JŚNĀ_1,1–1,3	namaḥ buddhāya āditya bandhoḥ kiraṇaiḥ iva anyaiḥ ātanyamāne kṣaṇa bhāji loke suptāḥ iva aniṣṭa vilāpinaḥ atas tala prahārāt iva cetayadhvam yat sat tat kṣaṇikam yathā jaladharaḥ santaḥ tu bhāvāḥ ime sattā śaktiḥ iha artha karmaṇi miteḥ siddheṣu siddhā na sā na api ekā eva vidhānya dā api para kṛt na eva kriyā vā bhavet dvedhā api kṣaṇa bhaṅga saṃgatiḥ atas sādhye ca viśrāsyati 
JŚNĀ_1,4	 atra prathama pāda upadarśitaḥ svabhāva hetuḥ ayam na tāvat asiddhaḥ tathā hi yadi nāma pratidarśanam sattva lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ tathā api iha athaṃkriyā sāmarthyam eva sattvam abhipretam hetu tayā upāttam tatra na asaṃbhavi sarvathā śakyam abhidhātum abhimatam vā keṣāñcid tad lakṣaṇā sahiṣṇavaḥ hi yadi param avyāptam asmad dūṣaṇam abhidadhyuḥ tatra yaḥ eva ete bhāvāḥ pramāṇa samadhigata artha kriyā viśeṣa vyāpārāḥ te eva pakṣīkṛtāḥ iti svarūpeṇa āśraya dvāreṇa vā na asiddhi śaṅkā ye punar artha kriyā sāmarthya saṃbhave api tattvataḥ anavadhārita tad bhāvāḥ teṣām idānīm pakṣāt bahis bhāve api paścāt nirūpayataḥ yadi artha kriyā upalambhaḥ bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyati eva anumāna antaram tad abhāve tu sādhya apratipattiḥ iṣṭā eva liṅga antara vat 
JŚNĀ_2,1^1	 nanu evam avyāpinī kṣaṇikatā siddhiḥ iti ced na yat kiñcid kadācid kvacid artha kriyāyām upayogi tasya sarvasya tad bhāva sādhanāya iṣṭa tvāt ca kvacid upayogini eva viśeṣa cintāyāḥ prakrama arha tvāt tasmāt na aniṣṭa rūpa parihāreṇa na ca hetu nirūpaṇa aśaktau na api sarvatra sādhya dharmavati dharmiṇi sakṛt anumāna pravṛtti viraha kṛtam prādeśika tvam sādhya siddheḥ īśvara ādi anumāna vat etena niścita artha kriyā śaktayaḥ bhāva bhedāḥ dharmiṇaḥ artha kriyā sāmarthya sāmānyam hetuḥ iti darśitam 
JŚNĀ_2,1^2	 athavā ime pratyakṣa ādi gocarāḥ sarve eva bhāvāḥ dharmiṇaḥ artha kriyā sāmarthyam hetuḥ tatra pramāṇa aviṣayasya kvacid api vidhi sādhana anumāne dharmīkartum aśakyatvāt pramāṇa viṣaye ca sarvatra anumāna pravṛtteḥ kā aparā vyāptiḥ sādhya siddheḥ pramāṇa gocara tayā dharmiṇaḥ na āśraya asiddhiḥ sādhanasya na api svarūpa asiddhiḥ yatas yeṣu tāvat avivādena bahis artha kriyā upalambhaḥ teṣu cintā eva na asti yeṣu api na sākṣāt tad avadhāraṇam tatra api pramāṇa jananāt eva artha kriyā sāmarthya vyavasthāpanam anavadyam adhyakṣe sākṣāt anumāne ca kārye pāramparyeṇa iti 
JŚNĀ_2,2–2,3	 atra kecid ācakṣate yad kārya kāriṇaḥ kāraṇasya sāmarthya vyavasthāpanam tasya eva katham sattva siddhiḥ tad asiddhau mūlasya api na artha sāmarthyam atha yathā aṅkura apekṣayā bījasya sāmarthyam tathā aṅkurasya api patra kāṇḍa ādi apekṣayāḥ tu buddheḥ api buddhi antara smṛti abhilāpa pravṛtti ādi apekṣayā sva para upakāra ādi apekṣayā vā iti syāt etat kevalam kārya parampara anusaraṇa paryavasāna abhāve yat ekam api kiñcid artha kriyā kāri kalayitvā kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanam tat na syāt yat eva ca kāryam paryavasāne anartha kriyā kāri tena eva pūrveṣām tad bhāva prasaṅge na ekam api artha kriyāśaktam siddhyati iti na asiddhi parihāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_2,4–3,1	 yat punar etat bhinna vyāvṛttika tayā sattā siddhau= api na kāryatva kṣatiḥ iti ucyate tat api na samyak vyāvṛtti bhede api hi sattva siddhau kṛtaka tvasya api katham siddhiḥ abhūtvā bhavanam hi kṛtaka tvam bhavanam ca bhavatām artha kriyā kāri tvam eva tatas artha kāri tva saṃdehe bhavatā uti eva na śakyam apekṣita para vyāpāra tvam svabhāva niṣpattau kṛtaka tvam iti api na asataḥ dharmaḥ sattā ca artha kriyā eva evam pratyaya bhede bheditvā ādayaḥ api saddharmāḥ na sattā niścaye abhidhātum śakyante iti atra ucyate na tāvat aṅkura ādayaḥ paritas nirasta vibhrama āśaṅke abhyāsa viśeṣa āsādita paṭimni pratyakṣa cetasi parisphurantaḥ na santaḥ śakyante abhidhātum adarśane api phalasya anyathā artha kriyāyām api na kaścid āśvāsaḥ iti saditara vyavahāra virahāt nirīham jagat jāyeta 
JŚNĀ_3,2–3,3	 atha sattva lakṣaṇam tāvat bhavatām artha kriyā sāmarthyam eva iti ced tat kim idānīm samaya siddhena lakṣaṇena pratyakṣa bādhaḥ abhidheyaḥ tat yadi bhavataḥ api lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ eva anena krameṇa vaktum iṣṭaḥ abhidhīyatām asmākam tu na tad lakṣaṇa prasādhanāya parikara bandhaḥ kim tu tad lakṣaṇena kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanāya atas tad lakṣaṇa anavadhāraṇam kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhi pratibandham ādadhīta kārye kārya antara darśane tu tatra api tad anumāna prasavaḥ krameṇa kena vāryate idānīm tu artha kriyā samarthasya eva pakṣīkaraṇāt pakṣa bahiḥ bhūte sādhya sādhanayoḥ asiddhau= api na kaścid doṣaḥ iti ukta prāyam tasmāt sāmayika lakṣaṇa kṣatau= api kim punar aniścaya mātre paṭutara pratyakṣa bala avalambita vastu bhāve aṅkura ādi vastuni vastu dharmasya kāryatvasya virodhaḥ iti tad apekṣayā bīja ādikam artha kriyā sāmarthya samarthana saham eva katham asiddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_3,4^1	 nanu artha kriyā sāmarthyam itarat vā vastu lakṣaṇam aspṛśata indriya jñānena katham vastu tvam upasthāpitam iti ucyate tat api yat kiñcid anubhave pramāṇa antara cintāyāḥ niravakāśa tvāt dṛśyate hi śāstrīya lakṣaṇa anullekhepi abhyāsa bhāvita pratyakṣa udaya mātrāt vastu tvam avasāya pravṛttiḥ avisaṃvāda bhāginī iti kim atra kriyatām evam tu syāt yadi paramārthataḥ artha kriyā sāmarthyam eva vastu tvam tadā idam atas jāyate iti janma adhiraṇam vastu ullikhatā adhyakṣeṇa artha kriyā sāmarthyam eva ullikhitam atha anyat eva vastu lakṣaṇam tadā tat eva ullikhitam yathā triguṇa maya tvam itarad vā anullikhitā tad abahis bhūtam nīlam nīla grāhiṇā gṛhītam eva ātad siddham adhyakṣeṇa vastu tvam aṅkura ādeḥ kārya tā saṃvāde api kārya antara adarśane api kāraṇasya bīja ādeḥ artha sāmarthyam avasthāpayati iti 
JŚNĀ_3,4^2	 kārya vat tarhi bīja ādikam api pratyakṣa udayāt eva astu vastu sat kimartha sāmarthya gaveṣaṇena iti ced na vai vastu vyavahāre pratyakṣa pāṭavam paribhūya artha śaktim anusarāmaḥ tasyāḥ api pratyakṣa adhīna tvāt kim tu kṣaṇa bhaṅgam aṅgīkārayitum pratyakṣa kṛtaḥ hi vastu vyavahāraḥ ukta krameṇa tad atad lakṣaṇa sādhāraṇaḥ na kṣaṇika tva sādhanāya niyamena prabhavati artha kriyā sāmarthyam tu vastu lakṣaṇam abhavat api yatra svayam vartate tatra avaśyam tat anupanīya na svarūpa sattām āviśati tatas sādhana tvena asya prastāvaḥ atra na vastu lakṣaṇa tvena iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_4,1	 evam jñāne api svarūpa saṃvedanam sattva avyabhicārī iti sarvam pūrvavat tat anena api viṣayasya sāmarthya siddhiḥ avyāhata iti veditavyam pareṇa hi para vedane bhrānti śaṅkā avakāśaḥ sva rūpa vedane punar sarvathā tad abhāvaḥ eva atha sva vedane vipratipadyeta tadā eka artha samavāyinā api jñānena vedana svīkāre aṅkura ādi vat eva pareṇa api svarūpa upadhānāt na kaścid doṣaḥ anyathā dṛṣṭa artha vyavahāra hāniḥ sarvathā prasajyeta 
JŚNĀ_4,2	 nanu viṣaya jñānayoḥ hetu phala bhāvaḥ eva katham avagantavyaḥ upalambhāt pūrvam viṣayasya anupalambhāt vyatireka balāt iti brūmaḥ sati ca bāhye arthe sthira itaratva nirṇaya ārambhaḥ tasmāt artha kriyā kāri kadambaka pakṣīkaraṇa vat pramāṇa gocara cakra pakṣīkaraṇe a pi na āśraya svarūpa dvārā dvividhā api asiddhiḥ asthira sādhanasya 
JŚNĀ_4,3	 atha artha śakteḥ sarvathā sūkṣma vicāra asaha tvāt artha śaktam sarvam iti kva pakṣīkaraṇam kim vā sādhanam iti ced nanu bīja ādeḥ aṅkura ādiṣu dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ na hi dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma sarvasya hi vicāra nāmnaḥ pramāṇasya anubhavaḥ eva sīmā kim ca evam anicchan prāmāṇikaḥ katham dhūmāt api dahanam anumāsyati jalajvalanayoḥ vāta ātapa śīta ārtaḥ sadṛśīm pravṛttim ālambeta apravṛttim vā bhavān eva katham vā mithyā śaktimāropayatā pareṇa sādhane upanyaste tad abhāvam vidvān eva etat parājaya āśaṃsī dūṣaṇa upanyāsa uttaritaḥ asti tatra api asiddhi ādikam eva vaktum ādriyase na tu jāti uttaram tat etat āyātam na ātmanā api pratyayaḥ iti tasmāt brūyāḥ kiñcid kenacid pratāritaḥ durapahnavā tu śaktiḥ artheṣu sa ābhāsā ced saṃvṛttyā na parama arthena astu yathā tathā saṃvṛttyā parama arthena vā kim atra nirbandhena 
JŚNĀ_5,1^1	 atha bhāva sāṃvṛta śakti samanvayinī kṣaṇikatā api sāṃvṛtī syāt na pāramārthikī iti matiḥ tatra api ucyate iha tattva abhyāsaḥ abhyudaya niḥśreyasa phala hetuḥ iti nityān ityādi vicāram ārabhante santaḥ tat aniścaye abhyāsa anupapatteḥ sa ca abhyāsaḥ nityeśvara ādi datta sāhāyakaḥ tad nirapekṣaḥ vā tad phala hetuḥ syāt iti īdṛśi prakaraṇe pramāṇa parīkṣā dakṣāṇām kṣaṇa bhaṅga avatāraḥ atra yadi parama puruṣa artha sādhanam aniṣṭa parihāreṇa śakti sthitinā antarīyaka tayā saṃvṛtiḥ eva iyam kṣaṇikatā api saṃvṛtiḥ eva astu parama puruṣa artha upayogena eva kṣaṇikatāyām ādarāt 
JŚNĀ_5,1^2–5,2	 kim asmākam parama artha cintayā yatra na pramāṇa prameya vibhāgaḥ sādhya sādhana vyavahāraḥ vā kaścid atha parama arthe api evam saṃbhavati tadā tadākṛṣṭaḥ śakti sambhavaḥ tad anvayī vā kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ na pāramārthika tvam āpatati pramāṇa prameya vibhāga ādi abhāve tu sarvathā caitanya vyāvṛttau sva cit mātra vyavasthitau vā pakṣa dharma tva ādi abhāva niścaya kāla vat kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ abhavanti api na pīḍayati tatra kṣaṇikatā siddhiḥ atāt tvikī iti yaḥ trāsayati sa svarga apavarga phala prāptiḥ apāram ārthikī iti kim na trasyati tasmāt yāvat sādhya sādhana bhāva vyavahāraḥ tāvat parīkṣā kṣamam iti eva pāramārthika tvam mūla dūṣaṇam prati sūkṣma vicāra antarasya asat kalpa tvāt iti alam ati vistareṇa 
JŚNĀ_5,3^1	 etena yadasthāna abhiniveśinā nyāya bhūṣaṇa kāreṇa bhāṣya kārīyam kārya kāraṇa bhāva dūṣaṇa prabandham utthāpya varṇitam tat sarvam nirupayogam iti pratipāditam tathā hi yadi etāvataḥ śramasya asiddha tā udbhāvanāyām eva upayogaḥ kim anena kartavyam asiddhiḥ ca parihṛtāḥ puruṣa artha samīhayā vastu tattva nirūpaṇa pravṛttasya śakti siddhinā āntarīyaka vyāpāra tvāt tatas eva tathā krama ākramābhyām kārya utpattiḥ vyāptā iti etat api asiddham iti yat uktam tat api niravakāśam yat api anena tat tad āśaṅkya uttara abhimānāt paryante sāṃvṛta tva artha kriyā pātāt artha kriyā samartham yat tat atra parama artha sat iti ukti vaiyarthyam udbhāvya likhitam yathā saṃvṛtya artha kriyā samartham tathā tat parama artha sat iti ced sāmānya avayavi saṃyoga ādeḥ kim na tathā sattvam iṣṭam 
JŚNĀ_5,3^2	 tasya saṃvṛttyā api asāmarthyam iti ced na anvaya vyatireka pratibhāsasya ubhayathā tulya tvāt tathā hi yatra yatra cakṣuḥ pravartate tatra tatra taimirika keśa ādi vat na stambha ādi pratibhāsaḥ bhavati iti stambha ādeḥ sāmarthya gatiḥ tathā mahiṣa ādiṣu gavā ādi anvaya buddhiḥ na bhavati paramāṇu mātreṣu saṃyoga ādi rahiteṣu ca avayavi saṃyoga buddhiḥ na bhavati iti sāmānya ādeḥ api sāmarthya gatiḥ iti tat api asāram na hi saṃvṛtiḥ iti eva parigrahaḥ tyāgaḥ vā bāla saṃvṛteḥ api grahaṇa prasaṅgāt paṇḍita saṃvṛteḥ api parama puruṣa artha sādhana pravaṇāyāḥ tyāga prasaṅgāt avicārita ramyā hi pratītiḥ saṃvṛtiḥ asti ca bālakasya darpaṇa tala avalīna satya vadana grahaḥ vicāra vidhuraḥ puruṣa artha sādhana grahaḥ vā paṇḍitānām tvad vicāreṇa vidhuritaḥ na ca tyājyaḥ tad parityāge kṣaṇa bhaṅga parīkṣā anapekṣāyāḥ iṣṭa tvāt 
JŚNĀ_6,1–6,4	 atha bauddhasya ayam vicāraḥ mama tu atra aniṣṭiḥ eva tatas bauddhasya eva siddhānta virodhaḥ sādhanasya ca vādya siddha tā doṣaḥ iti ced sa tāvat ayam vicāraḥ pramāṇam apramāṇam vā pramāṇa tve tava eva ayam na mama iti vibhāga anupapattiḥ pratyuta pramāṇāt bahirbhāva svīkāre na adhikāraḥ prativāde api tava iti āyātam atha apramāṇam tadā yadi nāma āgama pradeśa pratipāditaḥ arthaḥ kaścid na samarthaḥ prakṛtasya tu na kṣatiḥ tat etat āyātam yadi kiñcid kvacid śāstre na yuktam pratiṣidhyate bruvāṇaḥ yuktam api anyat iti rāja kula sthitiḥ iti sautra antika samaya sthitasya hi kṣaṇa bhaṅgam prasādhayataḥ sthiti antara virodhaḥ na bādhakaḥ anyathā ākāśam dvau nirodhau ca nityam trayam asaṃskṛtam 
JŚNĀ_6,5^1	 iti anena kim nava abhidhānam naiyāyikasya ca upamānam pramāṇam icchataḥ vaiśeṣika apekṣayā katham na siddhānta virodhaḥ bhinna prasthāna tvam tu samānam śakti saṃśrayaḥ ca na sautra antika nītim atikramya yadi tu tatra api na syāt śakti sthitiḥ tadā sva pratibhāsa mātram ācaṣṭe na bauddha siddhānta sthitaḥ iti syāt tasmāt naya antara virodhe api na siddhānta virodha yogaḥ na api vādya siddhiḥ na ca vastu bala pravṛtta anumāne śāstra anurodhaḥ kaścid tad vicāra prāmāṇye tu sāṃvṛta tve api artha śakteḥ avaśya abhyupagantavyatayā tad upanīta kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhi bādhita nitya abhimata sāmānya samavāya ādi kalpanam adhara saṃvṛti tvāt bāla saṃvṛti vat na upādeyam artha kriyā śaktau 
JŚNĀ_6,5^2	 aśaktau sva viṣaya jñāna janane api ayogyasya sattva abhyupagamaḥ saṃvṛtiḥ astu kim tu adharataḥ api adhara iti niścayaḥ ataeva adhara adhara saṃvṛti apekṣayā uttarottarāsu paramārtha tvena vyavasthāpyamāna avaśya abhyupagantavyā niruttara artha kriyā eva saṃvṛtiḥ parama arthaḥ iti tayā sat paramārtha sat ucyate tathā hi bālasya darpaṇa tale vadana graham apekṣya asat eva vadanam atra khyāti iti parama arthaḥ iti ucyate tad apekṣayā ca darpaṇa pratihati vyāvṛttyā netra aṃśavaḥ sva mukham eva gṛhṇāti iti parama arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_6,5^3	 evam uttarottara parikalpeṣu balavatsu pūrva pūrvaḥ saṃvṛtiḥ uttarottaraḥ parama arthaḥ yāvat artha kriyā sthitiḥ tad atikrame hi grāhya grāhaka bhaṅgāt āyātam pratibhāsa mātra vyavasthānam iti kva saṃvṛteḥ vārtā tasmāt saṃvṛtīnām antimārtha kriyā śaktiḥ eva parama artha śabda vācyā iti na saṃvṛti mātra tvena sāmānya ādi saṃvṛtiḥ tad kalām adhirohati tad vicāra prāmāṇyam tu gaja nimīlikayā avadhīrya tattvataḥ eva śaktiḥ paramārthaḥ tatra tatra ucyate sāmānya ādayaḥ ca saṃvṛtisantaḥ iti evam avayavi saṃyoga ādayaḥ api saṃvṛti santaḥ tadvat ubhayathāḥ veditavyāḥ śakteḥ parama artha tayā nitya tā abhyupagama tvāt kṣaṇa sthiti dharma tāyāḥ 
JŚNĀ_6,5^4	 aṇavaḥ eva hi viśiṣṭa utpannā dravya dvayam vā saṃyoga śūnyam tad tad buddhi sādhanam iti kim avayavi ādinā tat katham sāmānya ādi parigrahaḥ saṃvṛti mātra tvena artha kriyā samīkriyate yadi ca tāvatā eva sāmyam kim upapatti ghoṣaṇena mā bhūt adhara saṃvṛti tvam iti niyama upanyāsaḥ tat ca śakti samanvayinaḥ tad ādhārasya vā kṣaṇa bhaṅga saṅgamena durnivāram yathā uktam prāk śakti samanvaya abhāve tad ādhārasya api saṃvṛti sattve kutas tad dharmasya sāmānya ādeḥ adhara saṃvṛti tva parihāraḥ tasmāt saṃvṛti mātra tvam eva sāmyam tatra ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ yā ca iyam upapattiḥ buddhivyatirekaḥ nāma sā api apohe cintayiṣyate 
JŚNĀ_8,1^1	 yat ca idam ūce kim ca yadi anirūpita tattvā pratītiḥ saṃvṛtiḥ tatas eva kārya kāraṇa vyavasthitiḥ iṣṭā tathā satya kṣaṇikānām eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sarva vyavahāri prasiddhaḥ anvarthaḥ jñeyaḥ kim tatra sūkṣma vicāreṇa iti tat api ayuktam tathā hi yaḥ tāvat tattvataḥ eva kṣaṇa bhaṅgura bhāva grāma sādhanāya sādhanam āha sautra antikaḥ sva cit mātrā sthitau sādhana dūṣaṇa avadhāna abhāvāt tasya tāttvikam eva sāmarthyam trividham pratyakṣa anupalambha upalabhyam katham tasya ayam upālambhaḥ para viṣaya pramāṇa upasthāpitam anyam vā parihṛtya katham āsitum asau samarthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_8,1^2	 tāvatā ca tāttvikī kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhi rakṣaṇikānām eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvam sāṃvṛtam upapādayati iti kim asya aṅgīkaraṇa prayāsena na ca vicāraḥ parisphuran= eva parihartum śakyaḥ chāyā dravyatā ādi niṣedha īśvara siddhi ādiṣu api anādara prasaṅgāt tad aniṣṭa vādinaḥ pratītasya api vicārasya sūkṣma tvāt iti kṛtam idānīm śāstra paramparā pariśrameṇa tatas ca kim tatra sūkṣma vicāreṇa iti vimucya vicāraḥ cāruḥ asau na bhavati yena akṣaṇika kṣepaḥ iti vaktum ucitam tat ca na pratijñā mātreṇa sidhyati asmābhiḥ tu nityam atyetum sādhanam upanyastam na ca tatra doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_8,2^1	 atha prastuta sūkṣma vicāra ādare sūkṣma vicāra antarasya api avakāśa prasaṅgaḥ doṣaḥ eva yat āha sūkṣma īkṣikayā hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt bhedaḥ eva syāt tvad uktāt nyāyāt iti idam api śraddhā jaḍasya eva śobhate yāvat hi bhāvānām artha kriyā śakti parityāgam na sahāmahe tāvat avyāhataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga aṅgīkāraḥ nitya nigrahaḥ ca yadā tu śakti vivecana vi cāra antare ca balavati cetaḥ kramiṣyate tadā kṣaṇikatā vimokṣam api iti akṣamaḥ samāna tvāt daṇḍasya na ca evam śakteḥ upagamaḥ nityatām anitya tām ca pratyujjīvayitum śaknoti asādhāraṇa tvāt 
JŚNĀ_8,2^2–9,1	 tathā hi na khalu śaktiḥ iti pramāṇa śūnyam eva kiñcid kvacid kadācid asti iti avimokṣaḥ kim tarhi etat vīja ādikam aṅkura ādi samartham iti anena ākāreṇa pratyakṣa prativedya tayā eva tat ca pratyakṣam yathā anvaya vyatireke pramāṇam iṣṭam tathā kāryāṇām kramītara tvepī iti evam prakāreṇa nyāyena śaktiḥ kṣaṇikatāyām viśrāmyantī na nitya sādhāraṇī iti katham ubhayoḥ api pratyujjīvanam tat evam balavati hetu phala tā bhraṃśa śaṃsinī vicāre śakti siddhā kṣaṇikatā eva asti sā saṃvṛtiḥ nityatā tu adhara saṃvṛtiḥ eva iti sāmānya vat bhāvyam tad vicāra balane tu na kiñcid āśaṃka āsthānam iti siddhā eva śaktiḥ tat katham ucyate tathā api asiddha tvāt na sattvena kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ na api artha kriyāyāḥ krama ākramābhyām vyāpti siddhiḥ iti sāṃvṛta śakti pakṣe api nirvāhasya darśita tvāt 
JŚNĀ_9,2	 nanu yathā saṃvṛtau parama puruṣa artham prārthayamānasya upāya anveṣaṇa pravṛttasya na artha śaktim ana āśritya sthātum śaktiḥ tathā mayā tad phala lābhinā bhāvyam iti upāya anveṣaṇāt nitya tā grahaḥ api avaśyam āyāta iti nityaḥ api sat saṃvṛti sat na bhavatu katham adhara saṃvṛti viṣayaḥ nitya ātmā tu cintā antaram arhati na ca tanmātreṇa upagama arhaḥ yatas saṃvṛti viśeṣa viṣayaḥ syāt evam śakti grahaḥ anveṣaṇe prayojakaḥ astu śaktyā kim kartavyam iti abhidadhīta nāma na tu śakti vyatikramaḥ anena vacasā dalitaḥ śakti grahasya upāya anveṣaṇa hetu tva svīkārāt na tu evam ātmani śakyam śakti grahaḥ api saṃvṛtti ā iva prayojakaḥ iti ced astu saṃvṛttayā tattvena vā śakti siddhau ca punar ātma grahasya api prayojaka tva siddheḥ na avaśyam ātma siddheḥ ākṣepaḥ iti nirṇaya apekṣaṇe kṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ tad bādhani iti ukta prāyam hetu phala grahaṇe vyavasthita pratisandhātṛ siddhivādaḥ tu prastoṣyate anekānta cintāyām 
JŚNĀ_9,3	 yat api idam uktam sūkṣma īkṣikayā api tvad mataḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇam naṣṭam bhavati anyena anyasya apratibaddhasya grahaṇa anabhyupagamāt pratibandhaḥ ca dviṣṭhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa advaya grāhiṇā na gṛhyate iti anumānasya tatra apravṛtteḥ asmad mate tu kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya api na grahaṇa anupapattiḥ pratyakṣasya ekakṣaṇa viṣaya tva niyama anabhyupagamāt tathā ca vyāpti grahaṇa samarthana prastāve asmad ādi pratyakṣam api atota anāgata ādi viṣayam kadācid adṛṣṭa ādi hetu vaśāt pravartate iti samarthitam na hi anyathā kāraṇa tāvāda pratītiḥ saṃbhavati iti tat api sakalam viphalam tathā hi pareṇa parasya vedanam tāvat ubhayoḥ api kṣaṇiketara vādinoḥ iṣṭam tatra ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa advaya grahaṇam nāma nyāya viruddham etat dvaya grahaṇam eva nyāyyam tathā ca sati kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇasya na vyāghātaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādī api tathā upagacchan kiyatīm kṣatim āsādayet na hi adṛṣṭam aniṣṭam eva asya 
JŚNĀ_10,1–10,3^1	 pūrvam api eṣa siddhāntam sva icchayā eva gṛhītavān kathañcid anyam sa punar grahītum labhate na kim atha kathañcid advaya grahaṇam eva nyāyyam tadā tad viparītam kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇa pravaṇam api tvad iṣṭi mātram kutra upayogi atha kṣaṇa bhaṅga vāde kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇam api na prāpnoti iti ākūtam tarhi asti kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti virodhaḥ udbhāvyatām na asiddhiḥ tatra ca vakṣyāmaḥ yat api idam uktam anādi vāsanātaḥ eva iyam pratītiḥ iti ced na atra api pramāṇa abhāvāt iti tatra api kāya citta vyatirikta ātma dravya samavāye vastu antara dharma adharma lakṣaṇa guṇa prasādhaka mayam pramāṇam upanyasitum śaktaḥ na aparaḥ cetaḥ śakti viśeṣaḥ karma iti asya prasādhakam iti mahatī śraddhā citta śaktiḥ eva hi vāsanā iti abhidhīyate tasmāt asaṃsṛṣṭa kṣaṇa mātra vedana vādinaḥ hi vyavahārasya anādiḥ abhyāsaḥ tatas vāsanā tatas mithyā pratītiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_10,3^2	 etat sarvam andhaparamparāvadapramāṇakam iti api dhandha andha vilasitam iti mantavyam asaṃsṛṣṭa kṣaṇa mātra vedana vādī hi prastutaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādī sautra antikaḥ iti arthaḥ tasya kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ mithyā pratītiḥ iti mahatī bhrāntiḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva apalāpī tu yoga ācāraḥ sva saṃvid mātra vedana vādī iti vaditum ucitam na ca tasya dūṣaṇena kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādinaḥ kiñcid hetu phalā palāpinaḥ api yadi tad apalāpāya nyāya saṃbhavaḥ tadā tat api na dūram iti kim atra nirbandhena iti sthitam etat yadi kārya kriyāśaktiḥ tāttvikī tad itarā vā ubhayathā api na asiddhi dūṣaṇa avatāraḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_11,1	 na api ayam viruddhaḥ hetuḥ sa pakṣīkṛte jalabhṛti darśanāt sādhya viparyaya vyāpti lakṣaṇasya viruddhasya sādhyavati darśana anupapatteḥ nanu sāhasam etat kvacid api dhiyaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga gocarīkaraṇa sāmarthya anupalabdheḥ tathā avasāya abhāvāt na ca pramāṇa bala avalambanāt ambude kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ pratyakṣataḥ hi saḥ eva ayam toyadaḥ iti pratyabhijñānam asya kāla antara sthāyitām eva upasthāpayati tad bādhita tvāt ca anumānam anavakāśam na ca anumānam anyat asti sattva anumāne ca punar nidarśana antara samīkṣāyām anavasthā prasaṃgaḥ tasmāt sa pakṣe adarśanāt na virodha parihāraḥ vipakṣībhūte ambhaḥ bhṛti bhāvāt ca avirodhaḥ eva anaikāntika tvasya asattvasya pakṣe ca kṣaṇa bhaṅga pratijñāyāḥ pratyakṣa bādhāḥ 
JŚNĀ_11,2^1	 yat āha śaṃkaraḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva sthiti viparyaya abhāvasya siddha tvāt iti na ca ayam eka tā grahaḥ pūrva apara kālayoḥ apramāṇam saṃvādi tvāt tathā ca nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ yathā ca idam asat kāryam iti asyāḥ pratīteḥ visaṃvāda abhāvāt eva prāmāṇyam tathā anena etāni krameṇa kṛtāni na yugapad iti pratīteḥ saḥ eva aham saḥ eva ayam sphaṭikaḥ iti evam ādi pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca visaṃvāda abhāvāt eva prāmāṇyameṣṭavyam tulya yogakṣema tvāt iti tat etat asaṃgatam aliṅgasya hi vikalpasyā visaṃvādaḥ nāma artha kriyā prāptiḥ pramāṇa antara saṃgatiḥ vā syāt tatra saḥ eva iti adhyavasāya mātrāt na apara pramāṇa vṛttiḥ atra 
JŚNĀ_11,2^2	 artha kriyā api na eka pratibaddhā siddhā kācid bhinnena api tad samāna śaktinā tādṛś artha kriyāyāḥ karaṇa avirodhāt tathā hi yathā ekaḥ ghaṭaḥ vāri dhārayati iti tad kāla bhāvinaḥ api anyasya na vāri dhāraṇam tathā dvitīya kṣaṇe api anyaḥ yadi vāri dhārayati tadā kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ syāt visadṛśa kriyāyām tu cintā eva na asti tasmāt yathā pāvaka ādeḥ pāka ādi kriyā pratibaddhā siddha anubhūyamānāḥ dahana jñānasya saṃvādam āpādayati na tathā prathama carama kālayoḥ ekībhāva pratibaddhā kācid kriyā upalabdhi gocarā yayā eka bhāva grahaḥ api saṃvādī syāt 
JŚNĀ_12,1^1	 sarveṣām sarvadā ekādhyavasāya sāmyāt kim apara saṃvāda apekṣayā iti ced na asiddha tvāt yadi api hi samāna śaktibhiḥ eka tvam avaseyam tathā api sarvaiḥ iti na śakyam asarva vidā atīndriya darśinām sura muni yoginām ullaṃghanīya tayā teṣu kaścid kadācid kṣaṇa bhaṅga darśī yadi syāt na virodhaḥ adhika adhika śakti darśanam ca saṃbhāvanā bījam yadi tu svabhāvaḥ eva ayam kṣaṇa bhaṅga nāmā na bhavati na taiḥ grahaṇam iti yuktam etat tat ca nirūpayitum ārabdham atas yāvat na svabhāva siddhiḥ tāvat na sarveṣām kṣaṇa dhvaṃsa niṣedha adhyavasāya siddhiḥ atīndriya darśi dveṣiṇaḥ hi na anupalabdhi mātreṇa niṣedham abhidadhānāḥ sādhavaḥ atiprasaṅgāt yogyā anupalabdhiḥ tu deśa ādi viprakarṣiṇī a samartha iti āstām tāvat 
JŚNĀ_12,1^2	 katipaya saṃpratipattiḥ tu taimirika kalita keśa ādiṣu api saṃbhavinī na saṃvādam avasthāpayitum śaknoti etat ca pratyakṣa apekṣayā ucyate anumānataḥ tu kṣaṇa bhede bhāva bhedam pratiyantaḥ kim iha api pariṣadi niṣeddhum śakyante tad sādhana abhyāsasya kvacid anivāraṇāt tasmāt na sarveṣām adhyakṣa kṛtaḥ anumāna ātmā vai eka adhyavasāyaḥ niyamena bheda adhyavasāya niṣedhaḥ vā iti na pramāṇa antara vat saṃvāda saṃvāditam asya prāmāṇyam lūna punar jāta keśa kuśa ka dala kāṇḍa ādiṣu vyabhicārāt ca yat punar anena viśeṣa vacana abhimāninā abhihitam atha visaṃvādinī api pratyabhijñā dṛśyate kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ kim visaṃvādinī api na dṛśyate yā visaṃvādinī sā kārya kāraṇa pratītiḥ eva na bhavati apramāṇa tvāt iti ced samānam atra api visaṃvādinī yā sā pratyabhijñā eva na bhavati tad ābhāsa tvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_12,2	 syāt etat yadi kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratīti vat lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ pratipādayitum śakyeta tathā hi kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītau= api yadi vastu mātreṇa jananam dhūma ādeḥ gṛhṇīyāt gardabha ādi vyabhicāreṇa vahnau= api hastakam tyajet evam anvaya mātreṇa vyatireka mātreṇa vā yathāyogam bhāvyam yadā punar anvaya vyatireka grahaṇa pravaṇa pratyakṣa anupalambha sambhavaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratyayaḥ puraskriyate yathā nirṇītam asmābhiḥ trika pañcaka cintāyām na sthitam tatra na anyasmāt jātam na āyātam anyatas yasya bhāve bhavet kāryam na ced tasya na kasyacid iti tadā tu avyabhicāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_13,1	 evam yadi pratyabhijñāne api lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ darśitaḥ syāt darśayitum vā śakyaḥ vyabhicāra avi abhicāra upayogī tadā yuktam etat na ca evam asti sarvatra atyanta sadṛśa vastuni pṛthagjana pratyabhijñāyāḥ eka rasa tvāt yadi ca avaśyam etāvatā kālena bhrānti bhraṃśaḥ bhavati iti kāla niyamaḥ syāt tadā api ucitam etat yāvatā chinnodbhinna keśa pāśa ādau puruṣa āyuṣa kṣayeṇa api na ekatā bhrama bhraṃśaḥ avaśyam yatnavataḥ bhavati eva iti ced na tatra api niyama abhāvāt prayatamānasya api hi vacana mātram apramāṇam upapatti antaram ca durlabham yadi ca upapatti antaram pratyabhijñā asiddha eka tva bādhakam prastute api kim na evam āsthīyate kevalam pratyabhijñayā atītam anumānam varākam asamartham idānīm keśa ādau tava vacana mātram api samartham iti mahatī parāmarśa śaktiḥ bhinne api keśa āda avabheda adhyavasāya darśanāt bhavatu tatra yathā kathañcid bheda saṃpratyayaḥ iti ced na anyatra api bahulam tathā darśanāt na hi stambham ekam apanīya niveśite sadṛśe stambha antare na bhavati eva pratyabhijñānam 
JŚNĀ_13,2	 evam ghaṭa paṭa sphaṭika ādiṣu api yatra yāvat atyanta sadṛśa lābhaḥ bhinna kāla darśane ca ayam nyāyaḥ sama samayam tu ayaḥ golaka yugala upalambhe api bhavati eva bheda vyavasāyaḥ tasmāt kāla bhedena eka abhimate api stambha ādau bhinnaḥ eva kim ayam eka tva adhyavasāyaḥ stambha antareṇa iva atha abhinnaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇya pratiṣedhī katham niṣedhyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_13,3	 atha kṣaṇa bhedena abhedasya adṛṣṭa pūrva tvāt na saṃśayaḥ iti ced na etat api sādhu na hi adṛṣṭam iti eva na asti iti śakyate vaktum sataḥ api sūkṣmatayā anupalakṣaṇāt tad kṣaṇa udaya vyaya deha upacaya apacaya vat tatas anupalakṣaṇe api bhedasya satta aṅga ullekha śekharaḥ durnivāraḥ saṃśayaḥ etāvat vimarśa abhāve tu itara janasya niścalaḥ eka avasāyaḥ syāt yauktaḥ tu saḥ api saṃśayaḥ eva kim ca kṣaṇa bhedena api bhedaḥ pramāṇa paridṛṣṭa tvāt dṛṣṭaḥ eva yathā dhārā ādau kiyati api nabhaḥ bhāge apara apara payaḥ pāte api tat eva idam udakam iti avadhāraṇasya viparyaya sthiteḥ ca saṃbhavāt 
JŚNĀ_14,1	 anabhyāsa daśāyām eka tā grahaḥ tatra stambha ādau tu abhyāsavataḥ api iti ced nanu kṣaṇa bheda bhāvini viśeṣe sarvatra eva asmādṛśaḥ anabhyāsaḥ iti upapāditam eva ambhaḥ stambha ādau tu tad kriyā sārtha sāmānya ālambanaḥ sarvatra abhyāsaḥ sthūla viṣayaḥ tasmāt na pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇa dvaye abheda sādhana vyāpāraḥ svīkartum śakyaḥ eka avasāya mātram tu sat api vyabhicārāt asamartham 
JŚNĀ_14,2–14,3	 nanu sarvatra nīla ādau pṛṣṭha bhāvinā vikalpena pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ anugamyamānaḥ prāmāṇyam upanayati tad ekatāvasāyaḥ api eka viṣayam eva prāmāṇyam asya dīpayatu iti ced na khalu sarvatra pṛṣṭha bhāvi vikalpa viṣaye prāmāṇyam indriya jñānasya marīci viṣayasya api jala avasāye jala viṣaye prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt vikalpa apekṣam tu prāmāṇyam iti tad anudaye na prāmāṇyam iti nyāyaḥ tad udaye tu saṃvāda apekṣam eva tat na ca eka adhyavasāyasya saṃvādaḥ saḥ iti āveditam etat nanu yatra bādhaḥ tatra aprāmāṇyam abādhite prāmāṇyam iti kim na paryāptam iyam gatiḥ avanata gagana pratibhāse api deśa kāla nara antara vyāpinī saṃbhavati nirūpyamāṇā truṭyati iti pratyabhijñāyām api samānam 
JŚNĀ_14,4	 kim ca ayam abādhaḥ nāma bādhā virahaḥ bādhā an upalabdhiḥ vā iti vikalpayoḥ kramāt asiddhiḥ anekāntaḥ ca duṣpratividhānaḥ anupalabdhi mātreṇa niṣedha asiddheḥ bādhakasya ca anumānasya abhidhāsyamāna tvāt atha pratyakṣa samākhyātā iyam pratyabhijñā katham anumānena bādhyate na ca abādhya tva pratijñānāt vādhakasya sadbhāva cintā avakāśe anumānasya api avakāśaḥ svayam eva dattaḥ prāmāṇyasya eva siddhi bādhanayoḥ adhikārāt pratyakṣam eva asyāḥ bādhakam astu iti ced saṃvādadraḍhimni pratyakṣa śatena api kim asyāḥ tatas pratyakṣeṇa api bādhanam asyāḥ saṃvāda śaithilyam saṃbhāvayat anumānam api sannidhāpayati 
JŚNĀ_15,1	 api ca māyā karaḥ śirasi nimajjitam golakam āsyena niḥsārayati iti pratyabhijñā śirasi chidra prasaṅga saṅgatena anumānena bādhyamānā kim na upalabdhāḥ bādhyamānāḥ na pratyakṣam iti prastute api astu atas pratyakṣa tva kīrtanam asyāḥ yācita kamaṇḍana mātram atrāṇam yathā ca avanata ākāśa pratibhāsaḥ sarva saṃpratipattau= api na abādhyaḥ eva tathā na avisaṃvādya iva iti api vyaktam tadvat eva ca eka tā grahaḥ sarva saṃpratipattau= api na avisaṃvādī na hi tad aparādhyavasāya udayam antareṇa praṇata ambara saṃvedane saḥ eva ayam iti pratyaye aparaḥ saṃvādaḥ artha kriyā ādi svabhāvaḥ saṃbhavati atas ca bādhaka abhāve api nāma aprāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ aśakya sādhanaḥ tadvat eva saṃvādena prāmāṇyam anvaśāsataḥ tad abhāvāt prāmāṇya vyavahāraḥ api kutas pratyabhijñāyāḥ ubhaya niścaya abhāve ca tad ubhaya avalambī saṃśayaḥ siddhaḥ tad lakṣaṇe kadala kāṇḍa ādau vyabhicāra darśanāt paripuṣṭa aniṣṭa aṅgaḥ ca tat kutas prāmāṇyam 
JŚNĀ_15,2–15,3	 kim ca yaḥ evam āha visaṃvādinī yā sā pratyabhijñā eva na bhavati tad ābhāsa tvāt iti tena śabda ādau prameya tvam hetūkṛtya yat sādhya vyabhicāri prameya tvam tat prameya tvam eva na bhavati tad ābhāsa tvāt iti api vaktavyam eva atha pramāṇa viṣaya tva mātram prameya tvam tat ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ api akṣīṇam evam tarhi pūrva apara ekīkaraṇa mātram pratyabhijñā arthaḥ tat ca vyabhicāriṇyāḥ api asti pratyabhijñā nāma kriyatām mā vā kevalam sā pramāṇam eva na bhavati iti vaktavyam prameya tvam api yat vyabhicāri tat liṅgam eva na bhavati iti api brūhi eka lakṣaṇa tayā yathā ekatra vyabhicāraḥ tathā anyatra api saṃbhavan na nivāryate iti pratyabhijñāne api na aśakyam 
JŚNĀ_15,4	 nanu agniḥ atra iti anumānam ananumānam ca hetvābhāsa kāle samāna ākāram tat katham ekatra āśvāsaḥ na anyatra hetu dvāreṇa viśeṣāt yathā hi ekam trirūpa liṅga niścaya janitam anyat anyathā yathā kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ eva kācid pariśuddhā yā adhyakṣa anupalabdhi sādhanāḥ kācid anyathā iti darśitam tathā ca sati bhinna lakṣaṇa tvāt na āśvāsān āśvāsa saṅkaraḥ tathā na pratyabhijñāyām śakyam anupahata indriyasya iva tat jñānasya vā vyabhicāriṇyām api vyāpārāt na aparaḥ paraiḥ api paridīpite viśeṣaḥ dīrgha kāla anubandha mātram tu bahala vyāmohāt adṛṣṭa ādi hetu prabhāvāt viparyaya sāmagrī samavadhāna parilambe api upapattimat yathā uktam prāk yat vā yatas kutaścid parokṣa artha pratipattim anumānam anumatya yatra vyabhicāraḥ tat liṅgam eva na bhavati anumānam vā iti nirvṛttim ālambamānaḥ pakṣa dharma tva ādikam liṅga lakṣaṇam tad prabhavam anumānam kim artham abhidadhyāt 
JŚNĀ_16,1^1	 atha vyabhicāriṇaḥ api vyabhicāra darśanam asamartham sāmagrī lābha vilambe vyabhicāra adarśana mātreṇa liṅga tva prasaṅgāt vaktavyam eva lakṣaṇam yadīkṣaṇāt nirvṛttiḥ anīkṣaṇāt anāśvāsaḥ ca jāyate tatas na prekṣaḥ tad anurūpa anuṣṭhāna prārambham āsādayet santi hi pratyanīka darśana sthānām sādhanāni cira kāla abhyāsa bhāvitā sama samādhi bala unmīla t adhyakṣa gocara vyabhicārāṇi kṣaṇikatā ādi sādhana vat tat kim idānīm vyabhicāra adarśana mātreṇa bhāvinyāḥ pramāṇa anupapatteḥ sādhanāni eva bhavantu tad anurūpa anuṣṭhānena vā viphala māyā samāviśatu prekṣaḥ pakṣa dharma tva ādi lakṣaṇe tu tad lakṣaṇa nirūpaṇāyām tad aprāptau tadā eva hastaka tyāgāt nāyāsam āviśati 
JŚNĀ_16,1^2	 tad lakṣaṇa prāptau vā tat eva upādadīta tat na vyabhicāra avalambanam sādhu vyatireka nirākaraṇāya eva viveka ārambhāt tat katham lakṣaṇam avācyam iti ced etat sarvam pratyabhijñāyām api ālocayan yāvat na lakṣaṇa bhedam paśyasi tau= at na ekasya aṃvyabhicāra ādarśī vyabhicāra adarśana mātreṇa aparasyām āśvāsam ekāntena kartum arhasi tasmāt lakṣaṇa yukte bādhā saṃbhave tad lakṣaṇam eva dūṣitam syāt iti sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ tat iyam pratyabhijñā vyapanayatu vyabhicāra śaṅkām kalaṅkitā tayā na kāla antara sthitim arthasya sthāpayitum prabhavati na api anumānam anavakāśayitum tat katham tad apekṣayā pratyakṣa bādhitaḥ pakṣaḥ ucyate sa pakṣe vā jaladhare katham anvaya abhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_16,2–17,1	 atha mā bhūt pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam tad anusārī sthira tā niścayaḥ vā kṣaṇikatva avadhāraṇam tu sa pakṣīkṛte katham yatas sa pakṣe sattvam hetoḥ upapadyate ucyate iha jaladharasya jala dhāraṇa kriyā samarthaḥ tāvat eka artha svabhāvaḥ aśakya parihāraḥ kṣaṇa antare ca dvitīya ādau tad kriyāyāḥ kṛta tvāt punar kartum aśakyatvāt tad jātīyām anya jātīyām vā kuryāt na kuryāt vā kām api kriyām iti pakṣaḥ evam tat kriyā karaṇa kṣaṇāt prāk api vaktavyam tatra yadi tad karaṇa samartha svabhāvaḥ ambhodharaḥ tad kṣaṇa vat kṣaṇa antare api katham kadācid kriyā vicchedaḥ kṣaṇa antara nivartanīya kriyā samartha svabhāva tve vā kṣaṇa antara vat tatra api kṣaṇe sajātīya itara kriyā prasava prasaṅgaḥ kṣaṇa antare api hi tat śāmarthyasya saṃbhavāt jananam tat ca anyadā api akṣīṇam kāryāṇi hi vilambante kāraṇā sannidhānataḥ samartha hetu sadbhāve kṣepaḥ teṣām tu kiṃkṛtaḥ 
JŚNĀ_17,2	 etena akaraṇa pakṣaḥ api pratikṣiptaḥ yadā vilambaḥ api asahyaḥ tadā dūra utsāditam akaraṇam asāmarthye vā samīhita samaye api akaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ sadā eka svabhāva tvāt svabhāva bhraṃśe ca pratikṣaṇam kṣayaḥ siddhaḥ jaladharasya tatra prayogaḥ yat yadā yat janana samartham tat tadā tat janayati eva yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī sva kāryam saḥ eva vā jaladharaḥ tad avasthāyām vāri dhārayan kṛṣī bala vilocana utsava ādi kāryam vāri vitaraṇa kāle vā tad kriyām śaktaḥ ca ayam ubhaya daśāyām ubhaya kāryam arjitum iti svabhāva hetu prasaṅgaḥ jananam antareṇa sāmarthya vyavasthāyām sarvasya sarvatra śakti vyavahāra prasaṅgaḥ niyataḥ ca ayam pratipannaḥ vyavahāraḥ na ca asya jananāt anyat nimittam upapadyate tatas janana vinābhāve vipakṣe niyamavat tvena kṣaṇa vyāpaka viyogena ātma sat tayā viyujyamānaḥ janana eva viśrāmyati iti samartha vyavahāra gocara tva mātra anubandhi janaka tvam siddham iti vyāpti siddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_17,3	 evam yat yadā yat karaṇa samartham tat tadā tat karoti eva yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī śaktaḥ ca ayam sakala kriyā atikrama kāle api iti anyadā sarvathā akaraṇa pakṣe yojyam asamartha svabhāva tve tu yat yatra aśaktam na tat tat karoti yathā śāli aṅkuram kodravaḥ aśaktaḥ ca ayam uda vāhanaḥ akaraṇa kṣaṇa vat kṣaṇa antare api iti vyāpaka virudva upalabdheḥ na kadācid kuryāt iti hetu arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_17,4	 viparyaya prayogaḥ ca yat yat na karoti na tat tatra śaktam yathā śāli aṅkuram akurvan kodravaḥ na karoti ca prathama kṣaṇa sādhyām kriyām dvitīya ādi kṣaṇe dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa sādhyām vā prathama kṣaṇaḥ iti vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ jaladharasya tad tad kriyāsu samartha asamartha svabhāva tayā pratikṣaṇam bhedam utpādayati iti 
JŚNĀ_18,1	 evam sarvathā akaraṇa apekṣayā yat yat na karoti na tat tatra samartham yathā śāli aṅkuram akurvan kodravaḥ na karoti ca akaraṇa kāle karaṇa kāla kāryām kriyām iti sāmarthya apekṣayā yat yat karoti na tat tatra aśaktam antyasām agrīvat karoti ca ayam toyadharaḥ toya dhāraṇam iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ asamartha kṣaṇāt bhinatti karaṇa samartham yathā hi jananena vyāpyate samartha sthiti yogyatā tathā jananam tayā api tat asāmarthya viruddham yat sāmarthyam tena vyāptam karaṇam upalabhyamāna sāmarthyam kadarthayati iti samartha asamartha svabhāvatayā svabhāva bhedaḥ siddhaḥ toyadasya tat katham sattvāt anyat anumānam na asti iti ucyate 
JŚNĀ_18,2–18,3	 atra ca samartha vyavahāra yogya tā jananayoḥ bhinna vyāvṛttika tayā sādhya aviśiṣṭa tā hetoḥ iti avāntaraiḥ kīrtitam dūṣaṇam anavakāśam veditavyam tasmāt ekārtha kāriṇaḥ kṣaṇa antara apekṣayā samartha itara svabhāva tayā bhedaḥ eva iti kṣaṇa bhaṅgi tayā sa pakṣa tām āvahati balāhake sattva siddhiḥ aviruddhāḥ nanu kṣaṇabhedeṣu avatiṣṭhamānasya api bhāvasya sahakāri saṃgama apekṣayā karaṇa akaraṇam upapadyamānam katham svabhāva bhedam āpādayitum prabhavati tatas yathā ukta prasaṅga maula hetuṣu anekāntaḥ kim punar asya samartha svabhāvasya saha kāribhiḥ kartavyam yat ayam anapekṣya sahakāriṇaḥ na sva kārya karmaṇi pravṛttim ālambate anupakāriṇī apekṣāyāḥ ayogāt svayam asamarthaḥ tu sāmarthyam arthayamānaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ apekṣate iti yuktam etat tatas akiñcitkarāḥ ca sahakāriṇaḥ apekṣā gocarāḥ ca iti vyāhatam 
JŚNĀ_18,4	 atra śakaraḥ sahakāri virahaḥ hi tasya asāmarthyam ucyate tat ca asya sahakāri sākalya hetubhiḥ apanīyate tayoḥ ekatra saha sthiti virodhāt sākalya hetubhyaḥ ca vaikalyasya eva vyāvṛttiḥ na tadvatas sākalyasya sahakāri viraha vyāvṛtti rūpa tvāt na ca sahakāri sākalya vaikalyayoḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāvābhyām tadvataḥ tad bhāva siddhiḥ tasya tābhyām anya tvāt ataeva sahakāri viraha vyāvṛtti hetoḥ na tadvataḥ tirobhāva siddhiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_19,1	 etat eva nyāya bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ api āha sahakāriṇaḥ tasya kam upakāram kurvanti yena taiḥ vinā na karoti iti ced kāryam eva kurvanti anya upakāra karaṇe hi sahakāri tvam eva na syāt tathā hi yadi tam eva kurvanti tadā tad kāriṇaḥ eva syuḥ na tad sahakāriṇaḥ tena saha ekam kāryam kurvantaḥ hi tad sahakāriṇaḥ abhidhīyante iti tathā bhavatu nāma anupakārakaḥ api sahakārī tathā yadi tasya prāk eva śaktiḥ asti kim na karoti na asti ced paścāt aśaktaḥ katham karoti paścāt śaktaḥ ced śakta aśaktayoḥ katham na nānātvam viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bhedaka tvāt iti āśaṃkya sahakāri sākalyam hi tasya śaktiḥ tad vaikalyam ca aśaktiḥ tena saha kāri vaikalye prāc aśaktaḥ ucyate paścāt sākalye ca śaktaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ ca bhedaḥ prasādhitaḥ tena śakti utpāde api na avaśyam tad utpādaḥ aśakti nivṛttau= api na avaśyam tadvataḥ nivṛttiḥ pratibandha abhāvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_19,2	 tat etat sarvam apoha prastāve dharma dharmiṇa uḥ abheda pratipādanena eva nirastam veditavyam sākalya vekalyayoḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāvābhyām dharmiṇaḥ eva tathā avasthānāt astu vā dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedaḥ eva na api saha kāriṇā āma kiñcitkara tve vipratipadyāmahe kevalam na tāvantaḥ eva sahakāriṇaḥ kārya kāriṇaḥ na api sākalyam eva kāryam arjati kim tu saḥ api bhāvaḥ tad artham taiḥ eva prayattam iti na vistareṇa upayogaḥ tasya ca bhāvasya yādṛśaḥ cara makṣaṇe akṣepa kriyā dharmā svabhāvaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva ced prathama kṣaṇe api tadā eva prasahya kurvāṇaḥ gīrvāṇa śāpena api na apahastayitum śaktaḥ kim punar tava amunā marma pīḍā janita viklava vikrośa mātreṇa yathā hi śakta aśakta tayā bhaṅga prasaṅga parihārāya sākalya vaikalya lakṣaṇa dharma antara svabhāve śakti aśaktī bhinna svabhāve kalpite tathā na saḥ api akṣepa kriyā dharmā svabhāvaḥ bhāvāt bhinnaḥ eva abhidhātum śakyaḥ bhāvasya akartṛ tva prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_19,3–19,4^1	 atha yathā śakti aśaktī bhinnau dharmau pratijānīmahe na ca tayoḥ udaya vyayābhyām bhāvasya kiñcid tathā akṣepa kriyā dharma tvam kṣepa kriyā dharma tvam ca dharma antaram eva tat ca sahakāri sannidhāna pratyaya bhāva ākṣepam udeti vyeti ca iti tathā eva bhāvasya na kiñcid iti ucyate ucyatām kevalam astu na idānīm kārya janma kāraṇa abhimatasya tādavasthyāt tathā hi yathā na sahakāriṇaḥ eva na api sākalyam eva janakam tathā sākalye sati jātam akṣepa kriyā dharma tvam api na prakṛtam bhāvam anapekṣya janakam janakatve api svayam eva bhāvasya janakatva svīkārāt kim tu prakṛtaḥ api bhāvaḥ kartā svīkartavyaḥ sa ca prācīnadaśa atas anatiricyamāna mūrtiḥ kurvan pūrvam api kuryāt akurvan vā paścāt api na kuryāt iti tad avasthaḥ paribhavaḥ yadi tu kādācid kam sākalyādi vastu antaram eva hetuḥ tadā kāryam api tad apekṣam kādācid kam iti nyāyyam etat evam yāvat yāvat dharma antara parikalpaḥ tāvat tāvat udāsīnaḥ bhāvaḥ atha akṣepa kriyā dharma tvam jātam kāryam tu tatas na utpadyate iti kaḥ ayam nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_19,4^2	 tat avaśyam kāryeṇa janitavyam tat ca ākṣepa kriyā dharma tvam prāk nāsa uditi kārya udayasya api na avakāśaḥ evam tarhi kāryāt pādana āntarīyakam akṣepa kāri tvam akṣepa kāri tvana āntarīyakaḥ ca kārya utpādaḥ iti vyaktam itaretara āśraya tvam anyathā na yadi kārya utpādana antaroyakam akṣepa kāri tvam na ākṣepa kāri tvena kārya udayākṣepaḥ yadi ca na ākṣepa kāritvana antaroyakaḥ kārya utpādaḥ akṣepa kāri tvāt prāk api syāt eka artha tve tu sākalye jāte satyakṣepa kāri tvam dharma antaram jātam iti kim anayā bhāṣaya abhihitam kāryam utpannam iti tathā ca sati na prakṛta doṣa parihāraḥ nahi kārya janmani vivādaḥ yat svarūpa apekṣaḥ tu kārya udayaḥ tasya sarvadā tādavasthyāt katham kadācid katā iti cintyate 
JŚNĀ_20,1	 tasmāt akṣepa kriyā dharmā iti janayati iti vā yat svarūpa puraskāreṇa iyam abhikhyā tasya prāk api sattve katham ajani kadācid akṣepa kriyā dharmaka pratyanoka svabhāvasya vā prācyasya paścāt anuvṛttau katham kadācid api kārya saṃbhavaḥ atha yadi saḥ eva ekaḥ kartā syāt yuktam etat kim tu sāmagrī janikā tad saha kāryantara viraha velāyām balīyasaḥ api na kārya prasavaḥ iti kim atra viruddham eka artha karaṇāt ca sahakāri tvam uktam na upakāreṇa iti 
JŚNĀ_20,2	 atra ucyate yadi militāḥ santaḥ kāryam kurvate tadā eka artha karaṇa lakṣaṇam sahakāri tvam eṣām astu kaḥ niṣeddhāḥ militaiḥ eva tu tat kāryam kartavyam iti kutas labhyate pūrva apara kāryayoḥ eka tve tāvat bhāvasya sarvadā jananā jananayoḥ anyatara niyama prasaṅgasya durnivāra tvāt tasmāt sāmagrī janikā na ekam janakam iti sthira vādinām manorathasya anya viṣayaḥ dṛśyate tāvat evam iti ced ataeva na sthairya pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ iti brūmaḥ sarvaḥ hi prasaṅgaḥ viparyaya paryavasānaḥ tatas yadi nityatā syāt janayituḥ janyam sarvadā syāt na vā kadācid api iti na ca evam sākalyaḥ eva kadācid kārya utpattiḥ iti niyamena svabhāva bhaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_21,1–21,2	 nanu yadi kvacid nityam sarvadā kāraṇam upalabdham syāt tadā kvacid nitya tva abhyupagame sadā kartṛ tva prasaṅgaḥ saṃgacchate yāvatā sarvadā tasya abhāvāt katham etādṛśam prasañjayitum śakyate tat etat api grāmyam tathā hi nitya tve sati iti asya ayam arthaḥ para kāla bhāvī janakaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhāvasya saḥ eva yadi pūrva kāla bhāvī pūrva kāla bhāvī vā yaḥ ajanakaḥ svabhāvaḥ saḥ eva yadi para kāla bhāvī tadā tad upalabdham eva jananam ajananam vā syāt iti tathā ca sati siddhayoḥ eka tva ārope siddham eva jananam ajananam vā prasajyeta na pūva para svabhāvayoḥ eka tva saṃbhavān nitya tve satī iti ucyate iti kim atra viruddham 
JŚNĀ_21,3	 atha pūrva parayoḥ ekatvam na upalabdham katham āropyate iti manīṣā evam sati śuktau= api rajata āropeṇa na bhāvyam na hi rajata svarūpā śuktiḥ kvacid upalabdhi gocaraḥ āropyamāṇam tu rajatam kadācid upalabdham eva iti nāra upakṣatiḥ iti bhavatām api kṛtāntaḥ tathā prastute api pūrva apara svabhāvayoḥ ekatvam na upalabhe āropyamāṇau tu mithas pūrva apara svabhāvau siddhau= eva tad ārope karaṇa akaraṇe api prasajyamāne samañjase eva guñjā puñje jvala nāra upavidhau dāha vat 
JŚNĀ_21,4^1	 tat etat ati lāghavam āviṣkṛtam ātmanaḥ śaṅkareṇa tat ayam jāti andhānām nīla ādi prativedha vat asaṃbandhaḥ niṣedhaḥ saugatānām asantaḥ akṣaṇikāḥ iti abhidadhānena tasmāt sthitam etat sthira ātma tve militvā eva kārya karaṇa niyamaḥ bhāgya hīna manaḥ rājya sthānīyaḥ iti tathā ca sati sahakāri sākalye śakti śabda samayam apākurvāṇaḥ kamartham paripuṣṇāti para vyāmohanāt anyam anupayukta aprastuta abhidhānāt kṣaṇika tva vādinā hi śakta aśakta svabhāva tayā viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bheda m āropayatā yādṛśī śaktiḥ aśaktiḥ ca vivakṣitā tad pratividhānam ācaritum ucitam asya tad apahāya svayam kṛta saṅketena parihāram āracayati iti mahat nepuṇyam naiyāyika pravarasya yaḥ hi dhūmāt atra agninā bhāvyam iti āha tatra api yadi kaścid gardabha ādau dhūma śabdam saṃketya vahnim apahnavīta na kaścid doṣaḥ kṣaṇika vādī hi yat janayati iti samākhyayā yad anantara bhāvi kāryam tad svarūpam śaktam iti āha 
JŚNĀ_21,4^2	 na ca idam apūrvam saketa mātram loke api hi janana dvārakaḥ eva śakta vyavahāraḥ yadi api ca sākalyavataḥ eva jananam tathā api na sākalya dvāreṇa śakta aucyate kim tu jananāt kṣepavati sākalye api śakta vyavahārasya añjasasya abhāvāt anadhyavasita sahakāri viśeṣa sākalyasya api janana darśane idam atra śaktam iti vyavahārāt tādṛśam ca svarūpam śaktiḥ ucyate asya śaktiḥ iti bheda nirdeśe api asya svarūpam iti vat abhinnā eva sa ca janayitā svabhāvaḥ prāk api asti na ca janayati iti niyatam mātā ca bandhyā ca iti prāptam iti atra prakaraṇe yadi nāma tvayā kvacid śakti śabda niveśanam kṛtam tad āvirbhāva tirobhāvābhyā ca na bhāvasya kiñcid tatas prastute kim āyātam yat khalu janayitṛ rūpa janayitṛ bhāva āt abhinnam tayā uyāt nīdayavyayā kutas kādācid ka tā kāryasya udaya vyaya yoge vā svabhāva bhadaḥ tad avasthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_22,1–22,2^1	 yadi tu tat api na janayat rūpam bhinnam eva tadā tasya api na udaya vyayābhyām bhāva truṭiḥ kevalam ajanakaḥ eva bhāvaḥ syāt iti mūla nāśaḥ tasmāt brūyāḥ kiñcid kiñcitkarasya kvacid kārya kāla bhadena śakta aśakta svabhāvayoḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ eva ataeva yat āha bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ tatra kāla bhedena avirodhāt yathā kriyā utpatteḥ pūrvam niṣkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ saḥ eva paścāt sa kriyaḥ sādhya tvāt adṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced na pramāṇa siddhasya sādhya tva ayogāt evam hi viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ api asiddhaḥ iti api bruvāṇaḥ katham vāryate 
JŚNĀ_22,1–22,2^2	 tasmāt yayoḥ dharmayoḥ yathā virodhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tayoḥ tathā eva abhyupagantavyaḥ yathā saḥ eva hetuḥ sva kāryam prati śaktaḥ kārya antaram pratyaśaktaḥ iti ekasya eva viṣaya bhedam prati śakti aśaktī na viruddhe tathā kāla bhedena api śakti bhede śaktimat abhedasya pramāṇa siddheḥ u bhayatra aviśeṣāt iti etat api asāram etayā hiṇḍāra piṇḍa āḍambaram viḍambayate tathā hi na khalu pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāma pratyakṣa anumāne paribhūya abhidhātum śakyate tatra ca pratyakṣam iti na pratyabhijñā vikalpāt anyat sā ca nivāritā 
JŚNĀ_23,1	 yat ca anumānam āha śaṃkaraḥ sthira siddhau na utpatti anantaram vināśī bhāvaḥ prameya tvāt vastu vyāvṛtti vat iti avidyamāna vipakṣa tvāt anvayi eva hetuḥ prameya tvasya kṣaṇika tvena virodha abhāvāt sandigdha vyatirekam iti ced na khalu kṣaṇika tve kasyacid prameya tvam sidhyati kṣaṇa sthiti dharmaṇaḥ pramāṇa kāle atipātāt atītasya ca pratyakṣa tve ati prasaṅgāt tat api manoratha mātram tathā hi mā bhūt atītasya grahaṇam vartamānasya ca kṣaṇikasya eva kṣaṇikena jñānena grahaṇam bhaviṣyati tasmāt avirodhaḥ eva prameya tva kṣaṇika tvayoḥ 
JŚNĀ_23,2^1	 atha kāraṇam viṣayaḥ iti jñānāt prāc apekṣita sattākaḥ arthaḥ kṣaṇa antare ananuvartamānaḥ na grāhyaḥ eva syāt kṣaṇa antara anuvṛttau vā akṣaṇika tvam eva iti ced tat kim iyam rājñām ājñā yat ajanakena grāhyeṇa na bhavitavyam iti ayam asya samayaḥ eva iti ced nyāyasya ayam avasaraḥ na samayasya tasmāt samayam anapekṣya vāda vyasaninā nyāya upanyāsena paraḥ bodhayitavyaḥ samayasya hi sādhana tve sarva siddheḥ nyāyaḥ nāma na kiñcid nyāyaḥ tu samaya bādhanāya eva katham samayam eva śaraṇīkuryāt katham ajanitena grahaṇam atiprasaṅgaḥ ca evam iti ced janitena api katham grahaṇam 
JŚNĀ_23,2^2	 jāyamānam hi jñānam viṣayam anubhavat upajāyate tat ca janma viṣaya kṛtam anya kṛtam vā syāt kaḥ viśeṣaḥ atiprasaṅgaḥ tu sādhāraṇaḥ cakṣuḥ ādinā api tasya jananāt tasya aviṣaya svabhāva tvāt iti ced nanu gṛhyamāṇaḥ eva viṣayaḥ vyavahriyate na jāti niyataḥ kaścid viṣayaḥ nāma tatas aviṣaya tva āditya gṛhyamāṇa tvāt na gṛhyate iti kva idam uttaram saṃbadhyate tathā hi svabhāvāt eva na indriyam gṛhyate iti ced na yoginām darśana svīkārāt pṛthagjana apekṣayā niyamaḥ eṣaḥ iti ced pṛthagjana apekṣayā tarhi sūkṣma ādayaḥ api svabhāvena eva gṛhyante iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ athavā 
JŚNĀ_23,3–24,2	 pūrvikā eva tu sāmagrī sa jñānam viṣa yakṣaṇam sa āloka rūpa vat kuryāt yena syāt sahavedanam tena vā sva viṣaya niyatam utpāditam jñānam tat eka grāhi tad kāraṇa sāmagryā vā tat niyatam utpāditam iti nirviśeṣaḥ atas tasyāḥ eva te artha jñāne grāhya grāhaka bhāva niyata janmanī katham atiprasajya īyātām atha sa ākāra vedana vādinaḥ hi viṣayāt eva tad svarūpa saṃvitteḥ utpattiḥ abhimatā tatra atīta grahaṇe ati prasaṅgaḥ grahaṇa kṣaṇa anuvṛttau ca sthira siddhiḥ iti vivakṣitam tat kim ayam prasaṅga hetuḥ yat para upagamanam anapekṣya na bhavati tathā ca sati viparyaya paryavasānāt tava sthira siddhiḥ atīta grahaṇam vā iti na grāhyāt tad svarūpa jñāna utpattiḥ iti syāt evam ca sati vyaktam anyat bhuktam anyat vāntam iti nyāyaḥ sthiram ārabdhaḥ sādhayitum tad viparyayeṇa sa ākāra bodham vidhurayati iti 
JŚNĀ_24,3^1	 atha sautra antikasya idam ubhayam asamañjasamitīyat mātram ucyate tat api na asti sa ākāra vedanā udaya pakṣa sthitau hi dvitīya kṣaṇa anuvṛttau= api arthasya jaḍa tayā prakāśa anupapatteḥ viparyaya sarūpa svarūpa saṃvedanam eva jñānasya viṣaya vedanam evam ca na vartamāna anurodhaḥ atīte api tad pratyaya asatteḥ apracyuteḥ na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ viṣaya antareṇa api sārūpya samarpaṇāt na ca tad mata nirvāhaḥ prakṛtaḥ bhavataḥ tu tad mata āśrayeṇa api prameya tva hetuḥ sthira siddhaye na prabhavati iti siddham anekānta parihārāt iti tatas sthira vapuṣi pramāṇa antara siddheḥ ayogāt vajraḥ api pakṣa kukṣau nikṣiptaḥ kim punar sphaṭikaḥ varākaḥ tat ayam sa kriyā kriyā avasthayoḥ bhidyamānaḥ katham kāma bhedena avirodhe dṛṣṭāntī bhavitum arhati iti 
JŚNĀ_24,3^2	 yat ca viṣaya bhedena iva kāla bhedena api śakti aśaktyoḥ avi rodha pratipādanam tat api anaupayikam pratiyogī hi dharmaḥ virodhakaḥ sarvatra na ca sva kārya karaṇasya para kārya akaraṇam pratyanīkam kim tu sva kārya akaraṇam eva evam para kārya akaraṇasya api para kārya karaṇam pratyanīkam na sva kārya karaṇam sva kāryam na karoti iti vyavacchettum eva hi sva kāryam karoti iti ucyate pratyakṣa vyāpāraḥ ca te sva kārya kāriṇam para kārya kāriṇam ca bhāva bhedena avasthāpayati kāla bhede tu na ekatā vyavasthāpakam pratyakṣam pratyabhijñāyāḥ dūṣita tvāt tatas sva kāryasya karaṇam akaraṇam ca pariśiṣyamāṇam na virodha parihārāya paryāpnoti 
JŚNĀ_25,1	 kāla aneka tva apekṣa sva kārya karaṇa akaraṇam viruddham iti ced syāt iyam apekṣā para bhāga bhāginaḥ yadi viṣaya bheda vat abheda āpādaka pramāṇa vṛttiḥ syāt iti ukta prāyam bhavataḥ api tad anapekṣya virodha sthitau kim pramāṇam iti ced uktam eva yat yadā yat janana samartham tat tadā janayati eva ityādi sahakārī apekṣāyāḥ ca tad sannidhāna asannidhānayoḥ kārya arjjana prasaṅgena nirasta tvāt tasmāt janayat rūpam eva śaktiḥ vivakṣitā kṣaṇa bhaṅga vādinaḥ tasyāḥ ca bhede katham na bhāva bhraṃśaḥ 
JŚNĀ_25,2^1	 yat ca nyāya bhūṣaṇena pralapitam yadi asya bhinnā śaktiḥ śaktimataḥ abhyupagamyate tathā api na avaśyam śakta aśaktayoḥ bhedaḥ kasmāt tvad mate api dharma bhedāt dharmi bheda niyama asiddheḥ tathā ca bhinne api kārye sahakāriṇām pṛthak upayogam darśayatā abhihitam mṛd piṇḍa ādeḥ mṛd svabhāvebhyaḥ ityādi hetu bindum lekhitvā yathā ca tatra mṛdā ātma tā ādi svabhāva bhede api na kārya bhedaḥ tathā śakta aśakta ādi svabhāva bhede api abhedaḥ bhaviṣyati abādhita tva adhyavasāyasya samāna tvāt iti tat api anena pratyādiṣṭam 
JŚNĀ_25,2^2	 santi hi dharmāḥ ye paraspara virodhinaḥ avirodhinaḥ ca na tu dharmāḥ iti eva virodha avirodhaḥ na hi brāhmaṇyam vaiyākaraṇa tvena aviruddham iti cāṇḍāla tvena api aviruddham iti abhidhātum śakyam na ca atra brāhmaṇī avyāptam cāṇḍāla tvam na ca vaiyākaraṇa tvena api viruddham yathā ca atra sva pratiyogi brāhmaṇyā itara tvam eva virodham ādhatte na vaiyākaraṇa tvena tathā janayat rūpam ajanana tayā eva viruddha bhāvāt na vastu santāna bhedena nīla caturasrāditā tu śveta parimaṇḍa latā ādibhiḥ virodham āsādayatu na tu kvacid kārya kāraṇa ādibhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_25,2^3	 atas yadi virodha gandhā saṃbhavāt saṃsthāna mṛd svabhāvayoḥ abhinnena dharmiṇā bhāvyam tat kim atyanta pratyanīkayoḥ eka kāryam prati janayat rūpā itarayoḥ api iti kaḥ sa cetanakaḥ cintayet viruddha aviruddha tvam eva katham avagantavyam iti ced yat vyavacchedena yat vidhānam yat vidhānena vā yat vyavacchedaḥ tat tena viruddham na ca mṛd mayam iti vidhānena pṛthu udara tā vyavaccheda śaṅkā api saṃbhavati tad janaka abhidhānena ca ātat janaka tvam vyavacchidyate eva atajjanaka tvena ca tad janaka tvam na tad janakam iti eva hi atat janakam iti nañsamāsa vākyam api vismāri 
JŚNĀ_25,2^4	 tasmāt yayoḥ dharmayoḥ yathā virodhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā eva abhyupagantavyaḥ iti evam eva viśeṣam abhipretya yuktaḥ na eka kāla apekṣayā samāna pramāṇayoḥ apravṛtteḥ yena hi kāla bhedena abhinnam eva vastu sa kriyā kriya nīlā nīla tva ādi yuktam abhyupagatam yasya vā tad ātmani pramāṇam pravṛttam tasya kvacid vivāda saṃbhave kāla bhedena avirodhaḥ tadvatī iti yuktam tat ca dvayam api na asti iti vyaktam atas ekatva adhyavasāyasya ābādhita viṣaya viśeṣaṇam asiddham ekatva adhyavasāya mātram punar anaikāntikam bādhaka apekṣam eva anyathā keśa ādau= api na bādhakam apekṣeta bādhakam ca uktam yat api ayam svapnāyamānaḥ iva viplavate 
JŚNĀ_26,1	 atha na eva abhinna ātmanaḥ kasyacid svabhāva bhedaḥ iṣyate evam tarhi sahakāri pṛthak upapayoga kathanam bāla unmatta pralapitam syāt iti tena yadi dharma dharmiṇoḥ tādātmya tiraskāreṇa bheda āpādana mātram iṣṭam tadā na prakṛta upayogi tathā hi dharmiṇaḥ sakāśāt dharmāḥ bheda bhāginaḥ bhavantu na vā santi tāvat kecid anyonya virodhinaḥ ye sva adhikaraṇam dharmiṇam abhittvāḥ na ucchvasitum śaknuvanti iti vivakṣitam kṣaṇika vādinaḥ tatra anena tādṛśāḥ dharmāḥ eva na santi santaḥ api vā kāla ādi upādhi sāpekṣā bheda sādhavaḥ iti eva vaktum nyāyyam pṛthak upayogāt sahakāriṇām dharmiṇaḥ pṛthak eva te iti kim anena 
JŚNĀ_26,2	 yadi tu svābhāvya bhājaḥ eva bhedakāḥ na bhidyamānāḥ iti samayaḥ asya syāt yuktam etat yāvatā valana ādayaḥ api avalanataḥ bhedakāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ eva te ca kriyā ādi rūpa tvāt bhinnāḥ eva tasmāt kalpanā uparacita vibhāgāḥ bhavantu saugata matena bhavat matena vā tāttvika bhedaḥ dharma dharmiṇoḥ kim idānīm na ekāntena prastāva antaram hi tat duṣpariharāḥ tu dharmāḥ dharmiṇam bhindānāḥ ye virodha sthāyinaḥ iti siddham sādhyam 
JŚNĀ_26,3	 atha kāryāt abhedaḥ ca svabhāvānām pṛthak sahakāri kāraṇa kalāpa upayoga viṣaya tvam ca iti duḥśliṣṭa tā mātram udbhāvyate para nayasya tadā api prastuta kṣateḥ abhāvāt kim anena bhedavatām api bhedaka tvāt dharmāṇām duḥśliṣṭa tā bhāsa tā ca bhinna samaya sthānām parasparam agaṇiteṣu sthāneṣu saṃbhavati tattvam tu kīdṛś iti tad tad sthāna nirūpaṇe vyaktībhaviṣyati tatra yadi prastuta anupayogiyat kiñci dvistārayatā sthātavyam iti abhimatam sarvasya śakyam etat na ca etāvatā eva dharma dharmi vāda parisamāptiḥ tat kim asya garbha arbhakam anatiśayānasya nindā vacane nirbandhena tathā ca sati tasmāt na dharma bhedāt eva dharmi bhedaḥ iti nigamanam api asya ayuktam bauddhaḥ kila na dharmāṇām bheda mātreṇa dharmi bhedam āha kim tu virodhena anyathā kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādīnām api dharma bhedam ācakṣīta anena api svayam viruddha dharma adhyāsāt iti akṣaram utthāpitam tat yadi virodha bheda mātrayoḥ viśeṣam na paśyati yuktam āha iti kim aparam vaktavyam 
JŚNĀ_27,1	 yat api ayam eva āha yaḥ hi anantara kārya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryam kuryāt atha kuryāt na tarhi uttara kārya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ na hi nīla utpādana svabhāvaḥ pīta ādikam api karoti na ca prathama uttara kārya utpādana svabhāva bhedāt tadvataḥ api bhedaḥ svabhāva bhedasya vyabhicāri tvena ukta tvāt iti tat api niḥsāram yadi hi svabhāva śabdena sva lakṣaṇam abhipretam tadā tad bhede bhedaḥ eva vastūnām kva vyabhicāra vārtā tasmāt svabhāva bhedaḥ iti kalpita dharmāt nānātvam yuktam na ca tanmātreṇa dharmi bhedam āpādayati paraḥ kim tu virodhena na ca tad virodhe api dharmi bheda vyabhicāraḥ asti virodhaḥ hi na bhedam vyabhicarati bhedaḥ tu virodham vyabhicarati iti ukta prāyam 
JŚNĀ_27,2	 nanu yadi kalpitāḥ eva te dharmāḥ kva virodhaḥ kva vā bhedaḥ iti ced iha dvividham abhidheyam kalpita śabdasya tad tad vyāvṛtta vastu saṃbhave bheda mātram kalpanā avabhāsi tat api kalpitam kuvalaya nīlatva ādi vat kalpanā mātra niveśi ca kalpitam karikeśara triguṇī maya tva ādi vat tatra yadi antimaḥ kalpita arthaḥ syāt na bheda nirodhāt iti yuktam prācīne tu kalpita arthe vastu svabhāvasya eva adhyavasānāt bhedaḥ virodhaḥ vā vyavasthāpyamānaḥ saṃvādam ādāya eva vartate iti na doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_27,3^1	 yat ca idam uttarakṣaṇe yat kāryam kartum asya svabhāvaḥ tat katham prathama kṣaṇe kuryāt anyathā uttara kārya kāritā eva na svabhāvasya iti tat api aparibhāvya bhāṣitam sthira svabhāva tve hi bhāvasya uttarakālam eva idam kāryam na pūrva kālam iti kutas etat tad abhāvāt ca kāraṇam api uttara kārya karaṇa svabhāvam iti kutas artha anurodhinyaḥ hi vācaḥ śobhā bhājaḥ na vāc anurodhāt artha tathā bhāvaḥ rāja vat kim kurmaḥ uttaram eva tasya janma iti ced astu sthira tve tu tad anupapadyamānam asthira tām ādiśatu sthira tvepi eṣaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ tasya yat uttarakṣaṇaḥ eva karoti iti ced hata idānīm pramāṇa pratyāśā pramāṇa bādhite api svabhāva ālambanena nistaraṇāt dhūmāt atra agniḥ agneḥ abhāvāt vā na iha dhūmaḥ iti ukte api hi śakyam abhidhātum svabhāvaḥ eva ayam asya yat idānīm atra niragniḥ api dhūmaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_27,3^2	 tasmāt pramāṇa siddhe svabhāva avalambanam na svabhāva avalambanena pramāṇa vilopaḥ pramāṇa nirṇayaḥ ca vihitaḥ eva nīla utpādana svabhāvaḥ ca na pīta ādikam karoti iti asamīkṣa ākhyānam upādāna tvena hi tad karaṇa niṣedhaḥ na tu sahakāri kāraṇa tvena api sahakāritayā tatra api kathañcid upayogasya aśakya bādhana tvāt na ca anya varṇasya anya varṇa upāda āna tā niṣedhaḥ eva dṛśyate hi pītā eva haridrā cūrṇa sahakārikāḥ raktasya upādānam bhavanti iti nidarśanam asaṅgatam yadi ca yathā na nīlaḥ pītam utpādayati tathā na uttara janakaḥ pūrvam utpādayati evam tarhi yaḥ ca uttara janakaḥ yaḥ ca na uttara janakaḥ tayoḥ bhedaḥ api kim na iṣyate yathā yat nīlam tat na ānīlam iti tat alam evaṃvidha pralāpeṣu nirbandhena sthitam etat paraspara viruddha dharma adhyāsāt deśa bheda vat kāla bhede api jana kājanaka svabhāvayoḥ bhedaḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_28,1	 etena yat api nyāya mañjarī kāraḥ prāha nanu kārya utpatti hetuḥ yeṣām sannidhim apekṣate te khalu apekṣita sannidhayaḥ sahakāri pratyayāḥ tasya kim kurvanti na kiñcid kevalam kāryam eva yeṣām bhāva abhāvau= anuvidhatte te kāryeṇa eva apekṣita sannidhayaḥ sannipatantaḥ tat eva kāryam vivakṣitam hetunā saha kurvanti iti sahakāriṇaḥ ucyante na tu yena saha kurvanti tasya eva kartāraḥ bhavantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ bhavitum arhanti tasmāt akṣaṇikasya sva kārya nimāṇe dvividham sāmarthyam ekam nijam sāmarthyam dvitīyam ca āgantukam sahakāri antaram tayoḥ abhāve tad kārya anutpatteḥ tasmāt eva hi dvividhāt sāmarthyāt kārya utpatteḥ abhyupagamāt eka makṣaṇikam gṛhītvā tasmāt eva kārya utpattim saṃbhāvayantaḥ sāmarthyam eva hetūnām avijñātavantaḥ pare yasmāt akṣaṇikasya api kramavatīṣu tāsu tāsu artha kriyāsu kartavyāsu krama vat sahakārī antaram eva sāmarthyam aṅgīkurmaḥ tathā ca krama vat sahakāri nānā tvāt api kramavat kārya nānā tva upapatteḥ aśakyam bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anya tvam upapādayitum iti 
JŚNĀ_29,1	 tat api apāstam yadi api hetu antara kalpitam sāmarthyam avijñātam asmākam tathā api yat janayati iti vyavahāra gocarībhūyam āpannam svarūpam avaśyam abhyupagantavyam bhāvasya sva lakṣaṇa ākhyam sāmarthyam saṃkhyātam asmad mate tat kim prāk api paścāt eva vā iti vikalpya dūṣaṇam udīritam tatra kim anena uktam bhavati iti niveditam eva yat tu kāryeṇa eva apekṣita sannidhayaḥ iti upaskṛtam tat api nirupayogam yadi hi kāryam eva sva janmani svatantram syāt yuktam etat kevalam evam sati sahakāriṇām api sāmarthya rūpa tā kalpa nam a phalam iti hetoḥ sāmarthyam anapekṣya svātantryāt eva kāryam kadācid bhavati kadācid na bhavati iti kim hetu sāmarthya samarthana vyasanena vyavahāra mātram vā sāmarthyam iti na tu kvacid kiñcid samartham nāma iti prāptam astu kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced santaḥ hetavaḥ sarvathā asamarthāḥ asat tu kāryam svatantram iti viśuddhā buddhiḥ utpattau tu sat rūpam kāryam kimartham artha antaram apekṣate iti nirūpaya tāvat 
JŚNĀ_29,2	 tasmāt sāmagrīm apekṣate kāryam iti anena akṣareṇa sāmagrī eva janana samarthā kāryasya iti eva arthaḥ na ca sā samagrebhyaḥ bhinnā tatas samagrāḥ eva janakāḥ bhinna tve api vā artha antaram iva sākalyam api sahakārī iti na viśeṣaḥ tatas yāvantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ tāvantaḥ pratyekam samarthāḥ iti prāk vidyamānānām katham kriyā atikramaḥ sākalyam eva hi paścāt upapattimat iti samayaḥ tat api vā tebhyaḥ eva saha kāribhyaḥ labhya saṃbhavam prāk api teṣu asatsu katham sattā viyuktam kadācid yāvat ekasya api prāgbhāvaḥ atha kāryasya eva ayam aparādhaḥ yat amīṣu asamartheṣu kadācid na utpadyate iti ced sarva avasthā samāne api kāraṇe yadi akārya tā svatantram kāryam evam syāt tat na kāryam tathā sati iti kim na paśyasi 
JŚNĀ_29,3–30,2	 syāt etat na tad bhāve avaśyam bhavati iti tat kāryam ucyate kim tu tad abhāve na bhavati eva iti vyatireka prādhānyāt iti ced tad bhāve api na bhāvaḥ ced abhāve bhāvitā kutas tad abhāva prayuktasya saḥ abhāvaḥ iti tat kutas yadi hi svayam bhavanam bhāvayat eva kāryam hetuḥ tadā tad abhāva prayuktaḥ asya abhāvaḥ iti api syāt yadā tu hetau janana unmukhe api svātantryāt eva na bhūtam iti katham tad abhāva prayojakaḥ asya abhāvaḥ iti pratītiḥ tasmāt yadi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tadā niyatam yathā eva tad abhāve niyamena na bhavati tathā eva tad bhāve api niyamena bhavet abhavat ca na tad kāraṇa tām ātmanaḥ kṣamate tat ayam prayatna paramparayā api hetūnām samartha asamartha lakṣaṇa udaya vyaya yogaḥ jāragarbhaḥ iva go payitum aśakyaḥ caturabuddhiṣu 
JŚNĀ_30,3–30,4	 yat api āha śaṅkaraḥ na ca sarvatra sahakāri bhedena kārya bhedāt api kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sidhyati yathā ekatve api sahakāri bhedāt vijñāna varti vikāra jvālā antarāṇi pradīpaḥ karoti na ca asau bhidyate tad abhedasya pramāṇa siddha tvāt iti apūrvaḥ ayam asya dambha ārambhaḥ yat ayam akṣepa kriyā dharmā svabhāvaḥ śakti śabda vācyaḥ sa kim prāk api asti yadi vā saṃprati eva iti vikalpya codya śakti vācyam mama sahakāri sākalyam iti bravīti śakti aśakti lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ iti abhimatena kārya bhedāt kāraṇa bhedaḥ iti samādhatte kaḥ khalu kārya bhedāt kāraṇa bhedam vaktum upakrāntaḥ yatra evam ucyate saha kāri bhadena yaḥ kārya bhedaḥ sa na kāraṇa bhedaḥ iti api tu yasya yadā yat janana svabhāvaḥ saḥ avaśyam tat karoti eva na hi pradopaḥ eva vijñāna ādi kāryāṇi sakṛt kartum samarthaḥ kṣepeṇa janayati tadvat vā krama bhāvinī api kāryāṇi sajātīya vijātīyāni kim na tadā eva karoti atas teṣām anyaḥ eva kārakaḥ dīpaḥ iti yuktam evam anyatra api eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_30,5	 yat punar āha pradīpa ādi vyaktīnām iva pratyekam utpatti vināśa kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ abhrāntam sphaṭika ādeḥ avasthiti vijñānam iti tat api andha śara kṣepāyate pradīpe api anyānyasya utpatti kāraṇasya anupalabdheḥ varti sneha ādayaḥ hi pradīpa hetavaḥ te ca pratikṣaṇam pratilava ādi vā anyānyībhavanti iti adhyavasāyaḥ kasya saṃbhavati anyathā sphaṭike api anyānyībhavati pūrva pūrvam anyat anyat uttarottarasya kāraṇam anvaya vyatireka anuvṛtteḥ iti kim na gṛhyate yadi api ca pradīpe kāla bhedena anya buddhiḥ asti tathā api na taila vartyoḥ tat katham pradīpa ādi vyaktīnām utpatti kāraṇa upalabdhiḥ na sphaṭikasya iti ucyate vināśa kāraṇam tu cintayiṣyāmaḥ na api pradīpa bhaṅgura tayā tad kāraṇa bhaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ vaktum kāraṇa abhedāt kāryasya api pradīpasya abheda prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_31,1	 atha varti snehayoḥ kṣayaḥ upalabhyate pradīpasya api kṣīyamāṇa deśa vyāpti viyogāt saḥ eva kṣayaḥ iti ced tailam prabalam āsīt idānīm alpam vartate vartiḥ api evam pradīpaḥ api anya anya taila varti bhāga parihāreṇa anya ani atat bhāga vyāpi iti sarvathā nivṛttiḥ tu katham avasātum śakyā pratyabhijñānasya tad avastha tvāt 
JŚNĀ_31,2^1	 atha varti ādīnām apacaya kāle avayave kriyā utpadyate tatas vibhāga udayaḥ tatas saṃyoga nāśaḥ tatas api tadārabdha dravya nāśaḥ punar kriyā saṃyogāt itara dravya udayaḥ ca iti na eka dravya nirvāha siddhiḥ iti ced anubhava bhuvam avataran= api yadi ayam prapañcam ādriyate bauddhaḥ api evam sva prakriyām udghoṣayan katham vāryaḥ pūrvakebhyaḥ sa bhāga hetubhyaḥ sahakāriṇam aparam artham antatas vāta ātapa timira ādi samāsādya tebhyaḥ parasya samāna parimāṇasya yathā sahakāri bala saṅketam nyūnasya adhikasya vā saṃbhavaḥ iti na sphaṭika śata koṭi prabhṛtīnām eka tā nirvāha siddhiḥ yadā punar anena sādhanam eva upanyastam tadā na asya prakriyayā siddhiḥ tvad prakriyayā bādhā vā 
JŚNĀ_31,2^2	 vāta ādayaḥ kim upacinvanti apacinvanti vā sphaṭika ādau yena sahakāritayā kalpyante prāc bhāvi tva mātreṇa kāraṇa tve ati prasaṅgāt iti ced na vai sthūlaḥ kaścid upacayaḥ apacayaḥ vā kriyate taiḥ tasya ataeva atyanta sadṛśa udayaḥ sūkṣmaḥ tu aśakya upalakṣaṇa tayā yathedaṃtayā nirdeṣṭum ayogyaḥ tathā niṣedham api ayogyaḥ eva evam aneka vastu saṃkare kadācid kenacid upayoge na kiñcid vastu prastuta upādānasya sahakāri syāt iti na sarvathā saha kāri antara virahāt ekasya janana saṅgatiḥ avagantavyāḥ iti upanyāsasya arthaḥ sthira tva siddhau tu yadi tvam api sva prakriyām nirvāhayitum īśiṣe īṣiṣya bauddha sādhana vicāraḥ tāvat prastutaḥ ayam tatra ca prastute aneka kāryeṇa anekena bhāvyam iti kena karṇe bhavataḥ niveśitam yatas pradīpa dṛṣṭa antīkaraṇam bhavataḥ śobheta tat idam ucyate anyaḥ vyādhiḥ anyat auṣadham iti 
JŚNĀ_32,1	 yat api āha yat eva ca sahakāri bhedena kārya bhede pradīpasya abheda siddhau sādhanam tat eva krama vat sahakāri bhedena kārya bhede akramasya api iti tat api atyantam asaṃbaddham advaya ākāram indriya pratyakṣam eva hi bheda bhraṃśam āśaṃsati pradīpe sa pratighasya hi pradīpasya na eka sthānam bhinna deśasya ca atyanta sadṛśasya api bheda upalakṣaṇam anivāryam māyā golaka vat atas eka ākāram indriya jñānam ekatāyām eva pradīpam avasthāpayati kāla bhede hi bhinne api vastuni atyanta sadṛśe pratyabhijñānam upajāyamānam upalabdham na ca pratyabhijñānāt anyat eka tā sādhanam tat katham tat eva sādhanam iti na plavate na ca sadṛśa tayā kāla bhedena pratyabhijñānasya saṃśaya aṅga tvam vyabhicāra darśanāt lakṣaṇa bheda virahāt sakṛt abheda bhāsinī api pratyakṣe anāśvāsaḥ tathā kvacid adarśanāt indriya jñāne hi krama darśane api na yogyam artha dvayam pratighāti ekībhūya upalabhyamānam upalabdham tat katham sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ tasmāt anupayogi pradīpa dṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānam 
JŚNĀ_32,2	 etat eva rūpam dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya abhiprāya antaram asya dyotayan nyāya bhūṣaṇe api yat āha api ca yena svabhāvena rūpam rūpa antaram karoti na tena eva rasa ādikam rasa ādeḥ api rūpa svabhāvatā prasaṅgāt tatas sarvam rūpa kāryam cakṣuṣā gṛhyate na ca etat iṣṭam tasmāt yathā rūpam rūpa antara utpādana svabhāvena tat eva karoti vijñāna utpādana svabhāvena vijñānam eva karoti na rūpa ādikam rasa utpādana svabhāvena ca rasam evam gandha sparśana janana svabhāvābhyām tābeva janayati tadvat akṣaṇikaḥ api ādya kārya utpādana svabhāvena tat eva karoti tad uttara kārya janana svabhāvena tat uttaram eva janayati na ādyam uttarottaram vā evam uttarottara kāryeṣu ananta kāla bhāviṣu api pratiniyatāḥ svabhāvāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ svabhāvāḥ eva hetavaḥ na svabhāvi iti api ayuktam rūpasya ahetu tva prasaṅgāt svabhāvānām eva hetu tvāt atha na rūpasya svabhāva bhedaḥ iṣyate kim tu ekaḥ eva tathābhūta svabhāvaḥ yena bhinna ākāram bhinna deśam kāryam utpādayati tasya bhinna svabhāva kārya utpāda anurodhena svabhāva bhedaḥ kathitaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_33,1–33,2^1	 nanu evam paraḥ api abhinna svabhāvasya eva akṣaṇikasya krama bhāvi aneka svabhāva kārya utpādana anurodhena bhāva svabhāvam kalpayat nopālambham arhati iti etat apīrṣya ākaṣāyita dhiyaḥ para dhandhīkaraṇa mātram tathā hi yadi tāvat abhinna ātmā api dīpa vat anekam artham andhakāra nāśa ādi karoti kalpita svabhāva bhedaḥ iti iyat mātram vivakṣitam hanta kaḥ niṣeddhāḥ asti eṣa saṃbhavaḥ yat anekam ekaḥ karoti iti evam pūrva apara kālayoḥ api eka svabhāvaḥ yadi anekam kuryāt na vivādaḥ kevalam kvacid kārya vilambaḥ kvacid akṣepa karma iti na yuktam pradīpa vat sakṛt aneka karaṇam astu iti vyartham pradīpa nidarśanam atha krama bhāvi anekam eka ātmanaḥ kāryam astu iti vivakṣitam tadā samartham na khalu adya api dīpaḥ dṛṣṭāntayitum śakyaḥ evam rūpe api nidarśane kriyamāṇe vaktavyam na ca evam nirvahati yat anekam tat anekena eva kartavyam dīpa kārya vat kāla bheda bhāvi ca anekam kāryam iti na hi anekam jāyamānam ekasya eva kāryam āpadyate eka kartuḥ apāye bāneka janma eva na syāt iti upapādayitum śakyam 
JŚNĀ_33,2^2–33,3	 dāha gāhana ādeḥ anekasya anekena eva jala jvalana ādinā karaṇa darśanāt kāla bheda abhinnam ekam vivakṣitam iti ced aneka kāla antaritaiḥ eka ātmabhiḥ anekam na kriyamāṇam upalakṣayasi evam tu brūyāḥ ekam anekam vā bhinna kālam abhinna kālam vā nityāt eva jāyate iti tat ca pratijñā mātra āviṣkaraṇam abhīṣṭa ātmanaḥ kasyacid arthasya na sādhanam na api para prayukta sādhana bādhanam iti kim anena tathā api na dīpa rūpa duṣṭa antena kiñcid yadi ca kārya bhedena api bhāvam bhindyāt asthira vādī tathā api rūpam eva abhidyamānam bhidyamānau rūpa rasau katham janayati itīyat mātreṇa anekāntam udbhāvya svasthaḥ bhava rūpasya api punar eka tva sādhanena kaḥ upayogaḥ siddha tvāt tatas śaṃkaraḥ api na hi yena svabhāvena varti vikārasya hetuḥ tena eva jvālā upalambhayoḥ api tad svabhāvatā prasaṅgāt iti abhidadhānaḥ na kiñcid cetayate iti upalakṣyate ekasya aneka karaṇa avirodhāt 
JŚNĀ_33,4	 atha yathā bauddhaḥ abhyadhāt kṣaṇa antare api yadi saḥ eva svabhāvaḥ bhāvasya tadā saṃprati iva prāk api janana prasaṅgaḥ na ca janayati tatas svabhāva bhedaḥ bhāvasya iti tathā hi yadi jñāna janakena eva rūpeṇa varti vikāram karoti dīpaḥ tadā tasya api tattva prasaṅgaḥ na ca tattvam asti tatas dīpaḥ api kim bhinna svabhāvaḥ astu yathā ca kāryāṇām tādātmya virahe api hetu bheda abhāvaḥ tathā kāryāṇām bhinna kāla tve api na hetu bhedaḥ iti vivakṣitam tadā api bauddhena pramāṇa balam ālambya janakā janaka avasthayoḥ bhāva bhedaḥ āropitaḥ tatra ca yadi akṣamā tadā asiddhi ādi dūṣaṇam eva vaktum sāmpratam tāvatā eva tasya nirāśe kim anena prabandhena 
JŚNĀ_34,1	 atha duṣṭam eva tad sādhanam tathā api tena yat siddham tat siddham eva tāvat pradīpasya svabhāva bhedaḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt tathā api kim asya upanyāsena yat ca dīpasya svabhāva bheda sādhanāya sādhanam kāryāṇām tādātmya virahaḥ nāma saḥ api yadi siddhasvasādhya pratibandhaḥ tadā tena yadi yugapad api bheda siddhiḥ kasyacid tadā tadā urṣyayā kim anena bauddha sādhanena prayāga vaṭa prayāta āyātayoḥ dvitīya mūḍha karṇāṭena iva sva sādhya sādhanāya pravṛtti nirāśaḥ kartavyaḥ anyathā anena bhede sādhite pradīpa bheda sādhanam eva kim pravartate na vā kiñcid api sādhanam sādhya sādhanāya pravarteta dhūma ādi sādhanam sva sādhya sādhakam dṛṣṭvā 
JŚNĀ_34,2^1	 atha idam pradīpa svabhāva bheda sādhanam adhyakṣa adhikṣiptam sva sādhya pratibandha vidhuram vā tadā tat eva naśyatu na tadā bauddha sādhanasya kṣatiḥ tathā api kim tasya upanyāsena yadi bauddha sparddhayā tad vimarśam asārī kartum upamāna bhūtam vimarśa antaram eva idam upanītam tadā ayama sthitaḥ pakṣaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ dīpasya iti evam sati ekaḥ eva asau śakti viśeṣaḥ yaḥ teṣām utpādakaḥ iti ced etat apeta āgama yuktikam para spardhayā abhyupagamyamānam api na nīti śīlān prīṇāti pratiniyata svabhāva upādāna abhāve teṣām sarvatra utpatteḥ adṛṣṭa pūrva tvāt ityādinā tathā svabhāva bheda abhāve ca kāraṇasya kārya bheda bhāve tasya akasmika tvam prasajyeta tathā ca akaraṇam viśvasya vaiśvarūpyam syāt iti anena ca katham svabhāva bhedam eva sva bhāṣayā draḍhayet 
JŚNĀ_34,2^2	 na ca ayam nyāyyaḥ tathā hi yat tāvat ucyate yadi yena eva svabhāvena dīpaḥ varti vikāra hetuḥ tena eva jvālā ādeḥ tadā jvālā ādeḥ api varti vikāra tva prasaṅgaḥ na ca evam tasmāt bhinnena eva svabhāvena varti vikāre bhinnena ca jvālā ādau dīpaḥ pravartate iti viparyaya arthaḥ tatra ca pratyakṣa bādhā eva niraṃśasya dīpa ādeḥ tatra bhāsanāt anyathā kadamba golaka vat ananta svabhāva parikaritasya ābhāsa prasaṅgāt na ca anupalabhya tvam eṣām abhidhātum śakyam pradīpa svabhāva tve anupalabhyatāyāḥ virodhāt yadi ca pradīpa svabhāva tve api adṛśya tvam viruddham anurudhyase varti vikāra kāraṇa tve api jvālā ādi hetu tām kim na saṃbhāvayasi yatas svarūpa rāśi parikalpana vyagraḥ asi tasmāt na anupalabhyamānasya pradīpa svabhāva tā 
JŚNĀ_34,2^3	 upalabhya tve ca na adhyakṣadhi kṣepa parihāraḥ dīpāt anyat eva dṛśyam adṛśyam vā vastu dīpa svabhāvaḥ iti tu nāga loka bhāṣā ananya rūpe hi svabhāva svarūpa sva lakṣaṇa śabdāḥ prasiddhāḥ kalpanā upasthāpite tu dharme bhinnaḥ iva ābhāsamāne api tad adhyavasāyāt eva svabhāva śabda prayogaḥ yathā nitya tvam śabdasya svabhāvaḥ iti tatas yadi sahakāriṇi śakti śabda vat bhinne api kvacid svabhāva śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ tathā api svabhāva antareṇa karoti iti vastu antareṇa sahakāriṇā karoti iti yāvat na ca sva bhāvinaḥ karaṇa vāraṇam abhimatam tatas svabhāvi śabdaḥ bāhyaḥ arthaḥ tena svabhāvena abhinnena eva bhinnāni kāryāṇi karoti iti āyātam kevalam aneka sahakāri parivāritaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ sa ca kasya na iṣṭaḥ 
JŚNĀ_34,2^4	 na ca sahakāriṇaḥ api sva manīṣikayā kalpanīyāḥ kim tu yāvantaḥ anvaya vyatireka grāhaka pramāṇa vyāpārāḥ tāvantaḥ eva sa ca vyāpāraḥ tejaḥ taila varti ādi vyatiriktasya na asti iti kim adhika vidhānena pratyuta svabhāva śabda abhidheyān arthān parikalpya ṣaṭpadārthyām antar bhāvayan kim viphalam āyāsyasi yadā ca evam paryante svabhāva śabda abhidheyam nijam rūpam ekam eva aneka kārya hetuḥ iti upapāditam tadā yat ekena rūpeṇa janitam tat ekam eva iti na siddhā vyāptiḥ tathā sati prasaṅga vat viparyayasya api na anekānta parihāraḥ pratiniyata svabhāva upādāna tā api teṣām na pradīpasya eva tāttvika aneka svabhāvatayā kim tu tad sāmagryām apoddhāra dvāreṇa anvaya vyatirekābhyām kasyacid tailam kasyacid vartiḥ kasyacid dīpaḥ iti katham sarvatra utpattiḥ eṣām upalabhyate 
JŚNĀ_35,1	 yat tu kāraṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ iti tatra sāmagrī lakṣaṇa kāraṇa vaijātyāt kārya vaijātya nimitta abhyupagamaḥ tathā eva pramāṇena arpaṇāt na tu sāmagrī antargata kāraṇa nānā tvam ekasya aneka svabhāvatayā iti śāstre eva vipañcitam tat alam eṣām pramāṇa nirapekṣasva utprekṣā mātreṇa vikalpeṣu nirbandhena na ca taiḥ svabhāva bhedaiḥ bhāvikaḥ siddhaḥ api eṣām kācid artha siddhiḥ iti uktam eva iti aphalaḥ eva eṣa bhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_36,1	 yathā tarhi trilocanaḥ caryayati tathā anayoḥ api nīyatām abhiprāyaḥ tathā ca nyāya mañjarī asādhāraṇam api sattvam mādhyamika nyāyena śakyam udbhāvayitum tathā hi kṣaṇa vāde api pūrvarūpa kṣaṇaḥ yena svabhāvena ananta rakṣaṇam utpādayati kim tena eva rasakṣaṇam api āhosvit svabhāva antareṇa yadi tena eva rasasya api rūpa tva prasaṅgaḥ na hi eka svabhāvāt kāraṇāt kārya bhedam paśyāmaḥ viśvasya ahetuka tva prasaṅgāt atha svabhāva antareṇa karoti yadi evam ekasya viruddham svabhāva dvayam prasajyeta rūpa janana svabhāvaḥ hi rasa janana svabhāvāt na avyabhicārī tatra yadi svabhāva antaram bhavet bhavet tatra eva tasya bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca bhāva abhāvau ca sākṣāt viruddhau pūrvakam rūpa lakṣaṇam bhintaḥ na ca bhinnaḥ dṛśyate saḥ 
JŚNĀ_36,2	 syāt etat pūrvakasya rūpa kṣaṇasya rase kartavye svabhāva antaram pūrvakaḥ eva rasakṣaṇaḥ na ca viruddham svabhāva antaram asti iti yadi evamakṣaṇikasya api kramavatīṣu kārya vyaktiṣu svabhāva antaram krama vat sahakāri antaram eva iti sarvam samānam anyatra abhiniveśāt tasmāt asādhāraṇam upādadānasya svabhāva bheda āpatteḥ kṣaṇikebhyaḥ nivartamānam sattvam yena ca prakāreṇa svabhāva bhedaḥ nirākriyate tasya akṣaṇika tve api samāna tvāt sattva makṣaṇikān na nivartate atas vyatireka asiddheḥ pratibandhā siddhiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_36,3	 tatra tāvat yoga ācāra niṣṭhām anālocayan= ayam saugata samaya jñāna abhimānī mādhyamika nyāyena iti āha ubhayoḥ api hetu phalā apavādasya tattvataḥ abhimata tvāt iti adhara siddhim uddhūya sa ākāra siddhau darśitam eva sthite ca hetu phala bhāve asmākam iyam kṣaṇa bhaṅga cintā iti uktam sā ca sthiti grahyi grāhaka bhāvasya tāttvika tve gṛhīte tadā ca yat eva yasya anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tat eva kāryam kāraṇam ca bhavatu bīja aṅkura vat yathā ca kasyacid ekam anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi dṛśyamānam kāryam tathā yadi anekam api kasyacid ekasya anvayavyatirekau= anuvidhīyamānam upalabhyate tadā kim anekena api eka kāryeṇa bhavitavyam para vedana apalāpe hi ekam api ekasya kāryam na syāt anapalāpe tu anekam api kāryam ekasya kena vāryate atas para vedana apava ādi vādi matā avatāraṇena na kiñcid grāhya grāhaka sthitau tu eka vat anekasya api eka kārya tā nyāyaḥ samānaḥ tat katham eka ātmanā janyamānam eka ākāram eva bhavet iti plavate 
JŚNĀ_37,1	 yat tu uktam na hi eka svabhāvāt kāraṇāt kārya bhedam paśyāmaḥ iti tad ati sāhasam kim vā na paśyati pradīpam ekam vikāra kāriṇam andhakāra hāriṇam ca taraṇim vā tamaḥ kamalayoḥ nidhana pravodha vidhāyinam sarvadā andhakāra magnaḥ vā bhavān paśyati vā sahasram aṃśumālinaḥ kārya sahasra kāriṇaḥ eka svabhāvāt tu kāraṇāt na kārya bhedaḥ iti samāna sāmagryā na kārya vaijātyam iti arthaḥ ataeva na viśvasya ahetuka tvam tasmāt ekasmāt aneka utpattiḥ avirodhinī kārya dvāreṇa tu rūpam rūpa kāraṇam rasa kāraṇam ca iti samuccayena svabhāva dvaya vyavahāraḥ ataeva na virodha vārtā na hi samuccaye pramāṇa siddhe virodha gandhaḥ vāta ātapayoḥ iva ekasmin= ākāśa deśe 
JŚNĀ_37,2	 yat tu uktam rūpa janana svabhāvaḥ hi rasa janana svabhāva tā avyabhicārī iti tāvatā api bheda mātram sidhyati na tu virodhaḥ kṛtaka anitya vat yathā hi nīla abhāva avyabhicāri pītam na nīlam bhavitum arhati na tu tanmātreṇa virodhaḥ na hi yat yatas bhidyate tad aśeṣam tena viruddham abhidhātum śakyam virodhaḥ tu yadi api ekasmin dharmiṇi dvayoḥ asaṃbhavayoḥ niyamaḥ sa ca kadācid vastunoḥ ekasya bhāve anya paryādānāt dahana tu hina vat kadācid dharmayoḥ svabhāvena eva eka adhiṣṭhite anya asaṃbhavāt bhāva abhāva vat nīlatva anīla tva vat vā tatra yadi nīla pīta dravyayoḥ api eka bhāve anya paryādānam āpādayet syāt eva saha anavasthāna nāmā virodhaḥ na tu tad abhāva avyabhicāra mātreṇa bheda mātram tu tāvatā evam nīlatva pīta tvayoḥ api abhāva vyabhicāra mātreṇa bheda mātram tu na tu virodhaḥ virodhaḥ tu nīlatva svīkṛte dharmiṇi svayam eva ānīla tva bhedasya pīta tvasya abhāvāt anyathā kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādīnām api tad abhāva avyabhicāra mātreṇa virodha prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_37,3^1	 atha katham atra tad abhāva avyabhicāraḥ na hi kṛtakena satā na anityena bhāvyam iti upapattiḥ asti yadi evam rūpa janakena satā rasa janakena na bhāvyam iti atra api kopa pattiḥ rūpa janaka tvāt eva iti ced na ayoga vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇe kṣīṇa tvāt upapatteḥ anya yoga vyavacchedasya asiddha tvāt tathā hi kim rūpasya janakam eva atha rūpasya eva janakam iti rūpa janakam tatra prathama pakṣe rūpam pratyajanaka tvasya eva vyavacchedaḥ na punar anya janaka tvasya vyavacchedaḥ vidhiḥ vā iti sādhana antaram apekṣya tena eva virodhe vyavacchedasya eva asiddheḥ dvitīye tu pakṣe anya janana kṣepa siddhiḥ asandigdhā kevalam na tatra pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ yathā hi ekasya tat na antaroyaka tvam tathā dvitīyasya api yadi syāt na doṣaḥ pradīpa vat 
JŚNĀ_37,3^2	 na tu rūpa janakam iti eva rasa janaka pratikṣepaḥ rūpa janaka tvasya ayoga vyavacchedena api caritārtha tvāt iti na kā api upapattiḥ atra api kevalam kalpanā buddhau yathārtha antaram iva rūpa janaka tvam pratibhāti tathā tad abhāva avyabhicāri ca pṛthak eva rasa janaka tvam avasīyate yatas pṛthak śabda pramāṇa vṛttiḥ apekṣyate tāvatā eva virodha madhyavasyati sa avagatiḥ kṛtakatva anitya tvayoḥ api na vyavasīyate kena api na api tatra virodha abhidhānena kaścid upayogaḥ ekatra dharmiṇī apara parihāra artham eva hi virodhaḥ sādhyate tat yadi virodhe api eka dharmi samparkaḥ kṛtam virodha cintayā nīla tva anīla tva ādiṣu tu prayujyate paraspara parihāra ātmā virodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_38,1	 nanu paraspara abhāva avyabhicāra aviśeṣe api katham keṣāñcid dharmāṇām eka dharmiṇī anavasthāna ātmā virodhaḥ keṣāñcid punar bheda mātram na virodhaḥ uktam atra yat vyavacchedena yasya vidhānam yat vidhānena vā yasya vyavacchedaḥ niyamena tat tena pratiyoginā viruddham yatra na iyam gatiḥ tat aviruddham iti alam punar pariśrameṇa tat evam rūpa janana rasa jananayoḥ paraspara abhāva avyabhicāre api kṛtaka tva anitya tva vat bheda mātram śabda pramāṇa antara ākarṣi na tu virodhaḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_38,2^1	 yat tu uktam tatra yadi svabhāva antaram bhavet ityādi sa tarhi nyāyaḥ kim kṛtaka anitya tvābhyām bibheti prasaṅgaḥ eva tatra api bhavatu iti ced nanu para abhyupagamena prasaṅgaḥ na ca mayā idam aṅgīkṛtam paraspara abhāva avyabhicāra mātreṇa virodhaḥ ekatra anavasthāna hetuḥ iti kim tava eṣaḥ abhyupagamaḥ pramāṇa vṛttiḥ vā ubhayathā api na mama aparādhaḥ sidhyatutarām ca kṛtaka tvān ityādīnām virodhaḥ na ca evam tasmāt paraspara avyabhicārasya tādātmya niṣedhe vyāpārāt na kṛtaka tvam eva anitya tvam aniṣedhe tu ekasya eva kṛtaka tvasya bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca syāt 
JŚNĀ_38,2^2	 yathā vastunaḥ nīlāt anīlasya avyavacchede tasya eva bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca svīkṛtaḥ syāt iti ucyate nīlam iti hi tasya bhāvaḥ anīlam iti ca abhāvaḥ tad abhāva vyāptasya ānīlasya bhāvaḥ na vyāpakam tat abhāvam anākṛṣya sthātum śaktaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ ca virodhaḥ prasādhitaḥ eva iti eka dharmiṇī anavasthānam iti yat nīlam tat na ānīlam pīta ādi vastu tathā dharmaḥ api yat kṛtaka tvam tat na akṛtaka tvam anitya tva ādi yat rūpa jananam tat na arūpa jananam rasa janana ādi anyathā ekatra kṛtaka tva rūpa janana ādau śabda pramāṇa pravṛttau= anyatra anitya tva rasa janana ādau pramāṇa antara anapekṣā prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_39,1^1	 tasmāt tādātmye bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ ca ekatra syāt iti doṣaḥ na tad ādhāra tve tau hi parasparam bhinnau dharmau yadi ekatra syātām kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ bhāva abhāva doṣasya bheda sādhanena eva caritārtha tvāt śāstre api hi viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ bhedaḥ uktaḥ na virodhaḥ virodha lakṣaṇam tu anyat prasiddham eva tādātmya niṣedhaḥ api viśeṣaṇa anapekṣa svabhāva anupalambhāt uktaḥ na viruddha upalambhāt tat evam bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇa viruddha dharma saṃsargāt tad dharmitvena bhāsamānau dharmau= eva bhinnau bhavataḥ iti na tayoḥ api dharmi vastunoḥ nānā dharma yoga mātreṇa bheda vārtā
