JŚNĀ_39,1^2	 yadā punar tathā bhidyamānau= eva dharmau yathā ukta paraspara pratidvandvinau bhavataḥ tadā tad dharmiṇaḥ api bhedaḥ nīla tva ānīla tva bhāva abhāva dharmi vat eka kāryam prati jananā janana vat ca tasmāt bhāva abhāvau sākṣāt viruddhau rūpa janaka tva rasa janaka tva lakṣaṇau dharmau= eva svadharmi tvena ābhāsamānau bhintaḥ na tayoḥ api ādhāram prācīnavirūpa lakṣaṇam svayam virodha abhāvāt atas eva na bhinnau dṛśyate saḥ eka kārya jana kājanaka tve ca svayam pratyanīka tayā svadharmiṇam bhintaḥ eva abheda darśanam ca pratyanīka avasāyena virodhī yatas iti anumāna vṛttiḥ ca iti sarvam anavadyam 
JŚNĀ_39,2	 ayam tu svayam eva na hi eka svabhāvāt kāraṇāt kārya bhedam paśyāmaḥ iti na ca bhinnaḥ dṛśyate saḥ iti ca brūvanna svasthaḥ eva na nirbandha yogyaḥ tasmāt na eka svabhāvāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ kārya vaijātyam iti avirodhaḥ na tu svabhāva paramparā rahitāt iti tat evam svabhāva sandeha apohāt yat uktam kṣaṇikebhyaḥ nivartamānam sattvam asādhāraṇam upādadānasya svabhāva bheda āpattiḥ iti tat nirastam 
JŚNĀ_40,1	 kālpanikaḥ iva bheda pratibhāsaḥ na tāttvikaḥ bhedaḥ kim ca tāttvika svabhāva bheda āpattau= api sattvam asādhāraṇam iti śraddhā avadheyam eva na hi vastūnām parimāṇa atirekeṇa nityāt iva kṣaṇikāt api vyāvṛttam bhavati sattvam yatas asādhāraṇam avadhāryeta svabhāva bhūmani kaścid nityaḥ api syāt iti ced tam anupatattarhi sattvam sādhāraṇam anaikāntikam āśaṅkyatām tat ca cintyam bādhakānām vyātta vadanānām saṃbhavāt 
JŚNĀ_40,2^1	 atha svabhāva paramparā saṃbhave bhāvasya iva paribhavāt kasya kṣaṇika tvam iti kṣaṇikāt api vyāvṛttam ucyate tat api na asti svayam eva svabhāvebhyaḥ bhinnasya sva bhāvinaḥ kriyā samarthanena rakṣā vidhānāt na ca svabhāva bheda saṃbhave mūlasya kṣayaḥ api yuktaḥ aparimita upādhi saṃbhave api tadvataḥ vyaya aniṣṭaḥ asmad darśane api yadi nāma vastu antara rāśeḥ udayaḥ tathā api prakṛta bhāvasya kīdṛśī kṣaya upapattiḥ iti vyaktam etat sa tu rāśiḥ pramāṇam anviyān na va iti cintyam bhavatu vā mūlāpalāpaḥ ye tu svabhāvāḥ bhāvikāḥ iṣṭāḥ tad ātmani magna tvāt mūlasya ekam pṛthak sat kṣaṇikam mā bhūt bhūyāṃsaḥ tu kṣaṇikāḥ santaḥ iti upacayaḥ eva kṣaṇika tāyāḥ katham kṣaṇikatāyāḥ sattva vyāvṛttiḥ 
JŚNĀ_40,2^2	 tat evam evaṃvidhāḥ pralāpāḥ grāmya jana janita mahimānaḥ teṣu eva śobhante na tarka karkaśa kuśā grīya buddhiṣu bauddheṣu yā tu śikṣā svabhāva bheda sādhanāya syāt etat ityādiḥ sā eṣām eva astu anyaḥ anyasya svabhāvaḥ iti svasthasya vaktum aśakteḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ tu sādhana asaṃbhavāt adhyakṣa bādhanāt ca parihṛtaḥ eva na ca bhavan= api prakṛta doṣa saṃsparśī na api sahakāri antaram eva svabhāva antaram iti danta niṣkoṣikayā svabhāva bheda sādhanāḥ hetavaḥ viparyāsayitum śakyante kṣaṇika vādī hi sahakāriṇaḥ paśyan= eva prasiddha svabhāva bheda sādhanāya sādhanam upanyasya na katham api anena vacasā pratārayitum śakyaḥ tad varam tad sādhanam asādhanam eva iti mukhyam ākhyāyata aniṣṭa siddha vyāghātāt iti 
JŚNĀ_41,1	 tatra ca uktam asmābhiḥ na ca sahakāri sādhanāya eva pratyavasthātuḥ ayam prayatnaḥ kāryeṇa anubhūta anvaya vyatirekāḥ hi sahakāriṇaḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddhāḥ eva kim atra sādhyam tatas akṣaṇikā abhimatasya kramavatīṣu kārya vyaktiṣu sva lakṣaṇa bheda sādhane upanyaste dūṣaṇam anuktvā sahakāri antaram eva svabhāva bhedaḥ iti lapanam yadi sva hṛdaya santoṣam ālambeta ālambatām na tu para sādhyam bādhitam anena tasmāt siddham artha kriyā kāritvam asthairyeṇa vyāptam iti 
JŚNĀ_41,2	 yat api anena uktam kim ca idam tāvat ayam kṣaṇika vādī praṣṭavyaḥ pūrvasya kṣaṇasya uttarasmin= eka santāna vartini kṣaṇe kartavye na anyat kiñcid apekṣaṇīyam asti tatas ca para utpatti pratyanapekṣa tvāt tanmātra anubaddhena uttareṇa api sati eva tasmin bhavitavyam abhavan vā tanmātra anubaddhaḥ na syāt api tu nimitta antara apekṣaḥ vijñāyeta asa bhāga utpattau tu pūrve samāna santāna vartinaḥ eka santāna antarbhūta tva aviśeṣāt samarthāḥ asamarthāḥ vā bhaveyuḥ tena santāna antara varti kṣaṇa pratibandha sāmarthyaḥ sa apekṣaḥ kṣaṇaḥ syāt na tu sabhā gakṣaṇa pratibandha utpattau tathā ca sati pūrva kṣaṇa sattā mātra anubandhi tva aviśeṣāt uttarottaraḥ kṣaṇaḥ paurvāparyam tyaktvā yugapad utpadyeta tatas ca prabandha apekṣa kārya kṣaṇa kāla bhāvinām kṣaṇānām prabandhaḥ ucchidyeta tatas ca trailokya varti sakala vastu santāna bhāvinām anena eva paryāyeṇa prabandha ucchedāt anyonya saṃpīḍitā kṛtsnā trilokī prasajyeta 
JŚNĀ_41,3–41,4^1	 atha api samaya samaya bhāvi tvāt savya itara go viṣāṇayoḥ iva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ na asti iti ucyate yadi evam atīte kṣaṇe pūrvasmin vastu antaraḥ utpadyeta sati ca na utpadyeta iti apūrvaḥ ayam anvaya vyatireka anugama prakāraḥ etayā api dvārā kṣaṇikānām artha kriyā kāri tvam eva anupapannam iti tat api sarvam asaṃbaddham tathā hi yat tāvat pūrvasya uttare kartavye na anyatra kvacid apekṣā iti tatra sa bhāgāḥ uttare sarve eva kṣaṇāḥ abhipretāḥ bhavataḥ anyathā sarveṣām yaugapadya prasañjanam anupapannam syāt tatra yadi sva abhiprāye dūṣaṇam tadā na kaścid vipakṣaḥ atha saugataḥ eva praṣṭavyaḥ tadā pūrvasya uttarasmin= anantaraḥ eva kṣaṇe kartavye nirapekṣa tvam na uttare kṣaṇe saḥ eva tarhi tasya svabhāvaḥ na asti yaḥ tad utpādakaḥ tatas svabhāva sāpekṣa tvāt katham anapekṣaḥ sa tarhi svabhāvaḥ kadācid asya bhāvī na bhāvī tarhi tad apekṣaḥ iti vācaḥ yukteḥ kaḥ arthaḥ ayam arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_41,4^2–42,1	 yat ucyate devadattaḥ atra kārye yajñadatta apekṣaḥ samarthaḥ iti tatra dvayam pratīyate svayam asamarthaḥ iti yajñadattena saha samarthaḥ iti ca na ca sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ tattva anurodhī kim tu kvacid kiñcid satyam tat atra api svayam asamarthaḥ iti ayam aṃśaḥ ubhaya saṃmata tvāt durapahnavaḥ saḥ eva paścāt anyena saha samarthaḥ iti atra tu vivādaḥ ataeva sādhane bādhana avatāraḥ atas tad aṃśa asiddheḥ tad apekṣam svayaṃśabdam api apanīya kvacid sa apekṣaḥ iti asamarthaḥ iti eva arthaḥ tatas uttarottare karttavye asaṃbhavini tad utpādana svabhāve sa apekṣaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ uttarottara kartavye samarthaḥ tat atra yat dūṣaṇam tat ucyatām syāt etat uttara svarūpā viśiṣṭam uttarottaram tatas pūrvam yathottare śaktam tathā uttarottare api uttarottare aśaktaḥ tad uttare api katham śaktaḥ syāt eka svabhāva tvāt dvayoḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_42,2^1	 tat api asaṃgatam eka svabhāva tva asiddheḥ sabhā gakṣaṇa paramparā apekṣayā siddham eka svabhāva tvam iti ced na sarvathā sabhā gatva asiddheḥ sajātīya arthaḥ hi sabhāga arthaḥ sajātīya tvam ca vividham rūpataḥ śaktitas ubhayatas ca iti tatra yadi api rūpa mātra kṛtam sajātīya tvam uttarasya uttareṇa tathā api sāmarthya kṛtam na asti tatas kṛtam vijātīya tvam eva ataā iva bīja ādīnām svabhāva pariṇāma paramparayā kiyatyā api aṅkura kārya niṣpattiḥ tatra hi antimasya bīja kṣaṇasya aṅkure śaktiḥ antime punar upānti asya upāntye ca tat pūrvasya iti evam yāvat prathama bīja saṃbhavaḥ evam sahakāri sāmagrī api tatra apara aparā viśiṣṭa eva iti veditavyam ataeva apara apara pratyaya yogena pratikṣaṇa bhinna śaktayaḥ saṃtanvantaḥ saṃskārāḥ yadi api kutaścid sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante tathā api bhinnaḥ eva eṣām svabhāvaḥ tena kiñcid eva kasyacid kāraṇam kāryam vā iti nyāyaḥ tatas sarvathā sabhāga tva virahāt pūrvasya uttarakṣaṇa janana sāmarthye api na uttara uttara jana nam asya tatas śakti viśeṣeṇa viśeṣāt 
JŚNĀ_42,2^2	 tathā tasya api anyasmāt śakteḥ upacayaḥ apacayaḥ vā ubhayoḥ api viśeṣaḥ eva ucyate viśiṣyate anyasmāt iti tat katham eka kṣaṇaḥ eva sarveṣām sa bhāga abhima takṣaṇānām upanipāta codya avakāśaḥ anvaya vyatireka utprāsaḥ api paścimaḥ duścaritam eva kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhana sāmarthya akadarthane hi yat eka anantaram anya janma saḥ eva anvayaḥ yat ca tad kāraṇasya prāc asaṃbhave asaṃbhavaḥ eva deśa kāla antare kāryasya saḥ eva vyatirekaḥ iti kim atra kriyatām anicchatā api nitya vādinaḥ api hi na saha eva hetu phalayoḥ janma kim tu hetu janma anantaram phalasya janma yad kṣaṇāt ca kāraṇasya kāryam udaya vat tatas prāk paścāt vā saṃbhave kāraṇasya kāryasya kaḥ upakāraḥ tad kṣaṇa antaram asya janma iti tāvatā eva kṛtārtha tvāt kāryasya tāvatā eva anvayaḥ tad abhāve abhāvaḥ ca iti vyatirekaḥ ca kevalam tad kṣaṇāt prāk paścāt api kāraṇa abhimatasya bhāvaḥ pramāṇa upanītena kārya anupayoga mātreṇa parihartum śakyaḥ iti tāvat nitya vādinaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa ca vicāritaḥ anvaya vyatirekau tu yathā ukta mātreṇa iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_43,1–43,2	 yat api sattvasya asādhāraṇa tām pratijñāya ekasmāt anekasmāt ekam anekam vā utpadyata iti vimṛśya anekasmāt aneka utpatti pakṣam sthitam ādāya uvāca vācaspatiḥ kim pūrve kṣaṇāḥ uttareṣām kṣaṇānām parasparam nirapekṣāḥ eva janakāḥ āhosvit sa apekṣāḥ iti nanu uktam anti akṣaṇa prāptāḥ parasparam anapekṣāḥ kāryāṇi janayanti iti tat kim anabhyupetāropaprapañcena tat kim idānīm samartha bīja kṣaṇa janakaḥ api tad janane bīja kṣaṇaḥ anapekṣaḥ eva om iti brūmaḥ hanta anena prakāreṇa sarve eva bīja kṣaṇāḥ nirapekṣāḥ kārya jananaḥ iti kṛtam saha kāribhiḥ nanu uktam na ete prekṣāvantaḥ kim tu sva pratyaya adhīna niyata sannidhayaḥ na kṣaṇam api vyavadheḥ īśate iti tat kim ayam kṛṣībalaḥ api na prekṣāvān yaḥ kuśūlāt apanīya bījam āvapati bhūmau parikarṣitāyām kṣiti ādi sahabhāvena eva atiśayīt pāda paramparayā aṅku rajanana sāmarthyāt bījasya kuśūla sthāt vatsara śatena api tad adarśanāt tatra avapati iti ced atha kim ayam na sva santāna mātra prabhavaḥ samarthaḥ bīja kṣaṇaḥ tathā ced katham santāna antaram sahakāri na apekṣeta kārya karaṇe 
JŚNĀ_44,1	 nanu apekṣate eva kim tu sva utpāde na punar sva kārye tatra tasya anapekṣa tvam ucyate na tu sva utpattau nanu sva utpattau= api asya sva santāna vartī jāgarti pūrvaḥ eva nirapekṣaḥ kṣaṇaḥ evam tasya tasya pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ kṣaṇaḥ sva santānapatitaḥ eva anapekṣaḥ jāgarti jananaḥ iti kuśūla nihita bījaḥ eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ kṛtam asya prekṣāvataḥ kṛṣi karmaṇā duḥkha ākareṇa iti 
JŚNĀ_44,2	 yadi manyeta dvividham iha kāryam ekam sahakāribhiḥ āhita atiśaya viśeṣa paramparā prasava dharmakam dvitīyam sahakāri atiśaya nirapekṣa janakam yatra aṅkaraḥ atiśaya viśeṣa parampara apekṣa janmā ādya atiśayaḥ tu sahakāri kṛta atiśaya paramparā nirapekṣa utpādaḥ na ca etat ubhayavidham api kāryam bījasya sva santāna mātrāt utpattim arhati kṣiti ādi santāna antara apekṣam eva bījam sva santāna varti bhinna santāna varti vā kādācid kam kāryam karoti iti kalpate kṛṣi karmam santāna antarāṇi tu kādācitka kārya utpattau ye sahakāri pratyayāḥ te eva yathā aṅkura utpattau sahakāriṇaḥ bījasya sāmarthya prabodhe hetavaḥ kadācid teṣām kṣiti ādīnām ye api janana hetavaḥ te eva sāmarthya hetavaḥ bhavanti yathā bīja ādīnām ādya atiśaya utpādane sāmarthya prabodha hetavaḥ upasarpaṇa pratyayāḥ sarvathā santāna antaraiḥ anāhita atiśayam na bījam kārya viśeṣam kādācid kam karoti sāmarthya prabodha hetavaḥ ca dvaye sahakāri pratyayāḥ upasarpaṇa pratyayāḥ ca iti 
JŚNĀ_44,3	 tad anupapannam tathā hi bhavatu tathā dvividham kāryam astu ca tad kādācid ka tvāt santāna antara apekṣam apekṣā arthaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ kāraṇasya sva sāmarthya prabodhaḥ iti ced nanu sāmarthya tad prabodhayoḥ samartha bhāva tattva avyatirekāt samartha pratyaya utpādaḥ iti uktam bhavati tathā ca sva utpāda apekṣita kāraṇam sahakāri pratyayāt satyam abhyupagamaḥ eva doṣa tvena codyate atha ayam aṅkura janana samarthaḥ vā kṣaṇaḥ ādya atiśayaḥ vā kim nirapekṣeṇa sva santāna mātra janmanā pūrvakṣaṇena janyate na punar sva santāna mātra janmanā asya api pūrvasmāt eva puñjāt utpatteḥ 
JŚNĀ_45,1	 nanu samāna śaktyā kuśūla janmasu bīja santāneṣu kasmāt kiñcid eva bījam paramparayā aṅkura upajanana anuguṇam upajanayati bīja kṣaṇam na anye bīja kṣaṇāḥ bhinna santāna antaḥpātinaḥ na kha lu upasarpaṇa pratyayāt prāk eteṣām samāna asamāna santāna vartinām kaścid paramparā atiśayaḥ bīja kṣaṇānām artha upasarpaṇa pratyayāt prāk na tad santāna vartinaḥ janayanti paramparayā api aṅkura upajanana anuguṇam bīja kṣaṇam bīja mātra jananāt teṣām kasyacid bīja kṣaṇasya upasarpaṇa pratyaya sahabhuvaḥ ādya atiśaya utpādaḥ hanta tarhi tad abhāve sati utpannaḥ api janayet eva na ca asya upasarpaṇa pratyayena sahabhāva niyamaḥ atat santānānām kuśūla vartinām bīja kṣaṇānām tena saha samāna yogakṣemāṇām abhyupasarpaṇa pratyaya sahabhāva abhāvāt kṣaṇasya ca ekasya kṣaṇa antareṇa ekena kārya kāraṇa niścaya abhāvāt sāmānya viṣaya utpāda anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tatra eva upapatteḥ tathā ca kevalānām vyabhicāra saṃbhavāt ādya atiśaya utpādam aṅkuram vā prati kṣiti ādīnām paraspara apekṣa tvam eva utpādaka tvam akāmena api aṅgīkartavyam iti 
JŚNĀ_45,2	 tat api prācīna carcayā nirasta prāyam tathā hi yadi nāma paraspara apekṣāṇām eva utpādaka tvam etāvatā samarthitam prastute kim āyātam atha samāna kāla bhāvinām paraspara upakāram antareṇa api paraspara apekṣa tvam upalabdham evam akṣaṇikasya api sahakāriṣu anupakāriṣu tyakṣyate iti kadācid kasyacid karaṇa saṃbhāvanāyām āyāsa saṃbhavinī nityāt vyāvṛttiḥ satyasya iti abhiprāyaḥ yadi evam katham asādhāraṇa tā pratijñā nirvāhaḥ sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam eva abhidhātum ucitam 
JŚNĀ_45,3–45,4	 atha kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu na apekṣā na anapekṣā yuktā iti vyavasthitam vakṣyate ca purastāt ayam abhiprāyaḥ tatas apekṣa anapekṣābhyām vyāptam artha kriyā kāri tvam anityāt ca tad abhāvāt vyāvartate sthirāt ca krama yaugapadya virahāt vyāvartate tvad matena iti vyaktam asādhāraṇam tathā ca na kṣaṇikasya saha kāriṣu apekṣāḥ upakāra abhāvāt na api anapekṣā tām antareṇa kāraṇa abhāvāt iti siddhaḥ vyāpaka abhāvaḥ tat api yat kiñcit tathā hi kīdṛśam apekṣā artham ādāya idam ucyate yadi tāvat sahakāriṇam apekṣate iti sahakāriṇā upakartavyaḥ iti arthaḥ tadā tad abhāvāt anapekṣā eva kṣaṇikasya katham ubhaya vyāvṛttiḥ sahakāri bhedam antareṇa karaṇa anupapattiḥ tu kṣaṇa antare svayam abhāvāt eva 
JŚNĀ_46,1	 atha tat vā tādṛś vā āsīt iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tatas tādṛś svabhāva saṃbhave api akaraṇam sahakāriṇi nirapekṣāt na kṣamate iti ced asaṃbaddham etat akartuḥ tādṛś svabhāva tāyāḥ virahāt yat eva anantara kāryam aparyāsita śakti sakala sahakāri madhyam adhyāsīnasya svarūpam tat eva yadi deśa kāla antare api hanta tadvat eva karaṇa kṣama tvam na ca varṇa saṃsthāna mātra sāmye ca sāmyam bīja antarāṇām bhavitum arhati dṛśyante hi ākāra sāmye api phala sadbhāva ādi bhedena bhāvānām bhinna vyavasthitayaḥ tathā śakti bhedena api syuḥ pāka upacaye harītakī vat sa tu svabhāva bhedaḥ teṣām bīja tve sādhāraṇe api kutas iti praśne api kāraṇa sāmagrī śakti bheda eva śaraṇam kathañcid sāmya pratītau= api iti darśitam apara apara pratyaya ityādi prastāve 
JŚNĀ_46,2	 tatas yat uktam nanu samāna kuśūla janmasu ityādi tad apāstam yasya hi dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa kāraṇa sāmagrī pariṇāme paramparā āyātaḥ svabhāva bhedaḥ bījasya upasarpaṇa pratyaya sahakāri bhāva bhūmiḥ tat pariṇāma paramparayā janayati ādyam atiśayam aṅkuram vā na anye bīja kṣaṇāḥ tathā bhūta hetu paramparā viraheṇa tad svabhāva abhāvāt nanu ekatra kṣetre niṣpattila vana ādi pūrvakam ānīya kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvāṇi eva bījāni sādhāraṇa rūpāṇi pratīyante tat kutastyaḥ amuka bīja saṃbhavī viśeṣaḥ na anyeṣām atas ca evam yatas hi kṣetra la vanāya kara sparśaḥ tasya eva sa svabhāvaḥ paścāt anyeṣām api nayane tad darśanāt tat katham asya sama svabhāva tvam apahnotum śakyate iti 
JŚNĀ_46,3	 atra ucyate kāraṇam khalu sarvatra dvividham dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam ca iti sarva āstika siddham etat tatra adṛṣṭam karma svabhāvam anya janma janitam adarśana eka niyatam kārya vaicitrya darśanāt anumita vaicitryam dṛṣṭam punar aiha laukika svabhāvam dṛśyam adṛśyam ca iti dvedhā tat ca pratyekam acetana samavetam ca iti caturdhā bhavati tat evam na hetu sāmagrī sarvā sarva ākāreṇa pratyakṣā puruṣa mātrasya 
JŚNĀ_46,4^1	 tathā ca trilocanaḥ kaścid sahakāri pratyayaḥ pratyakṣaḥ parokṣaḥ ca itaraḥ tatas ca pratyakṣa parokṣa sahakāri pratyaya sākalyam asarva vidā pratyakṣataḥ na śakyam pratipattum iti yad aṃśena api sā sāmagrī pratyakṣā tatra api avāntara sūkṣma bheda parigaṇanāya na samarthaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ sthula darśi tvāt tatas bhavet api tādṛśa svabhāva bhedaḥ keṣāñcid vījānām upalabdha karmakara pāṇi praṇayānām yaḥ paramparayā prakṛta kāryam arjitum ūrjasvī yaḥ ca na anyeṣām tad eka kuśūla sthānām api na ca enam anviyāt lokaḥ na ca anavadhāraṇa mātreṇa tad abhāvaḥ saṃśayaḥ tu syāt 
JŚNĀ_46,4^2–47,1	 sa ca kāryeṇa kara sparśeṇa na bhavatā paribhūyate tathā caika śarīra avayavānām avibhakta mātā pitṛ saṃyoga ādi sāmagrī saṃbhavānām kvacid eva tilakaḥ citraka ciṇṭikā ādaye udayam āsādayantaḥ sahajāḥ krama jāḥ vā upalabhyante asti ca tvac māṃsa ādi sāmya m anya avayaveṣu api tat amī tilaka ādayaḥ vibhāgena bhavantaḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa kāraṇa sāmagrī pariṇati vibhāgam anupalakṣyam api khyāpayantaḥ katham iva niṣeddhum śakyāḥ evam bāhyeṣu api bhāveṣu sarva kārya grāmasya hi sādhāraṇa sādhāraṇa karmaṇi jāta tvam iṣṭam śiṣṭānām atha api syāt śarīre dakṣiṇa itara gopyā gopya sthāneṣu bhavantaḥ tilaka ādayaḥ avaśyam sukha asukha ādikam upanayanti iti sat saṃvartanīya karma ādhipatyāt ucitaḥ sthāna niyamaḥ kuśūle tu bīja visareṇa tena anyena vā parikarmita bhūmau= upyamāne na kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti vaiṣamyāt na karma śakti kalpanam iti ced 
JŚNĀ_47,2^1	 hanta evam sākṣāt upayoga darśana adarśanābhyām karma ādi sādhana śakti kalpanā kalpanayoḥ alpīyaḥ kiścid kāryam jagati karma nirmeyam anumantavyam īśvara ādi sādhyam vā na hi śiśu paśu viśeṣa sādhāraṇa vyāvṛttyā chāga ādīnām purīṣa ādeḥ vartulīkaraṇena kiñcid prayojanam upalabhase anupabhukta viśīrṇeṣu vā aṭavī viṭapa phala prasūna pallava ādiṣu te eva tilaka ādimantaḥ puruṣāḥ aparicita svakīya kāya tilaka ādayaḥ paricaye api vā anudīrṇa duḥkha daurmanasya ādayaḥ dṛśyante maraṇam upagacchantaḥ iti kaḥ tatra api upayogaḥ sa vyāsavyagopyetara sthāneṣu vā sthavīyassu tilaka ādi saṃbhava yogya sthānīyasya deśasya bhūyasaḥ saṃbhavāt katham udbhati sthāna niyamaḥ tilaka ādīnām 
JŚNĀ_47,2^2	 mṛga ādiṣu ca varṇa mātra vaikṛtyena kvacid aṅge daurmanasya ādi śaṅkayā api alam kim teṣu kīdṛśam upayoga varṇanam kiyat vā śakyam etādṛśam upadarśayitum kiyati vā tvayā api pratividheyam tat kim viphalam āyāsyasi upayoga abhyūha virahe api pratiniyata deśa kāla svabhāveṣu bhāveṣu kārya bheda upalambhaḥ sarvatra avāntara bhedam durlakṣya karma ādi sādhana śakti bheda bhāvitam sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā dṛśya adṛśya cetanā cetana artha karmaṇi upayoginam yogibhiḥ api avāntaraiḥ aśakya paricchedam idantayā niyamena sāmānyatas vyavasthāpayati iti galepa ādikayā api svīkārayitavyaḥ nyāya anveṣī nyāya vidā 
JŚNĀ_47,2^3	 tathā ca sati kasyacid eva bījasya apasarpaṇa pratyaya samparka karkaśaḥ svabhāvaḥ anyeṣām tu tad viśeṣa viśleṣa masṛṇaḥ iti avāntarāva antara viśeṣāt saḥ eva bīja kṣaṇaḥ paramparayā api prakṛta kārya upayogī na anye bīja kṣaṇāḥ sa ca avāntaraḥ viśeṣaḥ kara sparśāt anumīyamānaḥ na karma ādi sādhana śakti viśeṣa anabhyūhāt upayoga viśeṣa an abhyūhāt vā śakya pratikṣepaḥ tilaka ādi saṃbhavāt iva deha aṃśa viśeṣaḥ vṛkṣa ādi aṃśa viśeṣaḥ vā kutaścid eka deśika vikāra leśāt tatra api hi vikāra bindu sthānasya aṃśasya idam dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam vā kāraṇam āsādya upādāna bhāga viśeṣa paramparayā ayam svabhāva bhedaḥ idam anya bhāga asādhyam artham kartum samarthaḥ iti viśeṣān avadhāraṇe api asti kiñcid viśiṣṭam kāraṇam upayogaḥ vā a nyāsaṃbhavī iti sāmānyatas vikāra kāraṇa yogāt aṅgasya svabhāva bheda niścayaḥ evam atra api bīje puruṣa buddhi prayukta kara sparśāt asti svabhāva bhedaḥ sūkṣma hetu phala bheda bhāgī iti sāmānyatas durnivāraḥ niścayaḥ tatas svābhava bheda saṃbhavāt tat eva bījam upayujyate paramparayā api aṅkura upajanana anuguṇe viśeṣe na anye bīja kṣaṇāḥ iti siddham etat 
JŚNĀ_48,1^1	 yat tu uktam na khalu upasarpaṇa ityādi tat etat kasya pramāṇasya vyāpāram ālā ucyate na tāvat pratyakṣasya ākāra sāmyena sthūla eka jātīyatā niścaye api avāntara bhedasya sūkṣmatayā ana vasitasya aśakya niṣedha tvāt dṛṣṭam ca tikta itaratrapuṣa ādau sadṛśa ākāre sthūla jāti bhedavatī api praskhala dadhi akṣam eka avasāya jananāt tat na eka avasāya mātreṇa tattva sthitiḥ tad aṃśe bādhakasya darśita tvāt atyanta abhyāsa bhāvite tu saṃvādini bādhaka abhāvāt ekatā sthitiḥ aviruddhā iti na pratyakṣīkṛtaḥ prastute paraspara atiśaya niṣedhaḥ na api anumānāt yadi ucyeta kṣiti ādau janayitavye tad upādānam pūrvam eva kṣiti ādi bījasya rūpa antaram iti na tarhi bījam tad apekṣam kṣiti ādīnām janakam tad anapekṣa tve teṣām aṅkurāt bheda anupapatteḥ 
JŚNĀ_48,1^2	 na ca anupakārakāḥ apekṣante iti tvayā eva uktam na ca kṣaṇasya upakāra saṃbhavaḥ anyatra jananāt tasya abhedya tvāt tathā ca artha kriyāyāḥ ekatva aneka tva sāpekṣa tva anapekṣa tva vyāpta tvāt tṛtīya prakāra virahāt anayoḥ anyatara niṣedhasya anyatara vidhānana āntarīyaka tvāt akṣaṇike ca tad vyāpakayoḥ eka tva aneka tvayoḥ sa apekṣa tva anapekṣa tvayoḥ prakārayoḥ abhāvāt uktena krameṇa sattvam nivṛttam iti asādhāraṇā naikāntāt avyabhicāriṇaḥ liṅgasya anupadarśanāt upadarśayitum aśakya tvāt ca bādhakasya eva vidyamāna tvāt tasmāt na aniṣṭa mātra ghoṣaṇena kiñcid 
JŚNĀ_49,1–49,3	 etena na upakāraḥ apekṣā arthaḥ iti anapekṣā eva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu na ubhaya vyāvṛtiḥ atha saṃbhūyakaraṇam apekṣā arthaḥ tat api yadi pūrva sthitasya iti viśeṣaṇa apekṣā tadā api kṣaṇikasya na eva kācid iti anapekṣā eva akṣīṇā atha pūrva sthitasya iti na apekṣate milita avasthitasya karaṇa mātram apekṣā arthaḥ tadā sa apekṣatā eva na anapekṣā tathā api na ubhaya vyāvṛttiḥ 
JŚNĀ_49,4–49,5	 atha asmad samaya apekṣayā apekṣā sthitiḥ tadā sa apekṣam asamartham eva samarthitavantaḥ vayam iti yat kāryam prati yat asamartham tad sāpekṣam yat tu samartham tad anapekṣam iti vyavasthā tadā ca eka niṣedhena apara vidhānāt sāmarthya rahitam samartham eva bhavati asāmarthyam uktam ca samartham eva iti natarām ubhaya vyāvṛttiḥ kṣaṇika tve 
JŚNĀ_49,6	 yat ca avocat api ca antyakṣaṇa prāptam bījam anapekṣya aṅkura avanipavana pāthaḥ tejāṃsi janayat kim yena eva rūpeṇa aṅkuram janayati tena eva tad itarāṇi api kim vā rūpa antareṇa na tāvat tena eva kṣiti ādīnām api aṅkura svābhā vya āpatteḥ na khalu kāraṇa abhede bheda vat kāryam bhavitum arhati kārya bhedasya akasmika tva prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_49,7	 yat āha ayam eva hi bhedaḥ bheda hetuḥ vā yat uta viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ kāraṇa bhedaḥ ca iti na api sāmagrī bhedaḥ tasyāḥ api eka tvāt anyathā sahabhāva niyama abhāvāt rūpa antareṇa tad itareṣām janakam tathā hi bījam aṅkuram janayat upādānam tad vikriyayā tad utpatteḥ tad itareṣu punar asya sahakāri pratyaya tā teṣām tu pūrve pavana ādayaḥ yathā svam upādānāni tad vikriyayā tad utpādāt iti ced nanu sahakārita upādānate kim ekam tattvam nānā vā ekam ced katham rūpa antareṇa janakam nānātve tu anayoḥ bījāt bhedaḥ abhedaḥ vā bhede katham bījasya janaka tvam tābhyām eva aṅkura ādīnām upapatteḥ abhede vā katham bījasya na nānātvam bhinna tādātmyāt etayoḥ vā eka tvam ekatādātmyāt 
JŚNĀ_50,1	 yadyucyeta kṣiti ādau janayitavye tad upādānam pūrvam eva kṣiti ādi bījasya rūpa antaram iti na tarhi bījam tad anapekṣam kṣiti ādīnām janakam tad anapekṣa tve teṣām aṅkurāt bheda anupapatteḥ na ca anupakāra kāriṇaḥ apekṣantaḥ iti tvayā eva uktam na ca kṣaṇasya upakāra saṃbhavaḥ anyatra jananāt tasya abhedya tvāt tathā ca artha kriyāyāḥ ekatva aneka tva sāpekṣa tva anapekṣa tva vyāpta tvāt tṛtoya prakāra virahāt anayoḥ anyatara niṣedhasya anyatara vidhānana āntarīyaka tvāt kṣaṇika vat vyāpakayoḥ ekatva aneka tvayoḥ sa apekṣa tva anapekṣa tvayoḥ prakārayoḥ abhāvāt uktena krameṇa sattvam nivṛttam iti asādhāraṇa anaikāntika tvam gandhavat tva ādeḥ iva iti 
JŚNĀ_50,2	 yadi manyeta anupakāriṇaḥ api bhavanti sahakāriṇaḥ apekṣaṇīyāḥ ca kāryeṇa anuvihita bhāva abhāva tvāt saha kārya karaṇāt ca nanu anena krameṇa akṣaṇikaḥ api bhāvaḥ anupakārakān api sahakāriṇaḥ kramavataḥ kāryeṇa anukṛta anvaya vyatirekān apekṣiṣyate kariṣyate ca krama vat sahakāri samavadhāna vaśāt krameṇa kāryāṇi iti vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ asiddheḥ sandigdha vyatirekam anaikāntikam sattvam kṣaṇika tva siddhau= iti tat api pūrvam eva nirastam yat punar ayam adhikam āha na api sāmagrī bhedaḥ tasyāḥ api eka tvāt iti tatra api brūmaḥ yathā sāmagryāḥ abhedaḥ tathā kāryāṇām api abhedāt katham na kāraṇa abheda anukāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_50,3–51,1	 nanu pratiniyata aneka rūpāṇām kāryāṇām abhedaḥ iti kā iyam vācoyuktiḥ yadi ebam na khalu samagrebhyaḥ bhinnā kācid adhyakṣa gocaraḥ saugata mate ca cintā iyam tatas abhinnā sāmagrī iti samagrāḥ eva pratiniyata aneka mūrtayaḥ abhinnā iti api kīdṛśī vācoyuktiḥ sāmagrī lakṣaṇa kāraṇa bheda abhedāt ca kārya bheda abhedam āśaṅkamānasya ayam abhinnasāmagrīvādaḥ vācaspateḥ ucitaḥ anyathā bījam ekam katham aṅku rasa rodharaṇi dhām ādi janayet iti etāvatā eva gatam etat na ca idam ca udyam yatas yadi pramāṇa vṛttim anuvṛttya ekasmāt aneka utpatti niṣedhaḥ abhipretaḥ tadā ekasmāt api dīpāt varti vikāra ādi anekam kāryam upajāyamānam adhigacchat adhyakṣam akhila tad viparītam atiṣu āsthām dusthayati tat api katham iti ced nanu pramāṇa puraskāreṇa vicāre pratyakṣam ādau= ādāya pariśiṣṭa gaṇanāt tena sādhite bādhite vā na aparasya bādhana sādhanayoḥ adhikāraḥ pramāṇa mārga ullaṅghinaḥ tu tādṛśā eva deyam uttaram iti āstām tāvat 
JŚNĀ_51,2	 atha aṅkura kāri katham dharaṇi kṣaṇa hetuḥ na hi atra api pratyakṣa bādha abhidhānam yuktimat kṣaṇasya tad gocara atikrānta tvāt tadā api yadi eka kārakaḥ anya kārakaḥ na bhavati iti vyāptiḥ tadā dīpena eva vyabhicāraḥ atha aṅkura kārakaḥ na pṛthvī hetuḥ iti tadā asādhāraṇān ekāntaḥ atha aṅkurasya hetuḥ katham anyasya bhavitum arhati iti ced kim aṅkurasya eva atha aṅkurasya api yat vā aṅkurasya tāvat bhavati anyatra aniścayaḥ atra ca pakṣa traye api asiddha viruddha anaikāntika tvam krameṇa duṣpariharam tasmāt na atra pramāṇa vṛttiḥ prasaṅga udbhāvanam api para abhyupagamena bhavati na ca ekam anekasya ajanakam iti kṣaṇika vādinām abhyupagamaḥ tat na sāmagrī antargata vastu eka tvena kāryā ekatva prasañjanam abālasya sāmagrī lakṣaṇa kāraṇa apekṣaṇe ca bhinnānām api aṅkura ādīnām kāraṇa bheda abheda anuvidhānam siddham iti nābheda anuvidhāna anurodhāt aṅkura ādīnām ekatā āpattiḥ yathā hi aṅkura ādayaḥ pratyeka kārya tve api bhinna abhinna ātmānaḥ tathā sāmagraḥ śabda vācyā bīja ādayaḥ pratyekam kāraṇībhavantaḥ bhinna abhinnāḥ eva iti siddhaḥ kāraṇa bhedāt bhedaḥ 
JŚNĀ_51,3	 atha bhinna ātmānaḥ api bīja ādayaḥ kayācid pratyāsattyāḥ eka vyavahāra gocarīkriyante evam aṅkurādayopī iti kāraṇa abhede abhedaḥ api siddhaḥ tatra kāraṇānām ekaika artha janaka tvam eka vyavahāra hetuḥ kāryāṇām tu ekaika janya tvam iti samānam tat kim artham ekībhavitavyam aṅkura ādibhiḥ sāmagrī apekṣāyām api tāvatā eva hetu bheda abheda anuvidhānasya paryāpta tvāt etat ca kāraṇa śabdena sāmagrīm vyutpadyamānasya api parasya bheda abhedayoḥ avyutpattiḥ eva buddhi anurodhāt abhidhīyate tattvataḥ tu yathā kāraṇam sāmagrī vivakṣitā tathā bheda abhedau= api vaijātya a= aijātye vivakṣite iti darśita prāyam 
JŚNĀ_52,1^1	 nanu adya api na samagrebhyaḥ anyā sāmagri iti teṣām eva samagrāṇām sādṛśye vaisadṛśye vā kāryāṇām sādṛśyam vaisadṛśyam vā iti prāptam evam etat na tu tat puñja sthānām parasparam sādṛśya ādi nirūpaṇam kim tu puñja antara sthaiḥ saha sva jāti apekṣayā senāyāḥ senā antareṇa saha sādṛśya itara nirūpaṇa vat tatra yāvantaḥ yādṛśāḥ eka sāmagrī prajñapti gocarāḥ arthāḥ hetu saṃmatāḥ tāvantaḥ tādṛśāḥ eva yadi deśa kāla antara vartinaḥ tadā asau sadṛśī sāmagrī kāryam ca sadṛśam asyāḥ iti kārya śabdena api puñjaḥ eva yāvanti yādṛśāni kāryāṇi jātāni ekatra tāvanti tādṛśāni eva anyatra api jāyante iti arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_52,1^2	 vaisadṛśye tu tāratamya bhedena bhidyamāne kāryam api tāratamya bhedena bhidyate iti api kārya puñjasya eva tāratamya bhedena vaisadṛśyam iti arthaḥ bheda mātra bivakṣāyām api ayam eva nyāyaḥ satyām bipratipattau bhinnāyāḥ sāmagryāḥ bhinnam eva kāryam bhavati iti etādṛśam eva kāraṇa bheda anuvidhānam kāryasya pramāṇa anusāri tad atikrame ca viśvasya ahetuka tva prasaṅgaḥ saṅgatim avatarati na pramāṇa bādhitasya eka kāraṇa eka karaṇa niyamasya atikrame tat iyam bheda abheda anukaraṇa vārtā naiyāyikānām gopa mukhāt pāya samiṣṭa tā śrutim anuharati 
JŚNĀ_52,2	 tasmāt ekam eva bījam aṅkura ādikam anekam janayati evam kṣiti ādikam api pratyekam atas na eka anekayoḥ ubhayoḥ api vyāvṛttiḥ yatas vyāpaka anupalambhā ayam aparaḥ kṣaṇika pakṣe api kriyā bādhanam sat tayā asādhāraṇīkaraṇa artham upanyasyate rūpa antareṇa janana pakṣaḥ tu pratikṣiptaḥ eva asmābhiḥ iti na tad dūṣaṇa paramparāyāḥ parihāra abhiyogaḥ etat ca tattva apekṣayā ucyate kalpanā vilāse tu yat aṅkura jananam na tat kṣiti jananam tathā na sahakāri tvam eva upādāna tvam iti evam prakāra prapañca saṃbhave api na aparādhaḥ vastunaḥ kaścid kriyā viraha lakṣaṇaḥ tāttvikena eva rūpeṇa sarva nirvāhāt ataā iva kṣiti ādau janayitavye tad upādānam pūrvam eva kṣiti ādi bījasya rūpa antaram iti kim artham baktavyam asmābhiḥ yat uttaraḥ prabandhaḥ sādhuḥ syāt anapekṣā ca ekā sahakāriṣu api sādhitā iti prakaraṇa artha nigamanam sakalam ākulam ākula dhiyaḥ parasya 
JŚNĀ_53,1	 kim ca yena eva rūpeṇa bījam aṅkuram utpādayati kim tena eva kṣauṇīkṣaṇam iti paryanuyuñjānāḥ te api paryanuyujyante rūpa śabdena kim atra vivakṣitam iti kim tāvat kalpanā talpa śāyinaḥ bhinnāḥ iva bhāsamānāḥ dharmāḥ kṛtaka tva anitya tva ādi vat aṅkura itara janaka tva ādayaḥ sva rūpa śabdena api labdha vyavahṛtayaḥ atha rūpam svarūpam sva lakṣaṇam yat bhedāt na aparaḥ vastu bhedaḥ yat adhikāreṇa ucyate yat ādau vastunaḥ svarūpam tat eva yadi paścāt api prāk iva paścāt api na janayet ityādi 
JŚNĀ_53,2^1	 yat vā naiyāyikaiḥ patyuḥ nāma avijānatyā bhrātṛ śabdena vyavahāra vat sahakāriṇaḥ eva sva rūpa śabdena vyavahṛtāḥ rūpam iti uktam tatra prathama pakṣe tāvat na paryanuyoga saṃgatiḥ kalpanā nirmitāḥ hi dharmāḥ parasparam dharmiṇaḥ ca sakāśāt vidyamānāḥ iva bhāntaḥ api yathā pratibhā sam asattvāt pramāṇa saha tayā na kvacid kriyāyām karaṇa bhāva bhājaḥ bhavitum arhati yat eva hi sva lakṣaṇa madhyakṣa gocarīkṛtam anaṅgam tata eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām artha kriyā niṣpatti niścaye api anādi vāsanā vaśāt upajāyamāna vikalpa cetasi tatas tatas vyāvṛtta vastu vyavasāya bala avalambi saṃvāda iṣu dharmaṣu apa uddhāreṇa asyām asyām kriyāyāmaya mayam dharmaḥ upayujyate iti vyavahāra mātram ātanyate na tu teṣā kvacid karaṇa bhāvaḥ svayam asattvāt vivakṣā kṛtaḥ tu na vāryate yathā prakāśe piśaṅga ātmani pradā upepyayam akhaṇḍena eva rūpeṇa tamasaḥ nāśam avakāśa piñjaraṇam ca kurvati tathā eva niścite ca yat ayam dīpaḥ prakāśa rūpaḥ tatas andhakāram harati hariṇa aṅka vat 
JŚNĀ_53,2^2	 piśaṅga tvāt ca piñjaraṇa hetuḥ haridrā ādi vat iti vyavahāraḥ na ca tatra prakāśa piśaṅga bhāvau bhinnau vikalpa cetasi tu bhinna vat bhāsamānau= ekaikam apā uddhṛtya bhinna kriyā karaṇa tvena vyavasthitau vivakṣitau na vyavasthitau vā na ca vivakṣā mātreṇa pradīpasya akāraka tvam bhedaḥ vā tathā bījasya api aṅkura jananena rūpeṇa kalpitena aṅkura kaṇam pṛthvī janakena ca tat karaṇam iti vyavahāre api tattvataḥ na ekasya api aneka karmaṇi niṣedhaḥ bheda upapattiḥ vā akriyā eva vā tatas vikalpa ārūḍha rūpa apekṣayā anekena rūpeṇa aneka karaṇam iti vyavahāra mātram na vastu vāstavī ca cintā iyam tat kim anena vikalpitena kim tena rūpeṇa anyena vā iti vikalpe api vā anekena eva visarjanam vyavahāra mātreṇa na ca kaścid doṣaḥ dvitīya pakṣaḥ tu aneka sva lakṣaṇa darśane sati upapadyate na ca bīca sva lakṣaṇāni api sakṛt eka saṃkhyāḥ nirīkṣā viṣayaḥ na hi aparidṛṣṭa bhūmani manuṣye kim ayam atra karmaṇi niyojyaḥ naraḥ kim ayam vā iti praśna avatāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_54,1	 tṛtīya vikalpe tu ayam arthaḥ syāt yena eva rūpeṇa aṅkuram karoti kim tena eva kṣitim iti yena eva sahakāriṇā aṅkuram janayati kim tena eva bhuvam iti etat ca kadā ucyate yadi bījasya aṅkura karaṇe nirjāte niyata rūpaḥ kaścid sahakārī vyāpāravān pariniṣṭhitaḥ anya karaṇe sandigdha vyāpāraḥ na ca evam śakya upadarśanam 
JŚNĀ_54,2	 atha evam sati bījasya aṅkura karaṇe pṛthvī pāthaḥ prabhṛtayaḥ sahakāriṇasya eva kim tasya pṛthvī janane api iti vikalpa arthaḥ tena api na upayogaḥ sarveṣām sarvatra parasparam saha kāri bhāvasya su prasiddha tvāt kim atra praśnena na ca uttaraḥ prabandhaḥ atra anurūpaḥ na hi tadā api kāraṇa bheda abhedābhyām kārya bheda abhedau= iti śliṣṭa tā kācid tasmāt īrṣyā śalyakadarthita nirarthakaiḥ pralāpaiḥ parama ākulayitum icchanti nyāya vid māninaḥ iti alam atra nirbandhena 
JŚNĀ_54,3	 api ca apūrvaḥ ayam asādhāraṇa anaikāntika kīrtana prakāraḥ vidyamānaḥ hi bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoḥ aniścita anvaya vyatirekaḥ gandhavat tva ādi vadasā dhāraṇaḥ yuktaḥ prakṛta vyāpaka an upalambha balāt ca sarvathā artha kriyā eva asati iti tat katham asādhāraṇa anaikāntikī bhavitum arhati asiddhi dūṣaṇam tu vaktum ucitam tatra ca uktam eva 
JŚNĀ_54,4–54,5	 atha kṣaṇika tve vyāpaka abhāvaḥ iti uktam tat na sarvathā sattvam iti ced evam tarhi vidyamānā eva artha kriyā kṣaṇikāt eva vyāvartate tatas niyamena akṣaṇike viśrāmyanti iti tena vyāpyate iti viruddha tāpyaḥ tu atha sākṣāt akṣaṇike tasyāḥ bādhakasya sādhakasya vā virahāt sandehaḥ iti ced vidyamāna tve kṣaṇikāt vyāvṛttiḥ eva sādhanī tasyāḥ sandeham anavakāśayati vidyam āna tā āsandehe ca sandigdha asiddhiḥ eva dūṣaṇam 
JŚNĀ_54,6	 kim ca prakṛta vyāpaka an upalambhasya kṣaṇikavat akṣaṇike api sāmarthyān apāyāt katham bādhaka siddhiḥ iti asiddhiḥ eva sarvathā āyātā śakyam hi nitye api vaktum na sahakāriṇi sa apekṣasya karaṇam upakāra abhāvāt na nirapekṣasya tena vinā karaṇāt sthiram ca bījam aṅkura janakena eva rūpeṇa kṣitim utpādayati bhinnena vā ityādi yadā visadṛśa kṣiti ādi janma upālambhaḥ pradīpaḥ api ca akṣaṇikaḥ eva bhavatām tatra varti vikāra taila kṣayau= ekena bhinnena vā rūpeṇa kriyetām iti samānam yaḥ tu samādhiḥ sahakāriṇaḥ eva bhinnāḥ tasya svarūpa bhedaḥ iti evam ca bruvatā paraḥ api ātmā ātmā api paraḥ iti nivṛtta idānīm ātma para ādi śabdebhyaḥ pratiniyata artha pratyāyana pratyāśā na ca devadattasya svarūpam yajñadattaḥ śuklasya vā nīlam iti ucitam kvacid eka karmaṇi vyāpāre api 
JŚNĀ_55,1	 tat etat apeta āgama yuktikam para spardhayā abhidhīyamānam niyatam upahāsa bhājanīkaroti sahakāriṇaḥ avadhīrya ca svarūpa śabda vācyam artham pṛcchataḥ sahakāriṇā uttaram iti vyaktam na tena na anyena vā ātmanā janayati sthiraḥ api bhāvaḥ iti niyatam anujñātā eva vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ anyasya api hi saḥ eva ātmā janakaḥ na svayam iti na kaścid janakaḥ tat ayam sthirā sthirayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ nyāyaḥ kriyā niṣedha sādhanaḥ iti tasya dṛḍha tve sarvathā kriyā eva na asti iti asiddhiḥ eva antatas krama yaugapadya viraha lakṣaṇasya api doṣasya aparihārāt sthire api kriyā nivṛttiḥ avaśya abhyupeyāḥ katham anyathā kṣaṇike kriyā niṣedha abhidhānena kevalena asādhāraṇa tā pratijñā nivṛttim ālambeta na hi sādhyāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti eva asādhāraṇa tā anyathā vipakṣāt vyāvṛttiḥ iti eva kim nāsādhāraṇa tvam ucyate kim iyatā prayāsena nanu vipakṣāt vyāvṛttyā sādhye niyamāt hetuḥ eva syāt iti ced sādhyāt vyāvṛttyā vipakṣe niyamāt viruddhaḥ eva syāt iti samānam tasmāt artha kriyāyāḥ pratijñā mātre api asiddhiḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_55,2	 atha anyena prakāreṇa ubhayoḥ aniścaya mātram sattāyāḥ khyāpyate tathā ca satya sādhāraṇa tā yuktā eva tat ayuktam vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ hi ekāntataḥ abhāva niścaya karaḥ eva katham aniścayaḥ tatra yadi nāma krama ādi anupalambhasya nityāt sattā nivartakasya dārḍhyam asaṃgatam tathā api prakṛtasya kṣaṇi nityatā bādhanasya dṛḍha tvam abhipretam eva anyathā upanyāsā yogāt tatas kṣaṇa bhaṅgarāt kriyāyāḥ aikāntikī vyāvṛttiḥ eva vyāvṛtti ḥ asādhāraṇa tāyāḥ na hi gandhavat tvam kutaścid ekāntena vyāvṛttam avasātum śakyam tat ayam vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ sthire api vyāpaka anupalambham apekṣamāṇaḥ na sādhu ḥ asādhāraṇa tā sādhane apekṣamāṇaḥ ca sarvathā kriyām eva unmūlayati iti asiddhiḥ eva na sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ tasmāt bāhya vedanam bāhya vedaka pramāṇa siddhām ca artha kriyām vastu satīm āśritya vāda prakrame tasya asādhāraṇa tāva ādinā na sādhyetarayoḥ ekatra vṛttiḥ ekatas vyāvṛttiḥ vā upadarśayitavyā kim tu ubhayatra saṃśaya mātram śaraṇīkaraṇīyam na ca vyāpaka anupalambhe saṃbhavaḥ tasya tasmāt na sādhu ḥ asādhāraṇa tā upanyāsaḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_56,1	 syāt etat yadi bhinna kāla kārya janmani janakasya svabhāva bhedaḥ tadā bhinna deśa kārya utpāde api eṣa prasaṅgaḥ tat avaśyam sahakāri apekṣayā eva deśa bhedaḥ kāryāṇām na ca kiñcitkaraḥ sahakāroti kāla bhedaḥ api eṣām akiñcitkaraḥ sahakāri apekṣayā eva astu atha upādāna bhedāt deśa bhedaḥ kāla bhede tu na evam śakyam abhidhātum kāla antara janyānām upādānasya sthira pakṣe tadānīm api prāpti saṃbhavāt tasmāt kāraṇa bheda rūpa bheda nibandhanaḥ eva kāryasya kāla bhedaḥ iti ced tat api na asti upādāna sahakāri bhedasya tattvataḥ atāt tvika tvāt tāttvika tve api upādeya saha kārya bhedena dīpa ādeḥ upādāna sahakāri bhāva bhedāt aneka svabhāvatā prasaṅgaḥ tad ayam āropita svabhāvaḥ upādāna sahakāri bhāva bhedena bhedaḥ kāraṇasya katham kāryasya deśa bhedāya prabhavet yadi ca āropitaḥ api kāraṇasya bhedaḥ kāryasya deśa bhedāya prabhavet evam satya āropita eva kāraṇa bhedaḥ kāla bhedāya kāryāṇām paryāptaḥ iti alam tāttvika bheda pratyāśayā 
JŚNĀ_56,2–57,1	 na ca etat vaktavyam yathā kāla bhede yat yadā yat janakam ityādi bādhakam asti na tathā deśa bhedaḥ iti etādṛśasya bādhakasya deśa bhede api vaktum śakya tvāt yathā yat yat kāryam tat tad deśam yathā upādeya abhimatam tat kāryam ca kārya antaram api iti yat api idam ucyate sarva avasthā samāne api ityādi tatra api śakyam evam paṭhitum sarva deśa samāne api kāraṇe yadi akāryatā ityādi 
JŚNĀ_57,2	 atha kāraṇasya vaibhava abhyupagame syāt eṣa doṣaḥ tad abhāve tu kiṃkṛtam asya sarva deśa samāna tvam evam tarhi deśa antare api kāryam na kuryāt tatra svayam apravṛtteḥ yogyatā mātreṇa tu tad deśa vṛttim anapekṣya tatra kārya kāriṇaḥ samānaḥ asya deśaḥ upakārasya ekatas api alābhāt tasmāt tad deśe karoti iti na sva apekṣayā deśasya ādhāra bhāvaḥ kim tu kārya apekṣayā ayoga vyavacchedena ca tad karaṇam anyathā deśa antaravataḥ kāryasya karaṇa prasaṅgāt evam tarhi kāle karoti iti sa kālaḥ kāryasya eva ādhāraḥ niyamena hetoḥ tu sa ca asat ca syāt ayoga vyavacchedena tu eka kāla kārya karaṇam iti kāla antaravataḥ api kāryasya karaṇam avirodhi tasmāt kuśūla ādi sarva avasthā samāna svabhāvasya api tad atad kāla kārya jananam upapannam bhinna deśa aneka kārya arjana vat iti 
JŚNĀ_57,3	 tat etat na saṅgatam bādhaka bhāva abhāvābhyām viśeṣāt yat tu tad kārya tvam tad deśatā sādhanāya upanyastam tad viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt asādhanam eva anvaya vyatireka samadhigamyaḥ ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tau ca yathā tad deśa kārya janmani dṛṣṭau tathā bhinna deśa kārya saṃbhave api na ca evam sthitena api kāraṇena saha tad kāla kāryasya anya kāla kāryasya vā anvaya vyatirekau samānau= iti yuktam kāla antare api tat eva kāraṇam anuvartate iti na pratyabhijñātaḥ anyat pramāṇam sā ca dūṣitā iti katham sthireṇa anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam kāryāṇām kāla bhedavatām iti na ayam nyāyaḥ samānaḥ tatas viparyaya bādhaka vikala tayā deśa bhede bheda sādhanaḥ hetuḥ yadi sva sādhya sādhana samarthaḥ kim āyātam tat valavataḥ kāla bhede bheda sādhanasya na hi vṛṣabhasya adoha yogya tve dhenoḥ api tathā iti yuktam 
JŚNĀ_57,4	 astu vā deśa bhedena bheda sādhanasya api viparyaya bādhāḥ balam kāla bhede bheda sādhanasya tu kim etāvatā dūṣaṇam anaikāntika tvam upapādyate iti ced kim ayam mantra pāṭhaḥ kadācid janana samarthasya ajananasya anvaya darśanāt sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam abhimatam iti ced tathā api kim anena śrameṇa samartham ca syāt na ca janayati itīyatā eva tad siddheḥ deśa udāharaṇena saṃśaya puṣṭiḥ kriyate iti ced yadi viparyaya bādhāḥ balam asya na puṣṭyā api saṃśayam anullaṅghayantyā kiñcid viparyaya bādhā vaidhurye tu saṃśaya mātreṇa api hetoḥ viparyāsanāt kim aparam puṣṭyā yadi ca tanmātram vivakṣitam tadā viparyaya bādhakena niraste asmin kim punar upanyāsena 
JŚNĀ_58,1	 atha kāla deśayoḥ sarvatra samāna nyāya upalabdheḥ eka yogakṣema tvāt deśa bheda vat eva kāryeṇa kāla bhedavatā api na hetu bhedaḥ iti ucyate tat api ayuktam tathā hi na paramāṇoḥ kāla vyāpti sadṛśī deśa vyāptiḥ iṣyate nitya vādibhiḥ na api vidyut uddyotasya deśa vyāpti sadṛśī kāla vyāptiḥ evam ghaṭa ādeḥ api iti katham sarvatra samāna nyāyatā na ca anyatra samāna nyāyata adarśane api sarvatra tathā abhāvaḥ prastute vaiparītya saṃbhave bādhaka abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_58,2^1	 upādāna bhedāt ca deśa bhede yat uktam upādāna sahakāri bhāvaḥ avāntaraḥ iti tat api ayuktam yadi api vikalpe pratibhā samānau tau= upādāna sahakāri bhāvau bhinnau= iva na vastu tathā api vastunaḥ tad tad vyāvṛtti saṃbhavān na a= āstava vyavasthā anyānya apekṣayā ca na virodhaḥ yathā ekasya anya apekṣayā pitṛ putra tvasya na vāstava tvam na ca virodhaḥ na ca rūpa dvayena kārya dvayasya karaṇam yena kalpanā bhāsinaḥ rūpayoḥ avāstava tvāt dvayākaraṇam yathā ca eka rūpeṇa dvayākaraṇam tathā sva upādeyam sva deśe para upādeyam ca para deśe karoti iti upādāna bhedāt upapannaḥ api deśa bhedaḥ 
JŚNĀ_58,2^2	 yatas ca na āropita svabhāva bhedāt eva deśa bhedaḥ kāryasya kim tu sva upādeyam sva sva deśam janayadbhiḥ eva arthāt bhinna deśam saha kāryam kāryam iti nyāyaḥ tatas na vikalpita svabhāva bhedāt eva bhinna kāla kārya karaṇam abhinnasya bādhaka sāmarthyena bheda sādhanāt atas eva na sarva deśa samāna tvam kāraṇasya sva sahakāri upādeye hi saha kāritāḥ asya tasya ca kāryasya sva upādāna deśaḥ eva saṃbhavāt tatra eva asya sahakriyā sāmarthyam na deśa antaraḥ iti katham asya sarvaḥ samānaḥ deśaḥ kutaścid upakāra abhāve api 
JŚNĀ_58,3	 yat ca uktam kāryasya eva sa kālaḥ ādhāraḥ niyamena hetoḥ tu sa ca asat ca iti tat api deśa sāmyena pratihatam tathā hi yathā eka deśa sthaḥ eva hetuḥ bhinna deśāni kāryāṇi karoti tathā eka kāla sthaḥ eva bhinna kālāni kāryāṇi karoti iti aprāpya eva kārya kālam deśa vat tatas ca kadācid jāta naṣṭaḥ api sahakāri apekṣayā sakala kāla kalitāni kāryāṇi kuryāt iti sthāne saṃbhūya eka artha karaṇa pratijñā nirvāhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_59,1	 atha deśam api kāryasya prāpya eva jananāt na deśa dṛṣṭānta siddhiḥ iti ced na puruṣa antarbhuvaḥ jñānasya deśa prāpteḥ abhāvāt dīpasya jñāna adhikaraṇasya ātmanaḥ pradīpa saṃyoge a pi na jñāna sukha ādi saṃbhava deśe deha antar prabhā praveśa avakāśaḥ iti kāśa kuśa avalambanam etat yaḥ ca ayam tad deśa tva sādhanaḥ tad kārya tva hetuḥ upanyastaḥ sa na svatantraḥ pratibandha abhāvāt bhāve api na asmākam kṣatiḥ iti uktam 
JŚNĀ_59,2	 na ca prasaṅgaḥ bhavitum arhati tad kāryatāyāḥ pramāṇa siddha tvena para upagama mātra abhāvāt viparyaya paryavasāyitā virahāt ca tadā hi na ca tad deśa tvam atas tad kārya tvam api na asti iti syāt na ca evam śakyam śakya tve api na asmākam mūlaprasaṅgayoḥ kṣatiḥ na ca ukta doṣaḥ yatas janana sāmarthyam anyadā para upagama mātreṇa eva na pramāṇāt viparyaye ca janana abhāvaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ kṣaṇa antare tad kārya sāmarthyam nivartayan jaladharasya anya kriyā kriyā pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ api kṣaṇa bhaṅgam sādhayati iti sa pakṣe bhāvāt na viruddhaḥ sattva hetuḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_60,1	 na api anaikāntika śaṅkā sarva upasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt nanu viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇa vaśāt vyāpti siddhiḥ tasya ca na upanyāsa vārtā tat katham vyāptiḥ prasādhitā iti ucyate tat etat upari pariplavamāna tara latara buddhi vilasitam tathā hi aktam etat kartuḥ sā na kriyāḥ anyadā api kim tu para kriyā akriyā eva vā ataeva prakāra dvaye api kṣaṇa bhaṅgasya saṅgatiḥ avaśyambhāvaḥ tanmātra anubandhaḥ iti yāvat tat ca prasādhitam atas sādhyena vyāptā eva sā artha kriyā śaktiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_60,2^1	 nanu evam anvaya mātram astu vipakṣāt punar ekāntena vyatirekaḥ iti katham labhyam iti ced vyāpti siddheḥ eva vyatireke vyāpti siddhiḥ eva katham iti ced na dvividhā hi vyāptiḥ anvaya rūpā ca kartṛ dharmaḥ sādhanavati dharmiṇi sādhyasya avaśyambhāvaḥ yaḥ vyatireka rūpā ca karma dharmaḥ sādhya abhāve sādhanasya avaśyam abhāvaḥ yaḥ vyāptiḥ vyāpakasya tatra bhāvaḥ eva vyāpyasya vā tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti nyāyāt enayoḥ ca eka siddhiḥ niyamena dvitīya pratītim ākṣipati anyathā ekasya api asiddheḥ kevalam sākṣāt ekatra pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ anyatra na antarīyaka tayā pratītiḥ iti tāvatā eva eka vyapadeśaḥ 
JŚNĀ_60,2^2	 tathā ca sati ekatra pramāṇa pravṛtteḥ pūrvam anyatra saṃśayaḥ pravartamānaḥ api paścāt tanyā tayā nirasyate yathā viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇa vādinām anvayaḥ sandihyamānaḥ api vipakṣāt ekāntena vyāvṛtti balāt nirasta saṃśayaḥ paryavasyati akṣaṇike sarvathā anupapadyamānā iyam sattā kṣaṇa bhaṅga niyatā eva iti evam sattāvataḥ pratikṣaṇam niyata svabhāva bheda upasthāpanāt tad abhāve a pi sattā saṃśa ya kṣaṇaḥ pūrva pravṛttaḥ api svayam eva parigalati kriyāvatā ced avaśyam kṣaṇa bhaṅgureṇa bhāvyam kṣaṇika tva vyatireke na bhavati eva niyatam sat tā iti 
JŚNĀ_61,1^1	 yadi tu tad abhāve api syāt tadā tasyām satyām niyamena kṣaṇika tvam iti anvayaḥ api katham tasmāt sādhya abhāve sādhanasya ekāntikaḥ vyatirekaḥ sādhane sati sādhyasya avaśyam anvayaḥ vā iti na kaścid arthataḥ bhedaḥ pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ tu mukhyatas arthataḥ ca iti dvidhā vyavahāraḥ ataeva yatra yatra sādhya viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa paryeṣaṇāḥ tatra sādhane sati sādhya anvayaḥ sādhaka pramāṇa paryeṣaṇā api tayā upalakṣitā veditavyā viparyaya bādhaka śabdena punar ubhaya saṃgrahaḥ eva vyatireka rūpa vyāptau hi sādhya viparyaye bādhakam sādhanasya anvaya rūpāyām tu sādhya viparyayasya bādhakam sādhane sati iti tad ubhaya abhāve sādhanasya sādhya pratibandha anupapattiḥ iti ayam arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_61,1^2	 anyathā vyatireka niścāyaka pramāṇasya sākṣāt alābhe api yadi sādhanasya sādhyena anvaya niyama prasādhakam pramāṇam upadarśayet kaḥ tasya sādhya siddhau pratibandhaḥ vyatirekasya anvayasya api sāmarthya ākṣepāt anyathā sādharmya prayogaḥ anupādeyaḥ eva syāt sākṣāt vyatirekān upadarśanāt tat yadi sāmarthya gamyaḥ api na vyatireka ātmā tadā api yatra yatra sādhanam tatra tatra sādhyam itīyatā eva sādhane sati sādhya pratyāśā prayuktaḥ kṛtī kṛtārthaḥ tad abhāve abhāvini api hi sādhane sati yadi tad bhāve avaśyaṃbhāvi sādhyam tadā phalitaḥ sādhana svīkāraḥ tasmāt sādhana vādinā dvayam api paryeṣaṇīyam vikalpena vādinā ca ekaḥ api prakāraḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ upadarśayitavyaḥ para sādhaneṣu ca vyatireka vat anvayaḥ api niyamavān durlabhaḥ eva iti veditavyam 
JŚNĀ_61,2	 asmābhiḥ tu prakṛta sādhane niyamavān anvayaḥ prasaṅga viparyayābhyām paurastyābhyām darśitaḥ eva tau ca yadi api sa pakṣīkṛte jalabhṛti pravartitau tathā api yaḥ yat karaṇa svabhāvaḥ sa tat janayati eva yaḥ yat na janayati na sa tad karaṇa svabhāvaḥ iti evam pravartamānau sarvam eva kriyāśakti yuktam kṣaṇika tve niyatam darśayate iti sarva upasaṃhāraḥ vyatireka ākṣepa bījam dhūma ādi vat yathā ca adhyakṣam dhūmasya dhūma dhvajena vyāptim pratiyataḥ na vahneḥ mahānase sattām anupasaṃharat pratyeti tathā jalabhṛti kṣaṇika tām pratiyat eva yathā ukta anumānam sāmānyena kriyāvataḥ sādhāraṇa nyāya tayā kṣaṇika tayā vyāptim ātanoti iti yat uktam prāk na sattvāt anyat anumāna sthira siddhau yatas anavasthā na syāt iti tad apāstam yathā ukta prasaṅga viparyayayoḥ api tad sādhaka tvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_62,1	 yadi evam anarthakaḥ sattva hetu upanyāsaḥ iti ced brūmaḥ kim hetu antara sattā mātreṇa bandhyam sādhana antaram uta pakṣīkṛte tasya api upanyāsāt atha upanyasitum śakya tvāt yadi vā avaśya upanyasanīya tvāt yat vā yad artha kāri tat avaśyam kṣaṇikam iti vyāpti siddhau jaladhara vat kṣitidhara ādeḥ api artha kāriṇaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ iti pakṣāḥ 
JŚNĀ_62,2	 tatra prathamaḥ tāvat na yuktaḥ aneka sādhana saṃbhave api vivakṣā upanītasya eva para upayogāt ataeva śakyā upanyāsa tvam api na anarthakya hetuḥ tādṛśasya api upanyāsāt prāc aprāgalbhyāt sādhya dharmiṇī upanyāsaḥ ca asiddhau dṛṣṭānta dharmi mātre upanyāsāt ataeva pakṣe avaśyam upanyāsa apekṣā api asiddhāḥ tad balāt vyāpti siddhau san= ca ayam capala cāmaraḥ iti etāvatā eva sādhya siddheḥ antimaḥ tu doṣaḥ sarvatra sarva upasaṃhāravatyām vyāptau asiddhāyām śaṅkām avakāśayati na ca tatra viparyaya bādhakasya api viśeṣaḥ kevalam sāmānyena kriyāvati kṣaṇa bhaṅgi tayā vyāpteḥ siddhe api viśeṣe pravṛtti arthinaḥ sat ca idam iti avaśya upanyasanīya tvāt iti kim atra nirbandhena nanu tathā api dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi tāvat tat anumānam avaśya āśrayaṇīyam vyāpti sādhanāya tat eva ca kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanam svadharmiṇaḥ evam sati sādhya dharmiṇī api tad upanyasya eva nirvṛtiḥ ālambyatām kim iyatā prayāsena vibhāgena tad anumāna avatāraṇam tena ca vyāptam sattvam pratītya sattvāt pakṣe kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_62,3^1	 yadi evam viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇa vādinaḥ api samānaḥ paryanuyogaḥ tena api yat yadā yat janana svabhāvam iti ādi prayogasya vyāpti siddhau= apekṣaṇāt sādhya dharmiṇi sāmarthyān apāyāt ca tasya tasmāt pratipattuḥ pravṛtti bhedam āśritya vibhāgaḥ atra kartavyaḥ yaḥ hi prativastu yaḥ yat janana samarthaḥ iti ādikam avatārayan kṣaṇika tā parīkṣaṇa kṣamaḥ tasya tatas eva kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ kim anya hetunā evam para pratipādane api pratyeka vastuṣu tathā eva sādhayataḥ kṛtam anya hetu upanyāsena 
JŚNĀ_62,3^2	 yaḥ tu tad apekṣayā pratibuddha buddhiḥ saḥ ekatra tad sādhana vyāpāreṇa nyāyena sarvasya kriyāvataḥ iyam eva gatiḥ iti kṣaṇikatayā tad vyāptim anavadhārayan pratyekam tat nyāya avatāraṇa prayāsam anāviśan= eva yathā svayam yam yam artha kriyā samartham paśyati tam tam asthiram sthāpayati iti sattva hetoḥ upayogaḥ tathā para pratipādane api tad nyāya siddha vyāptikam sattvam eva vyāpārayati iti na doṣaḥ tat atra prativastu tat nyāya avatāraṇa prayāsaḥ asahyaḥ eva agatika tayā tu ādyaḥ pratipattā tam eva āśrayet dvitīyaḥ tu sa prajña tayā ekatra pravṛttena tat nyāyena jhaṭiti eva kriyā mātram asthairya paratantram avadhārayan sattvena eva param api pratipādayati na tu tat nyāyasya kvacid kriyāvati kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhana sāmarthya pratighātaḥ na api sattva ādi sādhana bandhya tā eva sādhya dharmiṇya pravartita tad nyāya pratyupanyāsāt iti alam bahunā 
JŚNĀ_63,1	 tat evam vyāptiḥ vyāpakasya vyāpyavati bhāvaḥ eva iti kartṛ dharma anvaya rūpa vyāpti saṃpādita sāmarthyāt eva sattva hetoḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ apratihata iti kim atra viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa upanyāsena iti samarthitam ataeva tad upanyāsa aśakya tā api na pīḍayati viparyayasya eva bādhakena sādhyasya siddha tvāt śāstre api prathama niyame ca vyāptiḥ anvaya rūpā bīja ādi vat anekānta parihāra vyājena vistarataḥ prasādhitā sphuṭataram anudbhedāt tu vyatireka lakṣaṇāyāḥ parikara mātram etat āropayati lokaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_63,2^1	 atra api tīrthika vacana vikrānti kṛtam kautukam asti vyatireka rūpāyām eva vyāptau tadā api na api ekā eva vidhā anyadā api kim tupara kṛt vā bhavet sthira abhimatasya anyadā pūrvam paścāt vā iti krama nirdeśaḥ na eva kriyā vā bhavet anyadā na eva iti abadhāraṇāt na pūrva na api paścāt kriyā iti akrama nirdeśaḥ yadi tu prāk paścāt vā syāt kadācid kriyā tadā kramaḥ eva iti asaṅkīrṇam anayoḥ lakṣaṇam ākhyātam bhavati yadi api ca ekasyāḥ eva sama samayām kriyām apekṣya yaugapadyam bhinna samayam apekṣya kramaḥ tathā api apekṣaṇīya bhedāt asaṅkaraḥ eva pitāputra vat akriyā grahaṇena ca vastu abhāvaḥ eva vā sarvathā astu kriyā śūnyam vā sva rūpam avaśiṣyatām mata bhedena na atra nirbandhaḥ tatra na api ekā eva iti pūrva parayoḥ ekatva mātra vivakṣayā jāti nirdeśaḥ pūrvā parā vā punar ekān ekā vā kriyā syāt ekadā kriyā pakṣe vā ubhayam api akrama śabda vācya tām na atipatati tatra api aneka kriyā eva tāttvikī puñjāt puñja utpatteḥ tāttvika tvāt śaṅkā mātreṇa anavakptyā vai eka kriyā abhidhānam 
JŚNĀ_63,2^2	 ataeva yaugapadya śabdena tasya api upalakṣaṇāt akrama saṃgṛhītaḥ eva arthaḥ yaugapadya pade api avagantavyaḥ śāstre etasya ca kārya gatasya prakāra dvayasya kartuḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ eva saṅgatiḥ iti atyantībhāva avadhāraṇayā vṛttyā nityāt vyāvṛttiḥ uktāḥ prādhānyena kṣaṇa bhaṅga saṅgatiḥ iti akṣaram tu nityāt iva kṣaṇikāt api sā vyāvṛttiḥ śaknoti lakṣayitum athavā vyāpyasya vā tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti anukaraṇa artham etena nityasya krama yaugapadyābhyām artha kriyā virodhāt tad lakṣaṇam sattvam avahīyate atas kṣaṇikatvaḥ eva viśrāmyati tena vyāpyate iti krama yaugapadya lakṣaṇa vyāpaka anupalambhāt viparyaye bādhakāt sattvasya artha kriyā śakti lakṣaṇasya kṣaṇika tvena vyāpti siddhiḥ iti uktam bhavati tatra kartṛ dharmaḥ yadā artha kriyā tadā artha kriyā śaktiḥ iti vā vyavahāraḥ eka arthaḥ kevalam karma dharmasya krama yaugapadyābhyām vyāptau katham kartṛ dharmasya vyāpti vyavahāraḥ iti syāt āśaṅkā tatra api krama ākramika kārya viṣaya tayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇa śaktiḥ kramākrama vyāptā iti ucyate vyavahāra lāghava artham iti 
JŚNĀ_64,1–65,1	 etena kṛtvā karaṇa lakṣaṇam kramam āśritya kṣaṇikā ādayam kramaḥ nivartayitum śakyaḥ iti asāra prabandham trilocana codyam nirastam artha kriyā virodhāt iti atra ca artha kriyā kartṛ dharmaḥ eva veditavyaḥ tad lakṣaṇam sattvam iti vacanāt athavā lakṣaṇam upalakṣaṇam na svabhāvaḥ iti karma dharmaḥ api astu tat atra pakṣe krama ākramābhyām upalakṣita artha kriyā nityasya virudhyate iti arthaḥ prathama pakṣe tu kramākrameṇa upalakṣita artha kāri tvam nityasya virodhi iti arthaḥ krama yaugapadyābhyām iti tu viśeṣaṇāt na śeṣa abhyanujñā śaṅkā hetu tva artham upādānāt yasmāt krama ākramābhyām eva artha kriyā tatas nityasya virodhinī krama akrama atikramāt iti arthāt kaḥ punar atra virodhaḥ na tāvat saha anavasthānam ubhayaḥ vastu tva prāpteḥ nityam sat eva syāt 
JŚNĀ_65,2	 na api dvitīyaḥ nityam hi tad viparītena anityena virudhyeta kramākrama vyāptā ca artha kriyā anartha kriyayā eva virudhyate iti ced pramāṇa balena nitye atyantam tasyāḥ bādha sādhanāt virodhaḥ eva pramāṇa antara bādhāt vā iti vacanāt vastutas tu paraspara parihāraḥ eva niṣṭhāsyati kim punar pramāṇam akṣaṇike artha kriyā ābādhakam iti ced yat yat krama yaugapadyavatyām artha kriyāyām na upayujyate tat na artha kriyā śaktam yathā hari pada aravindam na upayujyate ca nitya abhimataḥ bhāvaḥ kramākrama dharmiṇi karmaṇi iti vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ na hi krama ākramābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ asti yena artha kriyā saṃbhāvanāyām tābhyām avyāptiḥ asyāḥ bhavet tasmāt artha kriyā mātra anubaddha tayā tayoḥ anyatarasya prakārasya ubhayoḥ abhāve ca abhāvāt tābhyām asya a vyāpti siddhiḥ iti pakṣīkṛte tayoḥ abhāve ca artha kriyā śakti abhāva siddhau na anekāntaḥ tāvat 
JŚNĀ_65,3^1	 tatra yat śaṅkaraḥ krama ākramābhyām artha kriyā niṣedhe prakāra antareṇa saṃbhāvayan= āha na ca tṛtīyasya prakāra antarasya abhāva siddhiḥ viśeṣa niṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā viṣaya tvāt iti tat nirastam hetu tva artha vacanena yat tu upalabhya svabhāva tve na atyanta abhāva siddhiḥ upalabhya svabhāva tvāt eva paṭa ādi vat anupalabhya svabhāva tve tu na asattā niścayaḥ viprakarṣiṇām iti katham prakāra antara abhāva niścayaḥ tad nimitta ayogāt iti viplavate tatra yadi ādaraḥ hanta hataḥ prakāreyatta apari= chedadvāreṇa tattva vyavasthāna nibandhanaḥ svarga apavarga mārga anuṣṭhāna bhedaḥ 
JŚNĀ_65,3^2	 yadā hi prakāra dvaye tṛtīyaḥ śaṅkyate traye caturthaḥ catuṣṭaya ādau pañcama ādiḥ tadā sarvatra ananta prakāra tve prakāra dvaya traya ādi niyama kṛtam tattva vyavasthānam kutas yathā catvāri pramāṇāni ṣaṭ padārthāḥ yadā ca pramāṇa prakāra śatam anyat api saṃbhāvyate tadā caturbhiḥ yat na siddham tad anyena siddham catur siddham ca anyena bādhitam iti katham tad dvāreṇa tattva vyavasthitiḥ evam yadā artha sahasre dravya ādi vyatirekiṇi sidhyati tattva pariniṣṭhā viplavāt kim abhyudaya niḥśreyasayoḥ vātmā anuṣṭā iyam astu katham ca anityasya jñāna kāri tva ākāri tva pakṣau dūṣayitvā nirvṛtam anena svayam evam prakāreṇa prakāra śatasya niṣeddhum aśakyatvāt 
JŚNĀ_66,1–66,2	 kim ca paśavaḥ api yat ayuktam paśyanti na tadā eva tadācaranti iti katham anena sāhasam idam anuṣṭhitam anupalabdheḥ dṛśya viśeṣaṇa apekṣābhyām prakāra dvaitam niyamya krama ākramābhyām dvaitanirākaraṇam nāma prakāra antarasya upadarśayitum aśakya tvāt iti tu krama akrame api dvaita vādinām na aśakyam tasmāt kim api ayam jalpa mahodadhi nāma paripuṣṭaye viceṣṭatām eka niṣedhena apara vidhāne tāvat aśakya abhidhānaḥ prakāra antara saṃbhavaḥ kim ca eka kāla kriyā anantaram kriyā antarasya bhāve krama vyavahāraḥ a bhāve ca ākramaḥ iti bhāva abhāvayoḥ api tṛtīya śaṅkā iti mahat tārkika tvam tat alam nirbandhena sthitam etat krama ākramābhyām artha kriyā śakteḥ vyāptiḥ eva iti 
JŚNĀ_66,3	 yat api trilocanaḥ kaścid sahakāri pratyayaḥ pratyakṣaḥ parokṣaḥ ca itaraḥ tatas pratyakṣa parokṣa sahakāri pratyaya sākalyam asarva vidā pratyakṣataḥ na śakyam pratyetum tathā ca sati sādṛśa sahakāri pratyaya sākalyavataḥ krama yaugapadyasya atyanta parokṣa tvāt tena vyāptam sattvam api parokṣam eva iti katham pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati iti āha tat api nirupayogam kārya dharmau hi kramākramau pratipāditau tatas kāraṇa sāmagryāḥ sākalyāsākalya niścaya abhāve api krama yaugapadya niyamaḥ kāryāṇām adhyakṣa gocaraḥ eva ekadā eva kārya utpattiḥ anyadā api na iti katham agocaraḥ pratyakṣasya tadā api hi kāryam ekam anekam vā syāt pratyakṣeṇa vā tathā gṛhītam aneka saṃbhave api ca ekam gṛhītam astu sarvathā krama ākramābhyām eva vyāptā kārya niṣpatiḥ iti siddham etat 
JŚNĀ_66,4^1	 nanu kṣaṇa bhaṅga pakṣe na artha kriyā pratītiḥ na api krama akrama pratītiḥ iti katham vyāpti vyavasthā tathā ca śaṅkaraḥ kṣaṇika tve sati sarva saṃvittīnām svabhāva niyamena hetu phalayoḥ svarūpa anvaya vyatireka asiddhau sarvatra tad bhāvasya avagantum aśakyatvāt na hi kārya saṃvittyā tasya hetu bhāve bhāvaḥ pratīyate tadā tasya hetoḥ atīta tvāt na api hetu saṃvittyā kāryasya tad bhāve bhāvaḥ avasīyate tadā tasya anupapatteḥ eva na ca atīta anāgatayoḥ vartamānena siddhiḥ ati prasaṅgāt na api kārya saṃvittyā eva hetu svabhāva saṃvittiḥ adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekasya api dhūme agni janya tva viniścaya prasaṅgāt etena hetu mātra saṃvittyā kārya saṃvittiḥ apāstā 
JŚNĀ_66,4^2	 hetu vyatireke tu kārya vyatirekaḥ sva saṃvitti vādinaḥ manorathasya api aviṣayaḥ tasya hetu abhāve kārya abhāva pratipattau= upāya asaṃbhavāt na hi tat ca na asti tena ca pratipattiḥ iti nyāyyam tat ayam kāryasya hetu sadbhāve bhāvam tad abhāve ca abhāvam pratipadyamānaḥ avasthitam pratisandhātāram prasādhayati iti evam ca yadi avasthi kartṛ siddhiḥ tadā sādharaṇān ekāntaḥ eva maulaḥ sattva hetuḥ kim atra viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ kariṣyati tad aniṣṭau tu vyāpti graha anupapatteḥ sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam ubhayoḥ api yathā ca kramiṇī hetu phale pratyetum aśakye evam phale api iti na krama pratītiḥ na api yaugapadyasya 
JŚNĀ_67,1	 yathā āha saḥ eva na api yaugapadyasya bhinna ākāreṇa jñānena pratiniyata ākārāṇām yaugapadyasya aśakya sādhana tvāt na tāvadbhiḥ eva jñāne yaugapadyam pratyetavyam teṣām itaretarā saṃvedya tve santāna antara vat yugapad bhāvasya asiddheḥ na ca ekam aneka ākāram svabhāva bhūta ākāra bhede bhedasya avaśyaṃbhāvi tvāt bhede tu vijñānasya ākārebhyaḥ artha antara tva prasaṅge na viṣayasya tat ākāra tvam samarthitam bhaviṣyati iti 
JŚNĀ_67,2^1	 atra ucyate pratisandhātṛ svīkāraḥ tāvat asaṃbaddhaḥ pratisandheyā abhimatābhiḥ buddhibhiḥ bheda abheda vikalpa akṣama tvāt abhede hi saḥ eva vā syāt buddhayaḥ eva vā atra ca prathama pakṣe karmaṇaḥ pakṣa antare kartuḥ abhāvāt kaḥ pratisandhāna arthaḥ bhede api buddhibhyaḥ bhidyamānasya jaḍasya kaḥ pratisandhāna arthaḥ buddhi yogāt draṣṭṛ vat pratisandhātṛ tvam iti ced buddhiḥ eva tarhi draṣṭrī pratisandhātrī ca iti niyata svīkāre tad yogāt anyasya tathātvam iti kim anena yācita kamaṇḍanena buddhīnām kartṛ tva abhāvāt iti ced 
JŚNĀ_67,2^2	 tad dvāreṇa api tarhi tasya ātmanaḥ draṣṭṛ tva ādi vyavahāra anupapattiḥ yadi hi buddhiḥ hetoḥ phalasya vā draṣṭrī syāt tadānantarya pratiniyamasya ca anusandhātrī kalpikā tad yogāt tasya draṣṭṛ tvam pratisandhātṛ tvam vā ucyate iti syāt api prativiṣayam alabdha viśeṣāyām ca buddhau saṃbandhaḥ api na viśeṣam vyavahārayitum īśaḥ adhunā nibandhana adhigantā adhunā phalasya idānīm pratisandhātā iti tathāvidha buddhi gata viśeṣa svīkāre tu kim apareṇa kartavyam tāvatā eva paryāpta tvāt vyavahārasya sthira ātmānam antareṇa sā eva buddhiḥ na syāt iti ced 
JŚNĀ_68,1^1	 kena evam pratāritaḥ asi aho moha māhātmyam yat i īdṛśān api para vaśīkaroti tathā hi na idam idam antareṇa iti yat ucyate tat khalu anyatra pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām sāmarthya avadhāraṇe sati yujyate vahneḥ iva dhūme cakṣuḥ ādi vat vā dṛṣṭa kāraṇa sāmagrye kārya adarśane paścāt darśane ca kiñcid anyat apekṣaṇīyam asti iti sāmānya ākāreṇa ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ tāvat na asti iti vyaktam dvitīyaḥ api na saṃbhavī na hi kāraṇa buddhi samanantaram kārya buddhau satyām niścaya pravṛttasya idam asya anantaram dṛṣṭam mayā iti pratisandhānam adṛṣṭa pūrvam kadācid yatas anyasya sāmarthya parikalpanam syāt evam smaraṇam api anubhavāt kutaścid paramparayā śakti pariṇāma dvāreṇa kutaścid sākṣāt tat paripāka balāt iti 
JŚNĀ_68,1^2	 anyasya anubhave tarhi katham anyasya na smṛtiḥ anyasya iti na saṃbandhī siddhaḥ ca udyam kim īdṛśam anubhava ādibhyaḥ bhinna saṃbandhi siddhi adhikaraṇa vivāda prakrame tam eva siddham āsthāya paryanuyogaḥ iti asaṃbaddham etat tad siddhau hi vivāda paryavasānāt kā para apekṣā tasmāt anyasya iti vivāda pada tvāt apanīya anubhave katham na smṛtiḥ iti pariśiṣyamāṇam na prakṛta upayogi evam tu yujyate codya arthaḥ yad deha saṃbaddhaḥ anubhavaḥ tat anyatra dehe kasmāt na smṛteḥ udayaḥ iti evam ca vadatā yad kṣetra sambandhi bījam tat anyatra kṣetre kim na aṅkura janma iti uktam bhavati sa ca kutastyaḥ nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_68,2	 nanu kārya kāraṇa bhāva mātrāt anubhava smaraṇayoḥ na kācid aparā pratyāsattiḥ na ca kārya kāraṇa bhāve ayam niyamaḥ yat ādhāram eva kāraṇam tad ādhāram eva kāryam iti viṣayāt atyanta dūre api jñāna kārya darśanāt evam tarhi na aṅkurasya api kārya tā mātrāt aparā pratyāsattiḥ iti jñānam iva aṅkuram dūre api bījam janayet nanu bīja ārambhiṇaḥ eva paramāṇavaḥ kecid aṅkure samavāyikāraṇa tām pratipadyamānāḥ katham kṣetra antare aṅkuram utpādayitum īśate bhavataḥ tu tathāvidha pratyāsatti virahāt vijñāna ādinā sādhāraṇam kārya tvam asya iti dūre api janana prasaṅgaḥ anivāryaḥ iti ced kasmāt punar aṅkuraḥ eva kārye bīja paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇa tām pratipadyante na jñāna ādau kāryatvena sarveṣām eka rasa tvāt tatas sarveṣām aṅkura vat tad deśaḥ eva jananam jñāna ādi vat vā aṅkurasya api dūre jananam kāryatvena aviśeṣāt tadvat eva aṅkure api nimitta kāraṇa tvāt bījasya 
JŚNĀ_69,1^1	 nanu yatra eva kārye bīja paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇa tām pratipadyante saḥ eva aṅkuraḥ tat katham aṅkurāt anyatra teṣām samavāyikāraṇa tā codyate evam tarhi kāryatvena eka rasa tayā samavāyikāraṇa tāyāḥ duṣparihara tvāt aṅkura eka rūpa tvam sarveṣām eka deśa tā caprasahyāyātā iti sthāne phalitam parihāra pratyāśayā yadi ca kāryatvena sarveṣām aviśeṣaḥ kāryāṇām kāraṇānām api sarveṣām kāraṇa tvena aviśeṣaḥ iti viśvasya vaicitryam atrāṇam tasmāt kārya tve sati api na rītiḥ ekā eva sarveṣām iti yathā nisarga bhedāt kvacid kiñcid samavāyi kāraṇa tvena kvacid asamavāyi kāraṇa tvena kvacid nimitta kāraṇa tvena upayujyate bhavataḥ tathā asmākam api kiñcid kāryam samāna deśam eva hetuḥ utpādayati kiñcid vyavahita deśam kāryam ca kiñcid niyamena hetu deśaḥ eva utpatti dharmakam kiñcid anyathā tathā ekatra kārye pratyabhijñā saṃbhavaḥ na anyatra kāryatva aviśeṣe api dīpa antara vat jñāna vat ca tādṛś kārya apekṣayā ca yatra bhavataḥ samavāyi kāraṇa vyavasthā tatra upādāna kāraṇa vyavahāraḥ asmākam ātma ādeḥ anyatra 
JŚNĀ_69,1^2	 tathāvidha hetu phala paramparāyām ca ekatra santāna vyavasthānam anyatra sahakāri tva mātram iti prakriyā bhede api kārya dvaitam tādṛś nisarga siddham asti iti bhavataḥ api aśakyam atikramitum iti sthitam etat tathābhūta bheda saṃbhave ca yad kārya karaṇa adhikaraṇaḥ eva utpatti dharmakam tat katham itaratra utpadyate kāraṇam vā sva adhikaraṇaḥ eva śakya utpādanam kāryam katham anyatra janayet tat ayam anubhavaḥ api sva adhikaraṇa janyam smaraṇam aṅkuram iva bījāt katham anyatra utpādayet smṛtiḥ vā anubhava adhikaraṇa niyata utpattiḥ aṅkura vat katham anyatra utpadyeta yatas deha antare smaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ codyam avakāśam āsādayet ātma vāde tu duṣpariharam etat vyāpinaḥ tasya tena eva smṛti janana rūpeṇa deha antare api sthānāt adṛṣṭa āśrayaṇam ca nityasya eva iti bīja aṅkura vat anubhava smaraṇayoḥ nyāyaḥ na anya vat iti katham avagantavyam iti ced bīja aṅkurayoḥ api sa nyāyaḥ tathā adarśanāt eva avasīyate tathā niyama darśanam ca anubhava smaraṇayoḥ api asti na hi anya dehe anubhavavati anya mūrtiḥ smṛtimatī nāma 
JŚNĀ_70,1^1	 nanu dehaḥ katham anubhavavān tad ādhāra tayā tad kāraṇa tayā tena saha samāna kāraṇa tayā vā saṃbandha vivakṣā asti iti na kṣatiḥ kim ca ātmanaḥ api katham anubhavavat tvam samavāya balāt iti ced nanu samavāyaḥ api iha iti buddhi hetuḥ iṣyamāṇaḥ iha iti buddhi nibandhana kalpanaḥ eva asti ca iha śarīre buddhiḥ atas kim na samavāya kalpanā api ayutasiddha tva abhāvāt śarīra buddhyoḥ pṛthak eva pratīyamāna tvāt iti ced nanu pṛthak pratīyamānayoḥ iha idam iti pratīti niyamaḥ upari adhobhāvena hi bhāva dvaye paridṛśyamāne paraspara asaṅkareṇa saptamī prathamayoḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyeta yadā tu pṛthak darśanam eva na asti tadā katham iha idam iti bhedena nirdiśan prekṣāvat tāyāḥ na hīyate 
JŚNĀ_70,1^2	 samavāya viṣaye kvacid api bhedasya adṛṣṭeḥ iti ced ataeva svayam iha iti buddhim vikalpa mātra tvena icchayā nirvartana yogyām utpādya samavāyaḥ nāma kalpyate iha iti buddheḥ samavāya siddhiḥ iha itidhīḥ ca dvaya darśane syāt na ca kvacid tad viṣaye dvayekṣā sva kalpanā mātram atas abhyupāyaḥ tena ca asaṃvidyamānasya eva ātmanaḥ buddhimat tā vyavahāraḥ iti bandhyā putreṇa turaga śṛṅgasya kholi ghaṭana vṛttāntam anuharati yat khalu yāvatā upayogena kalpitam tāvataḥ upayogasya anyena siddhiḥ eva tasya abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ ca ātmanaḥ api smṛti ādi upayogaḥ anyathā iti tasmāt na eka kāyasthaḥ anubhavaḥ kāya antare smaraṇa karaṇāya prabhavati 
JŚNĀ_70,2	 nanu kṣaṇika tve deha antaraḥ eva smṛteḥ udayāt katham idam śakya parihāram janma antara parigrahe vā tatas santāna antara tvena abhimate api dehe kim na prasaṅgaḥ anya tvasya aviśeṣāt iti ced īdṛśam deha antare smṛti jananam ātmanaḥ api duṣpariharam tatas anyatra api tad prasaṅgaḥ anya tvasya aviśeṣāt iti samānam yadi api ca kāyasya kṣaṇika tvam na iṣṭam āśu nāśi tvam punar taiḥ iṣṭam eva tatas samānaḥ doṣaḥ yad bhayāt ātma vāda svīkāraḥ atha ātma vāde tasya ātmanaḥ karmaṇā abhisaṃskṛtaḥ eva dehe smṛti jananam iti na doṣaḥ nairātmya vāde tu kasya tat karma śārīra atiriktā hi buddhiḥ eva kṣaṇikā saṃbhavati ataeva ca na kartṛ kṣaṇasya tad karma sukha duḥkha ādi saṃvartanīyam tasya tad upabhoga abhāvāt yasya ca kṣaṇasya upabhogaḥ saḥ akartā iti kṛta nāśa akṛta abhyāgama doṣaḥ tu atiriktaḥ bhavatu na tu kasyacid karma siddhiḥ yatas prakṛta doṣa parihāraḥ syāt na ca santānaḥ api gīyamānaḥ bhinnaḥ kaścid asti na ca karma api bhinnam bhavatām asti iti abhitti citrakarma 
JŚNĀ_71,1^1	 atra ucyate kartṛ kṣaṇasya tāvat tat karma tad phala upabhoga abhāve api na apahnava saham na hi dāha ādikam akurvata utpāditena vahninā tadvān na bhavati naraḥ antimakṣaṇasya api tad karma upakāraka tayā saṃbadhyate paramparayā tatas eva upabhoga bhāgi tvāt eka kāla tā tu kārya kāraṇayoḥ api na saṃbhavati saṃbhavati ca meru mandarayoḥ tasmāt upakāra dvārakam eva bhede tasya idam iti ghaṭanam sa ca upakāraḥ antimasya tad kṛtaḥ mahān asti tad madhya vartinām ca tad santāna vartinām kṣaṇānām tādṛś antimakṣaṇa prasūti sāmarthyam sākṣāt paraṃparayā vā tatas eva karmaṇaḥ iti upakāra dvārakaḥ eva teṣām api tad sambandhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_71,1^2	 evam ca sarveṣām karma sambandha vyavasthitau sthitāyām tad karma ādhipatyena upanīyamāna eva śarīre tad karma abhisaṃbhūtānām buddhi deha kṣaṇānām udayaḥ na anyatra tādṛś pratyāsatteḥ abhāvāt karma ca kāmam na bhinnam asti vyatirekī ca nirdeśaḥ api vyavahāra anurodhena yaḥ tu prāktanaḥ karma saṃbaddhaḥ iti ucyate kṣaṇaḥ sa tādṛś viśeṣa bhūtaḥ jātaḥ yatas paryante tad phala upabha uktṛ kṣaṇa prasava samartha santāna saṃbhavaḥ tad anurūpa śarīra santati saṃbhavaḥ ca 
JŚNĀ_71,1^3	 tatra ādyāt viśiṣṭāt yau buddhi deha kṣaṇau alpatama viśeṣa yoginau= upajātau saṃbhūya uttarāvalpatara viśeṣau janayataḥ tau ca alpa viśeṣau= uttarau janayate iti anayā diśā tāvat śakti lakṣaṇa viśeṣa prakarṣaḥ taratam ādi bhāvena upacīyate yāvat antim ajanana samartha udayaḥ tatas antimaḥ iti eka sāmagrī adhīna tayā paraspara anubaddhayoḥ buddhi dehayoḥ anya paramparām prati viśiṣṭayoḥ na eka vyatirekeṇa dvaitīyika śaṅkā avakāśaḥ janma antara parigrahe api tad āyuḥ saṃskāra kṣīṇe kṣīyamāṇa mūrti kṣaṇa antara sahakāriṇā manaḥ kṣaṇena janitam tasya anurūpam vapuḥ anyat pūrvavat manasaḥ sāhāyakam ātanoti iti na deha antare smṛti bhoktṛ tva cintā vakāśaḥ na ca atra santāna nāmnā bhinnena kiñcid kṣaṇānām karma saṃbandha siddhi dvāreṇa eva santāne api siddheḥ apratibandhāt tebhyaḥ tasya vyatirekāt na ca mukhyatas santāna dvāreṇa siddhānta upakramaḥ kim tu kṣaṇa dvāreṇa iti sarvam avadātam mūla pariśodhanāt iti 
JŚNĀ_72,1–72,2^1	 yat uktam yasmin= eva hi santāne āhitā karma vāsanā phalam tatra eva badhnāti karpāse rakta tā yathā iti tat sva abhimata santāna lakṣaṇa prasiddhau yat tu nyāya bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ etat dūṣayānnāha na sādhana dūṣaṇa asaṃbhavāt anvaya ādi abhāvāt na sādhanam na hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt smṛtiḥ karpāse rakta tā ādi vat iti anvayaḥ saṃbhavati na api yatra na smṛtiḥ tatra na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ asti asiddha tva ādi anudbhāvanāt na dūṣaṇam na hi pūrva buddhi anubhūte arthe uttara buddhīnām smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatas anya tvāt santāna antara buddhi vat iti asya hetoḥ karpāse rakta tāvat iti anena na kaścid doṣaḥ pratipādyate iti tat asamīkṣya abhidhānam sādhana artha aparijñānāt na hi iha śloke kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ smṛtau hetu tvena upanyastaḥ pratīyate kim tarhi 
JŚNĀ_72,2^2	 karma vāsanā vāsanā hi karmaṇā abhisaṃskāraḥ vasitam hi abhisaṃskṛtam ucyate karma kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ yatra santāne utpāditaḥ tatra eva bhoga ādi phala bandhaḥ na anyatra yatra na asau viśeṣaḥ iti pratijñāya karpāse rakta tā yathā iti vadataḥ saṃskāra santāna bhedaḥ vā hetuḥ abhipretaḥ sādhyam ca anyatra bhoga ādi phala niṣedhaḥ tad santāne tad phala yogya tā ca pratīyate tat ayam prayogaḥ yaḥ yaḥ saṃskāraḥ kvacid santāne āhitaḥ sa tatra eva phala dāna yogyaḥ na anyatra yathā karpāsa santāne bīja avasthāyām rāga dravya yoga janitaḥ puṣpa avasthāyām phala avasthāyām vā rāgam phalam unmīlayitum yogyaḥ na anya santāne 
JŚNĀ_72,3^1	 saṃskāraḥ ca ayam dāna ādi karma janitaḥ citta santānaḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ eva samudāya sādhya apekṣayā saṃskāra mātra anubandhinī hi tad santāne phala dāna yogya tā anya santāne sarvathā tad ayogya tā ca iti nimitta antara anapekṣaṇāt eka eka sādhya tve tu prathame svabhāva hetuḥ dvitīye tu viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ sva ādhārāt anya santāne phala dāna viruddhena sva ādhāra santānaḥ eva phala dānena vyāptasya saṃskāra tvasya upalabdheḥ tatra yadi saṃskāre api sati tatra santāne phala dāna yogya tā nimitta antaram apekṣeta prayatnena saṃskāra ghaṭanam anarthakam syāt 
JŚNĀ_72,3^2	 anya santāne api phala dāna sāmarthye ca dvitīya prayatna vaiyarthyam na ca eka āmalakyām kṣīra avaseke sarva āmalakī madhura phalāḥ tasmāt svasantānaḥ eva phala dānena vyāptiḥ saṃskārasya iti na anekāntaḥ saṃskāraḥ ca karma kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ cetasaḥ iti āgama siddham abhyupagamya eva codya vat samādhānam api iti na asiddhiḥ sa pakṣe bhāvāt na virodhaḥ vyāpti asiddheḥ vā athavā yaḥ yaḥ santānaḥ sa sva adhikaraṇaḥ eva saṃskāre phala dāna yogyaḥ yathā karpāsa santānaḥ santānaḥ ca ayam citta santānaḥ iti pūrvavat 
JŚNĀ_73,1	 smṛttha ādi phala apekṣayā api ayam eva nyāyaḥ yadi santāna dvāreṇa iyam vyavasthā tadā vidyā yoni saṃbandha prasiddhe api santāne prasaṃgaḥ tatas guruṇā anubhūta ādau śiṣyasya smṛti ādiḥ syāt evam pituḥ anubhava ādau putrasya bhavet na etādṛśaḥ santānaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ upādāna upādeya bhūta hetu phala paramparā rūpaḥ kim punar upādāna upādeya lakṣaṇam eka ādhāra tā niyamaḥ asati vicāra kāraṇe vicāre api tad yogya tā niyamaḥ vicitrā hi kārya kāraṇa paramparā upapāditā pūrvam tatra evaṃlakṣaṇā paramparā santānaḥ ucyate iti api sūcitam eva na ca evam guru śiṣya cetasoḥ pitāputra m anasoḥ vā asti iti na ati prasaṅga doṣaḥ nyāya bhūṣaṇīyaḥ santāna upādāna vyavasthayoḥ vā anyoni āśraya doṣaḥ upādāna vyavasthāyāḥ tad anāśraya tva pratipādanāt 
JŚNĀ_73,2	 athavā abhrānta saṃmata eka avasāyaḥ prakṛti vikriye ubhau hetu phalasya upādāna upādeya lakṣaṇam hetu phala santatau idam upādānam idam upādeyam iti pratyabhijñā pratyayena lakṣitam veditavyam visabhāga utpattau tu prakṛtiḥ upādānasya vikṛtiḥ upādeyasya lakṣaṇam svabhāvaḥ eva prakṛti vikṛti tvam vā lakṣaṇam iti bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ kāṣṭhayūpa vat kāṣṭha aṅgāra vat ca aneka utpattau= api bhinnāḥ eva bhāgāḥ upādānam yathā dhūmaḥ uṣma ādīnām aṅgārāṇām buddhau= api eka puruṣa prajñaptiḥ eka avasāyaḥ asti ca viṣaya uparāgam vivecya caitanya mātram āmṛśate eka puruṣa abhimatāyām santatau sā eva iyam buddhiḥ iti avasāyaḥ te punar atra aśeṣa svarūpa an anukārāt anukāra saṃbhave api stambha antara vat eka avasāyaḥ bhrāntaḥ iti na pitāputra ādau= upādānādi vyavasthā tat evam upādāna ādi lakṣaṇam anapekṣya tādṛś santatau upādāna ādi vyavasthāyām kṛtāyām kīdṛśe santāne āhitā karma vāsanā iti jijñāsāyām yatra upādāna ādi vyavasthā iti bhaṇitau na doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_74,1	 yat punar ayam eva āha na sambandha viśeṣa abhāve kāraṇa mātra viśeṣāt upādān a itara vibhāga anupapatteḥ yathā asmākam janakatvā aviśeṣe api samavāyi asamavāyi nimitta kāraṇa vibhāgaḥ saṃbandha viśeṣāt na tathā tava kāraṇānām upādān a itara vibhāgam paśyāmaḥ iti etat api dūṣitam eva kāraṇa tva sāmānye api kārya apekṣayā vibhāgasya darśita tvāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ anyonya viśeṣa anapekṣaṇe hi saṃbandha dvāreṇa api vyavasthāt austhyam āpāditam na ca samavāyaḥ kṣamaḥ iti api leśena sūcitam eva tasmāt na saṃskāra santānayoḥ dūṣaṇam kiñcid 
JŚNĀ_74,2	 yadi api ca atra śloke karma vāsanā śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ na ca asya arthaḥ karpāsam anveti tathā api vāsanā arthaḥ abhisaṃskāraḥ tāvat anveti iti saḥ eva hetuḥ sūcitaḥ grāhyaḥ athavā karma śabdena api kriyā yatra santāne yayā kayācid kriyayā kṛtaḥ abhisaṃskāraḥ iti arthaḥ etena vyāpti pradarśanam pakṣa dharmaḥ tu prastāvāt boddhavyaḥ tatas kārya kāraṇa bhāvam sākṣāt smṛtau pratipādakam ādāya yat uktam tat sarvam viplutam kārya kāraṇa bhāva āśraya viśeṣa anvayinī tu smṛtiḥ iti anavadyam 
JŚNĀ_74,3^1	 yat punar asya sādhanam na pūrva buddhyā anubhūte arthe uttara buddhīnām smṛtiḥ bhavati anya tvāt santāna antara buddhi vat iti tatra utrara buddhīnām dharmiṇīnām bhinna smṛti rūpa buddhi sambandhaḥ niṣidhyate uta smṛti rūpa tvam eva tāsām vāryate atha smṛtyā phalavatyaḥ tāḥ na bhavanti iti pratipādyate prathama pakṣaḥ tāvat ayuktaḥ na hi anyā smṛtiḥ anyā ca smṛtimatī matiḥ iṣyate asmābhiḥ yat niṣedhaḥ syāt api tu smṛti rūpā eva sā matiḥ iti atha aśvasya smarataḥ gavekṣaṇa kāle tad darśanam smṛtimat bhavati iti ced 
JŚNĀ_74,3^2–75,1	 tat kim tad avasthāyāḥ eva smṛteḥ niṣedhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kevalā tu yadi smṛtiḥ bhavati tadā bhavatu na evam ced kim anena tarhi uttara buddhīnām iti sahacāra nirdeśena atha anumāna artham dharmi nirdeśaḥ eva iti ced na prakṛta abhimata sākalya siddheḥ sarvathā uttara kālam smṛti niṣedhasya iṣṭa tvāt pakṣa eka deśa asiddhiḥ sādhanasya atha aśakti daśāyām kevala smṛti kāle niṣedhaḥ na iṣṭaḥ eva tarhi vinā ātmānam uttara kālam smṛti saṃbhave buddhi antara sahacāra kālena kim aparāddham yat tatra eva niṣedhaḥ na api vyāpti viṣaye kiñcid asti bādhakam dvitīya pakṣe tu uttara buddhīnām smṛti tva niṣedhe kim anubhavasya eva smṛti tvam atha pūrva buddhīnām sarvathā niṣedhe tu kim viśeṣa nirdeśena iti pūrvavat 
JŚNĀ_75,2	 tṛtīye tu vikalpe evam eva viśeṣa nirdeśa vaiyarthyam samarthanīyam atha viśeṣa nirdeśasya upalakṣaṇa tvāt sarvā eva anubhavāt anyā buddhiḥ na smṛti rūpāḥ na api smṛtim utpādayati iti abhimatam anubhavasya na hi tathātvam niṣiddham tat taḥ anubhavaḥ smṛti rūpaḥ smṛtim ca utpādayati iti ubhayam api aniṣṭam āsaktam anyathā anubhavāt anya tayā viśeṣaṇam anarthakam anarthakam eva astu sarveṣām eva jñānānām dharmitvam astu tadā api anubhavāt anya tvam hetuḥ pakṣa eka deśa asiddhaḥ anubhavasya eva tat anyathā bhāvāt atha uttara grahaṇam vivāda pada tvena na tu anya vyavacchedena anyāsām tu buddhīnām bauddhena api smṛti bhāva aniṣṭeḥ tathā api tṛtīya pakṣe na idam uttaram anubhavasya api vivāda pada tvāt nairātmya pakṣe hi anubhavaḥ api sākṣāt smṛtim utpādayati iti aniṣṭam eva bhavataḥ bauddhasya punar iṣṭam tat ayam anubhavasya smṛti janaka tvam na svīkartum śaktaḥ apriya tvāt na parihartum hetoḥ pakṣa eka deśa āsiddheḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_75,3^1	 astu ca evam ubhaya pakṣe api tu vyāptiḥ na śakyāḥ tathā hi yasyāḥ uttara buddheḥ smṛti tvam smṛti janaka tvam veṣyate tasyāḥ yadi tad ubhaya prāptau= anubhavāt anya tva hā nirupapādayitum pāryate na paryavasyatu vyāptiḥ tad anya tvasya tad ubhaya niṣedhena na ca evam śakyam anubhavāt anya tva hānau= anubhava tvam eva tat ca katham smṛti tve vaktum śakyam smṛti janaka tve ca tat ucyamānam anubhavasya smaraṇa hetu tvam anapanīya na viśrāmyati pratibandha siddhau hi prasaṅga saṅgatiḥ evam uttara kāla bhāvi tva ādayaḥ api na āśaṅkyāḥ śakya pratīkāra tvāt tadvat eva anekāntaḥ tu hetu doṣaḥ vyāpteḥ abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_75,3^2	 tasmāt yadi codya cuñcutāyām bharaḥ tadā evam brūyāḥ anubhava mātrāt karma mātrāt vā smaraṇa bhoga ādi janyam ced bhinna santāne api janma prasaṅgaḥ na ca abhimate api yat yena aviśiṣṭa sāmarthya asāmarthyam tat tena aviśiṣṭa phala aphala tvam yathā bīja urvījala jvalana pavana ādi sāmagrī dvayam aviśiṣṭa sāmarthya asāmarthyam ca santāna dvayam anubhavāt api iti svabhāva hetuḥ atra ca siddhiḥ yasmin= eva hi ityādinā darśitā eva karma vāsanā ityādinā karpāsa vat saṃskāra viśeṣasya vyakta mukta tvāt yathā prathamam prathitam asmābhiḥ evam anubhavāt smṛtiḥ iti samāna nyāyam 
JŚNĀ_76,1	 athavā pūrva ukta hetau= ayam paryanuyogaḥ kim anubhava smaraṇa ādeḥ eva paramparayā hetu phala saṃmatasya ayam nyāyaḥ anya tvāt na jananam iti atha anyasya api yadi tāvat prakṛtasya eva ayam yautuka labdhaḥ nyāyaḥ tadā yuktiḥ kācid abhidhīyatām yatas sāmānya siddham kramam atikramya ayam atra viśeṣaḥ gamyeta santāna antare adarśanāt iti ced yad viśeṣa paramparayā jananam anya tve tad abhāve tad adarśanam bhavet yathā rakta bīja karpāse rāga adarśanam na ca tāvatā sarvatra ājananam iti śakyam 
JŚNĀ_76,2	 dvitīya pakṣe tu asiddheḥ udbhāvanam etat rakte bīje anyasya api tad santāna bhuvaḥ puṣpasya phalasya vā tad phala rāga darśanāt yat punar kārya kāraṇa bhāvena smṛtim āśaṅkya nānā tvasya avañcanāt iti uktam atra api trapā tapasvinaḥ ekatas kṣiptā tad vacanena yadi saṃskṛta karpāse kārya vāryeta sarvam śobhate tat ayam sāmānya siddhaḥ nyāyaḥ pṛthaktve api viśeṣa antara apekṣam phalam ekatra santāne bhavati na anyatra iti prakṛte api vārayitum aśakyaḥ ślokena ca anena sādhanam dūṣaṇam vā saṃpāditam iti āstām tāvat tat siddham avasthita eka abhāve api anubhava bhāvita santāna saṃskāreṇa smaraṇam na ca pratyakṣeṇa anubhava smaraṇayoḥ kvacid eka ādhāra tvam dṛṣṭam 
JŚNĀ_76,3	 yat api atra uktam na dṛṣṭa tvāt tathā hi pūrvam yam artham eva anubhūtavān aham tam etarhi smarāmi yaḥ aham anubhavitā saḥ aham smartā iti anubhava smaraṇayoḥ abhinna ādhāra tvam liṅga sambandha smṛttha napekṣam āpta upadeśa anapekṣam ca niścinoti na ca iyam bhrāntiḥ visaṃvāda abhāvāt sukha ādeḥ api pratyakṣa tvam apahnavānaḥ na akṣajena pratibodhayitavyaḥ tathā ca anusandhāna icchā dveṣa ādīnām api eka kāraṇa tvam pratyakṣataḥ gṛhyate yam aham adrākṣam tam aham paśyāmi iti tam dṛṣṭvā aham icchāmi dveṣmi vā tam icchan dviṣan vā prayate yatamānaḥ aham tam artham prāpya sukhī duḥkhī vā saṃvṛttaḥ asmi iti tat evam aham iti etasmin jñāne yaḥ arthaḥ cakāsti tad adhikaraṇaḥ smṛti anusandhāna icchā ādayaḥ pratyakṣatas pratibhānti iti atas pratyakṣeṇa ātmā gṛhyate na hi aham iti jñānam sandigdham bhrāntam vā na api laiṅgikam śābdam vā iti tat api mithyā paritoṣa mātram tathā hi vikalpaḥ tāvat ayam asti aham eva draṣṭā smartā ca iti na ca sarvaḥ vikalpaḥ āśvāsa viṣayaḥ tathā ca ayam caturdhā darśitaḥ trilocanena api 
JŚNĀ_77,1–77,2^1	 tatra pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvī tāvat na bhavati pratyakṣa antarasya tad grāhakasya svayam api anaṅgīkārāt yasya ayam pṛṣṭa bhāvī varṇyeta laiṅgika tvam api svayam eva nirastam tat yadi avastukaḥ sandigdha vastukaḥ vā bhavan bhavatā pramāṇīkriyate kasya kiyatī kṣatiḥ atha ebhyaḥ bhinnaḥ pañcamaḥ ayam pratyakṣaḥ iṣyate sarvasya tarhi sva abhimate pramāṇa virahiṇi viṣaye sulabhaḥ eva nyāyaḥ iti na kvacid siddhi pratibandhaḥ saṃvādena viśeṣaḥ iti ced sa punar saṃvādaḥ artha kriyā prāptiḥ pramāṇa antara vṛttiḥ vā syāt iti nirūpita prāyam pramāṇa antara bhāve ca tat eva astu kim anena artha kriyā ca na avasthita sādhyā kācid niścitā sarvasyāḥ buddhi śarīrābhyām siddheḥ na api tad atirikta gocaraḥ ahaṃpratyayaḥ yathā hi saḥ ayam caitraḥ iti atra caitra śarīre eva upādhi avasthā akṛtam bhedam avigaṇayya pūrva apara kālayoḥ ekatvena pratyabhijñāyete tathā aham eva draṣṭā smartā ca iti anena api pratyayena 
JŚNĀ_77,2^2	 kevala mayam buddhi dvārakaḥ samudāya vyapadeśaḥ yathā yaḥ aham mūrkhaḥ āsam sa paṇḍitaḥ asmi iti kaścid punar deha dvāreṇa vyapadeśaḥ yathā gauraḥ pīnaḥ vā aham iti eka deśena samudāya vyapadeśasya prasiddha tvāt kaścid punar ubhaya dvārakaḥ yathā mayā rājyam kṛtam mama durgatiḥ ityādi yathāyatham ūhyam sukha duḥkha icchā dveṣa prayatna dharma adharma dvārakāḥ api buddhi kārakāḥ eva vyapadeśāḥ aham sukhī yāvat aham dhārmikaḥ iti buddhi vyatireka abhāvāt teṣām mukham śarīram vā asya asti iti bheda nirdeśaḥ api samudāya eka deśa bheda vivakṣayā yathā vṛkṣasya śākhā atas eva mukham aham iti na bhavati
