JŚNĀ_77,3	 katham tarhi mama mati mūrtī iti yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram tarhi buddhi śarīre iti api syāt śilāputrakaḥ śarīram rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti api kim dṛṣṭam yathā ca tatra eva dvitīya ātma abhāve api mama ātmā iti vyavahāraḥ tathā samānam prathama ātma abhāve api mama buddhi dehau= iti yathā ca na aham ātmā iti tathā na aham buddhi śarīre iti aham ātmā iti ukta artha tvāt na prayoga arham iti ced evam eva aham buddhi śarīre iti ukta artham na ceṣṭā mātra para adhīneṣu dhvaniṣu nirbandhaḥ budhānām iti āstām tāvat 
JŚNĀ_78,1^1	 tat ayam asmad śabdaḥ vaktuḥ para niṣedha paraḥ na tu mati vigrahau vihāya vastu antara paraḥ tayoḥ ca buddhi vigrahayoḥ bhūta bhaviṣyatoḥ api vartamānena eka adhyavasāyāt mayā eva dṛṣṭam mayā eva spṛṣṭam smṛtam ca iti prayujyate tasmāt saḥ ayam caitraḥ itivat ubhaya puñjasya pūrva apara kālayoḥ eka tāra upamātram etat na artha antara ullekhaḥ caitrepi ātmā eva pratyabhijñāyate iti ced na adṛṣṭe pratyabhijñāna abhāvāt buddhi vigrahau= eva hi dṛṣṭau yadi api ca para buddhiḥ anumeyā tathā apiatyanta abhyāsāt asyām adhyakṣa vat vyavahāra darśanāt na doṣaḥ mitra amitrayoḥ darśana mātrāt eva hi tad anurūpa anuṣṭhānam upalabdham na ca tatra liṅga rūpa anusaraṇa ādi parilambhaḥ asti na api kalevara mātra pratipattau tādṛś anuṣṭhānam mṛta mūrtau= api prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_78,1^2	 sarva śarīra vyāpāra prayojaka tayā ca janmanaḥ prabhṛti buddheḥ ātmani darśanam eva paratra api tad sahacara abhyāsa bījam satatam sannihitam asti na ca evam ātmanaḥ darśanam abhyāsa bījam asti sarva vyāpārasya śarīra caitanyābhyām eva paryavasānāt tasmāt caitra śabda gocarau cittakāyau= eva saḥ ayam iti pratyabhijñāyete tathā asmad śabda viṣayayoḥ tayoḥ eva pratyabhijñāna mātram etat mayā dṛṣṭam mayā smṛtam iti mayā kṛtam mayā mokṣyate iti api ekatva adhyavasāya mātram tayoḥ eva tat atra pakṣe pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvī vikalpaḥ ayam āśvāsa viṣayaḥ sattā mātre eka tve pūrva parakṣaṇānām avastukaḥ atirikta viṣaya tve tu sphurati api arthe alīka analīka śaṅkā saṃkarāt sandigdha vastukaḥ katham pratyakṣa siddha tām ātmanaḥ prayojayet 
JŚNĀ_78,2^1	 yat ca anena api udghuṣyate abhinna saṃbandhinaḥ icchā ādi bhedāḥ mama iti aka pratisandhāna viṣaya tvāt eka nartakī pratisandhāna viṣayāḥ iva prekṣakāḥ iti anumānam tat api ati tarala hṛdaya tām eva dyotayati nahi nartakī tattvataḥ eka rūpā kācid caitanya adhiṣṭhita paramāṇu samūha mātra tvāt vyavahāra siddham eka tvam upādāya dṛṣṭānta siddhau dārṣṭa antike api vyavahāra siddham eka tvam kena bāryate iti na ca sarva ātmanā dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced satyam etat tāttvikam punar eka tvam kasya sāmarthyena samarthyatām dṛṣṭānte tad anvaya darśanāt tena vyāpti asiddheḥ dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭena api hi pramāṇa bala avalambinī vyāptiḥ siddhyati 
JŚNĀ_78,2^2	 adṛṣṭena tu tad siddhi śaṅkā api na asti tasmāt na sarva ātmanā sādhāraṇaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti vārtāyām api sādhya sādhanābhyām sādhāraṇaḥ tāvat avaśya kartavyaḥ na hi vyāpti pradarśanāt anyaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya arthaḥ na ca anupadarśitena dṛṣṭānte sādhyena vyāpti sādhanam ādarśitam bhavati na ca eka avayavi siddhyā sādhya śūnyatā parihāraḥ hārī śarīra buddhi ādi rāśi tayā nartakyā avayavi tva abhāvāt śarīra apekṣayā tu avaya vidūṣaṇam eva jāgarti ātma apekṣāyām tu saḥ adya api na sidhyati viparyaya bādhaka abhāvāt ca na anekānta śāntiḥ mama iti pratisandhānam hi vikalpa tayā anādya vidyā vaśāt api pratyabhijñāna vat saṃbhavat katham eka saṃbandha adhīna tām svīkuryāt iti 
JŚNĀ_79,1–79,3	 tat evam yathāsmṛti karma phala saṃbandha ādikam aśeṣam avasthā tāram antareṇa api na vipattim āsādayati kṣaṇika vādinaḥ tathā kārya kāraṇa bhāva buddhiḥ api iti na sādhāraṇa an ekānta śaṅkā kalaṅkaḥ śaṅkaraḥ tu vācāṭatayā kim api nāṭayati tathā hi kadācid upalambha pūrvikā dhūma buddhiḥ tejaḥ kāryam idam kapota kaṇṭha dhūsaram vastu iti niścayam utpādayati kadācid tad ubhaya upalambha pūrvakaḥ tad anupalambhaḥ anupalambhaḥ api pratiyogi vastu upalambha svabhāva tayā adhyakṣa rūpaḥ eva anvayaḥ punar anupalabdhi niṣṭhāyām vihitaḥ iti tatra eva avadhāryaḥ anvaya vyatireka grāhaka pratyakṣa anupalambha nītiḥ api trika pañcaka cintāyām darśitā iti āstām tāvat prakṛtam tū brūmaḥ ubhayathā api krama bhāvinīṣu buddhiṣu pūrva pūrvayā saṃskāra viśeṣa ādhānāt antimā buddhiḥ etasya idam kāryam iti matim utpādayitum pūrvavat nirvahati iti na avasthitasya anurodhaḥ pratisandhātuḥ 
JŚNĀ_79,4	 yat punaruktam vyatirekaḥ manorathasya api aviṣayaḥ iti tad ati sāhasam na hi yat eva pratyakṣam vastu grāhim vastu dvaya nivṛttau tat eva tayoḥ vyatirekam api gṛhṇāti iti ucyate kim tu tad vivikta pratiyogi vastu upalambha svabhāvam pratyakṣa antaram eva tatas yat uktam tat ca na asti tena ca pratipattiḥ iti na nyāyyam iti kva upayujyate na ca evam sva saṃvitti vāda upalambha saṃgatiḥ yat api uktam pūrva uttarayoḥ kṣaṇayoḥ saṃvittī tābhyām vāsanā tayā hetu phalā adhyavasāyī vikalpaḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm yat kiñcidāśaṅkitena vaktavyam iti evam vidhiḥ anuṣṭhīyate bhavatā vikalpaḥ hi gṛhīta anusandhā nam atad rūpa samāropaḥ vā syāt na tāvat pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekasya puruṣasya hetu phala bhāva agrahe anusandhāna pratyaya hetoḥ vāsanā viśeṣasya eva anupapatteḥ agṛhītasya ca anusandhāne ati prasaṅgāt iti 
JŚNĀ_80,1–80,2	 tat etat na samīcīnam ālocitam yatas hetu phala bhūta pūrva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ anubhavena kramiṇā api svarūpa sākṣātkaraṇāt hetu phala tve gṛhīte eva kevalam hetu kāle phala abhāvāt tad viṣaya sāmarthya grahaṇe api phala adarśanāt tad avasāyaḥ eva apravṛttaḥ kārya darśane pravartate tathā phala avalokane api tad kāryatā gṛhītā eva vikalpena anusandhīyate iti gṛhīta anusandhāna rūpaḥ eva ayam vikalpaḥ anvaya vyatireka grahaṇam ca pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām pratipāditam iti yat kiñcid etat etena tat api pratyuktam yat uktam na ca adṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekasya hetu phala bhāvaḥ vāsanāyām vāsanā hetau ca sidhyati tatra api paryanuyogasya aviśeṣāt anavasthā iti 
JŚNĀ_80,3–80,4^1	 anvaya vyatireka darśanam hi prastuta viṣayam tāvat upapāditam eva vāsanā vikalpayoḥ anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ adhyakṣa an upalambheṣu antimāt eva anusandhāna vikalpa pravṛtteḥ ekākinaḥ pratyakṣāt anupalambhāt vā pravṛtti abhāvāt śakti svabhāva tvāt vāsanāyāḥ kāryam antareṇa vyavasthā anupapatteḥ tathā vyavasthitāyāḥ ca tasyāḥ sva hetunā anubhavena api saha anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ kārya anvaya vyatireka dvāreṇa eva na ca ādyam ca udyam yāvat na anusandhāna vikalpaḥ tāvat na vāsanāyām vāsanā hetau vā anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ yāvat ca na vāsanāyām vāsanā hetau vā anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ tāvat na anusandhāna vikalpaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_80,3–80,4^2	 na hi anusandhāna vikalpaḥ vāsanāyām vāsanā hetau vā anvaya vyatireka niścayam apekṣate api tu anubhaya vāsanayoḥ anvaya vyatirekavatyoḥ sva santāne sattā mātram tad anvaya vyatireka niścayaḥ tu anusandhāna vikalpam apekṣate eva tatra yathā dahana indhana vikāra anvaya vyatireka niścaya anapekṣaḥ tad apekṣaṇīyaḥ dhūmaḥ iti na itaretarāśrayaḥ tathā prastute api iti alam bahu bhāṣitayā atad rūpa samāropa pakṣe tu dūṣaṇa prasaṅga āgatam aprastuta tayā tad anaṅgīkāreṇa avadhīritam tāvat tasmāt avyākulā kārya kāraṇa bhāva pratītiḥ asthiratvaḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_81,1	 tad sthitau ca krama pratītiḥ anivāritā asmin satī idam asmāt upajātam iti pratīteḥ krama avasāyana āntarīyaka tvāt anyathā siddha sādhya vibhakti prayogasya viṣaya niyama anupapatteḥ yasmāt hetu phalayoḥ vā krama pratītiḥ phalayoḥ vā iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ krama apekṣayā yaugapadye śaṅkā api na asti aikakālikān eka avalokana anantaram eva sakṛt imāni jātāni iti vikalpasya baujāt iva aṅkurasya utpatteḥ na hi tad aneka kārya udaya grahaṇa kṛtaḥ kaścid aparādhaḥ virodhaḥ kṣaṇika tāyāḥ kramika darśane hi sthira apekṣā syāt api anusandhānāya apātataḥ sakṛt darśane tu kim sthireṇa evam tu syāt sakṛt darśane anantaram api smartā anyaḥ prāpnoti iti tat ca parihṛtam prāk tat eva vā vācyam astu kimavraṇa kaṇḍūyā sthānīyena sa ākāra vedana dūṣaṇa udgīraṇena aprastuta tvāt grahaṇam ced asti sakṛt anekasya sa ākāreṇa nirākāreṇa vā jñānena bhaviṣyati kim idānīm eva sakala tattva niṣṭhāyāḥ anuṣṭhānam yadi tu sakṛt jāyamāna an eka grahaṇam eva na asti iti abhimatam tadā yathā sa ākāra nirākaraṇam tathā nirākārasya api astu anyathā tena eva grahaṇam āśaṅkyeta 
JŚNĀ_81,2–81,4	 kim ca aneka grahaṇa abhāvaḥ api sakṛt katham abhimataḥ kim sakṛt aneka saṃbhava abhāvāt grahaṇa prakāra asaṃbhavāt vā prathama kalpe tāvat katham pradīpasya varti vikāra andhakāra kṣaya ādayaḥ tadā kriyante svayam api asmākam punar evam sati prayāsa lāghavam eva na kṣatiḥ nitye krama dūṣaṇena eva sādhya siddheḥ dvitīye tu aneka saṃbhava vyavahāraḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ astu anumāna kṛtaḥ astu kim tad anumānam iti pṛṣṭaḥ yadi vyākaroṣi tadā anumāna siddham eva yaugapadyam krama sahāyam artha kriyā vyāpakam astu katham prakṛti viraha doṣaḥ atha na vyākaroṣi tāvatā eva hataḥ asi yugapad aneka graha nigrahe ca varam antaḥkaraṇasya manasaḥ yugapad anekatra pravṛtti asaṃbhavaḥ eva pratipadyatām kim anena 
JŚNĀ_81,5	 atha aneka ākāra aneka saṃvedana saṃkalayitāḥ ekaḥ eṣitavyaḥ iti matiḥ tatas kim sthira svīkāraḥ hi kramavān naḥ saṃprati pīḍayati anyathā tu vāda antara avatāraḥ eṣaḥ tadvat krame api saṃkalayitā sidhyati iti ced tat api yadi sa ākāranā āntarīyakam grahaṇam iti pramāṇa siddham syāt tadā sidhyet anyathā upagama mātrasya sukara tyāga tvāt anākāra svīkāreṇa nirvahet paraḥ na ca ākāra sādhana yatnaḥ asti viṣayasya eva tad ākāra tvam samarthitam syāt iti tat nirapekṣam akṣaram vā katham āvakṣīta na ca atra pratisandha ātuḥ a sthira tva avirodhinaḥ svīkāre api krame avaśyam svīkāraḥ yathā bhinna deśam abhinna svabhāvasya kārya karaṇam icchan= api na bhinna kālam icchati tasmāt krame pratisandhātṛ svīkāra artham anyaḥ eva prakāraḥ āśrayaṇīyaḥ tatas kim anena tasmāt kathañcid gaṇḍa ullāsaḥ kartavyaḥ iti evaṃvidhim anuṣṭhitaḥ anena na ced ānīm ākāra dūṣaṇa pratividheḥ avasaraḥ iti na idam pratiṣidhyate iti 
JŚNĀ_82,1–82,3	 nanu tathā api matiḥ sa ākārā ced na ca bhidi mithas vedanam atas sphurati ekā eva asau tat iha na virodhaḥ prabhavati atas śakta aśaktaḥ api abhiditi nirastā kṣaṇika tā na vācyaḥ doṣaḥ ca avayavini na vā sa ākṛti nayaḥ nanu atas eva uktam na ayam tad pratividheḥ avasaraḥ iti na hi tad asiddhiḥ avayavi siddhiḥ vā bādhikā asmākam 
JŚNĀ_82,4–82,6	 nitya traya anugamana ādi guṇena kāntaḥ sautra antikasya samayaḥ api na bādhitoṃ aśe na ūced na pudgala nirākaraṇena bauddha siddhānta bādha kṛtaḥ eva kṛta aparādhaḥ tasmāt dhiyaḥ sa ākāra tvam yadi mama yaḥ eva eṣa samayaḥ bhavet duṣṭaḥ māna abhyupanata hatiḥ syāt katham iva pramāsiddham tat ced bhavatu dhiyaḥ eva eṣa samayaḥ bahis citre api eka sthitiḥ iti viluptam khalu bahis 
JŚNĀ_83,1	 artha kriyā bhedana āntarīyakaḥ hi ākāra bhedaḥ padārtheṣu tatra yadi ākāra bhede api na artha kriyā bhedaḥ hanta pratibhāsa mātra bhedāt na atiriktam kiñcid iti bāhya padārtha apalāpaḥ eva prasaktaḥ tat avaśyam anena bāhya vastunaḥ ākāra bhedāt bhedaḥ eva svīkartavyaḥ buddhiḥ bhidyatām mā vā na hi sama kakṣatā api dhiyaḥ adhigantum alam anyathā sva saṃvedanam anya prakāśanam ca bāhyasya api prasajyamānam grāhya grāhaka bhāvam eva viplāvayet tat yadi pramāṇa siddham buddheḥ eka tvam citra ākārāyāḥ tasyāḥ eva astu bāhyam tu bhinna ākāram bhinnam eva bāhyam api bhinna ākāram katham bhinnam iti ced bhavatu tribhuvanam ekam eva vastu kim asmākam kṣīṇam pṛthak artha karma niyoga ādi abhāve tu na gandharvanagara ādi vat pratibhāsa mātra tām atiśayīta iti uktam kvacid eka tā kvacid bhedaḥ iti vibhāgasya api na eṣa prastāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_83,2–83,4	 atha buddheḥ api eka tvam samaya mātram na pramāṇa siddham tadānīm bādha virodhī samayaḥ iti saḥ eva duṣyatu pramāṇa upanītaḥ tu prastutaḥ vastu bhedaḥ paraspara virodhāt katham tyājyaḥ kim ca hataḥ hetuḥ vaktuḥ yadi samayam āśritya samaye tava astu eṣa śreyān atha samaya cintā pravadituḥ na vai śāstre sthitvā vacanam iti vaktuḥ ca samayaḥ pramāsiddhaiḥ rūpaiḥ anumiti vidhau na āgama guṇaḥ 
JŚNĀ_83,5	 api ca na virodha mātram bhedam asmākam kim tu śakta aśakta tvena tat ca avaśyam svīkāryam anyathā sādhana dūṣaṇa samartha anusaraṇa visaraṇāt paryavasitaḥ vādaḥ iti kim apareṇa tasmāt śakti aśakti dvāreṇa bhedaḥ duṣpariharaḥ tatas virodha mātrasya bheda vyabhicāre api prakṛta viśeṣasya na vyabhicāraḥ vastu mātrasya vahni vyabhicāre api dhūma lakṣaṇa vastu avyabhicāra vat 
JŚNĀ_83,6	 nanu śakta aśakta tvena api bhedaḥ virodhāt eva sa ca vyabhicāri iti ced dhūmaḥ api vastu tvāt eva hetuḥ gamakaḥ vastu tvam ca vyabhicāri iti samānam tasmāt vastu tvāt eva dahanasya gamakaḥ dhūmaḥ iti na vastu tvam parihṛtya iti arthaḥ na tu yāvat vastu tāvat gamakam evam śakta aśakta tvam virodhāt eva bheda sādhanam iti na virodham vidhūya iti arthaḥ na tu yāvat virodhaḥ tāvat bheda sādhakaḥ 
JŚNĀ_84,1–84,4	 āha ca virodhaḥ ced bhedam vyabhicarati bheda pratipade viśiṣṭaḥ asau= iṣṭaḥ prabhavati ca śakta itara tayā aśakte sāmānye yadi ca viśeṣaḥ api balavān na dhūmāt agni āśā vyabhicarati yat vastu śikhinam virodhāt eva alam balavat abala tvam yadi bhide na vastu tvam hitvā hutabhuji sa dhūmaḥ api balavān atho vahnim vastu vyabhicaratu bhedaḥ asya tu balī pramāsiddhāpattiḥ prakṛta viṣaye api eṣa samayaḥ abhede hi śakta aśaktayoḥ sakalam ākulam trailokyam apravṛtti nivṛttikam āsaktam iti śakta itarayoḥ virodhaḥ avaśyam bheda sādhakaḥ eṣitavyaḥ ākāra dvāreṇa bhavatu mā vā 
JŚNĀ_84,5	 nanu ākāra bhedaḥ api śakti bhedana antarīkaḥ eva iti kiṃkṛtaḥ vibhāgaḥ satyam bāhyeṣu tāvat evam eva jala anala ādiṣu tathā eva upalabdheḥ anyathā ca na bāhyam nāma kiñcid pratibhāsa mātra avaśeṣāt buddheḥ tu ākārāḥ na tāvat dāha gāhana ādiṣu eva upayoginaḥ bāhya kārya tvāt teṣām yat punar avasāya ādi kāryam tat api ākāra antareṇa saha bheda abheda vivāda ārūḍham eva iti katham ekatra eka vyāpāraḥ darśitaḥ bhavatu vā kiñcid ekam api kāryam tatra api kim apa uddhāra dvāreṇa eka ākāra vyāpāra kalpanam atha bhedāt eva iti cintyam na ca asmākam citra buddheḥ eka aneka tva sādhane nirbandhaḥ icchā api sa ākāra tā mātre kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhane tu tasya api na kaścid anurodhaḥ anāntarīyake ca arthe badhite anyasya kā kṣatiḥ iti nyāyāt tasmāt na apratīti kṛtaḥ artha sāmarthyasya kramākramasya ca vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva niścayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_85,1^1	 yat punar ucyate yadi krameṇa vyāptam tadā katham akrameṇa atha ākrameṇa na tarhi krameṇa krama ākramābhyām vyāptam iti bruvatā vyāpteḥ eva abhāvaḥ pradarśitaḥ bhavati sā hi vyāpyasya tatra eva bhāvaḥ vyāpakasya tatra bhāvaḥ eva iti evaṃrūpā ubhayoḥ vyāpaka tvena svarūpam jahāti na hi bhavati agniḥ dhūma dhūma abhāvābhyām vyāptaḥ iti kim evam vaktari vaktavyam dattaḥ hi jala añjaliḥ amunā krameṇa sakala tārkika vartmani vartamānaiḥ ātmanā ca anena bahudhā dattasya vikalpya dūṣaṇa rāśeḥ api nāma etat prakārāṇām dūṣaṇena asattā pratipādanāt tat prameyam asatsyāt iti vikalpya dūṣaṇāni pratīyante tad prakāraiḥ avyāptau ca dūṣya prameyasya teṣām abhāve apināsya abhāva niyamaḥ iti dūṣaṇa abhidhāne api prāk iva saṃśayaḥ tat alam upanyāsena 
JŚNĀ_85,1^2	 tad prakārāṇām abhāve abhāva niyame vā saḥ eva vyāpti arthaḥ iti kasya niṣedhaḥ tathā ca santānasya vastu tvam anicchan bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ vā iti vikalpya dūṣaṇam ārabhate tad ubhaya abhāva vibhāvane ca nirvṛṇvīta iti na bheda abhedābhyām vastu vyāptim anaṅgīkurvat nirvahati evam traya ādi vikalpeṣu api iti sthitam tasmāt ekaikena avyāptiḥ samudāyena tu vyāptiḥ eva iti nyāyaḥ yathā yudhiṣṭhira ādiṣu anyatamaḥ abhavan pāṇḍavaḥ eva na bhavati eka nivṛttau hi tad anya prakāram āśritya āsīt tattvam sarva prakāra abhāve tu kva āstām atas niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ vyāptiḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_85,2	 yat api uktam na hi bhavati agniḥ dhūma dhūma abhāvābhyām vyāptaḥ iti tat api pāpīyaḥ krama ākramābhyām hi kārya udaya vyāpti vādinaḥ rāśi antara virahavatā tad dharma dvayena vyāptiḥ prastutāḥ tat kva idam upayujyate na hi kramākramau= iva kāryāṇām vahneḥ api dhūma dhūma abhāvaḥ dharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ eva hi dharmiṇaḥ dharma śabda vācyaḥ prakṛtaḥ tat yadi dhūma dhūma abhāvābhyām iti dhūmavat tva adhūmavat tvābhyām iti vivakṣitam tadā kaḥ pratibandhaḥ pratibandha bodhasya na hi dahanaḥ tad avasthā dvaya virahitaḥ kvacid upapannaḥ 
JŚNĀ_85,3^1	 atha yathā yathā ukta dharmaḥ na antarīyaka tvam agneḥ tathā aparabhūte dhūme dhūma abhāva śabda vācye ca niścitam iti tābhyām api katham na vyāptiḥ asya sāmānya lakṣaṇasya akṣīṇa tvāt asti hi dhūma dhūma abhāvayoḥ yatra abhāvaḥ tatra vahneḥ api yatra ca vahniḥ tatra tayoḥ anyatarasya saṃbhavaḥ dhūme sati hutāśana prakārāṇām iva anyatamasya iti ced yadi eṣa nirbandhaḥ kaḥ tāvat evam doṣaḥ aniṣṭi mātrasya anaṅga tvāt vyāptiḥ hi vyāpya saṃbhave vyāpaka prabheda anyatama saṃbhavāya vyāpaka abhāvena niyamena vyāpya nivṛtti artham arthyamānā tad ubhaya vyāpāra vyabhicāra śaṅkāyām eva duṣyati tat ca na asti iti kim aniṣṭi mātreṇa bhavataḥ kevalam viśeṣa lakṣaṇa ayogāt na sākṣāt dhūma tad abhāvābhyām analasya vyāptiḥ abhidhīyate 
JŚNĀ_85,3^2	 tathā hi dahana dhūmaryoḥ bhedān na tādātmyam dhūma ādi bhāva abhāvābhyām asya anutpattiḥ ca na kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti dhūmavat tva itarābhyām eva sva gata dharmābhyām āśraya bhujaḥ añjasā vyāptiḥ tad artha svīkāra dvārā tu dhūma tad abhāvābhyām api abhidhīyamānā na doṣam āvahati tat yadi bhavataḥ īdṛśī vyāptiḥ anabhimatāḥ viparyayaḥ vā abhimataḥ astu asmākam tāvat ayam eva vyāpti kramaḥ vivakṣitaḥ saḥ eva ca prakṛta upayogī vipakṣāt atyantam hetoḥ vyāvartana samīhayā krama akramābhyām artha śakteḥ vyāpti vāda prakramāt tat ca evam eva siddham iti alam etāvati skhalite nirbandhena tat evam krama ākramābhyām artha kriyā vyāpti siddhau= eva artha kriyā bhāvena krama akrama abhāvasya api vyāpti siddhiḥ na hi vyāpya vyāpakayāḥ tad bhāva siddhim uddhūya vyāpya abhāvena vyāpaka abhāvasya vyāptau= upāya antaram asti iti na anekāntaḥ prakṛta vyāpaka an upalambhasya vyāpti siddhau ca na virodha gandhaḥ sa pakṣe bhāvāt ca 
JŚNĀ_86,1	 na api asiddhiḥ nityasya sādhya dharmiṇaḥ krama yaugapadyābhyām virodha siddheḥ atra nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ yadi tāvat akṣaṇikānām asattvam prasādhayitum abhipretam tadā kasya atra dharmi tvam tasya eva dharmi tve tasya eva abhāva sādhanam ayuktam na hi asati dharmiṇi hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam na ca asati pakṣa dharma tve gamaka tvam tasmāt asantaḥ akṣaṇikā iti ayuktā pratijñā atha santaḥ akṣaṇikāḥ na bhavanti iti pratijñā arthaḥ tathā api tasyām krama akrama virodha ādityasya katham pakṣa dharma tvam iti kim ca artha kriyā śakteḥ nityena saha virodhaḥ vyāpaka anupalambhāt eva mataḥ vyāpakasya tu kramākramasya katham api ca evam sattvam eva nityasya prasajyate tathā ca sarvaḥ prayāsaḥ viphalaḥ 
JŚNĀ_87,1	 yat āha śaṅkaraḥ virodha siddhim anusaratā virodhi api pratipattavyaḥ tad pratipattinā antarīyaka tvāt virodha siddheḥ yathā dahana tuhinayoḥ sa apekṣa dhruva bhāvayoḥ ca pratiyogī ca akṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ katham bādhaka uparodhena artha kriyā kāri tvam jahāti pratipatti rūpa artha kriyā kāritvāt atatkāri tve katham pratīyeta ajanakasya aprameya tvāt iti bāhyeṣu yathāsāram etat likhitam 
JŚNĀ_87,2	 tathā ca nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ virodhya pratītau virodhasya pratyetum aśakyatvāt na hi dahana tuhinayoḥ anyatara apratītau virodha pratītiḥ asti krama ākrama virodhāt akṣaṇikam yadi pratīyate tatas katham asat pratīti rūpa artha kriyā kāritvāt atatkāri tve katham pratīyate na hi tvayā artha antaram ajanakam pratīti viṣaya tvena iṣṭam atha akṣaṇikam na eva pratīyate katham tasya krama ākramābhyām virodhaḥ avagamyate iti tat evam nityasya sarvathā abhāvāt pratītya viṣaya tvāt āśraya asiddhiḥ vyāpaka an upalambhasya tathā sva rūpa asiddhiḥ ca 
JŚNĀ_87,3	 yat āha śaṅkaraḥ atha krama yaugapadyā yogādakṣaṇikā bhāvaḥ sidhyati sattātaḥ kṣaṇika tvam evam tarhi tasya pratipatti janaka tvāt tad avastham anaikāntika tvam artha kriyā kāri tvasya tasya abhāve api bhāvāt vyāpaka abhāva siddhau hi vyāpya abhāvaḥ anyaḥ pratipattavyaḥ yathā agni abhāve dhūma abhāvaḥ toya ādiḥ vṛkṣa abhāve śiṃśapā bhāvaḥ tad rahitaḥ deśa ādiḥ evam krama yaugapadya abhāve sāmarthya abhāvaḥ ca anyaḥ pratipattavyaḥ tat asiddha a= aniścita vyatirekeṇa hetunā sādhya siddheḥ ayogāt pratipattau tu vyāpya vyāpaka bhāvasya pratīti rūpa artha kriyā ākāritvam iti durnivāraḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_87,4–88,2	 ataeva sa pakṣe sattvam api asya vaktum aśakyam ākāśa kuśeśayasya krama akrama abhāvasya artha kriyā śakti abhāvasya ca pratīti abhāvāt pratītau sarveṣām vastu tvena mūla hetoḥ pakṣa sa pakṣayoḥ antar bhāva prasaṅgāt yat nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ vyatireka balena eva asya gamaka tvam iti ced na vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya api abhāvāt śaśa viṣāṇa ādiḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti ced na tasya pratipatti aviṣaya tvāt na hi sva rūpeṇa api yat na pratīyate tat sādhya sādhana dharma rahitam pratipattum śakyate na ca apratipannasya dṛṣṭānta tvam yuktam iti kim ca nityasya artha sāmarthya abhāva sādhanam asattā sādhanam etat tat ca sattā sādhana vat na trayīm doṣa jātim atipatati tathā hi aktena krameṇa na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti vyabhicāryu bhaya āśrayaḥ dharmaḥ viruddhaḥ abhāvasya sā sattā sādhyate katham 
JŚNĀ_88,3	 iti śaṅkara nyāya bhūṣaṇau darśayataḥ trilocanaḥ api tat eva prameya jātam upaskurvan= āha krama yaugapadya rahita tvam bādhakam kim akṣaṇikānām asattām sādhayati āhosvit vyatirekam artha pratibandham na tāvat pūrvaḥ vikalpaḥ ākāśa kāla diś ātma manasām paramāṇūnām ca rūpa asiddhau hetoḥ āśraya asiddheḥ asiddha tvāt saḥ api vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ na trayīm doṣa jātim atipatati tatra krama yaugapadya rahita tvam abhāva dharmaḥ na sidhyati āśraya asiddheḥ iti uktam na hi krama yaugapadya rahita tvasya śaśa viṣāṇa dharma tvam prekṣāvantaḥ pratipadyante kim ca yāvat teṣām asat tvam pramāṇa antarāt na avagamyate tāvat abhāva dharma tvam na sidhyati anyathā pakṣa dharma tva siddhau teṣām asattva siddhiḥ asatva siddhau ca satyām abhāva dharma tva siddhiḥ iti itaretara āśraya tvam durnivāram bhāva dharma tve ca asya viruddha tvam syāt ubhaya dharma tve ca anaikāntika tvam sattāyām iva saḥ ayam asattāyām api tulyaḥ prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_88,4–88,5	 na api dvitīyaḥ kalpaḥ tatra api hi vyāpaka nivṛtti sahitā vyāpya nivṛttiḥ vyatireka śabdasya arthaḥ sā ca nivṛttiḥ gamaka aṅga tvāt avaśyam pratipattavyā bhavati iti yadi anubhavāt gamyate tasya hetuḥ syāt ahetoḥ agrāhya tvāt iti hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ syāt vyatirekasya anubhava kāri tayā bhāva rūpa tve sādhya koṭi nikṣipta tvāt anvaya vyatirekayoḥ abhāvāt asādhāraṇaḥ hetuḥ agamakaḥ tasmāt vyatirekaḥ avaśya aṅgīkartavyaḥ avaśya jñātavyaḥ ca jñātavya tve tad jñāna prasaṅgaḥ darśitaḥ syāt etat vyatirekaḥ na sākṣātkāri vijñāna grāhyaḥ iṣṭaḥ yatas sākṣātkāriṇaḥ vijñānasya janakaḥ syāt api tu vikalpayitavyaḥ na ca vikalpyamānaḥ arthaḥ svakīya samanantara pratyaya adhīna utpādasya vikalpasya hetuḥ upapadyate tat kim ucyate hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_89,1	 tat api asaṅgatam yatas sarve eva vikalpaḥ na catuṣṭayīm gatim atikrāmati tathā hi kaścid anubhava pṛṣṭha bhāvī nīla ādi vikalpaḥ aparaḥ sandigdha viṣayaḥ piśāca ādi vikalpaḥ anyaḥ punar asat arthaḥ śaśa viṣāṇa ādi vikalpaḥ vikalpaḥ punar iha kaścid liṅga jaḥ tatra liṅgajāt ārabhya sarvaḥ vikalpaḥ avastu nirbhāsāt iti bruvatā pratyakṣa ābhaḥ uktaḥ yatas vastu pratibhāsam pratyakṣam sva lakṣaṇa abhāve tad pratibhāsa pracyuteḥ na ca evam vikalpaḥ tad pratibhāsasya vastuni ananurodhāt tasmāt pratyakṣa ābhaḥ vikalpaḥ liṅgajaḥ tu yathā adhyavasā iyam artham prāpayati iti pramāṇam na ca vyatirekaḥ vikalpyamānaḥ liṅga abhāvāt liṅga jena vikalpena vikalpyate anubhava pūrvakasya ca vikalpasya pāramparyeṇa vastu janmanaḥ api na vastuni prāmāṇyam anubhavasya eva pramāṇa tvāt anubhavaḥ ca vyatireka āśrayaḥ saṃprati eva nirastaḥ iti pāriśeṣyāt asat arthaḥ sandigdha vastukaḥ vā vikalpaḥ niścāyayati iti sattvam avidyamāna vyatirekam sandigdha vyatirekam vā na kṣaṇika tva sādhanāya paryāptam 
JŚNĀ_89,2–89,4	 na api tṛtīyaḥ vikalpaḥ yatas krama yaugapadya makṣaṇikāt sattvam upādāya vyāvartamānam svena vyāpyena saha kṣaṇika tve vyavatiṣṭhate iti pratibandha siddhiḥ vyatireka siddhi pūrvikā gamyate vyatirekaḥ ca pūrva uktena krameṇa nirākṛtaḥ iti tat evam nityam na asti na vā pratīti viṣayam tena āśraya asiddha tā hetoḥ sva anubhavasya ca akṣatiḥ atas kṣiptaḥ sva pakṣaḥ api ca śūnyam ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattā api sattā yathā naḥ nityena virodha siddhi rasa tā śakyā krama ādeḥ api 
JŚNĀ_89,5–90,1	 iti dūṣaṇa saṃgrahaḥ tatra amī evam paryanuyujyante dharmasya kasyacid avastuni māna siddhā bādhā vidhi vyavahṛtiḥ kim iha asti naḥ vā kvāpi asti ced katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni na asti eva ced sva vacana pratirodha siddhiḥ na hi kasyacid dharmasya vidhiniṣedha vyavahāraḥ nāma saṃvādavān vastu eka niyataḥ kim tu avastuni api atha avastuni na asti eva iti bhaktiḥ tatra katham etat iti paryanuyuktaḥ na rāja śāsanam āśritya eva stheyam iti yadi kiñcid hetum upādadīta katham āśrayā siddhi parihāraḥ mūkībhūya avasthānam sati vacana sāmarthye na ucitaḥ iti yat kiñcillapataḥ na pratimallaḥ na api para ratena pratipāditaḥ bhavati 
JŚNĀ_90,2	 kim ca avastuni na asti eva vidhi pratiṣedha vyavahāraḥ iti evam vadatā eva avastuni niṣedha vyavahāraḥ svīkṛtaḥ hetau param paraḥ vañcitaḥ na hi niṣedham avadhūya nañaḥ anyat artha saṃbhāvanā sa ca niṣedhaḥ yadi na pramāṇa siddhaḥ katham ādriyate kim vā asya vacanena pramāṇa siddhi svīkāre ca na tāvat adhyakṣam eva avastu niṣedhayoḥ sādhanam adhyakṣasya tad viṣaya virodhāt artha sāmarthya apekṣaṇāt anumāna āśraye tu āśraya asiddhiḥ aśakya parihārā iti atas avastu prastāve mūka tā eva prāptā na ca pratijñā mātrasya api avakāśaḥ na ca evam śakyam yāvat na rāja daṇḍena avastu prastāva vāraṇam prastāve tu avaśyam satā saṃbhavinaḥ vacanam anuṣaṅgi paryanuyoga saṃbhavāt vacanasya ca vidhi niṣedhābhyām na aparaḥ vyāpāraḥ tatas na vacanam na avacanam iti mahati kaṣṭa saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ 
JŚNĀ_90,3	 tathā ca saṃprati eva nitye antarāla ka mala vat krama akrama abhāvāt na artha sāmarthyam iti prastāvena avastuni kasyacid dharmasya vidhi niṣedhau= iti viduṣā api bhavatā na mūkībhūya sthātum śakyam kim tu kṛtaḥ eva niṣedhaḥ bauddha abhimatāyāḥ asati krama akrama abhāvena sāmarthya nivṛtteḥ nivṛtti abhāvaḥ tu vidhiḥ vastu bhāvaḥ asataḥ api san tad abhāvaḥ tu na asti iti paśya dhārṣṭya vijṛmbhitam iti antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_90,4	 atha nityasya koṣṭha śuddhyā vastu tvāt na pramāṇān niṣedha virodhaḥ kasyacid dharmasya tat kim idānīm gagana nalinasya api koṣṭha śuddhyā vastu tvam eva vastu tve vā na avastukaḥ vikalpaḥ saṅkalpayitum śakyaḥ tad avastuni nabhaḥ tāmarase krama ādi virahāt artha kriyā sāmarthya virahaḥ astu na vā ubhayathā api na avastuni vidhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti asyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ nirvāhaḥ katham etat iti pramāṇa gaveṣaṇe ca pratyakṣa abhāve anumānam āśrīyamāṇam āśraya asiddhi grastam samastam apramāṇa vacana mātrasya ca anapekṣita tvāt praśna kṛtā prekṣeṇa na ca ubhaya abhāvaḥ abhidhātum śakyaḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ bhāva abhāva svabhāvāt eka niṣedhena apara vidhānāt vidhi niṣedhaḥ hi niṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca vidhiḥ tat kīdṛśaḥ aparaḥ astu ca ubhaya niṣedha pratijñā hetoḥ upādīyamānasya na āśraya asiddhi parihāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_91,1	 yat ca id am uktam koṣṭha śuddhyā vastu eva nityam iti tatas kim na hi tat vastu tvena eva dharmi āśraya asiddhi dūṣaṇasya anavakāśa prasaṅgāt para upagama apekṣayā it amucyate iti ced prasaṅga hetuḥ tarhi avastu tvāt nitya āśraya asiddhaḥ krama ādi virahaḥ na hetuḥ iti arthaḥ evam ca satya vastuni hetuḥ āśraya asiddha tvena vyāptaḥ vaktavyaḥ na hi pratibandham antareṇa kaścid hetuḥ pakṣa dharma tā mātre para upagama apekṣayā tu prasaṅgaḥ ucyate na tu vyāptau= api tad upagamaḥ eva kadācid evam api syāt iti ced tathā api na pareṇa avastuni hetuḥ āśraya asiddha tvena vyāptaḥ abhyupagataḥ nityaḥ eva avastuni hetu praṇayanāt tatas ca yatravāvastuni vastu tvāt hetoḥ āśraya asiddhiḥ upanīyate tatra iva pratijñāyāḥ paribhavaḥ na avastuni vidhi niṣedhau= iti asyāḥ yadi ca para upagamāt eva vyāptiḥ api vivakṣitā avastuni avastutva anna pakṣa dharma tā prayuktaḥ hetuḥ iti tarhi tava na idam anumatam iti tathā api na avastuni vidhi pratiṣedhau= iti vyāhatam pratiṣedhasya svayam svīkriyamāṇa tvāt nañaḥ anya artha abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_91,2	 kim ca sarvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ viparyaya paryavasita vyāpāraḥ iti nyāyāt yadyavaḥ tu nityam tad āśrayā siddhiḥ na ca āśraya asiddhiḥ tat na avaḥ tu nityam iti kim vivakṣitam tadā api yathā āśraya asiddhiḥ doṣaḥ prastutaḥ na asti siddham avastu tvam nityasya dharmiṇaḥ iti na avastu nityam iti katham na viplavate tasmāt svatantraḥ eva ayam avastu tvāt āśraya asiddhiḥ avastuni hetoḥ iti hetu dūṣaṇa pravṛttasya prakṛtaḥ tathā ca na avastuni vidhi niṣedhau= iti dūrīkṛtam etat vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ ca ayam sva bhāṣayā prayujyate āśraya tvasya vastu tvena vyāpti abhimānāt sa ca abhimānaḥ sva vacana virodhānavabodhāt na hi na avastuni vidhi niṣedha ādhāra tvam iti sva vacana virodham manyamānasya vastu tvena dharmi tvasya vyāpti abhimānaḥ mānasam spṛśati kim sva paribhāvaka tayā iti sāmānya nyāyaḥ kim ca amī svayam avastuni vidhi niṣedha vyavahāram ātanvantaḥ vyāpakān upalambham ca apramāṇayantaḥ param pratikṣipanti iti kaḥ eṣa kramaḥ 
JŚNĀ_92,1–92,2	 nyāya bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ hi na hi asati dharmiṇi hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tvam iti bruvāṇaḥ avastuni hetoḥ pakṣa dharma tā niṣedham vyaktam āha katham etat iti yukti gaveṣaṇe ca dharmiṇaḥ asattvāt iti hetum abhipraiti anyathā ca vacana mātre kaḥ ādaraḥ atha akṣaṇikam na eva pratīyate katham tasya krama ākramābhyām virodhaḥ avagamyata iti bruvāṇaḥ ca vyaktam pratītya viṣaya tvena virodha avagama abhāvam āha sa ca avastu antara sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ nitye api avastu saṃmate āsajyate anyathā anyatra avastuni yadi ayam na nyāyaḥ nitye api katham abhidhātum śakyaḥ śaṅkara upyetat eva sphuṭayati avastuni pratītya viṣaya tvena na virodha asiddhiḥ iti anyathā prabandha vaiyarthyāt 
JŚNĀ_92,3	 nanu asya ṣaṣṭhī saptamī nirdeśa abhāvāt asatā saha sataḥ na virodhaḥ iti abhiprāyāt na doṣaḥ iti ced adya api asataḥ apratīyamāna tvāt iti svayam abhivyaktaḥ hetuḥ apekṣaṇīyaḥ eva iti katham asataḥ dharmi bhāva vyāpaka an upalambhayoḥ paribhavaḥ tena saha virodha asiddhau hi tasya pratīti viṣaya tva abhāvaḥ hetuḥ yadi ca tṛtīyā nirdeśena āśraya asiddhi parihāram anumanyate bhavān kramākramayoḥ api nityena saha yoga abhāvāt artha kriyā śakteḥ api nityena saha yoga abhāvaḥ iti na kṣatiḥ evam pakṣeṇa yogaḥ eva sa pakṣeṇa eva yogaḥ vipakṣeṇa ayogaḥ eva iti hetoḥ trairūpyam vakṣyāmaḥ śāntiḥ astu āśraya asiddhi prahārasya tasmāt vivakṣā mātra bhedaḥ eva na vastu bhedaḥ iti kim anena kāya vratena 
JŚNĀ_92,4	 kim ca asatā saha tāvat virodha bādhanam evam astu yadā punar sataḥ eva satā saha virodhaḥ kim astu na vā iti praśne astu iti svīkāraḥ sthitam bauddha siddhāntena iti viphale upanyāsaḥ atha na iti svīkāraḥ tadā saḥ eva apratīyamāna tvāt iti hetuḥ apekṣitavyaḥ iti avastuni niṣedhanam virodhasya vyāpaka an upalambhena iti punar bauddha siddhānta siddhiḥ tathā na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti iti atra api eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ śaraṇam 
JŚNĀ_93,1	 tathā ca trilocanaḥ sva akṣareṇa sphuṭayati krama yaugapadya rahita tvam abhāva dharmaḥ na sidhyati āśraya anupalabdheḥ iti atra hi vyaktam abhāvaḥ dharmī krama ādi rahita tvam asya dharmaḥ niṣidhyate āśraya anupalabdheḥ iti hetoḥ iti evam asataḥ dharmi tvam pratijānānaḥ eva anantaram na hi krama yaugapadya rahita śaśa viṣāṇa dharma tvam prekṣāvantaḥ pratipadyante iti evam bruvan mahān sāhasikaḥ yat ayam ātmānam ātmanā eva na upahasati abhāvāt eva hi śaśa viṣāṇasya dharmi tvam niṣeddhavyam svīkṛtam ca abhāvasya api dharmi tvam iti kaḥ pratirodhaḥ turaṅga śṛṅga ādeḥ atha abhāvasya dharmitā krama ādi rahita tva niṣedhena svīkṛtā katham krama ādi rahita tvena eva astu aho buddhi vaibhavam ! abhāvasya śaśa viṣāṇasya krama ādi rahita tva niṣedhena dharmi tvam manyate na krama ādi rahita tvena ubhayathā api avastuni vidhi niṣedha vyavahāra svīkārāt durnivāraḥ saugata kṛtāntaḥ iti varam krama ādi rahi tvena eva dharmi tvam ubhayatra astu kim uttarāpatham praviśya tāvatā eva mūlyena turaga tyāginaḥ gardabha krayaṇa vṛttāntaḥ āśriyate 
JŚNĀ_93,2	 athavā ati sūkṣmā buddhiḥ sthavīyāṃsam asamañjasa viśeṣam iyantam na paśyati iti kim atra kriyatām tathā api akṣiṇaḥ nimīlya cintaya tāvat kim śaśa viṣāṇam krama ādi yogi bhavati na vā yadi bhavati iti bhaṇasi kim atra vaktavyam asmābhiḥ sabhyādayaḥ pramāṇam atha na iti pakṣaḥ tadā krama ādi rahitam tat tat katham krama ādi rahita tva niṣedhena dharmīkaroṣi ubhayathā ca hetum paryanuyujya avaśyam avastu tvāt iti vakṣyāmi iti alam vistareṇa 
JŚNĀ_93,3^1	 evam bandhyā sutaḥ vaktā na vā iti evaṃvidhe api prastāve niṣedham apratijñāya na sthātum śakyam acetana tvāt avastu tvāt ityādi sādhanam anupanyasya vā na kaścid evam āśaṅkate yat īdṛśam uttarayitavyam iti ced kutas tad avastu tāyāḥ prasiddha tvāt iti ced punar tat eva āyātam bandhā sutasya dharmiṇaḥ vaktṛ tvena āśaṅkana uyata aniṣedhaḥ su prasiddha avastu tvāt iti hetuḥ iti na ca su prasiddha tve api sarvathā śaṅkā virahaḥ niḥsīmaḥ hi moha mahimā dṛṣṭaḥ hi śāstra kārāṇām api krama ādi rahita tva niṣedhaḥ śaśaviṣāṇe iti evaṃprakāraḥ bhramaḥ tatas yathā śabde cākṣuṣa tvāt anitya tvam saṃbhāvayan= asiddha tvena niṣidhyate tathā iha api syātām śaṅkā niṣedhau na virodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_93,3^2	 tasmāt vastunī iva avastuni api kasyacid dharmasya vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ durvāraḥ āhatya vipratipannānām api śāstra kārāṇām niṣedha vākyena eva svīkārāt tatra idānīm avastuṣu bandhyā suta paryanteṣu katham dharmi tvam prati iti abhāve katham vyavahāraḥ pratīti janaka tve katham na vastu tvam na ca vacana mātra pramāṇam upādeyam iti yaḥ kaścid hetuḥ upādīyate sa sarvaḥ katham na āśraya asiddhaḥ tat etat āyātam yaḥ ca ubhayoḥ samaḥ doṣaḥ ityādi yadi ca niścitauvastu bhāveṣu api na ete doṣāḥ tat kim sādhanāt prāc asandigdha sattāke nitye bhaviṣyati kaḥ punar atra parama arthaḥ na hi avastuni kasyacid dharmasya vidhi niṣedha vyavahāraḥ śakya parihāraḥ prāmāṇikasya 
JŚNĀ_93,3^3	 na ca ete doṣāḥ sa anuṣaṅgiṇaḥ iti ced ucyate na tāvat avastunaḥ dharmi tva abhāvaḥ yatra eva hi idam evam iti parāmarśaḥ tat eva idam iti anena ākāreṇa dharmi evam iti dharma viśeṣa yāgaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ nīlaḥ evam bandhyā sutaḥ na vaktā iti ghaṭasya nīlatvam iva bandhyā sutasya vaktṛ tvam dharmaḥ pratoyate iti na dharmi tva abhāvaḥ abhāve kevalam kaścid dharmaḥ vastu niyatāḥ nīlatva ādiḥ kaścid avastu niyataḥ sarva upākhyā viraha ādiḥ kaścid ubhaya sādhāraṇaḥ anupalambha mātram tatra vastu dharmiṇā vastu dharmi tva niṣedhaḥ iti yuktam na tu dharma mātrāṇām sva vacana virodhasya bādhaka tvāt pratītyabhāvena vyavahāraḥ iti api ayuktam 
JŚNĀ_93,3^4–94,1	 na punar ubhaya areka prakāra eva pratītiḥ aṅgam vyavahārasya vastunaḥ hi sva sāmarthya bhāvinī pratītiḥ vikalpaḥ ca adhyakṣa liṅgābhyām pāramparya kāryaḥ avastunaḥ tu sandigdha vastu bhāvasya vā vikalpa mātram sāmarthya abhāve hi tayoḥ abhāve vikalpa mātram api yadi na tad pratītiḥ avasthāpyate sarvathā vyavahāryaḥ eva syāt iṣṭaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ atas vikalpana mātram tatra pratātiḥ tad upasthāpitam eva ca tayoḥ svarūpam na anyat yathā vastunaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna upanītam eva sva rūpam evam avastunaḥ sandigdha vastu bhāvasya vā vikalpa apasthāpitaḥ eva ātmā na anyaḥ iti na atas samayāt aṅgam ākaṣantaḥ santā bhavitum arhanti yat tu grāhyatām viduḥ hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ iti uktam tad mānasa pratyakṣa prastāve grāhakāt bhinnam eva grāhyam apekṣya na hi sva saṃvedane api eṣa eva nyāyaḥ iti sthitam etat 
JŚNĀ_95,1^1	 tathā ca nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ eva āha na hi tvayā artha antaram ajanakam pratīti viṣaya tvena iṣṭam iti na ca avaḥ tu artha antaram arthaḥ eva hi anyam artham apekṣya artha antaram ucyate na tu avastu tad bhāva niṣedha mātram tat tasmāt artha antara tva abhāvāt na sva janya jñāna apekṣā anarthasya tatas vikalpa mātram atra śaraṇam tad ākāra ullikhitaḥ ca asya svabhāvaḥ na aparaḥ iti api avaśyam svīkartavyam anyathā śaśa viṣāṇa ādi śabdānām anuccāraṇam eva prasajyeta iti katham vyavahāraḥ tathā hi kharaśṛṅga ādi śabdena śabditam artha m anūdya avaśyam kiñcid vidheyam yathā na krama ādi rahita tvam śaśa viṣāṇa dharmaḥ tad sahitam vā yathā vā na asatā kasyacid virodha bodhaḥ na avastu dharmi iti vā tatra śaśa viṣāṇa asadavastu śabdaiḥ yadi nābhim ataḥ arthaḥ pratyāyyate abhimatāt anyaḥ eva arthaḥ dhvani janita vikalpasya tadā vidhīyamānaḥ krama ākrama niṣedha ādiḥ kasya pratīyatām tad prati iti abhāve ca śabda uccāraṇam anarthakam āyātam asti ca kūrma roma ādi śabda vyavahāraḥ tasmāt saḥ eva tasya arthaḥ arthasya api saḥ eva niścayaḥ dṛṣṭe api vikalpaḥ eva niścayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_95,1^2	 evam tarhi vikalpaḥ eva astu sarvatra āśrayaṇīyaḥ kim darśanena na evam darśana nirākṛte vikalpa cetasya ākāra mātra sphuraṇāt vastu tva sādhana artham bādhana artham vā pramāṇa antara apekṣaṇam darśanena tu viṣayīkṛte vastuni yāvati rūpe vikalpaḥ tāvati saḥ eva niścayaḥ asati sādṛśyāt vipralambhe tasmāt na vastuni api vikalpa mātram śaraṇam avastuni tu tat eva śaraṇam tad ākāra bāhya adhyavasānam eva hi pramāṇa antara sāpekṣam tatra prārthyate tat ca vikalpena eva siddham pramāṇa vṛttau tu na pramāṇa antara apekṣā tatas tena vikalpena yat svarūpam ullikhitam tad parāmarśena yathā krama ākrama rahita tva niṣedha ādikam upasthāpayanti santaḥ tad arha tayā tathā tad rūpa pratyanīka ākāreṇa saha virodha vyavasthāyām kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ yathā vā bandhyā sutasya saundarya ādi niṣedhaḥ anurūpaḥ tathā ca vastu tā vi rodhasya kaḥ virodhaḥ yadi ca anubhava abhāvāt virodha pratirodhaḥ anubhava abhāvāt eva saundarya niṣedhaḥ api mā abhūt tatas vidheyasya kasyacid dharmasya abhāve abhāva abhidhāyinām anuccāraṇa prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ na ca tat śakyam iti api niveditam 
JŚNĀ_96,1^1	 atha bandhyā suta ādīnām vikalpanīyāt rūpāt rūpa antara virahāt tanmātrasya ca vikalpena viṣayīkaraṇe tad anurūpa vyavahārasya na kṣatiḥ evam sati virodha vyavahārasya api tad anurūpasya kā kṣatiḥ yathā ca vastu tayā bandhyā sutasya virodhaḥ evam nityasya api yaḥ dharmaḥ pratyanīkaḥ upapādayitum śakyaḥ tena katham na virodhaḥ tat katham anubhava abhāva mātram virodha bādha nesā adhanam anabhidhīyamānam sādhu syāt yadi tu vikalpaḥ api tad viṣayaḥ na syāt tad pratyanīka ākāra parāmarśaḥ vā na syāt saha anavasthāna abhidhānaḥ vā virodhaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ bhavet bhavet virodha siddhiḥ ekasya hi bhavataḥ anya bhāve abhāvāt saha anavasthāna vyavasthā bhāvaḥ ca pratyakṣa gocaraḥ iti katham ekasya anya vastu tve ghaṭeta 
JŚNĀ_96,1^2	 paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa tvam tu pratyanīka ākāra parāmarśa mātra sādhyam vikalpa mātreṇa viṣayīkaraṇe api sannidhīyamāna vyavasthā nimittam na avaśyam vastu anurodhi katham anyathā bhāva abhāvayoḥ eva virodhaḥ paraspara parihāra lakṣaṇaḥ tatra ca virodhe pradhānam udāharaṇam tau= eva abhāvasya vastu tva svīkāre api na bhāvasya bhāvaḥ abhāva abhidhāne vastuni na api abhāvasya bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ iti na abhāva vastu paramparām upagantum śakyam iti sva pracyuti mātram avastu vyavahartavya eka svabhāvam iṣyamāṇam katham tat virodhi vyavasthāpyatām virodha avyavasthāne ca tatra sva ātmā ca sva pracyutiḥ ca iti ekam eva vastu sva ātmanā eva asti ca na asti ca iti syāt na ca evam niyamena iti ayam eva virodha arthaḥ kṣaṇikā kṣaṇika vat vā yathā hi ekasya na akṣaṇikam tathā na anyasya kṣaṇikam iti tasmāt vastu avastunoḥ na paraspara parihāra lakṣaṇa virodha bādhā iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_96,2	 nanu evam virodhasya apāram ārthika tve tad dvāreṇa kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ api avāstavī syāt na hi apāramārthika ādhāraḥ pāramārthikaḥ bhavitum arhati virodhaḥ yat āha śaṅkaraḥ evam tarhi virodha kalpanayā bādhakam api kalpita virodha tvāt na vāstava vyatireka sādhanam iti avāstava vyatireka tvāt sattāyāḥ tat āyattam kṣaṇika tvam api avāstavam eva iti 
JŚNĀ_96,3	 nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ api tat evam upaskurvan= āha saṃvṛti siddhena akṣaṇikena virodha asiddhiḥ iti ced saṃvṛti siddham api vāstavam kālpanikam vā syāt yadi vāstavam tatas katham tasya asattvam katham vā artha kriyā virodhaḥ artha kriyām kurvat hi vāstavam ucyate atha kālpanikam tad virodhaḥ kim vāstavaḥ kālpanikaḥ vā na tāvat vāstavaḥ kalpita virodhi virodha tvāt bandhyā putra virodha vat atha virodhaḥ api kālpanikaḥ eva na tarhi paramārthataḥ akṣaṇikasya artha kriyāyām krama ākramābhyām virodhaḥ iti atas akṣaṇikāt sattvasya vyatireka siddhiḥ api apāramārthikī iti avāstava vyatireka tvāt sattāyāḥ tat āyattam kṣaṇika tvam api avāstavam eva iti 
JŚNĀ_97,1^1	 abaddha pralapitam etat na hi virodhaḥ nāma vastu antaram kiñcid ubhaya koṭi datta pādam sambandha abhidhānam iṣyate asmābhiḥ upapadyate vā yena eka saṃbandhinaḥ vastu tva abhāve apāramārthikaḥ syāt yathā tu iṣyate tathā pāramārthikaḥ eva viruddha abhimatayoḥ anyonya svarūpa parihāra mātram virodha arthaḥ tat ca bhāva bhāvayoḥ pāramārthikam eva na hi bhāvaḥ abhāva rūpam āviśati na api abhāvaḥ bhāva rūpam iti yaḥ ayam anayoḥ asaṅkara niyamaḥ saḥ eva virodhaḥ sa ca niyamaḥ sva ātmānam virodham api pāramārthika pade niveśayati 
JŚNĀ_97,1^2	 evam na nityam krama yaugapadya rūpam āviśati na api krama yaugapadyam nitya rūpam āviśati iti yaḥ ayam niyamaḥ saḥ eva virodhaḥ tayoḥ na ca kadācid anyathā iti pramāṇa siddhiḥ eva pāramārthika tā iti katham ucyate virodhasya apāramārthika tayā sattva hetoḥ vyatirekaḥ api atāttvikaḥ iti nityasya punar apāramārthika tvam aṅgīkṛ yā eva sarvam avasthāpitam iti na kaścid doṣaḥ yat ca kalpita virodhi virodhasya vāstava tva niṣedhāya kalpita virodhi virodha tvāt bandhyā suta virodha vat iti uktam tatra eva anena tapasvinā katham āśraya asiddhi tva ādi dūṣaṇam sthavīyaḥ api na upalabdham iti āstām tāvat asya marma udghāṭanam 
JŚNĀ_97,2^1	 etat ca cintyate kalpita virodhi virodha tvam eva vāstava tvena viruddham na vā yadi tāvat na viruddham tadā kalpita avirodhi viruddha tvam api bhavati vāstava tvam api syāt iti katham tad upanyāsaḥ tad nirākaraṇa aikāntikaḥ syāt na aviruddha vidheḥ kasyacid pratiṣedha siddhiḥ atha viruddham sa virodhaḥ vāstavaḥ avāstavaḥ vā tatra avāstavaḥ virodhaḥ para parābhave ati prasaṅgāt asamarthaḥ iti vāstava pakṣe kalpita virodhi virodhaḥ api svayam vāstavaḥ iṣṭaḥ na ca asmākam iva sva viruddha niṣedha āmidhāyī iti paśya dhārṣṭya vijṛmbhitam 
JŚNĀ_97,2^2	 yathā hi nitya krama yaugapadyayoḥ virodhaḥ kalpita virodhi virodhaḥ nityasya kalpita tvāt tathā vāstava tva kalpita virodhe virodhayoḥ virodhaḥ kalpita virodha virodhaḥ vartate kalpitasya virodhinaḥ virodhaḥ iti kṛtvā kalpitaḥ virodhī tasya iti vā kalpitasya hi virodhinaḥ virodhaḥ api kalpitaḥ eva na vāstavaḥ iti eva bhavat pauruṣeṇa sādhyamānam īkṣāmahe tasmāt tasya kalpitasya virodhasya virodhinaḥ vāstava tvena saha yaḥ virodhaḥ saḥ api kalpita virodhi virodhaḥ siddhaḥ tasya vāstava tve sva vacana virodhaḥ avāstava tve dūṣaṇam uktam eva 
JŚNĀ_98,1	 api ca virodhaḥ nāma ekatra dvayoḥ saṃvāsa niṣedha artham arthyate na tu dvayoḥ vastutvasiddhiḥ nāma virodha phalam yatra tu dvayoḥ vastutva siddhiḥ tatra sāmarthyāt ekena vastunā vastu antaratiraskārāt kvacid deśe yathā saha anavasthāne yathoktam prāk prakṛtaḥ tu virodhaḥ dharmayoḥ ekatra dharmiṇi sadbhāva niṣedha phalaḥ 
JŚNĀ_98,2^1	 tatra yathā dvau= api dharmau santau niṣidhyete yatra nīla tvam na tatra anīla tvam atas na nīlānīlam ekam iti tathā sat asattva rūpau= api vipratiṣiddhau dharmau= ekatra dharmiṇi samāropitau pratiṣiddhau= eva na hi jananyāḥ tanaye bandhyā tanaya tvam āropitam tattvataḥ asat iti na niṣedhyam bandhyā tanaye vā vikalpa eka gocare jananī tanaya tvam āropitam na niṣedhyam na hi jananī tanayaḥ bandhyā tanayaḥ vā eka ātmā tāvatā eva virodha kārya paryavasanāt kim apareṇa virodha nāmnā yaḥ vastu dharmau= anapekṣya na ātma lābham āsādayati evam yatra nitya tvam na tatra krama yaugapadyavat tvam yatra krama yaugapadyavat tvam tatra na nitya tvam atas na nityam krama yaugapadya yogi paramārthataḥ tatas ca sattā yuktam api na eva niyamena paramārthataḥ tatas kṣaṇikaḥ eva viśrāmyat tadāyatta sattākam eva sattvam iti sattvāt kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddheḥ avirodhaḥ yadi ca evam api virodha vyatireka pratisandhānena mātṛ modaka krameṇa gṛhītvā giri kuhara koṇam āviśya ghoṣayitum icchasi ced ghoṣaya na punar asmad ārabdha siddhi pratibandhe kiñcid upayujyase 
JŚNĀ_98,2^2	 tat alam abhiniveśa para vaśībhūya vāstavāḥ eva ete virodha ādayaḥ iti eva sādhu nanu nitya tvam krama yaugapadyavat tvam ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya na aparaḥ virodhaḥ nāma kasya vāstava tvam iti ced tat api yat kiñcit na hi dharma antara saṃbhavena virodhasya pāramārthika tvam brūmaḥ kim tu yatas viruddhau dharmau dharma antara saṃbhave api hi yadi na viruddhau na pāramārthikaḥ api virodhaḥ viruddhau ced tāvatā eva tāttvikaḥ virodhaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ kim apareṇa dharmeṇa yat api bandhyā putra virodha vat iti uktam tatra kim eka ādhāraḥ eva ayam virodhaḥ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtaḥ atha dvitīya apekṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ api pratiyogi rūpaḥ anya mātram vā prathama pakṣaḥ tāvat ayuktaḥ na hi kaścid eka ādhāram virodham pratijānīte tatas yadi bandhyā putra virodhasya abhinna dharmiṇaḥ apāramārthika tvam tadā ubhaya dharmiṇaḥ api pāramārthikena virodhena na bhāvyam iti kaḥ ayam nyāyaḥ evam anya mātreṇa api na virodhaḥ kṛtaka anitya tva vat pratiyoginā tu tatra api iṣyate eva bandhyā putrasya hi abandhyā putra tvena virodhaḥ asti eva eka ātma niṣedhaḥ ca abhimataḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_99,1	 nanu dharmayoḥ virodhe dharmiṇoḥ aikātmya niṣedhaḥ iti yuktam banyā putrasya ābandhyā putra tvena virodhaḥ dharmi dharmayoḥ vartate na eṣa doṣaḥ dharmiṇaḥ api dharma dvāreṇa eva vyavahriyante evam dharmiṇoḥ api kadācid bhāva pradhānaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ iti yaḥ ca vaidharmyeṇa dahana tuhinayoḥ upanyāsaḥ saḥ api ayuktaḥ paraspara parihārasya vivakṣita tvāt yau ca tad viṣaya tayā sa apekṣa dhruva bhāva abuktau tatra api sa apekṣa tayā kādācid ka tvam anitya tvam uktam dhruva bhāvaḥ api avaśyambhāvaḥ iti yadi bhāva niyama tvam tadā nitya tvam eva tatas nitya anityayoḥ iyam virodha sthitiḥ katham anubhava pūrvakatayā upadarśayantam na upahāsayati nityena katham virodha pratītiḥ iti eva hi prakṛtam atha avaśyam bhaviṣyattā dhruva bhāvaḥ sā api na kasyacid anubhava viṣayaḥ iti nitya vat eva doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_99,2	 syāt etat yat ca kadācid avaśyambhūtam upalabdham tad apekṣayet amucyate iti tad apekṣayā tarhi virodhaḥ eva na asti tat hi sa apekṣam ca dhruva bhūtam ca atha tadā sa apekṣa tvam na asti siddha tvāt anyadā tadā sutarām na asti asiddha tvāt eva asiddha dharmam eva apekṣā iti ced ananubhūte tarhi na virodha vyavasthā iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ asiddhasya eva siddhi kāla apekṣayā anubhūtena eva virodhaḥ iti ced siddhi kāla apekṣā svīkāre tarhi virodhaḥ eva na asti iti eva sādhu 
JŚNĀ_99,3	 etena anubhava abhāvāt virodha vyavasthā abhāve sādhye vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta abhimataḥ sādhya avyatirekī asatā virodha prasañjane tu sādhana avyatirekī dhruva bhāvasya nitya tā artha pakṣe tu sādhya koṭi nikṣepaḥ eva iti bheda abheda ādikam tu bhavatu vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ na ca tāvatā api vastunoḥ eva nākṣaṇikaḥ virodhaḥ iti niyamaḥ anyathā api samarthita tvāt iti yat api na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti iti vācyam tat api āśraya asiddhi codyasya dūrīkṛta tvāt nirākṛtam asataḥ api dharmi tva sādhanāt avastuni vikalpasya pratīti vyavasthā siddheḥ ca vyoma ādi svarūpa apratītiḥ api parihṛtāḥ 
JŚNĀ_100,1^1	 syāt etat yadi vikalpa rūpām pratītim āśritya āśrayā siddhi parihāraḥ sattā sādhane api samānam tatas katham ucyate na asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ asti ityādi katham ca ātmanaḥ vibhu tva sādhanam sarvatra upalabhyamāna guṇa tvam āśraya asiddha abuda ahriyate iti ced sādhana anurodhāt ubhayatra api hi bhāva dharmaḥ eva hetuḥ upāttaḥ āśaṅkitaḥ ca na ca bhāva dharmasya avastu dharmī bhavitum arhati na hi dhūmarśi śapātu a ādayaḥ avastuni vasanti tasmāt yatra bhāva dharmaḥ sādhanam tatra niyamena vastu eva dharmī na ca vikalpa mātra viṣayasya vastu tāśvāsaḥ avastuni api vikalpa mātra anapāyāt tatas vastu dharmīkurvatā pratyakṣa anumāna rūpe ca siddhiḥ abhidhātavyā tad anabhidhāne tu vikalpa mātra gocaritaḥ arthaḥ sandigdha sattākaḥ nirasta sattākaḥ vā dharmīkriyamāṇaḥ katham vastu tayā niścitaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_100,1^2	 tathā ca sati yāvān vastu dharmaḥ hetuḥ sarvaḥ asau na āśraya asiddhim atikrāmati ekatra sandehāt anyatra viparyayāt tatas pratyakṣa anumānābhyām vastu viṣayābhyām asiddhe bhāva dharmaḥ na hetuḥ asti a āśraya asiddha tvāt iti yuktam etat sattā sādhane asattā sādhane tu avastu dharmaḥ hetuḥ avastuni vikalpa mātra siddhaḥ eva na āśraya asiddhi doṣeṇa dūṣayitum śakyaḥ na hi tasya vastu āśraya apekṣā avastu dharmāt eva na ca tad ādhārasya pratyakṣa anumāna apekṣā avastu tvāt eva bhāva dharme tu sādhane vastu eva āśrayaḥ vastu dharma tvāt vastunaḥ ca niścayaḥ pratyakṣa anumānābhyām eva tatas tayoḥ abhāve niyamena āśraya asiddhiḥ iti sat asat tā sādhanayoḥ katham samānaḥ doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_100,2^1	 yat tu trilocanena pramāṇa antaram nityānām asattā siddhau krama ādi virahasya abhāva dharmatā na sidhyati iti uktam tat bālasya api durabhidhānam nityāḥ hi dharmiṇaḥ asattvam sādhyam krama ādi virahaḥ hetuḥ asya ca abhāva dharma tvam nāma sva sādhya abinābhāvi tvam ucyate abhāvānām śaśaśṛṅga ādīnām dharmaḥ na bhāvānām iti kṛtvā tat anena vacasā yāvat pramāṇa antareṇa pakṣe sādhyam na sidhyati na tāvat hetoḥ vyāptiḥ iti uktam bhavati tat ca kutra hetau= upalabdham anena iti na vidmaḥ yathā ca anyatra sādhyana antarīyaka tā anyadā pravṛtta pramāṇa antara siddhā dṛṣṭāntena smāritā pakṣīkṛte sādhya siddhi artham upayujyate na anyatas sādhya siddhim apekṣate tathā krama āt yabhāve abhāva dharmatā vyāpti svabhāvānyadā eva kramākrameṇa siddhatvasya 
JŚNĀ_100,2^2	 vyāpti grahaṇa kāle pravṛtta pramāṇa siddha ākāśa kamala dṛṣṭāntena smāritā sādhya siddhau= upayujyate na anyatas sādhya siddhim apekṣate anyathā sarva anumāna vaiyarthyāt krama yaugapadyena hi sattvasya vyāpti siddhau sattvasya vyāpyasya abhāvena krama yaugapadyasya vyāpakasya virahaḥ vyāptaḥ sidhyati iti abhāva dharma tvam krama yaugapadya viṣayaḥ yathā ca vyāpti rūpam tathā pūrvam eva niścitam sat abhāva dharma tvam na pakṣe pramāṇa antareṇa sādhya siddhyā vyavasthāpyate tathā krama akrama abhāva abhāvena api sādhyam prasādhya vyavasthāpyate iti naḥ pakṣaḥ pūrvam eva vyavasthāpita tvāt tat kutas itaretara āśraya tvam 
JŚNĀ_101,1	 kim ca itaretara āśraya tvam api evam yujyate krama ādi virahasya abhāva dharma tva siddhau teṣām asattva siddhiḥ asattva siddhau ca abhāva dharma tva siddhiḥ iti viṣama dṛṣṭinā punar abhāva dharma siddheḥ asattva asiddhau na prayājaka tvam uktam kim tu pakṣa dharmatā siddheḥ tat kīdṛśam itaretara āśraya tvam na ca pakṣa dharmatā eva abhāva dharma tā sādhya avinābhāva rūpa tvāt abhāva dharma tāyāḥ atha yadi abhāva dharma tvam krama ādi abhāvasya syāt tadā pakṣīkṛtānām asatām nityānām dharmaḥ syāt iti abhiprāyāt pakṣa dharma tā vyāpāra dvāreṇa tat avyāpāraḥ darśitaḥ tathā api cakrakam vaktum ucitam tat api prācīna carcayā carcitam eva 
JŚNĀ_101,2	 kim ca abhāva dharma tve vyāpti rūpe sati pakṣa dharma tvam iti na ayam hetu antara sādhāraṇaḥ nyāyaḥ na ca asya api hetoḥ evam abhāva dharma tvam hi vyāptiḥ bhavatu mā vā krama ādi virahaḥ tu kena nityānām niṣidhyate na ca ete api asattā rūpeṇa dharmiṇaḥ kim tu sat asattva sandehavat tvena iti yat kiñcid etat bhāva dharma tvam ubhaya dharma tvam ca na iṣṭam asya krama ādi virahasya hetoḥ iti na prathama vikalpe doṣaḥ na api dvitīye vyatirekasya abhāva rūpa tve api vikalpena pratīteḥ samarthita tvāt na hi abhāva rūpāṇām vikalpāt anyā pratītiḥ apratītiḥ vā ubhayathā api abhāva vyavahāra hāni prasaṅgāt tatas anubhava apekṣā virahāt na tad janana prasaṅge doṣa avakāśaḥ anāśvāsaḥ tu śāsitum ucitaḥ saḥ api krama yaugapadya viraha lakṣaṇa vyāpaka anupalambha saṃbhavāt liṅga ja tvena dūrīkṛtaḥ 
JŚNĀ_102,1	 tathā hi tathā eva trairūpya pariśodhanam etat ārabdham siddham ca kim iti vismaryate yatas liṅga abhāvāt iti ucyate tasmāt krama ādi vyāpi asattā vyatireka vikalpe katham anāśvāsaḥ avyatireka śaṅkā hi anāśvāsasya arthaḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva niścaye ca āsthānam etat iti nityāt niyamena vyatiricyamānam sattvam kṣaṇika tvena vyāptam siddham iti na doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_102,2	 tṛtīye api vikalpe vyatireka niścayasya dṛḍhīkṛta tvāt saḥ ayam vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ nitye sva āśraye krama ādi abhāvam sādhayan= eva sattāyāḥ tatas niyamena vyatirekam kṣaṇikatāyām ca pratibandham asyāḥ sādhayati iti trayaḥ asya vyāpārāḥ eka vyāpāra saṃgṛhītāḥ ca na ca doṣa leśena lipyante tritvam ca arthaśakteḥ sattā lakṣaṇa tve hetu mātra tve tu vyatireka mātra sādhanam asattā sādhana arthaḥ iti vyāpāra dvaitam eva iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_102,3^1	 nanu vyāpaka abhāvasya abhāva rūpa tvena vastu dharma tayā āśraya asiddhi parihāre api sa katham abhāvaḥ kasyacid pratipattiḥ pratipatti hetuḥ vā tasya api vā katham pratipattiḥ iti kim na dṛśyate tad liṅga janmā ca saṃprati eva vyatireka vikalpaḥ na visaṃvāda śaṅkām aṅke nidhattaḥ iti uktam avaśyam ca sādhya buddhim sādhayatā sādhanena bhāva vyavahāraḥ svīkartavyaḥ na anyathā tat ca abhāva rūpa tve sarvam virudhyate vyāpakān upalabdhiḥ iti api yadi api anupalabdhi mātram saḥ eva doṣaḥ na ca anya upalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ abhidhātum śakyā anyasya api kasyacid anupalabdhiḥ iti tat api yat kiñcit dharmī upalabdheḥ eva anyatra api anupalabdhi tayā vyavasthāpanāt 
JŚNĀ_102,3^2	 yathā hi na iha śiṃśapā vṛkṣa abhāvāt iti atra vṛkṣa apekṣayā kevala pradeśasya dharmiṇaḥ upalabdhiḥ vṛkṣa anupalabdhiḥ śiṃśapā apekṣayā ca kevala pratītiḥ eva śiṃśapā bhāva pratītiḥ iti svabhāva hetu paryavasāyi vyāpāraḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ tathā nityasya dharmiṇaḥ vikalpa buddhau parisphurataḥ krama ādi apekṣayā kevala sphuraṇam eva krama ādi anupalambhaḥ artha kriyā apekṣayā ca kevala pratītiḥ eva artha kriyā viyoga pratītiḥ iti viśeṣaḥ adhyavasāya apekṣayā ca yathā na iha śiṃśapā vṛkṣa bhāva āditya bhāvasya hetu pañcamyāḥ nirdeśaḥ tathā bhāvaḥ sādhanam iti api vyavahāraḥ na tu abhāvaḥ sādhanam eva kvacid sa ca vyavahāraḥ avasita artha avisaṃvādāt na parihartum śakyaḥ yat khalu vyāpakena virahitam tat avaśyam vyāpyena api iti etāvataḥ eva arthasya saṃvādinaḥ tena api prakāreṇa pratipādanāt ayam ca nyāyaḥ yathā satye dharmiṇi tathā asatye api iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_103,1^1	 nanu ayam eva mahān viśeṣaḥ satye hi dharmiṇi vyāpakasya eka jñāna saṃsargī saḥ eva dharmī iti tasya upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ vyāpakasya astu asatyaḥ tu dharmī na eka jñāna saṃsargī kenacid iti ced tena eva sva saṃbandhinā dharmeṇa vyāpaka saṃmatena tathā hi eka jñānam atra vikalpaḥ eva sa hi nitya grāhī vikalpaḥ tad ākāra antaram iva krama yaugapadyadharma saṃbandhe nityasya krama ādi ākāram api ullikhet iti saṃbhāvanayā eka jñāna saṃsargi tvam ubhayoḥ anivāryam yadi na nityam anādheya atiśaya tva ādinā dharma antareṇa saha pratīti gocarībhavet yaugapadya ayaugapadyam vāstava dharmiṇā saha na pratīti viṣayaḥ syāt api evam 
JŚNĀ_103,1^2	 na ca evam na ca niṣedhyasya saṃbhāvanām vinā kvacid eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ tadā eva syāt labhyaḥ tatra yathā hariṇa śirasi tena eka jñāna saṃsargi śṛṅgam upalabdham hari vara aṅge api tad saṃbhāvanayā eva tad saṃsargāt niṣidhyate tathā nīla ādau= apariniṣṭhita nitya aniti abhāve tāvat kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdham eka jñāna saṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye api yadi bhavataḥ nitya grāhiṇā jñānena svadharmiṇā nityena saha eva gṛhyeyātām iti saṃbhāvanaya eka jñāna saṃsarga dvārakaḥ eva pratiṣedham āviśataḥ 
JŚNĀ_103,2^1	 katham punar etat nitya jñāne krama ādeḥ asphuraṇam iti yāvatā kramākrama kroḍīkṛtam eva nityam vikalpayāmaḥ iti ced ataeva bādhaka avatāraḥ viparīta rūpa avataraṇam vinā tasya vaiyarthyāt saḥ ayam nitya ātmani kramākrama āropau bhavataḥ tad vādhaka upanyāsam prayojayet nāma na tu nitye kramākramau= antar bhāvayitum prabhavati virodhāt kāla antara eka rūpa tayā hi nitya tvam krama ākramau ca kṣaṇa dvaye api bhinna rūpa tayā tatas nityasya krama ākramikā artha kriyā śakteḥ ca paraspara pratyanīka rūpa tayā durnivāraḥ virodhaḥ iti katham nitye antarbhāvaḥ krama ādeḥ 
JŚNĀ_103,2^2	 anantarbhāvāt ca śuddha nitya vikalpena dūrīkṛta samāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ kramākramasya sarvasya ca vikalpa mātra gocarasya vikalpa ārūḍha rūpa apekṣayā viruddha niyata aniyata dharma vyavasthānam yathā treguṇyasya ekatvam viruddham dharmaḥ prasāda tāpa dainya kriyā niyatā nairātmya itara yogaḥ aniyataḥ tathā iha api pūrva apara kālayoḥ eka ātma tayā yadi akārakam akārakam eva sarvadā kāraka tvem ca kāraka tvam eva nityam kramākramau tu kadācid kriyā śakti svabhāvau yaugapadye hi vyaktam ekadā eva karaṇam iti kādācid ka kriya tvam krame api kṛtāyāḥ kariṣyamāṇāyāḥ ca karaṇāt kādācid kī eva kriyā sahakārī apekṣāyāḥ kṣipta tvāt 
JŚNĀ_103,2^3	 tatas kādācid kākādā citka kriya tvayoḥ paraspara parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tayā virodhaḥ siddhaḥ evam sati pratiyogini nitye vikalpyamāne eka jñāna saṃsargi lakṣaṇa prāpte viruddhasya anupalabhyamānasya kramākramasya tad upalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ sā eva vā artha kriyā śakteḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ tasmāt vyāpaka dharmī upalabdhi tayā na vyāpaka anupalambha antarāt asya viśeṣaḥ yadi ca dharmi tve api vastu avastu tayā vibhāgaḥ bhāgya hīnasya bhavataḥ matim adya api duḥsthayati vastuni api dharmiṇi ekatra pradeśaḥ kaṭhinaḥ dharmī drava rūpam anyatra jalam ityādayaḥ vibhāgāḥ bhaṅgavantaḥ tat anviṣyantaḥ kena vāraṇīyāḥ tasmāt vastu avastu tayā api bheda cintā kopa yoginī 
JŚNĀ_104,1	 nanu mahānasyāḥ upayogaḥ tathā hi vastuni dharmiṇi paramparayā tad pratibaddham vyāpaka anupalambha lakṣaṇam anumānam pramāṇam pramāṇa bhājanībhavati vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvāt pramāṇa vyavasthāyāḥ na ca evam avastuni śakyam iti ced kim tāvat paramparayā api vastunaḥ sakāśāt āgata tvam eva vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam tadā krama ākramasya artha kriyāyāḥ ca vyāpti grahaṇa gocara vastu pratibaddha tvam asya api na kṣīṇam dharmi vikalpa vastu pratibaddha tvam vā 
JŚNĀ_104,2^1	 atha vastuni kenacid rūpeṇa vyavahāra kāraṇa tvam vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam tat api kṣaṇa bhaṅgi vastu sādhana upāya tvena pratiṣṭhitam asya tasya eva vā dharmi vikalpasya vastunaḥ avastu upādāna tva vyavahāra kāraṇa tvena dharmi vastunā eva tu vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam iti kim anena yadi ca eṣa grahaṇaḥ eva tat kim anumānaḥ eva vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam prāmāṇyam vā na pratyakṣe liṅga āśrayaṇam eva hi dharmi cintām avakāśayati tat anāśrayam tu pratyakṣam vastunaḥ āgatam vastu nimitta vyavahārakam iti eva vastu adhiṣṭhānam evam anumānam api tathā eva vastu adhiṣṭhānam iti gṛhyatām kevalam paramparayā pratyakṣasya api hi janma eva sākṣāt vyavaharaṇam tu vikalpa ādi vyavadhānena eva anumānasya punar ubhayam api paramparayā vyavahārāṇām api smṛti abhilāṣa ādinā vyavadhānāt evam vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam anumāne vyavadhānena dūṣaṇam eva 
JŚNĀ_104,2^2	 kevalam anumāne api anyatra sādhya dharma apekṣayā yat vyavadhānam tatas atiriktam idam vyāpti grahaṇa apekṣam vartate iti dhāndhyam dhiyaḥ tatra api na sarvaḥ anumāna antara sādhāraṇaḥ ayam dharmaḥ sva sādhye hi sākṣāt pratibandham avadhūya viparyaya vyāptyā gamaka tvam kārya kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhiṣu tadvat vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam api yadi yathā ukta vyavadhānena viṣaya viśeṣe bhavet kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ kasyacid bādhakasya abhāvāt dharmi vikalpa apekṣayā tu na tāvataḥ api vyavadhānasya saṃbhavaḥ asādhāraṇī ca pratyāsattiḥ dharmiṇaḥ vikalpa ākāreṇa saha ekīkaraṇāt nirākāra pakṣe api hi vikalpa āyatta prakāśa tvāt alīka nitya ākārasya dharmiṇaḥ tasmāt dharmiṇaḥ vastu adhiṣṭhāna paryeṣaṇam pratyāsatti viśeṣa āśraya tayā vikalpa bapuṣā api kṛta arthī bhavet iti na doṣaḥ kaścid ayam eva nyāyaḥ na vaktā bandhyā sutaḥ caitanya abhāvāt na kharam khara śṛṅgam dravya tā viyogāt ityādau yojyaḥ na avastuni virodhaḥ pratītya viṣaya tvāt ityādau ca śaraṇam 
JŚNĀ_105,1–106,1^1	 yadi pratīti mātra apekṣayā pratītyaviṣaya tvam tadā asiddhiḥ anubhava apekṣayā anekāntaḥ iti evaṃprakāra dūṣaṇa parihāra śaktiḥ na punar āśrayā siddhi ādi dūṣaṇa gaṇa gaṇanā kācid etena vyāpaka anupalabdhau hi vyāpya abhāvaḥ anyaḥ pratipattavyaḥ iti helayā apahastitam dharmi rūpasya bhinnasya pratipatti viṣayasya pratipādāt gaṇḍaśaile vṛkṣa tva abhāvena śiṃśapātvā abhāva vat tat evam na prakṛta vyāpaka an upalambhasya svarūpa asiddhiḥ nitya krama yaugapadyayoḥ virodha pratipādanāt yat āha krama akrama virodhaḥ iti tat vyāpaka dvāreṇa punar artha kriyā virodhāt iti āha 
JŚNĀ_105,1–106,1^2	 na api āśraya āsiddhiḥ avastunaḥ api dharmi tva pratipādanāt vikalpena pratipatti pratipādanāt ca ataeva śāstre tasya dharmiṇi pratyakṣataḥ anumānataḥ vā prasiddhi niścayaḥ iti utsargasya paraiḥ anutpādya āpūrvarūpam nakha ādikam sakṛt śabda ādi ahetu tva ādi kam avastuni sādhya sādhana pratijñānam apavādaḥ veditavyaḥ iti vyaktam etat evam dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇaḥ api asiddhi parihāraḥ vyāpya vyāpaka abhāvau ca siddhau= eva nitya vat tatra vimateḥ abhāvāt tatas sa pakṣe sattva niṣedhaḥ api dhvastaḥ atha mañcā anekānta krāntiḥ kṛtā iti tat anena siddha sādhya pratibandhāt sattva hetoḥ siddhaḥ sādhya dharmiṇām kṣaṇa bhaṅga aṅgīkāraḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_107,1–107,2	 anvīti vyatirekam ākalayatā adhyakṣeṇa dhūma agni vat dṛśya adṛṣṭi prabhūta hetu phala tā siddhāḥ vināśa aṅgayoḥ tad prāk kāraṇa sannidheḥ phalam asat nāśaḥ tanoti sthitim tāvantam kila kālam iti api mṛṣā nāśaḥ svarūpādṛśaḥ nahīdantayā nāśasya svarūpam upalabdhi gocaram yena anvaya vyatireka niścayāt kāraṇa abhimata mudgara ādi sannidheḥ prāk nāśa ākhyam kāryam abhavat tāvantam kālam bhāvasya sthairyam āpādayet yāvatā nāśasya svabhāva anupalabdheḥ mṛṣā eva kalpanā iyam iti kutas kāraṇa anupalabdhyā sthairya siddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_107,3–107,4	 nanu ghaṭa mudgara ādayaḥ dṛśyante tāvat teṣu eva kaścid nāśaḥ nāma iti nāśa svarūpa anupalabdhiḥ asiddhā iti ced dṛṣṭasya avadayam ghaṭaḥ atra ca patan dṛṣṭaḥ tathā mudgaraḥ dṛṣṭā karpara saṃhatiḥ paramatas abhāvaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ aparaḥ tena abhāvaḥ iti śrutiḥ kva nihitā kim vā atra tad kāraṇam svādhīnā paridhasya kevalam iyam dṛṣṭā kapāla āvaliḥ 
JŚNĀ_107,5	 su nipuṇam nirūpayantaḥ api māṃsa cakṣuṣā vayam tāvat na aparam atra vastu jātam īkṣāmahe yat abhāva śrutyā viṣayīkriyate tad darśana abhāvāt ca tad kāraṇam api kim avadhārayāmaḥ yad abhāvena pūrva pūrvam asan= āśaḥ iti syāt yaḥ ca tad kāraṇam kalpitaḥ daṇḍaḥ tasya api anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyinī kapālapaṃktiḥ eva dṛṣṭā na anyā kācid vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntatayā iyam upanyastā punar yathā iyam adhyakṣa anupalambhābhyām anvaya vyatirekau= anuvidadhatī dṛśya tayā daṇḍasya kāryam avasthāpyate tathā yadi nāśa ākhyam api vastu dṛśyam syāt anātma rūpa vivekena tasya api tarasvi daṇḍa kārya tā avārya eva na ca evam tasmāt kalpanā eva iyam 
JŚNĀ_108,1–108,3^1	 syāt etat āstām karparapaṃktiḥ eva kalasa dhvaṃsaḥ na ca iyam purātena sthairyam api prasidhyatu tatas bhinnena nāśena kim atra uttaram nāśaḥ sā eva yathā ucyate yadi tathā abhāvaḥ api kumbha antara nyāse abhāva ravaḥ katham matam atas sidhyati abhāve api naḥ ayam arthaḥ yathā vegavat mudgara prahārāt pūrvam ghaṭasya nāśaḥ na asti iti pratipādayitum śakyam bhavataḥ tad svabhāva bhūtāyāḥ kapāla paṃkteḥ adarśanāt tathā na abhau= a paramparā paricayaḥ api na asti iti śakyam na hi abhāvaḥ api kapālapaṃktiḥ eva ucyate yena svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ avalambanam tadvat eva syāt atha nāśa vat abhāvaḥ api kapālapaṃktiḥ eva ucyate tadā kvacid deśe kumbham ekam apanīya kumbha antara nyāse katham abhāva vyavahāraḥ kapāla āvalera bhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_108,3^2	 asti ca kathañcid bhedam ākalayataḥ tatra api abhāva vyavahāraḥ ekasya anyasya sādṛśya vipralabdhasya prācīna avasthāna vyavasāye api tat katham kapāla pāliḥ eva abhāvaḥ tat asyām dhvaṃsa śabdam saṅketayataḥ yadi pūrvam dhvaṃsaḥ na asti iti śakyam api abhidhātu kapāla daśā virahāt abhāvaḥ tu na asti iti na śakyam sadṛśa apara saṃbhavena durupalakṣaṇāt tasmāt prahārāt prāc abhāve api kumbhasya saṃbhāvyamāne siddham abhimatam asmākam dṛśyā anupalambhān avatāraṇam nāma atas na karparāṇām dhvaṃsa saṃjñayā upayogaḥ na ca anyat mudgara anvaya vyatireka anukāri dṛṣṭam iti vyavahāra mātra parāyaṇaḥ eva nāśaḥ na vastutas asti 
JŚNĀ_108,4–109,2	 nāśaḥ na asti yadi sva hetu niyataḥ kim deśa kāle kvacid kumbhaḥ naṣṭaḥ iti pratoti niyamaḥ tena asti kāryaḥ ca saḥ na api anyat kila kāraṇam rayavataḥ daṇḍāt purā api anyathā nāśa utthāna kṛtā vinaṣṭa ghaṭa dhīḥ kena uddhurā vāryate evam tarhi kārya antara vat kāraṇa anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam dhvaṃsasya utphulla gallam ullapitam luptam kārya antara vat anubhava abhāvāt kevalam upapattyā prasādhya pradhvaṃsam astha abhimata nibandhana adhīna tā sādhyāḥ sā ca upapattiḥ kṣīṇāḥ yatas dṛṣṭe ambhobhṛti mudgara ādi janitām dṛṣṭvā kapāla āvalim saṃketa anugamāt vinaṣṭa ghaṭa dhīḥ tāvat samutpādyate sāmagryām iha nāśa nāma na kim api aṅgam na vā asyām api syāt eṣā na kadāpi na api ca purā api eṣā samagrā sthitiḥ 
JŚNĀ_109,3^1	 pūrva ardhena naṣṭa ghaṭa buddheḥ janma sāmagrīm ādarśya paśca ardhena adhikasya nāśa nāmnaḥ na anvayaḥ na vyatirekaḥ tad viveka sāmagryāḥ tu ubhayam anukṛtam bhavet iti darśitam tatra nāśa ākhyam na kiñcid iha sāmagryām nimittam asti iti anvayaḥ nirastaḥ na ca asyām satyām api sāmagryām kadācid na syāt eṣā buddhiḥ iti vyatireka avalambanam apāstam pūrvam tarhi kasmāt na iyam buddhiḥ iti vyatireka pratyaya aśātanam śeṣeṇa yadi purā api eṣā sāmagrī syāt niyatam iyam bhavantī buddhiḥ artha antara sāpekṣa tām sūcayet na ca iyam sāmagrī purā api asti vikala kapāla paṃkteḥ parigha pāta ādi kāraṇa abhāvena abhāvāt tat kutas vyatireka mātram api ukta sāmagryāḥ tu na vā asyām api syāt eṣā na kadācid iti niṣedha dvayena anvayaḥ śeṣeṇa vyatirekaḥ ca vyaktaḥ 
JŚNĀ_109,3^2–110,1	 tat buddhi abhāva kāle sāmagryāḥ eva abhāva pratipādanāt asau sāmagrya bhāvaḥ buddhi abhāva vyāptaḥ iti arthaḥ yaḥ tu pratyakṣa itara sahakāri sākalya rūpa tayā sarvā eva sāmagrī parokṣā iti samarthayate viṣama dṛṣṭiḥ tatas ca parokṣa tayā tasyāḥ na anvaya vyatireka niścayaḥ iti ucyate hanta hutavaha indhana ādi sāmagrī pratibandhaḥ api dhūma ādeḥ astamitaḥ iti apravṛtti nivṛttikam jagat prasajyeta tasmāt na adṛṣṭa abhyupagamaḥ dṛṣṭa sādhana sāmarthya pratirodhena iti alam vistareṇa tat ayam ghaṭāmarśavataḥ kapāla anubhavaḥ eva naṣṭa ghaṭa āvasāya sādhanaḥ iti siddham artha āpattiḥ atas gatā kṣayam iyam na dhvaṃsa siddhau prabhuḥ na viśeṣa buddhiḥ viśeṣaṇam antareṇa iti ced na bhāve bhinna kāla tvāt viśeṣaṇa tva asiddheḥ dhu aṃsasya yatas sva buddhyā rajyate yena viśeṣyam tad viśeṣaṇam 
JŚNĀ_110,2^1	 kāla bhedena pūrva apara kālayoḥ nāśa bhāvayoḥ abhāvāt kena kaḥ syāt kvacid pratīti viṣayīkriyate na ca bhāve sthiti dharmaḥ dhvaṃsaḥ kim tu pradeśe na ca anyatra sthitaḥ anyasya viśeṣaṇam daṇḍa vat bhedāt evam api syāt iti ced bhede tarhi sarva anya rūpa vivekena pratibhāsamānam eva viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyam sva anurakta pratīti viṣayīkuryāt na sva rūpeṇa apratibhāsamānam daṇḍa vat eva anumāna siddhena api daṇḍena daṇḍi pratīteḥ utpādāt anekāntaḥ iti ced na sarvathā yasya na svarūpa avabhāsaḥ iti abhiprāyāt daṇḍasya punar anumāna kāle apratibhāsane api niścāyaka abhimata liṅgena saha saṃbandha grahaṇa kāle asti eva svarūpa nirbhāsaḥ tatas tad anusmaraṇāt anumāna kāle api tad rūpa anuraktām buddhim ādadhīta daṇḍaḥ na ca sarvathā adṛṣṭa daṇḍasya daṇḍaḥ api anumāna bhājanam svarūpa anurakta pratīti hetuḥ vā dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ evam nāśanām ā api arthaḥ katham tathā syāt sarvathā adarśanāt iti na ca daṇḍa anumānāt bhinnā daṇḍi pratītiḥ daṇḍaḥ atra daṇḍaḥ asya daṇḍavān ayam iti ca anartha antara tvāt 
JŚNĀ_110,2^2	 na ca iyam liṅga tyāge na bhavantī pratijñā mātra tayā anumānam bhavitum arhati yat naṣṭa pratītiḥ api nāśa nāma artha sādhakam niścayam apekṣamāṇā katham svayam eva sādhana tvena abhidhīyeta na ca anya liṅgam asti sarvathā adṛśya tayā tasmin kasyacid pratibandha asiddheḥ ataeva hi saṃva buddhiḥ tad siddhaya śaraṇam āśrīyate atas anumāna siddha nānakāntaḥ anumānasya api viśeṣaṇa svarūpa nirbhāsana antarīyaka tvāt apṛthak siddhaḥ ca anumāna viśeṣaṇa pratītyoḥ iti yasya na svarūpa nirbhāsaḥ tat na kasyacid sva anurakta pratīti nimittam yathā karikeśaraḥ na asti ca svarūpa pratibhāsaḥ dhvaṃsasya iti vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ sva anurakta pratīti nimitta tvam nirbhāsa bhaṅge bhavat ati prasaṅga bādhitam pratibhāsa vat tayā iva vyāptam na ca asiddhiḥ idantayā darśayitum aśakyasya bāhya vastunaḥ pratibhāsa vyavahāra abhāvāt idantayā nirdeśanoye ca vivāda abhāvāt na hi daṇḍaḥ api daṇḍi pratītyā sādhyaḥ adhyakṣa siddha tvāt mūḍham prati vyavahāra sādhane api nedantayā nirdeśaḥ viśeṣataḥ locana gocare 
JŚNĀ_110,3	 atha sarvam vastu sva rūpeṇa pratibhāti na para rūpeṇa yathā bhāvaḥ eva na abhāva rūpeṇa evam abhāvaḥ api bhāva rūpeṇa apratibhāsamānaḥ api svarūpeṇa pratibhāti eva idantayā pratibhāsanam nayana viṣayasya api bhāvasya eva atas nedantayā pratibhāsā abhāve api apratibhāsaḥ eva iti ced navai para rūpeṇa pratibhāsaḥ mṛgyate tasya abhāvam prati siddha tvāt svarūpam punar asya kim tat pratibhāti iti nibhālayantaḥ na labhāmahe idantayā nirdeśaḥ tu bhāveṣu eti api na rājakīyaḥ niyamaḥ tat yadi bhāveṣu api keṣucid eva netra pātreṣu idantayā nirdeśaḥ na sarveṣu iti brūyāt tadā ṭaṅkavaka ādayaḥ api puras pratibhāsinaḥ eva īdantayā param nirdeṣṭum aśakyāḥ iti kim atra vaktavyam tasmāt yāvat cakṣuḥ gocara cāri vastu tāvat idantayā nirdeśa pratibhāsam eva yat punar idantayā nirdeśa virahitam tat apratibhāsam eva nayana grāhyam iti nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_111,1	 atha viśeṣa buddhyā eva pratibhāsaḥ api sādhyaḥ yathā hi na daṇḍi buddhiḥ daṇḍa buddhim antareṇa tathā daṇḍa pratibhāsam antareṇa api evam naṣṭa buddhiḥ api viśeṣa buddhi tvāt na nāśam nāśa pratibhāsam antareṇa iti katham apratibhāsa ghoṣam iti ced bhavati eva vikāraḥ na punar etādṛśaḥ sva santāna varti pratibhāsaḥ asmābhiḥ api anumānena pratipattavyaḥ iti ghaṭa ādi pratibhāse api evam idānīm āyātam tat kim aham paśyāmi kiñcid iti anumānam anāptavatā āpta vacanena api pratyetavyam iti artham apratikurvāṇaḥ api vaidyaḥ kṛtārthaḥ syāt antatas śapathena api nirvṛttiḥ ālambyeta parokṣe hi viṣaye amīṣām prakārāṇām avakāśaḥ na jñāne yat punar apaśyantam ātmānam vedayamānaḥ eva paśyasi iti grāhyate vyaktam iyam bhaṇḍa vidyā paśyantam api vāhayati yaḥ api apaśyan= api tat vacanena paśyāmi iti gṛhṇīta sa khalu paśoḥ api paśuḥ 
JŚNĀ_111,2–111,5	 jñāna parokṣa tā vāde api hi kasyacid pratibhāsena sādhyate apratibhāsi yat pratibhāsaḥ asya na asya iti sādhyate na upapattibhiḥ tasmāt pratibhāsaḥ api sādhyaḥ iti asaṃbaddham etat nāśaḥ tu apratibhāsamānaḥ yadi sādhyate sādhyatām na tu naṣṭa ghaṭa pratītyā iti sthitam etat nāśaḥ vā astu na tu pratīti janakaḥ yadvat ghaṭe naṣṭa dhīḥ 
JŚNĀ_111,6	 abhyupagamya api brūmaḥ astu vā nāśaḥ nāma na punar asya avaśyam pratītam eva janakam mudgara ādi iti śakyam yathā naṣṭa ghaṭa buddheḥ eva na pratītaḥ kapāla anubhavaḥ hetuḥ iṣṭaḥ tathā nāśasya api mudgara ādi parihāreṇa kāraṇam anyat eva adṛṣṭam kiñcid syāt yatas na purā kāraṇa anupalabdhi siddhiḥ yathā adṛṣṭam eva nāśa ākhyam vastu svīkāra siddham naṣṭa buddheḥ nibandhanam tathā nāśasya api adṛṣṭam eva kiñcid kāraṇam na mudgara ādī iti katham tad abhāve api niyamena na aśani vṛttiḥ ayam tu viśeṣaḥ yathā mudgarasya kapāle kapāla anubhavasya ca naṣṭa buddhau= anvaya vyatirekābhyām sāmarthya siddhiḥ tathā na mudgarasya nāśe na nāśasya naṣṭa buddhau= iti yadi param bhavat uparodhāt ayam arthaḥ pratipattavyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_112,1	 atha kapāla anubhavāt kapāla kalpa naiba syāt na naṣṭa ghaṭa buddhiḥ iti ced tat etat jīvataḥ vyāghrasya daṃṣṭrā utpāṭanam kalasāmarśavataḥ kapāla valaya vīkṣaṇāt eva naṣṭa ghaṭa buddheḥ udayaḥ sākṣāt anubhūyamānaḥ apalapyate iti evam tarhi sarvasya anvaya vyatireka avadhārita arthasya apalāpaḥ prasaktaḥ yadā punar anarthi tva ādinā ghaṭāmarśena śūnyatā puruṣasya tadā kapāla avalokanāt kapāla kalpanā eva jāyate sāmagrī bhedasya bhedaka tvāt yadi punarbhavat abhipraya anuvartinaḥ bhāvāḥ bhaveyuḥ na bhavet api evam tathā api yadi icchasi kapāla anubhavāt eva naṣṭa ghaṭa buddhiḥ astu iti tadā tathā eva syāt iti na nāśaḥ prayojakaḥ tat alam sva manīṣikā saṃpratyayena karpara darśanam eva tad buddhi nibandhanam yadā tu kalasa vimarśam apekṣate tathā saṅketa smaraṇam api tatas na ati prasaṅgaḥ na ca saṅketaḥ api nāśam upadarśya kartum śakyaḥ tasya adṛśya tvāt eva kim tu visabhāga utpatti rūpam vikāram upadarśya etādṛśa avasthāyām naśyataḥ prayogaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_112,2–112,5	 etena abhāva darśanam eva bhāvān upalambham saṃbhāvayantaḥ nirastāḥ abhāva rūpa adarśanāt eva tasmāt na dhvaṃsaḥ nāma kaścid paścāt bhāvī kim ca anya prakṛti pratikṣaṇam idam saṃsādhitam ced jagat prauḍha nyāya balāt vilambi nidhanam syāt vā navā kim tatas syāt etat na dhvaṃsena vinā anyatā eva hi bhavet bhāvena sārdham sa ced sat ca asat ca kim astu vastu niyatam bhāva anujaḥ asau tatas bhāvāt tena vibhinna kāraṇa tayā tad kāraṇa asaṃbhava ibhāvāt tena kṛta anyatā api galitāḥ bhaṅgaḥ kutas anukṣaṇam 
JŚNĀ_113,1^1	 bhāva hetoḥ sakāśāt abhāva udaya varṇanā bhāvena sārdham sa ced iti uktam atra dhvaṃsāt anyatā iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim ekaḥ bhāvaḥ tena khaṇḍakhaṇḍīkriyate atha bhāva antara utpādana mātram asmāt uta prācīna nivartanam ca bhāva antara utpādanam ca yat vā prācīna nivartana mātram tatra na eka ātmānam aneka tām gamayati dhvaṃsaḥ virodhāt tayoḥ eka aneka tayoḥ nanu kāla bhedena ekam api anekam bhavat na duṣyati iti ced sva bheda virahe kālasya bhede api kim yadi hi kālabhedakaḥ bhāva bhedakaḥ bhavet bhavet etat 
JŚNĀ_113,1^2	 bhāvasya tu tādavasthye kāśa kuśa avalambanam upayuktam eva etādṛśām iti prathama pakṣa niṣedhaḥ bhinnam ced kurute na tasya dalanam iti dvitīyaḥ doṣaḥ artha antara karaṇe hi tat prācīnam na khaṇḍitam iti kṛte api karpara ādau kumbha upalambha prasaṅgaḥ bhinnena tat dālanekim nāśena artha antareṇa kapāla ādinā tasya kalasasya darśane abhyupagamyamāne na upayogaḥ nāśa ākhyasya tasya eva artha antarasya utpādane upayogaḥ iti ced vibhinna janma tu bhavat nāśasya hetoḥ na kim yatas eva mudgara ādeḥ nāśaḥ tatas eva karparasya astu janma kim sādhye dhvaṃsam utkṣipya 
JŚNĀ_113,2–114,1	 etena tṛtīye api vikalpe anya utpādana bhāgaḥ pratyuktaḥ iti caturthaḥ avaśiṣyate nāśena tasya nivṛttiḥ kriyate iti tadā api pradhvaṃsena vināśa janmani mate tena api nāśa antara utpāde nāśa paramparā iti vibhavet bhāvaḥ kadācid na saḥ na dhvaṃsāt aparā nivṛttiḥ iti ced anyaḥ anya nāśaḥ katham tasmin vastu vilokanāt iti na sanna āśādṛśaḥ khyāpanāt 
JŚNĀ_114,2	 dhvaṃsaḥ hi vastu tām bhāvatām vā atikramitum na arhati anubhava janana sāmarthyāt anyataḥ upapatteḥ ca sa katham anyaḥ arthaḥ anyasya nāśaḥ iti ucyate yat tu etasmin sati vastunaḥ adarśanāt iti uttaram tat na sat yatas nāśasya darśanam na asti iti khyāpitam tatas tasmin= asati iti katham kathayitum pāryate yadi ca tasmin sati vastu adarśanāt dhvaṃsa ākhya vastu nivṛttiḥ ucyate tadā 
JŚNĀ_114,3–114,8	 nāśaḥ mudgaraḥ eva vā astu śakalāni eva athavā tat ubhayatra tasmin satī iti vivakṣā ghaṭanāt mudgarasya prāgbhāvāt khaṇḍānām sama samaya tvāt bīje sati aṅkuraḥ goṣu duhyamānāsu satīṣu gataḥ iti vat nāśaḥ iti nivṛttiḥ dhvaṃsa ākhyaḥ vā dhvaṃsaḥ api mudgarādiḥ evāḥ tu alam pṛthak dhvaṃsa kalpanayā tāvatā api tad abhāvāt purā sthiraḥ bhāvaḥ iti siddheḥ atra ucyate tat dvayaṃbhāva tvena na bhāva rodhi na hi bhāvaḥ eva bhāvasya virodhī bhavitum arhati aviruddha bhāve ca katham anyasya nivṛttiḥ adarśanam vā atra uttaram bhavataḥ bhāṣā eva bhāvānyatā 
JŚNĀ_114,9	 na atra bhāvānām sāmarthyam kim tu bhavataḥ eva bhāratyā bhāvatā abhāvatā vā tathā hi bhavati iti bhāvaḥ bhavanam ca utpattiḥ tāvat asya svīkṛtā yadā api asti iti bhāvaḥ tadā api vidyamāna tā bhāva arthaḥ sā api sva rūpa sattva lakṣaṇā svīkṛtā eva nitya tā alaṃkṛtā yāvat yat ca asti iti na bhavati tat kim utpadyatinā saṃbadhyate bandhyā suta vat aṅkura vat ca 
JŚNĀ_115,1	 atha sarva sāmarthya upākhyā viraheṇa abhāva vyavahārāt śaktiḥ api sattvam anumanyate sā api sva jñāna janane abhyupagatā eva niḥśaṅka gamana ādikam ca tat kāryam eva sva abhyupagataḥ sattva samavāyaḥ sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ vā param na asti na ca sarveṇa bhāva dharmeṇa sarvatra bhāve bhavitavyam na api sarva bhāva dharma abhāvena bhāva antarasya api na bhāva tvam evam sati sāmānya viśeṣa samavāyānām api abhāva prasaṅgaḥ tebhyaḥ api adhikaḥ dhvaṃsasya utpattiḥ eva aparādhaḥ vastu ca avaśyam nāśaḥ vasati artha kriyā asmin= iti na bhāvaḥ iti kaṣṭaḥ vata ayam siddhānta viṣamagrahaḥ tasmāt bhavataḥ atra svātantryam yadi bhaṇasi dhvaṃsaḥ api bhāvaḥ syāt mudgara ādiḥ api kumbhasya abhāvaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_115,2^1	 na khalu mudgara ādikam bhāvam abhāvam vā kaścid vyavaharati iti ced nanu dhvaṃsam api yadi kenacid rūpeṇa jāyamānam upalabheta kaścid viśeṣataḥ nitya sthitam kim abhāvam vyavaharet dṛśyante hi tanu dhūma ādayaḥ vyavadhāna anavadhāna ādinā anupalabdha mūrtayaḥ punar upalabhyamānāḥ bhāva vyavahāra bhājaḥ tasmāt bhāva vyavahāra hāniḥ asya adarśanāt eva pratyātmam vedyate pratiyogi darśana svabhāvāt tat ca adarśanam anubhava abhyupagame bhāvaḥ eva anupalabhya tve tu janma ādi kīrtanam ākāśa citraṇam sva rūpa janmanorupalambhe tu bhāva vyavahāraḥ prasahya āyātaḥ iti katham asya api virodhi tvam na ca mudgara ādau= api abhāva śabda apravṛttiḥ eva bhāva antara paryudāsena tad siddheḥ 
JŚNĀ_115,2^2	 na ca atiprasaṅgaḥ dhvaṃsa vat yayā hi pratyāsattyā dhvaṃsa ākhyam eva vastu ghaṭasya nivṛttiḥ ucyate tasyāḥ na karpara paridhayoḥ vighātaḥ virodhi tvam api tayoḥ eva ramaṇīyam aṇīyasā api aṃśena darśana ākhyena tayoḥ utkarṣāt tayoḥ satoḥ kumbha abhāva vyavahāraḥ iti asya atiprasaṅga saṅgamāt bhaṅga nimittasya puṣṭa tvāt na ca bhāvaḥ bhāva antara virodhī na bhavati eva katham anyathā go tvam ago tvasya dahanaḥ tuhinasya vā kim ca virodhaḥ api dvividhaḥ prasiddhaḥ tatra rodhaḥ saḥ api saha asthitiḥ yadi tadā bhāva dvayasya eva sā dahana tu hina vat avikala kāraṇasya bhavataḥ anya bhāve abhāvāt hi sahāna sthāna vyavasthānam na ca iyam gatiḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ saṃbhavati iti vyaktam 
JŚNĀ_116,1–116,2	 na ekena anya hatiḥ paraspara parīhāra sthite lakṣaṇe na khalvala akṣaṇika virodhasya sat vastu bādhana vyāpāraḥ kim tu saha anavasthānasya eva lākṣaṇikasya tu dharmayoḥ eva vyavasthānāt vyavasthitaḥ eva vastuni vastunā avastunā vā svarūpa saṃkara vyatikara niṣedhaḥ tatas yathā nīlam anīlam na bhavati ubhayoḥ anyonya svabhāva tvāt tathā kalasa nāśayoḥ api syāt na ca tāvatā iṣṭa siddhiḥ mudga ra sannidhi mātraḥ iva tasya tādavasthyānapāyāt 
JŚNĀ_116,3	 nanu kalasa kuliśa ādau dharmayoḥ eva virodhāt tat adhyāsitasya bheda mātram kalasa nāśau tu bhāva abhāva rūpa tayā svayam viruddhau= iti katham saha syātām na bhāva abhāvayoḥ hi bhavana abhavana rūpa tayā dharmayoḥ eva paraspara parihāraḥ yatas na bhāva adhyāsitasya abhāvaḥ abhāva adhiṣṭhitasya vā bhāvaḥ yatas vā kumbha nabhaḥ ambhoruha ādeḥ na ekatvam kalasa nāśa rūpasya padārtha dvitayasya dharmi rūpasya kva paraspara parihāraḥ virodha mātram tu na vāryate kebalam ekena bhavatā bhavataḥ paribhave sati tāvatā ca saha anavasthāna vyāpāraḥ tasmāt dharmayoḥ eva paraspara parihāraḥ nīla ānīlayoḥ katham iti ced nīla ānīlayoḥ paraspara parihāraḥ iti na eka tvam anayoḥ iti eva arthaḥ tatas dharma virodhaḥ eva anena api prakāreṇa prakāśyate anyathā tuhina hutabhujoḥ iva nīla ānīla vāsasoḥ api militayoḥ anavasthiti prasaṅgaḥ tādātmyam tu tadā api na asti eva 
JŚNĀ_116,4	 deśaḥ api nīlā nīlayoḥ bhinnaḥ eva iti ced kāmam bhinnaḥ na tu vastunoḥ virodhaḥ tāvatā deśa bhedena kṛtārthaḥ anyathā jalajvalanayoḥ api tadvat eva militayoḥ prabandha sthitiḥ prasajyeta sūkṣma deśa parihāreṇa virodhasya phalavat tvāt ataeva viruddha upalabdhau kalpita eka bhāvaḥ sthūlaḥ eva deśaḥ dharmī evam nīlam anīla tvena virudhyate iti api nīlam anīlam na bhavati iti eva arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_116,5	 yadi tu dharmi dharmayoḥ api sākṣāt virodhaḥ syāt tadā yatra dharmiṇī anīla tvam tatra nīla tvam na syāt asti ca yathā ratna antaram tapanīya mātre tathā nāśasya abhāva rūpa dharma mātra tve api bhāva dharmā ghaṭaḥ na āsanna bhāva dharmā ca na san= ityā iva arthaḥ tatas siddhena abhāvena dharmeṇa āsan= eva ghaṭaḥ asan= iti vyavahriyate na tu san= ā iva nivartyate sattā nivartane tu sarvatra saha anavasthāna vyāpāraḥ katham punar ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ dharmaḥ kasya punar asau dharmaḥ astu dharma tvena svīkārāt dharmiṇaḥ avaśyam ākṣepāt kṣmā talasya eva astu iti ced tatas kim bhū talasya eva abhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ 
JŚNĀ_117,1^1	 nanu ghaṭasya nivartya nivarttaka bhāva saṃbaddhaḥ abhāvaḥ bhū talasya dharma mātram ucyate na tu bhū talasya nivartakaḥ iti ced bhavatu bhū talasya anibartakaḥ tad dharmaḥ vā kevalam yathā nīla viruddha ānīla tva yukte bhū tale nīla vastu sthitiḥ aviruddhāḥ tathā ghaṭa viruddha abhimatena abhāvena yukte api ghaṭa sthiteḥ avirodhaḥ syāt tatas abhimāna mātra vyavasthitaḥ eva eṣām nivartya nivartaka bhāvaḥ tasmāt bhū tale kalasasya abhāvaḥ iti bhū tala ādhārasya ghaṭasya saṃbandhi tvena ābhāsayantī vikalpa buddhiḥ abhāvam tad dharma tvena vyavahārayati iti nyāyyam 
JŚNĀ_117,1^2	 adhyavasita apekṣayā tu saṃvāda itarau tat evam paraspara parihāra viruddhaḥ dharmaḥ sva viruddhasya asataḥ eva asattām ātma dharmiṇi vyavahārayati na tu nivartayati iti dharmiṇaḥ bheda vyavahāra hetuḥ eva tathā ca jala anala ādiṣu sparśasya uṣṇa itara tvam dūre api pratyanīka ākāravat tayā anyonya apanayanam anapekṣya sva rūpa vimarśa mātreṇa virodha vyavahāra gocarībhavati saha anavasthānam punar ekena anyasya sattā nivartana darśanāt eva vyavasthāpyate tat yadi saha anavasthānam abhimataḥ virodhaḥ tadā sidhyatu bhāvasya satta upalambhayoḥ nivṛttiḥ kevalam bhāvayoḥ eva asau na bhāva abhāvayoḥ
