JŚNĀ_117,2	 nanu tasmin sati tad nivṛttiḥ itīyatā saha anavasthānam abhimataḥ virodhaḥ tat ca abhāvena api bhāvasya labhyate iti na bhāvayoḥ eva iti yuktaḥ niyamaḥ iti ced uktam atra asmin satī iti eva durlabham abhāve iti kim ca evam abhāva tva samarthanam anupayogi bhāvayoḥ api tad virodhasya avirodhāt mudgarādinā eva virodha siddheḥ ca dhvaṃsasya anupayogāt atha lākṣaṇikaḥ virodhaḥ iṣṭaḥ tadā svarūpa asaṃkareṇa eva tasya kṛtārtha tvāt bhāvasya avasthānam anivāryam 
JŚNĀ_117,3	 kim ca saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇa pakṣe na anutpannena virodhinā paraḥ viroddhavyaḥ śīta hutāśa vat prathamam utpattiḥ tatas vyāpāraḥ vyāpāra pāṭava tāratamya apekṣayā kiyatā api kṣaṇena para uparodhaḥ iti iyantam kālam uparodhāt prāc abhāvena saha saṃvaset atha utpatti kṣaṇaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ tathā api utpadyamānena dhvaṃsena sahakāriṇā bhāvaḥ sva upādeyam bandham ādadhīta tatas nivṛttiḥ iti durnivāraḥ sahabhāvaḥ bandha kṣaṇa ādhāna anapekṣāyām api sva santā nakṣaṇa anantaram nāśanāt kṣaṇam api sahabhāvaḥ siddhaḥ etat ca katham cetanāvataḥ soḍhum śakyam ekasmin= eva kṣaṇe bhāvasya bhāva abhāvau= iti 
JŚNĀ_118,1^1	 api ca saha anavasthāna svīkārāt kṛśānunā śītam iva dhvaṃsam aparam utpādayatā dhvaṃsena api nipādi nivartanīyam iti tena api dhvaṃsam aparam utpādayatā pratiyogī pratihantavyaḥ iti anavasthānāt puruṣa āyuṣa śatena api na kasyacid abhāva vyavahāraḥ syāt atha dvitīyaḥ virodhaḥ tadā yatra bhāvaḥ tatra abhāvasya avakāśaḥ eva na asti ayam eva hi lākṣaṇika virodhasya svabhāvaḥ yat viruddhayoḥ dharmayoḥ anyatara adhiṣṭhite dharmiṇi na itarasya avakāśaḥ iti anutpattiḥ eva dhvaṃsasya atha hetu sāmarthyāt katham abhūtvā āsitum śaknoti iti avaśyam bhāvyam dhvaṃsena iti ced na pramāṇa bādhite arthe hetu sāmarthya kalpanā anupapatteḥ ati prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_118,1^2	 yāvat khalu bhāvasya śvāsaḥ calati na tāvat abhāva gandhaḥ anyathā viruddha abhimatayoḥ dharmayoḥ ekatra dharmiṇi kṣaṇam api saṃbhave kva paraspara parihāra virodhaḥ tathā hi hetu balāt bhavatu nāma sahabhāvaḥ tu vastuni ekatra bhāva abhāvayoḥ duṣpariharaḥ sa hi bhāvaḥ pūrva vyavasthitaḥ na bhavana prayāsa khinnaḥ yat nivarteta mudgara ādeḥ ca dhvaṃsaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ ubhayatra vyāpāre api kim aṅga dhvaṃsena na api dhvaṃsena eva nivartanīyaḥ tasya udayāt pūrvam avyāpārāt tatas bhāvasya sthitiḥ abhāvasya utpattiḥ iti siddhaḥ sahabhāvaḥ gireḥ iva keśariṇā utpadyamānena 
JŚNĀ_118,2–119,2^1	 paścāt tarhi varhiṣā iva indhana dhvaṃsena nirākariṣyate tāvat iti ced bhāva abhāvayoḥ sahabhāva prasaṅga dūṣaṇāt avibhyat abhyasta durnītiḥ uttaram kila vilapati paścāt vidhvaṃsena bhāvaḥ nirākariṣyate na vā bhāva abhāvayoḥ tu sahabhāvaḥ prasaktaḥ iti eva pakṣa kṣatiḥ āyātāḥ kim apara gaveṣaṇena yadi ca vyavasthitaḥ bhāvaḥ tena dhvaṃsena dhvaṃsanīyaḥ tadā vyakta mayam saha anavasthāna virodha vyāpāraḥ iti prakṛta kṣatiḥ paraspara parihāra virodhaḥ hi vicārayitum upakrāntaḥ 
JŚNĀ_118,2–119,2^2	 tatas prakaraṇa vismaraṇāt vyutthāpayati adya api paraspara parihāra virodha abhimataḥ tadā na vyavasthita apanayana vyāpāraḥ spraṣṭavyaḥ iti drādhīyānasahabhāvaḥ saṃprati sva hetu bala avalambinoḥ kalasa nāśayoḥ upanatau bhāva abhāvau ca ekatra dharmiṇi dhīyete ciram iti paryavasitam virodha kathayā atha dhvaṃsena sva udayāt prāk eva bhāvaḥ nirbadhyamānaḥ nivartate pravartate ca anantaram dhvaṃsaḥ iti na ukta doṣaḥ na ca eṣa vyāpāraḥ sahānabasthānasya iti ced na śakyam evam vyavasthite hi vastuni paścāt pravartamānaḥ api dhvaṃsa ātmā tasya kiṅkaraḥ apravṛtteyataḥ tu asmin vastu eva balavattaram 
JŚNĀ_119,3	 vyāpāraḥ tu yathā na eṣa saha anavasthānasya tathā paraspara parihārasya api iti niveditam etat na api bhaviṣyataḥ kācid śaktiḥ svayam eva tarhi nivartatām evam sati kim atra anyena dhvaṃsena mudgareṇa vā tad sannidhāna apekṣāyām ca svayaṃśabda arthaḥ riktaḥ yathā bījam apekṣya svayam eva jāyate aṅkuraḥ iti na tāvatā tad prayukta tva parihāraḥ atha parihāraḥ eva tadā tat apekṣya iti na vaktavyam tāvatā ca siddham sādhyam iti anena kim iha kartavyam dhvaṃsa mudgara ādikam anapekṣya svayam eva bhāvaḥ nitratate iti prāk api nivṛtti siddhiḥ vastu mātra anubandhī ca dhvaṃsaḥ nibandhana antara nirapekṣaḥ iti saha sthāna abhāvaḥ yadi tava virodhaḥ artha vipadoḥ saha sthāna āsaṅgam kṣaṇam api yathā śīta śikhinoḥ saha dhvaṃsaḥ dhvaṃsa antaram upanayan saṃprati bhavet virodhī saḥ api anyam kṣayam iti na nāśaḥ katham api atha anyonya abhāva prakṛtika tayā arthe sati tadā kṣayasya eva abhāvaḥ saha bhavatu vā hetu balataḥ anena dhvaṃsena prakṛti hatiḥ asya tu anudaye balīyān eva arthaḥ svayam apacaye anyena kim iha iti saṃgraha ślokau 
JŚNĀ_120,1	 etena yat śaṅkarasya abhavana utpatti vidhānena katham bhāvasya niṣedhaḥ iti ced abhavana utpatteḥ eva saha sthiti virodhena bhāva pratiṣedha rūpa tvāt iti evam prakāram abhidhānam tad virodha bodha vaidhuryādi yuktam iti darśitam atas eva abhāva utpatti vidhānena ca bhāvasya tādavasthya prasaṅgaḥ iti pramatta bhāṣitam iti abhidadhānaḥ sphuṭa mayam tapasvī prativāta kṣipta bhasmanā ātmānam eva cchurayati iti mahā moham agna tayā kṛpā pātram mahatām avagantavyaḥ yadi evam bhavatām api abhāvaḥ vyavahriyate sa kiṃsvabhāvaḥ yadi na vastu bhāvena vā satyam na virudhyate eva ayam katham vā virodha dvaya vyavasthā kaḥ vā asya hetuḥ kādācitka tve akādācitka tve ca bhāvasya sama kālam katham na vyavahriyate katham vā prāk iva paścāt api na kṣaṇa paramparā prasavaḥ prasave ca na sahaḥ saha anavasthāna virodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_120,2–120,4	 paraspara parihāraḥ api bhāva abhāvayoḥ abhāvasya avastu tvena avāstavaḥ prāptaḥ iti ced yatas evam para matam vicāra kṣamam tasmāt pracyuti mātrakam vyavahṛteḥ pātram prasajya āhvayam bhūyas arthasya virudhyate na tu janiḥ tasya iti kim hetunā rodhāt eva sakṛt na tad vyavahṛtiḥ hetu kṣayāt na udayaḥ rodhaḥ tāttvikaḥ eva tāttvika mithas svābhāvya bhaṅga sthiteḥ bhāva pracyuti mātram prasajya pratiṣedha saṃjñakam iti svarūpa nirdeśaḥ tatra pratiṣedhe pratiṣedham eva vastu icchanti iti pracyuti mātram uktam pracyutiḥ nāma kiṃsvid tṛtīyaḥ bhāva niṣedhaḥ iti śaṅkāyām prasajya āhvayam iti uktam tat ca tathā vyavahāra mātra viṣayaḥ na punar anubhava viṣayaḥ anyathā vastu eva syāt 
JŚNĀ_120,5	 na ca yat kiñcid vyavahriyate vikalpa buddhyā tāvat vastu kharaśṛṅga ādeḥ api vastu tva prasaṅgāt nirvastuka vikalpa vyavasthā anupapatteḥ ca tat ca abhāvasya bhūtyā dharmeṇa virudhyate eva iti dvitīya praśna visarjanam bhūtiḥ ca satta artha sāmarthyam sva rūpeṇa avasthānam vā ubhayathā api anyonya pratyanīka rūpa tayā pracyuti mātreṇa virudhyate iti paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa virodha vyavasthā uktāḥ 
JŚNĀ_121,1	 nanu pracyuti mātram na kiñcid tat ca katham kenacid birudhyate yatas eva pracyuti mātram na kiñcid bhāvaḥ tu nañartha pratyanīkaḥ tatas eva virudhyate virodhaḥ api eṣa na anyonya pratighātaḥ sattā anavasthāna vat kim tu anyonya rūpa an anupraveśa mātram tat ca vikalpita anubhūtayoḥ api asti iti na doṣaḥ pracyuti mātrasya ca kadācid bhāva tva abhāvāt kim hetunā iti caturthe visarjanam kenacid rūpeṇa unmajjataḥ hi janakaḥ kalpyeta akādācitkam ca sarvadā asti vā na asti vā tatra asti pakṣa kṣepāt sarvadā na asti eva tat vyavahāraḥ tu kādācid kaḥ bhāva kāle tad apravṛtteḥ katham virodhāt eva bhāva virodhaḥ hi abhāvaḥ pracyuti svabhāvaḥ kalpanā viparivartī katham bhāva kāle vyavahriyate bhavana dharmāḥ hi nirhetukaḥ vā bhavana hetu janitaḥ vā hetu antara kṛtaḥ vā bhāva kāle api bhavet nāma bhāva anvayam ca vyavahāram asya āsādayet yadā tu na asya bhāvaḥ na tadā bhāva anuyāyī vyavahāraḥ vāsanā anugaḥ tu virodhaḥ niścayavataḥ vastu darśane vāsanā prabodha vaidhuryāt katham pravarteta 
JŚNĀ_121,2	 ataeva yāvat saḥ eva vastu ātmā asti iti vyavasāyaḥ tāvat anavakāśaḥ eva abhāva vyavahāraḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga bhāve api tattvataḥ yadā tu pramāṇa balāt eka kṣaṇa sthita dharmā eva bhāva svabhāvaḥ iti avadhārayati tadā dvitīye kṣaṇe tad vastu upādeya kṣaṇa sama kālam tad abhāvam vyavaharati tad pramāṇa alābhe tu karpara ādi vikāra darśanam apekṣya eva abhāva vyavahārāḥ iti pañcame visarjanam ṣaṣṭhe api hetu kṣayāt na udayaḥ sajātī yakṣaṇa dhārāyāḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_121,3–122,4	 etat uktam svarasa nirodheṣu pūrva pūrva kṣaṇeṣu mudgara sahakāriṇā kṣaṇena sāmagrīvaisadṛśyāt bandhi a kṣaṇasya utpādanāt upādānam kṣīṇam iti na aparasya utpattiḥ yad kṛte ca kasyacid bandhi akṣaṇa ādhāne sajātī yakṣaṇa antara apratisandhānam saḥ api bhāvaḥ tasya bhāvasya virodhī siddhaḥ iti saha anavasthāna virodha vyavasthā tena eva saptame api caturtha pādena yadi nāma vastu avastunoḥ paraspara parihāraḥ virodhaḥ tathā api na tāttvika tva hāniḥ na hi tayoḥ kadācid svabhāvasā aṅkaryam asti etāvān eva dharma virodhasya arthaḥ ataeva sthiti grahaṇam niyama sūcana param etena tṛtīyaḥ api vikalpaḥ nirastaḥ tasmāt nāśaḥ nāma na prasajya ātmā kartavya rūpaḥ yatas hetu sāpekṣaḥ syāt na api etāvanti dūṣaṇāni iti sthitam kim ca arthasya vinaśvaretaratayoḥ kim nāśane kāraṇaiḥ svayam vinaśvara svabhāvasya utpattau vaiyarthyam anartha hetūnām avinaśvara svabhāva tve tu asāmarthyam evam tarhi bhaviṣṇu tā itaratayoḥ kim kāraṇaiḥ janmani śakyam hi vaktum arthasya bhaviṣṇu tāyām vyarthāḥ janma hetavaḥ abhaviṣṇu tāyāmasamarthāḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_122,5^1	 tathā ca nyāya bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ tat na hetuvāda uccheda prasaṅgāt vikalpasya sarvatra saṃbhavāt tathā hi hetutaḥ kim bhavana svabhāvaḥ bhavatu āhosvit abhavana svabhāvaḥ iti yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā svayam eva bhavati tad svabhāva tvāt iti vyarthaḥ hetuḥ dvitīya pakṣe tu asamarthaḥ na hi abhavana svabhāvam śaśa viṣāṇa ādi kenacid utpādayitum śakyam tathā ccheda dāha ādi hetavaḥ api tad svabhāva tvāt tad svabhāva tva atad svabhāva tva pakṣayoḥ vaiyarthya asāmarthyābhyām anupapannāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ tathā ca evam hetuṣu sarva hetu pratikṣepa saṃbhavāt mokṣa ādau prayāsaḥ śāstra śravaṇāt vyarthaḥ iti atra ayam paryanuyujyate kim anena mūle paraśu nipāta prakāreṇa sarvathā kvacid api hetu tayā upanīte asāmarthya vaiyarthya lakṣaṇam dūṣaṇam eva na vācyam iti ucyate 
JŚNĀ_122,5^2	 tat tāvat ayuktam dṛśyate hi nakha= chedye kuṭhāra vaiyarthyam kuṭhāra= chedye ca nakhasya asāmarthyam tathā devadattena eva yat sādhyam tatra deva datta sahāyasya yajñadattasya vyāpāra vaiyarthyam tad vinākṛtasya punar asāmarthyam dahana indhana sāmagryām satyām rāsabhasya dhūme vaiyarthyam asati āma sāmarthyam yatra vā siddha sādhana poṣaṇam tatra vaiyarthyam asiddha viruddha anaikāntikeṣu anyatama sattve asāmarthyam iti ye tu siddha sādhanasya api eteṣu antarbhāvam icchanti tad prayāsa phalam na kiñcid vaiyarthyasya hetu dūṣaṇasya sarvathā aśakya apahnava tvāt jñāpaka hetoḥ api pratītim prati kāraka tvāt ca yadi ca asāmarthya vaiyarthyam adūṣaṇam hetoḥ anyat ūṣaṇa abhāvāt sarvasya sarva siddhiḥ yatas kutaścid 
JŚNĀ_123,1–123,2	 atha tad svabhāvā tad svabhāva vikalpa dvārakam dūṣaṇam asat iti ucyate tat api asat pradīpe hi yaḥ hetuḥ prakāśa karaṇe andhakāra kāraṇe vā upanīyate sa kim vaiyarthya asāmarthyābhyām na nigṛhyate yat punar ayam eva āha prakāśa ādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ api ayuktaḥ tathā hi na tāvat asmad mate pradīpa prakāśa ādīnām ekatvam siddham na api eka hetu tvam dravya utpatti anantaram hi sāmagryantarataḥ prakāśa ādayaḥ guṇāḥ utpadyante iti naḥ siddhānte iti tat api asambaddham yatas yadi api dravya utpatti anantaram prakāśaḥ guṇaḥ utpannaḥ tathā api tat eva dravyam utpannam na tad rūpa niṣpattau hetu antaram apekṣate paścāt vā prakāśaḥ guṇaḥ na prakāśa guṇa rūpa tve iti na dṛṣṭānta kṣatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_123,3	 atha dravya rūpam api dravya tva sāmānyāt tad samavāyāt pūrvam na dravyam na adravyam iti ced tat tarhi dravya rūpam dravya tva sāmānyāt jñāyate atha dravyam iti vikalpa vacasoḥ vā gocarībhavati iti pakṣaḥ prathama pakṣe tāvat na doṣaḥ sāmānyāt eva dravyam jāyatām yatas kutaścid yena ātmanā jātam na punar tad bhāve hetu antaram apekṣate iti hi prakṛtam dvitīya pakṣe api sutarām na doṣaḥ dravya rūpam hi jātam eva prāk api dravya dhī dhvani prasavaḥ eva sāmānyāt na ca etāvatā tad bhāve hetu antaram apekṣitam bhavati na hi kāryeṇa kāraṇasya sva viṣaya sāmarthya vyavahāre prāc aniṣpannam eva tad sāmarthyam tad bhāve vā kāraṇam tat eva kāryam hetu antaram apekṣita vat 
JŚNĀ_123,4	 kim ca bhinnena paścāt jāyamānena api prakāśa guṇena yadā tāvat prakāśa guṇa yuktaḥ saṃpannaḥ dīpaḥ tadā kim punar tad bhāve hetu antaram apekṣate yatas dṛṣṭānta kṣatiḥ syāt tat na prakriyā poṣaṇa trāṇam apramāṇa parāyaṇena anubhava anurodhena tu yathā abhimatam eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ na hi prathama dvitīya kṣaṇayoḥ sāmānya yoga ayogābhyām viśeṣa pratītiḥ asti na api dravya sāmānyayoḥ bheda anubhavaḥ iti prakṛtasya tu anyathā api siddheḥ na atra nirbandhaḥ tasmāt na prakāśaḥ sva hetoḥ prakāśa rūpa niṣpannaḥ tad bhāve hetu antaram apekṣate vaiyarthyāt andhakārīkaraṇe api asāmarthyāt iti siddham 
JŚNĀ_124,1	 nanu śulkam ambaram rāga dravya yogena raktī kriyamāṇam upalabdham tatra rakta svabhāva asvabhāva tve vastrasya vaiyarthya asāmarthye codyam rāga dravyasya kim na upakramyate iti ced na khalu asya vikalpasya sarvatra avatāraḥ vivakṣitaḥ kim tu tad svabhāvā tad svabhāva vikalpa dvārakam api dūṣaṇam hetoḥ asti tāvat iti atyanta ayoga niṣedhaḥ upakrāntaḥ tatas yatra etat dūṣaṇam upapādayitum śakyate tatra dūṣaṇa bhāvam āviśati kim anya cintayā yadi yukti bhedaḥ tathā ca vinaśvara tvam nāma kṣaṇika tvam kanīyaḥ kāla tvam vā avinaśvara tvam api drādhīyasā kālena sat āsthāyitayā vā sarvathā yāvat kāla avasthitikaḥ bhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ udapādi tad abhyantare yadi kenacid nāśyeta tadā yāvat kāla avasthitiḥ eva na utpannaḥ na hi saṃvatsara sthāyī ca asau divasa nāśī ca iti svabhāva dvayam paraspara viruddham asya sādhu 
JŚNĀ_124,2^1	 nanu vināśa kāraṇam antareṇa saṃvatsara sthāyī avāntaram tu vināśa kāraṇa samavadhāne avāntara nāśī iti kaḥ virodhaḥ virodhaḥ eva niścaye hi yadi artha anupraveśaḥ na svabhāve yathā yadi atra patra pāte dhūmaḥ saṃbhavet niyatam iyam aṅgārāḥ anyathā tu guñjā puñjaḥ iti na svabhāva bhedaḥ tathā yadi divase vinaśyati tad avadhikam eva hetunā janitam saṃvatsara nāśe tu tat avadhikam iti bhavatu na tu paraspara virodhi svarūpe dvitīyasya ekatra samuccayaḥ na hi tatra ahani vinaśyan= eva saṃvatsara sthāyī ardha ardhena vā tat ubhayam bhavitum arhati 
JŚNĀ_124,2^2	 vikalpaḥ tu saṃśaya ātmā jñānasya eva na vastunaḥ dharmaḥ tasmāt vastu eka svabhāvam eva na viruddha svabhāva antara yogi etat ca divasa ādi sthāyi tvam pramāṇena nirūpaṇam arhati satyam na vā iti abhyupagamya tu cintitam etat pramāṇa vyāhate hetu sāmarthya āśrayaṇasya durlabha tvāt tatas yat yakṣaṇika tā api tathā api yāvān asya kālaḥ sthiteḥ avadhiḥ tad abhyantare hetu antarasya asāmarthyam tasya purastāt vaiyarthyam iti sthitam kṣaṇika tve api na tad kṣaṇe nāśa kāraṇena kiñcid śakyam iti vyaktam kṣaṇa antare tu svayam eva na asti iti na arthaḥ anartha hetunā sadātane tu asamarthaḥ eva ayam 
JŚNĀ_124,3	 tasmāt vināśe kartavye na kaścid hetuḥ asāmarthya vaiyarthya dūṣaṇam atikrāmati yadā artha antare tu karpara ādau saḥ eva mudgaraḥ tābhyām dūṣaṇābhyām na lipyate tad vyāpāra anantaram eva janma lābhāt karparasya evam rāga dravyasya api tad vyāpāra antaram udaya bhāji rakta vāsasi na sāmarthya vaiyarthyam pāṇḍu caṇḍātaka nivartane punar kaḥ tat nivartayati yadā api daśā dvaye ekam eva vastra vastu tadā api tad doṣān ativṛttiḥ eva na hi rakta avasthāyām api śubhram eva tat iti nirvahati tatas yadi tadā api śubhram eva tat vastu na rakta tāyāḥ avakāśaḥ iti asamartham rāga dravyam pūrva rakte tu tanmātra rāga apekṣāyām vyartham tasmāt sthairya apekṣayā doṣa avatārāt samaya aparādhaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ na vastunaḥ pūrvasya svarasa nirodhe tad upādāna apekṣayā rāga dravyeṇa apūrva rakta vastra utpādane tad doṣasya parihāra siddheḥ na evam vastu sthitiḥ iti ced nanu tat eva cintyate kīdṛśī vastu sthitiḥ iti kim atra kośa pānena paraḥ pratyāyanīyaḥ tat kim akāṇḍena evam vastu sthitiḥ iti ucyate pratyabhijñā prāmāṇya avalambanasya nirasta tvāt 
JŚNĀ_125,1^1	 nanu samaya aparādhaḥ api katham abhidhīyate vyavasthite dharmiṇi guṇa dvayasya tirobhāva āvirbhāva svīkārāt yadi evam tadā prācīna guṇa nirākaraṇe asāmarthya vaiyarthya prāptau= api apūrva rakta tā guṇa utpādanena eva caritārthaḥ rāga dravya vyāpāraḥ iti katham ukta dūṣaṇa sparśaḥ pūrva niṣpanna rūpa apekṣayā hi vaiyarthya asāmarthya cintā prakrāntāḥ na apūrva apekṣayā na hi apūrve api kartavye yadi evam rūpam sva hetoḥ jātam tadā vaiyarthyam evam jāte tu asāmarthyam iti nirṇaya avakāśaḥ na aśanīyaḥ ca sarvaḥ pūrva siddhaḥ eva bhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_125,1^2–125,2	 sa ca vinaśvara itarayoḥ prakāra antara tiraskārāt anyatara svarūpam anativartamānaḥ na vināśa hetoḥ kalpitasya asāmarthyam ānarthakyam vā sthātum prabhavati na ca evam hetuvāda uccheda prasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ asiddhe hi kārye hetoḥ āśrayaṇam siddhe ca iyam cintā tadā eva ca yadi hetoḥ evaṃrūpaḥ niṣpannaḥ iti hetu puraskāreṇa eva vāda pravṛtteḥ na ca evam asiddhe śakyam iti uktam tat katham prakṛtā asmad vikalpasya sarvatra saṃbhavaḥ vikalpa mātrasya sarvatra hetu phala saṃmate saṃbhave api na asmadīya yukteḥ aparādha bodhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati yadi tu siddhe api vastuni vyāpaka svabhāva dvaye asāmarthya vaiyarthya avatāre a pi hetu antaram apekṣamāṇam upadarśayitum śakyate syāt aparādhaḥ na ca evam tasmāt vikalpa mātrasya aparādhe api na aparādhaḥ sa viśeṣaṇasya anupalambha vat iti vyarthaḥ tanmātra upanyāsaḥ 
JŚNĀ_126,1^1	 atha anupalambha mātrasya sva sādhya sādhana sāmarthya śūnyatā eva aparādhaḥ vikalpa mātrasya punar asāmarthya vaiyarthya ullekha śekharasya na hetu vāda apavāda śakti śūnyatā iti viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ aho puruṣakāraḥ bhasma bhūṣaṇasya ! evam hi sarvathā hetu phalā palāpe sādhu sādhitam dhvaṃsasya hetumat tvam iti vyaktam ayam ātmānam ātmanā eva viḍambayati tat ayam bhavana svabhāva ādi vikalpaḥ saṃkalpa niveśita śaktiḥ api viṣaye ca parihāryaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavasthitena anyathā mūla ucchedāt prakaraṇa pravṛtteḥ siddha upādhiḥ tu vikalpaḥ vināśa karaṇam eva kavalayati na kāraṇa mātram atiprasaṅga bhaṅga bhīruṇā tu bhavatā na ādriyate iti yuktam eva etat tasmāt hantu hetu phale śramaḥ ayam aphalaḥ saṃsthāpya sāmānyatas tattvam kvāpi vimarśaḥ eva viṣaye prārambha saṃbhāvitaḥ prārambhaḥ upakramaḥ prastāvaḥ tena saṃbhāvitaḥ ādṛtaḥ 
JŚNĀ_126,1^2	 sāmānyena kārya kāraṇa bhāva sattām vyavasthāpya vināśa ādau viṣaya viśeṣe kvacid hetu sattā kim astu navā iti atra vimarśaḥ eṣaḥ asmadīyaḥ prastāva anurūpaḥ hetu phala unmūlanāya tu viphalaḥ prayāsaḥ sāmānyena vyavasthāpya eva prakaraṇa pravṛtteḥ na ca ayam vikalpaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva kṣepāya kṣamaḥ bhavana svabhāvaḥ abhavana svabhāvaḥ vā hetutaḥ bhavati iti tathā hi abhavana dharmā tāvat bandhyā prasūti iti bhavana svabhāvaḥ ca tvad matena gagana ādeḥ abhavanasya kadācid api abhāvāt tayoḥ tāvat asāmarthya vaiyarthya grastaḥ bhavati hetu vyāpāraḥ kādācid kam bhāvam bhavana dharmāṇam abhavana dharmakam vā brūhi na punar ayam kiñcid anapekṣamāṇaḥ kādācid kaḥ eva bhavitum arhati yaḥ ca apekṣaḥ arthaḥ kāla deśa svabhāva niyamāya saḥ eva hetuḥ atha bhavana svabhāvaḥ iti na sattā dharmā kim tu utpatti dharmā iti vivakṣitam tadā api utpattiḥ iti asataḥ ātma lābhaḥ na kādācid ka tvāt anyaḥ iti tadvat eva uttaram vināśasya tu kādācid katva niṣedhaḥ uktaḥ 
JŚNĀ_126,2	 atha hetutaḥ bhavana dharmāḥ yaḥ sa kim bhavati itaraḥ vā iti vikalpa arthaḥ tadā ādya vikalpaḥ eva viśrāntaḥ vādaḥ tathā hi hetutaḥ bhavati na pūrvam iti na vaiyarthyam bhavati hetutaḥ na anyatas bhavati iti kutas asāmarthyam atra ca nirbandhaḥ bandhyaḥ iti diś mātram abhidhīyate ubhayoḥ siddha tvāt hetu phala bhāvasya aprastuta tvāt ca yatas ca ayam siddha upādhikaḥ vikalpaḥ sannāśasya eva hetoḥ bādhakaḥ na asat utpādakasya asamāna tvāt nyāyasya yathoktam prāk tatas cheda dāha ādi hetavaḥ rakta dukūla kāraṇa vat upapannāḥ eva mokṣa ākhya daśā viśeṣa hetuḥ ca iti saphalaḥ eva tatra prayāsaḥ tasmāt na sataḥ nāśa hetuḥ kaścid sva hetutaḥ eva tāvat deśa ākāra vat kāla tayā api niṣpattiḥ 
JŚNĀ_127,1–127,3^1	 kim ca dhvaṃsaḥ vā astu vidheḥ balāt parigha vat yat vā yathā śarkarā bhāvaḥ asau tad avasthaḥ eva tu na yat kiñcitkarāḥ tasya te vyāpāra aviratiḥ tatas kṣaṇi naye dattvā ādabandhyam katham deśa ākāra vat asya hetu niyataḥ kālaḥ api yasmāt mataḥ yathā hi mudgaraḥ śarkarā nikaraḥ vā yaḥ tasmāt syāt mataḥ nāśa hetoḥ anupapatteḥ na utpattiḥ nāśasya iti uktam astu vā nāśa abhidhānam artha antaram kāraṇa balāt daṇḍa vat śarkarā rakta tā nāśe api koṣa antarakam adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhatu santu bhāvāḥ tad avasthāḥ eva na hi te tasya kiñcitkarāḥ yathā hi mudgaraḥ śarkarā nikaraḥ vā tasya akiñcitkaraḥ anyathā nāśa abhyupagamaverthya prasaṅgāt tathā nāśaḥ api sthitimati bhāve sva kāraṇāt utpadyamānaḥ tasya kim aṅga kartum asam arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_127,3^2	 yathā hi tasya hetu bala bhāvinaḥ na sarvathā nāśaḥ śakyaḥ vā sāmarthya vaiyarthyābhyām tathā anurūpa aṃśe nāśaḥ api aśakyaḥ eva tatra api svabhāva bhede pūrvavat = aśvara itara vikalpasya avatāra vāraṇa abhāvāt niraṃśe api ca vastuni kalpanā anurodhāt etat ucyate tattvataḥ tu aṃśa na aśane api sarvathā nāśaḥ eva sa ca aśakyaḥ iti sādhitam apūrva nirvartanam vastunaḥ tu vāryate tatas yaḥ api apūrvaḥ pūrvavat koṣa antara tirohitaḥ kalpam āstām tad kṛtaḥ vā punar aparaḥ nāśa abhidhānaḥ arthaḥ tat vat astu na tu bhāvasya kiñcid iti sva jñāna janana jala dhāraṇa ādi vyāpāra anuparama prasaṅgaḥ durnivāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_128,1	 etena yat avocat vācaspatiḥ nanu asmin= utpanne api bhinna mūrtau kim āyātam bhāvasya na kiñcid āyātam astu ayam āyuṣmān bhāvaḥ sva kāraṇa adhīna janmanā tad abhāvena tad svarūpa viraha lakṣaṇena sva lakṣaṇa śālinā artha anurūpa vyavahāram pravartayatā nirasta samasta artha kriyā kim naḥ chinnam iti tat apahastitam samasta artha kriyā nirasanasya eva tad avasthe tasmin= aśakya sādhana tvāt 
JŚNĀ_128,2	 tad abhāvena eva tādavasthya khaṇḍanam iti ced nanu bhāve tāvat tad avasthaḥ eva sva kāraṇa prabhāvāt abhāvaḥ jātaḥ tatas vyāvṛttya tad khaṇḍanam anena kartavyam iti sama samayatā prasaṅgaḥ prācīnaḥ duṣpariharaḥ tathā ca sati tad svarūpa viraha lakṣaṇena iti anupapannam na hi tad viraha rūpa tve tad kālasaṃbhavaḥ nāma tatas mudgara ādi padārtha antara sādhāraṇasya abhāva saṃjñā karaṇe nābhimata sva lakṣaṇa śālita abhivyakti siddhiḥ yatas tad anurūpa vyavahāra pravartanam abhidhīyamānam śobheta tena ca svarūpasya artha kriyāyām tādavasthyasya ca ākhaṇḍanam iti paraspara ākarṣī nāśa antara karaṇa prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_128,3	 svayaṃnivṛtti rūpa tayā na nāśa antara avakāśaḥ iti ced na samāna kāla saṃbhavāt nivṛtti rūpa tāyāḥ pratikṣipta tvāt padārtha antara vat paryudastam eva rūpam avaśiṣyate tena ca vināśena niyatam para bhūta vināśa ākhya vastu karaṇam mudgareṇa iva kaḥ hi viśeṣaḥ asya tad paryudasta rūpa tvena mudgarāt yat ayam param anapekṣamāṇaḥ eva nāśayati mudgaraḥ tu enam anapekṣamāṇaḥ nāśaḥ iti syāt vināśa saṃjñā karaṇa pratilambhaḥ tu bhavet tām antareṇa tasya api mudgarāda viśeṣāt ākāra bheda mātrasya maṇi mantra ādiṣu api bhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_128,4–129,1	 yadi tu pratyakṣa anupalambham śakti sādhanam eka niyatam bhavet bhavet viśeṣaḥ tat ca na asti iti pratipāditam tasmāt prasajya pakṣe asti na tulya kāla tā na paryudāse para nāśa varjanam sthite anyat anyatrabhavat bhavet sakṛt niyogataḥ anyakṣaṇa tā anurodhini iti saṃgrahaḥ sthite api hetau bhavat ekadā na ced prayojanam tad kṣaṇa bhaṅga saṃbhavāt sthitena kim vyomni samakṣaṇam phalam phalena nāśaḥ api yathā eva lakṣayet iti antaraślokaḥ yadi tu nāśa ākhyam kāryam na tasya nivartakam kim tu anyat eva daṇḍa ādi tadā bhāvaḥ ca nivartate abhāvaḥ ca pravartate iti bhavati kāla bhedaḥ kim tu na upayogaḥ nāśasya na api tad abhāvena nirasta samasta artha kriyaḥ iti vācyam asāmarthya vaiyarthyam ca prastutam tatas api riktā iyam vācoyuktiḥ 
JŚNĀ_129,2^1	 yat punar atra tena utprekṣitam yathā uktam sva hetutaḥ bhāvaḥ naśvaraḥ anaśvaraḥ vā jāyate iti tatra ucyate na vayam vinaśvaram avinaśvaram vā jānīmaḥ kim tu santaḥ sva hetubhyaḥ jāyante dhvaṃsante ca hetu antarebhyaḥ sva pratyaya adhīna sannidhānebhyaḥ dhvaṃsaḥ ca dhvaṃsamānāt bhinnaḥ hetu bhedataḥ svabhāva bhedāt ca iti tatra api ucyate yadi naśvarān aśvara svarūpam avidvān eva bhavān evam āha tadā kva nāśaḥ nāma padārthaḥ kutas vā vyāvṛttyā bhavati vyavasthāpyaḥ yaḥ dhvaṃsamānāt bhinnaḥ saṃprati eva pratijñātaḥ saḥ idānīm vinaśva rāvinaśvara svarūpā parijñānena vyavasthāpyamānaḥ ākāśa ādiṣu api kim na vyavasthāpyate 
JŚNĀ_129,2^2	 teṣu nāśā darśanāt iti ced nanu anyatra api nāśaḥ nāma dṛśyate iti śapatha gamyam etat tatas vinaśvaretara svabhāva āviṣkaraṇam bhavataḥ prasahya āyātam kim atra śapathena tathā ca sati sva hetoḥ eva tat atad rūpa janmani niyata avatāram asāmarthya vaiyarthya dūṣaṇam paśyataḥ api tatra hetu antara pratijñānam katham iti vayam api na jānīmaḥ atha idam ākūtam vaidarbhya garbhayā girā pratyakṣatas eva kutaścid utpādaḥ kutaścid nāśaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ vinaśva retara vikalpena katham apohitum śakyaḥ na hi pratyakṣa siddham vikalpa śatena api śātayitum śakyam sarva pramāṇa vyāpārasya pratyakṣaḥ eva viśrāmāt iti 
JŚNĀ_130,1–130,3^1	 tatra api nāśaḥ iti yadi padārtha antaram sva samaya prasiddham ucyate yaḥ mudgara ādi janmā ghaṭa ādi padārtham arthaḥ kadarthayati tasya janma vyāpārau pratyakṣa gocarau= iti mahat sāhasam iti upapāditam prāk tat katham na vikalpa avakāśaḥ atha naśyataḥ svayam eva rūpam bheda antara pratikṣepeṇa tanmātra jijñāsāyām pṛthak iva ādarśyamānaḥ nāśaḥ abhipretaḥ tathā ca dhvaṃsante hetu antarebhyaḥ iti abhītvā eva uktam evam tarhi daṇḍa ādibhyaḥ kuṇḍa ādayaḥ vinaśyanti na svayam iti siddhānta niṣṭhāyām dhvaṃsaḥ ca nirasta samasta artha kriyaḥ iti api supta vilapitam eva 
JŚNĀ_130,1–130,3^2	 tat kim anayā vācaspatiḥ abhipraiti iti na vidmaḥ evam tarhi yāvati pratyakṣa vyāpāraḥ tāvataḥ api katham apahnavaḥ kiyati ca asau pratyakṣa vyāpāraḥ utpadyamāne ca hetu antarāt hetu antarāt nirudhyamāne ca bhāvetat utpatti hetoḥ vināśa hetuḥ anyaḥ iti siddham na ca nāśaḥ nāma anyaḥ yatas pratyakṣa gocara codya avakāśaḥ iti dhik etat ! vināśasya bhāvāt ananya tve tad hetūḥ bhāva hetuḥ eva bhāva hetuḥ eva na bhāva utpatti hetuḥ tat katham utpatti hetoḥ anyaḥ vināśa hetuḥ katham ca pūrva niṣpannasya paścāt tanaḥ hettuḥ pūrva para bhāvaḥ ca ayam adhyakṣa siddhaḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_130,4^1	 kim ca utpadyamānam nirudhyamānam ca vastu ekam anekam vā eka tvam tāvat viruddha dharma adhyāsāt ayuktam atha pratyakṣeṇa tathā vyavasthānāt kim kurmam iti ced eka pratyakṣeṇa ekadā eka ādhārayoḥ upalabdhau sādhuḥ avirodhaḥ nīla caturasra tā vat yadā tu bhinna kālam adhyakṣa dvayam ekaika rūpa grāhi tadā pratyabhijñāna mātram eva miśrayati tat ca apramāṇam iti uktam tatas viddha dharma adhyāsāt bhedaḥ eva ekatra tu kṣaṇe vibhāga abhāvāt na virodhaḥ vyāvṛtti bheda mātreṇa ekatra bhāvāt tathā hi saḥ eva bhāva kṣaṇaḥ prāc abhāvāt utpadyamānaḥ ucyate paścāt bhāvāt nirudhyamānaḥ ucyate kṣaṇa paramparā vyāpini api vastuni evam asti iti ced na vyāpaka dvāreṇa virodhasya eva siddheḥ prathama kṣaṇe api utpadyamānaḥ bhāvaḥ vā bhāvi kṣaṇa antara avasthānena vyāptaḥ na prācīna avasthitim kṣaṇam api spṛśati nirudhyamānaḥ ca asau cara makṣaṇe prācyakṣaṇa antara avasthānena vyāptaḥ na ca bhāvinīm avasthitim kṣaṇam api spṛśati iti virodhaḥ eva kṣaṇe punar ekasmin= eṣa vibhāgaḥ iti vyāvṛtti mātra bhedaḥ na virodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_130,4^2	 tasmāt kṣaṇa dvayam api sthiti vivakṣāyām udaya nidhana dharmayoḥ virodha at na eka tvam aneka tva pakṣe ca prācīnam vastu mudgara ādi parigaṇita vināśa hetu vyatirekeṇa api nirudhyamānam sva hetoḥ eva niyata kāla sthiti dāna sāmarthyam uddopayati iti na vināśa hetuḥ kaścid atha aparigaṇitāḥ eva vināśa hetavaḥ tatra durupalakṣaḥ kaścid hetuḥ anirjñāyamānaḥ sva nibandhanam nidhanam ādadhīta iti kim ayuktam evam tarhi pratikṣaṇam api vināśa saṃbhāvanāyāḥ na pracyutiḥ iti vyartham vināśa hetu vyavasthāpanam 
JŚNĀ_130,4^3	 parigaṇitasya hi bhūyas lakṣaṇasya hetoḥ prasiddha pradhvaṃsa lakṣaṇāt prāc abhāva niścayena vināśa vyavasthā mābhūt iti sa hetuka tvam vināśasya sādhayitum ārabdham sūkṣma tayā tu durupalakṣaṇasya api hetoḥ svīkāre prayatna vaiyarthyam āyātam iti alam mithyā vikalpena tasmāt sthitimati vastuni sarvasya akiñcitkara tva pratipādanāt santaḥ sva hetubhyaḥ jāyante dhvaṃsante ca hetu antarebhyaḥ iti artha padam etat tat kutas idam maṇi mantra auṣadham indrajālam bhāvena śikṣitam yat ayam avikalāni adarśana pratyayaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva kadācid adhyakṣaḥ atyakṣaḥ ca iti 
JŚNĀ_131,1	 nanu kṣaṇika nītau= eva ayam doṣaḥ uktaḥ yuktaḥ ca yat āha śaṅkaraḥ na hi bhāvasya nivṛtteḥ utpattim antareṇa prāk iva paścāt api svarūpa hāniḥ yena ayam tadā eva anupalambha viṣayaḥ na pūrvam hānau vā paścāt sā eva asya nivṛtteḥ utpattiḥ iti tat ayuktam kṣaṇika pakṣe hi prāk iva paścāt api na svarūpa hāniḥ iti sāhasam etat nivṛtteḥ utpattim antareṇa svīkriyamāṇā api sva rūpa hāniḥ asaṅga tā eva iti ced nivṛtti ādi nāmnaḥ padārtha antarasya utpattiḥ bhavatu mā vā bhūt yatas eva asau kṣaṇa sthiti niyataḥ arthaḥ tatas eva kṣaṇa antaram avyāpnuvan kṣaṇa antare na asti iti ucyate saḥ eva arthaḥ bhāvasya kṣaṇa antare nāśaḥ jātaḥ iti anena vacasā ucyate na apūrva vastu utpādaḥ vidhīyate chandataḥ hi vacasām pravṛttiḥ arthaḥ tu nirūpaṇīyaḥ tatra yadi eka kṣaṇa adhīna tayā kṣaṇa antare niyata sattāvasāya siddhiḥ tāvatā eva caritārthaḥ vināśa vādaḥ kim atra kasyacid utpatti paryeṣaṇayā na hi gṛhe eva devadattaḥ asti iti sarvatra anyatra vastu antaram abhidhāna nirodha bodhanam iti nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_132,1	 tatra api pradeśa antare abhāva vidhiḥ asti iti ced astu tad artham eva niyama nibandhana nipāta prayogāt kevalam kiñcid vastu vidyamānam utpadyamānam vā na pratīti patha prasthāyi niṣedha mātrasya eva pratīteḥ tāvatā eva ca devadattam anusarataḥ pravṛti nivṛtti pāṭavam āpanīpadyate vastu antara pratītau= api hi vihitāyām gṛhāt anyatra yāvat na niyama anusāreṇa devadattasya prasajya ātmānam niṣedham avasthāpayati tāvat na susthaḥ tasmāt aspṛṣṭa vastu rūpam abhāva mātram avaśya pratipādyam 
JŚNĀ_132,2^1	 na ca anyatra na asti iti anena vastu rūpam kiñcid vidhāya tat eva param asti na devadattaḥ iti kramavatī pratītiḥ anubhava viṣayaḥ yathā gṛhaḥ eva asti iti anena na anyatra iti bhavatu ca evam tathā api paścāt abhāva mātra pratītyā eva viśrāmaḥ anyathā parāpara vastu rūpa pratipattau= eva puruṣa āyuṣam upayujyet na prakṛta niṣedha bodha siddhiḥ tasmāt yathā atra niṣedha mātram mandirāt anyatra devadattasya vyavahriyate tanmātram eva ca devadattasya anyatra abhāvaḥ pratīti gocaraḥ ityādi vyavahārasya api arthaḥ tathā ekatra eva kṣaṇe asti bhāvaḥ kṣaṇa antare na asti 
JŚNĀ_132,2^2	 kṣaṇa antare tasya abhāvaḥ pratīyate iti niṣedha mātram anyatra kṣaṇe khyāpyate na vastu rūpa saṃsparśaḥ na api tad apekṣā niṣedha siddhaye api evam svarūpa hāniḥ iti api niṣedha mātra vyavahāraḥ eva tatra ca na kasyacid utpattyā sat tayā vā upayogaḥ iti katham ucyate nivṛtteḥ utpattim antareṇa svarūpa hāniḥ iti ataeva hānau vā paścāt sā eva asya nivṛtteḥ utpattiḥ iti api pravāha āpātaḥ pātaka vat parihāryaḥ paścāt svarūpa hāniḥ iti api hi paścāt niṣedha vyavahāra mātram na tu kasyacid vastu rūpasya utpattiḥ iti sa ca niṣedha vyavahāraḥ devadattasya eva anyatra kvacid sattā niyama pratibandhāt avyavasthita saṃvādī 
JŚNĀ_132,3–133,1	 etena yat nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ api āha kaḥ hi evam śraddadhīta pratyutpanna avasthāyām eva san bhāvaḥ paścāt tu asan na ca paścāt naśyati iti tatra api kaḥ punar evam āha na paścāt naśyati iti yadi paścāt naśyati tadā paścāt nāśa utpattiḥ svīkṛtā iti ced yadi tvam eva vacasām artheṣu svāmī syāt etat dvidhā tu artha sthitiḥ pramāṇa anusāriṇī samaya anusāriṇī ca prathamāyām paścāt naśyati iti paścāt asan= iti vyavahriyate iti eva arthaḥ samarthitaḥ atas pramāṇa parāyaṇena katham abhidhātum śakyam paścāt asat na ca paścāt naśyati iti dvitīyāyām tu na virodhaḥ yasya hi paścāt naśyati iti paścāt nāśa utpattiḥ iṣṭā tam prati paścāt asan na san vyavahartavyaḥ na ca paścāt naśyati na ca asya paścāt nāśavaḥ tu utpattiḥ iti katham aśraddhā viṣayaḥ tad apariniṣṭhita artha tattva vacana vibhrama mātreṇa grāmya jana manohareṇa samaya nirvāha manorathaḥ iti kaṣṭam 
JŚNĀ_133,2^1	 tasmāt sva hetoḥ eka kṣaṇa niyata sthitiḥ udabhūt bhāvaḥ iti eva na anyadā san na tu kasyacid utpattyā hetoḥ tu tādṛś sāmarthyam kim saṃbhāvanā viṣayaḥ iti yadi cintayasi tadā api yadi janane sāmarthyam tadā avaśyam kenacid rūpeṇa kāryam utpādayan kṣaṇa mātra sthāyinā api rūpeṇa kim na utpādayet sarvam tu rūpam aspṛśan kāryam kuryāt hetuḥ iti kasya śraddhā viṣayaḥ tatas yathā ayam bhāvaḥ niyata deśaḥ niyata vastu saṃsthāna ādi ākāraḥ sva hetoḥ eva samutpadyate tathā niyata kālaḥ api iti kim asaṃbhāvyam atra na ca deśa ādi niyamena svarūpa saṃkocam abhāvaḥ eva bhāvasya bhāvayati iti vācyam 
JŚNĀ_133,2^2	 na hi abhāvaḥ bhāvam utpannam vā saṅkocayet kāraṇena saha saṃbhūya saṅkucitam eva ca utpādayet atra pakṣe pṛthak pauruṣa rahitaḥ kāraṇasāmagrī antarbhūtaḥ abhāvaḥ api nāma yadi bhāva sādhakaḥ kaścid upapādayitum śakyaḥ kim naḥ chinnam yādṛśī tādṛśī vā kāraṇa sāmagrī kāryam kuryāt yathā tu niyata deśa ākāram kurute tathā niyata kālam api kartum kaḥ tasyāḥ śakti vighātaḥ iti brūmaḥ yatas tad artham arthyate para utpattiḥ paścāt prathama pakṣe api kim tāvat sa bhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ viśva rūpaḥ utpannaḥ niyataḥ kriyate abhāvena na vā kena api rūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ kenacid vā niṣpannaḥ eva na tu deśa ākāra kālaiḥ iti vikalpāḥ 
JŚNĀ_133,3–133,4	 antyaḥ tāvat ayuktaḥ yena hi rūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ saḥ eva tasya ākāraḥ sa ca na kvacid bhāvam antareṇa kvacid bhāvaḥ api na kadācid abhavataḥ iti katham ākāra ādi parihāraḥ mā abhūt tathā evam kevalam kenacid rūpeṇa utpādayitum śaknuvataḥ sva hetoḥ anyatra kim ālasyam īrṣyā vā pramāṇena ekatra śakti niyama anirvāhāt madhyamīye tu kiṃkṛtaḥ kāraṇa bhāvaḥ rāja prasādaḥ vā ādye api kalpe sakala tribhuvana ākāra= chedana sahā bhāva karṣiṇaḥ kṣaṇa antara avasthiti= chedana mātre aṇīyasi kārye paryālocaḥ eva na asti tatas deśa ādi saṅkoca kāriṇā eva abhāva nāmnā pūrva siddhena siddhe kāla saṅkoce api kim akāraṇam anyaḥ kāla antara bhāvī kāraṇa antara apekṣaḥ siddhaḥ yaḥ sthāyī gaveṣyate iti ukta prāyam 
JŚNĀ_134,1	 pratyartham bhedaḥ abhāvasya iti ced sarvathā anupalabhya svabhāva tve sāhasam etat atas vyoma ādeḥ sarva dharma nirmāṇa vat sarvatas vyāvartanam api kim na iṣyate na ca prācīnam evam vyāpāra bhāvam anubhavaḥ kṣamate tasmāt sva kāraṇāt eva deśa ādi niyataḥ iva kāla niyataḥ api jātaḥ iti na sthira pakṣa vat kṣaṇika pakṣe api vīkṣaṇa ādi prasaṅgaḥ bhāvasya eva abhāvāt sthira pakṣe tu sa ca asti tad avasthaḥ ca iti na nivartate prasaṅgaḥ padārtha antara utpattau= api tasya tatra akiñcitkara tvāt aprastuta abhidhānam ca bhāva nivṛttau prastutāyām vastu antara udaya varjanāt 
JŚNĀ_134,2–134,3	 na nu bhāva nivṛttau prastutāyām nivṛtteḥ udayaḥ apadiśyate iti kim aprastutam atra na nu tāvat eva nivṛttiḥ prasajya ātmā yāvat na udaya upadeśaḥ udaye tu tad paryudasta vastu antara vidhānāt punar artha āpattyā nivṛtti ākṛṣṭiḥ na tu sā eva nivṛtiḥ vastu tvāt eva anyathā ati prasaṅgāt yat tu śaṅkaraḥ bhāvāt bhāva antara vat artha antara tva aviśeṣe katham saḥ eva tasya eva nivṛttiḥ iti ced atra vastu svabhāvaiḥ uttaram vācyam yeṣām sva hetubhyaḥ saha sthiti virodhena eva utpattiḥ na hi artha antara tvāt anyatra saha sthiti virodha abhāve bhāva tad nivṛttyoḥ api tasya abhāvaḥ iti nyāyyam tayoḥ eva saha sthiti virodhasya pramāṇena siddha tvāt na hi yathā kaścid artha antara tayā anyeṣām ahetuḥ evam sva kāryasya api mā abhūt tādṛś etat api iti 
JŚNĀ_134,4	 etat eva nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ api tat api dvividhasya api virodhasya ghaṭa nādapāstam yadi ca virodhāt artha antarasya api nivṛtti bhāvaḥ varam mudgarasya eva astu iti api darśitam na ca pratyakṣam anumānam vā nivṛttau pravṛttam tad virodhaḥ ca pramāṇa siddhaḥ avaśya vaktavyaḥ iti sundaram vahni dhūma ādau tu hetu phala bhāvaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ eva iti na artha antara udaya varṇane api tad nivṛtti khyātiḥ tasmāt agneḥ artha antara utpattau bhavet kāṣṭhasya darśanam na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavati eva kevalam iti duratikramaḥ nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_135,1	 yat tu nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ yadi tasya na kiñcid bhavati tatas pratiṣedhaḥ api na tasya bhavati iti apratiṣiddha svarūpaḥ tad avastha tvāt prāk iva upalabhyeta iti prāk eva prarihṛtam etat tathā hi pratiṣedhaḥ api na tasya bhavati iti yadi pratiṣedha ākhyaḥ api padārthaḥ na utpadyate iti arthaḥ tadā satyam etat na tu tāvatā eva apratiṣiddha svarūpa tvam arthasya sva hetu tā eva kṣaṇa antare pratiṣid dha tā pratipādanāt atha vācanika pratiṣedhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tadā kaḥ tam apahastayati kevalam atra pakṣe prāk iva upalabhyeta iti asaṃbaddham na hi yaḥ yadā na asti sa tadā upalabhyaḥ anyathā kānyakubja sthitaḥ api pāṭaliputre dṛśyeta māndhātā api vādya upalabhyeta 
JŚNĀ_135,2	 nanu adya mā andha ātura bhāvaḥ tena nīpa lambhaḥ kaḥ vai anyathā prāha kevala ṣaṣṭhī nirdeśāt bheda avasāye api na tatas bhinnaḥ padārthaḥ vidhīyate yāvān eva arthaḥ māndhātā adya na asti tad kāla niyata sattāka tvāt tāvān eva māndhātuḥ adya abhāvaḥ iti na nu samānam etat api yāvān eva arthaḥ māndhātuḥ adya abhāvaḥ iti tāvān eva māndhātā adya na asti iti 
JŚNĀ_135,3	 yat api ucyate tad kāla niyata sattāka tvāt iti tatra api tad kāle eva asti iti kāla antare abhāvaḥ eva pratipādyate iti kim atra adhikam abhihitam uktam eva etat tathā api ucyate bheda abheda nideśayoḥ ekaḥ eva arthaḥ tattvataḥ kevalam yadi bhinna vastu siddhiḥ pramāṇa bala avalambinī tadā adya na asti iti asya api vākyasya adya abhāvaḥ asti iti ayam eva arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_135,4	 atha bhinna vastu bādhā eva pramāṇa anvayinī tadā abhāvaḥ asti iti tāvat astu adya abhāvaḥ jātaḥ iti asya api vākyasya adya na asti iti eva arthaḥ veditavyaḥ pramāṇa anveṣaṇe ca dṛśya tayā svīkṛtasya adarśanam eva bādhakam uktam ca sādhakam ca kiñcinnā iti api adya anupalambhe api tad kāla vartinaḥ kāla antare vastu antara rūpam aspṛśatā viraha mātreṇa siddha tvam iti upapāditam na ca viraha mātreṇa iti karaṇa śakti nirdeśāt vastu tva pratyāśā vivakṣā paratantra tvāt kriyā kāraka vyavahārasya yāti gandharvanagarāt eṣa bandhyā sutaḥ padā mṛgatṛṣṇā ambhasi snātvā pitre dātum jala añjalim iti sakala kāraka śakti yoge api vastu tva abhāvāt sarvathā mithyā idam iti ced vivakṣā paratantra tā mātreṇa dṛṣṭāntīkṛta tvāt 
JŚNĀ_136,1–136,2	 kaḥ evam sādhuḥ abhidadhīta iti ced na kaḥ api abhidhattām prakṛta siddheḥ avirodhāt na ca sādhoḥ api etat pāṭhaḥ asaṃbhavī sarvathā kim tat sādhuḥ nābhidadhīta iti tat aśrutavataḥ praśne tad pāṭha mātreṇa sādhu tā kṣateḥ abhāvāt kūrma romṇām tu mithyātvam svīkṛtam iti api kim asādhunā eva vaktavyam na api sarvathā mithyā eva idam tathā māndhātā na asti iti na adya sthīyate māndhātrā iti vā vyaktā kartṛ śaktiḥ na vastu tām pratyujjīvayati niṣedhaḥ eva tasyāḥ vartate iti ced atas eva vivakṣā pāratantryam apeta san deham tasmāt kāraka śakti nirdeśena vastu tā siddhi pratyāśā phena saṃghātena toyataraṇa manoratham anuharati 
JŚNĀ_136,3–136,4	 tat evam na abhidhāna adhīnam artha tattva vaśena idam tu abhidhānam iti bheda nirdeśaḥ eva adya abhāvaḥ asya jāta iti bhinna vastu utpattim iva asaṃśan adya idam na asti iti asya prasajya pratiṣedha mātra sūcakasya arthe sthāpyaḥ na viparyaye pramāṇa aśaraṇa tvāt asya vibhāgasya tad kāla niyamena kāla antare abhāva abhidhānam ca siddha sādhanam vastu antara utpattiḥ eva hi niṣidhyate kāla antare na ca prasajya pratiṣedha vyavahāra mātram pratiṣidhyate tat asya bādha vidhāna pratipādane api na parama artha sat padārtha antara siddhiḥ tena yat udvartya vārtikaślokasya nyāya bhūṣaṇaḥ cakāra kāvyam abhāvaḥ yadi paścāt na bhāvaḥ tasya kim iṣyate saḥ api na pratiṣedhaḥ ayam abhāvasya kim iṣyate iti tat siddha sādhanam bādhā niḥ cayena vā paścāt abhāva vyavahāra pravartana mātrasya iṣṭa tvāt vastu utpatteḥ eva pratiṣiddhi tvāt 
JŚNĀ_137,1	 nanu kā iyam vācoyuktiḥ abhāva vyavahāra mātram iṣyate paścāt na abhāvaḥ iti evam hi sati visaṃvāditā prasaṅgaḥ abhāva vyavahārasya abhāvaḥ ca mithyā iti bhāvaḥ eva pratiṣedhyasya syāt pratiṣedha niṣedhaḥ ca vidhānāt kīdṛśaḥ aparaḥ iti nyāyasya svayam pratijñānāt sa ca abhāvaḥ bhavan paścāt eva iti sphuṭataram asya kādācid ka tvāt sa hetu tvam vastu tvam ca iti tathā ca saha eva āha yasya bhāvasya paścāt abhāvaḥ saḥ eva nāśaḥ iti ucyate katham bhāvasya vināśaḥ anyaḥ vā kaścid na upalabhyate atha bhāvasya vināśaḥ ucyate kim tu sa bhavati iti na ucyate bhavati iti abhidhāne kaḥ doṣaḥ bhāvaḥ eva syāt iti ced tat kim idānīm abhidhānāt eva arthasya rūpa parivartaḥ bhavati yadi ca bhavet tatas jāyate iti ucyatām janma api abhāvasya kutas iti ced kādācid ka tvāt akādācitka tve tu pratyutpanna avasthāyām api abhāvaḥ syāt iti 
JŚNĀ_137,2^1	 atra ucyate vyavahāra śabdena tāvat asmākam niścaya vacasī abhimate vacanam ca vikalpena saha eka viṣayam eva vikalpasya ca grāhya adhyavasāya bhedena dvividhaḥ viṣayaḥ tatra yat pratibhāsam vikalpa jñānam ājāyate tat grāhyam ucyate yad āśraye tu pravṛtti nivṛttī tat adhyavaseyam yathā paścāt abhāvāḥ bhāvasya eva jātaḥ iti asya eva vikalpasya artha antara utpattiḥ sākṣāt nirbhāsamānā grāhyā tad bhāva artha kriyā arthinaḥ nivṛtteḥ āśraya bhūtā ca tad vivikta tad kāla deśa svabhāva vastu avasthā adhyavaseyāḥ yatas tad vikalpa udaye vināśa ākhya vastu utpatti parāmarśa vimukhaḥ pratiṣedhya bhāva artha kriyā arthī tad deśa kāla ātmani vastuni na pravartate api tu nivartate 
JŚNĀ_137,2^2	 tatas tad deśa kāla vastu avasthā adhyavaseyaḥ ucyate tatra pratibhāsamāna vastu antara apekṣayā vyavahāra mātram ucyate yatnena nirūpa tayā nayana sahasreṇa api udīyamāna padārtha antarasya anupalabdheḥ tatas tad visaṃvāde api yatra pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām pariniṣṭhita vyāpāraḥ vikalpaḥ saṃpadyate tam adhyavasā iyam viṣayam apekṣya na visaṃvāda saṃvādaḥ adhyavaseye ca saṃvāda itara cintā na pratibhāsini tat ayam avyāpakaḥ api yadi nyāyaḥ prakṛte tāvat avaseya saṃvādena eva saṃvādam anuśiṣmaḥ pratibhāsinī tu visaṃvādaḥ sādhyaḥ eva yadi sidhyati prasannāḥ devatāḥ kim atrabhavataḥ kopena 
JŚNĀ_138,1	 tasmāt abhāva vikalpa pratibhāsinaḥ kārya rūpasya mithyātve api na abhāva vyavahārasya visaṃvāditā adhyavasita artha yāthātmyasya sattvāt tasya ca kalpita rūpasya mithyātve api bhāva virodhinaḥ pracyuti mātrasya vyavahartavya eka rūpasya mithyātvam iti na vastu niṣedhe bhāva prasaṅgaḥ tasya tu pracyuti mātrasya niṣedhe syāt na cā sā tena rūpeṇa pracyuti mātra ātmanā pratiṣidhyate kim tu vastu rūpa tayā kalpitayā 
JŚNĀ_138,2^1	 nanu vastu na bhavati iti ayam eva pratiṣedhaḥ tathā ca sā pratyutiḥ asti na vā iti praśne yadi asti katham na vastu na asti ced katham apratiṣedhaḥ ucyate vastu viraha mātrasya vastu tva āropaḥ eva niṣedhaḥ na vastu tva niṣedhaḥ tad niṣedhaḥ tatas pracyutiḥ asti iti na pracyuti rūpāt pracyavataḥ iti ayam eva arthaḥ ghaṭaḥ asti iti api hi ghaṭa rūpa apracyuti mātram āpadyate na tu asti prayoga mātreṇa kalpitasya api traiguṇya maya tva ādeḥ vidhiḥ yathā ca pratiṣiddha ghaṭa rūpāt atirikta rūpa apekṣā eva na asti ghaṭaḥ nitya tayā kṣaṇika tayā vā iti sādhu tathā na asti pracyutiḥ iti api vastu tvena iti apekṣā eva sādhu nirupādhiḥ tu asti pracyutiḥ iti tad svarūpa apracyutau na duṣyati yāvat ca na pratiṣedhya bhāvaḥ tāvat pracyutiḥ svarūpa apracyutiḥ paraspara abhāva rūpa tvāt anayoḥ ataeva nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim iṣyate sā api na pratiṣedhaḥ ayam nivṛttiḥ kim niṣidhyate 
JŚNĀ_138,2^2	 iti durlaṅghaḥ ayam nyāyaḥ evam abhāvaḥ yadi paścāt na iti anena paścāt abhāva ākhya viraham āśaṅkya bhāvaḥ tasya kim iṣyate iti ucyate yadi tadā na doṣaḥ yasya hi yadā asti iti asya pratyanīkam na asti iti viraha mātram avastu rūpam kalpanā viparivarti pratiṣidhyate tasya tadā niyamena asti iti evam rūpam antar mātrāyām upasthānam āsādayati yadā tu paścāt viraha mātram apratikṣipya paścāt bhavati jāyate ca iti vikalpa vivarta vaśāt vāsanā vaśagāt vastu rūpasya kalpitasya niṣedhaḥ tadā katham viraha mātra pratikṣepa prabhavaḥ bhāva prasaṅgaḥ yatas bhāvaḥ tasya kim iṣyate iti ucyate na hi ghaṭaḥ kalpita rūpa niṣedhe svarūpāt pracyavam āsādayati udaka dhāraṇa ādi artha kriyā viraha prasaṅgāt na ca pracyuteḥ svarūpa ullekhaḥ vastu tva pratyāśāyāḥ pūrakaḥ asat svabhāvaḥ bandhyā sutaḥ ityādi vat svabhāva avasthāna niveśane api tad ayogāt asiddhaḥ hetuḥ iti ādi vat vā 
JŚNĀ_139,1–139,2^1	 tasmāt nāśaḥ paścāt bhavati jāyate mudgara ādibhyaḥ iti bāla vyavahāra mātram apalapyate tat pratibhāṣitam tu kādācid ka tva ādi vastu rūpam na asti iti brūmaḥ na ca vastu yāvat vyavahāra upasthāpitam tat sarvam vastu tattvam iti śakyam śāstra praṇayana ānarthakya prasaṅgāt vyavahāram tu vitatham upadarśayan= api mūla bala abalābhyām kaścid upādeyaḥ heyaḥ ca kaścid iti vibhāgaḥ subhagaḥ mūlam ca adhyavaseyam iti darśitam tasmāt tattva cintāyām na bhāvaḥ bhavati iti uktam abhāvaḥ bhavati iti api paścāt abhāvaḥ bhavati bhāvasya eva anapāyi vā tathā ca paścāt na bhavati bhāvaḥ sva kāla mātra niyate iti eva kathyate atas na artha antara utpattiḥ iti na kṣaṇa bhaṅga pakṣe tādavasthyāt upalambha ādi saṃbhavaḥ 
JŚNĀ_139,2^2	 kim tu sthira pakṣaḥ eva iti sthitam na arthaḥ tāvat svayam uparataḥ nāśa hetoḥ mudhā tvaprāpteḥ daṇḍāt api na nidhane vyāpṛteḥ tasya gīteḥ na api dhvaṃsāt parigha vat ataḥ bhinna nāśa prasakteḥ kasmāt na eṣa sphurati caṭakālopa vṛttam kim etat iti antaraślokaḥ kṣaṇika tve tu sva kāraṇāt eva yathā anya rūpa vicchinna rūpaḥ samudeti bhāvaḥ vicchinna bhinna kṣaṇa vṛttiḥ evam sva kāraṇāt eva na jāyate kim iti uktam abhāvataḥ artha antara rūpa bādhetatra api abhāva antaram īkṣaṇīyam tatra yat ayam āha pradīpa prakāśa vat na anavasthā iti eke iti tatra ucyate 
JŚNĀ_140,1–140,2	 pradīpa dṛṣṭānta matam na kāntaṃsvarūpa sandarśana viprayogāt dṛṣṭaḥ hi pradīpaḥ para prakāśana śakti yuktaḥ katham apahnotum śakyaḥ abhāvasya punar sva rūpa vedanam svapne api durlabham tatra kaḥ evam dhṛṣṭaḥ ākāśa citram ācaratu etad bhāve ayam asya bhedaḥ tad abhāve ca atra na asti svayam ca anena rūpeṇa bhidyamānaḥ na anyam apekṣate iti tat katham pradīpena sāmyam kim ca 
JŚNĀ_140,3–140,4	 pradīpa vat ced ayam api abhāvaḥ bhinatti bhāvam ca vibhidyate ca saḥ eva bhāvaḥ api uditaḥ sva hetoḥ bhinattu bhāvam ca vibhidyatām ca na hi evam abhidhīyamānam vadanam vakrayati adarśanāt anya pauruṣa abhāvasya na ca dṛṣṭānta mātrāt sādhya siddhiḥ hetuḥ tad bhāva sādhanāya abhāve upādīyamānaḥ kaḥ asau= asti yaḥ na āśraya asiddhaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_141,1–141,2	 yat punar āha vayam tu paśyāmaḥ tatra anavasthā na abhyupagamyate yatra anavasthāyām kiñcid dṛṣṭam virudhyeta na ca atra dṛṣṭam kiñcid virudhyate yā tāvat ghaṭasya paṭa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tayā eva ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ siddhaḥ tatra vyāvṛtti antara anavasthāyām na kiñcid vighaṭitam vyāvṛtti vyāvṛtti paramparā grahaṇa upakṣīṇa śakti tvāt vastu vyāvṛttam na sidhyati iti ced na viśeṣaṇa viparyastānām api grahaṇa anabhyupagamāt iti tatra api ucyate sa hi astu nābhyupagamaḥ atra paramparāyāḥ bhāvasya tad graha paramparayā astam āpteḥ na iṣṭam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣaṇa vedanam ced nyāyaḥ samānaḥ iti na eṣa tatas vibhāgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_141,3	 agṛhītam api kila vilocanam grāhayati rūpam iti tad viśeṣaṇa viśeṣaṇam agṛhītam api viśeṣaṇam grāhayati iti manyamānasya prathamam api viśeṣaṇam agṛhītam eva grāhayiṣyati viśeṣyam iti kṛtam tad grahaṇena api na ca ayam viśeṣaṇa kramaḥ tatas yathā prathamam eva viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam anapekṣya lakṣayitum viśeṣyam aśaktam tathā dvitīyādi api iti katham ayam vibhāgaḥ śobhām abhyeti yathā hi abhāva upādhi grahaṇam antareṇa saṅkīrṇa grahaṇa bhītiḥ tathā saḥ api upādhiḥ asaṅkīrṇaḥ agṛhyamāṇaḥ katham parabhedakaḥ nāma svayam viṣṭambhi dravya vat evam paramparā apekṣāyām vyāvṛtta vastunaḥ kalpaiḥ api grahaṇa abhāvāt astamayaḥ durvāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_141,4	 yadi ca viśeṣaṇam abhāvaḥ tadā sva hetoḥ eva bhinna bhāva saṃbhave bhinna darśana vikalpanayoḥ artha āpattyā siddheḥ kim abhāvena na hi bhinnam abhinnam anubhavitavyam abhrānta pratyayena na api bhinnam anubhūtam bhinna saṅkalpa virodhi atha abhāvam antareṇa na bhinnam na abhinnam kva tarhi kāraka vyāpāraḥ iti abhāvaḥ kārakaḥ eva svīkṛtaḥ bhavati tathā api sva hetoḥ eva bhinna utpattau sarvam aviruddham iti na upādhivādaḥ saṃvāda viṣayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_141,5–142,2	 yat ca āha athavā nirvikalpaka jñānena vyāvṛtti vyāvṛtti ānantyam api gṛhītam iti tatra api nirbhāsam āha yat ayam hṛdi nirvikalpe tat kauṣika āvaraṇam api ajahādalajjaḥ yatra ekam api anupalabhyam abhāva nāmnā sva vyāpinī sphurati tatra paramparā iti mṛṣāvādaḥ ced ārabdhaḥ kim atra naibhṛtyena iti anurūpam eva nyāya bhūṣaṇasya yat api ayam likhati nanu svarūpeṇa buddham vyāvṛttam avyāvṛttam vā yadi vyāvṛttam tadā anarthikā vyāvṛttiḥ na ced vyāvṛttam vastu saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_142,3	 svarūpeṇa iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim vyāvṛttim vinā kim vā vyāvṛtti vyatiriktena rūpeṇa vyāvṛttim vinā iti na yuktam vyāvṛtteḥ nitya dharma tvāt yaḥ hi dharmaḥ kadācid bhavati tena dharmeṇa vinā api dharmī vyapadiśyate yathā kuṇḍalena vinā puruṣaḥ akuṇḍalī nāśāt prāk anaṣṭaḥ iti na ca vastu antarāt vyāvṛtti vihīnam vastu kadācid yathā na go tva vihīnaḥ asti gauḥ na auṣṇya vihīnaḥ agniḥ 
JŚNĀ_142,4	 atha vyāvṛtti vyatiriktena rūpeṇa vyāvṛttam iti abhipretam tat iṣṭam eva asmākam bheda abhyupagamāt na ca evam vyāvṛttiḥ anarthikā yadi vyatiriktena dhanena dhanī puruṣaḥ kim etāvatā dhanam vyartham bhavet tasmāt itaretarābhāvaḥ api bhāvāt artha antaram eva iti tat api vidhūtam yasmāt na khalu vastu satīm vyāvṛttim anumatyā anyad artham ca udyam etat kim tu vyāvṛtta pratyaye asāmarthya vaiyarthyābhyām anupayogāt na tat dhanena vyāvṛtti siddhiḥ iti codya arthaḥ tatra prathama pakṣe vaiyarthyam uktam dvitīye tu asāmarthyam abhipretam 
JŚNĀ_142,5	 atham ca arthaḥ yadi vyāvṛtta svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ sva hetoḥ udayavān tadā tad upajani tayā pratīttyā vyāvṛttaḥ eva pratyetavyaḥ vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam artha antaram vinā api na hi vyasanam eva etat arthasya pramāṇena vā kenacid avadhāritam yat mayā pratyaya antarasākalpe api tām antareṇa na sva jñānam utpādanīyam iti na api jñānasya tad utpāditasya tayā vinā tat agrahaṇagrahaḥ nāma tat iyam anarthikā vyāvṛttiḥ vyāvṛtta pratyayasya anyathā api saṃbhavāt na kalpanīyāḥ 
JŚNĀ_143,1	 atha na sva hetoḥ vyāvṛttaḥ utpannaḥ bhāvaḥ utpannaḥ ca tatas saṅkīrṇa svabhāvasya utpannasya vyāvṛttiḥ eva asatī katham vyāvṛtta pratyayam utpādayet iti asamarthāḥ evam ca codya prakrame siddhām eva vyāvṛttim avasthāpya vyāvṛtteḥ nitya dharma tva ādi kutra upayogi na hi anena prathama pakṣa ukta vaiyarthya parihāra vārtā tathā hi vyāvṛtta pratyaya sāmarthyāt vyāvṛttiḥ nāma kalpyate sa ca vyāvṛtta pratyayaḥ anyathā siddhaḥ iti kim asyāḥ kalpanayā iti codye vyāvṛttiḥ nityaḥ dharmaḥ atas tena vinā iti na śakyam iti uttara vādinaḥ kim kena saṅgatam yāvatā vyāvṛtti vyatireke sthityā eva vyāvṛtta pratyayasya anyathā anupapattivādasya ayam na avasaraḥ tat vidhūya siddhānta mātra kathayā kim atra 
JŚNĀ_143,2–143,3	 na ca vināśāt prāk anaṣṭaḥ iti udāhartum yuktam vināśasya bheda asiddheḥ na vyāvṛtti vihīnam vastu iti api vyāvṛtteḥ tāttvika abhede siddha sādhanam bheda asiddhiḥ dṛṣṭānte api atad vyāvṛtti rūpayoḥ go tva auṣṇa tvayoḥ gavāgni bhedena darśayitum aśakyatvāt yat ca atra eva pakṣe dvitīyam vikalpitam anena kim vā vyāvṛttiḥ iti vyatiriktena vyāpāreṇa iti tad anabhyupagamena eva gatam svarūpeṇa vyāvṛttam buddham iti viśvasmāt vyāvṛtta rūpam buddham iti etasya arthasya vivakṣita tvāt na ca adya vaiphalya parihāraḥ iti uktam na api dhani dṛṣṭāntena bhinna vyāvṛtti siddhiḥ niyama hetoḥ abhāvāt dhana vat vā saṃyoga samavāya anapekṣaḥ viśeṣaṇa antarasya daṇḍa pāṇḍara tva ādeḥ api saṃbandha vyavahāraḥ syāt tasmāt na itaretarābhāvaḥ nāma kaścid sva hetoḥ eva paraspara vyavacchinnasya utpatteḥ 
JŚNĀ_143,4–143,5	 evam kāla antara vyavacchinnasya api iti na vināśa hetunā kiñcid tat ayam apekṣeta paraḥ kāryam yadi vidyeta kiñcana iti siddhaḥ nyāyaḥ kim atra piṣṭa peṣaṇena nāśaḥ adya jātaḥ iti na anya padārtha bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ sva kāla niyataḥ tu sa na anyadā asti na asti anyadā iti api para udayaḥ eva yasya tasya prasajya viṣaya astamaye prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_144,1–144,2	 yat punar ayam prasajya paryudāsayoḥ bheda sādhana artham abhāva bhāva vyavahāra viṣaya tvena vibhāgam pratyapīpadat tat bhavataḥ bhāṣā eva bhāvānyateti atra antare tiraskṛtam na hi nyāya siddhasya samaya mātreṇa bādhanam sādhu tathā hi yat jāyamānam upalakṣitam artha kāri bhāva ātmanā vyavaharanti tat eva santaḥ saḥ ayam na yaḥ samayataḥ yadi bhaṅga bhāgī bhāvān avasthitiḥ iyam na ca paryudāsaḥ 
JŚNĀ_144,3	 yadā hi mūrta amūrta sapratighā pratighasa nidarśana anidarśana dūra āsanna sthūla sūkṣma ādi prakāreṣu kaścid bhāvam abhāvam vā kaścid sva icchā vaśāt abhidadhīta vindhya vandhyā suta ādikam abhāva bhāvam vā tadā āyātam avyavasthānam bhāvasya na ca evam kṣatiḥ sva samaya anurodhāt abhidhāna bheda saṃbhavāt kevalam kim idānīm paryudastam vastu vyavahriyatām tasmāt samaya anurodhāt abhāva śabda apravṛttau= api ekasya kāraṇa apekṣa saṃbhavasya upālambha bhājaḥ vā anyaḥ tādṛś eva padārthaḥ paryudastaḥ vaktavyaḥ tad katham abhāva śabda saṅketa mātreṇa paryudāsa vyudāsaḥ yadi punar upalambha saṃbhavau= api abhāva abhimatasya samaya mātra tantrau= iti ucyate tadā vāstavaḥ prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eva ayam na paryudāsaḥ iti na doṣaḥ anena tu nyāya vid māninā nyāya āgatam tam eva prakāram ullaṅghya saṃbhava upalambha artha kriyā śaktayaḥ ca abhāvasya bhāvikyaḥ abhyupagantavyāḥ paryudāsa pratyanīka prasajya pratiṣedha tā ca iti kim atas api vyasanam anavasānam anyat 
JŚNĀ_144,4–145,1	 yat ca ayam āha na hi utpattiḥ bhāvasya lakṣaṇam yena nivṛttiḥ bhavantī bhāvaḥ syāt anutpattimatām api ākāśa ādīnām bhāva tvāt iti tatra api pāṇineḥ na nadī gaṅgā yamunā ca sthalī nadī abhavan= api bhāvaḥ asya na bhāvaḥ asya bhavan= api naraḥ svātantryam āpannaḥ yat icchati karoti tat ubhayatra samānaḥ ayam nyāyaḥ nyāya vidām mataḥ 
JŚNĀ_145,2–145,5	 nadī saṃjñā niṣedhe api na avagāhasya bādhanam bhāva saṃjñā niṣedhe api paryudāsaḥ na bādhyate upalambha artha śaktasya kāraṇa apekṣajanmanaḥ sarvasya paryudasta tvam vastu antaram apekṣya hi abhāva saṃjñā virahe paryudāsa vyavasthitiḥ na kvāpi sidhyet sarvatra saṃjñāyāḥ sulabha tvataḥ yat ca idam svarūpa nivṛtti lakṣaṇā ca utpattiḥ pradhvaṃsasya iṣyate na tu prāc asataḥ sattā saṃbandha lakṣaṇā kāraṇa samavāya lakṣaṇā vā iti tatra api 
JŚNĀ_145,6–145,7	 svarūpasya eva nirvṛttiḥ sarvatra utpattiḥ ucyate prakṣipya samavāyam tu vimūḍhaiḥ sā api hāritā samavāyasya eva abhāvāt kva sattā saṃbandha ādiḥ astu vā saḥ api tathā api apūrva ātma lābhaḥ eva utpattiḥ dharma adharma antarāṇām tu bhāva abhāvau na sādhaka bādhakau kim ca kāryasya api abhāvasya na prāc asataḥ sattā saṃbandhaḥ iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim prāk asan= eva na bhavati atha paścāt api na sattvam asya ubhayathā api kutas kārya tvam ākāśa ākāśa kuśeśaya vat prāc asataḥ sattvam astu paścāt na tu sattā yogaḥ 
JŚNĀ_145,8	 nanu sattvam sattā iti anartha antaram etat yogaḥ ca sambandhaḥ tatra sattva yogaḥ asti na sattā yogaḥ iti kaḥ api ayam nyāyaḥ atha sattā mahā sāmānyam ucyate tad abhāve api sva rūpa sattva mātreṇa paścāt san= iti ucyate iti ced tat tarhi svarūpa sattvam yadi tāttvikam tāvatā eva kārya tvam kim apareṇa kartavyam anyasya api kāryasya atha aupacārikam tadā nāśasya api kutas kārya tā na hi bandhyā tanayasya paścāt bhāva upacāre kārya tā vāstavī nāma 
JŚNĀ_146,1	 yat ca idam nivṛtteḥ api ādimattvam iti ucyate iti tadā api na adhikam kiñcid sā ca nivṛttiḥ abhāva rūpeṇa eva ādimati iti punar na sahāmahe kārya antara sādhāraṇa tāyāḥ pratipādanāt ādeśa mātram etat bhūbhujām eva śobhate bhāva upalambha kāle tad rūpa anupalambhāt iti api paścāt rūpa upalambhe śobhām ābhajati sa ca na asti kumbha asaṃbhava vikalpa mātram tu saṅketa anurodhena iti darśitam arthī paṭa artha kriyayā ghaṭasya anupalambhane na prāvartate iti asti na anyadṛś pratiyoginaḥ tad alam asya prakriyā mātram avakaram nirūpya svayam ūhya doṣa tvāt 
JŚNĀ_146,2–146,3	 yat ca āha na api artha kriyā hetu tva mātreṇa bhāva tva prasaktiḥ tvad ukta bhāva lakṣaṇa anabhyupagamāt iti tatra api paryudāsatva anatikramāt iti uktam tasmāt na bhāvāt artha antaram abhāvaḥ yat punar āha tvayā api bhāva abhāvayoḥ lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ abhihitaḥ tat katham ekatvam sarva arthānām lakṣaṇa bhedāt eva bheda vyavasthā tatas api ced na bheda vyavasthitiḥ na kasyacid kutaścid bheda siddhiḥ iti advaita prasaṅgaḥ iti tat api aparyālocana phalam yaḥ hi naśvara svabhāvaḥ eva nāśaḥ nāśyati iti bahula adhikārāt kartari ghan tad dharmatā kalpanayā vā tad vācakena abhidhānāt tad nāśam bhāva svabhāvam icchāmaḥ tam eva āśritya sattā mātra anubandhi tvāt na aśasya anitya tā dhvaneḥ iti uktam 
JŚNĀ_146,4^1	 tathā ca anena eva utthāpitam bhāvaḥ eva kṣaṇa sthiti dharmāḥ nāśaḥ iti tasya abhedam eva brūmaḥ naśanam nāśaḥ iti prasajya ātmā dvidhā vyākartavyaḥ tattvataḥ tāvat vastu tva virahāt tattva anyatva śūnyaḥ eva asau bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti tad bhāva niṣedha mātra pātram tu kharaśṛṅga ādi vat saṃvṛttau tu yathā kāla bhedena vikalpyamānaḥ kādācitkaḥ iti pratibhāti tathā sarva upākhyā viraha rūpa tayā bhāvāt bhinnaḥ iva pratibhāti iti na avastu tvepi lakṣaṇa bheda ākhyāna virodhaḥ evam ca sati saṃvṛttyā lakṣaṇa bhede bhāva abhāvayoḥ bhedasya iṣṭa tvāt tattvena ca lakṣaṇa eka tā virahe bhāvasya tena aikya niṣedhāt katham advaita prasaṅga upālambhaḥ naśyati iti tu nāśaḥ naśvara svabhāvaḥ katham bhāva ātma tām pariharet 
JŚNĀ_146,4^2	 sa ca sa hetukaḥ bhāva hetunā eva na tu paraḥ tasya hetuḥ bhāva svabhāva tvāt tat ayam yat bhāve hi eṣa vikalpaḥ syāt vidheḥ vastu anurodhataḥ iti atas āha tat api sva vacana virodhāt ayuktam tvayā hi bhāva abhāvayoḥ tādātmyam uktam tat ca tattva anabhyupagame virudhyate tattva abhyupagame api lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ virudhyate yasya hi lakṣaṇa bhedena bhedaḥ ucyate tasya katham tattva atattva nirvacanīya tvam iti tad sukha edhitaḥ krīḍana śīla tayā kṛtam kṛtam punar kārayati na khalu bhāva pracyuti svabhāvena abhāvena bhāvasya tādātmyam brūmaḥ yaḥ tu na bhavati iti abhāvaḥ uttara kṣaṇa apekṣayā tena kaḥ tādātmya virodhaḥ iti nāśa vimarśena gatam etat evam anyat api anadhikam avadhīritam asya veditavyam 
JŚNĀ_147,1–147,2	 yat api āha nanu abhāvasya sarva dharma viveka lakṣaṇa tvāt utpattiḥ na yuktāḥ sā hi bhāva dharmaḥ eva iti na jñeya tva ādeḥ bhāva dharmasya abhāve api sadbhāvāt ityādi tat api asāram na hi sādhāraṇa dharma yoga mātreṇa virodha pratiniyatānām api dharmāṇām avakāśaḥ hutāśanasya api śaitya prasaṅgāt abhāvasya eva vā sarvatra sadbhāva prasaṅgāt jñeya tva ādīnām api niṣedhāt utpattiḥ ca abhūtvā bhavana rūpa tayā bhāva dharmaḥ eva iti āpāditam eva yat tu svayam na bhavati iti kaḥ arthaḥ kim svayam eva ayam abhāvaḥ kim vā svayam abhavanam karoti uta bhavanam na karoti atha kiñcid na karoti svayam vā na kiñcid kim vā svayam abhāvībhavati iti vikalpya dūṣaṇam ārabdham tat api marma= chedikā janita ārta rava prāyam 
JŚNĀ_147,3	 tatra hi svayam iti hetu antaram anapekṣya sva hetunā kṣaṇa niyata sthitiḥ janitaḥ iti kṣaṇa antareṇa na kiñcid iti prakaṭitaḥ eva arthaḥ tatas atad svabhāvaḥ paścāt asau kutas jātaḥ sva hetoḥ hi tad svabhāvaḥ atad svabhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ utpannaḥ sa katham paścāt api atad svabhāvaḥ syāt na hi laghu svabhāvāt vyāvṛttaḥ pāṣāṇaḥ kadācid laghu syāt iti tat api plavate eva yathā hi deśa antara sthiti vyāvṛttaḥ utpannaḥ tathā kṣaṇa antara sthiti vyāvṛttaḥ api katham kṣaṇa antara sthiteḥ avakāśaḥ iti ukta prāyam 
JŚNĀ_148,1	 nanu asat iti na tat eva vastu abhidhīyate vidhi viṣaya tvāt anyat ca abhāva śabda abhidheyam pratīti gocara āpannam tvayā na iṣṭam tatas nirviṣayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ visaṃvādī iti apratiṣiddham vastu syāt na evam pracyuteḥ api pratipādya tvāt kutas nirviṣaya tvam na api visaṃvādaḥ bhāva sthitau hi pratiṣedhasya visaṃvādaḥ syāt sa ca na asti pracyuteḥ pratipādita tvāt na ca avastunaḥ saṅkalpa viṣaya tāyāḥ api anupapattiḥ iti uktam eva 
JŚNĀ_148,2	 yat punar artha antara viṣayaḥ api pratiṣedhaḥ katham vastu pratiṣedhakaḥ iti ced tad abhāva abhidhāyī katham na pratiṣedhakaḥ iti uktam tat api pratyukta prāyam tad abhāvaḥ hi na prasajya ātmakaḥ artha antara svīkārāt paryudāsa mātra tve tu na artha antara nivṛttiḥ avaśyam artha antara bhāvena vibhāvitā bhavati virodhaḥ tu na asti iti pratipāditam sati api vā virodhe kim viruddha dvāra āśrayaṇena sākṣāt eva abhāva pratipādanam astu 
JŚNĀ_148,3–148,5	 syāt etat vacasā abhāva pratipādane kṛte saṃśaya avakāśaḥ viruddha dvāreṇa tu niścayaḥ iti asat viruddha pratipādanam api hi vacasā eva vartate tat yathā vacana mātra pratipādye hutabhuji na iha śītam iti eva sādhu na tu na atra śītam vahneḥ iti tadvat etat api atha anyat cintyate na alam niṣedha vidhaye yadi paryudastam anya upalabdhiḥ itarasya katham niṣeddhrī naṣṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ saḥ iti vā bhavataḥ vikalpa ākāraḥ katham ghaṭa niṣedhanam ādadhāti 
JŚNĀ_148,6–149,3	 atra uttaram na iha asti asau= iti vikalpam abhiprasūteḥ anyaḥ niṣedha vidhiḥ anyadhiyaḥ na tāvat nābhāva kalpanadhiyaḥ api aviśaṅkitāyāḥ māna aṅga bhāvam avadhūya niṣedhaka tvam sataḥ vināśanam nāma na upapannam iti īritam na asataḥ karaṇe śaktiḥ aniṣṭāḥ vastunaḥ sataḥ tatas pratiyogi anubhavaḥ pratiyogi antara viraha vikalpam utpādayet iti na iha anupapattiḥ na ca tanmātrāt anyaḥ api anubhavasya pariniṣedhana vyāpāraḥ yasya api vikalpasya naṣṭaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti evam ākārasya vā niḥśaṅka gamana ādau tad artha kriyā anvita tayā pravṛtti vyāvṛtti avasthāyām vā nimitta bhāvāt na anya niṣedha kāri tvam evam vacanasya api tad vikalpa utpādana dvārakam eva niṣedha sādhana tvam draṣṭavyam etena atha na asti iti jñānam eva anupalambhaḥ tat api vastu sat katham vastu antara pratiṣedhasya viṣayaḥ syāt iti āt yavakara parihāraḥ siddhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_149,4^1	 na ca na asti iti jñānam anupalambhaḥ asmākam kim tu pratiyogi upalambhaḥ nirvikalpaḥ eva na asti iti jñānam tu manaḥ vyavahāra rūpam tat phalam eva kim ca evaṃvidha nirbandhena vastu cintāyām anupayogāt yat api asya na asti iti jñāna viṣaya nirūpaṇam tat api asat iti nirūpaṇena gata artham yat tu tad vivikta bhū tala ādeḥ viṣaya tvam āśaṅkya uktam na bhū tala ādeḥ vastu antara tvāt na ca vastu antare pratipādite pratīte vādya ghaṭa ādi vastu antaram abhūtam iti pratipāditam pratītam vā bhavati evam hi vastu antaram hi nāśaḥ iti etasmin mate yat dūṣaṇam uktam tat tu svayam eva parihṛtam syāt iti tat api asaṃbaddham kevalam hi bhū talam asya viṣayaḥ iti katham na ghaṭa ādeḥ abhūta tva bodhaḥ yā eva hi ghaṭa ādi apekṣayā kaivalya avasthā pradeśasya saḥ eva ghaṭa virahaḥ vacana āt inā api evam kevalam pradeśa pratipādane katham iva na prakṛta ghaṭa ādi apekṣya bhāva pratipādanam 
JŚNĀ_149,4^2	 evam yadi karpara ādi vat kevalasya nāśasya api upalambhaḥ syāt bhavatu ghaṭaḥ niṣedha pratītiḥ ghaṭa niṣedhaḥ tu kena kṛtaḥ pūrvam san= ā iva hi ghaṭa abhāvaḥ tad dvāreṇa pratipattavyaḥ na hi pradeśena ghaṭa abhāvaḥ janyante kim tu san= ā iva ghaṭa abhāvaḥ tad dvāreṇa niścetavyaḥ yadi hi ghaṭaḥ api na syāt na pradeśa eka rūpa niyatā pratītiḥ iti evam yathā yadi ghaṭaḥ adya api syāt na karpara eka rūpa niyatā pratipattiḥ tathā na nāśa eka rūpa niyatā pratipattiḥ iti balāt ghaṭa abhāva niścayaḥ bhavatu yadi pūrvam ghaṭa abhāvaḥ syāt sa ca na asti tad bhāve api kim nāśena kapālena eva pratiyoginā gata artha tvāt na ca nāśa pratītiḥ api asti iti uktam tasmāt sataḥ pradhvaṃsane sat rūpeṇa asat rūpeṇa vā dūṣaṇam uktam katham sat rūpeṇa sataḥ asataḥ vā niścaye kartavye syāt iti na samānaḥ parihāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_150,1	 yat tvāha na ca tad viveka apratītau tad vivikta grahaṇam bhavati tad vivekaḥ ca na bhū tala ādi svarūpam eva viśeṣaṇa tvāt iti tat nyāya bahiṣkṛtam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ api saṅkalpa ārūḍhe rūpe sa ca bhinnam bhāvam abhinnam ākalayati vyaktam tad anya ātmanā jiṣṇu sphāra kadamba ḍambaram iva sva aṃśaiḥ anaṃśam jagat kim ca su a ākṛti mātre eva viṣaya vyāmoha doha kṣamaḥ saṅkalpaḥ param ā aindrajālikaḥ iva vyādhūta bhūta sthitiḥ yathā hi bhinnam bhāvam ekīkurvan= utpadyate tathā abhinnam bhāvam bhinnam ākalayati iti api arthaḥ yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram śarīre kara caraṇa ādayaḥ lamba karṇaḥ devadattaḥ ityādi tasmāt kalpanā adhīnaḥ viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ abhinnaḥ api bhāve bheda vivakṣa apekṣa vyavahāraḥ katham bheda niyatam ātmānam ātanoti skhalat gatiḥ ayam rāhoḥ śiraḥ ityādi nirdeśaḥ iti ced yadi satyam etat tadā bhinnasya sākṣāt anupalambhāt eva iyam ca gatiḥ ghaṭa viveka ākhya padārtha antara apekṣayā api asti tathā api na iti koṣa pānam pramāṇam tasmāt sa ghaṭa ābha pradeśaḥ eva ayam anyaḥ ghaṭa viviktaḥ na tu ghaṭa vivekena bhinnena viśeṣitaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_150,2–151,1	 tasmāt yadi api kiñcid viśeṣaṇam bhinnam eva dṛṣṭam vāha ādi tathā api na ayam niyamaḥ viparyayasya api darśanāt saṃbhāvanāt ca bādhakā darśanāt vivakṣā paratantra tā tu dṛṣṭānta saṃbhāvanā bījam tat evam na vācyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyāt artha antara tvāt vāha ādi vat iti kim ca vyāptam bhidā yadi viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa tvam bheda atyayān nanu tadā tad abhāvaḥ eva deśaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ iti na asti yathā tathā idam api asti dṛśya mata bheda dṛś asti na iti na ca dṛśya anupalabdheḥ pramāṇa ātmanaḥ viśiṣṭa vyavahāra mātreṇa sa ghaṭāt anyaḥ iti artha niṣṭhena bādhaḥ kim tu tathā eva asya iti yat ca āha abhede api na pramāṇam kiñcid asti iti tad anunmīlita akṣasya eva sāmpratam anyathā pratyakṣa udayasya nivārayitum aśakyatvāt 
JŚNĀ_151,2	 yat ca idam yadi ca ghaṭaḥ na asti iti asya saṃjñānasya abhidhānasya ca bhū talam eva viṣayaḥ na ca tatas anyaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ tadā atra ghaṭaḥ asti iti asya api bhū talam eva viṣayaḥ syāt ghaṭaḥ api na tatas anyaḥ kalpanīyaḥ tathā utpādena viśiṣṭam bhū talam eva ubhaya trāpi aḥ tu na ca etat yuktam yasmāt ghaṭa sadbhāva vat ghaṭā sadbhāve api bhū ta lataḥ anyaḥ pratibhāti evam hi vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ prayogaḥ api arthavān eva bhavet iti tat varam januṣā andhaḥ na punar ayam durnīti dagdha buddhiḥ abhāva vat kila kalasaḥ api kalpanā mātra viṣayaḥ na locana gocaraḥ iti kim atra brūmaḥ sa kumbham udbhutam bhū talam iti api sahita utpattiḥ āpadyate na rūpa saṅkaraḥ bheda upalambhasya bhinna artha kriyā niyogasya ca durapahnava tvāt tadvat na abhāvaḥ api bhū tala kapāla ādibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ pratibhāti iti cintitam eva kim ca 
JŚNĀ_151,3–151,4	 kim iha kalasa dhvaṃsaḥ dṛśyaḥ na vā iti uditaḥ janaḥ vadatu samaya smṛtyā dṛṣṭim vimarśa parāṅmukhaḥ kalayasi punar kāṃskān arthān iha iti param yadi pradiśati dharā ādibhyaḥ sabhyaḥ tvam eva vayam na tu tatas vidhi pratiṣedha prayogayoḥ api kā anupapattiḥ avasthā dvaya pratipādanāt tathā ca jāla antareṇa praviṣṭa ālokasya abhāvaḥ bhinna deśaḥ bhāsamānaḥ kim apahnotum śakyaḥ kevalam 
JŚNĀ_151,5–152,1	 vicchinnaḥ sphuṭa nīla kānti kalitaḥ tāvat pradeśa sthiti rbhinna artha tva viniścayāt tu saḥ iti prakhyāti nāmā antaraḥ ālokasya yathā tathā anya virahaḥ api ātma svarūpa sphuṭīkāre kim kalasaḥ kim ātapa bhidā adhyakṣa iti citram mahat na hi sūkṣmam īkṣamāṇe api atyanta vicitrasya bhāva rāśeḥ a bhāvānām saṃbandhi bhedāt bheda upacāram antareṇa sūkṣmaḥ api svabhāva bhedaḥ tamaḥ iva upalambha gocaraḥ tad varam āloka vivekaḥ api sakalāni aviveka vadana ālokyaḥ eva astu tamaḥ tu vastu eva iti gṛhāṇa kim aṅga kaṣṭa saṃkaṭe sukhinam ātmānam āveśayasi 
JŚNĀ_152,2	 nanu nimīlita akṣasya api tādṛś nīla pratibhāsaḥ saṃbhavī na ca nīlam artham upasthāpayati iti tat ayuktam kṛṣṇa varṇa antarasya sarvasya api abhāva prasaṅgāt anyādṛśam etat kṛṣṇa antaram kalayā api nimīlita akṣa pratibhāsāt iti ced andhakāraḥ api tarhi punar parimita deśaḥ vicitra saṃsthānaḥ pratibhāsamānaḥ sphuṭataram nimīlita akṣa pratibhāsāt bhinna rūpaḥ eva anubhūyate ekarasaḥ ca nimīlita akṣa pratibhāsaḥ andhakāraḥ tu kadācid kiraṇa paramāṇu nikara saṅkara kāle virala rūpaḥ anyadā ghanaḥ dhanataraḥ vā iti katham sāmyam kṛṣṇa tā mātram punar anyatra api sādhāraṇam 
JŚNĀ_152,3	 anyatra nīla varṇe vastuni sparśa antara sahacāraḥ avaśyambhāvī iti ced na indranīla ādi maṇi kiraṇa jālake tad abhāvāt anupalakṣyaḥ tatra sparśaḥ iti kalpanam na andhakārāt vibheti tasmāt rūpa mātram ubhayam astu na hi dṛṣṭe anupapannam nāma yadi ca āśrayaḥ avaśya mṛgyaḥ maṇi kuḍya ādikam asti eva na ca vastu vyavasthāyām pratyakṣa pratibhā sam āśrayataḥ pratibhāsa viplavena vyabhicāra abhidhānam dhīmataḥ dhinoti anyathā vāta pitta kṣobha ādinā jvalita stambha ādi saṃdarśanāt satyam api jvalita stambha ādikam asatyam syāt prakṛti pratyāpattau tu yathā tad pratibhāsā bhāvaḥ tathā nayana unmīlana kāle nīla abhāva viplavasya api andhakāra adarśanam tu svastha avasthā apekṣam eva yathā upavarṇita viśeṣam tad pratibhāsasya ca pratyakṣa saṃbhava sāmagrī vighaṭane vighaṭanam guṇaḥ eva na aparādhaḥ pratyakṣa svabhāva tāyāḥ iṣṭa tvāt 
JŚNĀ_153,1–153,2	 yat punaruktam kṛṣṇa rūpasya alokena vinā grahītum aśakya tvāt iti nanu pīta avadāta ādayaḥ api na āloka nirapekṣa vīkṣaṇāḥ iti pradīpa candra ātapa ādayaḥ api prakāśa antaram apekṣeran vicitrāḥ tu bhāva prakṛtayaḥ pramāṇa samadhigatā na paryanuyogam arhanti yat ca āloka vat tad abhāvasya api grahaṇe cakṣuḥ āloka antara nirapekṣam ācakṣāte śaṅkara nyāya bhūṣaṇau tat api na kiñcid niścāyakam hi cakṣuḥ vijñānam abhāvasya na grāha kam avastu tvāt āloka antara anapekṣam iti tu siddham eva na ca etat vācyam yaḥ hi bhāvaḥ yāvatyā sāmagryā gṛhyate tad abhāvaḥ api tāvatyā eva iti āloka grahaṇa sāmagryāḥ gṛhyamāṇam tamaḥ tad abhāvaḥ eva iti tamaḥ grahaṇa sāmagryāḥ gṛhyamāṇasya ālokasya eva tad abhāvatā prasaṅgena anaikāntika tvāt ghaṭa paṭayoḥ vā samāna grahaṇa sāmagrīkatayā paramparā bhāva tva prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_153,3–153,4	 tasmāt padārtha antare rūpa vivekena pratibhāsamānam adhyakṣe andhakāram āloka virodhi vastu eva virodhi tve tarhi kadācid ālokam api andhakāraḥ paribhavet iti na ca udyam adya api prakṛti vādasya upasthāpanāt tūla anala ādi vat etena tamasaḥ eva pratiyogi vastunaḥ upalabdhiḥ abhāvam sahasā vyavahārayitum prabhavati tamasya āloka nivṛttau= api iti siddhe yathā iha ālokasya abhāva upalabdhiḥ tathā sarvatra iti śaṅkara ādīnām pratyāśā pratyādeśaḥ veditavyaḥ anupalabdhi niṣṭhāyām tu jñāna ākāre api pratiyoginyabhāva siddhiḥ darśitāḥ na ca kaścid doṣaḥ iti āstām tāvat tasmāt na abhāvaḥ nāma kiñcid yatra kāraṇa vyāpāraḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_153,5	 etena trilocanaḥ api nirastaḥ yat āha bhāvasya vyatiriktām nivṛttim anicchadbhiḥ aśakyā svarūpa nivṛttiḥ avasthāpayitum yā hi tasya prāktanī kācid avasthā bhavadbhiḥ artha kriyā nirvartana yogyā dṛṣṭā sā eva yadi uttara kālam api anuvarteta tarhi sva rūpeṇa eva nivṛttau bhāvaḥ katham avasthāpyeta tadānīmayam naṣṭaḥ bhāvaḥ na sapadi sva hetu pratilabdha svarūpa atirekiṇī tasya kācid avasthā utpadyeta 
JŚNĀ_154,1–154,2	 utpattau sā eva tasya ātmā antaram jātam iti atādavasthyam atādavasthyam eva asya vināśam brūmaḥ tādavasthye tādātmyam eva sva rūpeṇa nivṛttaḥ bhāvaḥ iti asya śabdasya satyam artham na vidmaḥ svarūpa nivṛttiḥ khalu iyam bhavantī bhāvaḥ eva syāt bhāvāt anyā vā tattve sva kāraṇebhyaḥ niṣpannasya anyathā anutpattau= uttpatteḥ ārabhya sattvāt nitya tvam prasajyate anyathātve ca tat eva nivṛtteḥ anyatvam iti priyam anuṣṭhitam priyeṇa tasmāt utsṛjya vibhramam nāśa utpattiḥ eva naṣṭa tvam abhyupagantavyam tat kim ucyate naṣṭasya adarśanam na ca tasya kiñcid bhavati iti adarśanam naṣṭasya punar abhāva darśanam eva ātma hānam abhāva utpattim eva vayam aṅgīkurmaḥ iti sarvam anavadyam 
JŚNĀ_154,3	 akṣaṇikāḥ santaḥ kāraṇavat tvāt yad kāraṇa vat tadakṣaṇikam yathā bhāva vināśaḥ kāraṇavantaḥ ca ime santaḥ tasmāt akṣaṇikāḥ iti kāraṇavat tvasya sādhya viparyaye vṛtti śaṅkā vināśa hetumat tvam eva nivartayati iti prasiddha vyāptikāt kāraṇavat tvāt akṣaṇika tva siddhiḥ iti vyatirikta nivṛttim antareṇa api svarūpa nivṛtteḥ upapādi tattvāt tatas ca kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam kutas prāktana śakta avasthā sthitiḥ vyatirikta utpāde api katham naṣṭaḥ nāma atādavasthyam atādātmyam ca jātam iti asya ati akṣarasya sva hetoḥ eva avasthā svabhāva antara virahitaḥ ayam jātaḥ iti eva arthaḥ uktaḥ tad mūlakaḥ atāda vasthya ādi vyavahāraḥ eva paścāt bhāvī na tad vikalpa pratibhāsi bhāva antaram iti na tattva anyatva vikalpa avakāśaḥ tasmāt utsṛjya vibhramam naṣṭa vyavahāraḥ astu na tu tasya anyat kiñcid jāyate iti adarśanam ca abhāva darśanam eva iti saṃprati eva pratyākhyātam iti sarvam anavadyam 
JŚNĀ_154,4	 tasmāt prasajya ātmanaḥ abhāvasya nāśa ākhyasya hetuḥ eva na kaścid vinaśvara svabhāve tu hetu antara śaktim apākṛtya sva hetoḥ eva sāmarthya samarthanād jāta mātram eva vinaśyati iti na kṣaṇa antaram anveti iti siddheḥ kāraṇavat tvasya akṣaṇika tvena vyāpti asiddheḥ anekāntaḥ kṛtakānām avaśyam ante api nāśa abhyupagame ca virodhaḥ pramāṇa gocarasya pakṣīkaraṇe pratijñāyai anumāna bādhāḥ agocare ca āśraya svarūpayoḥ asiddhiḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_154,5	 yat punar ayam bhagavataḥ bhāṣya kārasya pratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhim anavagāhamānaḥ anurūpa vikalpa abhāva udbhāvana mātra sāreṇa vistareṇa dūṣaṇam abhilaṣat = apa bhāṣaṇa pramādam ācarati tat asya caṭula vaṭu bhāva sulabham anātma jña tā viṣkaraṇa mātram iti mantavyam tathā hi pratyakṣa siddham kṣaṇika tvam iti na pratyakṣa vyavahṛtam anurūpa vikalpa an udayāt kim tu pratyakṣa gṛhītam vyavahāra tva anumānāt tat ca anumānam yadi svayam kutaścid liṅgāt prasādhya pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇa bhaṅga grahaṇa vyavahāram ādadhīta sāmarthyāt tadā na viśeṣaḥ sattva ādi anumāna vat arthataḥ hi tadā pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇa bhaṅga grahaṇam avasthāpyamānam sva pauruṣa sparśa abhāvāt na pratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhi prasiddhim puṣṇāti yadā tu pramāṇa antara siddham adhyakṣasya kṣaṇa mātra sthiti grahaṇam āśritya vyavahāra mātra sādhanam anumānam pṛṣṭhaja vikalpa nirviśeṣam tat pauruṣam eva dīpayat utpadyate tadā pratyakṣatas kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhiḥ iti mukhyam ākhyāyate tat ayam arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_155,1–155,4	 kṣaṇi tvam adhyakṣadhiyā adhipātam pātam punar na vyavahāram etat atas samakṣa graha sādhanena prasādhyate tad vyavahāraḥ eva kṣaṇa bhaṅge anyadā asiddhe pratyakṣeṇa graha sthitiḥ pratyakṣeṇa grahāt asya kṣaṇa bhaṅga vyavasthitiḥ tathā hi yat nirbhāti yathā tathā tat akhilam gaṅgā ambu gauram yathā na ūced na prativastu śakti niyamaḥ saṅkīrṇa bhāve bhavet saṃskārāḥ pratibhānti ca indriyam atiṣu eka kṣaṇa sthāyinaḥ syāt ekakṣaṇa vīkṣaṇa āt itarathā dṛṣṭaḥ tri kālī kalaḥ 
JŚNĀ_155,5^1	 liṅga rūpa upapatti vyavakīrṇaḥ ayam svabhāva hetu prayogaḥ atra ca sa pakṣe sadbhāvāt na virodha doṣaḥ dvitīya pādena ca anekānta parihāraḥ tathā hi nirbhānam pratyakṣe pratibhānam uktam tatas yāvatā viśeṣeṇa padārthaḥ pratyakṣe pratibhāsam āsādayati tat niyama parihāreṇa yadi svarūpa sthitim ābhajeta tadā sarva saṅkīrṇam asya rūpam iti sarvatra sarva upayoga ādi prasaṅgaḥ atas svarūpa niyame pramāṇa apekṣāyām pravṛtti nivṛtti kāmasya yat yathā pratyakṣe pratibhātam tat tathā eva san na anyayā iti tat anena avaitathya vyāptaḥ hi pratyakṣa pratibhāsaḥ arthasya anyathā avasthāne vipakṣe vyāpaka abhāvāt abhavan= tathā avasthānena vyāpyate iti darśitam tṛtīya pādena pakṣa dharma upasaṃhāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_155,5^2	 tad asiddhi parihāraḥ caturthena pūrva apara kālayoḥ eka tve hi padārthasya dṛṣṭāt rūpāt rūpa antara virahāt sakala kāla kalā kalitasya deśa antara yuṣaḥ a pi rūpasya avaśyam pratibhāsaḥ iti na deśa kāla antara avasthā pratipattaye pramāṇa antara paryeṣaṇa avakāśaḥ asti ca paryeṣaṇāḥ idānīm anya deśe kāle vā tat vastu katham asti kiṃsvinna upanipātinā rāga rasena siktam iti tad upanipāta saṃbhavinī avasare vimarśa darśanāt na ca darśana viṣayīkṛte tathā saṃbhavaḥ na ca dṛṣṭe api anavasāyaḥ śakyaḥ abhidhātum tādṛśi jijñāsite rakta ādau rūpe kṣaṇikatā vat anabhyāsā bhāvāt anyathā paścāt darśane api na avasāya udayaḥ syāt tasmāt tat anavasāyaḥ tu tad apratibhāsāt eva 
JŚNĀ_156,1	 nanu vastuna strekālya vyāpti pratibhāse api sva saṃbandhi viśeṣāṇām kāla deśa daśa antarāṇām apratibhāsaḥ na bādhakaḥ kṣaṇika grahaṇe api tad saṃbandhi hetu phala saṃyogya ādi vastu antarāṇām apratibhāsasya samāna tvāt atas saṃbandhi antara apekṣayā pramāṇa antara paryeṣaṇam api yuktam eva iti ced na evam deśa kāla kriyā guṇa ādīnām bhāvāt bheda asiddheḥ bhinnasya tu saṃbandhinaḥ api pratibhāsaḥ tad pratibhāse mā abhūt tasmāt kṣaṇa antara daśāḥ sarvāḥ nirvāsya kṣaṇa parigatena eva rūpeṇa pratibhāsanam samasta vastunaḥ siddham 
JŚNĀ_156,2	 yāvat tarhi rakta ādi rūpā visadṛśī daśā na sannidhīyate tāvat kālam ekīkṛtau ca grahaṇam astu tat api na asti darśana lakṣaṇa anantaram jhaṭiti vicalane vilocanasya sadṛśeṣu api tattvataḥ kṣaṇa antareṣu viparyaya śaṅkā avatārāt sākṣātkṛteṣu ca tad ayogāt yad anantaram tarhi locana calanam tad darśanam na eka kṣaṇikam avasāya viparyaya śaṅke pṛthagjanasya saṃbandham utthāpayitum avaśyam hi dvitrān api kṣaṇān udīyamānam eva tad darśanam tad upayogi tatas dvi tri kṣaṇa sthāyinaḥ rūpasya katham prathama kṣaṇe pratibhāsa bhraṃśaḥ yena dvitīya ādi kṣaṇasya bheda siddhiḥ iti ced yasya tāvat prathama kṣaṇa vīkṣaṇa kṣaṇa antaram eva calati cakṣuṣi viṣaya vikalpa udayaḥ tasya durvāraḥ sarva aparakṣaṇa viparyaya vimarśa avakāśaḥ 
JŚNĀ_157,1^1	 na evam kasyacid saṃbhavati iti ced kim atra bādhakam sādhakam api kim atra iti cait ucyate yadi tāvat īkṣaṇa kṣaṇa mātra anantaram avasāya udaye sādhaka anveṣaṇam tadā dvividhaḥ pratyakṣa pṛṣṭhajaḥ vikalpaḥ dṛṣṭa mātra vikalpaḥ ca dṛṣṭam idam vastram vā iti eva svarūpa viśeṣa vikalpaḥ ca kṛtrima itara maṇi muktā ādau tatra asya viṣaye sādṛśya apahārya manda dhiyaḥ pṛthagjanasya bhrāntiḥ utsarga siddha abhyāsa prakarṣa saṃbhavinā apohyate atas prakarṣa tāratamyena udayasya kālasya lāghava tāratamī a niṣṭhāyām darśana kṣaṇa anantaram api ayam udayam āsādayan= aśakya saṃbhāvana niṣedhaḥ dṛṣṭa mātrasya vikalpasya tu darśana anantaram eva janma utsava siddham sāmagrī bhedena apohyate 
JŚNĀ_157,1^2	 tathā hi prakṛtyā anādi saṃsāra santati sātmībhūta vikalpāḥ tu anubhūta pratyakṣe api ca vastuni vikalpa apekṣa pravṛtti nivṛttayaḥ viśeṣataḥ sukha duḥkha prāpti parihāra arthinaḥ sarve sarvadā tad sādhana vimarśa abhyāsa vāsita santatayaḥ katham tad viṣaya anubhave a pi samatha hetau samupasthite vilambita vikalpa bhāvān anubhavitum arhanti kevalam kadācid saṃhatāḥ yatā na vikalpa saṃhāra abhyāsaḥ kadācid anya āsaktiḥ kadācid ātyantika māhāt āmukhībhāvaḥ iti evaṃprakāra sāmagryāḥ vilamba saṃvāhita vikalpa janmānaḥ bhaveyuḥ tad abhāve tu siddhaḥ eva pratyakṣa kṣaṇa anantaram udayaḥ vikalpasya tatas tad darśana vinākṛteṣu sarveṣu eva viṣa ya kṣaṇeṣu rakta tā ādi sandeha dolān dālanam manasaḥ viprakṛṣṭa kṣaṇa paramparāsu iva dvitīya kṣaṇe api vimarśa viṣayīkṛte katham anavakāśaḥ na ca pratyakṣa pratibhāse api evam tasmāt kṣaṇa parigatena iva padārtha rāśiḥ adhyakṣa pratibhāsam āviśati 
JŚNĀ_157,2	 syāt etat pratyakṣasya kṣaṇika tve sati upapannam etat yāvatā pratyakṣam aneka kṣaṇa vyāpi tatas anekṣaṇa vyāpini pratibhāsite vikalpa avasāyaḥ tat katham eka kṣaṇa grahaṇa siddhiḥ ucyate kim tāvat sva rūpa niṣpattau= upayogāt aneka kṣaṇasya vyāpakam adhyakṣam atha kṣaṇa niṣpannasya eva sthairyāt tatra ādya kalpaḥ tāvat asaṃbhavī jñārnasya avayavi rūpa tā viyogena khaṇḍaśas utpattara yogāt kṣaṇa bhedinaḥ ca te avayavāḥ pratyakṣasya yadi paricchitti svabhāvāḥ tadā tāvanti eva pratyakṣāṇoti prathama pratyakṣa apekṣayā sā eva cintā aparicchitti svabhāve tu samuditam api na pratyakṣam akhaṇḍaśas paricchittiḥ samudāyena sakala ātma vastu paricchedaḥ tat āpi ādi akṣaṇa paricchinnaḥ khaṇḍaḥ eva sakala ātmavastu tad apraviṣṭasya tatas bhinna tvāt anyathā krameṇa pratīyamānam viśvam ekam eva vastu syāt sakalam ca pratyakṣam ekam eva pratyakṣam iti 
JŚNĀ_158,1	 dvitīye pakṣe api niṣpanna vyāpārasya vā kṣaṇa antara vyāpti niṣpanna vyāpārasya eva vā prathama pakṣe viṣaya grahaṇam eva asya vyāpāraḥ iti tāvatā eva vikalpa janma avakāśaḥ svayam kṣaṇa antaram astu mā vā tathā ca sati calati cakṣuṣi viṣaye vā tad viṣaya grahaṇa pravaṇam adhyakṣam avatiṣṭhate iti apūrvaḥ ayam nayaḥ agrahaṇa āvakṣaṇa avasthāne tu na tāvatā eva vikalpa janma avakāśāt muktiḥ na ca pūrva grāhiṇaḥ paścāt agrahaṇe sthairya pakṣa sthitiḥ iti indriya viṣaya vidhāne bāgṛhṇataḥ api tasya sthitiḥ iti śraddhā avadheyam eva evam aniṣpanna vyāpāra sthitiḥ iti api duḥśraddhānam na hi kārya antara vat janma atirekeṇa jñānasya api vyāpāraḥ astu ca evam tathā api indriya viṣaya upanidhau labdha udayam adhyakṣam anadhigata gocaram ubhaya vicāla kāle kalayat kila asti iti su bhāṣitam pūrvavat 
JŚNĀ_158,2	 tad alamati pratiṣṭhaiḥ mithyā vikalpaiḥ iti caturtha pādena prāk paścāt vā citra rakta ādi rūpasya tadā eva nirbhāse sūcita pramāṇa antara avṛtti viparyayeṇa yat yat rūpam vyavasiti saham kvāpi nirbhāsamāne mānam bhinnam spṛhayati na tat tatra nirbhāsa yogi rūpa ābhāse rasaḥ iva tathā tad kṣaṇe bhāsamāne pūrva avasthā vyavasiti sahā apekṣyate mānam anyat iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdheḥ sthitam etat eka kṣaṇa sthāyinam eva bhāva svabhāvam āmukhayati pratyakṣa pratibhāsaḥ iti na ca tad pratibhāsa bahirbhūtaḥ api svabhāvaḥ tasya iti nivedita prāyam vyāpti samarthana prastāve 
JŚNĀ_158,3–159,1	 tasmāt siddham adhyakṣeṇa bhaṅgura tvam vyavahṛtam ca anumānena māna antara upapāditam tad siddhi siddhena iti pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇika kalane nyāya diś sūcanātas sāmarthī a āpta vyavahṛti vidhau dhīmataḥ na prabandhaḥ saḥ api ācārya pravara raviṇā kāri kim tu alpamedhāḥ stattva abodhāt prakṛti mukharaḥ asatyam abhyujjagāraḥ naḥ mārgam ācārya raveḥ apekṣya cakṣaṇigrahe asmākam atha kramaḥ yatas
