JŚNĀ_159,2–159,5	 yathā ca bhāṣya ukti samanvayaḥ tathā ana gītam aprastuta vistarāt bhiyā tad ala mānuṣaṅgika kathā nirbandhena sthitam etat na vināśaḥ nāma parigha ādibhyaḥ bhinnaḥ kaścid mudgara ādi sādhyaḥ yaḥ tad anupanipāta daśāyām abhavan bhāvasya sthairya siddhi manoratham paripūrayet iti durnīta āśrama vedikā dṛḍhatara stambhān amūn śaṅkara nyāya alaṅkaraṇa trilocana vacaspatyāhvayān helayā unmūlya kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ eṣa vihitaḥ yat puṇyam āptam mayā tena syāt para pāragaḥ tribhuvane jñāna śriyaḥ ayam janaḥ ahetuka vināśa adhikāraḥ nāma caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ 
JŚNĀ_161,1–161,2^1	 namaḥ bhagavate vīta rāgāya iha dahana ādinā dhūma ādeḥ vyāptiḥ adhyakṣa anupalabdhi sādhana tad utpatti lakṣaṇā iti vyutpādyate pare hi pura stanāḥ tāvat agnimati dhūmasya darśanam adarśanam ca tad virahiṇī iti eva anvaya vyatireki tvam kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ tatra darśana adarśanam yādṛcchikam api sakṛt bhavet iti ca bhūyas pravṛttim apekṣate nanu bhūyasā api pravṛtte darśana adarśane ghaṭa kulaṭa ādau= upalabdhaḥ vyabhicāraḥ iti ced kim etāvatā tatra api anumānam astu iti ucyate atha tadvat dhūma ādau= api mā bhūt iti prathama pakṣaḥ tāvat vyabhicārāt eva nirastaḥ dvitīyaḥ api avyabhicārāt eva na hi anyasya vyabhicāre dhūmasya kiñcid 
JŚNĀ_161,2^2	 na khalu viṣa annam aniṣṭam iti bhakṣya antaram api heyam astu tāvatā ca sarvāḥ nivṛttiḥ labdhā iti kim utpatti prārthanayā tad niścaya upayoginā vā pratyakṣānupalambhena tad utpattiḥ api yadi darśana adarśanāt eva gṛhyeta kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ anumānam eva ca vibhāgena bhavatu iti tad anveṣaṇam sa ca vibhāgaḥ vyabhicāra avi abhicāra dvāreṇa siddhaḥ asati ca vyabhicāre tāvatā eva gamaka tvam anarthikā tad utpattiḥ vyabhicāre ca śatam api tad utpattayaḥ na samarthāḥ tasmāt sannikarṣeṇa paryeṣaṇam saṃyogena eva kṛtārtham ataā iva saṃyogī hetuḥ ucyate vahneḥ dhūmaḥ na kāryam iti 
JŚNĀ_161,3	 trilocanaḥ tu āha pratyakṣa anupalambhayoḥ viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt katham tābhyām sāmānyayoḥ sambandha pratītiḥ atha anagni vyāvṛttena adhūma vyāvṛttasya sambandhaḥ pratīyate eva iti nanu saḥ api kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ na tāvat pratyakṣasya tasya sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt na api anumānasya tasya api tad pūrvaka tvāt na ca vyāvṛttaḥ kaścid sambandhaḥ atha pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvī vikalpaḥ dṛṣṭe bhede abheda madhyavasyati tat eva sāmānyam evam api vikalpānām na vastu eva viṣayaḥ api tu grāhya ākāraḥ sa ca na vastu vastu tu teṣām parokṣam eva iti katham tena api sambandha grahaḥ asmākam tu bhūyas darśana sahāyena manasā tad jātīyānām sambandhaḥ gṛhītaḥ bhavati atas dhūmaḥ na agnim vyabhicarati tad vyabhicāre dhūmaḥ upādhi rahitam sambandham atikrāmet iti hetoḥ vipakṣa śaṅkā nivartakam pramāṇam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta upādhi viraha hetuḥ anupalambha ākhyam pratyakṣam eva tatas siddhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_162,1–162,2	 vācaspateḥ tu prapañcaḥ tathā hi dhūma ādīnām vahni ādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ na tu vahni ādīnām dhūma ādibhiḥ te hi vinā api dhūma ādibhiḥ upalabhyante yadā tu ārdra indhana sambandham anubhavanti tadā dhūma ādibhiḥ sambadhyante tasmāt vahni ādīnām ārdra indhana ādi upādhi kṛtaḥ sambandhaḥ na tu svābhāvikaḥ tatas na niyataḥ svābhāvikaḥ tu dhūma ādīnām vahni ādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ tad upādheḥ anupalabhyamāna tvāt kvacid vyabhicārasya adarśanāt anupalabhyamānasya api kalpanā anupapatteḥ na ca adṛśyamānaḥ api darśanān arha tayā sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena sandihyamānaḥ upādhiḥ sambandhasya svābhāvika tvam pratibadhnāti iti yuktam avaśyam śaṅkayā bhāvyam niyāmakam apaśyatām 
JŚNĀ_162,3	 iti ca datta avakāśā laukika pramāṇa maryādā atikrameṇa saṃśaya piśācī labdha prasarā na kvacid na asti iti na ayam kvacid pravarteta sarvatra eva kasyacid anarthasya kathañcid śaṅkā āspada tvāt anartha śaṅkāyāḥ ca prekṣāvatām nivṛtti aṅga tvāt antatas snigdha anna pāna upayoge api maraṇa darśanāt tasmāt prāmāṇika lokayātrām anupālayatā yathādarśanam āśaṅkanīyam na tu adṛṣṭa pūrvam api viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ eva hi saṃśayaḥ na asmṛteḥ bhavati na ca smṛtiḥ ananubhūta care bhavitum arhati tat uktam mīmāṃsā śloka vārtika kṛtā na āśaṅkā niṣpramāṇikāḥ iti tathā tena eva bṛhaṭṭīkāyām utprekṣeta hi yaḥ mohāt ajātam api bādhakam sa sarva vyavahāreṣu saṃśaya ātmā kṣayam vrajet iti tasmāt upādhim prayatnena anviṣyantaḥ anupalabhamānā na asti iti avagamya svābhāvika tvam sambandhasya niścinumaḥ 
JŚNĀ_162,4	 syāt etat anyasya anyena saha akāraṇena ced svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ bhavet sarvam sarveṇa svabhāvataḥ sambadhyeta sarvam sarvasmāt gamyeta atha anyasya ced anyat kāryam kasmāt sarvam sarvasmāt na bhavati anya tva aviśeṣāt tatas ca saḥ eva atiprasaṅgaḥ yadi ucyeta na bhāva svabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ tasmāt anya tva aviśeṣe api kiñcid eva kāraṇam kiñcid ca kāryam iti nanu eṣa svabhāvān anuyogaḥ akārya kāraṇa bhūtānām api svabhāva pratibandhe tulyaḥ eva tasmāt yat kiñcid etat api 
JŚNĀ_163,1	 kena punar pramāṇena eṣa svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ gṛhyate pratyakṣa sambandheṣu pratyakṣeṇa tathā hi yadā tāvat prathamam vahni dhūmayoḥ saha ārdra indhanayoḥ sambandham paśyati tadā kim dvayoḥ api svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ aupādhikaḥ vā atha dhūmasya aupādhikaḥ vahneḥ svābhāvikaḥ vahneḥ aupādhikaḥ dhūmasya svābhāvikaḥ iti ca na śakyam nirdhārayitum tatra vahneḥ anārdra indhanasya vinā dhūma mayaḥ golaka ādau darśanāt ārdra indhana upādhiḥ asya dhūmena sambandhaḥ na tu svābhāvikaḥ iti niścīyate dhūma viśeṣasya tu vinā vahnim anupalambhāt upādhi bhedasya ca anupalabhyamānasya kalpanāyām pramāṇa abhāvāt viśeṣa smṛti apekṣasya saṃśayasya anupalabdha pūrve anutpādāt utpāde vā atiprasaṅgāt prekṣāvatām pravṛtti ucchedāt svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ avadhāryate 
JŚNĀ_163,2	 tat idam avadhāraṇam na mānasam anapekṣasya manasaḥ bāhyeṣu pravṛtta ābandha vadhi rābhāva prasaṅgāt bhūyas darśana sāpekṣasya ca pravṛttau pramāṇa antara āpātāt na hi manaḥ nimittam iti eva mānasam tathā sati na kiñcid na mānasam pratyaya mātrasya manaḥ nimitta tvāt tad tad asādhāraṇa kāraṇa apekṣayā ca tad tad pramāṇa vyapadeśe atra api bhūyas darśanam asādhāraṇam kāraṇam asti iti pramāṇa antaram jātam tasmāt abhijāta maṇi bheda tattva vat bhūyas darśana janita saṃskāra sahāyam indriyam eva dhūma ādīnām vahni ādibhiḥ svābhāvika sambandha grāhī iti yuktam 
JŚNĀ_163,3	 evam māna antara vidita sambandheṣu māna antarāṇi eva yathāsvam bhūyas darśana sahāyāni svābhāvika sambandha grahaṇe pramāṇam unnetavyāni svabhāvataḥ ca pratibaddhāḥ hetavaḥ sva sādhyena yadi sādhyam antareṇa bhaveyuḥ svabhāvāt eva pracyaveran= iti tarka sahāyāḥ nirasta sādhya vyatireka sandehāḥ yatra dṛṣṭāḥ tatra sva sādhyam upasthāpayanti eva na ca śyāma tā ādiṣu maitra tanaya tva ādīnām svābhāvika pratibandha saṃbhavaḥ anna pāna pariṇati bhedasya upādheḥ śyāma tāyāḥ maitra tanaya tva sambandham prati vidyamāna tvena maitra tanaya tvasya āgamaka tvāt etena pakvānyasya vṛkṣasya agra vartīni phalāni etad vṛkṣa prabhava tvāt āsvādita phala vat iti ādayaḥ api aupādhika sambandhāḥ vyākhyātāḥ tasmāt yasya svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ niyataḥ saḥ anumāna aṅgam yathā dhūma kṛtaka tva ādiḥ yasya tu aupādhikaḥ saḥ anumāna aṅgam na bhavati yathā tad putra tva ādiḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_164,1	 atra ucyate vyāptiḥ nāma vyāpakasya tatra bhāvaḥ eva vyāpyasya vā tatra eva bhāvaḥ iti evam kartṛ karma dharma tayā pratīteḥ anvaya vyatireka rūpa tayā dvidhā anumāna samīhayā samīhitā anyathā anumāne anupayogāt yadi hi sādhane satya vaśyam sādhyam bhavati eva iti sāmānyena siddham bhavati sādhya abhāve vā sādhanam avaśyam na bhavati iti tadā viśeṣa uddeśena sādhanavati sādhya pratyāśā bhavati sādhya abhāve tad abhāvasya yadā tu na yathā ukta niyamaḥ tadā sādhanam ca bhavati na ca sādhyam iti āśaṅkāyām katham anumāna avakāśaḥ tasmāt anumānam icchatā niyatam yathā uktā eva vyāptiḥ apekṣitavyā na ca bhūyas darśana mātreṇa tasyāḥ siddhiḥ yathā hi yadṛcchayā api sakṛt saṃvāda saṃbhāvanā tathā katipaya vārān api yadṛcchayā eva bhavataḥ saṃvādasya niṣedhaḥ yathā ca sakṛt sahacāra darśane vyabhicāraḥ upalabdhaḥ iti na sarvatra sarvadā ca tad sahacāra niyamaḥ iti śaṅkā tathā bhūyas darśane api vyabhicāra darśanāt eva bhavantī na śakya niṣedhāḥ 
JŚNĀ_164,2^1	 yat tu vyabhicāra darśanāt ananumānam uktam tat na yuktam tathā hi kasya punar iha vyabhicāra darśanam anumāna vidhnāya prayojakam kim pratipattuḥ eva atha śāstra kārasya yasya kasyacid vā antya pakṣe pratipattuḥ kim āyātam yatas na anumāna mayam kuryāt anyathā anyasya tad tad viṣaya pratyakṣīkāreṇa eva saḥ api kṛtārthaḥ iti kim anumānam avaśyam anveṣate śāstra kāram ca pṛṣṭvā adṛṣṭa sambandhaḥ api dhūmāt agnim anumāsyate iti alaukikam pratipattuḥ tu na avaśyam san= api vyabhicāraḥ gocarībhavati na hi yatra vyabhicāraḥ tatra eva tāvati kāle deśe vā avaśyam pratītim avatarati apratīyamānaḥ ca na asti eva iti na śakyam avasātum ātyantika kāla vyavadhāne api vā darśanāt anupajāta bādha buddhīnām api nidhana sannidheḥ avarodhāt ca tatas ca sati api vyabhicāre pratipattuḥ darśanam saṃbhāvyate 
JŚNĀ_164,2^2	 bhavati ca avyabhicāre anumānam anyathā na iti upadiṣṭasya smaran kim asau= avyabhicāra niścayāt anumāne pravartatām nivartatām vā adarśana mātreṇa niścaya ayogāt avyabhicāra asiddheḥ sandigdha asiddha hetu vat tatra ādya pakṣe karabhāt api anumānam kuryāt dvitīye tu na dhūmāt api na hi vidyamānasya avidyamānasya vā vyabhicārasya anavalokana kāle kaścid viśeṣaḥ tatas yadi bhūyāṃsam api saha upalambham karabhagarda bhayoḥ yādṛcchikam āśaṅkate tathā dhūma dahanayoḥ api kasmāt na iti samānam atha pratyāsannayoḥ api karabhagarda bhayoḥ svātantryeṇa upalakṣyamāṇayoḥ paśyāmi tāvat kim ekam apasāryamāṇam anyaḥ anudhāvati dhenum iva vatsaḥ iti jijñāsayā tathā anutiṣṭhan na tathā pratipadyate vahnau tu apasārite dhūma apagamam eva pratyeti vahni sannidhāne vā dhūma saṃbhavam 
JŚNĀ_165,1	 atas saṃbhāvyate vyabhicāraḥ karabhasya anyadā api na dhūmasya iti ced viśiṣṭam eva tarhi darśana adarśanam dhūme utpatti grāhakam ca yādṛśam tādṛśam na karabhe tathā hi yadā agni abhāve dhūma abhāvam pratyeti tadā saha upalambha pūrvakam agni mātra abhāve dhūma adarśanam upayuktam pratibandha siddhau anyathā saha darśana abhāve tāvat aṅgārā viśeṣa citra bhānu mātra apasāraṇam ca dhūmaḥ ca na asti eva karabhavat gardabha abhāvaḥ iti kva sambandha bodhaḥ saha darśane api yadi vastu antara sahita hutāśa apasāraḥ tadā pūrvam asya sattā kim hutāśasya vastu antarasya vā sat tayā prayuktā iti na niścayaḥ hutāśa mātra abhāve tu tad bhāva prayuktaḥ eva prāgasya bhāvaḥ iti sulabham yadā api pāvaka mātra sannidhau dhūma sattā tadā api pūrvam ubhaya adarśana pūrvakam agni mātra upadarśane darśanam dhūmasya upayuktam anyathā agni mātram ānītam dhūmaḥ ca asti eva iti kara bhavat kutra pratibandha siddhiḥ vastu antara sahita hutāśana ānayane api kasya abhāvena prayuktaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ dhūmasya iti na niścayaḥ hutāśa mātra upalambhe tu tad abhāva prayuktaḥ yuktaḥ 
JŚNĀ_165,2	 tat evam pūrva darśana apekṣa niyata ekā darśana pūrvam ca anya adarśanam viśiṣṭam ucyate tat api prācīna darśana mautara kālika yathā ukta adarśana dvaya apekṣayā viśiṣṭam evam adarśana pūrvake api darśane viśeṣaḥ ūhitavyaḥ yad abhāvāt karabha ādau na āśvāsaḥ tam eva darśana adarśanayoḥ viśeṣam āśritya pratyakṣa anupalambha vyāpāra vyavahāraḥ tad viṣayaḥ ca bhāva dvaya svabhāvaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti ucyate 
JŚNĀ_165,3^1	 yat ca āyattam anāyatte paratra tat tatra tad utpattyā pratibaddham iti api tathā hi tad mātra apanayane dvitīya sāhityasya api niṣedhāt vyaktam tat āyattam tat evam tanmātra apasāraṇe api bīddhavyam anyathā dvitīya apasāraṇa apekṣaṇāt kutas tad na atra apasāraṇam iti tad utpattyā eva pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanayā vyāptiḥ uktā bhavati na tad viśeṣa virahiṇā darśana adarśana mātreṇa tad viśeṣa apekṣaṇe ca sakṛt eva pravṛttau nirvṛtti lābhāt na bhūyas pravṛtti apekṣā yathā hi sakṛt darśana adarśanena pratīta sahacāra mātrādanāśvāsa karān na aparama pareṇa pratyayam tathā sakṛt pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām pratīta viśiṣṭa jāti dvaya hetu phala bhāva sambandhāt na aparamparābhyām pratyeyam iti tāvatā eva nirvṛttiḥ yadi na sādṛśya ādinā jāti antare tad adhyavasāyaḥ puruṣasya iti nipuṇena pratipattrā bhavitavyam sahacāra mātre tu tad jātau= eva saṃśayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_165,3^2	 anyatra sahacāra mātre vyabhicāra darśanam ca puṣṭam bījam asya na ca atra viṣa anna dṛṣṭāntaḥ śāntaye viṣa annāt bhojya antarasya bhinna jātīya tvāt atra tu yaḥ prayojakaḥ bhāgaḥ bhūyas sahacāra lakṣaṇaḥ tena eka jātīya tvam eva dhūmasya na tu viṣa digdha tvam dadhi bhakta ādeḥ sādhāraṇam iti vaiṣamyam tad utpattim antareṇa ca avyabhicārasya eva abhāvāt bhede avyabhicārasya eva tad utpatti rūpa tvāt avyabhicāra apekṣayā kṣepaḥ tad utpatteḥ ayuktaḥ eva tasmāt kāryam eva hetuḥ dhūmaḥ dhūmadhvajasya tad utpattyā avyabhicāra ākṣepāt na saṃyogī sahacāra mātra ullekhāt katham tarhi karabhagarda bha uda āharaṇam asaṃyogāt dāsī kalasa saṃyoga darśana bhūmnā santoṣaḥ astu karabhagarda bhayoḥ api vā jala balākayoḥ iva tāvati kāle deśe avasthiti niyamaḥ tathā darśanāt astu iti na kiñcid etat tasmāt artha antare gamye kārya hetuḥ tad bhāva siddhiḥ ca pratyakṣa anupalambhāt iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_166,1	 trilocana codye tu brūmaḥ viśeṣa viṣayam pratyakṣam iti kim viśeṣaḥ api viṣayaḥ asya atha viśeṣaḥ eva ayoga vyavaccheda pakṣe na sāmānya viṣaya tā pratihatiḥ iti katham na pratyakṣa anupalambha avakāśaḥ sāmānya dvaye anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ tu kim asmad siddhānta āśrayeṇa ucyate vastu vṛttyā vā asmākam tāvat ubhayam ubhayam api pramāṇam ubhaya viṣayam grāhya adhyavasāya bhedena yat hi yatra jñāne pratibhāsate tat grāhyam yatra tu tat pravartate tat adhyavaseyam tatra pratyakṣasya sva lakṣaṇam grāhya madhyavaseyam ca sāmānyam anumānasya tu viparyayaḥ tatra sādhana pratyakṣam tadā eva artha kriyā arthinaḥ kṣaṇavokṣaṇe api santāna apekṣayā sāmānya viṣayam vyāpti grahaṇa prakaraṇe punar eka vyakti darśane api sarva sajātīya vyakti viṣaya tvena sāmānya viṣayam pratyakṣeṇa mayā agnijanmā dhūmaḥ paricchinnaḥ iti sakala tad anya apoḍha vyakti jātam antar bhāvyā eva tad bala utpannasya adhyavasāyasya saṃvedanāt yathā rūpa mātra darśane rūpa rasa gandha sparśa samudāya viśeṣa ātmani ghaṭe dṛṣṭa adhyavasāyāt tad viṣaya tvam pratyakṣasya 
JŚNĀ_166,2^1	 na ca sāmānyam nāma kiñcid anyat eva kiṃtu sva lakṣaṇāni eva parasparam avivecita bhedāni sāmānyam ucyante bheda vivecane tu pratyekam sva lakṣaṇam iti sva śabdena eva vyavahāraḥ tatas yadi api para vilakṣaṇa aśeṣa sva lakṣaṇānām apratibhāsāt na grāhya tvena viṣaya tvam tathā api adhyavaseya tvena durnivāram iti katham anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ vikalpā nām avastu eva viṣayaḥ iti api para kṛta anta anabhijña tayā eva ucyate anusandhāna anumānayoḥ adhyavasāya apekṣayā vastu viṣaya tvāt śeṣam siddha sādhanam atha vastu vṛttyā iti pakṣaḥ saḥ api ayuktaḥ sarva jñānānām grāhya adhyavaseya bhedena viṣaya dvaividhyasya duratikramāt pramāṇasya hi prāmāṇyam eva atiricyate viṣaya dvaitam tu sarvatra siddham 
JŚNĀ_166,2^2	 tatra anumāne tāvat vastunaḥ apratibhāsā t adhyavaseyam eva sva lakṣaṇam grāhyaḥ tu svākāraḥ evaṃvidham nirloṭhitam asmābhiḥ apoha prakaraṇe iti na prastūyate yadi api ca buddheḥ ākāraḥ na iṣṭaḥ tathā api vastu balāt āyātaḥ katham apohitum śakyaḥ na hi apratibhāse jñānam nāma pratibhāsi ca anumāyām na vastu iti sthite niyatam su ākāraḥ alīkam astu iti ced tathā api tad pratibhāse grāhyam avaseyam ca bāhyam iti viṣaya dvaita siddhau kim nirbandhena evam pratyakṣe api kācid eva vyaktiḥ pratibhāsinī grāhyā sarvā tu sajātīya adhyavaseyā pratibandha bodha kāle asphuraṇe hi yadi avasāyaḥ api syāt pratyakṣeṇa sambandha bodha prasiddhi gandhaḥ api nirdhūtaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_167,1^1	 yat tu mānasena bhūyas darśana janita saṃskāra sahāyena indriyeṇa vā grahaṇam uktam tatra idam vicāryate asti tāvat agni dhūma vyaktyoḥ punar punar upalabdhiḥ aindriyī asti ca tad kṛta saṃskāra janmā vimarśaḥ ayam etat sahitaḥ eva upalabhyate tat kim anayoḥ sadātanaḥ ayam sahacāraḥ atha suhṛd dvayasya iva sā atyayaḥ iti parāmarśa durbalasya hetunā antarīyaka pratītiḥ api bhavati tad anurūpam ca anuṣṭhānam na punar atra aparaḥ jñāna vivartaḥ saṃvedyate tatas bhūyas darśanam tāvat saṃskāra dvāreṇa sahāyam eva kṛtam na tat prastutam abhidhātum śakyam tad antimam eka jātika aśeṣa vyakti viṣayakaḥ iti api manoratha mātram tad vyaktīnām nirbhāsa abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_167,1^2	 saṃśayaḥ api tad anantaraḥ saṃśaya tvāt eva na niścāyakaḥ sambandhasya paścimaḥ ca niścaya ākāra tve api parāmarśa śūnyasya eva iti pratyakṣa abhikhyayā api tad upasthāpite prameye kaḥ āśvāsaḥ aliṅga jasya hi vikalpasya pūrva pravṛtta darśana vyāpāranusārā t eva artha tathā bhāva sambhavaḥ na svātantryāt atiprasaṅgāt pūrva pravṛttāni ca darśanāni sahacāra mātra sākṣīṇi vāta ātapa ādi sahacāra vat kañcid viśeṣam anāviśanti katham asya yathārtha tām samarthayitum īśate 
JŚNĀ_167,1^3	 tathā abhāve api tāni eva tatra pramāṇam idam tu smaraṇam pramāṇa tvena nirdiśyate iti sādhu vāta ātapayoḥ paścāt sahacāra vighaṭana asti viśeṣaḥ iti na vācyam vyabhicāra adarśana kāla apekṣayā abhedasya vivakṣita tvāt atra api avighaṭana niścaya anupapatteḥ ca ukta tvāt yāvat eva vahni vyāpārāt pūrvam dhūmān udayaḥ hṛdaya saṃvāsī tāvat eva hi sahacāra antarāt bheda vimarśaḥ tatas eva tad vyabhicāre dhūmaḥ upādhi rahitam sambandham atikrāmet iti śobhate 
JŚNĀ_167,1^4	 anyathā pūrvam sahacāra mātra upalabdhau yathā dhūmam antareṇa anala vilokane analasya dhūmena sambandhe upādhi kalpanam sāmānyena tathā dhūmasya api vahnim antareṇa bhāva saṃbhāvanāyām upādhi antara kalpanam bhaviṣyati atas kasya kena aupādhikaḥ svābhāvikaḥ vā sambandhaḥ syāt na hi suhṛdoḥ eka vyatirekeṇa anya darśane avyatirekeṇa api tad darśana saṃbhāvanā na bhavati kevalam caitram antareṇa api maitrasya bhāva avirodhāt bhūdhara vivara praviṣṭasya api na darśana yogya tā vigalati dhūmasya tu niyatam vinā vahnim udayaḥ eva na asti iti na saṃbhāvanā tāvatā ca tad utpattiḥ eva śaraṇīkṛtā bhavati sā ca na bhūyas darśanāt iti uktam eva 
JŚNĀ_168,1	 atas eva go go tvayoḥ api na svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ abhidhātum śakyaḥ tad utpatti pratīti virahe anyasmāt sahacāriṇaḥ viśeṣa abhāvāt na ca sahacāra darśanam api asti pratyakṣeṇa ubhaya bhāgānullekhāt tat kim atra svābhāvikaupādhika vāda prakṣepeṇa vibhāgena gamaka tvam ca sāmagryāḥ kāraṇa tvāt ekam kāraṇam anya apekṣam eva janakam iti aniyamaḥ kāryam tu sāmagrī niyata tvena pratyekam niyatam iti tat eva liṅgam na kāraṇam iti siddham atha agneḥ indhana sannidhau dhūma darśanāt viśeṣa uddeśena eva siddhaḥ upādhiḥ indhanam dhūmasya punar agninā sambandhe tad upādhiḥ bhavan dṛśyaḥ eva bhavet anupalabdhaḥ tu na asti iti ucyate tat kim indhanam eva param upādhiḥ yena dṛśyatā niyamaḥ sambandhe hi vivakṣyate apekṣaṇīyam artha antaram svabhāva viśeṣaḥ eva ca upādhiḥ abhidheyaḥ na ca artha antaram dṛśyatā niyatam tatas ca dhūmasya api hutāśena saha sambandhe syāt upādhiḥ na ca upalakṣyate iti katham adarśanāt na asti eva yatas svābhāvika sambandha siddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_168,2	 atha yadi apekṣaṇīyam artha antaram syāt katham dhūmaḥ iti eva pāvakasya sattā niyamaḥ iti ced nanu idam eva cintyate kim dhūme sati avaśyam agniḥ sambhavī na vā iti kadācid artha antaram upādhim apekṣya dhūmaḥ api syāt na agniḥ iti kim atra niṣṭaṅka kāraṇam tasmāt pāvaka para adhīna udayaḥ dhūmaḥ pariniṣṭhataḥ katham tad abhāve api bhāvam svīkuryāt iti eva sādhu asiddhā ca iyam upādhi anupalabdhiḥ yathā hi dahanaḥ na indhanena vinā dhūmena saṃbadhyate tathā dhūmaḥ api na tena vinā agni saṃbadhyate iti samānam upādhi tvam indhanasya ubhayatra atha siddhasya agneḥ indhana sāhityena dhūma lābhaḥ iti upādhi vyavasthā asiddhasya tu dhūmasya tad nimitta ātma lābha tayā tat avyabhicārāt svābhāvikaḥ sthāpyate iti ced evam api sā eva tad utpattiḥ āyātāḥ sā eva ca svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ na ca yathā ukta mānasa ādi grāhyaḥ na ca upādhiḥ dṛśya anupalabdhi bādhyaḥ iti aupādhika śaṅkāyām na vipakṣāt nivṛttiḥ dhūmasya iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_169,1^1	 vācaspatye tu prabandhe agneḥ dhūmena saṃbandhe indhanam upādhiḥ dṛśyaḥ uktaḥ eva dhūmasya tu vahninā sambandhe svābhāvika tvam upādheḥ anupalabdhi mātreṇa ca bādhaḥ tatra ca kvacid vyabhicārasya adarśanāt iti hetuḥ tatra idam ālā ucyate kim ayam hetuḥ upādhi anupalabdhi sādhakaḥ atha sā eva asya sādhikāyam svābhāvika tvasya bhūta anupalabdheḥ adārḍhi aṃśaṅkayā upādheḥ eva bādhakaḥ prathame nirupayogaḥ na hi buddheḥ bhāva abhāvau hetu antara sādhyau sva saṃvedya vedanā antara svabhāva tvāt na asti ca upādheḥ upalabdhiḥ iti siddhā eva anupalabdhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_169,1^2	 evam vyabhicāra adarśane api hetu anupayogaḥ vācyaḥ vyavahāra sādhanam upayogaḥ iti ced na vimateḥ abhāvāt apratīti mātrasya siddha tvāt tṛtīyaḥ api na yuktaḥ ekasyāḥ dṛśya viśeṣaṇa rahitāyāḥ niṣedha sādhana aśaktau dvitīyasyāḥ kīdṛśī śaktiḥ vyabhicāraḥ dṛśyaḥ eva vivakṣitaḥ iti ced tarhi na sarvatra sarvadā vā tatas ca na kvacid vyabhicāraḥ iti atas svābhāvika tvam ayuktam kvacid tu na dṛṣṭaḥ vyabhicāraḥ iti evam tat kalpanam analasya api dhūmena prasajyeta caitra maitra ādīnām vā parasparam sati ca evam svābhāvika sambandhe api anāśvāsaḥ iti āyātam 
JŚNĀ_169,2^1	 tasmāt sarvatra eva avyabhicāraḥ paryeṣaṇīyaḥ tatas anumāna viṣaye api yāvat na sādhyam pratyakṣeṇa upasthāpayati tāvat na avyabhicāram pratīyāt iti kṛtam anumānena kim ca tad utpatti vāda īrṣyayā dhūmasya anekānta parihārāya svābhāvika vādaḥ āśritaḥ anekāntaḥ ca vyabhicāra āśaṅkayā tatas svābhāvika tvāt avyabhicāraḥ sarvatra sarvatra avyabhicārāt ca svābhāvika tvam iti itaretara āśrayaḥ yasya tu sakṛt eka jāteḥ anya jāti adhīna utpatti pratītiḥ eva sarvatra avyabhicāra pratītiḥ tasya na ayam prasaṅgaḥ bhūyas darśana apekṣāyām eva tad avatārasya nyāya prāpta tvāt 
JŚNĀ_169,2^2	 yathā hi ekadā darśane śaṅkāyām anya apekṣā tathā anyadā api śaṅkā apekṣā paraspara ākṛṣṭaḥ eva sarvatra darśana ākṣepaḥ yadi tu tatra api vāra saṃkhyā niyamam darśayet yathā asmākam prāc adṛṣṭau kramāt paśyan vetti hetu phala sthitim dṛṣṭau vā kramaśas apaśyan= anyathātvena ca sthitiḥ iti pratyakṣa anupalambhayoḥ vāra traya niyamaḥ avayave samudāye tu eka vārasya tadā tāvatā eva susthaḥ bhavet bhūyas iti tu apariniṣṭhita saṃkhyaḥ kiyatā nirvṛttim āsādayet lakṣya anusārī tad aśakya tve ca na kvacid anumāna mayam kuryāt iti lakṣaṇa śāstram anarthakam 
JŚNĀ_169,2^3	 smaraṇe tu citta pāṭava ādhānāya kiyat api darśanam pravartsyati na tatra parimāṇa niyamam antareṇa kiñcid kṣīyate bīje aṅkura jananāya kāla parimāṇa niyama vat evam abhijāta maṇi tattva sphuṭībhāve api na darśanānām parimāṇa niyamaḥ sūkṣma rūpa bheda udbheda mātrasya vivakṣita tvāt prabhāsvarādi vāvaraka praviṣṭasya yamalaka vat vā dhūma ādau tu na rūpasya bhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kim tu svarūpasya yathā hi nīla itara rūpayoḥ prāk paṭīyasaḥ api koṭiḥ api darśanāni na bheda avadhāraṇa paṭūni tathā vyabhicāra darśanāt prāk vyabhicāra avi abhicāra vatoḥ artha antare sannidhīyamānayoḥ na kiñcid rūpa bheda avadhāraṇam 
JŚNĀ_169,2^4	 dhūme tu na rūpāt viśeṣa ullekhi hṛdayam api tu pāvaka adhīna saṃbhavatayā iti uktam atas eva ca sakṛt pravṛtta pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām nirvṛttiḥ rūpa apekṣayā tu dhūme api yādṛś eva darśanam ādyam tādṛś eva koṭitamam api na maṇi vat viśeṣa bhāj tādṛś eva darśane yadi vyabhicāra śaṅkā rahitaḥ pratipattā tadā na dvitīyasya api darśanasya apekṣāḥ śaṅkamānaḥ tu śatena api darśanaiḥ apratyayaḥ eva iti bhūyaḥ iti bhavadīya mantra akṣara jāpinaḥ kā gatiḥ atas ca śatadhā api avyabhicāra darśī purastāt sandehavān eva 
JŚNĀ_170,1^1	 yat tu anupalabhyamānasya api kalpanā anupapatteḥ iti suptena iva vilapitam tat bālasya api asāmpratam anupalabhyamānasya eva hi kalpanā bhavati prakṛti īśvara ādi vat kalpitam tu kiñcid pramāṇam anveti kiñcid nā iti viśeṣaḥ na hi dṛśyamānaḥ ghaṭaḥ kalpitaḥ ucyate tasmāt anupalabhyamāneṣu eva kalpanā vyavahāraḥ kevalam kvacid āpta vacana ādinā bādhaka adarśanāt dṛḍhaḥ sattāvasāyaḥ vimarśakasya tu pākṣikaḥ tatas dhūmasya api yadi vyabhicāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ eva kaḥ tatra saṃśayaḥ yadā tu na dṛṣṭaḥ tadā satta eka aṃśa avasāyaḥ mā bhūt prāmāṇika adhikārāt pākṣikaḥ tu satta ullekhaḥ katham vāryaḥ atha evam abhiprāyaḥ na tatra eva anupalabdhiḥ vivakṣitā kim tu anyatra api yat na upalabhyam tasya na śaṅkā iti ced 
JŚNĀ_170,1^2	 nanu agni vyabhicāraḥ cāmīkara ādau dṛṣṭaḥ eva ityaḥ tu santoṣaḥ atha dhūme na dṛṣṭaḥ tat kim sthāṇau puruṣa tvam dṛṣṭam yena sthāṇau śaṅkyate ūrdhva tā āliṅgite dṛṣṭam iti ced iha api bhūyas sahacāriṇi dṛṣṭaḥ eva anyatra atas eva na ca adṛśyamānaḥ api ityādi viplatam yatra eva tu yat saṃśayyate tatra eva tasya darśanam apekṣyate iti alaukikam atas dhūma jātau= adṛśyamānaḥ api vyabhicāraḥ upādhiḥ vā darśana ayogya tayā niṣeddhum aśakyaḥ saḥ idānīm saṃśayaḥ svābhāvika tva saṃśaya svabhāvaḥ svābhāvika tva niścayam tāvat avaśyam pratibadhnāti svābhāvika saṃbandha balena ca dhūmaḥ gamakaḥ katham tat aniścaye gamaka tvena gṛhyeta na hi dharmiṇi sattvena hetuḥ gamakaḥ sattva sandehe api gamakaḥ bhavitum arhati 
JŚNĀ_170,1^3	 yaḥ ca yat sandehe pravartate sa tad asambhave api pravartate eva iti svābhāvika saṃbandham vidhūya api dhūmasya iva anyasya api gamaka tva prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt niścaya pratibandhaḥ svābhāvika tva pratibandhaḥ eva arthataḥ niścayam antareṇa gamaka aṅgasya svayam akiñcitkara tvāt tasmāt niragnau dhūmasya avaśyam śaṅkayā bhāvyam niyāmakam apaśyatām iti durlaṅghyam etat tad utpatti anāśrayaṇe na ca evam prāmāṇika loka maryādā atikrama upālambhaḥ na hi pramāṇa gocare kaścid aniścayam ācaṣṭe pramāṇa abhāve vā niścayam yathā bhava anupādheḥ bādhaka pramāṇa abhāve api abhāva niścayam atas eva na saṃśaya piśācasya sarvatra avakāśaḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ eva anumata tvāt pramāṇa viṣaye api kiñcid vaktum śakyate iti ced yadi mukham asti iti vaktavyam ucyatām 
JŚNĀ_170,1^4	 kevalam yadi svīkṛta pramāṇa dharmaḥ vakti tadā su dānam uttaram atha itaraḥ tadā itareṇa eva vaktavyam na asmākam avasaraḥ svīkṛta pramāṇasya hi niścaya phala tvāt pramāṇasya avipratipanna pramāṇa viṣaye niścaya svīkāranā antarīyakaḥ eva tad svīkāraḥ katham sarvatra śaṅkā apiśācī labdha avakāśāḥ bhavet kevalam tvad praṇīta lakṣaṇam na pramāṇam iti brūhi tat ca vicāryamāṇam eva vartate atha adṛśyamānaḥ api upādhiḥ dhūme śaṅkyate iti prāmāṇika lokayātrā atikramaḥ iti ced na prāmāṇikaiḥ eva ayogya anupalabdheḥ bādha adhikāra pratiṣedhāt anyathā īśvara svarga sādhana ādeḥ dattaḥ jala añjaliḥ anumāna āgama pramāṇa siddheḥ na ayam doṣaḥ iti ced na pūrvam anupalabdhyā bādhite anumāna ādeḥ sādhakasya apravṛtteḥ sarvajña siddhau prasādhita tvāt 
JŚNĀ_171,1^1	 tasmāt pūrva apara parāmarśa viveka phalam etat anupalabdhi mātram niścaya sādhanam iti tatas pramāṇa viṣaye saṃśaya anavakāśāt na ayam kvacid pravarteta iti asaṃbaddham na ca śaṅkā iti eva na pravṛttiḥ artha saṃśayena pravṛtteḥ anivārya tvāt snigdha anna pāna vat etat tu anarthaka saṃśayena udāharataḥ artha anartha saṃśaya viṣayaḥ api ajñātaḥ iti kim atas param vācyam na ca etat prakṛtam pramāṇa vṛttau saṃśayaḥ astu na vā iti asya prakṛta tvāt tatra ca uktam eva atha idam ākūtam anekadhā dhūmasya dhāmanya vyabhicāra darśanāt kadācid tad antareṇa dhūmaḥ bhavet iti iyam anartha śaṅkā sā ca nivṛtti aṅgam iti tām avadhūya svābhāvika sambandha bodhaḥ eva vidhīyatām iti arthaḥ yathā anna pāne maraṇa śaṅkām nirasya pravṛttiḥ eva iti yadi evam artha saṃśayaḥ api pravṛtti aṅgam iti yuktam bhūyas sāhitya darśanāt avyabhicāraḥ eva hi prāyikaḥ anna pāne jīvana vat 
JŚNĀ_171,1^2	 atha īdṛśam anartha saṃśayam eva brūmaḥ iti ced sa tarhi pravartakaḥ eva tat katham na ayam kvacid pravarteta iti ucyate katham vā anarthaka saṃśayaḥ api nivṛtti aṅgam etat ca kadācid vyabhicāre api samānam kādācid kā dāna mānavayācana vat iti sādhvī dhūmasya svābhāvika sambandha siddhiḥ yathā dṛṣṭa aśaṅkanam ca prāk eva pratipāditam ataeva viśeṣa ityādi siddha sādhanam tat uktam ityādinā tu āturam ādāya dahana praveśaḥ eṣaḥ tathā hi bādhā jñāne tu anutpanne na āśaṅkā niṣpramāṇikāḥ iti yadi ut likhyamānasya arthasya bādha jñānam utpannam sādhakam vā pramāṇam tadā śaṅkāyāḥ kva avakāśaḥ tasyāḥ saṃśaya rūpa tvāt sādhaka bādhakasya ca ekānta āvasāya sādhana tvāt atha indriyeṣu timira ādi bādha jñāna anutpattiḥ vivakṣitā tad aprastutam na hi dhūma ādau svarūpasya asiddhiḥ āśaṅkitāḥ kim tu vyāpteḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_172,1^1	 kaḥ vā arthaḥ niṣpramāṇikāḥ iti yadi sādhaka pramāṇa virahaḥ iṣṭaḥ tat kim śaṅkāyāḥ yat vā śaṅkayā ullikhyamānasya arthasya tasya api tatra eva anyatra vā anyatra api sajātīye anya mātre vā prathama pakṣaḥ tāvat na prastāva anurūpaḥ bhavatu vā tathā api tad anya jñāne sādhanam ekārdha samavetam mānasam arthāpattiḥ sva saṃvedanam vā tat na kṣīṇam asyāḥ śaṅkitasya prastute sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvaḥ tu śaṅkā sādhakaḥ eva iti uktam anyatra sajātīyena pramāṇa abhāvasya tu ayam arthaḥ yat dhūme vahni anāyatta tvam śaṅkyate tat tad jātīye pramāṇena na avagatam tatra vyakti apekṣayā tad jātīya tvam jāti apekṣayā vā vyakti apekṣayā tāvat dhūma antaram eva tad jātīyam yadi ca tatra citrabhānunā anāyattiḥ pramitā tadā vyabhicārāt eva vyāpti bahiṣkṛtaḥ dhūmaḥ sādhāraṇāna ekāntaḥ jāta iti kim atra sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikatva artham śaṅkā avatāraṇena 
JŚNĀ_172,1^2	 apramitāyām api vahni anāyattau= avyabhicārāt eva kim śaṅkayā iti ced adarśana mātreṇa vyabhicārasya abhāva asiddheḥ yogyā anupalabdheḥ eva abhāva sādhane adhikārāt tatas bahulam sahacāra mātre vyabhicārī na avyabhicārī niścitaḥ iti śaṅkā avakāśaḥ jāti apekṣayā tu dhūma jāteḥ anyā eva jātiḥ kayācid dravya ādi pratyāsattyā sajātīyāḥ tatas abhimata pakṣa upanipāte jala ādau vyabhicāra darśanam uktam eva yuktaḥ ca ayam eva pakṣaḥ dhūme vyāpti cintāyām deśa kāla antara viprakṛṣṭam dhūmam ekīkṛtya eva nirṇaya prakramāt jāti antaraḥ eva śaṅkyamāna darśanam anurūpam tāvatā api smṛteḥ anubhava pūrvatva apracyuteḥ iti prathama pakṣāt anyatra avācakam ca idam akṣaram tatra ca anupayuktam iti yat kiñcid etat 
JŚNĀ_172,2^1	 ajāta bādhaka utprekṣiṇaḥ saṃśaya ātma tvam api bāla vilapitam eva bādha utprekṣaṇam hi niścaya ātma tayā saṃśaya viruddham iti uktam na hi aniścaya phalam bādhakam vā tatas yatra tad abhāvaḥ tatra naḥ saṃśayaḥ iti katham sarva vyavahāreṣu tad ātmaka tvam atha na uṣarbudha adhīna tvasya dhūme bādhakam utprekṣate yaḥ iti vivakṣitam kim tu vahni apratibaddha tva saṃśayaḥ eva vyāpti niścayasya virodhāt bādhakaḥ uktaḥ iti evam na iyam tathā api utprekṣeta iti viruddham vikalpanam hyat prekṣā arthaḥ na ca saṃśayasya eva vikalpa ātmanaḥ vikalpanam nāma prastutam jananam tu yuktam tat ā api ajāta viśeṣaṇam apārthakam jātasya utpādana artha asaṅgateḥ 
JŚNĀ_172,2^2	 atha ajātam abhūtam asatyam api śaṅkyamānam anagni adhīnatā ādikam prameyam sva viruddha bādhakam utprekṣeta sva kalpanā mātreṇa udbhāvayet iti arthaḥ tadā api tat asatya tvam kenacid pramāṇena prasādhya yadi evam brūyāt sarvam śobheta na ca ākrośāt anyat asti sādhanam asya sāhasikasya yadi ca yathāprasiddha atiriktam abhyūhataḥ eva ākrośa pātra tvam tadā darśana adarśana mātra prasiddhe vyāpti vāde vipakṣa vṛtti śaṅkām apākartum svābhāvika sambandha ādikam abhyūhamānasya api kim na tattvam tasya api vā sambandhasya mānasa grāhya tva bādhakam indriya grāhya tvam vadataḥ sarvajña bādhakāni vā jñeya tva ādīni yathā prasiddha ūrvasya ādi śabda artha bādhakam vā pātrī ādi artham bruvataḥ kim vā bhūyas bauddhīya śaṅkā sannipāta śātanam īdṛśam ākrośa sādhanam ananya śakya mūhita bataḥ asya eva prathamam kṣaya gamanam ucitam 
JŚNĀ_173,1	 saṃśaya utthāpakasya tat iṣṭam iti ced nanu saṃśayasya api pūrvam ajātasya eva utthāpanāt bhraṣṭaḥ tatas sādhaka bādha kopa nīta niścayasya api ajātasya utthāpanāt kim na duṣṭaḥ pramāṇa balāt niścayaḥ durlaṅghyaḥ iti ced tad abhāve tarhi saṃśayaḥ api durlaṅghye iti alam ati visāriṇyā kathayā tatas pūrva apara parāmarśena pramāṇa viṣayāt anyatra saṃśaya udbhāvanam katham mohāt iti anunmattaḥ bhāṣate pramāṇa pratibaddhaḥ hi niścayaḥ yadi tad abhāve api bhavet kim artham yatnena pramāṇa anveṣaṇam prekṣasya tad vipratipatti nirākaraṇāya vā śramaḥ śāstra kārāṇām tasmāt pramāṇa apāye niyatam āyātaḥ saṃśayaḥ katham aniṣṭi mātreṇa nirākartum śakyaḥ yadi api evam tathā api gati antara virahāt saṃvyavahāre prāyas saha vāra darśanāt adarśanāt ca sakṛt api vyabhicārasya vikalpa ullekhitam aparipuṣṭa saṃśayam asantam iva kṛtvā niścayaḥ eva vyavahartavyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_173,2	 atra ucyate tattvataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ asti na vā san= ca niyata viṣayaḥ anyathā vā na iti pakṣe sarvam ayatna śīrṇam sādhana dūṣaṇayoḥ api anavakāśāt iti vibhaktam kṣaṇa bhaṅge san= api yadi aniyata viṣayaḥ tadā api san= ā iva iti vistṛtam śāstre na ca svarga ādi arthinaḥ veda īśvara ādi anuvartanam niyamena vācyam brahma vadha ādeḥ api tad lābha prasaṅgāt tatas asti ca asau niyata viṣayaḥ ca yathā ukta pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ ca iti avaśya abhyupagantavye āyāte niścayasya siddha tvāt gati antarābhāvaḥ asiddhaḥ tam antareṇa svābhāvika sambandha siddheḥ api anāśraya tvāt yat tu yatnena anviṣyante ityādi tatra api vyabhicāra anveṣaṇam eva upādhi anveṣaṇam vidmaḥ vyabhicāram antareṇa upādhi vyavasthāyāḥ aśakya tvāt tatas yāvat dhūma darśanam tāvat vyabhicāra śaṅkayā upamṛdya nirūpaṇa aparyavasāne gatam anumānena iti ukta prāyam anyathā yatnena anviṣyamāṇāḥ iti asya kaḥ arthaḥ katipaya vāra avi abhicāra gocarīkaraṇe hi paratra kīdṛśī nirvṛtiḥ 
JŚNĀ_174,1	 yat api syāt etat iti valgitam tat api niḥsāram pramāṇa siddhe hi rūpe svabhāva avalambanam na tu svabhāva vāda balena eva vastu rūpa vyavasthā tat yadi niyata viṣaya anvaya vyatireka grāhaka pratyakṣa anupalambha pramāṇa siddhe hetu phala bhāve svabhāva vādaḥ tat kim āyātam svābhāvika sambandhe yatra tad utpatti pratīti sāmagrīm hṛdayena dūrīkṛtya anyatas sahacarita dvaya aviśeṣa pratītau prati iti upāyaḥ eva davīyān tad sāmagrī apekṣaṇe ca tad utpattiḥ eva sā kim āhopuruṣikayā nāma antara karaṇena atra antare bhūyas darśana janita saṃskāra sahāya indriyeṇa grahaṇa paryantam pūrva dūṣaṇena eva nirastam 
JŚNĀ_174,2^1	 yat ca ayam saṃśayasya viśeṣa darśana apekṣayā sāmānya darśanāt viśeṣa adarśanāt viśeṣa smṛteḥ ca saṃśayaḥ iti lakṣaṇa kṣatim saṃśayam anicchan utkalayati tatra kim lakṣaṇa kṣati bhayāt pramāṇa aviṣaye dvi ākāra buddhyā eva na bhāvyam uta śvid dvi ākāra tve api na asau saṃśayaḥ iti abhimatam atha tattvataḥ saṃśayaḥ bhavatu mā vā vayam tu saṃśaya tvena vyavaharāmaḥ asmad lakṣaṇa kṣayāt iti pakṣāḥ prathamaḥ tāvat asambhavī vikalpa ullekhitasya rūpasya sādhaka bādhakayoḥ ekānta sādhanayoḥ abhāve śvas priya āgamana vārtā ādi vat kim satyam etat na beti ubhaya aṅga ullekhi vikalpa janmanaḥ rāja ājñayā api niṣeddhum aśakteḥ śakyante hi kāya vāc vyavahārāḥ anyādṛśe api cetasi balāt eva bhaya ādinā anyathā kartum na tu citta vivartaḥ pramāṇa apramāṇa dvāra āyātaḥ 
JŚNĀ_174,2^2	 etat tu syāt bhūyasā eka bhāgasya upalambhāt paripuṣṭaḥ iva saḥ aṅgaḥ parisphurati ekānta aśakteḥ tu anyaḥ bhāgaḥ kṣīṇaḥ iva tādṛś sāmagrī virahe punar ubhayaḥ api sādhāraṇaḥ yathā tatra veśmani kākaḥ kim asti na asti vā iti dvi ākāra tā api kvāpi na apaiti saḥ eva saṃśaya arthaḥ iti dvitīyaḥ api ayuktaḥ anyathā niścaya ākārābhyām bhrānti samyak jñānābhyām bhidyamānaḥ yadi na saṃśayaḥ tat kim turīyaḥ rāśiḥ eṣaḥ tatas tam agṛhṇataḥ lakṣaṇasya eva ayam astu doṣaḥ na lakṣyam anyathākartum śakyam atas eva antimaḥ api na upayogī ubhaya bhāga avalambi saṃvedanam ced ekānta kriyām apekṣamāṇam siddham tāvatā eva svābhāvika sambandha asiddheḥ kim atrabhavataḥ sandeha vyavahāra apekṣayā iti alam bāla vādi tayā 
JŚNĀ_175,1^1	 mānasa dūṣaṇe tu siddha sādhanam eva astu kim atra api pariśrameṇa svabhāva pratibandhe tu gamaka tvam siddha sādhanam eva sa tu tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ eva iti sthāpitam evam ca bhūyas darśana sāmarthya kadarthanāt tad sahāyāni māna antarāṇi pratyakṣa viṣaya svabhāva pratibandha siddhaye bandhyāni boddhavyāni viparyaya bādhakam eva tu pramāṇam anumānam unneyam tad abhāve vipakṣa vṛtti niṣedhasya aśakya tvāt tad putra tāyāḥ iva śyāma tve yat punar atra anna pāna pariṇati bhedasya upādheḥ bhāvāt svābhāvika sambandha vaidhuryam uttaram tat na yuktam āhāra pariṇati bhedasya upādhi tva niścaya abhāvāt yathā hi dahana mātrāt anindhanāt na dhūmaḥ iti dhūmena vahneḥ sambandhi indhanam upādhiḥ ucyate tathā yadi maitra janitasya api kasyacid vivakṣita āhāra pariṇāma viraheṇa śyāma tā upālapsyate saḥ upādhiḥ niraceṣyata tadā kim upādhi vādena vyabhicārāt eva na maitra putra tvam gamakam itīyatā eva paryāpta tvāt 
JŚNĀ_175,1^2	 na ca evam śakyam tat katham asau= upādhiḥ niścitaḥ kiṃśvinmaitrasya eva janma antara praṇidhānāt sapta aṣṭā api dṛśyamānāḥ śyāma tanavaḥ sūnavaḥ na jātāḥ kim atra pramāṇam tadvat tarhi mātuḥ api sutānām api vā praṇidhānam āśaṅkyeta tad puṇya praṇidhānayoḥ adṛḍha tve ca āhāra bhedasya api śaktiḥ saṃbhāvyate tatra kiṃprayuktam eṣām śyāma tvam iti śaṅkā eva upādhiśaṃkā anumānam anavakāśayati kim tat niścayena paryavasitam idānīm antimena śyāma tā sādhanena yad vipakṣa nivṛttam pakṣa sapakṣa viśrāntam abādhita viṣayam apratihetum tad putra tā hetum ahetūkartum udaram mṛditvā saṃśaya piśācam utthāpayatā katham na bhītam bhavatā tasmāt tad putra tāyāḥ śyāma tve pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt aśyāma tāyām adarśana mātreṇa asambhava anupapatteḥ ahetu tvam iti eva sādhu kim antargarḍuna upādhivādena 
JŚNĀ_175,2	 sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam ca hetu dūṣaṇam tāttvikam eva abhyupagantavyam na hi anyathā sarva aṅga sundarasya asya hetu tva apasāraḥ śakyaḥ api ca evam anabhyupagame vaṅre loha lekhya tva sādhanāya prārthitasya pārthiva tva hetoḥ kam upādhim īkṣamāṇaḥ na anumānam anumanyate bhavān atha praśithila avayaveṣu kāṣṭha ādiṣu ayaḥ koṭi majjanam dṛṣṭam dṛḍham ca vajram iti saḥ eva upādhiḥ iti ced na evam na khalu ghana avayava tvena śata koṭi sphaṭikayoḥ viśeṣam upalabhāmahe yatas taraṇi maṇau= apratihanyamāna mayaḥ pavau pratihanyeta iti syāt 
JŚNĀ_176,1	 syāt etat vajre vyāpāryamāṇa mayaḥ pratihanyamānam upalabdham tāvat nanu yasya sādhya viparya bādhakam sādhakam vā pravṛttam na tam pratyanumāna prasañjanam ārabdham yasya tu śata śikhara pakṣīkaraṇa mātram vartate tena katham anumānam upādheḥ abodhāt svābhāvika sambandha avadhāraṇe api parihāryam iti ukta prāyam atha pārthive upādhi antara anava dhāraṇe api svāgataḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati upādhiḥ yatas na loha lekhya tvam iti ced atra tarhi labdha avakāśā śaṅkā apiśācī dhūmam api anudhāvet dhūmasya api svāgataḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati yena agnim vinā bhaviṣyati nanu yatnena anusarantaḥ na upalabhāmahe dhūme sva gata viśeṣa lakṣaṇam upādhim vajre tu pārthive avagacchāmaḥ loha vyāpāraṇāt 
JŚNĀ_176,2	 tat tarhi loha vyāpāraṇam pravṛtte anumāne prayojanena uta yadṛcchayā āhosvit jijñāsayā ādya pakṣe mahatī prayojana siddhiḥ anumānāt iti a numāna antaram api īdṛśam eva bhavataḥ yadṛcchayā tu na tāvān śramaḥ yāvatā lekhya niścayaḥ bhavatu vā tasya ananumānam anyasya katham jijñāsā tu niravakāśa eva tathā hi mṛd kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa tīkṣṇa bhedeṣu pārthiveṣu koṭiśas ayaḥ koṭi majjana darśinaḥ vyabhicārasya api adarśanāt svābhāvika sambandha niścayāt lekhya tā anumānena nirasta vyabhicāra saṃśayasya kva tad pūrvakajijñāsā avakāśaḥ anyathā saudha śikharāt parvata nitamba saṃvāhitam dhūmam api upalabhya bhūyas darśanena svābhāvika sambandha bodhavataḥ tatra api jijñāsā eva syāt na anumānam tatas sarvathā anumāna apasāraḥ eva katipaya vāra saṃvāde ca anyadā jāte svābhāvika sambandha niścayāt kāla antare dhūmāt anumānam anveti na yāvajjīvam saṃvāde pārthiva tā ādi vat iti ślādhanīya prajñaḥ 
JŚNĀ_176,3	 atha pārthiva tve api kāṭhinya tāratamya darśanāt kvacid lekhya tā nivṛttiḥ api saṃbhāvyate iti bhūyasi api saṃvāde pārthiva tva ādi ananumānam dhūme tu na agni nirapekṣatā tāratamya upalambhaḥ iti ced nanu agniḥ apekṣeta iti agni vicchedaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ na ca yatra ātyantika vicchedaḥ bhāvī tatra avaśyam prāk viccheda tāratamya darśanam nigaḍa puruṣa vat ante tu katipa yakṣaṇe dhūme api bhaviṣyati kevalam na puruṣa nigaḍa vat pṛthak siddhayoḥ dhūma analayoḥ saṃyoga mātram kim tu dhūmasya dhūma dhvajāt eva janma iti na ante api viccheda śaṅkā tāvat viśeṣa asparśe tu śaṅkā eva tasmāt vahni vicchedinaḥ svarūpasya dhūme pārthive vā loha lekhya tāyāḥ āhatya adarśana mātram bhūyas viparyaya darśanam ca sādhāraṇam iti na eka niyatā svābhāvika saṃbandha siddhiḥ sādhye na aupādhika vyavasthā ca iti samānam anumānam ananumānam vā 
JŚNĀ_177,1	 yadā tu dhūme tad utpattiḥ eva vyāpti sādhanī bheda abhāvāt na tu pārthive loha lekhya tvena na api tādātmyam saḥ eva loha lekhya tvam eva ātmā asya iti asiddheḥ viparyaya bādhakasya anumānasya darśayitum aśakyatvāt kṛtaka tva vat pratyakṣasya ca jāti viśeṣa adhikāreṇa eva pravṛtteḥ yāvatīṣu pārthiva jātiṣu loha lekhya tvam upalabdham tatra eva vyāpti siddhiḥ na anyatra tadā dhūma kṛtaka tva ādiḥ hetuḥ pārthiva tad putra tva ādiḥ tu sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ evam tad śākhā prabhava tva ādi prathama prasava udrikta vāta ātapa sparśa ādi apekṣayā pākasya kvacid eka śākhā prabhave api abhāva śaṅkanāt tat evam kasyacid artha antareṇa vyāpti prakrame yadi bhūyas darśanam upāyaḥ tadā vipakṣāt anīkṣā mātreṇa nivṛtti asiddheḥ tādṛśām vyabhicāra darśanāt ca sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tayā na aikāntikena sādhya sādhanam dhūma ādiḥ svābhāvika ādi vādena tu hṛdaya lepanam aśucinā iva parihāryam ḍiṇḍika rāga mātrāt āpātatas para svīkaraṇa mātra upayoginaḥ atiriktasya arthasya pratipādanāt iti pratipāditam 
JŚNĀ_177,2^1	 tasmāt bhede tad utpatti pratītiḥ eva vyāpti pratītiḥ sā ca pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām eva bhavatu bhede tad utpatti pratītiḥ eva vyāpti pratītiḥ na tu pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām vartamāna kṣaṇa grahaṇa niyamāt pratyakṣasya anupalambhasya ca tad svabhāva tvāt yat ca adhyavasāya apekṣayā aśeṣasa jātīya viśeṣa tvam ākhyātam akṣa dhiyaḥ tatra api adhyavasāyaḥ nāma anantaraḥ vikalpaḥ eva tatas tad vaśena pratyakṣam sarva viṣayam iti yācita kamaṇḍanam etat 
JŚNĀ_177,2^2	 tad varam agneḥ dhūmaḥ iti sakala ubhaya vyakti lakṣaṇa sāmānya dvaya ālambanaḥ vikalpaḥ eva tad bhāva grāhakaḥ svīkriyatām pramāṇa antaram pratyakṣa antaram vā anadhigata adhigamāt adhi akṣa vyāpāra kāle bhāvāt ca iti ced tat api asāram vikalpe api hi sarva viṣaya tva madhyavasāya saraṇam eva sva lakṣaṇa sphūrteḥ abhāvāt eka vyāvṛtta= chāyā anukāra mātreṇa su a ākārasya eva pratibhāsanāt tat kīdṛśaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣāt kevalam sva anurūpa anuvyavasāya ādi uttara prabandha apekṣayā vikalpe viṣaya adhyavasāya vyavasthā pratyakṣe tu tam api vikalpam ādāya iti bhedaḥ samasta vastu sparśaḥ tu na ekatra api na ca anyaḥ asti grāhaka prakāraḥ iti carcitam 
JŚNĀ_177,3	 tasmāt saṃvyavahāre siddha madhyavasāyena api viṣaya vyavasthānam aparihāryam anubhava vikalpayoḥ ca sādhāraṇam iti pratyakṣa viṣayīkṛte hetu phala bhāve mānasa vyavahāra svabhāvaḥ api vikalpaḥ smṛtiḥ eva na pramāṇam ucitā ca eka deśa dvāreṇa api samudāya sparśāt aśeṣa sajātīya grahaṇa vyavasthā adhyakṣasya na vikalpasya prakṛtyāḥ bahis arthasya tasmāt pratyakṣa anupalambha saṃbhavā eva hetu phala bhāva svabhāva vyāpti siddhiḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_179,1–179,3^1	 amaḥ buddhāya pratyeka pakṣa upanipāti dūṣaṇa parijihīrṣayā kaiścid āśriyamāṇaḥ bheda abheda pakṣaḥ parīkṣyate tatra kim ayam ubhaya samuccaya svabhāvaḥ tad abhāva rūpaḥ vā abhāvaḥ api prasajya mātram paryudāsa vṛttyā vā bhāva antaram tat api prakṛta pratyanīkam tṛtīyam rūpam utaa prakṛtam eva kiñcid tatra prathama pakṣe yau= eva bheda abhedau pṛthak doṣa jālaka valitau tau= eva amū eka vastu vartinā āviṣyete tadā anyau= eva vā tattve tad dūṣaṇasya avaśyam anuvṛtteḥ viphalaḥ abhyupagamaḥ anya tve api tad dūṣaṇa vat guṇasya api ananuvṛtteḥ api nāma bheda pakṣa bhāvi pṛthak pratīti prasaṅga dūṣaṇam abhedam upagacchan parihariṣyāmi iti bhede api abheda svīkāraḥ tatra bhavataḥ 
JŚNĀ_179,1–179,3^2	 yadi ca saḥ eva abhedaḥ pṛthak upalabdhi bādhanaḥ adhunā api upanītaḥ syāt evam tat parihāraḥ kevalam eka yogakṣema samāveśāt pramāṇa antara āvṛttim api ākarṣet tatas yadi anyatayā enām na ākarṣet tatas eva pṛthak upalabdhi niṣedhanam api na sādhayet atha abhedasya pṛthak upalabdhi bādha eva phalam na śabda antara avṛtti svābhāvyāt tathā api dvaita abhyupagamaḥ viphalaḥ evam bheda pakṣe api vācyam atha pṛthak upalabdhi bādha eva phalam abhedasya śabda antara āvṛtti nivṛttiḥ tu bhedasya eva tena api hi saṃbhavinā sva kāryam arjanīyam eva evam bhedasya api pramāṇa antara apekṣā iva phalam pṛthak upalabdhi bādhā tu abhedasya iti 
JŚNĀ_179,4	 ucyate ubhayam ubhayasya kāryam dṛṣṭam bhedasya api pṛthak prakāśa prasaṅga doṣaḥ śabda antara apekṣā ca guṇaḥ abhedasya api śabda antara apekṣā prasaṅga doṣaḥ apṛthak pratibhāsaḥ ca guṇaḥ tatra idānīm bhedena śabda antara vṛtti mātram ātanvatā sthātavyam dvitīye tu kārye para prahāraḥ apekṣitavyaḥ abhedena api saha pratibhāsam sṛjatā kārya antare pratyanīka prahāraḥ iti kiṃkṛtaḥ vibhāgaḥ bhavat abhiprāya anuvidhāyitayā bhāvānām svayam eva vā guṇa doṣayoḥ anunaya pratigha saṃbhavāt kāla bheda saṃbhavāt vā svabhāvayoḥ kāryāṇām ca tatra api niyataḥ guṇa doṣa kramaḥ aniyataḥ vā tatra prathama vikalpe bheda abhedayoḥ anyataraḥ eva pakṣaḥ svakīyam guṇa mātram arpayan dūṣaṇa sparśa rahitaḥ bhaviṣyati na ca enam dūṣaṇam upaneṣyate iti kim ātma pramāṇa anabhijñena dvaita parigrahaḥ kṛtaḥ caitanya śūnya tvāt ca bhāvānām nābhi prāya anuvidhānam 
JŚNĀ_180,1–180,2	 ataeva na dvitīyaḥ api vikalpaḥ astu vaiṣamye anunaya ādiḥ sa punar ātma upakāra apakāriṇi syāt na vai vācaka vācya tayā kiñcid eṣām apakṛtam pratibhāsa bhedena vā upakṛtam vā tad itareṇa bhavat anurodhāt tu guṇa doṣa śabda prayogaḥ tatas tad anuvṛtti vidhurasya tathātve api na kiñcid ananuvṛttau vā caitanyam uktam eva syāt etat śabda udaya kāraṇa karaṇa kalāpa vyāpāra vat abhiprāya anuvṛttiḥ svabhāvāt eva iti tathā api dvaita parigrahaḥ agrahaḥ eva ekasya eva svabhāvasya tathā vyāpāra kalpanam kim na asthīyate iti ukta prāyam 
JŚNĀ_180,3^1	 na api tṛtīya pakṣa upakṣepaḥ kṣamaḥ svabhāvayoḥ tāvat kāla bhede yadā bhedaḥ na tadā abhedaḥ abheda kāle ca na bhedaḥ iti na kadācid para doṣa parihāraḥ tatra yathā bhinne abhinne vā vastuni ekānta bheda abheda bhāvīni paryāya tva ādīni kāryāṇi na vihanyante tathā eva svabhāvayoḥ kāla bhede na prāpnuvanti pratidvandvinaḥ abhāvāt na ca bhāvinā eva niṣedhaḥ avastu tvāt atas tad kāla kārya kāla bhedaḥ śaraṇīkaraṇīyaḥ tatra bhedaḥ śabda antara vṛttim ādhāya yāvat pratibhāsa bhedam ādhātum upakramate tāvat eva abhedena upaniyata tā pratibadhyate iti kaḥ evam nyāya vihastaḥ hasta samāracitam vastu prastotum arhati sāhasa eka bhuvam bhavantam antareṇa svabhāvayoḥ eva hi kālabhedaḥ sa ca kasya vastunaḥ tāvat durlabhaḥ na hi sa paścāt bhavan tasya eva yuktaḥ kāraṇa cintā vidhura tvāt ca tatra api pratyekam kāla bhedaḥ na hi eka svabhāva pratibaddha tve yuktam evam tatra api niyataḥ guṇa doṣa abhimata kārya karaṇa kramaḥ 
JŚNĀ_180,3^2	 aniyamena punar prapāta patana prasaṅgāt iti vyaktam iṣṭa kāma tāmātra apahṛta hṛdayaḥ na kiñcid cetayate iti upekṣām arhati na hi tat icchā atiriktam atra kāraṇam ākalayāmaḥ api ca yadā bhedasya paścāt bheda abhyupagamaḥ tadā pṛthak upalabdhim bādhamānasya abhedasya dvitīyam kāryam kena nivāryatām bhedena iti ced na yadi anyena uttara kāla bhāvinā tadā asya api doṣa aṅga nirākaraṇāya aparaḥ mṛgyate iti anavasthā atha prāktanena tasya yadi etāvatī śaktiḥ paścāt abhedena upanīyamānam apṛthak pratibhāsam eva katham na badhnīyāt tat yadi pūrva apekṣayā uttarasya apavādaka tvam pūrvatara apekṣayā katham na iti cintyam tasmāt pratyekam ubhaya kārya tvāt bheda abhedayoḥ eka pratiniyataḥ parihāraḥ svīkāraḥ veti anibandhanam etat tatas pṛthak pratibhāsā pratibhāsau saha utpatti anutpattī śabda antara vṛtti āvṛtti ādayaḥ ca ekasya ekadā prasajyeran na ca upādheḥ upādhimataḥ bhedena anubhava gandhaḥ api samasti vyakti vināśe vā vināśa leśaḥ api na sāmānyasya abhyupeyate paraiḥ 
JŚNĀ_181,1	 vyakti rūpeṇa iṣyataḥ eva iti ced nanu vyakti rūpeṇa iti na nijena rūpeṇa iti vivakṣitam anyathā viśeṣaṇa ānarthakyāt nijasya eva rūpasya bheda abheda cintāyāmayam prasaṅgaḥ iti kim anena parihṛtam atha nijam asya na rūpa antaram saṃbhavati eva kasya tarhi bheda abheda cintā iti siddhāḥ nirupādhayaḥ dharmāḥ nanu bhinnasya abheda saṃbhave api na śabda antara vaiyarthyam vidmaḥ iti kim atra kurmaḥ evam tarhi bhinnasya api upādheḥ na bhinnaḥ prakāśaḥ iti kim atra kurmaḥ iti bruvataḥ na ekānta vāde api doṣaḥ iti tathā api vyarthaḥ dveta mata āśrayaḥ paryante pāda prasārikāyāḥ aparihārāt pariśrama atiśayaḥ tu atiricyate āhopuruṣikā vā atha api syāt tādātmyam abhyupagacchataḥ yadā śabda antara āvṛtti ādi doṣaḥ paraiḥ prasajyate tadā bhedasya api saṃbhavaḥ parihāraḥ bhede ca pratibhāsa bheda āpādane abheda upanayaḥ iti na śakyam ekānta vāde na ca pāda prasārikā iti na api ubhaya doṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadā hi pūrvam bhedaḥ upanītaḥ tadā tadā asaṅgi doṣa utkhāte ca abhedasya upanayāt 
JŚNĀ_181,2	 evam punar punar tad āvartana paramparayā paryavasāna abhāve api na kṣatiḥ iti ced bhavatā upanīyamānaḥ tarhi bādhakaḥ dharmaḥ sādhakaḥ vā na sva sāmarthyena eva iti āpannam upanayaḥ ca vacana ātmani anabhidhīyamānaḥ bhavataḥ uṣarbudhaḥ api na bādhakaḥ syāt etena mayā prasaṅga artham anaṅgīkārāt iti api nirastam na hi jīvanāya bhakṣyamāṇam viṣam na hinasti iti śakyam tasmāt bhauta argala yugala samānam etat ubhaya parijihīrṣayā ubhaya pakṣa ālambanam manda medhasām iti 
JŚNĀ_181,3	 prayogaḥ yat yat mātra nimittam tat tasmin sati bhavati eva yathā cakṣuḥ ādi sāmagrī mātra nimittam jñāna janma bheda abheda mātra apekṣam ca yathā ukta doṣa jātam iti svabhāva hetuḥ tanmātra nimitta tvam anya anapekṣa tvena vyāptam tad saṃbhave api ca tad abhāve tad viruddha m anya apekṣa tvam syāt iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhyā viparyayāt nivartamānam tanmātra nimitta tvam tasmin sati bhāve niyamyate iti vyāpti siddhiḥ na api asiddhiḥ tanmātra apekṣāyāḥ na hi abheda mātra atiriktam saha utpāda nimittam upapadyate bheda mātra atiriktam vā pṛthak prakāśasya dṛśya tve ayaḥ guḍa dahanayoḥ kṣīrodakayoḥ vā bhede api abhavan prakāśa bhedaḥ itara sā apekṣaḥ siddhaḥ iti ced na abhra anta indriya jñānasya prakṛta tvāt tatra bhinne eva vastunī ekīkṛtya pratipadyamānam jñānam katham abhrāntam nāma 
JŚNĀ_182,1	 etena candra dvaya pratibhāsaḥ vyākhyātaḥ atha ubhaya kāraṇa ārabdham ekam eva tat vastu saṃjātam iti matiḥ tadā vyabhicāraḥ eva na asti iti siddham tanmātra apekṣa tvam syāt etat tanmātra apekṣasya api tad bhāvena avaśyambhāvaḥ yathā kaṭuka madhura dravya bhāvinoḥ api pitta śleṣmaṇoḥ tat ayuktam vīrya vipāka apekṣayā api tad atad kārya karaṇa saṃbhavāt dravyāṇām rasa mātra apekṣā atipātāt pitta ādeḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_183,1–183,2	 siddhānte viprakīrṇasya anupalambhasya yādṛśī rūpa niṣṭhā iha tādṛśyāḥ saṃgrahaḥ kriyate sphuṭaḥ pratiṣedhe sādhye anupalabdhiḥ tṛtīyam liṅgam tat ca yadi upalabdhi viraha mātram tat katham kasyacid pratipattiḥ pratipatti hetuḥ vā tasya api vā katham pratipattiḥ tasmāt abhakṣya ādi vat paryudāsa vṛttyā anya upalabdhiḥ eva anupalabdhiḥ tatra api yadi anya mātrasya tadā ekasya kasyacid upalabdhau sarvasya niṣedha prasaṅgaḥ iṣyate eva tādātmya niṣedhaḥ sarvasya iti ced tad deśa niṣedhaḥ api anivāryaḥ tat ayam viśeṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_183,3–183,4	 vedye yatra hi yat matiḥ niyamataḥ syāt vā na vā tasya dhīriṣṭā naḥ anupalabdhiḥ anya viraha jñāna sthiteḥ āśrayaḥ yatra vedyamāne yasya matiḥ syāt iti deśa kāla svabhāva viprakarṣāṇām niṣedhaḥ niyamena iti upalambha kāraka antara vaikalyasya etena dṛśya viśeṣaṇa prāptasya bhāva jñāna sthitiḥ iti darśitam atas na sarvasya niṣedha prasaṅgaḥ yatra ca vedyamāne yat matiḥ niyamena syāt tasya eva dhīriṣṭā anyasya dvitīyasya abhāva niścaya prabandha ākṣepāya kṣamā iti etena na viraha mātram paryudāsa vṛttyā tu anya viśeṣa buddhiḥ iti uktam atra ca tasya eva ekākinaḥ iti sāmarthyāt anyathā itarasya aniṣiddha upalabdheḥ abhāva asiddheḥ 
JŚNĀ_183,5	 tat yathā na iha ghaṭaḥ upalabhyasya anupalabdheḥ yathā kvacid kiñcid iti tatra dṛśyasya iti svabhāva viśeṣaḥ upalambha pratyaya antarasākalyam ca uktam draṣṭavyam anupalabdheḥ iti pratiyoginaḥ upalabdheḥ iti arthaḥ tat ca pratiyogī hetu ādhāra prāptam bhū talam anyat vā eka indriya jñāna saṃsargi tad anyaḥ vā yasmin vedyamāne niṣedhya upalabhyam eva iti sāmānya ukteḥ tatra yadi bhū bhāgaḥ upalabhyaḥ eva kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ sādhyaḥ tadā saḥ eva pratiyogī kim anya apekṣayā yadā tu nabhasi tadā api tat eva āloka saṃjñitam anyaḥ vā ghaṭa ādiḥ aniyata sthitiḥ spṛśya niṣedhe tu ayam eva 
JŚNĀ_184,1	 etena eka jñāna saṃsargī pratiyogī vyākhyātaḥ kvacid punar anyathā api yathā pradīpam kavala yatuḥ na iha rasaḥ dṛśya anupalabdheḥ iti spaśam eva pratiyogī tayoḥ hi satoḥ na eka rūpa niyatā pratyāsattiḥ pānaka vat dūrāt rūpa darśane api tarhi katham rasa niṣedhaḥ na bhavati deśa viprakarṣiṇaḥ upalambha yogya tāyāḥ abhāvāt prāpya kāri tvāt ghrāṇa rasana sparśanānām uktam ca yasmin vedyamāne yat avaśyam vedyatas eva iti na api rasa anubhave rūpa niṣedhaḥ tadā api tad lakṣaṇā yogāt evam śabda upalabdhau= api na rūpa niṣedhaḥ samandhakāre hi sataḥ api rūpasya jñāna avyabhicāriṇī na śabda vittiḥ 
JŚNĀ_184,2	 āloke tu na tāvat dṛśyamānasya eva niṣedhaḥ adṛṣṭasya tu yogyasya niṣedhe api na doṣaḥ tad lakṣaṇa atyāgāt etena devakula ādau paridṛśyamāne tad deśa bherī ādeḥ eva abhāva siddhiḥ na avaśyam śabda antara pratīti sāpekṣā iti darśitam na tayoḥ saha pratīti niyamaḥ iti ca iti bhū bhāga kumbhayoḥ api na evam ubhayoḥ tu sa toḥ eka rūpa pratīti niyama virahaḥ pratyakṣasya tatra api samānaḥ eka jñāna m anya grahāvinābhūtam vā anyagrāhi jñāna antarauvinābhūtam vā iti na viśeṣaḥ evam eka indriya jam anyat vā santam ase avavarake api dīpa abhāvaḥ tad ākāra virahiṇaḥ jñāna antarāt antataḥ vikalpāt api yadi paramaḥ tu samānam vastutas tu vastu sannā iva andhakāraḥ eka jñāna saṃsargī pradīpasya saṃbhavati iti kim anyena 
JŚNĀ_184,3	 nanu svabhāva viśeṣe api pratyaya antara sannidhiḥ upalabdhi yogya tā sa ca bhinna indriya jñāna nimittam bhavan= api bhinna indriya jñāna pratyaya niścaye anupayuktaḥ tatas ca anyasya pratyaya antara sannidhi saṃśaye niṣedhaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ antataḥ vikalpāt api niyata ākārāt katham dṛśyasya  na hi bhavati pratyaya antara sannidhi siddhi nibandhanam samāna indriya jñānam eva kim tu pañca skandha lakṣaṇasya ātma bhāvasya avasthā viśeṣa saṃvedanam api yadā na indriya svabhāva viśeṣābhyām aparaḥ prakāśakaḥ apekṣyate yathā śabda pradīpa ādau tatra hi kiñcid śruta dṛṣṭa pūrviṇaḥ tad avastha indriya praṇidhī viduṣaḥ yatas kutaścid tu tad ākāra virahiṇaḥ jñānāt tad abhāva siddhiḥ kena vāryate 
JŚNĀ_184,4	 kaḥ tarhi jñāna antara parigrahasya upayogaḥ tad daśā saṃvidaḥ jñāna anutpādāt eva tad abhāva siddheḥ katham vā bhinna viṣaya indriya jñānāt anya niṣedhaḥ iti uktam atra na abhāvasya kvacid sāmarthyam ityādi tatas na jñāna antaram indriya sādguṇya niścayāya samāśrīyate kiṃtu pratiyogi viraha vikalpa jananāya tatra yathā samāna indriya saṃsargi jñānam anya abhāva niścaya samartham tathā anyat api sati sattve avyabhicaritavyaḥ artha antara jñāna ākāra virahī iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_185,1	 katham iti ced na atra icchā anicchayoḥ sāmarthyam yasya tu yat anvaya vi atireka anukāraḥ tayoḥ hetu phala bhāva ādi upagamaḥ yathā bhū tala eka ākāra niyamāt tu jñānam anya niṣedha vikalpena anukṛta anvaya vyatirekam tathā pradīpam ānane kṣipataḥ sparśa ākāra mātra niyamāt rasa abhāva jñānena tat jñānam na hi anayoḥ utpattau vyavadhāna avyavadhāna vibhāgaḥ tathā anupādhike payasi praṇihita ghrāṇasya asparśana darśanasya api vikalpa eva gandha antaram ananubhavataḥ api gandha ākāra jñānena tad ākāra śūnyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_185,2	 laiṅgikam tat iti ced na vyavadhāna abhāvāt abhyāsa daśā= ataḥ yat pratipattau= eva hi yat niścayaḥ na sa laiṅgikaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ vā yathā nīlam na pītam iti asti ca sannihite payasi ghrāṇa praṇidhāna mātra ākāra vikalpavataḥ na asti gandhaḥ iti niścayaḥ tatra gandha jñāna abhāva mātrasya asādhana tve yadi niyata ākāra vikalpa anubhavaḥ na hetuḥ pīta abhāva jñānasya api mā bhūt nīla anubhavaḥ atra vā pratyakṣa pauruṣa m āmanataḥ duṣpariharam paratra api tat eva ca pratyakṣam ekasya niṣedhya apekṣayā anupalabdhiḥ ucyate yathā tathā uktam tat ca mūḍham pratipattāram adhikṛtya pūrva samaya anusāreṇa dharmi viśeṣe abhāvam niścāyayat liṅgam amūḍhasya punar abhāvavataḥ anantara saṃśaya vinākṛtaḥ sthiraḥ eva asau niścayaḥ iti pratyakṣa pravarttitaḥ ucyate 
JŚNĀ_185,3	 nanu na pratyakṣa kṛtaḥ kaścid abhāva vyavahāraḥ na api pratyakṣam artha abhāva niścayena phala vat uktam kim tu jñāna abhāva niścayena eva tad dvāreṇa eva tu artha abhāva niścayam antar bhāvayati iti pratyakṣa kṛtaḥ saḥ ucyate sa ca tad sāmarthya janmā api anantaram saṃśayena bhavatā paribhūyamānaḥ mūḍham prati laiṅgikaḥ na hi jñānasya iva prakāśa rūpa niyamaḥ arthasya iti adṛṣṭasya api sthiteḥ avirodhāt dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ śaraṇam amūḍhasya tu vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ dṛśya sattāyām darśana viṣaya tvena vyāpteḥ etat vivecanā sāmarthyāt tu prācyaḥ mūḍhaḥ iti eke 
JŚNĀ_185,4	 tat ayuktam yathā hi jñānam aprakāśam anavasthāyi tathā dṛśyam bahis api iti tadvat eva pratyakṣeṇa anivārya viraha vyavahāram kevalam jātyā eva jñānam dṛśyam bahis tu kiñcid kathañcid kadācid tatra abhyāsa viśeṣavataḥ pratipattuḥ jñāna antara sāmānyaḥ iva bāhya viśeṣe api pratyakṣa mātrāt eva jhagiti niṣedha siddhiḥ asakṛt anubhūyamānā katham apahnotum śakyāḥ 
JŚNĀ_186,1	 tattvataḥ anumāna saṃbhavāt iti ced abhimata yogya tā niścayaḥ api pratyakṣa kṛtaḥ syāt iti yat kiñcid etat na ca yathā uktaḥ saṃśayaḥ bahis adhikāreṇa eva tat ayam asaṃsṛṣṭa vikalpaḥ vā darśana ātmā dṛśya ātmanaḥ vā vikalpasya darśane adṛṣṭiḥ vikalpa kalpanām indriya jñāne pratihanti iti ādeḥ avācya tā prasaṅgāt tasmāt jñāne api kadācid anya jñānasya vimarśaḥ arthe api anullikhita antara asaṃśayaḥ niścayaḥ iti daśa avibhāgena pratyakṣasya itarasya vā sāmarthya sthitiḥ na tu jāti vibhāgena 
JŚNĀ_186,2^1	 nanu eka upalambha anubhavāt ityādinā jñāna antara niṣedhaḥ eva sāmarthyam uktam anubhavaḥ ca evam eva iti ced na yathā hi idam na upalabhaḥ iti pratyakṣāt anubhūyate tathā idam na asti iti api jhagiti eva abhyāsavataḥ anabhyāsavataḥ tu jñāna abhāvaḥ eva niścayaḥ tad dvāreṇa tu artha abhāvaḥ iti tad apekṣayā śāstre tathā abhidhānam evam eka jñāna saṃsargi yatna ādayaḥ api vācyāḥ ataeva vyavasyanti īkṣaṇāt eva sarva ākārān mahā ādhiyaḥ iti uktam mṛdu prajñā adhikāreṇa ca sthāna sthāneṣu yatnaḥ tasmāt paṭudhiyaḥ pratyakṣāt eva maṇi rūpya ādi viveka vat tad niṣedha vyavahāraḥ api durnivāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_186,2^2	 na ca abhāvaḥ nāma vigrahavān yena anya vyatirekiṇā rūpeṇa sākṣāt kartavyaḥ kim tu vyavahartavyaḥ sa ca eka ākāra niyamāt paṭunā vyavahartum adhyakṣeṇa śakyaḥ eva yaḥ punar apaṭuḥ āpātataḥ pravṛtte api abhāva niścaye saṃśete sādṛśyam asya anupalambha mātram anusṛtya tad vyavahāram pravartayati yaḥ tu tatas api apaṭuḥ sa dṛśya anupalambhe api sandihānaḥ vyāpaka an upalambhena pravartate na punar avyāmūḍhasya anena pravṛttiḥ pratyakṣa apāṭavaḥ eva hi anumānam prārthyate tat pāṭavam ca vikalpa jananena avasthāpyate paṭutara tvam ca tatra vimarśa abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_186,3	 cārvākeṇa tu pṛthak abhāvam anumanyamānena prati pratyakṣa niṣedhe avyāpāraḥ darśitaḥ artha sāmarthya apekṣādyukteḥ na ca anumānasya iva pratyakṣasya api niścaya vaśāt grahaṇa vyavasthā kim tu pratibhāsa vaśāt niyata ākāra tā eva ca tasya tad anya abhāva bhāsanam tasmāt duṣpariharaḥ pratyakṣasya abhāva vyavahāra śakti saṃbhavaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvatra anupalambhāt iti tu na pratyakṣa pratikṣepaḥ kim tu liṅga antarasya dvau= eva vidhi sādhanau= iti yathā tat ayam ambhasi gandha niṣedhaḥ pratyakṣa kṛtaḥ eva avya vadhaiḥ na laiṅgikaḥ kim ca atra liṅgam gandha abhāva avyabhicāri jñāna kāryān upalabdhiḥ iti ced yadā sva grāhi jñānam kārya hetuḥ tadā idam yuktam api yadā tu pratyakṣam eva tat tadā pratyakṣa yogyasya tad nivṛttiḥ yadi na dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ dhaṭasya api mā bhūt 
JŚNĀ_187,1	 tat idam pratiyogi jñāna rūpa tā locana vañcanā phalam eva ayam ca vādī yadi indriyasāt guṇyam aniścinvan= etat āha tadā san= api gandhādiḥ na upalabhyate iti āyātam atha niścinvat = alam kāryānupalabdhyā iti draṣṭavyam parokṣa saṃbhāvite ca kāraṇa ādau kārya ādi anupalabdhim yatnena yojayati saṃprati ca doṣa leśa bhayāt pratyakṣa saṃbhāvite api saṃśetaḥ iti iti asaṃbaddham tasmāt sthitam etat yasmin vedyamāne yat avaśyam vedyatas eva tasya abhinna indriya grāhyasya anyasya vān indriya grāhyasya vā buddhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ sā ca vyavahāram eva sādhayati anyathā pratyakṣa siddheḥ tad artham ca viraha jñānasya sthiteḥ sthairyasya āśrayaḥ iti uktam na tu viraha niścayasya iti yathā ca niyata saha upalambhayoḥ eka jñānam anya niṣedhāya tathā niyata asaha upalambhayoḥ iti āha na vā iti vedye yatra hi yat matiḥ niyamataḥ na syāt iti arthaḥ yathā nīlam idam anīlam na bhavati iti atra api vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyaḥ etena paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇā virodhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ 
JŚNĀ_187,2	 nanu yasmin= avedyamāne yat matiḥ niyamena bhavitum saṃbhāvyate iti anena eva gatam etat adṛśyaḥ api hi tādātmyena niṣedhyamānaḥ dṛśya tayā saṃbhāvitaḥ eva niṣidhyate anyathā dṛśya adṛśya tayā svayam eva bheda abhyupagamāt iti kim anena pṛthak vacanena iti ced evam tarhi na vā syāt iti ayam abhāvaḥ pradhvaṃsa lakṣaṇaḥ vyākhyāyate pravṛttā api yat matiḥ yatra vedye sati niyamena nivartate iti arthaḥ niyamaḥ ca sattā bādhane abhāvaḥ eva yuktaḥ yathā na iha śītam agneḥ iti etena saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇaḥ virodhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ 
JŚNĀ_187,3	 nanu andhakāre niyamena anupalambhaḥ iti na avaśyam viruddha parigrahaḥ iti ced na eka pratipattṛ apekṣam lakṣaṇam etat kim tu sāmānyena asti ca nirālokasya api rūpasya darśanam kaiścid tena api vā saṃbhāvyam añjana viśeṣa ādinā iti satta ucchede tu niyamaḥ eva iti adoṣaḥ nanu atra api śītam yadi syāt na agneḥ eka rūpa niyatā pratipattiḥ iti katham pūrvatas viśeṣaḥ na evam sparśana agamye niṣedhasya abhimata tvāt tarhi pravṛttau= api śītasya buddhiḥ agnau vedye sati niyamān nivṛtā iti pratyetum aśakyam na viruddham anyadā etat pratīteḥ vivakṣita tvāt tarhi prāk gṛhīta virodha smaraṇa vyavahita vyāpāra tvāt na pratyakṣasya pravṛttitaḥ abhāva niścayaḥ syāt mā bhūt kevalam vyavadhāne api tathā viruddha buddhiḥ eva abhāva niścaya aṅgam na anya mātrasya iti anupalabdhi vyavasthā nibandhanasya na kṣatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_188,1	 na ca vyabahāra mātra sādhanam atra api saṃmatam iti āha sa apekṣā tu parā smṛtau atas iha abhāvaḥ api sādhyaḥ tad siddhau ca tad niścaya sthiti lakṣaṇaḥ vyavahāraḥ api na punar tanmātram iti arthaḥ tathā hetu vyāpaka nihnave abhāvaḥ api sādhyaḥ iti vartate yathā na iha dhūmaḥ agneḥ abhāvāt na iha śiṃśapā vṛkṣa abhāvāt na hi atra agni vṛkṣayoḥ pratiyogi pratyakṣa mātram pūrva pravṛtta tādātmya tad utpatti sambandha bodha smaraṇa nirapekṣam dhūma śiṃśa payā uḥ abhāva niścayam prasavati tatra api abhāva sādhana vyavahāra siddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_188,2	 te etarhi niṣedha hetavaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca iti tathā vidhi sādhanau dvau= iti pañca hetavaḥ prasaktāḥ na anupalabdhi sāmānya āśrayāt eka tvāt api ca anupalabdhiḥ svasya aparasya aparā kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva aparasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā aparā kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ca ucyate yathā hi anya pratyakṣam ebāni asya anupalabdhiḥ tathā kasyacid svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva kārya vyāpya apekṣayā kāraṇa vyāpakān upalabdhiḥ ucyate iti na vyapadeśa bhedāt vastu bhedaḥ tasmāt svabhāva anupalabdheḥ eva niṣedhaḥ sarvasya iti trayam eva liṅgam 
JŚNĀ_188,3	 etena kāryasya svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ eva samartha kāraṇasya kārya anupalabdhiḥ upalakṣitāḥ draṣṭavyā hetu śabdasya ca liṅga arthasya vyākhyānāt yathā na iha apratibaddha sāmarthyāni dhūma kāraṇāni santi dhūma abhāvāt iti katham tarhi na atra tuṣāra sparśaḥ agneḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhi saṃgrahaḥ atra api vyāpakasya hi śītasya viruddha dahana upalabdhi rūpā yā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ sā vyāpyasya tuṣāra sparśasya vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ ucyate iti na doṣaḥ yadi api ca vyāpaka anulabdhiḥ api sā vaktum śakyā tathā api viruddha pratiyogi pratīti rūpa tā pratipādana artham tathā vyapadeśaḥ evam kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhi ādayaḥ vyākhyeyāḥ sarvatra abhāvaḥ eva sādhyaḥ adhyakṣeṇa asiddheḥ tad dvārakaḥ tu vyavahāraḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_188,4	 nanu viruddha upalabdhi ādau katham anupalabdhi vyavahāraḥ uktam atra pratiyogi upalabdhiḥ eva anya anupalabdhiḥ pratiyogī ca dvividhaḥ eva tatra yadā viruddhaḥ pratiyogī tadā viruddha śabda prayogaḥ upalabdhi śabdam eva prayojyam upapādayati śeṣe tu pratiyogini gamyamāne svabhāva śabdaḥ dṛśya śabdaḥ vā prayujyamānaḥ pratiṣedhya apekṣayā anupalabdhi śabdena vyapadeśayati tad ekatra upalabdhi tvam gamyam anyatra anupalabdhi tvam tattvam tu ekam eva iti na doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_189,1	 yadā ca viruddhaḥ pratiyogī dvitīyasya ca parokṣasya eva niṣedhaḥ tadā tasya api na avaśyam pratyakṣam eva anupalabdhiḥ kim tu anumānam api viruddhaḥ hi sva sat tayā para sattām apanayan pratiyogī mataḥ na ca parokṣaḥ api tathā bhavan kena vāryate niyata saha upalambhe tu pratiyogini pratyakṣa yogyasya eva niṣedhaḥ iti tasya avaśyam pratyakṣa apekṣā na hi anumīyamāne pradeśe ghaṭaḥ yadi bhavet upalabhyeta eva iti sāmarthyam pratyakṣa ayogāt anumānasya ca ārambha niyama abhāvāt iti katham niṣedhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_189,2	 yadi evam vikalpa mātrāt apratiṣedhaḥ iti ced na tatra api vikalpa ākāre vedyamāne bahis api abhimata deśam indriya sāmarthyān apāye anubhūyeta iti ucyate na tu vikalpanīye bāhye vikalpyamāne dvitīyam api vedyeta iti śakyam vikalpanīye api bāhye vikalpyamāne tad deśam aparam upalabhyeta eva iti kim na syāt na hi pratiyogi jñānam anyasya dṛśyatāra upanibandhanam api tva bhāva niścaya utpāda nimittam sattva vastu tvāt tat ca vikalpasya api iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_189,3	 atha pratipattranurodhaḥ eka jñāna saṃsargiṇaḥ api anurodhaḥ sādhuḥ iti na evam jale gandhasya anale rasasya api vāyau rūpasya api śeṣa mātra upalabdhau vā abhāva vyavahāra mātra darśanāt tatra vā jñāna kāryānupalambha vat anyatra api saḥ eva iti kim eka jñāna saṃsargiṇā kārya anupalabdhyā samarthasya eva niṣedhaḥ iti ced gandha ādiḥ tarhi san= api nīra ādau= indriya vaiguṇyāt na upalabhyaḥ iti mahat eva śāstra pariśrama phalam sa hi vaiguṇyasya kāraṇa anupalambhe api yogi ādibhiḥ abhibhavam saṃbhāvayan saṃśete bhū tale tu tad kṛtā bhūta darśanam indriya pāṭave api saṃbhāvayan kim na saṃśete tasmāt abhyāsa daśāyām tādavasthya sthityā eva vyavahāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_189,4–190,1	 nyāya nāthasya tu na vyavahāram anuvṛttya paryanuyogaḥ visargaḥ vā kiṃtu etāvatyām api gatau na asmat lakṣaṇa kṣatiḥ iti darśayitum prauḍhi vaśāt yathā sarva citā sarva bodha niścaye saḥ eva sarvajñaḥ iti vyavahāre ca yathā eka jñāna saṃsargiṇam paśyataḥ tathā anyam api pratiyoginam abhāva niścayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ avisaṃvādi ca iti na eka jñāna saṃsargi grahaḥ vikalpa śaraṇa avasthāyām ca tad ākāra saṃvedanam eva anya niṣedha sādhanam yuktam tathā eva abhyāsena pratyakṣa sāmarthya darśanāt tat evam viruddhasya parokṣasya api upalabdhiḥ anumāna ātmikā bhāvam itarasya sādhayati yathā na iha śītam dhūmāt iti evam vyāpaka viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ draṣṭavyā yathā na iha tuṣāram dhūmāt etat ca saṃkalayya prayoga kāle vyākhyānam vastutas tu na śītam agneḥ iti ekaḥ prayogaḥ yathā na tuṣāram agneḥ vyāpakasya hi viruddhaḥ viruddhaḥ eva agniḥ ca dhūmāt iti śeṣam api evam ūhyam 
JŚNĀ_190,2	 yadi kāraṇa ādeḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ anyasya kāraṇa ādi anupalabdhiḥ paryudāsa rūpā katham tarhi nirupākhyeṣu tathā na vaktā bandhyā sutaḥ caitanya abhāvāt iti tatra api buddhi pratibhāsasya eva caitanya viyukta tvena saṃvedanam vyāpaka anupalabdhi paryudāsaḥ vaktṛ tva vyavacchedena ca saṃvedanam vyāpya abhāvaḥ svabhāva hetu paryavasitāḥ ca sarva an upalabdhayaḥ niṣedha sādhana adhyavasāyāt ca bhedena nirdeśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ tathā api uktena krameṇa sākṣāt eba svabhāva anupalabdheḥ niṣedhaḥ iti katham ācārya pādaiḥ paramparayā abhidhānāt aupacārikaḥ kṛtaḥ iti ced niṣedhyasya eva yadi dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ niṣeddhrā vivakṣitā tad aupacārikaḥ yadi tu parasya api tadā mukhyaḥ iti kaḥ virodhaḥ iti kevalam aupacārika kathane kim prayojanam iti syāt tatra api dṛśyasya eva niṣedhaḥ yathā śakyaḥ syāt na anyasya sarvajña vīta rāga ādeḥ pradhāna puruṣa arthasya iti kāryataḥ tatra antarbhāvaḥ tattvataḥ tu tasya tad anyasya vā yathā uktasya anupalabdhiḥ sādhikā iti 
JŚNĀ_191,1	 iha sarva śabda abhāva sādhane jñāna kāryān upalabdhim eke pramāṇayanti eka jñāna saṃsargi virahāt kila na iha svabhāva anupalabdheḥ avasaraḥ tathā hi trayam avaśyam asyām abhidheyam ghaṭa ādimad pratikṣepeṇa viśeṣaṇam svabhāvaḥ phalam ca iti tatra dṛśya viṣaya viśeṣaṇa vaśāt piśāca ādeḥ apratiṣedhaḥ eka jñāna saṃsargi vedana svabhāva tvena rūpa jñānāt rasasya na api abhāva pakṣa doṣa anuṣaṅgaḥ vyavahāra phala tayā ca pratyakṣa siddhiḥ upasaṃhitā sā ca pratiyogi jñāna āśraye sati upapadyate tat eva hi pratiyogi antara abhāvanā antarīyaka tayā tad abhāva vikalpa janana sāmarthyāt sādhanam bhavet tatas mūḍham prati tad ātmika anupalabdhiḥ abhāva vyavahāra sādhanī iti yuktam na ca sarva śabda abhāve sādhye kaścid eka jñāna saṃsargī labhyate iti na atra avakāśaḥ tasyāḥ sa tu śabdarāśiḥ abhimata pradeśe vidyamānaḥ tadā jñāna kāryam anārabhyāsitum na samarthaḥ iti kārya pratiṣedhe api nirviśeṣaṇā eva sattā pratiṣiddhā bhavati iti bhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_191,2	 atra cintyate na tāvat dhvaniḥ iti eva śravaṇam vadhiḥ asya api śravaṇa prasaṅgāt tasmāt indriya pāṭava sahakṛtasya eva śabdasya śravaṇa jñāna janaka tvam tat ca śravaṇa pāṭavam eka jñāna saṃsargi virahe duravadhāram ataeva pradeśa pratyakṣa apekṣayā ghaṭa niṣedhaḥ tatas hi indriya guṇam gaṇayan ghaṭa aparādham eva anupalabdheḥ avadhārayati na ca manaskāra vat sva saṃvedana siddhiḥ indriyasya jaḍa tvāt na api indriya antara gamya tvam atīndriya tvāt kāryam punar upalabdhiḥ eva asya tad siddhau ca kārya anupalabdheḥ eva asiddhiḥ asiddhau siddham anaikāntika tvam na hi viṣaye sati api indriya doṣāt saṃbhāvyamānaḥ anupalambhaḥ tad abhāva niyataḥ nāma 
JŚNĀ_191,3	 na abhāvaḥ eva śabdasya tad jñāna janana yogyaḥ tu na asti iti brūmaḥ iti ced sā iyam kuvedya vṛttiḥ āyātāḥ prathamam prāgalbhya garbham abhimata pratikaraṇam abhyupagamya upāya buddhyā upanyastasya anupāyasya pareṇa tattva pratipādane kṛte paścāt asādhya tva dhoṣaṇāt sarvathā abhāvaḥ eva hi jijñāsite kārya anupalabdhiḥ iyam sādhana muktāḥ na tu jñāna janana yogya tā viraha jijñāsāyām tat yadi pramāṇa bhraṃśaḥ eva kathañcid jñātaḥ prameya bhraṃśaḥ tu kim aṅga aṅgīkriyate varam ca pramāṇa antaram eva mṛgyatām asādhya ta eva tu kasmāt avaghuṣyate na hi śakyam avadhiḥ asya aśṛṇvataḥ sannihita bherī rava ādi abhāvaḥ prattikṣeptum vadhira avadhiḥ ayoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_192,1	 sati śruti kṛtaḥ asti viśeṣaḥ prāk paścāt iti ced na evam yadi hi prāc avasthātaḥ śravaṇa śaktyānirviśeṣaḥ eṣaḥ katham aśrutiḥ sati śabde anyathā prāk api na syāt atha visadṛśa avasthaḥ api saṃbhāvyate śrutau= api na śraddhātavyam asya viplavasya saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt tatra aśravaṇam abhūta śravaṇam vā iti na viśeṣaḥ ante kutas śakti viparyayaḥ iti ced madhye kutas tad abhāvaḥ iti samānam tasmāt apakṣaḥ eva ayam san= api śabdaḥ tadā na śrutaḥ iti kevalam kim atra pramāṇam astu iti cintāyām kārya anupalabdhiḥ anaikāntikī iti uktam eva śravaṇa pāṭavasya duravadhāra tvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_192,2	 nanu katham etat duravadhāraṇam dṛṣṭa śravaṇa pāṭava smaraṇa balavataḥ śrotum pravṛttasya kṣaṇika tve api hi visadṛśa sahakāri pratyaya antara virahe visadṛśa daśa asaṃbhava abhāvāt indriya vikāra kāriṇaḥ hi pratyayāḥ dhātu kṣobha prahāra ādayaḥ nirṇīta śaktayaḥ sva santāne santāna vyākulībhāva hetavaḥ sūpa lakṣāḥ eva anupalakṣitāḥ tu sva prabhava bheda śaṅkā katham iva kṣamante sūkṣmam tu prabhāvavataḥ adhiṣṭhāna ādi vikāra kāraṇam śaṅkamānasya śravaṇe api kaḥ āśvāsaḥ tasmāt anupalakṣya kāraṇa ārabdha diś moha lakṣaṇa indriya bhrānti darśane api prasiddha kāraṇa anupalakṣaṇāt na indriyāṇām atādavasthya vyavasthā yathā anyathā tad pratyayānām bhramatva prasaṅgāt tathā adya api kim na gaṇyate mā abhūt sarva saṃvṛtti vilopaḥ 
JŚNĀ_192,3	 abhyāsa daśa asatti samāśrayaḥ tu samānaḥ na hi vadhiravarasya abhira upārūḍha śravaṇa balasya api aśravaṇe abhāva niścayam brūmaḥ bala niścayasya eva abhāvāt tadvat anyasya api akalita balasya atyanta abhyāse hi sakala rajanī supta prabuddhānām adarśane api tad avasthā saṃvedinām aviparīta vyavahāra vṛtti darśanāt kaḥ prastāvī jāgrataḥ sva ātmani anyathā tva śaṅkāyāḥ 
JŚNĀ_192,4	 tasmāt atādavasthyasya tad vyavasthāyāḥ vā niṣedhaḥ prasiddha kāraṇa abhāvāt tad upalakṣaṇa abhāvāt vā yadi darśana śravaṇa ādau= abhyāsa daśa apekṣayā adhyakṣa tva nibandhanam tādavasthyam icchatā saṃvṛti vyavasthite na indriya tādavasthyam sāmagrī pratibaddha buddhi tādavasthyam vā sādhāraṇa śakti apekṣayā saṃvedanam eva vā śaraṇam āsthīyate tat eva aśravaṇa daśāyām api iti katham anekāntaḥ śabda abhāve nanu jñāna ātmani eva sva saṃvedanam iti ced na eka adhimokṣa viṣayeṣu eka kārya upayogiṣu ekadhīḥ sarva viṣayā sthitāḥ nirbhāga vartiṣu pañca skandheṣi api aham iti ekaḥ adhimokṣaḥ bhāṣaṇa āt au= ekasmin= arthe paraspara upādeye ca upayogaḥ ghaṭa ādi saṃjñake tu rūpa rasa ādau prasiddhaḥ ayam nyāyaḥ anyathā vyavahāra ayogāt 
JŚNĀ_193,1	 nanu na śarīra pratyakṣam buddhim anveti evam etat prātisvika rūpa apekṣayā rūpa rasa ādi vat eva sāmānyena tu gṛhītvā eka dhī viṣaya tvam ucyate yāvat na nirbandhaḥ vivecane vivecane tu pṛthak pramāṇam uktam tena pratyakṣaḥ caitraḥ na ca buddhiḥ adhyakṣa iti dvitayam aviruddham ataeva tad avasthaḥ aham iti vikalpaḥ api saṃvedana anusārī sarva viṣayaḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_193,2	 bhrāntiḥ iyam iti ced na bādhaka abhāvāt bhrāntyasiddheḥ tasmāt pūrva pratīta śrotra śakteḥ tad avasthā niścaya saṃbhavāt aśrutiḥ śabdasya eva aparādhāt iti jñāna abhāvena api tad abhāva siddhiḥ aikāntikī iti na prakṛta vyāghātaḥ iyati eva tarhi svabhāva anupalabdheḥ lakṣaṇa sāmagri iti kārya anupalabdhi saṃjñā karaṇe kaḥ arthaḥ pratyaya antara sākalyam svabhāva viśeṣam ca āpannasya eva śabdasya anupalabdhyā niṣedhāt 
JŚNĀ_193,3	 tathā api anya saṃjñāyām ghaṭa niṣedhe api kaḥ niṣeddhāḥ kevalam ghaṭa vat śabdasya api dṛśyānupalabdhyā api niṣedhaḥ sādhyaḥ jātaḥ iti ucyate tatra eka jñāna saṃsargi saṃbhavāt yuktaḥ tayā niṣedhaḥ iti ced tatra eva tāvat eka jñāna saṃsargiṇaḥ kim apekṣayā rūpa darśane hi rasasya viprakṛṣṭa deśa tayā anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvāt eva apratiṣedhaḥ prāpya kāri tvāt ghrāṇa rasana sparśanānām 
JŚNĀ_193,4	 uktena ca krameṇa indriya tādavasthyam siddham iti kim eka jñāna saṃsargi apekṣayā na evam indriya atiriktasya ālokasya tatra apekṣya tvāt sa hi bahis sulabha kāraṇa adhīna upajana apajana dharmakaḥ na sva ātma tādavasthi a sādhyaḥ iti tad artham eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ apekṣyamāṇaḥ indriya sādguṇya jñāne api sahāyībhaviṣyati evam yatra āloka nirapekṣā eva grahaṇa śaktiḥ tatra na kiñcid eka jñāna saṃsargi apekṣayā iti siddham tat ca nāma kvacid sādhane apekṣyate yad antareṇa virodha asiddhi sandeheṣu anyama doṣa āsattiḥ na ca dvividha upalabdhi yogya tā āpannasya kvacid anupalabdhyā niṣedhe sā asti yena saṃsargī niyatam apekṣyeta yatra api ayam apekṣyate tatra api āloka apekṣa pratipattinaḥ vastunaḥ pratiṣedhe viśeṣaṇā siddhi parihāra artham eva na ca etāvatā sarvatra tad apekṣā na hi vināśam pratyanapekṣā vyāpti sādhanī sarvatra kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhane api svabhāva hetau= apekṣyate 
JŚNĀ_194,1	 yadi ca ayam apekṣyaḥ eva kim aṅga dṛśya viśeṣaṇena kenacid eka jñāna saṃsargiṇaḥ dṛśya tva avyabhicārāt na hi piśācasya kenacid eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ ekaḥ eva arthaḥ ubhayathā api iti na eka prayoge anya prayojana carcā iti ced na sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvena bhedasya avyakta tvāt saṃsargaḥ hi na viśeṣaṇam vyabhicarati viśeṣaṇa mātram tu tam vyabhicarati eva ataeva viśeṣaṇa siddhaye saṃsargaḥ upanīyate na tu viśeṣaṇam saṃsarga ākṛṣṭaye prabhavati śabde api prasaṅgāt tathā ca pakṣa kṣayaḥ iti kaḥ śramasya arthaḥ tasmāt eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ nāma prakṛta udāharaṇa apekṣayā eva udghuṣyate na svabhāva anupalabdhau sarvatra apekṣya tvena 
JŚNĀ_194,2	 prastute hi kalasa pratiṣedhe sā digaḥ tu sa viśeṣaṇa siddhyai na upalabdham upalabhyamiti iyat lakṣaṇam khalu nija anupalabdheḥ tathā ca lakṣaṇe prayoge ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta anupalabdhi mātra upanyāsaḥ śāstre viparyaya bādha upadarśane ca pratyaya antara sannidhau svabhāva viśeṣavataḥ sattve anupalabdheḥ asaṃbhavaḥ khyāpyate anyathā prayojakam aṃśam saṃsargam eva sarvatra darśayet viśeṣaṇa vat tādātmyam tu dṛśya tvam abhyupagamya eva niṣidhyate iti viśeṣaṇasya anukti mātram na punar aprayojaka tvam vyāpteḥ iva viduṣi anvayokti viśeṣe vā vyatirekasya tasmāt nyāya nāthasya api na avaśyam eka jñāna saṃsargi vyapekṣā abhiprāyaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhau api ca evam kārya anupalabdhau= eva sarva saṃgraham ācakṣīta svabhāva anupalabdheḥ api tad eka deśa tvāt sarva pramāṇa vyavasthām ca kārya anumāne kuryāt sva saṃvedanāt anyatra 
JŚNĀ_194,3	 tasmāt indriya jñāna viṣaye na kārya anumāna vyavasthā yathā tathā tat agṛhītaḥ iti eva kutas kārya anupalabdhi vyavasthā api śāstra kārasya yathā hi pratyakṣa vyavasthā vila upa bhayam ekatra tathā anyatra svabhāva anupalambhasya yathā vā apratyakṣe kāryam liṅgam tathā apratyakṣa yogyaḥ eva tad anupalabdhiḥ iti samānam yathā ca ayam eva bhagavān ajñāne jñāna antara abhāvam api dṛśya anupalabdhyā vyavahārayati yat āha 
JŚNĀ_194,4	 dṛśya ātmanaḥ vā vikalpasya darśane adṛṣṭiḥ vikalpa kalpanām indriya jñāne pratihanti iti tadā kaḥ eka jñāna saṃsargī kim ca evam abhyupagame kārya anupalabdheḥ api asiddhiḥ iti prakṛta mata hāniḥ eva na hi jñāna kāryasya abhāvaḥ kārya anupalabdheḥ eva boddhavyaḥ anavasthā prasaṅgāt sva saṃvedanam ca eka ākāra niyata m anya abhāva niścayam ākṣipati eva kevalam vimatam prati yadi syāt jñāna antaram anubhūyeta iti dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ eva śaraṇam vyavahāre bāhya vat viśeṣaṇān uccāraṇam tu syāt na tu anyā gatiḥ saṃsarga apekṣāyām ca sā api na asti iti sandigdha asiddhaḥ hetuḥ tasmāt anupalabdheḥ eka jñāna saṃsarga apekṣā niyamam anullaṅghya vartitum aśakyam 
JŚNĀ_195,1	 bahis apekṣayā niyamaḥ iti ced na tatra api nibandhana abhāvāt yat hi sāmarthyam antar tad atikrame tasya bahis api lābha saṃbhave kim na sadṛśī sthitiḥ vicitraḥ hi viṣaya svabhāvaḥ tatra sva ātmā tāvat pratyakṣībhāve yogyatā mātram apekṣate śabda gandha rasa sparśa tamisra ālokāḥ tu manaskāra atirikta mātram ghaṭa ādi sanniveśinaḥ tu rūpa viśeṣāḥ prakāśam api prāyaśas tathā eṣām vidhau= upalabdhiḥ iva svabhāvasya anupalabdhiḥ api niṣedhe kim na bhinnām eva sāmagrī pekṣeta 
JŚNĀ_195,2	 tatra ādye yathā na indriya tādavasthyena upayogaḥ tathā madhyamīyeṣu api na eka jñāna saṃsargiṇā anya atirikta apekṣiṇaḥ tad apekṣā yujyate api tatas yathā yadi buddhiḥ syāt upalabhyeta eva kim indriya tādavasthya apekṣayā iti sāmarthyam tathā yadi syāt rasa ādiḥ tad avastha indriyeṇa mayā upalabhyeta eva kim eka jñāna saṃsargiṇā iti śakyam eva tasmāt bahis api niyama saṃbhāvanā ati dūrā eva abhyupagame vā jñāne api apekṣeta 
JŚNĀ_195,3	 tatra api saṃvedana eka pratyakṣa apekṣā eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ asti iti ced nanu na saṃvedanam nāma ekam pratyakṣam asti dharma mātrasya tasya pratisvam bhedāt sāmānyam āśritya eka jñāna saṃjñayā tu parituṣṭau bhinna indriya grāhyayoḥ api sva saṃvedana indriya jñāna viṣayayoḥ api vā prasaṅgaḥ yayoḥ sa toḥ anyaḥ anya pratyakṣa avyabhicāraḥ tatra iyam vyavasthā iti ced rūpayoḥ api na ayam niyamaḥ pradeśa piśācayoḥ adarśanāt viśiṣṭayoḥ asti eva na ca sāmānya aparādhaḥ viśeṣam āskandati iti ced evam api śabda ākāśayoḥ śabda manaskārayoḥ vā prasaṅgaḥ na hi ākāśa pratyakṣam manaskāra saṃvedana pratyakṣam vā sattve śabdasya pratyakṣam vyabhicarati vyabhicāre punar kārya anupalabdheḥ anekānta prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt avyāpakam eka jñāna apekṣaṇam anyasya api ca sulabham iti alam vimatyai 
JŚNĀ_195,4	 api ca ayam cittayoḥ eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ apūrvaḥ eva mukhyasya abhāvāt gauṇasya ca eka āyatana saṃgraha abhāvāt upalakṣaṇam eka āyatana saṃgrahaḥ iti ced eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ eva kim na upalakṣaṇam ākhyāyate prakṛta ghaṭa udāharaṇa apekṣayā tu dvayam api etat uktam iti anabhiniveśaḥ yathā hi eka āyatana saṃgraheṇa anyaḥ anya pratyakṣa avyabhicāraḥ upalakṣyate tathā eka jñāna saṃsargeṇa api pratiyogi mātra apekṣā eva iti yujyate 
JŚNĀ_196,1	 kaḥ ca kasya pratiyogī yayoḥ eka ākāra niyatam pratyakṣam itarābhāva niścayam upapādayitum śaknoti iti kayoḥ ca evam anupalabdhiḥ yayoḥ eka pratyakṣam apara pratyakṣa avyabhicāri tayoḥ hi satoḥ na eka rūpa niyatā pratipattiḥ asaṃbhavāt tatas tāvatyaḥ viśiṣṭa kāla deśa daśā santāna apekṣayā anyaḥ anyasya pratiyoginau vyavasthā apyete sadṛśaḥ saṃvitti lābha lakṣaṇe ayogaḥ tayoḥ iti kṛtvā atas eva tayoḥ eka ākāra niyatam vedanam anyasya pratiṣedha vikalpam upapādayitum śaknoti iti tādṛśām abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa siddhaḥ abhidhīyate tam eva niścayam mūḍham prati pratiyogi upalambha svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ upalabdhi yogya tā yuga yoginaḥ saṃbhavantī vyavahāra vyavahārau= api sādhayati iti tāvatā eva itara mata pratikṣepeṇa svabhāva phalayoḥ api pariniṣṭhā siddhau kim eka indriya grāhya tā apekṣa upagraheṇa 
JŚNĀ_196,2	 ayam hi pratiyogaḥ ekena anekena vā indriyeṇa grāhyayoḥ arthayoḥ jñānayoḥ jñāna arthayoḥ vā sādhāraṇaḥ abhāva sādhane ca nirapavādaḥ iti kaḥ tad anurodhaḥ yathā hi bhū tala kalasayoḥ jñānayoḥ vā eka rūpa vedanam anya pratyakṣa avyabhicāritayā tad abhāva niścaya utpādane paryāptam tathā pānaka pāna karmaṇi dvayam upalabdhavataḥ tādavasthya saṃvedinaḥ pradīpa kavalane sparśa mātra upalabdhiḥ rasa abhāva niścaya janane sva vikalpa ākāra mātra saṃvedanam vā sannihita sparśa abhāva avasāya sādhane śaknoti eva
