JŚNĀ_196,3	 na hi tad vikalpa vedanam tadā sataḥ sparśasya pratyakṣam vyabhicarati na ca anyaḥ anya pratyakṣa avyabhicārāt anyat anyatra api dvitīya abhāva niścaya utpādana sāmarthyam nāma na api abhāva niścayotpādanasāmarthyāt artha antaram abhāva pratyakṣīkaraṇam nāma na hi asau vigrahavān yatas sākṣāt kartavyaḥ yadā ca paryudāsena pratiyogi eva abhāvaḥ tadā tu asya mukhyā eva pratyakṣa siddhiḥ iti yuktam sarvatra vyavahāra phala tvam na ca ayam pratiyogaḥ svabhāva ādi viprakarṣiṇām kenacid asti yena kasyacid pratyakṣam tad abhāva vibhāvanāya prabhavet na ca evam nivṛtti mātram anupalabdhiḥ uktā bhavati 
JŚNĀ_196,4	 bhaṭṭaḥ tu paryudāsa pakṣe api yathoktam pratiyoginam anapekṣya anya mātrasya upalabdhim anupalabdhim pramāṇayati iti tad mate yuktaḥ piśāca ādi pratikṣepaḥ rūpa darśinaḥ tu rasaḥ tad deśa viprakṛṣṭaḥ eva na tena pratiyogam yathoktam āvahati rasanā agra saṅgī tu na abhāvam anupalabdhau vyabhicarati iti na doṣaḥ kaścid atas eva kārya anupalabdhi ādīnām sākṣāt akṣamaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhau antarbhāvaḥ pāramparyeṇa ucyate tādṛśasya pratiyogasya abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_197,1	 tasmāt upalambha yogya tā prāptasya anupalambhaḥ iti eva dṛśya anupalabdheḥ lakṣaṇam sā ca yathā ukta pratipatti yogi upalambha patayā siddhasya abhāvasya vyavahārikasya eva avatiṣṭhate iti na nyāyaśāḥ trayoḥ uparodhaḥ eka indriya grāhya upanyāsaḥ tu ghaṭa ādi udāharaṇa apekṣaḥ eva mantavyaḥ iti sthitam tatra yadā tāvat timira āloka saṃjñite ākāśa pradeśe dṛśyamāne devakula ādau vā bherī ādeḥ eva abhāvam pratipadyate tadā tat eva tad eka ākāra upakāra uparakta jñāna viṣayī bhavat jñānam vā tādṛśam niyata prāptika pratyakṣa udayasya niṣedhyasya tat jñānasya vā paryudāsaḥ anupalabdhiḥ avyāpṛta cakṣuṣaḥ tu rasa ādiḥ tat jñānam vā antataḥ manaskāra ākāraḥ jñeya paryudāsaḥ tad saṃvedanam ca paryudāsaḥ 
JŚNĀ_197,2	 na hi tat api śabda pratyakṣa udaya vinākṛtam upapadyate paṭu śravaṇasya nirvikalpakasya tu na niṣedhe adhikāraḥ kevalam yāvat deśa saṃbaddhasya dhvaneḥ adhyakṣam na vyabhicarati rasa ādi pratyakṣam vikalpa ākāra saṃvedanam vā tāvat deśa śabda apekṣā eva paryudāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ anyam prati pratiyogasya anyaḥ anya pratyakṣa avyabhicāra lakṣaṇasya vaktum aśakyatvāt tatas ca pūrvavat pratyakṣa siddhiḥ abhāvasya vyavahāraḥ ca phalam dṛśya anupalabdheḥ eva śabde api iti siddham ekadhī virahe api asyāḥ vyāpārān uparodhataḥ anākṛṣṭeḥ aniṣṭasya pratiyogi samāśrayāt iti 
JŚNĀ_197,3–197,4	 āloka ādi samagra tā adhigataye janma adhika vyañjaka apekṣe sūcitaḥ ekadhī vacanayoḥ śabda pradīpa ādiṣu kiñcid tu śruta dṛṣṭa pūrvi manasaḥ tādṛś dṛśaḥ saṃvidaḥ anyeṣu sva anupalabdhiḥ eva hi rava ādi ākāra śūnyāni adhīḥ na akṣasya siddham yadi tādavasthyam śaktiḥ na kārya anupalambhanasya akṣasya siddham yadi tādavasthyam phalam na kārya anupalambhanasya 
JŚNĀ_198,1–198,6	 avaśya apekṣaṇīya tve svabhāva anupalabdhiṣu saṃsargasya katham siddhiḥ jñāna kārya dṛśaḥ api vaḥ bāhyaḥ eva eṣa niyamaḥ yadi tatra api kiṃkṛtaḥ pradeśa mātra yogya tvāt citrā hi viṣaya sthitiḥ anālokasya dhīrya dvat bādhā na anukta bhedikā saṃsargiṇam anādṛtya tathā bādhāt tu kutracid tasyāḥ tu rūpam pratiyogi vastu vijñānam eva iti na bhaṭṭa bhītiḥ tathā hi saḥ api pratiyogi bhāvaḥ mithas samakṣa avi abhicāraḥ eva tatas eva eka vijñānam anyā bhāva vikalpa kṛt na abhāva bodhyaḥ adhyakṣeṇa tad kṛtān niścayāt paraḥ yathā ukta pratiyogi tve sati eva kṣamam akṣa jam tad abhāva avasāyāyeti īdṛśī vastunaḥ sthitiḥ 
JŚNĀ_198,7	 nanu pratiyogi eva eka jñāna saṃsargī sākṣāt eka jñāna saṃsargasya abhimata tvāt mukhya tayā sa ākāra svīkārāt tatas sāmarthyāt eka śabdaḥ avyabhicāra mātra upalakṣaṇa tayā avatiṣṭhate pratyakṣa eka jāti apekṣayā ca ekavṛttiḥ eva na ca evam saṃjñā mātram tathā rūḍhi darśanāt yathā ekaḥ brīhiḥ saṃpannaḥ subhikṣam karoti iti tena yatra api eka jñāna saṃsargiṇi dṛśyamānaḥ iti ucyate tatra api anyaḥ anya pratyakṣa avyabhicāriṇī iti ayam eva arthaḥ eka āyatana bhāvaḥ eva tu upalakṣaṇa tayā prakṛta apekṣa tayā vyākhyeyaḥ yathā pradeśaḥ tat jñānam ca anupalabdhiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_198,8	 tatas ca svabhāva anupalabdhau pratiyogi samāśrayaḥ iti eka jñāna saṃsargi samāśraya eva uktaḥ bhavati iti katham avyāpakam eka jñāna saṃsargi tvam nāma satyam evam pratiyugasitā eka dhī sthitiḥ yadi bhavate pratibhāti kā kṣatiḥ nanu sakala kalāpa saṃhṛtam svayam adṛśaḥ astu niṣedhanam dhvaneḥ anyaḥ anya pratyakṣa avyabhicārasya kena api dhvanau= api saṃbhavāt itarasya tu pratiyoginaḥ ayogāt pratiyoga paryavasitam eka jñāna saṃsargam manyamānasya sva anupalabdhiḥ prakṛta niṣedhe kā para apekṣā tasmāt na yogya deśa aśeṣa śabda abhāva sādhane jñāna kārya anupalambhaḥ śaraṇīkaraṇīyaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhyā eva siddheḥ iti timira ālokayoḥ tu paraspara deśa parihāreṇa sthitayoḥ abhinna indriya kṛtaḥ eva eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ sulabhaḥ iti tad abhāva sādhana adhikāre dūra sthitā eva svabhāva anupalambhāt anya sādhana cintā iti 
JŚNĀ_201,1–201,2	 apohaḥ śabda liṅgābhyām prakāśyate iti sthitiḥ sādhyate sarva dharmāṇām avācya tva prasiddhaye sthitiḥ vyavasthā prakāśyate iti antena apohaḥ atra abhidheyaḥ uktaḥ śeṣeṇa tad prasādhana phalam athavā yat ācāryaiḥ apohaḥ śabda ādinā prakāśyate iti vyavasthā kriyate tat etad artham iti arthaḥ ubhayathā api sarva dharma anabhilāpya tva pratipādana param apoha vyavasthāpanam iti uktam bhavati 
JŚNĀ_201,3	 nanu apohaḥ śabda liṅgābhyām prakāśyate iti anubhava bādhitam etat tathā hi iha mahīdhara uddeśe vahniḥ asti iti śabdāt liṅgāt vā pratītiḥ vidhi rūpam eva ullikhantī lakṣyate na anagniḥ na bhavati iti nivṛtti mātram āmukhayantī yat ca anubhava bādhitam na tatra sādhana antara cintā sarva pramāṇa pauruṣasya tatra eva viśrāmāt tad prasūteḥ tad phala tvāt ca na hi pratyakṣa upakāra nirapekṣaḥ pramāṇa antara udayaḥ na api pramāṇa antara udaya mātreṇa kṛtārthaḥ pramāṇa anusārī yāvat na tad upanīta sādhana artha kriyā anubhavaḥ tasmāt tad anapekṣāyām asāmarthya vaiyarthya grastam pramāṇa antaram svayam eva na kiñcid iti na tena sādhite bādhite vā avakāśam āsādayati tat katham apohaḥ śabda ādi gocaraḥ ucyate 
JŚNĀ_201,4	 atha yadi api nivṛttim aham pratyemi iti na vikalpaḥ tathā api nivṛtta padārtha ullekhaḥ eva nivṛtti ullekhaḥ na hi anantar bhāvita viśeṣaṇa pratītiḥ viśiṣṭa pratītiḥ tatas yathā sāmānyam aham pratyemi iti vikalpa abhāve api sādhāraṇa ākāra parisphuraṇāt vikalpa buddhiḥ sāmānya buddhiḥ pareṣām tathā nivṛtta pratyaya ākṣiptā nivṛtti buddhiḥ apoha pratīti vyavahāram ātanoti iti ced nanu sādhāraṇa ākāra parisphuraṇe vidhi rūpa tayā yadi sāmānya bodha vyavasthā tat kim āyātam asphurat abhāva ākāre cetasi nivṛtti pratīti vyavasthāyāḥ tatas nivṛttim aham pratyemi iti evam ākāra abhāve api nivṛttya akāraṇa sphuraṇam yadi syāt kaḥ nāma nivṛtti pratīti sthitim apalapet anyathā vā tad pratibhāse tad pratīti vyavahṛtiḥ iti gavā ākāre api cetasi turaga bodhaḥ iti astu atha viśeṣaṇa tayā antarbhūtā nivṛtti pratītiḥ iti uktam tathā api yadi agava apoḍhaḥ iti īdṛśa ākāraḥ vikalpaḥ tadā viśeṣaṇa tayā tad anupraveśaḥ bhavatu kim tu gaurati pratītiḥ tadā ca sataḥ api nivṛtti lakṣaṇa viśeṣasya tatra anud kalanāt katham tad pratīti vyavasthā 
JŚNĀ_202,1	 tat etat āyātam sphurataḥ api vidheḥ na viṣaya sthitiḥ apohasya punar asphurataḥ api iti kaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ tathā ca niścayaiḥ yat na niścīyate rūpam tat teṣām viṣayaḥ katham na ca vikalpe asphurataḥ tena niścayanam nāma yat vidhi rūpam sphuritam antar mātrāyām tasya parāpohaḥ api asti iti tad pratītiḥ ucyate tatra api sambandha mātram apohasya vidhiḥ tu sākṣāt nirbhāsi iti na pūrva doṣāt muktiḥ api ca evam adhyakṣasya api apoha viṣaya tvam anivāryam viśeṣataḥ vikalpāt eka vyāvṛtta ullekhinaḥ akhilāni avyāvṛttam īkṣamāṇasya tasmāt vidhi ākāra avagraha adhyakṣa vat vikalpasya api vidhi viṣaya tvam eva na anya apoha viṣaya tvam 
JŚNĀ_202,2–202,3	 yat punar anyasmāt apohyate apohyate anyat asmin vā iti vijāti vyāvṛttam bāhyam eva buddhi ākāraḥ anya apohaḥ iti gīyate tena na kaścid upayogaḥ apoha nāmnā vidheḥ eva vivakṣita tvāt na ca nāma antara karaṇe vastunaḥ svarūpa parāvṛttiḥ tasmāt anubhava anusārāt vidhi rūpam eva bāhyam śabda ādi gamyam astu śāstram ca atra dvau vastu sādhanau= ekaḥ pratiṣedha hetuḥ anaṅgīkṛtavastu aṃśaḥ niṣedhaḥ sādhyate anayā vastuni api tu pūrvābhyām paryudāsaḥ vidhānataḥ 
JŚNĀ_202,4	 yadi ca naña prayoga vat abhāva mātrasya eva hetu antarāt api pratītiḥ tadā na anupalambhāt bhedaḥ iti liṅga vibhāga pūrvaka aśeṣa vyavasthādausthyam āyātam iti katham apohaḥ śabda liṅgābhyām prakāśyate iti ucyate iti atas āha sthitiḥ iti vyavasthā mātram etat mukhya tayā apohaḥ śabda ādeḥ viṣayaḥ iti na idam vastu tattvam iti arthaḥ kim punar atra vastu tattvam iti ced śabdaiḥ tāvat mukhyam ākhyāyate arthaḥ tatra apohaḥ tad guṇa tvena gamyaḥ arthaḥ ca ekaḥ adhyāsataḥ bhāsate anyaḥ sthāpyaḥ vācyaḥ tattvataḥ na eva kaścid iti prakaraṇa artha saṃgrahaḥ 
JŚNĀ_203,1^1	 na khalu śāstram anubhavam paribhūya bhavitum kṣamam iti vidhi rūpam āmukhayan= eva vikalpaḥ upajāyate iti tāvat na śakyam apahnotum iti prathama pāda arthaḥ nañyoge vivāda abhāvāt na tatra cintā śabdaiḥ iti ca upalakṣaṇam liṅgaḥ pratipādyate vikalpaiḥ viṣayīkriyate iti api draṣṭavyam evam satyāḥ tām apohasya vācya tā tad vyavasthā mātram api viluptam sā sthitiḥ api hi dvidhā vidhīyate sannikarṣāt prayojakāt ca tatra yadi api sarva dharma anabhilāpya tva pratipādanam prayojakam uktam na tu sannikarṣaḥ kaścid iti āśaṅkya āha tatra apohaḥ iti vidhau hi mukhya tayā pratipādyamāne tad viśeṣaṇa tayā upasarjana tvena gamyate eva apohaḥ 
JŚNĀ_203,1^2	 tatra tad guṇa tvena iti artha sannikarṣaḥ gamyate iti pratīti sannikarṣaḥ tatas ca artha saṃbaddhaḥ pratīyamānaḥ ca apohaḥ mukhya pratītikam api vidhim tiraskṛtya prādhānyena saḥ eva abhidheyaḥ iti ucyate ukta prayojanāt athavā tad guṇa tvena eva gamyaḥ na mukha tvena iti sākṣāt apoha vādinaḥ nirastāḥ yadi api ca anya apoha ādi śabdānullekhaḥ uktaḥ tathā api na apratītiḥ eva viśeṣaṇa bhūtasya apohasya agavādi apoḍhaḥ eva gavā ādi śabdasya niveśita tvāt śāstram hi niveśanam ca yaḥ yasmāt bhidyate vinivartya tam ityādi yathā hi nīlotpale niveśitāt indīvara śabdāt tad pratītau nīlim a sphuraṇam anivāryam tathā go śabdāt api agavāpoḍhe niveśitāt go pratīta avagaḥ apoha sphuraṇam anivāryam 
JŚNĀ_203,2	 ye punar agaḥ apohe go śabda saṅketa vidhau= anyonya āśrayaṇam grāmya dhandhīkaraṇam udbhāvayanti te api sāmānye sāmānyavati vā saṅketa vādinaḥ katham atas doṣān mucyamānam ātmānam paśyanti tathā hi sāmānyam nāma na sāmānya mātram abhipretam turage api go śabda saṅketa prasaṅgāt kim tu go tva sāmānyam abhipretam tāvatā ca go tva sāmānye tadvati vā go śabda saṅketa iti artha niṣṭhāyām saḥ eva doṣaḥ gavā parijñāne go tva sāmānya aparijñānāt go tva sāmānya aparijñāne go śabda vācya aparijñānāt atha go tve tadvati vā go śabdaḥ iti īdṛśa akṣareṇa yadi saṅketaḥ tadā doṣaḥ yadā tu puras sthitam piṇḍam ekam upadarśya deśa kāla antara viprakīrṇa aśeṣa vyakti sādhāraṇa rūpa vikalpa sthāyinam prakaraṇa ādeḥ pratipattāram avadhāryāyam gauḥ iti saṅketaḥ tadā yatra eva asau tat sādhāraṇam rūpam nirūpayati tam eva go śabdena vyavaharati iti katham mithas prārthanā doṣaḥ tāvatā ca go tve tadvati vā saṅketa iti vyākhyātṝṇām siddhānta anuvādaḥ eṣaḥ na tu saṅketakartṝṇām upadeśa kramaḥ tādṛś iti ced 
JŚNĀ_204,1^1	 evam tarhi yadyagavāpoḍhe go śabdaḥ iti īdṛśa ākāram saṅketa ākāra kīrtanam tadā ayam doṣaḥ yadā tu vivakṣita vyaktiṣu eka ākāra pratyavamarśa vartini prakaraṇāt avadhārite pratipattari saṅketakaraṇa mayam gauḥ iti tadā kva doṣa avakāśaḥ sa hi sva vikalpa talpa śāyinīḥ sakala vyaktīra go vyāvṛtta ādi akṣaram anapekṣya svayam tad vijātīya aśeṣa vyakti vyāvṛttā go śabda vācyāḥ pratipadyamānaḥ yatra eva vijātīya vyāvṛtim pratipadyate tāḥ eva go śabdena vyavaharati iti tāvatā agāvyāvṛtte go śabdaḥ iti siddhānta anuvādaḥ eva na saṅketa ākāraḥ abhimate go śabda vṛtta avago śabdena śeṣasya abhidhātum śakya tvāt 
JŚNĀ_204,1^2	 sa tu vijātīya vyāvṛttaḥ sādhāraṇa ākāraḥ vikalpe sāmānyasya pratibhāsaḥ vyakteḥ vā sva ātmā eva iti paścāt niśceṣyate itaretara āśrayaḥ tu na asti iti siddham siddham ca puṇḍarīka śabda śrutau śveta śatapatra pratipatti vat gā śabda śrutau= api agavāpa ūḍha pratītau jāti vādinā api avaśya abhyupagantavyam apoha viśeṣaṇa śemuṣīna antarīyaka tvam vidheḥ iti na ca saṃbandha gandha mātram sākṣāt eva dvayoḥ pratītiḥ mukhya upasarjana bhāvena iti bhedaḥ dharma vācī vā guṇa śabdaḥ anya apoha dharmaṇaḥ vidhi rūpasya pratīteḥ 
JŚNĀ_204,2	 yat tṛtīya ākārasya āropita bāhyayoḥ anya nivṛtti kṛtam sādṛśyam dūṣayan vācaspatiḥ āha na ca sva lakṣaṇa dharmaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ bhavadbhiḥ abhyupeyate iti tat duṣṭam eva atha bhāvikī iti vivakṣitam tatra iti ced tathā api na upayogaḥ kalpanā ārūḍhasya eva dharmi dharma bhāvasya iṣṭa tvāt kevalam kim na vidhinā eva vyapadeśaḥ pratyakṣasya api vā para apoha viṣaya tva vyavahāra prasaṅgaḥ iti avaśiṣyate 
JŚNĀ_204,3^1	 atra brūmaḥ iha kācid vyavasthā tattva leśam āśritya prayojana biśeṣāt anyathā sthitau= api anyathā kriyate yathā ātma tad utpādaḥ iti utpādaḥ hi prāc abhāva viśiṣṭasya vastunaḥ sataḥ eva dharmaḥ atha ca prāgabhāva lakṣaṇa tattva leśam āśritya asate iti vyavasthāpyate satkārya vāda śaṅkā saṅkocāya yathā vā anena eva kṛtam karma kaḥ anyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati iti eka santāna prajñaptim āśritya kṛta nāśa akṛta abhyāgama vañcanā vimohāya tathā adya api vidhi viṣaya abhidhānam vastutas vastunaḥ eva para āropita vācya tā svīkāra śaṅkā nirākaraṇāya na antarīyaka pratītiḥ api apohaḥ eva vikalpa viṣayaḥ iti vyavasthāpyate atas na vidhinā eva vyavahāraḥ yadā tu apohe eva mukhya arthaḥ śabdasya iti āropaḥ tadā vidhiḥ api puraskriyate yathā uktam śabdaiḥ tāvat mukhyam ākhyāyate arthaḥ iti pratyakṣe tu vivāda abhāvāt na evam vyavasthā iti yuktam anya apoha viśeṣaṇam tu vidhiḥ tatra atiśayaḥ na iti uktam eva 
JŚNĀ_204,3^2	 śāstram hi tat paricchinatti tatas anyat vyavacchinatti ityādi niṣedhya apekṣayā tu tatra anupalabdhi śabdena niṣedha vyāpāraḥ puraskriyate eva yathā vā vidhi vṛtteḥ agrahaṇam nāma prasajya pakṣe niyata rūpa anubhavāt abhāva vikalpa utpādana śaktiḥ eva tathā vidhi vikalpānām api tantre anurūpa anuṣṭhāna dāna śaktiḥ eva niṣedha grahaṇam agniḥ mayā pratītaḥ iti anuvyavasāya prasava śaktiḥ ca paryudāsa pakṣe ca niyata svarūpa saṃvedanam eva ubhayatra niṣedha grahaṇam ubhayam ca etat abhimatam śāstra kārasya kvacid tasya prastāva anurūpam prasajya pratiṣedha adhikāreṇa rūpe tasya na kiñcana ityādīni vacanāni kvacid tu atad rūpa parāvṛtta vastu mātra prasādhanāt itya ādīni paryudāsā āśrayāṇi na tu eka niyamaḥ tatas yaṭṭīkākāraḥ sva apoha siddhau tad artha avatārataralaḥ trilocanaḥ ca avocatām ācāryaḥ prasajya pratiṣedha vallabhaḥ unnīyate iti tad nirākṛtam 
JŚNĀ_204,3^3	 na ca bheda abhāvāt viśeṣaṇa vyavahāra hāniḥ rāhoḥ śiraḥ go tvam sāmānyam ityādi vat vivakṣā kṛtasya anapāyāt kim ca vyavahriyate eva bhavatā api ghaṭa abhāva pradeśayoḥ piśāca tva abhāva stambhayoḥ vā viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa bhāvaḥ tat katham asmākam niṣedhe niḥsvabhāva abhāva vādi tvāt iti ced na idānīm svarūpa nirūpaṇam abhāvasya kim tu pratīti nirūpaṇam sā ca śakyāḥ apahnotum paryudāsa pakṣe api tad vidhiḥ eva anya niṣedhaḥ iti na pratīti kṣatiḥ na api viśeṣaṇa bhāvasya anena eva vākyena vidhi niṣedhayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya pradarśanāt ataeva virodha codyam api avadyam na svābhāvena hi vidheḥ virodhaḥ na anya abhāvena saha eva sthānāt tasmāt yuktam uktam tatra apohaḥ tad guṇa tvena gamyaḥ iti athavā tasya artha ākhyānasya guṇaḥ ayam eva yat anyaniṣedhanam nāma tena asau gamyate iti vyavahartavyam 
JŚNĀ_204,3^4	 yat śāstram tad anya parihāreṇa pravarteta iti śabda niyogaḥ vyarthaḥ anyathā prayogaḥ syāt iti etena tātparyārtha tvam apohasya darśitam avyāpi tva parihāraḥ ca eṣa panthāḥ śrudhnam upatiṣṭhate iti atra api prakṛta patha antara apekṣayā eṣaḥ eva śrudhna pratyanīka aniṣṭa sthāna apekṣayā śrudhnam eva araṇya mārgavat viccheda abhāvāt upatiṣṭhate eva sārtha dūta ādi vyavacchedena panthāḥ eva iti sulabhaḥ niyamaḥ tarjanī nirdeśāt gata arthaḥ panthāḥ eva iti ced para vyavacchedaḥ tāvat asti iṣṭaḥ ca prayogaḥ tu gata arthasya api loke dṛśyate eva abhyāgacchati brāhmaṇau dvau= iti ādi vat yathā hi sārtha puruṣa ādi vyavacchedena kaḥ panthāḥ śrudhnam upatiṣṭhate iti praśnaḥ tathā uttaram api eṣa panthāḥ iti sarvatra eva hi pratipādya śaṅkā aṅkitasya eva vidhi pratiṣedhau= iti yadi ca śabda śruti kāle kalitaḥ na parāpohaḥ katham anya parihāreṇa pravṛttiḥ tatas gām badhāna iti coditaḥ aśva ādīn api badhnīyāt 
JŚNĀ_206,1	 yat tu goḥ pratītau na tad ātmā parātmā iti sāmarthyāt anya apohaḥ paścāt niścīyate iti matam tad asaṅgatam prāthamikasya api pratīti krama adarśanāt na hi tad kāla vyutpanna saṅketaḥ api gāmānaya iti uktaḥ paratas nivṛttau= artha āpattim anusarati na ca go śabdāt anyauvakorṇa pratipattau go niścayaḥ yuktaḥ tathā pratipattau vā paścāt api katham arthāpatteḥ udayaḥ para rūpa parikaraḥ hi gauḥ gṛhītaḥ katham sa tad anākīrṇa tā samarthane samarthaḥ tasmāt goḥ pratītiḥ iti agaḥ apoḍha pratipattiḥ ucyate atas sva artha pratīti kāle eva artha antara apohasya pratīti kālaḥ candra prayoge candra pratīti kāla vat avadāta tāyāḥ yathā ca śuklimā pratītau kīdṛśī indu pratītiḥ para rūpa saṅkīrṇa pratītau= api kīdṛśī gopratītiḥ iti samānam na api na saṅkīrṇam na asaṅkīrṇam avagantum śakyam vastu paścāt api sāmarthyasya aśakya tvāt ca tasmāt na niṣedha bodhāya artha sāmarthya ālambanam śreyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_206,2–207,1	 yat api uvāca vācaspatiḥ jātimatyaḥ vyaktayaḥ vikalpānām śabdānām ca gocaraḥ tāsām ca tadvatīnām rūpam atad jātīya vyāvṛttam iti arthataḥ tad avagateḥ gā badhāna iti coditaḥ na aśva ādīn badhnāti iti tat api anena eva nirastam yatas jāteḥ adhikāyāḥ prakṣepe api vyaktīnām rūpam atad jātīya vyāvṛttam eva ced tadā tena eva rūpeṇa śabda vikalpayoḥ viṣayī bhavantīnām katham atad vyāvṛtti pratoti parihāraḥ atha na vijātīya vyāvṛttam vyakti rūpam tathā apratītam vā tadā jāti prasādaḥ eṣaḥ iti katham arthataḥ api tat avagatiḥ iti ukta prāyam atha jāti balāt eva anyatas vyāvṛttam sā tarhi pūrvam api āsīt eva iti pūrvam na samarthāḥ tad niścaye paścāt api katham saṅketa smaraṇa sahakāryapekṣā hi nāma yojanāyām eva vijātīya itara kalpanā tu darśana mātra adhīnā bāla ādi vat iti yat kiñcid etat 
JŚNĀ_207,2^1	 yadi vā guṇyate abhyasyate iti guṇaḥ upādeyaḥ dharmaḥ tena prādhānyam atra lakṣaṇīyam tatas saḥ eva guṇaḥ apohaḥ eva pradhānam yeṣu śabdeṣu tad bhāvena apohaḥ eva bhāva vāciṣu śabdeṣu gamyaḥ ucyate na vidhiḥ sphuran= api apradhāna vat tathā hi vijātīye sarvatra adṛṣṭi apekṣa tvāt kvacid tu dṛṣṭi apekṣaṇa ātmajātīye śrutau saṃbadhyate apohaḥ iti śāstram api ca ubhaya avabhāse api yathā avabhāsa prameya abhāvāt anya nivṛtteḥ tu bhāva niyamāt nivṛttiḥ eva pradhānam yat śāstram vastu rūpasya saṃsparśaḥ viccheda karaṇe dhvaneḥ syāt satyam sa hi tatra iti abhāva vāciṣu punarvastunaḥ asattvāt eva yat śāstram rūpa abhāvāt abhāvānām śabdāḥ rūpa abhidhāyinaḥ na āśaṅkyāḥ eva siddhāḥ te vyavacchedasya bodhakāḥ iti yat vā tasmin= apohe paryudāsena apoḍha ākāre vā vācye sthitaḥ guṇaḥ doṣa niṣedhaḥ yeṣām śabdānām tad bhāvena apoḍhaḥ eva vācyaḥ ucyate 
JŚNĀ_207,2^2	 yathā āha nivṛtteḥ niḥsvabhāva tvāt na sthāna antara kalpanā upaplavaḥ ca sāmānya dhiyaḥ tena api adūṣaṇā iti evam apohasya vācya tā vyavasthāyām nimittāni abhidhīyamānāni śāstre apohasya śabdān mukhya sphuraṇa virodhīni ūhanīyāni bhāva vāciṣu abhāva vācaka adhikāre ca ayam eva mukhyaḥ vivekaḥ iti uktam bhāva vāciṣu upasarjana tayā vivekasya amukhya tām khyāpayati viśeṣataḥ hi eṣa boddhavyaḥ abhāva vāciṣu padārthaḥ eva apohaḥ bhāva vāciṣu punar padārthasya anyatas apohaḥ padārthavat ca anyasya enayoḥ ca ukti mātreṇa bhedaḥ iti yadi tathāvidha nibandhana adhīnā apohasya vācya tā vyavasthā arthaḥ eva tu mukhyam ākhyāyate hanta tarhi sarva dharma anabhilāpya tā samayaḥ astam ayam āyātaḥ tad arthaḥ ca samārambhaḥ iti sūcitam 
JŚNĀ_208,1^1	 yat ca uktam vastu vācyata āra upaniṣedha artham apohasya prādhānyena abhidhāna vyavasthā iti tatra api svayam artha vācya tā eva svīkriyate parasya tu anyathā upadiśyate iti mahatī prekṣata iti āśaṅkya āha arthaḥ ca ekaḥ ityādi ayam arthaḥ arthaḥ hi dvividhaḥ bāhyaḥ āntaraḥ ca anyasya abhāvāt tatra ekaḥ tāvat bāhyaḥ adhyavasāyāt eva vācyaḥ vyavasthāpyate na sva lakṣaṇa parisphūrttyā katham iti ced anubhavāt eva yathā hi pratyakṣa cetasi deśa kāla avasthā niyatāni parisphuṭa rūpāṇi sva lakṣaṇāni pratibhānti anubhūyante tathā na vikalpa kāle vikalpa kāle hi vijātivyāvṛttam eva paraspara ākāra ākīrṇam iva asphuṭam iva pratyakṣa aparicitam kiñcid rūpam ābhāsamānam anubhava viṣayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_208,1^2	 yat śāstram śabdena avyāpṛta akṣasya buddhau= apratibhāsana ātarthasya dṛṣṭau= iva iti upāya bhedāt ekasya eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ ekatra hi buddhau= indriyam āśrayaḥ anyatra śabda ādi iti ced atra api uktam jātaḥ nāma āśrayonyānyaḥ cetasām tasya vastunaḥ ekasya eva kutas rūpam bhinna ākāra avabhāsi tat na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe paraspara viruddhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ yatas ekena indriya buddhau pratibhāseta anyena vikalpe tathā sati vastunaḥ eva bheda prāpteḥ na hi svarūpa bhedāt aparaḥ vastu bhedaḥ na ca pratibhāsa bhedāt aparaḥ svarūpa bhedaḥ anyathā trailokyam ekam eva vastu syāt nanu dūra āsanna deśa vartinoḥ ekatra śākhini spaṣṭa aspaṣṭa pratibhāsa bhede api na śākhi bhedaḥ artha kriyā bheda abhāvāt iti artha kriyā bheda upakṛtaḥ eva pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhedakaḥ 
JŚNĀ_209,1	 na ca iha artha kriyā bhedaḥ iti katham indriya śabdābhyām janita jñāna viṣayaḥ gavādiḥ bheda bhāj iti ced na brūmaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ bhinna vastu niyataḥ kim tu eka viṣaya tva abhāva niyate iti tathā hi yaḥ yaḥ kvacid vastuni pratyakṣa pratibhāsāt viparītaḥ pratibhāsaḥ na asau tena eka viṣayaḥ yathā ghaṭa grāhakāt paṭa pratibhāsaḥ yathā vā śaṅkha grāhakāt pīta pratibhāsaḥ tathā ca gavi pratyakṣa pratibhāsāt viparītaḥ pratibhāsaḥ vikalpa kāle iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ eka viṣaya tvam hi pratibhāsā bhedena vyāptam savya itara nayana dṛṣṭa vat dṛṣṭam avyāptitaḥ tu yadi pratyakṣa antaram api viparīta pratibhāsam syāt vastu ca dvi rūpam bhavet tat ca dvayam api na asti iti vyāptiḥ eva āśraya bheda bhāvini ca jñāne pakṣīkṛte tad viruddhaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ siddhaḥ tatas yatra artha kriyā bheda ādi sacivaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tatra vastu bhedaḥ ghaṭa paṭa vat tam punar sahāyam vihāya pravṛttaḥ niyamena eka viṣaya tām pariharati iti ekaḥ atra bhrāntaḥ eva pratibhāsaḥ śaṅkhe pīta pratibhāsa vat 
JŚNĀ_209,2	 tatra api śaṅkhaḥ eva viṣayaḥ iti ced śukla tām aspṛśantī buddhiḥ śaṅkha viṣaya iti su vyāhṛtam śaṅkha mātram pratyeti iti ced na tatas parasya śaṅkha mātrasya asphuraṇāt pṛṣṭha bhāvini vikalpe sphurati iti ced astu na tu nirvikalpaḥ pīta pratibhāsaḥ śaṅkha viṣayaḥ iti siddham evam dūratas śikhariṇi piṇḍa ākāra pratipattiḥ api na pippala ādi bheda avasāya samartha patra ādi viśeṣa virahiṇī vṛkṣa viṣaya iti prakṛta samam etat artha kriyā bheda ādi abhāvāt ca na bhinnaḥ artham iti ekasya arpite bhrānti bhāve yadi na pratyakṣa pratibhāsaḥ bhrāntaḥ tadā anya pratibhāsaḥ eva bhramaḥ iti brūmaḥ evam pīta ābhāse go vikalpe ca samānaḥ nyāyaḥ nanu kvacid kasyacid āropaḥ kutaścid sādṛśyāt bhavati na ca vikalpa pratibhāsa vat saṃbhinna ākāram janma antare api kiñcid upalabdham 
JŚNĀ_209,3	 tat kutas kasya kva samāropāt bhramaḥ ayam iti ced ayam aparaḥ tava eva doṣaḥ yat ayam vikalpena adhyakṣa gamyaḥ eva gocaraḥ na anya gocaraḥ iti nirviṣayaḥ api na bhramaḥ abhidhātavyaḥ asmākam tu tad viṣayaḥ na bhavati iti etāvatā eva prakṛta siddhiḥ tat eva anyathā ākhyāti iti tad gocaraḥ eva iti ced yathā pratyakṣa puraskṛtena rūpeṇa asti tatas atiriktasya vastunaḥ abhāvāt kasya anyathā ākhyāne kartṛ tvam tat tu na khyāti eva iti alam bahu bhāṣitayā tasmāt na sva lakṣaṇa pratibhāsaḥ vikalpeṣu iti nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_210,1^1	 tena yat āha vācaspatiḥ na ca śābda pratyakṣoyoḥ vastu gocara tve pratyaya abhedaḥ kāraṇa bhedena pārokṣya apārokṣya bheda upapatteḥ iti tat na upayogi parokṣa pratyayasya vastu gocara tva asam arthanāt parokṣata āśrayaḥ tu kāraṇa bhedaḥ indriya gocara grahaṇa viraheṇa eva kṛtārthaḥ nanu vastu viṣaya tve pratyaya abheda prasaṅgaḥ tvayā eva uktaḥ iti tad parihāreṇa eva vastu viṣaya tvam siddham na ca anyat vastu asti iti tad viṣaya tvam ca iti ced na evam yatas pratibhāsa vaijātyasya atad viṣaya tvena vyāpti sādhanāt asau prasaṅgaḥ asmadīyaḥ asmākam api vyāpti vighaṭanāya eva prayatnaḥ eṣaḥ kāraṇa vaijātya kṛte pratibhāsa vaijātye saṃbhavini kutas vā tad viṣaya tvena vyāptiḥ iti etat api kadā yujyate tad viṣaya tva mātreṇa vā kāraṇa bhedaḥ vyāptaḥ śakyaḥ darśayitum 
JŚNĀ_210,1^2	 tad tāvat na asti kāraṇa bhedasya vastunaḥ apratītya eva caritārtha tvāt atha na satya udbhāvanam etat kāraṇa bhedāt api saṃbhāvyate pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tat viṣaya tve api iti saṃbhāvyatām tarhi gāndhāra madhura bodhayoḥ api eka viṣaya tvam kāraṇa bhedasya tatra api saṃbhavāt nirvikalpa sa vikalpayoḥ agni tva mātra ullekhaḥ asti iti eka viṣaya tā āśvāsaḥ tatra tu na gāndhāra tvasya na vā madhura tvasya tad ubhaya bodhayoḥ ullekhaḥ iti ced aho niruḍhatā mahatī ātyantika kāraṇa vaijātyasya hi phalam etat eka viṣaya tva āśvāsaḥ punar antataḥ vastunaḥ ullekhāt bhaviṣyati sandehe kāraṇa vaijātye avāntarasya agni tva ādeḥ ullekhaḥ ātyantike tu sarva sādhāraṇasya dharmasya iti na tāvatā eva atat viṣaya tvam asti ca avāstava dharmasya mādhuryasya anuvṛttiḥ gān dhāre api 
JŚNĀ_210,2	 anyādṛśam tat mādhuryam iti ced vikalpa nyastasya api agni tvam anyat eva na ca eka rūpe api ullikhyamāne avāntara dharma pratibhāsayoḥ eka viṣaya tvam śukti rajata vat na hi śukti pratibhāsaḥ rajata viṣayaḥ rajata pratibhāsaḥ vā śukti viṣayaḥ sādhāraṇa dhava latā ullekhe api tasmāt yathā agni vikalpe vastu sphuraṇe api avāntara dharmasya gardabha tvasya asphuraṇāt na gardabha viṣaya tā tathā avāntarasya agni tvasya sphuraṇe api sva lakṣaṇa ākārasya pratiniyatasya asphuraṇāt na anya dravya sphuraṇam iti nyāyaḥ sva lakṣaṇasya eva agni dravya tvāt tatas kāraṇa bhedaḥ jñāna pratibhāsasya bhedakaḥ astu vastu viṣaya tvam tu na dvayoḥ api pratibhāsayoḥ iti sthitam etat tasmāt na sva lakṣaṇam viṣayaḥ śabda ādeḥ iti siddham 
JŚNĀ_211,1	 kim ca evam vidhi niṣedhayoḥ apoha tvāt uccāraṇam eva na syāt tau hi dharmiṇaḥ vā syātām dharmāṇām vā yathā vṛkṣaḥ asti na asti vā vṛkṣaḥ nīlaḥ na vā nīlaḥ iti tatra prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ tāvat na asti bhāva abhāva niyataḥ hi vṛkṣaḥ vṛkṣa śabdena coditaḥ iti bhāva niyama pakṣe asti iti vyartham na asti iti asamartham virodhāt abhāva nirūpaṇe tu viparyayaḥ asti ca vṛkṣa pada śrutī vidhi niṣedha apekṣā iti bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇī ayam vṛkṣa padāt vṛkṣa pratibhāsaḥ na bāhyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_211,2	 yat tu nyāya darśane tātparyaṭīkākāreṇa jātimat vyakti vācya tām sva vācā eva prastutya anantaram eva na ca śabda arthasya jāteḥ bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyam na upapadyate sā hi svarūpataḥ nityā api deśa kāla viprakīrṇa aneka vyakti āśraya tayā bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇī bhavanti astināsti saṃbandha yogyā vartamāna vyakti saṃbandhi tā hi jāteḥ astitāḥ atīta anāgata saṃbandhi tā ca na astitā iti sandigdha vyatireki tvāt anaikāntikam bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyam anyathā siddham vā iti vilapitam tāvatā tāvat na prakṛta kṣatiḥ jātau bharam nyasyatā sva lakṣaṇa avācya tvasya svayam svīkārāt 
JŚNĀ_211,3	 api ca jātiḥ api asti ādi pada prayogāt prāc abhidhīyamānā śabdena vartamāna vyakti saṃbaddhāḥ vā abhidheyāḥ atīta anāgata vyakti saṃbaddhāḥ vā ubhaya saṃbaddhāḥ vā asaṃbaddhāḥ vā iti pakṣāḥ na ca ekatra api trāṇam prācīnacodya caturaḥ kṣamate prathame pakṣe hi bhāva niyamaḥ dvitīye tu abhāba niyamaḥ tṛtīye api yadi sat asat vyakti yogāt asyāḥ sattva asattva vyavahāra manorathaḥ tathā yaiḥ yaiḥ āśrayaiḥ vartamāna vyakti yogaḥ asyāḥ vyavahriyate yaiḥ yaiḥ vā atīta an āgata vyakti yogaḥ tān āśrayān= tathā eva pratipādayet śabdaḥ na hi anyathā ubhaya vyakti saṃbaddhā pratipāditā bhavati tathā ca sati saḥ eva asti ādi pada aprayoga prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_211,4^1	 atha evam matiḥ yat tad ubhaya vyakti saṃbandhi rūpam tat asyāḥ śabdena coditam eva na tu tad saṃbandhinīnām ubhayīnām vyaktīnām pratītiḥ na hi eka saṃbandhi pratītiḥ saṃbandhi antara pratītim avaśyam anvākarṣati putra ādi pratīti vat iti ced evam sati saṃbandhinām apratītau na saṃbandhasya api pratītiḥ yatas dviṣṭha saṃbandha saṃvittiḥ na eka rūpa pravedanāt dvaya svarūpa grahaṇe sati saṃbandha vedanam tatas yathā tattvataḥ kasyacid putraḥ api pitṛ saṃbandhān avadhāraṇe puruṣa mātra rūpaḥ pratītaḥ dhaṭa vat svatantraḥ tathā sāmānya saṅkhātam api vastu svatantram pratīyamānam na sāmānya rūpa tayā pratītam bhavati iti caturtha pakṣa pratikṣepaḥ 
JŚNĀ_211,4^2	 tadā api saṃbandhi nāmanākṣepāt astyādi pada aprayogaḥ siddhaḥ svatantre hi tasmin niścīyamāne tasya eva bhāva abhāvābhyām asti ādi prayogeṇa bhāvyam na anyasya saṃbandha avadhāraṇe api hi na eka saṃbandhinaḥ bhāva abhāvābhyām itarasya asti ādi pada prayogaḥ na hi caitrasya bhāva abhāvābhyām tad putra tvena avadhāritaḥ api maitraḥ asti na asti vā iti saṃbandham arhati kim punar saṃbandhā abodhi sāmānyam anyādṛśaḥ tatra saṃbandhaḥ iti ced kīdṛśaḥ api vā bhavatu pratītim ana ārūḍhaḥ punar asat kalpaḥ eva iti na anya doya bhāva abhāva abhyām ayaḥ śalākā kalpasya pratītasya asti ādi pada prayogaḥ yogam anveti atiprasaṅgāt svarūpam ca asya sadā avasthāyi pratipāditam iti asti pada vaiyarthyam nāstipada virodhaḥ ca tad avasthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_212,1	 tasmāt na anyathā siddham bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇyam aikāntikam ca bāhya viṣaya tva sādhane vikalpa pratibhāsasya niyamavatī hi viṣaya vyavasthā nimittavat tayā vyāptā na ca viṣaya sada sattā prasādhanāt anyat nimittam upapadyate atiprasaṅgāt tatas tad abhāve vyāpaka abhāvāt abhavantī viṣaya vattā sat asattva prasādhana eva niyamyamānā tena vyāptā iti tad virodhini katham avatiṣṭhet yat jñānam yatra bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇa pratibhāsam na tena tasya viṣayavat tvam yathā go jñānasya aśvena bāhye ca bhāva abhāva sādhāraṇa pratibhāsam vṛkṣa vikalpa jñānam iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ tad viṣaya tva vyāpakasya bhāva abhāva prasādhanasya hi viruddham tad aprasādhana rūpam sādhāraṇyam evam jātimat vyakti vacane api doṣaḥ eva vyakteḥ ced pratīti siddhiḥ jātiḥ adhikā pratīyatām mā vā na tu tad doṣāt muktiḥ 
JŚNĀ_212,2	 yat ca uktam kaumārilaiḥ sa bhāga tvāt eva vastunaḥ na sādhāraṇya doṣaḥ vṛkṣa tvam hi anirdhārita bhāva abhāvam śabdāt avagamyate tayoḥ anyatareṇa śabda antara avagatena saṃbadhyate iti tatra api vṛkṣa tvam iti yadi jātiḥ vivakṣitā tadā tad daṣaṇena eva nirvṛtiḥ atha aparāmṛṣṭa bheda abhedam eva vṛkṣa tvam tadā tad avaśyambhāve abhāve vā niyatam śabdena ca tathā eva khyāpitam iti kim asti ādi padena adya api 
JŚNĀ_212,3	 syāt etat tat niyata tve api vṛkṣa tva aṅgaḥ eva śabdena coditaḥ na sattva asattva aṅgaḥ iti ced tayoḥ aṃśayoḥ tarhi bhedaḥ kālpanikaḥ tāttvikaḥ vā kālpanika tve iyam gavya vastunā uva pratiyatī śābdī buddhiḥ katham vastu viṣaya iti siddham tāttvika tve vṛkṣaḥ san= iti sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapattiḥ ghaṭa paṭa vat eka vastu niyatau dharmau= iti nyāya darśana vid pratikṣepaḥ vakṣyate bheda abheda pakṣaḥ api kṣiptaḥ anyatra yat ca idam na ca pratyakṣasya iva śabdānām artha pratyāyana prakāraḥ yena tat dṛṣṭaḥ iva asti ādi śabda apekṣā na syāt vicitra śakti tvāt pramāṇānām iti tat api ekārtha tve bhinna avabhāsa dūṣaṇena dūṣitam tatas yadi pratyakṣa artha pratipādanam śabdena tadvat eva avabhāsaḥ syāt abhavan= ca na tad viṣaya khyāpanam kṣamate tat asya api vicitra śakti tvam pramāṇānām vastu svarūpa anubhava adhyavasāya mātra kṛtam eva na eka artha tve api pratibhāsa bheda kṛte tad bhede eka artha tāyāḥ pramāṇa bādhita tvāt iti tasmāt avasthitam etat na sva lakṣaṇa abhidhāne dharmiṇaḥ vidhi niṣedha ayogaḥ iti kṛtam pada prayogeṇa iti 
JŚNĀ_213,1	 na api dharmāṇām vṛkṣa padena hi dharmiṇaḥ adhyakṣa vat sarva ātmanā pratipādita tvāt kaḥ a vakāśaḥ pada antareṇa nīla tva ādi vidhi niṣedhayoḥ pramāṇa antareṇa vā pratyakṣe api pramāṇa antara apekṣā dṛṣṭā iti ced bhavatu tasya api aniścaya ātmaka tvāt anabhyasta svarūpa viṣaye vikalpaḥ tu svayam niścaya ātmakaḥ yatra grāhī tatra kim apareṇa asti ca śabda liṅga antara apekṣā tatas na vastu svarūpa grahaḥ kim tu eka dharma= chāyā anukāri vikalpa udaya saṃvedanam eva iti siddham na siddham bhinnāḥ hi jāti ādayaḥ dharmāḥ parasparam dharmiṇaḥ ca iti jāti eka dharma dvāreṇa pratīte api śākhini dharma antara vat tayā na pratītiḥ iti kim na bhinna abhidhāna adhīnaḥ dharma antarasya nīla cala uccaistara tva ādeḥ avabodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_213,2	 tat ayuktam yadi hi bhedāt dharmiṇaḥ pratītau= api na dharmāṇām śabda liṅga dvāreṇa bodhaḥ indriya dvāreṇa api mā bhūt atha indriyasya saṃyoga samavāya balāt sannikṛṣṭe dharmiṇi samavāya ādi sannikarṣa bhājaḥ dharmāḥ api pratīti goca rībhavanti iti ucyate liṅgasya api iyam sāmagrī na khalu kalayā api hīyate śabdasya tu yadi api na vācyena saha saṃyoga samavāyau vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇā tu pratyāsattiḥ iṣṭā eva tad abhāve vācya pratīteḥ eva abhāva prasaṅgāt pratītau vā kīdṛśī saṃyoga ādeḥ apekṣā etat ca svābhāvika saṃbandha avalambinām api liṅgāt vastu pratītau tulyam na ca śabda dvāreṇa pratītau pravṛtti nimitta rodhinī vyavadhāna śaṅkā jātimatī hi vyaktiḥ sakṛt eva śabdāt avasīyate bhavatām krameṇa tu ekaika bodhāt na kadāpi jātimat vyakti bodhaḥ syāt na ca niścaya krama upalambhaḥ tasmāt jātiḥ adhikā pratīyatām nāma vyaktiḥ tu dharmiṇī pratīyamānāḥ na sva samaveta guṇa kriyā ādīn apratipādya svāsthyam āsādayet anyathā pratyakṣe api apara upādhi buddhiḥ anibandhanā syāt 
JŚNĀ_214,1^1	 atha evam sati śabdaiḥ vyakti bodhanam eva astu kim upādhi sāhitya svīkāreṇa iti ced tat kim idānīm bhavat upagama vaiyarthya bhayāt bhāvaiḥ svabhāva parityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ tat ayam aparaḥ tavāḥ tu doṣaḥ na vā na tu kvacid gocare jñāna sādhanaiḥ tad saṃbandhinām bodhamasādhayitvā sthātavyam indriya vat atha indriyāt eva tathā dṛṣṭam iti na anyatra prasaṅgaḥ iti ced evam tarhi tṛṇa vahniḥ indhana vikāra kriyānāntarīyaka dhūma utpādana samarthaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti khādiraḥ tathā na syāt sāmānyena tu vyāptiḥ ubhayatra api iti na viśeṣaḥ tatas yadi khādire vikāra virahaḥ tadā na asau dhūmaḥ api tu vātyā saṃvalita dhūli nivahaḥ na vā tatra dhūmadhvajaḥ kim tu kāntimat padmarāga ratna rāśi raśmi saṃhatiḥ ucchrāyavatī yadi punar asau dhūmaḥ sa ca dhūmadhvajaḥ khādire vā avaśyam vikāraḥ iti tathā yadi asau dharmi bodhaḥ tad sādhanaḥ ca śabdaḥ niyatam tad āśraya dharma bodha doṣaḥ na ced tad āśraya dharma bodhaḥ tadā na asau dharmi bodhaḥ na api dharmi bodhanaḥ śabdaḥ 
JŚNĀ_214,1^2	 yat kvacid jñāna sādhanam tat tadīya dharmāṇām pratīti sādhana niyatam yathā indriyam tathā ca liṅga śabdau parokṣa abhimatasya pratīti sādhana āviṣṭau tava iti svabhāvaḥ prasaṅga hetuḥ na ca evam śabda liṅga antara apekṣaṇāt yat na yat samaveta dharma bodha sādhanam na tat tasya svarūpa jñāna janakam yathā go śabdaḥ turage turagaḥ vā gardabhe na bodhayataḥ ca godhuli dhūmau sva viṣaya abhimata samaveta dharma antaram iti viparyaye vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ jāti guṇa kriyā ādi rahitasya svapne api darśana śaṅkā virahāt vastu darśanam tad sattā mātra bhāvinā dharma antara jñānena vyāpyate iti ubhayoḥ api prayogayoḥ na anekāntaḥ bhede eva hi jāti ādīnām vivādaḥ samaveta śabdaḥ tu abheda pakṣe api kalpanā buddhau bhinna vat ābhāsamānānām apṛthak prathana paraḥ tat varam abhedaḥ eva dharmāṇām astu sarvathā vastu pratīti svīkāre dharmāṇām pratīti codyasya duṣparihara tvāt kim anubhava bhraṣṭa bheda abhyupagamena svabhāvāḥ eva bhāvasya jāti ādayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_214,2	 yat tu bhāṣaṇam bhūṣaṇasya na ca yat svabhāva saṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ tathā satya saṃbandhi tvam eva na hi tat eva tena sādhyate iti tat asat svabhāva saṃbandhī iti atra eva svabhāvaḥ kasyacid vastunaḥ vivakṣitaḥ na ca tayoḥ bhedaḥ bhede hi svabhāva tvam iti alaukikam etat tat katham tat eva tena saṃbaddham iti parihṛtam anyathā asya svabhāvaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī nirdeśa anupapatteḥ atha svabhāvaḥ iti jāti ādiḥ eva ucyate iti na doṣaḥ eva yadā jāti ādikam vivicya vastu mātra svabhāva parāmarśaḥ na hi asau vastunaḥ kevalasya svabhāvaḥ na vaktavyaḥ saḥ eva ca yat svabhāva saṃbandhī iti atra vivakṣitaḥ saṃbandhi śabdena jāti ādeḥ vivakṣita tvāt tasmāt yatas yat abhinnam api kalpanayā bhinnam eva darśitam tat tasya saṃbandhi iti vyavahāraḥ duṣpariharaḥ 
JŚNĀ_215,1	 yat ca vācaspatiḥ na ca eka upādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe asmin gṛhīte upādhi antara viśiṣṭa tad grahaḥ svabhāvaḥ hi dravyasya upādhiḥ viśiṣyate na tu upādhayaḥ viśeṣya tvam vā tasya svabhāvaḥ iti tat api plavate eva na hi abhedāt upādhi antara grahaṇam āsan jitam ākare api upakārya upakāra dvāreṇa bhedam puraskṛtya eva sarva ākāra grahaṇa prasañjanāt śaktīnām tu śaktimatoḥ abhedaḥ uktaḥ tat anena api na spṛṣṭam 
JŚNĀ_215,2^1	 yat punar tatra dūṣaṇam bhūṣaṇena sūrya ādi grahaṇe tad upakārya aśeṣa vasturāśi grahaṇa prasañjanam uktam tad abhiprāyān avagāhana phalam tathā hi idam ākūtam svayam vakṣyamāṇa samavāya niṣedham sthirīkṛtya bhavatā naiyāyika pravareṇa pratyakṣa kāle akṣa saṃbandham anubhavitari dharmiṇi dharmāṇām jāti ādīnām bheda abhyupagamāt upakārya tayā eva tad upakāraka śakti abhedāt pratipattiḥ eṣitavyāḥ na hi anupakāre kvacid kasyacid pratibandhaḥ bhedavataḥ iti śakti abheda āpādana mukhena āha dharma upakāra śaktīnām bhede tāḥ tasya kim yadi na upakāraḥ tatas tāsām tathā syāt anavasthitiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_215,2^2	 yat tu śaktiḥ nāma sahajā jātiḥ aupādhikī ca sahakāri sākalyam atas bhinna eva iti ālambanam tad dūṣayitvā kṣaṇā bhaṅga adhyāye kārya kriyā pravṛttaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ śaktiḥ iti eva nirvāhitam upakāraḥ ca samāna kārya arjana svabhāvaḥ akāryasya api saṃbhavati iti api tatra eva dhvastam kārya upakāryayoḥ api tattvataḥ na asti eva bhedaḥ vyavahāre punar apūrva utpattau soha apohāt kārya tā pūrva sthita abhimāna viṣaye tu viśeṣa anubhavāt upakārya tā ucyate tattvataḥ tu pūrva sthitaḥ ca adhunā viśiṣṭaḥ ca iti viruddham eva tat iha sthira abhimata jāti puraskāreṇa cintāyām kārya tā niṣṭhaḥ eva upakārya vyavahāraḥ tat tvataḥ eka artha tayā vā iti na doṣaḥ tat evam avaśya abhyupaganta vyāyām upakāra lakṣaṇāyām pratyāsattau sūrya upakārya ādibhiḥ anubhava vyabhicāraḥ prasajya āyātaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ eva āvayoḥ 
JŚNĀ_216,1	 yat tu vācaspatiḥ svābhāvikaḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ vyakteḥ jātyā saha na upakāram apekṣate iti tatra na svābhāvikaḥ nāma yathā prasiddhāt anyaḥ eva kaścid saṃbandhaḥ kim tu saṃyoga ādi sattāyām eva saṃbandhinoḥ vyabhicāra avi abhicāreṇa vṛtti bhedāt aupādhikaḥ svābhāvikaḥ ca sambandhaḥ iti vyavasthā mātram etat vicāraḥ ca vyāpti carcāyām apekṣitavyaḥ yathā ca jātthā saha vyakteḥ tat avyabhicārāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tathā jāteḥ api vyaktyā saha avyabhicārāt eva nirviśeṣam na sāmānyam bhavet śaśa viṣāṇa vat iti nyāyāt tad anayoḥ pratyāsatti antara abhāvāt samavāyasya ca kalpanā mātra tvāt yadi upakārya upakāraka bhāvaḥ api parasparam asanna vanibīja ādi vat avyabhicāra niyamaḥ eva bheda abhyupagama vyasaninām ati prasaṅgāt anupapannaḥ upakāre hi svabhāvaḥ tad viśeṣaḥ vā tat na antarīyakaḥ iti eva avyabhicāra arthaḥ na anyatra iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_216,2^1	 tad abhāve tu dvidhā tad parihāraḥ svabhāva vādam samavāya balam vā avalambya na ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ sarvasya yatra kvacana dṛṣṭa śakteḥ viparyāsana prasaṅgāt dṛṣṭaḥ ca upakāraḥ vahni śilpi jala ādau dhūma kumbha balākā ādeḥ avyabhicāra hetuḥ kevalam kāla deśa ādi apekṣayā iti viśeṣaḥ tatas bhede api svabhāvāt eva avyabhicāraḥ na upakāraḥ iti bruvatā niyamena sāmarthyam apohitam dvitīya pakṣaḥ ca asambhavī samavāyasya eva abhāvāt iha idam iti buddhi sādhanaḥ hi samavāyaḥ abhyupagataḥ sā ca buddhiḥ na samāna saṅketa graha timira nikuramba karambita dṛśām upādeyāḥ sarvasya sarva artha siddhi prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_216,2^2	 icchā mātra paratantra udaya tvāt vikalpānām anyasya ca lokasya na asti eva vivāda pade sarvatra sā buddhiḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt paraspara rūpā saṅkīrṇa vastu dvaya pratibhāsaḥ hi kāraṇam iha idam iti saptamī prathama artha vibhāgam utkalayataḥ vikalpasya kumbhe ambhaḥ saṃbhave api kumbha mātra upalambhinaḥ sakalāni akāraṇa kalāpavataḥ tad abhāvāt tādṛś avasthasya ca paścāt dvitīya upalambha mātre bhāvāt na ca asau dvaya pratibhāsaḥ kvacid api samavāya viṣaye asti iti saṃyoga kalpanā viṣayaḥ eva tad vikalpa viṣayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_216,2^3	 yatra anātma rūpa parihāreṇa na ubhaya upalambhaḥ na tatra idam iha iti pratītiḥ anunmattasya yathā pātravat arayoḥ eka anupalambhe na asti ca ātma ātmīya rūpa pratibhāsa bhedena jāti tadvatoḥ anubhavaḥ iti kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ dhūma agni vat kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya vivakṣitayoḥ sādhanāt na anekāntaḥ tat amī svayaṃkṛta śabdena artha antaram upakalpayantaḥ turaga tulām anupatanti iti etat eva vakṣyati paṭaḥ tantuḥ u iha iti ādi śabdāḥ ca ime svayam kṛtāḥ iti nanu nirvikalpaka bodhena dvi ātmakasya api vastunaḥ grahaṇam iti uktam tat katham na sva rūpa dvaya pratibhāsaḥ iti asiddhā kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ tat etat pāpīyaḥ na hi pratyakṣa gamye arthe para upadeśaḥ garīyān pratibhāsaḥ api tathā iti ced tat etat āyātam etāsu pañca su avabhāsinīṣu pratyakṣa bodhe sphuṭam aṅgulīṣu sādhāraṇam ṣaṣṭham iha īkṣate yaḥ śṛṅgam śirasi ātmanaḥ īkṣate saḥ iti vayam hi tāvat carmacakṣuṣaḥ cakṣuṣī su dūram unmīlya śata kṛtvas nirūpayantaḥ api na aparam upalabhāmahe bhavataḥ tu adṛṣṭa devatā prasādāt tathā pratibhāse api na itarasya tathā bodha siddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_217,1	 tena pratyakṣam eva draṣṭavyam yat ekam aneka sādhāraṇam draṭraṣṇām darśayati iti ācakṣāṇaḥ trilocanaḥ api anya locanena iva vīkṣate iti lakṣyate yat ca āha dṛśyamānā api jātiḥ apṛthak deśa varti tvāt vyaktitaḥ bhedena vyakti antara vat na dṛśyate iti tatra api dṛśyate jātiḥ na tu bhedena iti bruvatā niyamāt abhedena pratyakṣa gocaraḥ iti uktam bhavati yathā ca pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītam tava eva samastam vastu na khalu tatra bādhaka sādhakayoḥ yogaḥ tatas ca pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tu vyaktitaḥ sāmānyam bhetsyati iti upapatti varṇanamana vakāśam yathā spārśanaḥ pratyayaḥ gandha ādibhyaḥ sparśam bhinatti iti api na yuktam uktam na hi gandha sparśayoḥ api abheda grāhi pratyakṣam 
JŚNĀ_217,2–218,1	 evam tarhi bhedena na dṛśyate iti bhedena na vyavasīyate iti vyākhyāyatām tadā api dṛśyamānā api jātiḥ iti kim bhedena abhedena vā iti vivakṣitam yadi abhedena tadā vyavasāyaḥ bhedena abhedena vā astu kim asya cintayā pratyakṣeṇa abhedasya siddha tvāt atha bhedena dṛśyamānā iti vivakṣitam tat punar aśakyam pratibhāsa bheda abhāvasya ukta tvāt yuktyā sādhyate pratibhāsa bhedaḥ iti ced tat etat lajjā karam yatas kasyacid pratibhāsena sādhyate apratibhāsi yat pratibhāsaḥ asya na asya iti na upapatteḥ tu gocaraḥ iti vivecitam asmābhiḥ ahetuka abhāva prastāve kim ca yadi eka ākāra pratibhāse api pratibhāsā antaram yukti sādhyam abhyupeyate tadā anuṣṇaḥ vahniḥ iti na pratyakṣa bādhyam abhidheyam anuṣṇa pratibhāsasya api tatra saṃbhavāt vyaktau jāti pratibhāsa vat 
JŚNĀ_218,2–218,3	 anuṣṇa pratibhāsasya citrabhānau sādhana abhāvāt na sāmyam iti ced tathā api saṃśayaḥ astu iti katham anuṣṇasya bādhakam adhyakṣam katham ca sādhana abhāvaḥ prameya tvasya vidyamāna tvāt avyabhicārī hetuḥ iti ced vyabhicāraḥ api sākṣāt paramparayā vā pratyakṣāt eva tatra ca viparīta pratibhāsaḥ niṣeddhum aśakyaḥ iti uktam yadi ca anaikāntika tayā prameya tvāt na siddhiḥ anuṣṇa tāyāḥ hetu doṣāt tarhi dṛṣṭa m anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ iti na ayam pakṣa doṣaḥ tatas anuṣṇa tva ābādhanāt sādhanam api na adhyakṣam uṣṇam eva hi uṣṇam na punar uṣṇa anuṣṇam tasmāt niyata pratibhāsa saṃvedanam anya pratibhāsasya niyamena bādhakam abhyupagantavyam akāmakena api anyathā pravṛtti saṅkara prāpteḥ tathā ca na hi ayam analam paśyan= ityādi 
JŚNĀ_218,4	 tatas yadodha patitaiḥ udghuṣyate jāti matīṣu vyaktiṣu saṅkete kṛte yatra yatra jāti darśanam tatra tatra tad śabda vācya tā pratītiḥ iti tat asūtram ambaram viḍambayati sva lakṣaṇa vilakṣaṇasya svapne api anupalakṣaṇāt ataeva sva rūpa mātreṇa gṛhītau= upādhi tadvantau yojayataḥ vikalpasya prāmāṇyam iṣṭam yat tad pratyādiṣṭam pūrvam dvaya darśanasya eva abhāvāt tasmāt na kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ asiddhiḥ asiddhiḥ punar iha iti pratyayasya iti kva samavāya vārtā vārtam ca etat vyakteḥ jātyā saha svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ iti tatas ca yadi api upādhi tadvatām bheda vādaḥ duṣpariharaḥ tadā upakāra lakṣaṇāyām api pratyāsattau samāna deśasya eva grahaṇe vastu grāhiṇaḥ śaktiṃriti samānaḥ sūkṣma upakārya vyabhicāra parihāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_218,5^1	 tasmāt eka dharma dvāreṇa api vastu svarūpa pratītau sarva ātma pratīteḥ kva śabda antareṇa vidhi niṣedha avakāśaḥ iti kim adya api kevala vṛkṣa padena tatas ca kva sāmānya sāmāna adhikaraṇya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva vyavasthā yadā tu eka artha śleṣa vicchede ekaḥ vyāpriyate dhvaniḥ liṅgam vā tava vicchinnam vācyam vastu na kiñcana yasya abhidhānataḥ vastu sāmarthyāt akhile gatiḥ bhavet nānā phalaḥ śabdaḥ eka ādhāraḥ bhavati atas vastuni hi vācye sarva ātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhi niṣedhayoḥ ayogaḥ yadā punar anādi vitatha vikalpa abhyāsa vāsanā vaśāt eka vyāvṛtti ākāra śekharā buddhiḥ eva kutaścid vāsanā prabodhāt udayam āsādayati tadā vastu grahaṇa sāmarthya bhāvinā mukta doṣāṇām kva avakāśaḥ tathā hi vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte dhava khadira ādi sādhāraṇa rūpa pratibhāsa vaśāt sāmānyam avṛkṣa apoha parama artham avasthāpyate 
JŚNĀ_218,5^2	 tat ca rūpam apratikṣipta anupātta sattā sādvala tva ādi bheda tayā pada antara prayoga sāpekṣam iti ekatra dharmiṇi dharmi antara nibandhanaiḥ iva sannīla cala ādi padaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ca tadā buddhi anurodhataḥ eka bheda codanā apekṣāyām vṛkṣasya sattvam iti bheda nirdeśaḥ ca iti dvividhaḥ api viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ evam ca sati yathā pṛthvīruhe pāthaḥ agni saṅgamāt upacaya apacayau dṛṣṭau ekatva āropāt ca saḥ eva ayam pādapaḥ īdṛśaḥ jātaḥ iti pratītiḥ sa ca dharmāṇām tad saṃbandha yogyānām anudaye api tad yogyaḥ iva vyavasīyate tathā vikalpe api vṛkṣa ākāraḥ dharma antara apratibhāse api tad yogyaḥ iti nīlaḥ na phalinaḥ iti ādi prayoge ca upacaya apacaya bhāj iva bhāsate saḥ eva iti ca avasīyate na tathā bāhyaḥ jala ādi samparka vat śabda uccāraṇa kāle api upacaya apacayavān etat ca na bāhya viṣaya tve yuktam yathā pratibhāsam atattvāt yathātattvam ca apratibhāsanāt ataeva caitrasya gauḥ gomān maitraḥ na aśvavān iti bhinna viśeṣaṇa apekṣayā api na pada antara prayoga yogaḥ tad kṛta upacaya apacaya pratibhāsasya bahis abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_219,1	 tasmāt buddhi vilāsaḥ eva eṣaḥ yatra ca ayam viplavaḥ paramparayā parāpoḍha vastunā āntarīyakaḥ tatra abhimata artha kriyā akṛtārthaḥ janaḥ tādṛśam viśeṣam ūhitum na prayatnavān na api kṣamaḥ iti anavacchinnaḥ vyavahāraḥ visaṃvāde api mṛṣā idam iti na vyavasthāpayati na punar anyadā api bāhyena abiṣaya tvam iti śāstra kārāṇām api abhyūha saṃbhavāt kā parasya kathā tasmāt na sva lakṣaṇasya śabda ādi gocara tvam iti sthitam ekam dharmiṇam ākalayya vividha vyāvṛtti dharma āśrayam tatra ekaika vidhāna bādhana vidha āvāya vyaya ābhāsinam mukhyāḥ buddhiḥ iyam yathā bhramayati bhrāmyan= tathā ayam janaḥ tattva aṃśena kṛtārtha tām upagataḥ na upaplavam manyate iti saṃgraha ślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_220,1	 na api sāmānya lakṣaṇasya tathā hi uttara tīre saritaḥ caranti gāvaḥ iti vākye gavā ādi śabdāt sāsnā śṛṅga lāṅgūla ādayaḥ a kṣara ākāra parikarāḥ sajātīya bheda aparāmarśāt saṃpiṇḍita prāyāḥ pratibhāsante na ca tat eva sāmānyam varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śūnyam go tvam hi kathyate na ca aparam ākāśa vat kiñcid pratibhāti anyathā go tva aśva tva vikalpayoḥ aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt tat eva hi jvalat bhāsuḥ ākāra mātram akhila vyaktau= atyanta vilakṣaṇam api sva lakṣaṇena ekīkriyamāṇam sāmānyam iti ucyate na tu tat sāmānyam eva tāsām buddhi ākāra tvena anyatra anugamāt śāstram hi buddheḥ avyatiriktam ca katham artha antaram vrajet na ca ālocana anantara janmani indriya artha janya tayā abhimate saḥ ayam tādṛśaḥ ayam gaurayam iti vā vikalpe artha antara pratibhāsaḥ yathā tu saṃpiṇḍita ākāram alaukikam ātmani pratibhāsamānam puras pratibhāsini piṇḍe yojayati tathā tasya bāhyasya abhāvāt bhrāntiḥ eva asau keśa prakāśa vat 
JŚNĀ_220,2	 bādhakā devam iti ced nanu prayatna praṇihita pāṇi pratighāta ādi abhāvāt keśa pāśe visaṃvādaḥ prastute tu yadi paribhāvakaḥ bhavati saḥ eva vyakta vyakti anubhavaḥ bādhakaḥ kim apareṇa janasya tu vivecana asāmarthyam iti uktam eva katham vā kara pratighāta ādi virahaḥ adya api na bādhakaḥ te eva hi śṛṅga ādayaḥ yathāsthāna niveśinaḥ aspaṣṭa rūpā apratiṣṭhita deśa daśā viśeṣā deśa kāla ādi bhedāt ananta mūrtayaḥ saṅkīryamāṇāḥ iva adya api bhāsante teṣām pratidhātā ādi niyata tvāt kīdṛśaḥ keśa ādibhyaḥ bhedaḥ yatas na atra bādhakam iti syāt 
JŚNĀ_220,3	 tasmāt vāsanā vaśāt buddheḥ eva tad ātmanā vivartaḥ ayam astu asat eva vā tad rūpam khyātu vyaktayaḥ eva vā sajātīya bheda tiraṣkāreṇa anyathā bhāsantām anubhava vyavadhānāt smṛti pramoṣaḥ vā abhidhīyatām sarvathā bhrāntiḥ eva iyam bahis apekṣayā sāmānya vārtā idantayā ca purovarti vastu anubhava prabhava tayā bhavitum yuktā eva nanu bhrānti hetavaḥ timira āśu bhramaṇa ādayaḥ indriya vikāra kāriṇaḥ parigaṇitāḥ eva na ca tatra ekasya api sannidhiḥ iti katham iyam ākasmikī bhrāntiḥ atha nirvikalpaka bhrānteḥ eva hetavaḥ te iyam ca mānasī bhrāntiḥ iti manyase sā api āropya āropaviṣayayoḥ sādṛśya darśana nibandhana eva iti tādṛś avibhāga abhāvāt katham mānasī api bhrāntiḥ sarvā ca bhrāntiḥ sādṛśya nibandhana eva na khalu janma antare api sadṛśa darśanam antareṇa bhavitum arhati na ca saṃbhinna ākāram kiñcid janma antare api dṛṣṭam iti katham tad āropaḥ aho mahat pauruṣam ! tathā hi nirviṣaya tvam tāvat uktena krameṇa na ced parihartum śakyate bhrānti vyavahāram kuryāt mā vā tāvatā eva prakṛta siddheḥ kim atra nirbandhena 
JŚNĀ_221,1	 yat punar ākasmika tvam uktam tat ayuktam janaka sāmagrī bhedasya bhavatā api avaśya svīkaraṇīya tvāt katham anyathā indriya arthau nirvikalpaka jñāna janana niyatau dṛṣṭau vikalpam utpādayataḥ tasmāt pūrva piṇḍa darśana smaraṇa sahakāriṇā tiricyamāna sāmarthyeyam sāmagrī vikalpam utpādayati iti nirviṣayam jñānam utpādayati eva arthaḥ nirviṣayatā niṣṭha tvāt vikalpa tāyāḥ tad aṃśena tat varam vijātīya vikalpa vat vispaṣṭa pratibhāsāt anubhavāt bhinnaḥ eva sajātīya vikalpaḥ apotyeva sādhu tasmāt na jāti siddhiḥ adhyakṣāt 
JŚNĀ_221,2^1	 na api anumānāt adhyakṣa gocara tayā eva kenacid agni dhūma vat kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya grahītum aśakyatvāt sāmānyena tu jñāna janmani yathā paridṛṣṭa kāraṇebhyaḥ kāraṇa antaram apekṣaṇīyam indriya vat kadācid sidhyet yadi sakalāni akāraṇa sannidhau kadācid abhimata jñāna kārya abhāvam vibhāvayet na ca evam prastute śakyam yadā hi piṇḍa antare antarāle vā go buddheḥ abhāvam darśayet tadā gopiṇḍasya eva abhāvāt abhāvaḥ go buddheḥ upapadyamānaḥ katham artha antara apekṣām ākṣipet yatas tat eva go tvam iti pratyāśā syāt nanu gopiṇḍaḥ iti go tvāt eva sāmānyāt anyathā turaga piṇḍaḥ api gopiṇḍaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_221,2^2	 yadi evam go tvam api sāmānyam gopiṇḍāt eva anyathā turaga tvam api go tvam syāt iti samānam na ca adṛśyasya sāmānyasya bhāva abhāvau kvacid niścetum śakyau piṇḍa vat iti na kiñcid etat atha api syāt yadi bāhuleya piṇḍa abhāvāt turage na go buddhiḥ śābaleye api mā bhūt sva lakṣaṇasya kvacid ananvayāt satyam ananvayi sva lakṣaṇam yathā tu sva jātīya piṇḍa antara darśana smaraṇavati prattipattari tad ākāra pratyavamarśa janana sāmarthyam bāhuleyasya tathā śābaleyasya api tatas na ekaḥ eva gopiṇḍaḥ api tu tādṛś vikalpa ārohiṇaḥ sarve eva piṇḍāḥ atas turage na go pratyayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_222,1	 nanu sāmarthyam śaktiḥ iti jātiḥ eva ucyate sā hi śaktiḥ bhinnā vā syāt abhinnāḥ vā yadi abhinnā tadā sva lakṣaṇa vat ananugāminī iti na itaraḥ śaktaḥ atha bhinnāḥ anya sādhāraṇī ca tadā jātiḥ eva asau= iti nāmni vivādaḥ atra ucyate abhinnā eva sā prativastu yathā tu ekaḥ śakta svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ tathā anyaḥ api bhavan kīdṛśam doṣam āvahati yathā hi bhavatām jātiḥ ekā api samāna dhīdhvani prasava hetuḥ anyā api sva rūpeṇa eva jāti antara virahāt tathā asmākam vyaktiḥ api nirapekṣā sva rūpeṇa eva bhinnā api hetuḥ tat tu svarūpam vyakteḥ kāraṇa paramparā pratibaddham 
JŚNĀ_222,2^1	 yat tu trilocanaḥ aśva tvagotva ādīnām sāmānya viśeṣāṇām sva āśrayeṣu samavāyaḥ sāmānyam iti abhidhāna pratyayayoḥ nimittam iti tat samavāya nirākaraṇena eva apahastitam samavāyaḥ eva vā sva rūpeṇa eva nimittam iti na dṛṣṭānta kṣatiḥ na ca jāti samavāyayoḥ sahakriyā kalpanena anyonya śakti tvam tadā hi svarūpeṇa ekasya api janakatvam iti sāmānya abhidhāna dhiyoḥ dattaḥ jala añjaliḥ svarūpeṇa janakānām eva hi bīja ādīnām sahakāri sākalyam aupādhikī śaktiḥ iti sva rūpeṇa janaka tvam avaśya vācyam iti samavāya avalambanam viḍambaḥ 
JŚNĀ_222,2^2	 na ca tad vyāpāra virahe tad ākāra vedana udayaḥ kāraṇa antara mātrāt anyathā anuvṛtta ākārasya api pratyayasya janmani sva lakṣaṇaiḥ eva kim na nirvṛttiḥ iti cintā api jāteḥ sa mūla kāṣam kaṣitā syāt ākasmika tve api saḥ eva doṣaḥ iti gale pādikayā jāti svīkāriṇaḥ anuvṛtta pratyaye sva rūpeṇa eva jāti vyāpāram anavasthā bhayāt svayam eva anāropita jāti antarāḥ svīkārayitavyāḥ iti katham samavāyena parihāraḥ sa punar adhikaḥ sahakārī bhavatu mā vā bhūt jātiḥ tu jāti nirapekṣā svarūpeṇa śaktimatī anuvṛtta pratyayam janayati svabhāvasya aparyanuyojya tvāt na vyaktiḥ iti na rājñām ājñām antareṇa śakyam abhidhātum 
JŚNĀ_222,3	 etena sā iyam pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ anuvṛtta vastu anuyāyinī katham atyanta bhedinīṣu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛtta pratyaya viṣaya bhāva anupātinīṣu bhavitum arhati iti api ūha pravartanam asya pratyākhyātam jātiṣu eva paraspara vyāvṛtta tayā vyaktīyamānāsu anuvṛtta pratyayena vyabhicārāt atha jātīnām adarśanāt kva anuvṛtta pratyayaḥ yatas vyabhicāraḥ iti ced na abhyupagama virodhasya anena krameṇa pratipādanāt tathā hi pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ anuvṛtta vastu sādhanāya upanīyate sā ca anuvṛtta vastu abhāvanā antarīyikā yadi anuvṛtta vastu siddhiḥ iti kaḥ imam vyāghātam udvoḍhum śaktaḥ anyatra jāḍyāt kim ca kalpitāsu api jātiṣu vyabhicāraḥ tad avasthaḥ eva kim atra darśanena 
JŚNĀ_223,1	 atha dṛśyamāneṣu artheṣu niyamaḥ ucyate na tatra api viparyaya bādhaka abhāvāt pratibandha anupapatteḥ sāmānyena ca vyabhicāra darśanāt anyatra api śaṅkābījam yadi ca dṛśya viśeṣa apekṣayā sāmānya vyabhicāra parihāraḥ tadā na vaktavyam yā bhinneṣu abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ asau= anuvṛtta vastu nimittāḥ yathā kusumeṣu sūtram iti abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tathā ca goṣu bhinneṣu gauḥ iti abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ iti dṛśyamāna nimitta tāyām eva abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ anuvṛtta vastu nimitta tayā vyāpteḥ viśrāma niyamāt yuktam ca etat na khalu sūtre api darśana aviṣayīkṛteṣu sūtra pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ sa vastukaḥ hi vikalpaḥ anumānam vinā vastu darśana kāryaḥ siddhaḥ iti viparyayāt kāraṇa anupalabdhyā nivartamāna anuvṛtta vastunā pratyaya anuvṛtti vyāptiḥ dṛśya nimitta tāyām eva viśrāmyati sati vastu viṣaya tve vastu viṣaya tva vivāde tu na ayam niyamaḥ 
JŚNĀ_223,2	 yat punar anena viparyaya bādhakam uktam abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ kutaścid nivṛttya kvacid eva bhavantī nimittavatī na ca anyat nimittam ityādi tat na samyak anuvṛttam antareṇa api abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛtteḥ atadrūpa parāvṛtta svarūpa viśeṣāt avaśyam svīkārasya sādhita tvāt tasmāt yathā sva lakṣaṇāt nivṛttya go tva aśva tva ādau= eva sāmānyam sāmānyam iti abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ kayācid pratyāsattyā bhavati tathā vyaktiṣu api bhavatu etena anunṛtta vastuni sādhye abhidhāna pratyaya anuvṛttiḥ tena asyāḥ vyāptau ca viparyaya bādhikā vyāpakān upalabdhiḥ iti ubhayam anaikāntikam iti veditavyam pratyāsattiḥ iti api na asti anya vyāvṛtteḥ anyā yathā hi go tvam aśva sāmānyāt vyāvṛttam tathā aśva tva dravya tva ādikam api evam yathā ekā go vyaktiḥ agotaḥ parāvṛttā tathā anyā api asyāḥ api bheda abheda cintā maukharye śakti vat eva uttaram tatas ca ye arthāḥ atad rūpa parāvṛttyā parasparam pratyāsannāḥ te teṣu eka darśana anantaram apara dṛṣṭau anuvṛtta pratyayam utpādayanti na anye sā eva ca śaktiḥ na jāti ātmā anyathā 
JŚNĀ_223,3–224,1	 ātmā ekatra api saḥ asti iti vyarthāḥ syuḥ sahakāriṇaḥ etat ca kṣaṇa bhaṅge saha kārivādāt avadhāryam sā ca pratyāsattiḥ kāraṇa paramparāyātā iti anantaram uktam eva avaśyam ca hetu kṛtaḥ pratyāsatti viśeṣaḥ eṣitavyaḥ yatas kāścid eva vyaktayaḥ jāti adhiṣṭhāna bhājanī bhavanti na itarāḥ anyathātve tu sāmagrī niyamāt ca niyata jātimat kārya bhavati iti uktam aparitrāṇam bhūṣaṇasya syāt tathā ca sati tulye bhede yathā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati kvacid na anyatra sā eva astu śabda jñāna nibandhanam kim atra jātyā 
JŚNĀ_224,2^1	 yat punar atra tena uktam aparam api kuvodyam na hi evam bhavati yathā pratyāsattyāḥ daṇḍa sūtra ādikam prasarpati kvacid na anyatra sā eva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣa sphaṭika ādiṣu daṇḍi sūtri tva ādi vyavahāra nibandha nam aḥ tu kim daṇḍa sūtra ādinā iti etat kadā śobhate yadi pramāṇa siddham sāmarthyam kiñcid kvacid apalapyeta yathā hi upasarpaṇa pratyaya ādi āśrayā pratyāsattiḥ daṇḍa sūtrayoḥ puṃsi sphaṭike ca prasarpaṇa hetuḥ pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddhā tad saṃpṛkta puruṣa sphaṭika anubhavaḥ ca daṇḍi sūtri buddheḥ nibandhanam siddham samaya smaraṇavataḥ pratipattuḥ tathā na go tva bhāva abhāvau= anuvidhīyamānā iyam go buddhiḥ upalabdhā kim tu andhakāre kara amarṣa mātram etat īdṛśā kenacid bhavitavyam go buddhi nibandhanena iti 
JŚNĀ_224,2^2	 tatra yadi avaśya abhyupagantavyena prakāra antareṇa tad siddhau na bādhaḥ tat kim guru itarayā parikalpanayā iti ucyate anyathā tat api kalpayitvā anarthaka artha śata kalpa nama nivāryam yadi tu yathā upasarpaṇa pratyaya ādeḥ puruṣa ādau daṇḍa ādi sannidhiḥ bhāva abhāvam anuvidadhānaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca puruṣa ādau daṇḍa ādi sannidhāna anubhava bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyī daṇḍyādi pratyayaḥ tathā kāraṇa kalāpasya niyata jātika tāyām eva param vyāpāraḥ na ekāmarśe ekāmarśe punar iyam asau jātiḥ eva saṃprati vyāpāravatī iti anubhūyeta syāt tad apavadituḥ aparādhaḥ yāvatā samaya mātram etat jāteḥ anubhava atikrānti pratipādanāt iti kutas tat vaiyarthya codanam daṇḍa ādikam api viṣayīkuryāt evam anyatra api īdṛśi pratividhau bādhanam ūhyam 
JŚNĀ_225,1	 atha evam anumānam yad viśiṣṭa jñānam tad viśeṣaṇa grahaṇana antarīyakam yathā daṇḍi jñānam viśiṣṭa jñānam ca idam gaurayam iti pratyayaḥ iti arthataḥ kārya hetuḥ viśeṣaṇa anubhava kāryam hi dṛṣṭānte viśiṣṭa buddhiḥ siddhā iti atra anuyogaḥ viśiṣṭa buddheḥ bhinna viśeṣaṇa grahaṇana antarīyaka tvam vā sādhyam viśeṣaṇa mātra anubhavana antarīyaka tvam vā prathama pakṣe pakṣasya pratyakṣa bādhā sādhana avadhānam anavakāśayati vastu grāhiṇaḥ pratyakṣasya ubhaya pratibhāsā bhāvāt viśiṣṭa jñāna tvam ca sāmānyam hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ bhinna viśeṣaṇa grahaṇam antareṇa api darśanāt yathā sva rūpavān ghaṭaḥ go tvam sāmānyam iti vā dvitīya pakṣe tu siddha sādhanam sva rūpavān ghaṭaḥ ityādi vat go tva jātimān piṇḍe iti kalpitam bhedam upādāya viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvasya iṣṭa tvāt ago vyāvṛtta anubhava bhāvi tvāt gaurayam iti vyavahārasya iti tat evam śābda ādi buddhau na bāhyasya sva lakṣaṇasya sāmānya lakṣaṇasya vā pratibhāsaḥ na ca sāmānyam pramāṇa siddham iti pratipāditam tadvat upādhi antarāṇi cintyāni 
JŚNĀ_225,2^1	 yadi evam katham tarhi śabdaiḥ tāvat mukhyam ākhyāyate arthaḥ iti śāstram saṅgati yuktam na hi tat ca tena pratipādyate na ca tad jñāne tad prakāśaḥ iti saṅgatiḥ kācid iti āha adhyāsate iti dvidhā viṣaya vyavahāraḥ pratibhāsā dadhyavasāyāt ca tat iha pratibhāsā bhāve api para apoḍha sva lakṣaṇasya adhyavasāya mātreṇa viṣaya tvam uktam tathā ca tatas api vikalpāt tad adhyavasāyena vastuni eva pravṛtteḥ iti atha kaḥ ayam adhyavasāyaḥ nāma vikalpāt anyaḥ vikalpita madhya vasitam iti anartha antara tvāt tat katham vikalpāt adhyavasāyena iti bheda nirdeśaḥ 
JŚNĀ_225,2^2	 anya apoḍham ca sva lakṣaṇam na vikalpe parisphurati adhyavasite vikalpitaḥ iti kaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ yatas adhyavasāya apekṣa tayā tat api vikalpasya viṣayaḥ iti vyavasthāpyate kim ca vikalpasya aviṣayaḥ ca bāhyam grahaṇam ca asya śabdena saṃyojya iti duryojam ātmani ca tat na asti iti vikalpaḥ nāma na asti eva tat kasya viṣaya cintā agṛhīte ca sva lakṣaṇe śabdāt pravṛttiḥ iti sarvatra aviśeṣeṇa prasajyeta sarvasya agṛhīta tvena viśeṣa abhāvāt tatas prāptiḥ api nābhimatasya niyamena iti anumānasya api viplavaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_226,1	 atra ucyate satyam eka arthau vikalpa adhyavasāyau kevalam vikalpa śabdaḥ śabda ādi yojanā nimittakaḥ adhyavasāyaḥ tu agṛhīte api pravartana yogya tā nimittaḥ yadi api ca viśvam agṛhītam tathā api niyata viṣayā pravṛttiḥ niyata ākāra tvāt vikalpasya niyata śaktayaḥ hi bhāvāḥ pramāṇa pariniṣṭhita svabhāvāḥ na śakti sāṅkarya paryanuyoga bhājaḥ asat utpatti vat sarvasya tatra asattve api hi bījāt aṅkurasya eva utpattiḥ tatra eva tasya śakteḥ pramāṇena nirūpaṇāt tathā iha api hutavaha ākārasya vikalpasya hutavaha artha kriyā arthinaḥ tad smaraṇavataḥ hutavaha viṣayāyām eva pravṛttau sāmarthya pramāṇa pratītam katham ati prasaṅga bhāgi pratyāsatti cintayā ca tāttvikasya api vahneḥ jvalat bhāsuḥ ākāra tvam vikalpa ullekhasya api iti tāvatā tatra eva pravartana śaktiḥ jvalana vikalpasya na jala ādau na ca sādṛśya āropeṇa pravṛttim brūmaḥ yena ākāre bāhyasya bāhye vā ākārasya āropa dvāra dūṣaṇa avakāśaḥ kim tarhi sva vāsanā paripāka vaśāt upajāyamānā eva sā buddhiḥ apaśyanti api bāhyam bāhye pravṛttim ātanoti iti viplutā eva 
JŚNĀ_226,2	 yat śāstram deśa bhrāntiḥ ca na jñāne tulyam utpattitaḥ dhiyaḥ tathāvidhāyāḥ anyatra tatra anupagamāt dhiyaḥ iti tasmāt na rūpya ādi vat āropadvāreṇa pravṛttiḥ api tu tathāvidha ākāra utpatti pratibaddha śakti niyamāt yathā śāli tvena śāli bījam upādānam niranvaya udaye apim śāli aṅkuraḥ upādeye śalitvā ādi sthiteḥ sthairya dūṣaṇena nirasta tvāt na ca vicārakasya vastu adarśanam niścinvataḥ apravṛtti prasaṅgaḥ saṅgacchate darśane api hi pravṛttiḥ artha kriyayā anvitayā artha kriyā prāptiḥ ca vastu sattā niyame sa ca niyamaḥ yathā darśanāt vastu pratibandha kṛtaḥ tathā vikalpa viśeṣāt api pāramparyeṇa iti na anumānam anavasthitam śabdāt tu kvacid artha saṃśayena iti prāpteḥ api tatra aniyamaḥ tasmāt adhyavasitam iti apratibhāse api pravṛtti viṣayīkṛtam iti arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_226,3	 tatas vikalpa buddhau= apratibhāse api adhyavasita tvam na bāhyasya bādhyate ayam eva ca arthaḥ dṛśya vikalpayoḥ ekīkaraṇasya abheda pratipatti ādeḥ ca tatas ca tat ca na pratīyate tena ca abheda bhāsanam iti upālambhaḥ asaṃbhavoti darśitam tad artha niṣṭhāyāḥ kṛta tvāt sa ca agniḥ atra iti vyavasāyaḥ yathā kāyikīm pravṛttim prasūte tathā agniḥ mayā pratītaḥ iti vācikīm api prasūte etat ākāra anuvyavasāya rūpām mānasīm api prasavati evam sati yathā vikalpena ayam arthaḥ gṛhītaḥ iti niścayaḥ tathā śabdena saṃyojya iti api artha ākāra leśa vat śabda ākārasya api sphuraṇāt tasmāt yāvat artha grahaṇa abhimānavān mānavaḥ tāvat abhidhāna saṃyukta grahaṇa abhimānavān api iti avasāya anurodhāt eva vikalpa vyavasthā na tattvataḥ 
JŚNĀ_227,1–227,3	 āha ca na śabdeḥ saṃsargaḥ kvacid api bahis vā manasi vā akṣara ākāra ākīrṇaḥ sphurati punar artha ākṛti lavaḥ ubhau= api ātmānau yat api dhiyaḥ eva adhyavasitiḥ nidhatte tau bāhye vacasi ca vikalpa sthiti ḥ atas ataeva ca tad abhimāna mlāna mānasam vyāvahārikam prati pratyakṣa lakṣaṇe kalpanā apoḍha viśeṣaṇam upādīyate sūtrataḥ api vikalpāt adhyavasāyena iti bheda nirdeśaḥ tatra api na ayam adhyavasāya dhvaniḥ dharmiṇaḥ eva vikalpasya abhidhāyakaḥ prayuktaḥ kim tu tad gatasya adhyavasāna lakṣaṇasya dharmasya tat ayam arthaḥ adṛṣṭe api pravartana yogya tā nāma yaḥ dharmaḥ tayā vikalpāt pravṛttiḥ iti jñātaḥ ced arthaḥ vyavasthāpitaḥ adhyavasāyāt saṃvṛttyā tatas viṣaya vyavahāraḥ api labdhaḥ iti avasāya mātreṇa viṣaya tvam iti yuktam 
JŚNĀ_227,4–227,9	 atas uktam arthaḥ ca ekaḥ adhyāsataḥ vācyaḥ iti yat āha bhāṣya kāraḥ katham tat viṣaya tvam tatra pravartanāt iti yaḥ tu katham adṛṣṭe pravartanam iti āśaṅkya adṛṣṭaḥ eva sarvatra pravartanam ityādi siṃhanādaḥ sa na vipañcitaḥ asmābhiḥ grantha gaurava bhayāt evam sva pratibhāse anartha adhyavasāyena pravṛtteḥ iti atra api anarthe sva pratibhāse sati adhyavasāyaḥ pūrvavat arthaḥ tu artha kriyā samarthaḥ bāhyaḥ uktaḥ tad paryudāsena anarthaḥ buddhi ākāraḥ evam sa vastu iti asan= iti ca draṣṭavyam etat ca vārtti kavāca eva sphuṭīkṛtam sa ākāra siddhau artha adhyavasāyena pravṛttiḥ anumānasya iti api hi artha adhyavasāya anumānam iti arthaḥ ṭīkākārasya tu yathā atra vyākhyānam sva apoha siddhau tat heyam eva vistara prasaṅga bhītyā na udbhāvitam asmābhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_228,1^1	 yadi tarhi bāhyasya adhyavasāyena vācya tā katham buddhi ākārasya yat śāstram anādi vāsanā udbhata vikalpa pariniṣṭhitaḥ śabda arthaḥ trividhaḥ dharmī bhāva abhāva ubhayāśrayaḥ ityādi vikalpa pratibimbeṣu tad niṣṭheṣu nibadhyate vyatirekī iva yat jñāne bhāti artha pratibimbakam śabdāt tat api na artha ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā udbhavā iti na hi buddhi ākāre api adhyavasāyaḥ śakyaḥ abhidhātum pravṛtti viṣaye tasya vyavasthāpanāt sa ca artha kriyā arthinaḥ bāhyaḥ eva iti āha bhāsate anyaḥ arthaḥ vācyaḥ iti bāhyāt anyaḥ buddhi ākāraḥ iti arthaḥ śabda ādi janyāyām buddhau= ākāra mātrasya pratibhāsanāt saḥ eva viṣayaḥ ucyate cakṣuṣaḥ iva rūpam viṣayaḥ na punar adhyavasāyāt iti bhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_228,1^2–229,1	 uktam ca yathāprati iti kathitaḥ śabda arthaḥ asau= asan= api iti asan= iti tu yathāpratibhāsam bahis abhāvāt bahirmukha apekṣayā ca cintāyāḥ prakramāt ayam eva arthaḥ yathā adhyavasā yam a tattvāt yathātattvam ca anadhi avasāyāt iti adhyavasāyasya vikalpa paryāya tvāt yathā vikalpa sphuraṇam iti artha niṣṭhānāt asat artha prakāśana ādeḥ api yathāprati iti bahis asattvam eva arthaḥ bhrānti tvam api bahis apekṣayā eva iti sarvam anākulam na tu sva saṃvedana gocarasya jñāna rūpa tayā artha tvāt keśa ādi ākārasya iva asatta abhidhānam sādhu ataeva vācya tve api na ākārasya na bāhyasya tattvataḥ vidhi sādhanam bahis eva hi saṃvṛttyā saṃvṛtya api tu na ākṛteḥ 
JŚNĀ_229,2	 na hi asan dehasya viṣayasya sva saṃvedyasya ākārasya śabda ādinā vidhi niṣedha yogaḥ vaiyarthya ādasāmarthyāt ca na api vikalpa apratibhāsinaḥ bāhyasya viṣaya apratipatteḥ hi kasya vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ vā syāt tasmāt yathā vṛkṣa śabdena bāhyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhyavasāyāt abhidheyaḥ vyavasthāpitaḥ tathā adhyavasāyāt eva bāhyasya vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ vā vyavahriyate yadā api kutaścid prakaraṇāt buddhi ākāram kañcid vikalpa antareṇa ādāya parīkṣā tadā api tad vikalpāt bāhyaḥ eva vidhi niṣedhau tam hi patati arthe vivecayan iti hi śāstram tasmāt tattvataḥ na ubhayoḥ api vidhi niṣedhau saṃvṛttyā hi bāhyasya eva duṣpariharau ca anyathā saṃvyavahāra hāni prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_229,3^1	 etena yaṭṭīka ākāraḥ āropitasya bāhya tva viṣayau vidhi niṣedhau= iti alaukikam anāgamam atārkikī iyam kathayati tat apahastitam na hi saṃvṛti parama artha satya dvayam anāśritya kācid vyavasthā tatra na tāvat iyam saṃvṛtiḥ loka abhimāna rūpa tvāt tasyāḥ lokasya ca bāhyaḥ eva padasya arthaḥ vihitaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ vā iti avigānena vyāpī pravṛtti nivṛtti āśrayaḥ abhimānaḥ na āropitasya bāhya tva ādikam spṛśati lokaḥ na api eṣa parama arthaḥ na hi avācyasya vidhi niṣedhau na ca vācyam kiñcid tattvataḥ iti āgamaḥ tarkasya api na anyā diś 
JŚNĀ_229,3^2	 kim ca na anadhyavaseyasya vidhi niṣedhau na ca śabdāt adhyavasāyaḥ sva lakṣaṇāt anyatra iti svayam api udghuṣyate atas kim āyātam āropita bāhya tva vidhi niṣedhayoḥ pratibhā asādhyavasāya dvārā ca sarvā vyavasthitiḥ tattvam aspṛśatī tatra āropitam āropita bāhya tvam vā na pratibhāsasya viṣayaḥ na api adhyavasāyasya tatra āropitam tāvat na pratibhāsa sparśi yat svayam eva āha ullekhā anubhava samāna kālam samāropaṇam apratibhāsa rūpam eva avastu vikalpa viṣayaḥ iti ataeva tat vāhya tvam api na pratibhāsi tad dharma tvāt adhyavasāya vaḥ tu bāhya sva lakṣaṇa niyamāt eva na enayoḥ iti alam enām utthāpya 
JŚNĀ_230,1	 āropitam iti api kalpitam ebā ucyate kalpanā akarma ca pratibhāsam avasitam ca iti dvayam tat kutastyaḥ ayam āropita ākhyaḥ rāśiḥ aparaḥ tasmāt buddhi ākāra bāhya āśrayā eva saṃvṛti parama arthābhyām cintā ucitā iti tathāvidha artha kriyā vivakṣāyām ca kim vakra durga mārga āśrayeṇa iti alam ati nirbandhena sthitam etat adhyavasāyena bāhyasya buddhi ākārasya tu pratibhāsena śabda vācya tvam ucyate iti nanu evaṃvyācakṣāṇena bhavatā ubhaya artha rāśeḥ a śeṣasya vācya tā svīkṛtā iti katham sarva dharma anabhilāpya tā samarthana artham idam avatāritam iti āha sthāpyate iti prayojana antaram uddiśya vyavasthā mātram etat kriyate adhyavasāya mātreṇa pratibhāsa mātreṇa vā vācya tvam iti tathā ca bahis viṣayīkaraṇam tattva vyavasthāna mātram gṛhṇataḥ tāvat anya apoḍham sva lakṣaṇam eva viṣayaḥ iti ucyate upādhirāśiniraśana param evam anya apoḍha ākāraḥ vikalpasya ātmā viṣayaḥ iti samasta bāhya nirasana param na tu svasmin viṣaya tvasya viśrāmāya iti na virodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_230,2^1	 kutas punar etat tatra tatra viṣaya tā pratipādane api na viśrāmaḥ vivakṣitaḥ kim tu anya nirasane tātparyam iti āha vācyaḥ tattvataḥ na eva kaścid arthaḥ iti adhyavasāya saha apohi pratibhāsaḥ sāṃvyavahārika apekṣayā tattvataḥ jñeyasya jñāna viṣaya tām upanayati pratyakṣa vat na hi pratibhāsa mātram avasāya śūnyam anya avasāya ākrānta vyāpāram vā pravṛtti kāmasya viṣaya vyavasthām arthe kṣamate gacchat tṛṇa sparśa vat marīcau= udakāra upavat na api avasāya mātram apeta pratibhāsam udakāra upavadeva 
JŚNĀ_230,2^2	 tasmāt pravṛtti yogya tayā vyāptam viṣaya vyavasthānam ubhaya abhāvaḥ vyāpaka abhāvena paribhūyamānam ubhaya saṃbhava pratibaddham eka viveke svīkriyamāṇam sāṃvṛtam eva yatra jñāne yat na pratibhāsate yena vā yat na avasīyate sa na tasya viṣayaḥ yathā go jñānasya aśvaḥ na pratibhāsate ca śābda jñāne sva lakṣaṇam na avasīyate ca anena buddhi ākāraḥ iti vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ pratibandha sādhanāt na anekāntaḥ yadi api ca atyanta abhyāse pratibhāsa mātreṇa api pravṛttiḥ viṣaya tvam ca dṛṣṭam tathā api saḥ eva abhyāsaḥ na avasāyāt vinā iti avasāyasya eva tat pauruṣam tatas yena yat na avasīyate asati abhyāsaḥ iti viśeṣaṇam apekṣyam 
JŚNĀ_231,1	 nanu pratyakṣe api na gṛhīta kṣaṇasya avasāyaḥ kim tu santateḥ na ca asyāḥ pratibhāsaḥ iti kena asya api sa viṣaya tvam kṣaṇe santatau ca ubhaya abhāvāt anumāne tu parīkṣā eva vartate na ca anyat pramāṇam asti yasya ubhaya saṃbhavena viṣayaḥ kaścid iti asaṃbhavam etat tat ekaikena vidheya tve sthita viṣayaka sthitiḥ akhilasya bāhyasya antarasya vā vācya tvam iti 
JŚNĀ_231,2	 atra ucyate tattva vyavasthām āha ubhaya saṃbhavena eva viṣaya tvam kevalam sāṃvyavahārika apekṣayā saṃvṛteḥ eva adhara saṃvṛtim apekṣya tattvam iti vyavahriyate kṣaṇa bheda avatāre saṃvyavahāra vilopāt vyāvahārikam prati pratikṣaṇa kṣīṇa tāyāḥ abhāvāt tattvataḥ pratyakṣeṇa ubhaya saṃbhava abhāvaḥ iti na doṣaḥ atha pṛthagjanasya dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ api abheda grahaḥ niyataḥ eva iti avasitaḥ vahniḥ pratibhāsitaḥ eva iti ced na pratibhāsā antara smaraṇena tad pratibhāsa bhrama bhraṃśasya kṛta tvāt yathā ca vikalpa pratibhāsāt anyaḥ eva vastu pratibhāsaḥ darśayitum adhyakṣe śakyaḥ tathā na adhyakṣa pratibhāsāt anyaḥ asti iti tatra eva vastu pratibhāsa viśrāmāt tat vijātīyasya vastu pratibhāsata avyudāsaḥ śreyān tasmāt yuktam uktam sthāpyaḥ vācyaḥ tattvataḥ na eva kaścid iti athavā vastu antara avācya tve api tatra apohaḥ tad viśeṣaṇa tvena gamyaḥ iti apohasya vācya tā svīkṛtā eva tathā api katham sarva dharmānabhilapya tvam iti āha 
JŚNĀ_231,3–231,4	 vācyaḥ tattvataḥ na eva kaścid arthaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ paryudāsa pakṣe tāvat vastu rūpa vat tasya api adhyavasāya mātra kṛtam vācya tvam na pratibhāsāt adhyakṣa vat prasajya pakṣe punar anya nivṛtti mātrasya anyadā api na viśeṣaḥ tathā api asau na arthaḥ iti na ukta doṣaḥ yada vā yaḥ śāstre tasmāt siddham etat sarva śabdauviveka viṣayāḥ vikalpāḥ ca iti upasaṃhāraḥ tasya artha niṣṭhām upasaṃhāreṇa eva darśayati vācyaḥ tattvataḥ na eva kaścid arthaḥ iti saṃvṛtau pratibhā asā adhyavasāya mātreṇa vācya tāyāḥ darśita tvāt tattvataḥ iti āha tat ayam arthaḥ yat etat śāstre vivekaḥ eva vācyaḥ iti upasaṃhṛtam tasya na kiñcid vācyam eva arthaḥ yathā abhāvaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti eva arthaḥ tathā apohasya vācya tā iti vācya tāyāḥ eva apohaḥ iti arthaḥ etat ca hetu traya vibhāga karaṇa ādinā svayam eva śāstreṇa sphuṭīkṛtam iti upapāditam 
JŚNĀ_232,1–232,3	 tat evam katham apohaḥ śabda vācyaḥ iti praśne tad guṇa tvena yathā ukta arthena iti uttaram atha buddhi ākāraḥ sva lakṣaṇam upādhayaḥ vā kasmāt na vācyāḥ iti praśnaḥ tad adhyavasāyasya pratibhāsasya ubhayasya ca abhāvāt iti krameṇa visarjanāni yadā tu śabdaiḥ kim vācyam iti anuyogaḥ tadā pratibhāsāt artha adhyavasāyāt yat vā tattvataḥ iti vikalpya vikalpa sthe anya apoḍha ākāraḥ anya apoḍha sva lakṣaṇam na kiñcid iti prativacanāni krameṇa eva iti uktam bhavati tasmāt śabda liṅgayoḥ apoha viṣayatā sthiti prasādhanam sarva dharma avācya tva pratipādana param iti prathama śloka artha upasaṃhāraḥ bhavatu apohe kṛtinām prapañcaḥ vastu svarūpā sphuraṇam tu marma tatra adṛḍhe sarvam ayatna śīrṇam dṛḍhe tu sausthyam nanu tāvatā eva samarthanā etasya diśaḥ prakāśaḥ kṛtaḥ ayam asmābhiḥ avistareṇa tad vistaraḥ tu ākaraḥ eva cintyaḥ para uditam tūlam iva kṣipadbhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_233,1–233,2	 karma nirmita vaicitryam anīśam yaḥ jagat jagau praṇamāmi pramāṇena tam avyāhata śāsanam iha pratyavasthānam anyeṣām vivāda āspadībhūtam bhūdhara ādi buddhimat kartṛ pūrvakam kāryatvāt yat yat kāryam tat buddhimat kartṛ pūrvakam dṛṣṭam yathā ghaṭaḥ kāryam ca idam bhūdhara ādi tasmāt buddhimat pūrvakam iti na ca idam asiddham bauddhasya api vindhya gandhamādana ādīnām kāryatve vivāda abhāvāt na api viruddham sa pakṣe bhāvāt na ca anaikāntikam kvacid api kārye buddhimat adhiṣṭhāna vyabhicārasya darśayitum aśakyatvāt pratyakṣa āgamābhyām abādhanāt ca na kāla atyaya apadiṣṭam pratihetoḥ abhāvāt ca na prakaraṇa samam tat anena yat siddham tad upādeyam viduṣām sādhana antara siddha vat na ca sarvatra anvaya vyatireke hetu vallabha tayā buddhimati kāryasya tad ubhaya asiddheḥ asādhana tvam abhidheyam sa pakṣe sataḥ asya vipakṣa rāśeḥ ākāśa deḥ atyantam vyāvṛtteḥ 
JŚNĀ_233,3	 trayaḥ hi bhāva rāśayaḥ buddhimat kartṛkāḥ ca ghaṭa ādayaḥ akartṛkāḥ ca ākāśa ādayaḥ sandigdha kartṛkāḥ ca bhūdhara ādayaḥ tatra ghaṭa ādiṣu sa pakṣeṣu vidyamānam avidyamānam ambara ādiṣu vipakṣeṣu iti anvayavi atireki kārya tvam śeṣeṣu vartamānam avaśyam sādhyam upasthāpayati yadi api ca digambara ādayaḥ asantaḥ tad mate paramāṇavaḥ tu kāryam eva tathā api asataḥ api vyāvṛttiḥ svīkṛtā eva tathā ca nivṛttiyaṃdi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim iṣyate iti hi śāstram na ca vipakṣatā kṣatiḥ sādhya an adhikaraṇa lakṣaṇa tvāt vipakṣasya iti kim eṣām sattā sādhana prayāsena tasmāt na anvaya vyatireka arekaḥ kartari yathoke kāryatvasya evam utpattimat tva acetana upādāna tva sthityā pravṛtti ādiṣu yojyam 
JŚNĀ_234,1^1	 atra bauddham utthāpayan śaṅkaraḥ prāha na utpatti mātreṇa yathā ukta buddhimat pūrvaka tvasya siddhiḥ api tu yādṛśam prāsāda ādiṣu dṛṣṭam yat dṛṣṭeḥ akriyā darśinaḥ api kṛtabuddhiḥ utpadyate yadi tādṛś eva kṣiti ādiṣu bhavet syāt atra api buddhim ataḥ anumānam na kāryatva śabda sāmyena tatra vyabhicārasya api saṃbhāvyamāna tvāt na hi artha antarāt śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ pāṇḍu tvāt agneḥ anumānam nyāyyam acetana upādāna tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat kṣiti ādeḥ api kartuḥ anumānam iti ced evam tarhi ghaṭa ādeḥ mudvikārasya kumbhakāra pūrvaka tvāt valmīkasya api tad pūrvakatva anumāna prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_234,1^2	 tat uktam siddham yādṛś ityādi vārtika trayam tad idam anirūpita para abhiprāyasya vyāhṛtam tathā hi buddhimat kāraṇasya sadbhāve bhāvaḥ ghaṭāda abutpatti ādeḥ abhāve ca abhāvaḥ gagana ādiṣu sa ca tathā prasiddha avinābhāvaḥ yatra eva kṣiti ādau= upalabhyate tatra eva tad vinirmāṇa samartha kartṛ buddhim tad vidaḥ janayati na ca evam pāṇḍu tva ādayaḥ teṣām jāti antara samavāyinām agni vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ iti tathā na hi anadhiṣṭhitānām prayatnavatā karaṇa karmaṇām kriyāsu svātantryam upalabdha pūrvam sarvatra buddhimat adhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ eva prāsāda ādi prasava upalabdheḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_234,2^1	 vācaspatiḥ tu svābhāvika sambandham prastutya āha iha api kāryatvasya upādāna ādi abhijñena kartrā svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ asti eva upādheḥ anupalambhena vyabhicāra asiddheḥ tṛṇa ādayaḥ ca pakṣīkṛtāḥ iti uktam utprekṣaṇa mātram tu na kartavyam iti api pratipāditam eva tatas svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham sva sādhyena yadi sādhyam antareṇa bhavet svabhāvāt eva pracyaveta iti tarka sahāyam nirasta sādhya vyatireka vṛtti sandeham bhūdhara ādiṣu dṛṣṭam sva sādhyam upasthāpayitum śaktam kim arucibhiḥ ye tu pāṇḍu tva mṛd vikāra go tva ādayaḥ teṣām jāti antara samavāyi tvena pratyakṣaḥ eva vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ na te hetavaḥ jāti antara samavāyinaḥ hima ādi gata pāṇḍu tvasya agni vyabhicārāt 
JŚNĀ_234,2^2–235,1	 tathā mṛd vikārasya sthapati ādi pūrvaka tvena kulāla vyabhicārāt evam anyatra api boddhavyam tatas ca ayam tatra vibhāgaḥ yat eva viśiṣṭam pāṇḍu dravya dhūma rūpam tat eva agneḥ hetuḥ tatra tasya avyabhicāra darśanāt yat punar agni vilakṣaṇa kāraṇa janma pāṇḍu dravya mātram arthataḥ bhinnam śabda sāmyāt abhedi na tatas agneḥ anumānam tatra tasya vyabhicāra upalabdheḥ evam mṛd vikāra ādiṣu api yojyam kāryatva sāmānyasya tu abhūtvā abhāva lakṣaṇasya parvata ādiṣu bhāvaḥ paraiḥ iṣṭaḥ eva kim tu pratibandhā siddheḥ anaikāntikam iti bruvate sa ca dhūma ādeḥ iva pratipāditaḥ iti yuktam tatas tad anumānam iti vittokaḥ tu āha syāt etat na sa pakṣa vipakṣayoḥ darśana mātreṇa avyabhicāra niścayaḥ atat ātmanaḥ atad utpatteḥ ca avyabhicāra niyama ayogāt tat idam kārya tvam sandigdha vyatireka tvāt asādhanam 
JŚNĀ_235,2	 atra ucyate na asti vipakṣa vyāvṛtti sandehaḥ dhūma analayoḥ iva kārya buddhimatorupalambhānupalambha sādhanasya kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya siddha tvāt kārya viśeṣasya eva tad utpatti siddhiḥ na kārya sāmānyasya yathā dhūma ādi varti vastu tva ādeḥ na anala ādi janya tva niścayaḥ iti ced na viśeṣa hetu abhāvāt upalambha an upalambhayoḥ tad utpatti sādhana tvena iṣṭayoḥ sādhya sādhana sāmānyayoḥ aviśeṣāt kārya viśeṣasya iva kārya mātrasya api prabodha āśraya āyattatā siddheḥ na ca evam vastu tvasya api vahni kārya tvam tad antareṇa api sahasraśas upalambhāt tatas yathā kāryam vastra ādi upādāna vat dṛṣṭam iti kārya antaram api tathā vyavasthāpyate tathā tat eva vastra ādi kāryam buddhimat hetukam dṛṣṭam iti adṛṣṭa kartṛkam api kārya kartṛ pūrvakam vyavasthāpyate upādānasya iva kartuḥ api kāryeṇa anukṛta anvaya vyatireka tvāt tena yathā kāryam ca nirupādānam ca iti na śakyam āśaṅkitum tathā kāryam ca bhavet akartṛkam ca iti na aśaṅkanīyam kārya mātrasya kartṛ mātrāt upādānādivātpāda siddheḥ aviśeṣāt iti 
JŚNĀ_235,3	 yat tu ucyate anyādṛśam eva kāryam buddhimatā vyāptam yat dṛṣṭeḥ akriyā darśinaḥ api kṛta buddhiḥ tat ca asiddham sindhu bhūdhara ādau= iti nanu kā iyam kṛta buddhiḥ kim sādhana buddhiḥ atha sādhya buddhiḥ sādhana buddhiḥ tāvat bhavatām siddhā eva karma jam loka vaicitryam iti abhyupagamāt atha uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati na idam kṣiti ādiṣu upalabhyamānam sādhya anumāna samartham kārya tvam kim tu anyat eva sādhya buddhi jananāt na ca etat yuktam sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt dhūma ādiṣu api hi śakyam evam vaktum na ayam vahni anumiti samarthaḥ dhūmaḥ kim tu anyaḥ eva sādhya darśinaḥ sādhya buddhi ajananāt tathā ca tāvat na sādhanam sidhyati yāvat na sādhya buddhiḥ sidhyati tāvat na sādhya buddhiḥ sidhyati yāvat na sādhanam sidhyati iti sphuṭataram itaretara āśraya tvam iti 
JŚNĀ_236,1–236,2	 śaṅkaraḥ api āha na ca vyāmohāt kasyacid sādhya buddhi abhāve hetoḥ asiddhiḥ sarva anumāneṣu tad bhāva prasaṅgāt iti bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ tu āha kṛtaka tvena pratītau katham na kṛta buddhiḥ sarveṣām prāsāda ādiṣu api kṛtabuddhiḥ na bhavati yathā cirantaneṣu prāsāda ādiṣu vyāpti abhijñasya eva kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati vyāpti vimūḍhānām akṛtabuddhiḥ eva tathā kṣiti ādiṣu api iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ prāsāda ādiṣu iva kṣiti ādiṣu na bhavati iti ced kim prasiddha avinābhāvānām uta aprasiddha avinā abhāvānām prasiddha āvinā abhāvānām api kim vyāpti grahaṇa smṛti vikalānām atha anyeṣām abhraṣṭa smaraṇānām tāvat bhavati eva puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ loke api vicitram jagat kenacid dhātrā nirmitam iti asti pratītiḥ vyāpti graha smṛti vimūḍhānām tu prāsāda ādiṣu api keṣucid na puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati iti na etāvatā teṣām apuruṣa kṛta tvam 
JŚNĀ_236,3	 api ca iyam vedeṣu api puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ mīmāṃsakānām na asti iti atas ca tatra api puruṣa kṛti sādhanāya uktāḥ vākya tvāt ayaḥ asiddhāḥ syuḥ kim ca anitya tva siddhi artham yat kṛtaka tvam sādhanam uktam tat api asiddham syāt na hi yādṛśam kṛtaka tva ādi ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭam śrotra agrāhya rūpam tādṛśam śabde asti iti tasmāt dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antika vaidharmyam etat sarva anumāneṣu samānam na īśvara anumānasya eva bādhakam iti 
JŚNĀ_236,4	 mañjaryām trilocanaḥ punar āha buddhimat pūrvaka tvena vyāptam janma dhaṭa ādiṣu eva asti iti kutas pratipadyase kṛta buddhi hetu tvāt iti ced evam tarhi ghaṭa ādīnām sa viśeṣaḥ vācyaḥ yena mahābhūta asaṃbhāvinā viśeṣeṇa ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva kṛtabuddhim utpādayanti na mahābhūtāni na tāvat kartṛ kriyā upalabdhiḥ viśeṣaḥ akriyā darśinaḥ api kṛta buddhi hetu tva abhyupagamāt mahat tva parimāṇam viśeṣaḥ iti ced tasya api kāraṇa bahu tva mahat tva pracaya viśeṣebhyaḥ mahābhūteṣu api dṛṣṭa tvāt kṛtaka tvam eva viśeṣaḥ iti na vācyam kāraṇa samavāya lakṣaṇasya abhūta prādurbhāvasya pṛthivī ādiṣu api aviśiṣṭa tvāt na ca etebhyaḥ anyaḥ śakyaḥ viśeṣaḥ śakreṇa api nirūpayitum yasya bhāvāt ghaṭa ādayaḥ eva kṛta buddhi hetavaḥ na pṛthivī ādayaḥ iti
