JŚNĀ_275,2	 evam tarhi kulāla saṃjñitaḥ eva prayatna bān buddhīndriya ādi kalāpaḥ katham aparam apekṣate tasmāt cetanaḥ acetanaḥ vā kalāpaḥ svabhāvena eva apara cetanam apekṣya jāyate janayati vā iti upagantavyam iti anavasthā eva atha cetana vargaḥ cetanā antara nirapekṣaḥ eva iṣyate tadā ghaṭa ādi vartinaḥ kāryatva ādayaḥ abhimata kāraka adhiṣṭhāyaka viparītana antarīyakāḥ sidhyantaḥ na virodha dūṣaṇa parihāreṇa sthitim anubhaveyuḥ tathāvidha adhiṣṭhāna svīkāre tu svabhāva viprakarṣāt anupalabdhau= api tad vyāpāra saṃbhāvanāyām na tad viparīta dṛṣṭa ekanā antarīyaka tvam eṣām iti viparyaya vyāpteḥ abhāvāt abhāvaḥ viruddha vyavahārasya syāt tadā api yadi kārya kāraṇa vyavasthānāya vyatireka cintā caturaḥ kaścid na pratyavasthānam ādriyate na ca idānīm tadā ārabdham iti āstām tāvat 
JŚNĀ_275,3	 tat kim anena nirbandhena nirbandhe vā virodhi adhyakṣa sthūla doṣa avatāra prasaṅgāt tathā api asiddhiḥ vā iti viparīta siddhiḥ yojayiṣyate iti sa antargarvaḥ gaja nimīlitena eva vā avadhīrya yathā eva anena sarva kārya utpattau nimitta kāraṇam īśvaraḥ gṛhītaḥ tathā enam saṃbhāvya cetanasya api cetanā antara apekṣāyām anavasthāna bhīroḥ tena eva avyabhicārān āśritya saṃśayam āha atha prayatnavān api kulālaḥ na sva śarīre kim tu kumbha ādau tatas sva śarīra siddhaye kim na param apekṣeta tarhi īśvara abhimataḥ api para karaṇa prayatnavān na sva śarīraḥ eva sva ātmani kāritra virodhāt iti kim na param apekṣeta na ca apekṣate tatas yad artha kāri kārya ādi vā tat pratiyatna vat adhiṣṭhitam iti tat tena eva vyabhicāri iti saṃśaya siddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_275,4	 nanu tasya śarīram eva na asti iti kutas anekāntaḥ eṣaḥ tat etat prakaraṇa vismaraṇa phalam tathā hi anvaya upadarśana samīhayā kulāle sāṃvṛtam eka tvam aṅgīkṛtya tādṛś sāṃvṛta eka puruṣa nirmeya tvam jagataḥ bhavatā eva svīkṛtam iti ayam asmākam avakāśaḥ yadi tu vāstavam eva eka tvam śarīra sahacāra viruddham anurudhyate na tarhi sāṃvṛtam eka tvam upanetavyam dṛṣṭānte vyāpaka tvena kārya ādeḥ na api nāma mātra pareṇa tena vyāptā tattvataḥ tathā siddhi pratyāśā phalavatī na khalu dahana upacarita māṇavaka pratibaddha vacana viśeṣa ādi kāryam upalabhya pāramārthikam kaścid dahanam anumīyate 
JŚNĀ_276,1–276,3	 askhalantī eka pratītiḥ puruṣa avayavinī iti ced kaḥ punar iha sākṣāt upacāra tvam āha atasmiḥ tat vyavahāraḥ tu dvayoḥ samānaḥ iti ucyate śarīra tve avaya vi bādhakāt ekādhyavasāyasya bhrama tvam avasātavyam sattve api vā avayavinaḥ śarīra avayavī kara ādi avayavāḥ buddhiḥ iti eṣa kalāpe eka śabda abhidheyaḥ bhūta ādi kalāpaḥ vā iti apāram ārthika tvam siddham adhiṣṭhātuḥ syāt etat puruṣaḥ eva tatra adhiṣṭhātā kartā vā sa ca śarīra ādibhyaḥ labdha vyatirekaḥ ekaḥ eva iti ced saṃdṛṣṭa kāraṇa kalāpa kṛte api kārya janmani adṛṣṭam aparam parikalpyate yat tatra api dṛṣṭam avadhūya tat eva tat ca na anekam iti anavadhiḥ vividhaḥ vimohaḥ 
JŚNĀ_276,4	 adṛṣṭasya tāvat bhāvaḥ eva duravadhāraḥ sahaja vaiṣamyāt atra anumānasya iti uktam tasya api dṛṣṭa anupalambha saciva pratyakṣa sādhyaḥ kāraṇa bhāvaḥ sa ca dṛṣṭa vyavacchedena tasya eva anyathā kara caraṇa ādeḥ api vyāpāra saṃbhave tasya api anumāna prasaṅge punar saḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ anyathā puruṣasya api anumānam anibandhanam syāt etena caitanya santānasya eka puruṣa tva parikalpanam pratyuktam asya api kara caraṇa ādi saha kṛtasya eva śakti pratīteḥ kāryāt tattvataḥ eva anumāna prasaṅgaḥ dhūmāt iva sa indhana śikhinaḥ 
JŚNĀ_276,5–277,1	 caitanya mātreṇa vyāptiḥ gṛhyate na apareṇa api iti ced na samāna nyāya tayā vibhāgasya kartum aśakyatvāt iti tat ayam buddhi śarīra avyatirekiṇaḥ kāraṇa tām anya yoga vyavacchedena eva vaktum arhati yatas tanmātram anumātum apratibandhena śaktuyāt pāramārthika eka tvena ca vyāptim grahītum tathā ca sati dṛṣṭam dṛṣṭa anvaya vyatirekam kāraka samudāyam apahāya anyat eva kāraṇam kalpitam iti ayam aparaḥ dhikkāraḥ tat api yadi kathañcid anekam syāt viphalaḥ sakalaḥ yatnaḥ iti ekam eva parikalpanoyam iti ākāśa kamala parimala ākṛṣṭa madhukara kolāhala prāyam idam akhilam ākalayāmaḥ tat alam deha ādi vyatirikta upakṣepeṇa tasmāt prayatnavataḥ kartuḥ ekatvena vyāptiḥ na mukhyāḥ kartṛ vācyasya kulāla ādeḥ tattvataḥ ekatva anupapatteḥ sāṃvṛta āśraye ca tādṛśasya eva anumāna prasaṅgena tena iva vyabhicāraḥ kāryatva ādeḥ iti saṃśayaḥ sādhyasya iti uktam 
JŚNĀ_277,2^1	 nanu tathā api tādṛśaḥ sādhyasya asiddhau kena vyabhicāraḥ siddhau ca vyabhicāraḥ kim kariṣyati vyabhicārāt asiddhiḥ eva iti ced asiddhau tarhi vyabhicāraḥ api na asti iti kutas asiddhiḥ iti siddhiḥ iti vā vyavatiṣṭhate kāryatva ādeḥ ca vastu dharmasya vastu sannā iva dharmī bhavitum arhati iti na ca udyam abhyupagama virodhasya anena krameṇa pratipādayitum ārabdha tvāt tattvataḥ asti ca asau sādhyasya sādhana trairūpyeṇa trirūpa sādhanasya ca yathā abhimata sādhyena tatra sādhya sattve vipakṣa vyatirekasya asattvāt sva abhyupagama siddha tayā pramāṇa siddham iti sādhāraṇā anaikāntikam ucyate tatra abhyupāyaḥ kārya aṅgam iti vacanāt para abhyupagamaḥ khalu na pramāṇam iti yuktam tad bādhanāya eva pravṛtteḥ ataeva na svatantra hetau= asya āśrayaḥ prasaṅgasya ca viparyayaḥ eva phalam sva upagamasya tu apramāṇa tve vacana uccāraṇam eva na syāt 
JŚNĀ_277,2^2–278,1^1	 sva dṛṣṭa artha prakāśanam ca vacanam para artha anumānāt na ca evam sva dṛṣṭa rūpa traya prakāśanam anena kṛtam bhavati iti tad vādinaḥ asādhana aṅga vacanam nigraha sthānam ucitam parasya tu doṣa udbhāvanam eva iti sthitam athavā anvaya ghaṭana artham eva ekena karaṇam upanītam āśaṅkya āha dṛṣṭānte saṃśayaḥ athavā iti dṛṣṭānte asiddhiḥ eva tāvat ekena karaṇasya siddhau= api vā sandehaḥ eva kasya yad artham upanīyate dṛṣṭāntaḥ sarva upasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ iti yāvat tathā hi na dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭam iti eva yasya kasyacid vastunaḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva pratītiḥ atiprasaṅgāt api tu pratibandha siddheḥ 
JŚNĀ_277,2^2–278,1^2	 na ca iha kiñcid nibandhanam asti iti sādhya dharmiṇi sidhyantaḥ api kartṛ tva ādayaḥ na ekatva niyatam ātmānam ātanvanti iti viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt prayatna vat kartṛ niyatāḥ api kārya tvādaya eka kartṛka tve sādhye sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tayā saṃśaya hetavaḥ eva iti tathā ca śaṃkaraḥ eva āha na kartuḥ eka tvena acetana upādāna tvasya avyabhicāraḥ ityādi yat punar āha na ca evam acetana upādāna tvasya prayatna vat adhiṣṭhāna mātreṇa vyabhicāraḥ iti na tanmātreṇa prastute kaścid upayogaḥ vivāda ādhāra dharma siddheḥ tad siddhau pratibaddha tvasya pūrvam pratipādanāt iti 
JŚNĀ_279,1	 tat evam sādhya viśeṣa apekṣayā vyāpti dūṣaṇam abhidhāya prayatna vat mātre api abhidhātum vitarkayan= āha sthitvā pravṛtti saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādiṣu iṣṭa siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ vā dṛṣṭānte saṃśayaḥ athavā iti dṛṣṭaḥ antaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ siddhānte iti yaḥ arthaḥ prayatna vat mātreṇa vyāpteḥ siddha tvāt eka aneka rūpa anatikramāt ca vastunaḥ sthitvā pravṛtti ādiṣu upanyasteṣu vādinaḥ iṣṭa siddhiḥ kim astu ekatva pakṣe asiddhi mātram vā aneka tve atha vyāptiḥ eva na asti iti siddhānte saṃśayaḥ eva ubhayatra api iti praśna arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_279,2	 atra ca anantaram abheda sādhana adhikāreṇa sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tva udbhāvanena dattam eva uttaram atas tṛtīyaḥ eva pakṣaḥ na hi prayatna upayogam antareṇa api kārya janmani saṃbhāvyamāne bādhakam kiñcid ālocayāmaḥ tat kutas tatra niyamaḥ kārya ādeḥ atha kāla deśa ādi a niyama prasaṅgaḥ bādhakaḥ tat ayuktam yatas pratiniyata śakteḥ asarva kāla bhāvinaḥ sva kāraṇa āyatta sannidheḥ kāraṇa daśā viśeṣasya vyatireke api vyatirekaḥ kāryasya saṃbhavan na prayatna vat na antarīyaka tvam upakalpayitum kalpate sarvathā hetu anapekṣāyām tad vādhakam upapadyamānam kāryasya hetu mātreṇa vyāptim sādhayet na tu hetu viśeṣeṇa prayatnavatā 
JŚNĀ_279,3	 nanu kāraṇam nāma sarvatra kalāpaḥ eva sa ca na vyagra avasthāyām tad saṃhatiḥ ca prayatnavantam antareṇa yadi syāt nityam eva syāt evam deśe api vācyam tatas ca saḥ eva deśa kāla niyama prasaṅgaḥ iti caitanya nirapekṣa tvena kalāpa kārya tvasya vyāpakasya abhāvena kāryatva ādayaḥ asaṃbhavantaḥ prayatna vat apekṣa tvena vyāpyante iti ced evam tarhi saḥ api prayatnavān yadi kṣaṇikaḥ prādeśikaḥ ca tad kṣaṇa eka deśa tvam eva sarva kārya grāmasya syāt iti sanātanaḥ eva aṅgīkartavyaḥ vyāpī ca tatas ca saḥ eva deśa kāla aniyamaḥ adya api prasaktaḥ iti kim asya upagamena atha saḥ adṛṣṭam apekṣya janayat niyatam janayet jaḍānām tu na adṛṣṭam locanam iti 
JŚNĀ_279,4	 evam tarhi tad adṛṣṭa paripāka sahāyāḥ eva pratyayāḥ niyatam utpādayiṣyanti nirālocāḥ api iti kim caitanyena iti ced evam bruvataḥ kulāla ādeḥ api vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ na hi tatra api na adṛṣṭam asti sahakāri na ca evam tasmāt viparyayaḥ yā yā sāmagrī sā na adṛṣṭa apekṣayā puruṣa prayatnam viphalayati yathā sūtra piṇḍa daṇḍa cakra ādiḥ sāmagrī ca giri sāgara ādi janikā iti virudvavyāpta upalabdhiḥ prayatna viphalīkaraṇam hi tad anapekṣa tvam ambara ādau siddham niṣedhyam tena yat viruddham prayatna apekṣa tvam tat vyāptam sāmagrī tvam tasyāḥ yatna kārya tvāt 
JŚNĀ_280,1	 atra ucyate yadi prayatna kāryam sāmagrī sarva upasaṃhāreṇa sidhyet yuktam etat na ca evam na hi tatra api viparyaye bādhakam kiñcid asti yathā hi kāryam sva kāraṇa āyatta sannidheḥ kāraṇa avasthā viśeṣasya apekṣayā asarva kāla bhāvi saṃbhāvyate tathā sāmagrī api kim na syāt yatas nityam bhāva prasaṅgaḥ codyeta tatas ca anivartita vipakṣa vṛtti śaṅkā sāmagrī yadi prayatna apekṣām niyacchet vsākṣāt kārya tva ādibhiḥ eva kīdṛśaḥ aparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ yena tad upanyāse saṃśayitasya sāmagrī śaraṇam upakṣipyate 
JŚNĀ_280,2^1	 mṛd ā ādayaḥ puruṣāt eva milantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ iti ced kāryam api prayatnavataḥ eva jāyamānam upalabdham iti kim na ucyate yathā ca yadi api kim api kāryam prayatnavataḥ dṛṣṭam tathā api kārya antaram tiraskṛtya api buddhimantam bhaviṣyati iti śaṅkā tathā sāmagrī api saṃbhāvyamānā kam artham puṣṇāti tatas anukta samam etat tasmāt sāmagrīm api madhye prakṣipya kumbha ādiṣu sāmagryāḥ tathā darśanam eva pramāṇayitavyam tathā ca sati kāryam eva pratyakṣa anupalambhaiḥ pratyatna vat na antarīyakam siddham iti eva sādhu kim atra vyāpti siddhaye bādhaka pramāṇa upanyāsa śauṭīryeṇa atha vakṣyamāṇa krameṇa pratyakṣa anupalambhāḥ jāti viśeṣam eva viṣayīkartum śaknuyuḥ iti na kārya mātram prayatnavatā vyāptam sidhyet 
JŚNĀ_280,2^2	 tad artham viparyaya bādha āśrayaṇam evam tarhi sāmagryāḥ api prayatna vat kārya tve te eva pratyakṣa anupalambhāḥ śaraṇam iti evaṃvidhā saṃhatiḥ prayatnavatā kriyate iti yuktaḥ sarva upasaṃhāraḥ tathā ca na vyagrāt udayaḥ kvacid na ca cayaḥ caitanya śūnyāt bhavet bhāve kim na sadā sadātana tanoḥ api eṣa doṣaḥ samaḥ tasya adṛṣṭam apekṣya kāla niyame kim cetasā ced tadā kumbha ādau= api śilpinaḥ viphala tā na etat ca tat vyatyayaḥ kumbha ādau yadi darśanāt abhividhiḥ kim vyatyaye bādhayā pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ kimu matā na vyāptiḥ evam sati teṣām jāti viśeṣaḥ eva viṣayaḥ yadi evam evaṃvidhaḥ vyūhaḥ cetanataḥ bhavet iti bhavet anyatra kaḥ niścayaḥ iti saṃgraha ślokau 
JŚNĀ_281,1	 na ca sāmagryantarasya atad pūrvaka tve asyāḥ api mā bhūt iti yuktam asarva vyāpinām api dharmāṇām pradeśa vṛtteḥ darśanāt loha lekhanasya iva pārthive asiddha śarīra pūrvaka tvasya iva vā kārye tatra bādhakāt na sarva vyāpi tvam iti ced tad asphuraṇe tarhi saṃśayaḥ kena nivāryate yathā hi na parasya bādhakam kalāpa antare api kārya antara ādau vā cetanā apekṣāyāḥ tathā bhavataḥ api sarva jātau tayā avaśyaṃbhāvyam iti na sādhakam asti yathā ca tava kvacid buddhimat apekṣā darśanam asti tathā parasya api ekatra dṛṣṭasya dharmasya bhinna jātīya avyāpti darśanam asti tatas loha lekhanasya śarīra vyāpārasya ca kvacid bādhakā darśanam sandeha sādhanam upayuktam eva parasya anyathā saṃśayasya eva nirbīja tā prasakteḥ 
JŚNĀ_281,2	 na ca sādhāraṇāna ekāntaḥ prārabdhaḥ adhunā abhidhātum yatas tadvat atra bādhakānupadarśanam bādhakam syāt prativadituḥ api tu sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam eva tat ca siddham dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭi mātreṇa vyāpteḥ asiddheḥ nibandhana antarasya abhāvāt etena kṣiti ādi hetūnām acetana tve sati niyata pravṛtti tvena prāsāda ādi hetu vat prayatna vat adhiṣṭhāna asiddhiḥ iti api pratyuktam acetasaḥ api kāla ādi niyatāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ prayatna vat na antarīyaka tva sādhaka pramāṇasya tadvat eva abhāvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_281,3	 na api kārya avirāma prasaṅgaḥ saṅgatim āvahati apara apara pratyaya yoga janya svabhāva bheda saṃbhavena bhāveṣu eka śakti nirvāhasya dūrīkṛta tvāt tatas ca kartuḥ eka tve sandeha udbhāvanena samāna nyāya tayā āgatam eva buddhi pratibandham para paritoṣāya sādhāraṇa anaikāntika tvena dūṣayitum āha sthitvā pravṛtti saṃsthāna viśeṣa artha kriyā ādiṣu iṣṭa siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ vā dṛṣṭānte iti vā śabdaḥ samuccaye eṣu satsu yat iṣṭam caitanyam tasya dṛṣṭānte sādhanavati dharmiṇi siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ ca ghaṭa ādau viṭapa ādau ca yathākramam tatas vyaktam vipakṣa eka deśe vṛttiḥ eṣām iti bhāvaḥ etena yadi kṛtaka ādi vat viparyaya bādha abhidhānam aśakyam dhūma ādi vat pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām anvaya vyatireka pratītiḥ prayatnena saha kārya ādīnām bhaviṣyati iti gati antaram apāstam tam antareṇa api kāryasya udayāt vyatirekasya eva abhāvāt iti uktam 
JŚNĀ_281,4	 nanu buddhimat tvam nāma dṛśya adṛśya śarīretara sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ kṣmāruha ādi janmani vyāpriyamāṇam na asti iti katham avagantavyam anupalabdhi mātrāt abhāva asiddheḥ yuktam etat yadi dṛśya śarīra upādhi vidhureṇa buddhi mātreṇa vyāptiḥ abhimatā syāt bāḍham eva iti ced evam tarhi dhūma vat vyattirekam eva adhikṛtya āha saṃśayaḥ atha vā iti yadā kumbhakāra vyāpārāt prāk kalasasya vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ tadā na sādhya abhāva kṛtaḥ ghaṭa vyatirekaḥ pratītaḥ syāt sādhya abhāvasya sandehāt na hi tathāvidha śarīra upādhikena cetasā vyāptiḥ jijñāsitāḥ yatas anupalabdhi viśeṣeṇa niṣedhaḥ sidhyet kim tu prayatna vat mātreṇa tasya ca yathā vṛkṣa ādi janma samaye saṃbhāvanā niṣedhasya aśakya tvāt tathā adya api iti tad saṃbhave api saṃbhāvyamānaḥ kumbha abhāvaḥ tad abhāva prayukta tvam ātmanaḥ bodhayitum na śaknoti iti sandigdha vyatirekaḥ 
JŚNĀ_282,1	 nanu sādhya abhāve sādhanasya bhāva saṃśaye sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ iti yuktam na tu kulāla vyāpārāt prāk kumbha bhāvaḥ sandihyate iti ced tat ayuktam sādhya vyatireka prayuktaḥ vyatirekaḥ sādhanasya vyāpti vādinā darśayitavyaḥ sa ca sādhya abhāva sandehāt vā svayam atas api na darśitaḥ sādhya abhāve api vā svabhāva sandehāt iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ ubhayathā api tasya sa viśeṣaṇasya sandigdha tvāt iti ataeva sandigdha sādhya sādhana dharmi tvam dṛṣṭāntayoḥ doṣaḥ ucyate 
JŚNĀ_282,2	 yadi tu sādhana abhāva mātram abhidhīyeta sādhya abhāvam anapekṣya tadā yuktam etat na ca tāvatā vyāpti grahaḥ anyathā pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām vyāptim pratipadya pavana upaghāta sādhana upanīyamānaḥ kampaḥ yadā mardana ādi saṃbhavena kampena sādhāraṇam kriyate tadā stimita mārutam asparśa yogya tayā niṣeddhum aśakyam saṃbhāvya pariharan= anivāryaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_282,3	 tatra viśeṣa sādhanāt vyabhicāraḥ eva iti ced kutas punar etat viśeṣaḥ tena sādhyate iti upahati śabdaḥ tu aśarīra vyāpāra vat tad anurūpa viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati pratyakṣa anupalambhena vyāpti varṇanāt iti ced tat api bhavataḥ samānam yathā ca asya tādṛś marut mātrā apekṣayā adṛśya tvena vyabhicāra parihāre vyāpti grahaṇa kāle a dṛśya tvena eva vyatireka asiddhiḥ tathā bhavataḥ api śarīra virahiṇi caitanya mātre tatas yadā tad abhāva saṃśaye api kārya abhāva mātreṇa vyāpti grahaṇa abhimānaḥ tathā aspṛśya prabhañjana abhāva saṃśaye api kampa abhāvaḥ siddhaḥ iti syāt vyāptiḥ 
JŚNĀ_283,1	 atha na kaścid dehavatā iva deha virahiṇā api vyāptim karoti kim tu caitanya mātreṇa tat ca kāya vat kāle api asti viśeṣa saṃbhave sāmānyasya avaśyaṃbhāvāt iti tad apekṣayā vyāpti grahaḥ sāmānya viṣayaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate vahnau= iva vahni antara svarūpa anupraveśāt iti etat api samānam samīra anumāne na ca kaścid cetanāvān vepathu mātreṇa mārutam anumimīte sarva ga tvā adhyavasāye api kampa mātrasya sādhana sāmarthya apratīteḥ na hi rājyam iṣṭam iti tad nāmakaraṇa anantaram upajāyamānam api tad upāya vādinam pramāṇīkaroti sādhanam api vā kṛtaka tvam vastutas asādhana aṅgaḥ vyāpaka tvena upanīyamānam anitya tā siddhau 
JŚNĀ_283,2	 tasmāt na koṣṭha śuddhyā prameya tathā bhāvena paritoṣaḥ pramāṇa guṇaḥ tu nirūpyate na ca kampasya marunmātreṇa vyāpti siddhau kiñcid viparyaye bādhakam asti pratyakṣa anupalambhāḥ tu sva gocarībhāva yogyam eva svabhāva deśa kāla viprakṛṣṭam api tadā tu asannihite antar bhāvayitum śaknuvanti iti avaśyam eṣitavyam na anyam anyathā vyāpti grahaṇa vat vyabhicāraḥ api tad niṣṭhaḥ eva prasajyeta tatas yathā viśeṣa viṣayau= anvaya vyatirekau pratyakṣa ādi agocara caitanya marut mātra viṣayau vyavasthitau tathā api viśeṣa viṣayaḥ vyabhicāraḥ api tanmātra viṣayaḥ kim na vyavasthāpyate na hi lābhe praveśaḥ chede niḥsaraṇam iti labhyam 
JŚNĀ_283,3	 vahniḥ tu deśa kāla viprakṛṣṭaḥ api tad ātmā sannihitaḥ iva svabhāva viprakṛṣṭa pratyakṣa ādi yogya tayā tat anupraveśam āsādayati iti yuktam yatas tat eka adhyavasāyāt sarve eva dhūma vyāpaka tayā avadhāryamāṇaḥ na duṣyati jāṭharam tad ayogya tayā tathā niścāyi atas eva dhūmāt abhimate śikhini pravṛttiḥ asaṃśayān asya yujyate itarathā pratyakṣa ayogyena api vyāptiḥ āśraya bhujāḥ gṛhyamāṇā dhūmasya tad yogya ayogya dahana sāmānya viṣayā eva vyavatiṣṭhate iti tārṇa ādi bhedaḥ iva abhimate api rūpe sandihānaḥ na tad sādhya artha kriyā lābha ekāgra buddhiḥ pravarteta pratibandha vaikalya vat vā asati jāṭharatvaḥ iti āmṛṣataḥ pravṛttiḥ syāt na ca evam tasmāt na sva rūpa viśeṣa niṣṭham pramāṇam sāmānyena vyāptim prapadyate 
JŚNĀ_283,4	 anitya tvena tu kṛtaka tvasya vyāptim viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇam adhigacchat bhūtvā abhavana mātreṇa viśeṣān avacchinnena pravṛttam iti sāmānyena eva adhigacchati na api kṛtakāt pravartamānaḥ abhimata anitya ekāgra buddhiḥ kaścid pravṛttim arhati atas ca sāmānya paryavasitam api pramāṇam na viśeṣeṇa vyāptim gṛhṇāti iti siddham uktam ca nyāya anusāriṇā śaṃkareṇa yat pramāṇam yāvatīm artha gatim vyāpnoti ityādi yat pramāṇam yat svabhāva sāpekṣa pravṛttikam tat na eva tad itara svabhāvena kasyacid vyāptim pratipadyate yathā viparyaya bādhakam bhūtvā bhavana mātra apekṣam anitya viśeṣeṇa kṛtaka tvasya yathā vā abhimata svarūpa viśeṣa apekṣa madhyakṣa anupalambham agneḥ jāṭha rasa ādhāraṇena rūpeṇa dhūmasya sva rūpa viśeṣa apekṣa pravṛttayaḥ ca pratyakṣa anupalambhāḥ prabhañjanena kampasya vyāpti grahaṇaḥ iti vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ mātariśva laghutva vat pratyakṣa pravṛtteḥ abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_284,1	 na api anekāntaḥ vivakṣita svabhāvena hi kasyacid vyāpti grahaṇam pramāṇasya tad svarūpa apekṣa pravṛttika tvena vyāptam anyathā ati prasaṅgaḥ pravṛtti saṃkaraḥ ca doṣaḥ tad viruddhā ca tad itara svabhāva apekṣā pravṛttiḥ tasmāt sva rūpa viśeṣa apekṣam pratyakṣa anupalambham na anila mātreṇa stimita itara sādhāraṇena kampasya vyāptim pratipadyate iti pramāṇa arthaḥ tatas na paramārthataḥ kampena pavana anumānam asti 
JŚNĀ_284,2	 atha ca na kācid bhavadīya samaya samādhāna kalpanā yā na enam anudhāvati na ca etat īyam aprāmāṇya nibandhanam kim api yat na bhāvat kam anumānam upanīyate tatas ca vahni dhūma vat prayatna vat kāryayoḥ yadi vyāpti siddhaye adhyakṣa anupalambham śaraṇam āśriyate tadā tad pravṛtti yogya svarūpa apekṣayā prayatnavataḥ niyataḥ vyabhicāraḥ kārya mātreṇa tṛṇa ādinā 
JŚNĀ_284,3	 atha vyabhicāra camatkāra agocareṇa cetanāvatā vyāptiḥ iṣyate tadā mahīruha ādi janmani iva śilpi vyāpārāt api prāk niṣeddhum aśakye prayatna vat mātra vya apāre vyatiricyamānaḥ ghaṭa ādiḥ kasya abhāva prayukta abhāvaḥ avadhāryatām yatas tena vyāptaḥ sidhyet iti sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tayā punar aneka antar pūrvam dṛśya adṛśya viśeṣam anapekṣya viparyaye bādhaka abhāvam svayam upadarśya kṛtaḥ idānīm vādinaḥ eva abhyupagamena tad iṣṭa pramāṇa apekṣayā vyatirekāsiddheḥ iti bhedaḥ vipakṣa bādhakam tu hetu mātreṇa vyāptim pratīyāt na tad viśeṣaṇa buddhimatā iti uktam 
JŚNĀ_284,4	 nanu vṛkṣa ādayaḥ pakṣīkṛtāḥ iti katham taiḥ vyabhicāraḥ trividhaḥ hi bhāva rāśiḥ sandigdha kartṛkaḥ buddhimat kartṛkaḥ akartṛkaḥ ca iti tatra buddhimat kartṛke ghaṭa ādau pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām vyāptim ādāya sandeha pade bhūdhara ādau kāryatvam upasaṃhṛtya prayatnavān sādhyate na punar asau vyabhicāra viṣayaḥ bhavitum arhati 
JŚNĀ_284,5	 yat āha na ca sādhyena eva vyabhicāraḥ iti tat ayuktam na hi vyabhicāra viṣayaḥ eva pakṣaḥ bhavitum arhati sandigdhe hetu vacanāt vyastaḥ hetuḥ anāśrayaḥ iti nyāyāt tatas ca kṣmādhara ādiḥ eva sandigdha kartṛkaḥ pakṣīkartum ucitaḥ kṣmāruha ādiḥ tu acetana kartṛkaḥ iti caturthaḥ rāśiḥ eṣitavyaḥ vyāpti samīhayā pratyakṣa yogya abhimatasya vṛkṣa ādi janmani anupalabdheḥ iti katham pakṣīkaraṇam mā bhūt aśeṣa sādhāraṇa anaikāntika ucchedaḥ kāryatvasya vipakṣa vṛtti hataye saṃbhāvyate atīndriyaḥ kartā ced vyatireka siddhi vidhurā vyāptiḥ katham sidhyati bādhā tu āhita hetu mātra niyatiḥ bhedena na vyāptaye na api ardhaḥ vyabhicāra gocara caraḥ pakṣīkriyāyām kṣamaḥ iti saṃgraha ślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_285,1	 nanu tathā api katham avyāptiḥ ākāśasya vyatireka grahaṇa adhikaraṇasya saṃbhavāt yat āha buddhimat kāraṇa sadbhāve bhāvaḥ ghaṭa ādau= utpatti ādeḥ abhāve ca abhāvaḥ gagana ādiṣu sa ca tathā aprasiddha avinābhāvaḥ yatra eva kṣiti ādau= upalabhyate tatra eva tad vinirmāṇa samartha kartṛ buddhim tad vidaḥ janayati iti utpatti ādeḥ iti kāryatva ādeḥ iti arthaḥ atra abhidhīyate na sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭānta mātram asti iti sādhya siddhiḥ yadṛcchā upanatau= api tathā saṃbhavāt tasmāt nidarśanam nāma gṛhīta vismṛta pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa smaraṇa dvāreṇa eva hetau= upayogi na sva sannidhi mātreṇa 
JŚNĀ_285,2	 sa ca pratibandhaḥ dvāra antareṇa vā gṛhītaḥ vihāyasā smaryeta sva adhikaraṇa pramāṇa prasiddhaḥ vā tatra tāvat prathama kalpanam apāstam prāk eva dṛśya śarīra upādhinā dhī mātreṇa vā kārya tva ādeḥ ghaṭau= api pratibandha grahaṇa upāya apāyāt caramam ca asaṃbhavi tathā hi yadi nāma vyomni dvaya nivṛttiḥ upalabdhā tathā api eka abhāva prayukta tva niścaya āyogāt anya abhāve viśva rūpasya ca tatra āvṛtteḥ kasya kena saṃbandha bodhaḥ syāt karabhagarda bha ādeḥ api kārya kāraṇa bhāva grahaṇa prasaṅgāt ca anyatra anvaya darśana sahāyasya tathā pratītiḥ iti ced nanu saha darśanam eva anvaya arthaḥ tat ca kadācid karabha ādeḥ api asti iti sādhvī vyavasthā 
JŚNĀ_285,3	 na saha darśanam anvayasya arthaḥ kim tu eka saṃbhava prayuktaḥ anya bhāvaḥ sa ca buddhimat kārya tvayoḥ asti na anyatra iti ced na tad bhāva prayukta tvam nāma apara bhāvasya na tad vyāpārāt prāc abhāvinaḥ sattāla ābhāt anyaḥ prāc abhāvaḥ ca na anupalabdhi vyāpāram antareṇa iti pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām anvaya vyatirekayoḥ niścaye saṃśayaḥ nāma kīdṛś hetu phala sthitau= iti tad pratīti pratibandha smaraṇam eva vihāyasā vidhīyate iti prathama pakṣaḥ eva ayam 
JŚNĀ_286,1	 kim ca kim idam īśvare anujaḥ vivṛtta avivṛtta āviṣkaraṇa mātram atrabhavataḥ uta prativandīkṛte dhūma anumāne api sā eva gatiḥ ekatra ubhaya saṃbhavam upalakṣya antarīkṣe eka vyāpāra nivṛttau anya nivṛtteḥ upalakṣaṇāt vyāpti grahaḥ iti yadi eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ tadā tad icchatām anibandhanaḥ prakṛta pradveṣaḥ kevalam evam vilapatāḥ dahana anumānam api hāritam dūratarā tu prakṛta siddhiḥ ukta krameṇa gardabhena api tasya prasaṅge vahnau= api hasta katyāgāt yadā tu gati antara mapi tatra prakṛta asaṃbhavi saṃbhavi tadā kutas vandīkaraṇam śaraṇam 
JŚNĀ_286,2	 evam tarhi pratyakṣa anupalambha vyāpāraḥ tad atiprasaṅga bhayāt eva āśrīyate na tu saḥ eva samayaḥ iti ced evam sati bhavatā eva kim ayam ati prasaṅge bharaḥ dattaḥ na iti kośa pānam kartavyam yaḥ hi pratyakṣa anupalabdhī vihāya vihāyasi vahni vyāpāra nivṛttyā dhūma nivṛttim ādāya vyāptim abhidhatte tam prati yathā vastu mātrasya api tatra vyāpāra uparamāt tena api vyāpti siddhiḥ syāt iti atiprasaṅgaḥ tathā yaḥ api pratyakṣa anupalabdhīḥ uddhūya tad yogya puruṣa viśeṣa vyāpāra viraheṇa vyomani ghaṭa ādi kāryatva nivṛttim darśayitvā tena vyāptim asya manyate tam prati puruṣa mātrasya api tatra nivṛttyā tena api vyāptiḥ tathā kārya antara tvasya api nivṛttyā tasya api syāt iti vyaktam ati prasaṅga mātram etat na nyāyaḥ iti paśyāmaḥ 
JŚNĀ_286,3	 dhūme gardabha ādi vyabhicāra darśanāt na vastu mātreṇa vyāptiḥ iti yuktam puruṣa mātrasya tu vyabhicāra anupalabdheḥ na idam ati prasaṅga mātra udbhāvanam bhaviṣyati na evam samāna nyāyānām ekatra bādhaka darśanam anyatra api śaṅkām utpādayati yadi hi vihāyasi ubhaya nivṛtti darśanam pratibandha sādhakam bhavet vastu dhūmayoḥ api na bādhyeta tatra tu bādhyamānam anyatra api katham ekānta āvasāya sādhanam syāt na ca pakṣīkṛte na eva vyabhicāraḥ iti api na pakṣīkaraṇam mantra prabhāvaḥ kim tu vyāpti grāhaka dārḍhyam tat ca yadi nabhasi ubhaya abhāva mātram tadā tatra bādhaka adhigateḥ astam dārḍhyam iti sati api pakṣīkaraṇa vyabhicāra āśaṅkā na nivartate iti vyoma asti vyatireka bhūmiḥ iti ced dhūmasya dhūma dhvajāt utpattau= api kim saḥ eva samayaḥ na ati prasaṅga udayāt yadi evam bhavatā eva kim vinihitaḥ na ati prasaṅga itaraḥ tasmin bādha vilokanam punar iha api ārekam ākarṣati iti saṃgrahaḥ 
JŚNĀ_287,1^1	 tasmāt na ākāśe dvaya nivṛttyā vyāpti siddhiḥ siddha vyāptikayoḥ tu abhāva darśanam gṛhīta vyāpti smaraṇa kāraṇam syāt na ca vyāpti grāhakam kiñcid upapadyate iti uktam tasmāt anvaya mātra bhāve api vyatireka abhāvāt anekāntaḥ eva iti sthitam vastutas tu vyatireka vat anvayaḥ api asya durlabhaḥ eva yasya hi pratyakṣa agocara tayā abhāva prayuktaḥ kārya abhāvaḥ iti pratyetum aśakyam tasya anvayaḥ dūra utsāritaḥ eva pratyakṣa grāhya tvāt tasya pratyakṣam hi paridṛśyamāne vastuni deśa kāla viprakṛṣṭam api sva pravṛtti yogyam eva antar bhāvya vyāptim avakalpayet na svabhāva viprakṛṣṭam api iti ukta prāyam tatas ca anvaya mātram gaja nimīlitena avadhīrya vyatireka abhāvena eva dṣaṇam uktam 
JŚNĀ_287,1^2	 vastutas tu na anvayaḥ na vyatirekaḥ iti prayatna vat mātre sādhye kārya tvam asādhāraṇam eva iti vā darśayitum āha saṃśayaḥ athavā iti pratyakṣa ādi yogya apekṣayā sādhāraṇa anaikāntikam caitanya mātra apekṣayā asādhāraṇam iti arthaḥ nanu śarīra upādhi buddhi kṛtam kāryam sidhyat buddhi mātra kṛtam sidhyati eva śiṃśapā kṛtam iva bṛkṣa kṛtam viśeṣe sāmānyān apahnavāt iti katham ucyate anvaya abhāvaḥ evam sati vyatirekaḥ api tad apekṣayā syāt iti ced kā naḥ hāniḥ buddhimati kārya hetoḥ anvaya vyatirekavat tva abhyupagamāt iti uktam atra evam anvaya vyatireka kalpane jāṭhara citraka ādi gatena api rūpeṇa dhūmāt anumitam agnim saṃśayānaḥ na abhimata ekāgra cittaḥ pravartteta ityādi 
JŚNĀ_287,2	 api ca na tatra saṃbhavi iti eva pratyakṣeṇa yat kiñcid vastunaḥ rūpam kāryasya vyāpakam avadhāryate api tu adhyavasāya apekṣayā adhyavasāyaḥ ca puruṣeṇa kṛtaḥ eva iti buddhimatā vā iti viśiṣṭa viṣayaḥ eva pravartate tādṛśi eva puruṣa ādi śabdasya rūḍheḥ na tu kara ādi vyāpāra nirapekṣeṇa caitanya mātreṇa iti caitanya mātram sat api udāsīnam anvaya grahaṇa kāle adhyavasāyasya viśeṣa unmukhena eva pravṛtteḥ sāmānya śabda tve api vā prakṛta viśeṣam ākṣipya eva agni vyāpti vat sa ca adhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣa vyāpāra anusārī tad yogyam eva rūpam bahis kuryāt na tu tat ayogyam api jāṭhara ādi vat tārṇa ādi vat ca evam puruṣeṇa api vyāptau kasyacid śarīra upādhi vidhurasya buddhi mātrasya tat ayogyasya pratikṣepaḥ syāt eva apratikṣepaḥ tu kharva ādi bhedasya eya ayam eva nyāyaḥ sarvatra pratyakṣeṇa anvaya grahaṇe 
JŚNĀ_288,1	 atha aṅgāra saṅgāt aguru khaṇḍa janitam dhūmam upalabdhavataḥ pratyakṣa yogya tayā indhana ādi antareṇa api tad anvaya prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tat kim idānīm pramāṇa viṣaya pratiniyamam anādṛtya yatra kvacid pravṛttam adhyakṣam yena kenacid anvayam pratyetu iti vivakṣitam evam sati hetumadābhāsa vyavasthā vilopāt sarvasya sarva siddhiḥ iti pratiniyata sādhana anveṣaḥ viphalaḥ 
JŚNĀ_288,2	 atha pratyakṣeṇa sva yogyam ullaṃdhyā api vyāptiḥ gṛhīta iti ucyate tat asiddham yadā api pratyakṣam sva pravṛtti yogye api vastuni ava antara bheda apekṣayā sāmānyam udāsayat anu ayam pratipadyate tadā kā eva kathā sva pravṛtti ayogyasya atyantam vijātīyasya na ca asmākam pakṣaḥ pratyakṣa yogyeṇa sarveṇa vyāptiḥ iti kim tu pratyakṣa yogyeṇa eva tad kṛtā vyāptiḥ iti anyathā gardabha ādibhiḥ api dhūma kumbha ādeḥ eva anvaya prasaṅgaḥ kim atas param katham punar atra avāntara bheda apekṣaḥ eva vyāpti grahaḥ na darśana yogya tā mātra apekṣaḥ vikalpaḥ tu vāsanā prabodha mātra artham apekṣita pratyakṣa ādi sannidhiḥ aniyata udaya ākāra tayā na pratiniyatam viśeṣam āveśayitum arhati iti 
JŚNĀ_288,3	 satyam ataeva vyatireka sādhanyāḥ anupalabdheḥ avatāraḥ tatra yathā vahni puruṣābhyām dhūma kumbhayoḥ anvayā adhyavasāye sahāya tām anupalabdhiḥ pratipadyate pūrva sthitiḥ anyatas utpattiḥ anyatas āgamanam iti tridhā bhinna saṃbhava vyatirekam sādhayanti ita ratha anupayogāt tathā yadi gardabha anvaye vedana mātra anvaye vā pratipadyeta syāt eva tābhyām api vyāptiḥ na anyathā yatas na pratyakṣa mātram vyāptim pratipadyate na api anupalambha mātram kim tu pratyakṣānupalambhau= anyonya sahāyau= iti nirṇītam śāstre bahuśas asmābhiḥ api trika pañcaka cintāyām kiñcid iti 
JŚNĀ_288,4	 na ca gardabha ādi anvaye tasyāḥ sāhāyakam asti etena dhūma viśeṣa apekṣayā anupalambha vyāpāra abhāvaḥ vyākhyātaḥ iti na evaṃvādini kaścid paryanuyogaḥ yaḥ tu pratyakṣa gocare api tad kṛtām vyāptim upavarṇayati tasya tad viṣayaḥ eva vyāpti graha virahaḥ iti duḥsthāḥ vyavasthā tatas ca tasya eva asau paryanuyogaḥ tasya api anupalabdhi vyāpāra abhāvāt na iti ced na yatas pratyakṣa yogye api tad kṛta vyāpti vādinaḥ anupalambha vyāpāra virahe api tad kṛta vyāptim icchataḥ kaḥ pratiroddhā yadi hi asya vrīḍā syāt apratyakṣa yogyaḥ eva tat vyāpāram katham varṇayet atha upādāna ādi vidā prayatnavatā kāraṇa darśanāt eva gardabhasya nirāsaḥ kim atra anupalabdhyā 
JŚNĀ_289,1	 evam tarhi dṛśyamānena eva vyāptim upavarṇayan na ca darśana patha atikrāntena na ca śarīra upādhim vyavadhūya caitanya mātram upalabdham kvacid yadi ca darśana balāt eva vyavasthā caitanya mātra adhiṣṭhitam śarīram kumbha ādi janayat dṛṣṭam eva iti na gardabhena anvaya virodhaḥ tat katham anupalabdhi pratikṣepaḥ vyāpaka gatāḥ sāmānya dharmāḥ eva vyāptau sādhakāḥ itareṣām vyabhicāra darśanena anyatra śaṃkā avakāśāt eva na gardabhena anvayaḥ iti ced nanu vyabhicāra darśanam iti tad abhāve api bhāva darśanam iti anupalabdhi vyāpāra abhāve a sādhana tvam upanīyamānam anupalabdheḥ eva sādhana aṅga niścaye vyāpāram paridīpayati 
JŚNĀ_289,2	 yadi ca viśeṣe vyāpāra śaṃkā ākulaḥ sāmānyam anusarati bhavān upādāna ādi abhijñam api viśeṣam apahāya caitanya mātreṇa gardabha sādhāraṇena siddha sādhana yogyena tatas api vā sāmānyena kāraṇa mātreṇa vyāptim abhidhattām evam hi sati sarvathā dūrīkṛtaḥ śaṃkā vakāśaḥ syāt iti etāvat tu sāmānyam avamanye upādāna ādi abhijña viśeṣe sthitiḥ na tu tat api avajñāya yathādṛṣṭaḥ iti kim atra sāmarthyam anyatra jāḍyāt pratyakṣa anupalambha vādinaḥ tu yāvati yādṛśi sāmānye pratyakṣa anupalambha vyāpāraḥ na tatra śaṃkā śaṃkāvakāśini ca na vyāpāraḥ iti na asau kvacana svayam icchayā vyāptim upanayati apanayati vā pramāṇena eva samarpaṇāt iti na doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_289,3	 nanu saḥ api hetu mātra kṛtam vā kārya grāmam bruvan pratyakṣa yogye api pratyakṣa vyāpāra upalambham kim na paśyati paśyati eva viparyaya bādhakāt āgamāt ca tasya tadā abhyupagamāt pratyakṣa anupalambham tu śarīra viśeṣa adhikaḥ eva cetasi sa pramāṇayati icchāyām api kara ādi vyāpāra uparame kārya abhāvāt tad dvāreṇa eva kulāla ādi vyapadeśa viṣayasya samudāyasya pratyakṣa tva vyavahārāt na tu iyam gatiḥ prayatna saciva citta mātre tadā api anumānāt anvayaḥ pratyeṣyate na ca pratyakṣasya eva kaścid anurodhaḥ upalambha anupalambhābhyām anvaya vyatireka niścayaḥ kartavyaḥ sa ca upalambhaḥ pratyakṣa rūpaḥ anumāna rūpaḥ vā iti na atra nirbandhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_289,4	 atra cintyate kim tat eva śarīra upādhikam cittam prayatna vat citta mātra śabdena abhimatam uta anyat tattve kim anumānena pratyakṣa siddhau vivāda abhāvāt tena ca anvaya vyatirekau siddhau kārya mātreṇa ca tat vyabhicāraḥ vyaktaḥ anya tve liṅga abhāva doṣaḥ bhāṣaṇa ādeḥ kāryasya śarīriṇā eva caritārtha tvāt na ca tena anumitena api vyāptiḥ svīkriyate vyatireka aniścayāt pūrvavat evam tarhi barhiṣā api dhūmasya vyāptiḥ na deśa kāla avasthā niyatena kim tu vahni mātreṇa tat ca dṛśyamānāt anyena eva iti vikalpe vyabhicāra ādi doṣaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ iti tādugviśeṣa virahiṇā sāmānyena vyāptiḥ vaktavyā 
JŚNĀ_290,1	 tathā iha api iti ced evam api jāṭhara ādi gatena api rūpeṇa vyāpti prasaṅgaḥ dhūmasya tasmāt na sāmānyam iti eva vyāptau= adhikriyate na api viśeṣaḥ iti eva pratikṣipyate dhūma anumānasya eva ucchedāt abhimate śikhani pravṛtti sandehāt tatas yadi na sva icchā eva saṃgraha pariccheda sādhanī tadā pramāṇa vyāpāram anviṣya vyavasthā prakrame kiñcid sāmānyam svīkāra pravṛttena api pratyakṣeṇa pratikṣiptam artha ādeṣitavyam yat viśeṣa atikrameṇa na asya avatāraḥ yathā jvalat bhāsuḥ ākāra pātikrame dhūma vyāpti grāhiṇaḥ kiñcid tu pratyakṣa svīkṛtam api anupalabdhiḥ pratikṣipati pīṭhara ādi vat sāmarthyāt 
JŚNĀ_290,2	 sā hi dahana abhāve kārya abhimata abhāvam sādhayantī dahana bhāva prayukta tad bhāva vibhāvanāt ayoga vyavacchedena tad kāryatā sādhana pravṛttā api anyasya hetu tām sādhayati eva yad abhāve svayam na vartate anupalambha pūrvake tu pratyakṣe prāgbhāva ādi bādhana pravṛttayā anupalabdhyā aneka vastu rūpa sattva abhāve a bhāva siddhau yat eka vastu svabhāva sannidhau sannidhiḥ adhyakṣeṇa pratīyate prāk api tad abhāva prayukta abhāva vibhāvanāt tad hetu bhāva sādhane yat apravṛtti yogya tayā pratikṣiptam adhyakṣeṇa tat pratikṣiptam eva 
JŚNĀ_290,3	 tatas na jāṭhara ādeḥ anvayaḥ na api kāla daśā bheda bhinna svabhāva pratikṣepaḥ sarvasya pratyakṣeṇa sva janma yogya tayā svīkārāt na api anupalabdhyā sā hi atādṛś svabhāva abhāve abhavantī tad vijātīya hetu tām pratikṣipati iti yuktam na tu tasya eva anyathā tad āśrayaṇa vaiyarthyāt nanu deśa ādi bhinna svabhāva abhāve api ayam dhūmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na deśa ādi bhinnasya api eka ākāra pratyavamarśa pratyayena paridṛśyamāna rūpeṇa saha ekīkaraṇāt darśana ayogya svabhāvāt anyatra ataeva vahni mātra śabda abhidheyam tat eva paridṛśyamāna yogyāt bheda ākṛṣṭau= api abheda avabhāsāt 
JŚNĀ_290,4	 nanu deśa ādi viprakṛṣṭam api adarśana yogyam eva satyam kevalam kadācid kvacid svabhāva viprakṛṣṭam tu sadā iti atyanta vijātīya tayā svīkāra parihārayoḥ bhedena vṛttiḥ na virudhyate tatas yathā anumāna vādinā sāmānyam anusaraṇīyam avyāptim asaṃbhavam vā parihartu tathā dṛśya viśeṣa apekṣayā atirikta sāmānyam api parihartavyam ati vyāpti parihārāya evam sati yathā darśana ayogya vahni sāmānya parihāreṇa tad yogya avāntara sāmānyena vyāptiḥ ekatva vyavasthā ca yuktāḥ na prayatna vat mātreṇa pratyakṣa pratikṣipta tvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_291,1	 tatra vyāmohāt pramāṇa antareṇa anvayam icchan tattva anya tvābhyām paryanuyujyate dahane tu tad pakṣeṇa eva samādhiḥ iti uktam tasmāt pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām vyāpti jighṛkṣāyām tad yogya sāmānya apekṣāyāḥ ghaṭa viṭapa ādau dṛṣṭāntaḥ iṣṭasya siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ ca iti sādhāraṇa anaikāntika tvam kāryasya caitanya mātreṇa tu tad ayogyena anvaya vyatirekayoḥ ekasya api aniścayāt sandigdha anvaya vyatireka tvam vaktum yuktam uktam saṃśayaḥ athavā iti siddhi asiddhyoḥ iti prakaraṇāt tābhyām ca bhāva abhāvau= uktau yathā āha upalabdhiḥ eva sattā anupalabdhiḥ asat tā iti tatas kāryatva ādi sādhanavati dharmiṇi dṛṣṭānte sādhya tvena iṣṭasya prayatna vat mātreṇa sattva asattva sandehāt tad adhiṣṭhāna an adhiṣṭhānābhyām ca sarva saṃgrahāt ekatā anvaya vyatireka anupapatteḥ yuktam asādhāraṇa anaikāntika tvam 
JŚNĀ_291,2–291,3	 nanu tathā api anekāntaḥ api astu anvaya mātram kim iti pratikṣipyate kārya utpattau buddheḥ eva vyāpāra darśanāt jāṭha rasa ādhāraṇena api rūpeṇa tarhi dhūme anvaya prasaṅgaḥ dahana vyāpāra darśanāt tatas ca tad apekṣaḥ vyatirekaḥ api syāt iti prācīna doṣaḥ pratyakṣa pratikṣepaḥ tu sādhāraṇaḥ nanu jāṭhara ādi abhāve api dhūma bhāvāt na prācīna doṣaḥ sati api anvayaḥ iti ced kailāsa karaṇa kauśala vikalena api kalasasya karaṇam kim na kīrttyate atha karaṇa kauśala sāmānyena anvayaḥ atra tatra api dāhaka mātreṇa iti na vyakti upakṣepeṇa kiñcid jāti apekṣayā tu tadā anyadāpi iti katham tad abhāve api dhūma bhāvaḥ atha dāhaka tva mātram paridṛṣṭa viśeṣāt bhinnām jātim āsthāya vyabhicāraḥ ucyate tadā tad apekṣayā anvayaḥ api kutas pratyakṣeṇa viśiṣṭāyāḥ eva jāteḥ adhigamāt anvaye vā punar vyabhicāra anupapatteḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_291,4	 yat punar sajātīyena pratyakṣatas pratibandha niścayam āśaṃkya na hi sarvatra samāna jātiḥ anumīyate pratyakṣaḥ ca yasmāt asamāna jātiḥ apratyakṣaḥ ca rūpa ādi vyaktibhiḥ anumīyate cakṣuḥ ādi grāmaḥ tathā candramasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ca para bhāga adhobhāgau= iti uktam tat api pāpīyaḥ tathā hi na tāvat vyāpti śūnyam anumānam vyāptiḥ ca sāmānyena sāmānyasya bhavantī katham asamāna anumānam anu saheta tathā ca sā dvidhā eva pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ viparyaya bādhakāt vā ubhayathā api dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa sajātīyasya eva anumānam anyathā anya jātīyena dharmeṇa vyāptim upādāya anyajātīyam anuminoti iti mahatī prekṣā 
JŚNĀ_292,1	 sāmānyatas dṛṣṭa anumāne api hi yat eva gati sāmānyam anya sthāna prāpti nibandhanam upalabdham tat eva adhikaraṇa antare niścīyate iti katham vijātīya dharma anumānam atha ādhāra bheda apekṣayā sāmarthī a sādhyam avāntara bhedam abhipretya ucyate tad anukta samam na hi kaścid anumāna vādaḥ tanmātreṇa viśeṣam anicchan phalinam anumānam samarthayitum īśaḥ yadi ca īśvara anumāne api tādṛśaḥ vyāptiḥ syāt tanmātra viśeṣa siddhyā ca iṣṭa siddhiḥ syāt kaḥ tatra matsaram ācaret na ca tanmātra viśeṣa apekṣayā na hi sarvatra samāna jātiḥ anumīyate iti vaktum yuktam kvacid asamāna jāti anumāne api tathā ucyate tanmātra viśeṣaḥ ca sarvatra anumāne asti viśeṣataḥ dṛṣṭasya sāmānye api tat eva niścīyate iti tad apekṣayā na sarvatra tat eva anumīyate iti vaktavyam bheda adhiṣṭhāna tvāt samāna jāti cintāyāḥ 
JŚNĀ_292,2	 tat punar aprakṛtam eva sa tu na sarvaḥ pratyakṣaḥ anumīyate iti yadi prakṛtam agni vat pratibandha grahe pramāṇam adhikṛtya ucyate tadā pratyakṣasya eva sarvatra anumānam anyatra apadiṣṭa pramāṇa pravṛtteḥ atha viparyaya bādhaka apekṣayā tadā na vaktavyam na kaścid viśeṣaḥ agni sādhanāt īśvara anumānasya iti anitya sādhanāt iti tu vaktum ucitam atha kārya hetu tā mātreṇa evam ucyate tadā kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ eva iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ na ca viparyaya bādhakam kiñcid asti iti carcitam eva deśa ādi aniyama prasaṅgaḥ ca hetu mātrāpattim sādhayati api tasmāt prakṛta prameyān avagāhanāt plavate etat na sarvaḥ pratyakṣaḥ anumīyate iti 
JŚNĀ_292,3	 anumāna kāla apekṣayā tu sarvaḥ parokṣaḥ eva anumīyate na ca tatra kācid vimatiḥ iti anukta samam indriyam tu na sākṣāt buddheḥ anumātum śakyam pratibandha agrahaṇāt buddhi kāryam tu keṣucid sat svabhāva abhāvavat tad atirikta kāraṇa sā apekṣa tām āvahati iti tādṛśī indriya ghoṣaṇā tatra aṅkura ādiṣu dṛṣṭa jātīyam eva sa apekṣa tvam yathā sādhyate tathā para bhāga adhobhāgau= api ghaṭa ādi kāryeṣu arvāga eka sāmagrī pratibaddhau sāmānyatas dṛṣṭau= eva anumīyete iti sādhya śūnyam udāharaṇam api iti alam bahunā athavā kāraṇa sāmānyena kārya sāmānyam vyāpyate kāraṇa viśeṣeṇa tu kārya viśeṣaḥ eva iti nyāyaḥ adhyavasāya mātrataḥ vā kāraṇa sāmānyena kārya viśeṣaḥ iti pravādaḥ tatra ayam kāraṇa viśeṣeṇa buddhimatā kārya sāmānyam vyāptam itibruvāṇaḥ pramāṇa a= aṣṭambhena nāma prasiddhim ullaṅghayet 
JŚNĀ_293,1–293,2	 tat ca pramāṇam vyāpti sādhakam dvividham eva pratyakṣa anupalambham vā viparyaya bādhakam vā anayoḥ pratyakṣa anumāna svabhāva tvāt anyatas niścaya ayogāt tatra tāvat ukta krameṇa kārya sāmānyasya naḥ bhedena vipakṣa bādhaka vaśāt vyāptiḥ samastasya ca pratyakṣa anupalambhataḥ na tat atad jātīya bheda spṛśaḥ prāgbhāva ādi niṣedha pūrvaka tayā dhūma ādi vat janmadhī ranveti īdṛśam īdṛśāt iti yatas sāmānya bheda dvayam 
JŚNĀ_293,3	 idam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam anupalabdham asya upalambhe upalabhyate iti evam hi pratyakṣa anupalambhayoḥ vyāpti grahaṇa kramaḥ tatra idam iti eka jātīya tayā eka pratyavamarśa pratibhā asi dhūma ādikam aneka kārya jāti antara vyudāsena aneka kāraṇa jāti antara vyudāsena ca asya iti vahni ādeḥ iti arthaḥ tatas kārya kāraṇayoḥ pratyekam tad jātīya itarayoḥ itareta rataḥ bhede parāmarśa pūrvikā pravṛttiḥ anyathā sāmarthya vaiyarthyābhyām anupayogāt 
JŚNĀ_293,4	 tathā hi akārya rāśi vyavacchedena vā kārya antara vyavacchedena vā idam etat bhāva abhāva anuvidhāyi iti avadhāryeta ādye pakṣe etāni vastuni etat niyatāni iti ayam arthaḥ na etat vastu iti eka ākāra virahāt eka ākāra pratyavamarśa anupapatteḥ nanu kāryatva ādinā sāmānyena idam iti kāryam sanniveśaḥ vā ityādi vaktum śakteḥ asiddham etat iti ced ucyate iha bhāva abhāva vidhāna buddhiḥ dvidhā saṃbhavati dharmi viṣayā dharma viṣayā ca kāryasya nirvartti avikārya bhedena dvaividhyāt tatra ādyā sarva ātmanā utpatti niścayam upādāya dharmiṇam eva viśiṣṭa ākāra kroḍīkṛtam kāla deśa ādi bheda bhinnam api svabhāvam antar bhāvya eka pratyavamarśāt viṣayīkaroti iti tat viṣaya iti ucyate sa hi saṃbhavinam api atad ākāra bheda virodhinam dharmam udāsayati dhūma ādiṣu dhava latā ādi vat 
JŚNĀ_293,5	 yatra punar avasthitasya eva dharmiṇaḥ dharma antaram udayam āsādayati tatra dharma mātrasya eva hetubhiḥ anvaya vyatirekau= iti dharma viṣaya iti ucyate sā punar ākāram eva udāsayantī dharma mātram adhiṣṭhānīkaroti rāga ādi vat na hi ākāra kriyā ādi vaijātyam atyantam anubhavantaḥ paṭakūṭa ādayaḥ sādhāraṇa rāga yoginaḥ gṛhīta sāmarthya rāga dravya antara yogam anumāpya tṛpyanti prathamā tu ākāra śaraṇā eva sarva ātmanā utpatteḥ yathā eva hi viśiṣṭa ākāra uparaktam vastu kutaścid upajāyate tathā eva tad vala utpannena indri jñānena anubhūya anantaram vikalpa dvāreṇa vyavahāra gocarīkriyate iti katham ākāra parihāraḥ ataeva dhūma kumbha ādi vyaktiḥ ekatra anupalabhya prabhavāḥ upalabhamānasya anyatra tadā eva yat yukti bhedena vyāpti siddhiḥ tatra eva tad kāraṇa avasāyaḥ jāyate na anyatra vyabhicāra darśana adarśanam apekṣya api anantaram tu ākāram udāsayet kevalam vyavasthite dharmiṇi dharma mātra udaya darśinaḥ 
JŚNĀ_294,1	 na ca vyavasthite kumbha ādau kāryatva ādi dharma mātra utpattiḥ īkṣyate kṣitidhara ādau vā abhyupeyate yena ākāram anādṛtya rāgavat tanmātram eva hetum anumāpayet sanniveśaḥ tarhi sthitaḥ eva tad ātmani kumbhakārāt iti ced na drāk api saṃsthāna vinākṛtāyāḥ mṛdaḥ anupalabdheḥ atha tādṛśasya abhāvaḥ eva pūrva yaḥ kumbha prajñapti gocaraḥ iti ced tat eva saṃsthānam tarhi puruṣāt iti na tāvat mātra vyāptiḥ 
JŚNĀ_294,2–294,4	 tathā api yadi saṃsthāna sāmānye puruṣa kriyā haridrā dravya yogaḥ api varṇa mātra vidhāyakaḥ nanu tathā api na pūrva siddha darśanam iti eva vyakti antare gṛhyamāṇāyāḥ vyāpteḥ vyāghātaḥ tad valāt tu anumānam eva tatra iti anantaram eva samarthitam na ca tāvatā varṇa mātram kusumbha saṃbhava sādhana sādhu vyabhicāra ālambanam tu durbalam iti kim atra prāptam guṇe api dravya vat tasmāt sajātīya parigrahaḥ tat pūrva siddhe api anumā na varṇāt kuṅkumasya ca 
JŚNĀ_294,5	 tad niyata viśeṣa aparigrahe hi rāgāt api kutas kuṅkuma anumā davīyasī tu varṇa mātrāt varṇa vat ca saṃsthānasya api vicitram eva vaijātyam anubhava viṣayaḥ tad anayoḥ ekatra jāti niyamena vyāpti vyavasthānam aniyamena vā vyaktau vyabhicāraḥ na eka niyataḥ tasmāt varṇa vat aneka jātini saṃsthāne api tattvam sāmānyam anuvartamānam api vyāpti grahāt bahis bhūtam eva evam artha kriyā api pūrvam asati vastuni puruṣāt iti vaktum aśakyam sarva sāmarthya virahiṇaḥ prāc abhāva prasaṅgena apūrva utpatti prāpteḥ iti viśiṣṭe vā artha kriyā api puruṣa anvaya vyatirekā anuvidhāyinī iti siddham 
JŚNĀ_294,6	 tasmāt evaṃvidhā dharma viṣayā api vyāpti buddhiḥ na sāmānyam anudhāvati yadā tu kārya hetu adhikāreṇa dharmi viṣaya eva tadā yathā paridṛṣṭa ākāra artha kriyā sāmānyam samāśritya yathā kāraṇe pratiniyata svarūpa sāmānyena vyāpaka tva avasāyinī tathā kārye api pratiniyata ākāra sāmānya puraskāreṇa eva vyāpya tva avasāyinī samakṣa buddhiḥ iti na sandehaḥ anyathā kārya vat kāraṇe api buddhi mat ādi viśeṣa vyudāsena pravṛttimatī matiḥ kim abhimatam upanayet tasmāt kāraṇa vat kārye api tathābhūta ākāra viśeṣam evam ayam avasātum arhati 
JŚNĀ_295,1	 tatra idānīm tad ākāra bahis bhūteṣu bhū tala ādiṣu sat api kāryatvam abhidhīyamānam anupayuktam eva dharma viṣaya hetu phala grāhi pratyakṣa vyāpāra apekṣayā dharma mātra sāmyasya akiñcitkara tvāt na hi tat eva ākāra artha kriyā ādi rūpam tat sāmya unmīlana hetuḥ vā tat anena sāmyam na kiñcid artha puṣṇāti agauṇakārya śabda pravṛtteḥ anyatra sa hi saṅkalpa niveśinī udaya artham apekṣita para vyāpāra mātre arthe akāra ādika mudā asya kṛta samayaḥ iti na tasya vyāghātaḥ upapatti antareṇa vyāpaka tayā yaḥ pratītaḥ dharmaḥ tatra eva nāśa vat pratyakṣa vyāpāraḥ eva tu sva udaya samaya parisphurat ākāra ādi sādṛśyam apekṣate deśa ādi kṛta bhede tu vaisadṛśya avasāyaḥ iti na virodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_295,2	 tasmāt eka kāraṇa virahāt pratyekam pratyakṣa anupalambha apekṣāyām etāni vastūni etad kāraṇa anugāmīni iti anena eva ākāreṇa vyāpti niścayaḥ kāryaḥ kevalam adya api na vyakti kārtsnyena upayogaḥ iti sarva kārya prakāreṣu ekaika viṣayaḥ avatiṣṭhate sa ca aśakyaḥ krama yaugapadyābhyām ayogāt tathā hi na tāvat sakṛt eva teṣām anvayaḥ sarva prakāra upanipāte darśanasya draṣṭuḥ eva antardhāna prāpteḥ vyatirekaḥ vā śakya niścayaḥ aśakya parihāra tvāt keṣāñcid ādhāra āloka śarīra ādīnām na api ekena nara āyuṣā kṣamam idam sarva prakāra īkṣaṇaṃkāryasya anta viyogataḥ katipaya apekṣāsu kārtsnyam kutas na khalu bhūyasaḥ api bhāgasya abhividhi bodhe nirvṛttiḥ na hi tat api yat yat kāryam tat tat evam iti śakyam abhidhātum etāvat iti tu syāt 
JŚNĀ_295,3	 yat punar ekatra pravṛttaḥ vicāraḥ sarva bhāvān= tathā abhāve vyavasthāpayati iti ucyate tad sādhāraṇa ākāra pravṛttim adhikṛtya ākṛtyādi vyudāsena pramāṇa antara avalambanāt pratyakṣa vyāpāraḥ eva hi eka jāti graha niyamaḥ uktaḥ nanu tatra api avāntara aneka bheda saṃbhavāt ayam evam iti abhidhātum aśakteḥ anāśvāsaḥ atra vā bheda tiraskāreṇa dhūma ādi jāti antaram avalambya saṃvyavahāre kārya tām āśritya jāti antareṣu api kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced na vayam sva icchayā kañcid bhedam tiraskurmaḥ puraskurmaḥ vā kām api jātim adhyakṣa pūrvakaḥ tu saṃkalpaḥ yathā arthān upasthāpayati bhedena abhedena vā tathā hetu phala bhāva vyavahāram avatarāmaḥ sa tu prakṛti viśeṣam āsādya yadi sūkṣma sthūla bhāvena bhedeṣu abhibhūti sāmarthyā sāmarthyābhyām bhinatti vṛttim kim atra kaiścid kartavyam tad vivartaḥ tu cintyaḥ tatra 
JŚNĀ_296,1–296,5	 dhūmaḥ avāntara bhedavatī api yathā jāti antara apohitaṃsā rūpyam viṣayīkaroti hṛdayam kim kārya mātre tathā eka saṃsthāna ādi anugamān anugamayoḥ pratyātma vedya tvāt na aparam atra prārthyate nirṇaya nibandhanam anyathā ca vyapadeśa artha kriyā viniyoga ādi saṃkara prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt na kvacid kāraṇe sarva kārya prakāraṇām krameṇa yaugapadyena vā adhyakṣa anupalambha saṃbhavā vyāptiḥ upapādayitum śakyā iti kim ābhyām atas evaṃmukhena sarva kārya vyāpti vādinaḥ sva abhiprāya nivedana mātram etat vartmani sthāṇu upadeśa ghoṣaṇa vat tathā ca sati icchā mātram sādhanam astu iti sphuṭam anayoḥ apārthaka tvam tasmāt ābhyām atas idam iti matiḥ kārya antara vyavacchedena eva bhavantī na kārya mātra gocarīkaraṇa saṃvādam āsādayati tatas niścayam upādāna ādi vidaḥ apanudan= āha saṃśayaḥ athavā iti pareṣṭa siddhiḥ na parasya bādhane prasādhane vedana yatna mātrayoḥ ananvayaḥ abhīṣṭa viśeṣa sādhane vipakṣa sandeha saham tu sādhanam sādhye ca dṛśye vyabhicāraḥ eva dṛśyam na ced na vyatireka siddhiḥ na ca anvayaḥ api vyatireka vat vā vyāptiḥ viśeṣeṇa na ca itarasya 
JŚNĀ_297,1–297,3	 evam sati sati api vyāptiḥ aśakya niścayā saṃbhāvyate iti kim atra sāmpratam iti ced paśya kāryam tāvat aneka jāti janakaḥ ca ekaḥ jaḍaḥ vīkṣate nānā bhedavataḥ na ca eka niyama jñāne anya bhede api tat yat yat jātikam eka hetu viditam tat tat tad aṅgam tatas na evam ced ati sañjanam na ca mataḥ sādhya upame ayat = ayaḥ na hi nānā prakāra kārya jananam nāma prayatnavati ā iva niyatam vahni ādeḥ api vividha sāmagrī madhyam adhyāsīnasya dhūma bhasma aṅgāra aṅga tāpa pāka pārada utsāraṇa vīkṣaṇa kṣati prabhṛti vicitra kārya kriyā darśanāt yadi param prayatnavataḥ adhiṣṭhānena iti atra vivādaḥ na ca ekasya tatra niyame jñāte kārya antare api niyama jñānam upapadyate yathā uktam prāk tatas yāvantaḥ prakārāḥ eka hetavaḥ niścitāḥ tāvantaḥ tasya hetoḥ cetanasya itarasya vā sādhanam yujyante anyathā stimita indhana sakhena śikhinā gṛhīta dhūma vyāptiḥ aparicita tad kārya bhāvaiḥ bhasma ādibhiḥ api dahanam anuminuyāt na ca evam tasmāt tad jāti bhedaḥ vyaktaḥ vyāpti grahaḥ ca pṛthak pṛthak apekṣyamāṇaḥ yatra kvacid tad grahaṇena yena kenacid anumānam unmūlayati 
JŚNĀ_297,4	 kaḥ punar evam āha yatra kvacid gṛhīta vyāptiḥ yena kenacid anumimītām iti eka dharma anuvṛtti virahe hetoḥ eva abhāvāt na hi tadā bhasma sādhanam avyāpteḥ na api dhūmaḥ asiddheḥ kuṭakūṭa ādau kārya tvam eva anya dharmān anuvṛttau= api anumāne vartamānam hetuḥ syāt iti ced na kāryatvasya api prāk avyāpteḥ vistareṇa sādhanāt tatra yathā kulagiriḥ kulāla vyāpāra kāle svabhāva vaikalya ādi kalita niyamaḥ tathā sat api kārya tvam prāmāṇya pravṛttyā dhūma janmani iva rāsabhaḥ iti pramāṇena vyāpti graha virahe na kaścid viśeṣaḥ tat ayam ghaṭa ādau kārya viśeṣe gṛhīta vyāptiḥ sarvatas na kārya tā mātreṇa vā vyāpaka m anumātu na tu vyāpti grahaṇa sādhana vyavasthayoḥ bhinna adhikaraṇa tām atikrāmati iti katham ati prasaṅga upālambha parihāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_297,5	 tasmāt na eka dharma anuvṛtti mātreṇa upayogaḥ kena vā dhūma saṃbhavinaḥ kāryatva vastu tva ādayaḥ bhasmani bhasmasāt eva kṛtāḥ santaḥ api vyabhicāriṇaḥ iti ced nanu savyabhicāraḥ vyāpti viyogāt eva vyāptau tad gandhasya abhāvāt sa ca vyāpti abhāvaḥ kāryatvena api avarjitaḥ iti tatra api vyabhicāraḥ durnivāraḥ āhatya adarśanam tu viprakarṣāt api syāt na tāvatā tad abhāvaḥ eva tad mūla bhūtāyāḥ avyāpteḥ tādavasthyāt yadi tu vyāptau= eva savyabhicāraḥ tadā nitarām avyāptau= iti alam mithyā abhiniveśena tat yadi api sādhāraṇa dharmā tanmātram vyāptim anādṛtya sādhanam iṣyate kim na bhinnaḥ evam bhūdhara ādi sādhāraṇam dharmam anādṛtya iti atiprasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_298,1	 na api ayam nayaḥ sādhya samānīkṛte kalasa ādau= api asti tatra api yathā yathā pratisara śara ābaḥ dañcana ādiṣu kumbhakāra kṛtim upalabhāmahe tathā tathā evam api idam api anena sṛjyate iti pratiyantaḥ paricita kriyebhyaḥ eva prakārebhyaḥ tad vyāpāram avadhārayāmaḥ anyathā tad doṣān ativṛttiḥ tasmāt yadi paramārthataḥ prayatna vat na antarīyakaḥ eva ayam sakala prakāraḥ kārya grāmaḥ tathā api svayam akiñcitkaraḥ iti pramāṇa vṛtti apekṣayā siddham yādṛś adhiṣṭhātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛttimat sanniveśa ādi tat yuktam tasmāt yat anumīyate iti yat dṛṣṭeḥ akriyā darśinaḥ api kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati śūnya nagara paridṛṣṭa deva kula ādi vat sanniveśa ādi tādṛś eva yadīkṣyeta tad naga ādiṣu dharmiṣu yuktam tad sādhanāt asmāt yathā abhīṣṭasya sādhanam tat ca asiddham iti ākūtam 
JŚNĀ_298,2	 nanu bhavati eva asmākam sarvatra pauruṣeya buddhiḥ kṛta buddhiḥ sā sādhya buddhiḥ eva anumānam iti niyamaḥ kathañcid kasyacid tatra api abhāvāt kim ca kṛtabuddhiḥ iti kārya mātra buddhiḥ vā puruṣa mātra buddhiḥ vā yadi kṛta mātra buddhiḥ sā bauddhasya api siddhā sindhu bhūdhara ādiṣu sa avayava tvāt ca tad ārambha saṃbhavi tvam eva kṛta tvam atha pauruṣeya buddhiḥ kṛta buddhiḥ sā sādhya buddhiḥ eva anumānam iti ca ucyate tatas tad abhāvāt na anumānam iti katham ucyamānam na upaplavate 
JŚNĀ_298,3	 yat āha na ca vyāmohāt kasyacid sādhya buddhi abhāve hetoḥ asiddha tā doṣaḥ sarva anumāneṣu tad bhāva prasaṅgāt iti yat api idam ucyate tādṛś kārya tva ādi niṣiddham acala ādiṣu iti tatra api na kāryatva ādinā kailāsa kalasa ādeḥ kiñcid viśeṣam upalabhāmahe āha ca na api kaścid viśeṣaḥ kṣiti ādi hetūnām prāsāda ādi hetubhyaḥ yena amī nirabhiprāyāḥ santaḥ prayatna nirapekṣāḥ pratiniyamavatā ca vyāpāreṇa tadvantaḥ syuḥ na hi anadhiṣṭhitānām prayatnavatā karaṇa dharmāṇām kriyāsu svātantryam upalabdhi pūrvam sarvatra buddhimat adhiṣṭhiteṣu eva prāsāda ādi prasava upalabdheḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_299,1	 atra ucyate na iyam kṛta buddhiḥ siddhānta abhiniveśa vāsita buddhīn adhikṛtya kīrtitā kim tu saṃvyavahāra pragalbha puruṣa mātra apekṣayā tasya ca pūrva pratīta pratibandha smaraṇavataḥ kāraṇa parāmarśa vaimukhyā bhāve bhavati eva devakula ādau tādṛśī buddhiḥ na tu malaya makara ālaya ādau tad anayoḥ asyāḥ dhiyaḥ bhāva abhāvau na jāti bhedam avyavasthāpya sthātum prabhavataḥ dhūma dvaya darśane api tathā abhāva prasaṅgāt iyam ca kāmam sādhya buddhiḥ eva kaḥ punar enām etat vataḥ anumāna nibandhanam āha tad abhāvāt vā bhūdhara ādau tad abhāvam kim tu jāti bheda mātra upalakṣaṇa artham asyāḥ bhāva abhāva upanyāsaḥ samāna jana apekṣayā kasyacid durvidagdha buddheḥ pratibodha sādhanāya jāti bhede hi tāvati siddhe na ekatra pravṛtta madhyakṣa anupalambham anyatra pratibandha sādhana samartham iti vaktum samarthaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_299,2	 tatas na apratibaddhāt sanniveśa ādeḥ sādhya siddhiḥ pratibaddhaḥ ca asiddhaḥ iti katham anumānam iti antataḥ anumāna niṣedhāya upanyāse api na ekasya eva tad abhāvāt tad abhāvaḥ iti uktam bhavati nanu tathā api anyasya anumāna udaya abhāvāt anyasya api na bhavitavyam iti uktam bhavati tat ca katham saṅgatim ālambeta uktam hi na ca vyāmohāt ityādi tat ayuktam samāna sādhana sāmagrī saṃbhave sādhyasya eka pratiniyama anupapatteḥ yat yena viśiṣṭa sāmagrīkam tat tena aviśiṣṭa phalam eva yathā sādhāraṇa dhūma sādhana indhana dahana ādi samudāyam pradeśa dvayam anyonyam aviśiṣṭa anumāna sādhana pratibandha grahaṇa ādi sāmagrīkaḥ ca bhavatā saha sāṃvyavahārikaḥ puruṣaḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ prasaṅgaḥ bhavataḥ api hi pratyakṣa anupalambham eva pramāṇam pratibandha sādhanam devakula sūtra dhārā ādi adhikāreṇa pravṛttam etat ca parasya api sādhāraṇam asādhāraṇam tu viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇam eva durabhyūha tayā bhavet tat ca bhavataḥ api na asti iti prāk prakāśitam 
JŚNĀ_299,3	 tat yadi sva mata abhiniveśa mātram anubhavataḥ na āvṛṇoti cetaḥ kim tu tat eva sādhanam ita rasādhāraṇam tadā tasya api śūnya nagara paridṛṣṭa devakula ādi vat meru mandara ādau= api pauruṣeya anumānam anivāryam na ca evam tatas yasya yat pratibandha grāhaka pramāṇa vyāpāre yathāvat smaraṇavataḥ yad darśanāt na tad anumānam na tasya tatra pratibandhaḥ siddhaḥ yathā agnau dhūma pratibandhasya anusmarataḥ gardabha darśanāt agnim ananuminvataḥ na bhavati ca cetanena devakula ādi pratibandha smṛtimataḥ malaya himālaya ādau puruṣa anumānam iti kārya anupalabdhiḥ smaraṇa kāraṇa anusaraṇa vaimukhya ādi pratyaya antara saṃbhave prācīna pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇena viṣayīkaraṇa vaikalyam sādhayati tat ca na jāti bheda atiśayam antareṇa avāntara bhedavataḥ api dhūmāt gardabha vat 
JŚNĀ_300,1	 vyāpti grahaṇa smaraṇayoḥ aparādhe tu na iyam iṣṭa siddhiḥ tad artham yathāvat grahaṇam tatra smaraṇa aparādhe devakula antarāt api na anumimīta grahaṇa aparādhaḥ api pratyakṣa apekṣayā asaṃbhavī eka pratyavamarśa yogya tāyāḥ eva abhāvāt iti ukteḥ anyathā jaladhara ādi arthinaḥ api kumbhakāra sūtra dhārā ādīn apekṣeran apekṣate eva tatra api sūtra dhāra sthānīyaḥ anyaḥ yathā kumbhakāra sthānīyaḥ kvacid sūtradhāraḥ iti ced na kārya jāti vaisadṛśya abhāve kāraṇa sāmarthya vaisadṛśya apekṣā anupapatteḥ anyathā kumbha antare api na kulāla mātreṇa toṣam aśnuvota tadvat vā kṛṣīvalaḥ kulāla pauruṣa apaneyānāvṛṣṭi kaṣṭaḥ syāt iti siddhaḥ eva tādṛśaḥ jāti bhedaḥ tasmāt eka ākāra pratyavamarśa anupapatteḥ adhyakṣa sādhyāḥ vyāptiḥ viśiṣṭa viṣaya tayā na durgraha doṣam āvahati yatas anumāna abhāve api jāti bheda atiśayasya asiddheḥ siddha sādhana doṣaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_300,2	 tatas ca yathāvat grahaṇa siddheḥ yatra na anumānam tatra vyāpteḥ eva agrahāt iti na anekāntaḥ katham punar anumāna hānam eva tādṛśi lokasya avagantavyam iti ced uktāt eva jaladhara arthinaḥ api kulāla jaṅghā mardana prasaṅgāt para cakra ākrānti kātarasya vā kula giri jala dhi vya vadhim abhilaṣataḥ cetana mātreṇa vyāptim pratīmaḥ na kumbhakāra ādi avasthā niyatena tena na ayam prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tad avasthā niyatena eva vyāpti grahe kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ iti kim atra vaktavyam na ca samaya apakṣāla kalāṅkita dhiyam bhavantam prati kācid cintā api tu lokam prati saḥ api vyabhicārāt na tena pratipadyate iti ced evam tarhi kalasa antarāt api na anumāna mayam kuryāt 
JŚNĀ_300,3	 anyatra eva vyabhicāra darśanāt atra kaḥ doṣaḥ iti ced tat etat jāti vaisadṛśye asati na labhyate tatas ca viśiṣṭāyām eva jātau vyāpti grāhi pratyakṣam pravṛttam atas na anyatra tad vyāpāra anumānam iti evam kim na ucyate kim atra vyabhicāra upakṣepeṇa avaśyam ca pratyakṣasya pratiniyata jāti vyavasāya eṣitavyaḥ anyathā vyabhicāra agocaram api pratyakṣam na niyata jātikam iti kalasa antaram api āskandet tathā ca sati saḥ eva doṣaḥ vyāpti grāhiṇā eva kalasa antarasya adhiṣṭhita tvāt iti ced nanu tad adhiṣṭhitaḥ eva viṣaye vyabhicāra cāri cetaḥ pracarat katham tam eva pariharet 
JŚNĀ_301,1	 ubhayoḥ niyata viṣaya tve tu na ayam doṣaḥ kevalam idānīm adhyakṣeṇa viśiṣṭa viṣaya svīkārāt na vyabhicāra upanyāsaḥ saphalaḥ vyāpti grāhiṇaḥ tu pramāṇasya viśiṣṭa viṣaya pravṛtti smaraṇa ādhāna artham upayujyate mūḍham prati na tu paritas visāriṇī vyāpti gṛhītiḥ asya niyata viṣayā kriyate vyabhicāreṇa na api anumāna khaṇḍana mātra mukta nyāyāt eva tasmāt viśiṣṭa viṣayā eva vyāptiḥ kumbhakāra ādinā gṛhyate vyabhicāra darśana adarśana apekṣya pratyakṣasya eka jāti apekṣayā eva pravṛtteḥ iti siddham 
JŚNĀ_301,2	 evam cetana mātreṇa api vyāpti jighṛkṣāyām vyabhicāraḥ darśana abhāvāt yat jātini vastuni pratyakṣa pravṛttiḥ tat eva tena vyāptam sidhyati iti api siddham tat katham sāmānyena vyāptim abhidadhānaḥ samaya anuvāda mātreṇa na upālambham arhati yadi tu puruṣa mātreṇa vyāptim jighṛkṣoradhyakṣa pratikṣepeṇa pramāṇa antaram śaraṇam tadā na eṣa doṣaḥ tat tu vicāritam yadi veśvara prasādāt asya vādinaḥ jagataḥ citra ākāra parihāreṇa sarvatra eka ākāram pratyakṣam udayam āsādayati tat ca asādhāraṇam iti na vyavahāra aṅgam sa śarīra aśarīrayoḥ prayatnavatoḥ na kaścid viśeṣaḥ karma dharma apekṣayā pratyakṣeṇa vyāpti grahaṇe yatas jaladhara arthinā kumbhakārān anusaraṇena tad kṛta anumāna viraha anumāne prakāra antareṇa api saṃbhāvanāyām jāti bheda eka nibandhana apratibandhāt siddha sādhanam punar api āsajyeta tatas jāti bheda kṛtaḥ tatra anumāna abhāvaḥ saṃsidhyan pratiniyata jāti pratibaddham anumānam upapādayati 
JŚNĀ_301,3	 viśiṣṭa jāti pratibaddha pauruṣeya anumāna asiddhau vā anubhava siddham api jāti bhedam śāṭhyāt apahnuvānaḥ para lokasya jāti bhedana āntarīyakeṇa tathā pravṛtti abhāva siddhena kulāla ādi kṛta tva anumāna abhāvena anyathā anumāna udayam prasajya jāti bhedam āpādyate yathā sthāṇu kākābhyām bhinnaḥ saṃyogaḥ nāma yadi syāt dṛśyaḥ lokaḥ api enam tṛtīyam īkṣeta iti ucyate tathā ca yadi yādṛśaḥ sanniveśaḥ buddhimat pūrvakaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tādṛś eva jaladhara ādau= api syāt lokasya api puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ syāt ghaṭa antara vat 
JŚNĀ_301,4	 na ca evam tat jāti bheda kṛtaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ anya nimitta abhāvāt iti uktam bhavati tatas kīdṛśam punar sanniveśa ādi adhiṣṭhātṛnāntarīyakam siddham iti apekṣāyām yad darśanāt a kriyā darśinaḥ api ityādi ucyate paryāya parikalita aneka prakāra parigaṇana gaurava parihāra artham tatra puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ iti prayatna vat anumānam vā kumbhakāra ādi vyāpāra anumānam vā iti ubhayasya api saṅgateḥ prāk ukta kramāt kevalam prayatna vat mātra niṣedha sādhana sāmagrīka tayā kulāla anumānābhāvaḥ eva liṅgam tat vid siddhaḥ vā vyāpti grahaṇa abhāvaḥ etat ca para icchām anupālya pallavitam 
JŚNĀ_302,1	 lokaḥ tu yathā darśana anusārī yad jātikam puruṣa pūrvakam paśyati tad tad tādṛśā tanumatā eva kṛtam avabudhyate na tu śarīra virati sandeham api ullikhati iti samāna mānava anumāna paryavasānā eva kṛta buddhiḥ avatiṣṭhate iti yadā api yadi kasyacid siddhi vaśāt āsurīm māyā alim ālocayataḥ acale api kaścid ullekhaḥ jāyate kena api kaiḥ api vā kaccit kṛtaḥ ayam api bhavet iti tadā api kena api kara caraṇa aṅga uparaktaḥ eva atyantam pratibhāti niścayaḥ tu su dūraḥ eva na ca eka jāti tve tat upapadyate dhūma kumbha ādeḥ iva anala kulāla ādeḥ na ca kara caraṇa ādi vyāpāra virahiṇaḥ ullekhaḥ api na ca tāvatā kṣaṇikā ādi vādinaḥ anumāna apalāpaḥ śakyate adhyakṣa pūrva vyāpti graha sahāyam tu jāti viśeṣa apekṣa vṛttikam anumānam ubhayoḥ api sādhāraṇa tvāt na saṃbhavati laukika parīkṣakayoḥ iti brūmaḥ 
JŚNĀ_302,2	 yadi api ca dvitīyam api laukikam eva tathā api kaścid viṣayaḥ anabhyasta tayā tīvratara abhyūha sāpekṣaḥ sūkṣma dhiyaḥ sāṃvyavahārikasya api saṃbhavati tatra pratyakṣa akṣama tve api vipakṣa bādhakena anumāna antareṇa loka pratītim eva āśritya gṛhītā vyāptiḥ anumānam prayojayet iti na kṣatiḥ yathā yatra artha āpatti ghoṣaṇā viśeṣaḥ lokasya tasmāt sādhya buddhi rūpā kṛta buddhiḥ bhāva abhāvābhyām jāti bhedam prasādhayati iti yuktam eva yadā api kṛta mātra buddhiḥ kṛta buddhiḥ tadā api na doṣaḥ tathā api kṛta tvam nāma sva janmani apekṣita para vyāpāra tvam tat ca na tāvat vṛkṣa ādi vat pratyakṣataḥ kṣitidhara ādiṣu siddham para abhyupagama mātra siddham tu svatantra sādhana adhikāre anaṅgam eva 
JŚNĀ_302,3	 tatas anumāna siddham āśrīyamāṇam dṛṣṭa sajātīyam yathā kathañcid vā āśrīyate antya pakṣe yadi anādi upādāna śakti saṃtanya māna kṣaṇa paramparā rūpam eva kārya tvam niyata deśa tayā vyavasthāpyamānam sidhyet tādṛśāt kīdṛśī puruṣa adhiṣṭhāna pratyāśā dṛṣṭa sajātīyam tu tad aṅgam ucitam cetana acetana adhiṣṭhāna kṛtam viśeṣam avadhūya vitata aneka kāraṇa kalā pamilana labhya udayam hi puruṣa vyāpāram ākarṣet api milanasya tad adhīna adhyavasāyāt acetana upādāna tva mātram api hi prācīna krameṇa caritārtham na prakṛtam viśeṣam ākarṣet etat eva tu kārya tvam loke viditam tat ca na acala ādau siddham iti katham asiddhi parihāraḥ kevalam na sākṣāt asiddhi sādhanam idam kim tu vijātīya tva sādhana artham na ca kāryatva mātram adhikṛtya kim tu sarvam 
JŚNĀ_303,1	 tat ayam arthaḥ kim tad adhiṣṭātṛ bhāva abhāva anuvṛtti sanniveśa ādi siddham yad darśanāt a kriyā darśinaḥ api lokasya kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati iti tatas yadi sa avayavā kṛta buddhiḥ api bhavataḥ bhavati tathā api lokasya na asti iti bhinna jātīya tvam vyavasthāpyate anyathā kumbhakāra ādinā api bhūdhara ādi vyāpyam pratīyāt loke iti pūrvavat prasaṅgaḥ tatas jāti bhedāt anyat eva pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām puruṣa kṛtam pratītam iti siddham 
JŚNĀ_303,2	 yat tu uktam kāryatve na kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti atra sarva sādhāraṇa dharma tve api kāryatvasya yadi pratyakṣa sādhanā vyāptiḥ abhimatā tadā sat api tad udāsīnam eva iti ukta prāyam yadi tu viśeṣam utsujya abhū tva abhāva mātrasya cetanā vyāptiḥ vivakṣitā tadā pratyakṣa vyāpāram api utsṛjya pramāṇa antaram śaraṇam astu iti api tad abhāve vā na kiñcid kāryatvena satā api 
JŚNĀ_303,3	 yat api āha na api kaścid viśeṣaḥ kṣiti ādi hetūnām ityādi tat api grāmya jana dhandhīkaraṇa mātra upayogi na vivakṣita artha gateḥ gatiḥ bhavitum arhati yathā pārthiva tvena vajra upalānām loha lekhya tvam sādhayan sandihāne prāha na api kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa ādibhyaḥ dambhaḥ līnām kaścid viśeṣaḥ yena amī pārthivāḥ santaḥ loha lekhya tā virahiṇaḥ syuḥ na hi aloha lekhyānām kadācid pārthiva tvam upalabdham sarvatra loha lekhya tā svīkṛteṣu eva ghaṭa viṭapa ādiṣu pārthiva tva upalabdheḥ iti tadvat prakṛtam api vacana racanā mātram ābhāti 
JŚNĀ_303,4	 yathā hi nirabhiprāya tvena sāmānyam anuyantaḥ sarve puruṣa apekṣa kārya ārambha bhājaḥ pratīyante tathā pārthivatdhena loha lekhya tva svabhāva bhājaḥ yathā ca tathā bahu darśanam vihāya na anyā gatiḥ tathā atra api yathā atra kim etat loha lekhya tvam pārthiva tva mātra anubandhi uta pārthiva tve api kiñcid viśeṣam apekṣya iti śaṅkā bahula darśane api tathā kim acetanam iti eva kārya kriyāsu cetanā apekṣam uta kriyā viṣaya apekṣayā eva iti samānam 
JŚNĀ_303,5	 kim ca yadi dahana ādiṣu iva sūkṣma avāntara bheda tiraskāreṇa eka pratyavamarśa yogya tāpekṣayā na api kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate kārye api aviśeṣa prasaktyā dhūma ādi vat saudha sādhanasya api kula giri karaṇa prasaṅgaḥ durvāraḥ īśvara svīkāre kadācid anyathā api syāt sarvadā viparyaye śālibījasya api śāli aṅkura karaṇa nirākaraṇa prasaṅgaḥ saudha antara kriyā niṣedhaḥ vā syāt atha atyanta jāti bhede api nirabhiprāya tva dharma mātra apekṣayā tat api biplavaḥ eva ayam na hi kvacid sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ durlabhaḥ eva na api tāvatā svabhāva para bhāvaḥ bhāveṣu viṣa amṛtayoḥ eka kriyā prasaṅgāt kim aniṣṭam asaṃśitāni eva vā saudha ādi sādhanāni aśakya parihāra nirabhi prāya tvam sādhāraṇam avajñāya yayā svabhāva bheda adhiṣṭhānayā śaktyā kārya bhedam ātyantikam ārabhante tad kṛta prayatna apekṣā niyama niṣedhaḥ a pi yadi syāt kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ iti artha padam etat na asti kaścid viśeṣaḥ ityādi 
JŚNĀ_304,1	 tasmāt vividha viśeṣa vyāpti grahaṇa prakārasya abhāvāt śaṅkāyāḥ anivṛtteḥ sva hṛdayasya api saṃpratyaya akṣa matayā saṃbhāvanā rakṣā mātram evaṃvidhaḥ pralāpaḥ tatas avasthitam etat adhyakṣa sādhya pratibandha apekṣayā yat jātīyam sanniveśa ādi prayatnavatā vyāptam siddham na tat bhūdhara ādau asti yādṛśam ca asti na tad vyāptam siddham iti asiddhiḥ anekāntaḥ vā iti 
JŚNĀ_304,2	 etena yat āha trilocanaḥ nanu kā iyam kṛta buddhiḥ kim sādhana buddhiḥ atha sādhya buddhiḥ sādhana buddhiḥ tāvat bhavatām siddhā eva karma jam loka vaicitryam iti abhyupagamāt iti atha uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ tena ayam arthaḥ bhavati na idam kṣiti ādiṣu upalabhyamānam sādhya anumāna samartham kāryatvam kim tu anyat eva sādhya buddhi ajananāt na ca etat yuktam sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgāt dhūma ādiṣu api hi śakyam eva idam vaktum na ayam vahni anumiti samarthaḥ dhūmaḥ kim tu anyat eva sādhya darśinaḥ sādhya buddhi ajananāt tathā ca tāvat sādhanam na sidhyati yāvat sādhya buddhiḥ na sidhyati yāvat sādhya buddhiḥ na sidhyati tāvat sādhanam na sidhyati iti sphuṭataram itaretara āśraya tvam iti tat nirastam 
JŚNĀ_304,3	 na hi sākṣāt asiddhi codanam idam kim tu yatas na vyāvahārikasya kṛta buddhiḥ sindhva ādau ghaṭa ādi vyāptim smarataḥ api tatas na eka jāti tvam iti jāti bheda mātra sādhanam idam syāt tatas viśiṣṭa jātīya vyāpti dvāreṇa asit dhiḥ anekāntaḥ vā iti yuktam eva tatra ca kṛtabuddhi abhāvaḥ nāma sādhya buddhi abhāvaḥ sādhana buddhi abhāvaḥ vā iti ubhayam api nirvyūḍham 
JŚNĀ_304,4	 yat api bhūṣaṇa kāraḥ kṛtaka tvena ca pratītau katham na kṛta buddhiḥ sarveṣām prāsāda ādiṣu api kṛtabuddhiḥ na bhavati yathā cirantaneṣu prāsāda ādiṣu vyāpti abhijñasya eva kṛtabuddhiḥ bhavati vyāpti vimūḍhānām akṛtabuddhiḥ eva tathā kṣiti ādiṣu api iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ prāsāda ādiṣu iva kṣiti ādiṣu na saṃbhavati iti ced kim prasiddha avinābhāvānām uta aprasiddhāvinā abhāvānām prasiddha āvinā abhāvānām api kim vyāpti graha smṛti vikalānām atha anyeṣām abhraṣṭa smaraṇānām tāvat bhavati eva puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ loke api hi vicitram jagat kenacid dhātrā nirmitam iti asti pratītiḥ vyāpti graha smṛti vimūḍhānām tu prāsāda ādiṣu api keṣucid na puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ bhavati iti na tāvatā teṣām apuruṣa kṛta tvam 
JŚNĀ_305,1	 api ca iyam vedeṣu api puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ mīmāṃsakānām na asti iti atas ca tatra api puruṣa kṛta tva sādhanāya uktāḥ vākya tvāt ayā upya siddhāḥ syuḥ kim ca anitya tva siddhi artha yat kṛtaka tva sādhanam uktam tat api asiddham syāt na hi yādṛśam kṛtaka tva ādi ghaṭa ādiṣu dṛṣṭam śrotra agrāhya tva rūpam tādṛśam śabde asti iti tasmāt dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antika vaidharmyam etat sarva anumāneṣu samānam na īśvara anumānasya eva bādhakam iti tat api etena eva pratyuktam 
JŚNĀ_305,2	 yat punar sādhya buddhim adhikṛtya vikalpitam kim prasiddha anumāna bhāvānām ityādi atra brūmaḥ yaḥ ekadā sūtra dhārā ādi vyāpāre devakula kalasa ādi saṃbhavam upalabhya kāla antare kalasa ādi saṃdarśanāt puruṣa kṛtim anumimīte sa kīdṛśaḥ vaktavyaḥ prasiddha avinābhāva smaraṇavān na vā ādye pakṣe tasya eva na acala ādau puruṣa kṛta buddhiḥ kulāla anumānasya api prasaṅgāt iti upapāditam tat katham abhraṣṭa darśanānām tad bhāva niyamaḥ tatas eva vicitram jagat ityādi matiḥ api na vyāpti graha smaraṇa balāt kim tu darśana antara prabhava pravāda vaśāt tam aśṛṇvatām abhāvāt viparīta vāda vat 
JŚNĀ_305,3	 vyāpti vimūḍhānām tu ityādi siddha sādhanam ca udāharaṇam api pāpīyaḥ kṛtabuddhi abhāvasya jāti bheda mātra upadarśana para tvāt na ca vādi pratibādi apekṣayā tad bhāva abhāva cintā iti uktam svayam vai abhiniveśena anyathā api saṃkalpa saṃbhavāt pratyakṣa apekṣayā tu vyāvahārika adhikāreṇa cintā iyam tasya ca avidita veda ādi saṃketasya vaidika vākye tad praticchandena ca racitam aparam śṛṇvataḥ nipuṇam api nirūpayān cintaya tāvat kīdṛśaḥ viśeṣa avasāyaḥ kalasa kuliśa ādi vat sarva prakārāṇām puruṣaiḥ kāraṇa darśanāt pratyakṣa svabhāvānām śabdānām pratyakṣa bheda kalpane dhūma ādiṣu api prasaṅgāt tatas ca 
JŚNĀ_305,4–306,1	 yad bhāvaḥ puruṣa anvaya vyatiricoḥ tad bhāva bhājaḥ sthitāḥ na anyasmāt vacasaḥ ca vaidika girām bhedaḥ asti śakya ātmanoḥ tulya ati indriya sūcanā ca niyatam na ekatra ca āśvāsanam vedaḥ tena na pauruṣeya padavīm aprāpya viśrāmyati yadi tadā kaḥ avakāśaḥ tad bhāvasya pratyakṣa mahā vaijātyeṣu śaila ādiṣu tat etat āyātam ekaḥ kārya viśeṣam eva kalayan hetoḥ viśiṣṭam nijam lakṣya agneḥ iva kārya mātram amunā vyāptam mudhā manyate tat jātīyakam eva kāryam aparaḥ na avaiti tad hetukam hanta dhvānta viśeṣaḥ eṣa viduṣām adhyakṣa vastuni api 
JŚNĀ_306,2	 na ca laukika vaidika vākyayoḥ vaijātya saṃbhave samaya mātreṇa parājetavyaḥ mīmāṃsakaḥ na ca pratyakṣa ākṣipta vyāptikam vākya tvam eva tatra śaraṇam kṛtaka tve tu yat uktam tat api cintitam cintayiṣyate ca anantaram iti nanu tathā api tad vyāpte api kārye kāryatva ādi dṛṣṭam itaratra api iti yathā ghaṭa ādi prayatna vat na antarīyakam tathā pṛthvīdhara ādi api syāt iti ced nanu uktam atra kāryatva ādi vidyamānam api tatra aśakya vyāpti grahatayā udāsīnam eva iti tena abhidyamānāt api kārya antarāt na yatnavataḥ sparśaḥ api labhyate kevalam kāryam kāryam iti śabda mātram abhidyamānam avaśiṣyate tat yadi tat eva dvāra antareṇa śaraṇīkṛtam āyuṣma tā tatra sākṣāt dūṣaṇa aśravaṇāt tadā tat api kāka bhakṣaṇa prāyam iti ādarśayan= āha 
JŚNĀ_306,3–306,4	 vastu bhede prasiddhasya śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ na yukta anumitiḥ pāṇḍu dravya ādi vat hutāśane etena yat api uktam na api atra śabda sāmyāt acetana upādāna tvasya samāropeṇa sādhya siddhiḥ anitya tva ādinā kṛtaka tva ādiṣu iva pratyāsatteḥ iha api vāstava tvāt na ca jāti bhedaḥ dharmiṇoḥ dharmayoḥ sarvatra vāstavīm pratyāsattim bhinatti kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ śabda ghaṭa jāti bhedena pratyāsatteḥ abhāva prasaṅgāt iti tat api anavakāśam na hi nagāda a= acetana tvasya sa upādāna tvasya samāropam brūmaḥ tanmātram tu vyāpti bahirbhāvāt asat kalpam iti 
JŚNĀ_306,5	 yadi ca anyat eva acetana upādāna tvam cetanā apekṣi siddham anyat eva ca acala ādau dṛśyate iti kiṃkṛtaḥ ayam vibhāgaḥ iti ced upādhikṛtaḥ kim na bhinna dharmiṇoḥ dharmayoḥ api iti ced na vaiṣamyāt acetana upādānam dhūma sthānīyam kārya hetu abhimānāt na ca kaścid tasya dharmi bhedāt bhedam āha yadā tu acetana upādāna tvāt acala ādau cetana apekṣa tvam vivakṣitam tadā dhūma tvena dhūmaḥ vahnimān iti evaṃprāyā sthitiḥ evam ca sati dhūma dvaye dhūma tvayoḥ bhedaḥ prasañjanīyaḥ iti katham sāmyam evam eva astu iti ced na bhidyamānaḥ hi upādhiḥ upādhimantam api bhindyāt bhedaḥ ca eka pratyavamarśa bahirbhāva lakṣaṇaḥ na dhūmam upādhi spṛśati yena sva gatam bhinattu yathā kumbha ambhodhara ādiḥ a cetana tva upādāna tvam iti acodyam etat 
JŚNĀ_307,1	 nanu na dṛṣṭaḥ tāvat dharmi bhedena dharma bhedaḥ iti ced yad rūpa puraskāreṇa pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa vṛttiḥ tasya abhede bhidyamānā api dharmi jātiḥ abhinnavat ābhāsamānā na bādhikāḥ tad bhede tu tad gatam dharma antaram abhidyamānam api bhinna vat ābhāsamānam na sādhakam iti nyāyaḥ anyathā jaladhara arthinā api kumbhakārasya paryeṣaṇa aprasaṅgaḥ tad apāye api vihāyasi balāhaka udaya darśanāt na iti ced na tad prabhavasya eva ghaṭasya iva tasya marutaḥ kṣepaḥ kim na saṃbhāvyate atha ca vāri dhāri tva mātram ubhayatra dṛṣṭam iti yathā tatra saṃjñā bheda mātra bhedaḥ vyavasthāpyate tathā atrāpi iti yuktam pratibandha niścayaḥ hi pramāṇa viṣaya svabhāva niyame sati bhavati tad viruddha aniyama rūpam ca sādhāraṇa tvam 
JŚNĀ_307,2	 pramāṇa pratibaddhaḥ hi niścayaḥ tad viṣaya svarūpa ullaṅghe api bhavan pramāṇa apramāṇa sādhyaḥ syāt na ca evam tasmāt na anekāntaḥ na api asiddhiḥ adhyakṣa vyāpāra anusārāt tat iha pāṇḍu tvasya agni vyabhicāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya śūnyatā niṣedhaḥ eṣaḥ atas eva na anumānam iti pratibandha abhāvāt aniścaya phalam idam ubhayatra na tu siddha vyāptikayoḥ dahana pāṇḍu tayoḥ vyabhicāreṇa sādhana vaidhuryam vyāpti siddhau= anumāna aṇvādasya aśakya sādhana tvāt vyabhicārasya eva ayogāt sarva upasaṃhāravatī hi vyāptiḥ tad bhāve tad bhāvaḥ katham syāt 
JŚNĀ_307,3	 tatas ayam arthaḥ yathā pāṇḍu tvāt na agnimat tve anumānam tasya tatra apratibandhāt sa ca vyabhicāreṇa abhivyaktaḥ anyathā tatra api anumānam aṅgīkṛtya eva svastham āsīt sa ca vyabhicāraḥ pramāṇa viṣaya svarūpa itarasādhāraṇam dharmam sarvam apratibaddha tve niyatam ādarśayati iti yathā ukta sādhāraṇa tva ākṛṣṭāt apratibandhāt tathā eva yathā kāryatva ādi mātrāt api na cetanā adhiṣṭhāna anumānam iti atas vyabhicāra darśanam upakārakam eva parasya tasmāt pramāṇa viṣaya svarūpa parāmarśāt tathāvidha upādhikam eva kārya tva ādi sādhanam dhiyaḥ iti siddham tathāvidhasya ca vāstavaḥ eva pratyāsatti bhedaḥ iti saṃjñā mātram śaraṇam āpatitam 
JŚNĀ_307,4	 tena dharmi jāti bhedasya dharma bhedaka tvam siddham api iti katham sarvatra tad niṣedhaḥ atha sarvatra eva yad bhedaka tvam tat niṣidhyate kvacid abhedaka tvam api iti arthaḥ tadā siddha sādhanam uktam hi pramāṇa viṣaya svarūpa apekṣayā tad ubhaya vyavasthānam iti tathā ca sati bheda sthitiḥ eva kṛtaka tva ādi sparśaḥ ca aparibhāvaka tayā kriyate na hi tatra api pratyakṣa balāt vyāptiḥ upapādayitum śakyāḥ kim tu viparyaya bādhaka anumānāt tad abhāve ananumānasya iṣṭa tvāt 
JŚNĀ_308,1^1	 tatas abhūtvā bhavana abhidhāna dharma mātrasya bhūtvā abhavanena dharmeṇa vyāpti sādhakam dharmiṇaḥ yadi jāti bhedam udāsayati dhūmasya agninā vyāpti sādhakam eva mahānasa ādi tadā prastute kim āyātam yatra pratyakṣa vyāpāra apekṣayā jāti bheda niṣṭhā eva vyāpti gṛhīti rītiḥ iti yadi tu prakṛte api kārya vastu stoma gatāḥ kāryatva ādayaḥ eva dharmāḥ pratīta vyāptayaḥ syuḥ tadā ayam na doṣaḥ kevalam upāya prakāra dvayasya api ayogāt ayuktā eva vyāptiḥ iti darśitam tatra viparyaya bādhaka pramāṇa paricayaḥ teṣām asaṃbhavaḥ bauddha gandheḥ eva kasyacid tathā yatna darśanāt 
JŚNĀ_308,1^2	 na ca prakṛte vaktum śakyaḥ iti tatra āsthām avadhūya pradeśa antare ca nityam sattvam asat tvam vā ityādinā karaṇa mātre viśeṣa tyāgena kārya mātra pratibandham viparyaya bādhaka balena sūcayataḥ nirvṛtim vidadhānaḥ bhagavān vārtikakāraḥ parasya darśana adarśana mātreṇa vyāpti vādinaḥ tad yoga pratipādane pratyāsannam pratyakṣānupalambha bala avalambanam avalokayan tat āhatya dūṣayitum jāti bheda kṛtam dūṣaṇam udbhāvayati iti veditavyam tasmāt pratyakṣa vyāpāra avadheya jāti bhedasya atyantam vyakta tvāt saṃjñā mātram śaraṇīkriyamāṇam api akiñcitkaram iti uktam 
JŚNĀ_308,2	 athavā astu ghaṭa ādi apekṣayā kṣoṇīdhara ādīnām jāti bhedaḥ yatas siddham yādṛś ityādi ucyeta krīḍā parvata ādayaḥ tu pauruṣeyāḥ tad eka jāti bhavāḥ taiḥ saha eka hetavaḥ kim na bhavanti tatas ayam arthaḥ yaḥ yaḥ śailaḥ sa sarvaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ yathā krīḍā śailaḥ śailaḥ ca kailāsaḥ iti evam kulyā mahā sarovara prabhṛtayaḥ nadī samudra ādīnām udāharaṇāni ūhanīyāni iti āśaṅkya āha vastu bhede prasiddhasya ityādi ayam arthaḥ krīḍā parvataka ādi nirmiti dṛśām śaila ādiṣu jñānumānā api nyāya sahā skhalat gati yatas tad nāma mātram samam kim ca aneka samāna mānava kṛtāḥ sidhyanti amī ced nagāḥ kā vārteśvara sādhanasya kim iha upāttam samāptam ca kim jāti bhede siddhe adhikaraṇa siddhānta nyāya anusāraḥ pūrayet api pratyāśām abhede tu tat api nirāspadam na hi sajātīya kumbha antare tat vijātīyasya nirmātuḥ siddhiḥ iti anubhavāt abhyupagamāt vā bhinna eva jātiḥ anayoḥ na samānam hetum āvahati saṃjñā mātra sāmye api iti 
JŚNĀ_309,1–309,2	 kaḥ punar ayam niyamaḥ yaḥ ukta prakāra dvayena eva vyāpti grahaḥ na anyathā iti āśaṅkya āha anyathā kumbhakāreṇa mṛd vikārasya kasyacid ghaṭa ādeḥ karaṇāt sidhyet valmīkasya api tad kṛtiḥ iti na hi su dūram anusaratā api sa kaścid pratibandha sādhana vidhiḥ labdhavyaḥ yaḥ kumbhakāreṇa mṛd maya mātra vyāpti prasaṅga parihāra kārī prayatnavatā kārya mātra vyāptim sādhayiṣyati iti bhāvaḥ kumbhakāreṇa hi kārya mātra vyāpti sādhanāya prabhavataḥ tad viśeṣa mṛd mayasya sādhane kaḥ śakti vyāghātaḥ astu vā prakāra dvayena eva vyāpti grahaḥ yat tu uktam naḥ bhedena vipakṣa bādhaka vaśāt ityādi tatas anyathā bhaviṣyati iti āśaṅkya jaladhara arthinā kumbhakāra paryeṣaṇa aprasaṅgam uktam eva prakāra antareṇa saṃbhāvayan= āha anyathā ityādi 
JŚNĀ_309,3	 yadā hi bādha ātmaka uddeśena api pravartamānaḥ sāmānyena eva vyāptim sādhayati tadā kutas mṛd mayāt kulāla anumānam kuryāt kāraṇa mātrasya siddheḥ yadā api pratyakṣa apekṣayā hetu viśeṣeṇa kulālena karaṇa vyāpāra upadheya viśeṣasya kumbha ādi kārya viśeṣasya vyāptiḥ tadā api kutas tad prasaṅgaḥ yadā api adhyavasāya mātra apekṣayā sāmānyena viśeṣasya tadā api ayam dūrataraḥ evam tu vyavasthātaḥ anyathā vyāpti grahaṇe viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya bhavati iti katham mṛd mayāt kulāla anumānam aprasaṅgi tad kārya kumbha ādi apekṣayā atyanta visadṛśāt api prasaṅge katham kiyatā api aṃśena pratyāsannāt na syāt tathā ca evam sajātīyāt api avāntara bheda anusāri pratyakṣa vyavasāya apekṣayā na anumānam pratibandhā niścayāt tadā kā eva vārtā vijātīyāt atyanta vijātīye dṛṣṭa vyāptikasya iti daṇḍa apūpa nyāyaḥ eṣaḥ iti darśayitum mṛd maya grahaṇam 
JŚNĀ_310,1	 nanūbhayathā vyākhyāne api vyabhicārāt eva na anumānam tat katham atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced ukta krameṇa upakārakaḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ asmākam na bādhakaḥ tathā hi pramā dvaya vyāpāra atikrame anantara prakāra bahis bhāve vā pratijñāta pratibandha niścaya abhāva sādhakaḥ eva vyabhicāraḥ iti api ca vyabhicāraḥ nāma sāmānyena gṛhītāyāḥ vyāpteḥ niyata viṣaya apekṣayā vighātam ātanoti atha vyāpti grahaṇam eva tat na bhavati iti vibhāvayati atha sati api vyāpti prasare anumāna mātram khaṇḍayati ataeva ābādhita viṣaya tvam api liṅga lakṣaṇam ākhyātam iti pakṣāḥ 
JŚNĀ_310,2–310,3	 tatra prathama pakṣe sarvatra anāśvāsaḥ anyatra api tad balāt eva sādhya pratyāśā sā ca niścitā api khaṇḍitā kvacid iti anyatra api śaṅkā nivṛtteḥ tatas eva tad grahaṇa vaiyarthyāt dvitīye tu na viśeṣaḥ cetane yathā hi kumbhakāreṇa kārya sāmānyasya pratyakṣeṇa vyāptiḥ gṛhītā vyabhicāreṇa durgṛhītā vyavasthāpyate tathā caitanya mātreṇa api tatra api pratyakṣa vyāpāre viśeṣa abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_310,4^1	 tṛtīye tu vyāptau satyām eva vyabhicāreṇa anumānam apāsyate iti mahīyasīyam ayoga paramparā kevalam atra pakṣe etat āpatitam yadi idam atra sādhanam sādhyam vyabhicarya na sthitam tadā sādhyam sādhayati iti etat ca sādhya vidhuram sarva artha sākṣātkāriṇaḥ na anyaḥ kartu śaktaḥ sa hi yaḥ eva dharmī tathāvidha madhyam adhiśayitaḥ na bhavati tam eva vā vyabhicāra gocara tayā anumāna bhājanīkaroti sarva vipakṣa ani īkṣaṇe tu tad madhye eva kadācid eṣaḥ api syāt iti śaṅkā anivṛtteḥ 
JŚNĀ_310,4^2	 tasmāt uktaḥ eva nyāya āśrayaṇa yogyaḥ vyabhicāraḥ ca vyāpti durgrahaṇam eva sādhayati iti kārya mātra vyāptiḥ prakṛta kāraṇa viśeṣeṇa asaṃbhavinī eva sādhuḥ iti gṛhītāyām vyāptau yadi vihatiḥ āśvāsa virahaḥ grahaḥ na asau vyāpteḥ yadi ca na viśeṣaḥ matimati abādha apekṣāyām na sakala vipakṣa īkṣaṇam ṛte nirātaṅkaḥ tasmāt na khalu phala mātre graha vidhiḥ iti saṃgrahaḥ kim ca ādāya samasta vastu viṣayām vyāptim punar ced matā tad tad jātiṣu bādhaka krama vaśāt su a vyāpya tat tat sthitiḥ tad tad jātiṣu sādhaka krama vaśāt unnīyate kim na sā yena āyāsaka śakti saṃśaya padam santaḥ viśanti īdṛśam iti antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_311,1	 aparigaṇitaḥ nāma vastu vyāpāra viṣayaḥ aparigaṇita tamaḥ tu aviṣayaḥ tatra kaḥ evam anātmīya kārya jāti nikarasya pratyekam vyabhicārān dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā sva kārya jātiṣu eva niyantum hetum apāra vyāpāraḥ pārayate tathā ca sati yasya eva sākṣāt anīkṣitaḥ vyabhicāraḥ tat eva tasya gamakam āśaktam tadā śaṅkā saṃbhavāt na iti ced na kvacid atīndriye tarhi niścaya mayam kuryāt yat jātīya uddeśena pravṛttam adhyakṣam sāmānya viṣayam avasthāpitam tatra kaḥ sandehaḥ iti ced evam tarhi parāparatadīya vyāpya jātiṣu tathā eva saṃśaya pravṛtti pratyanīka pramāṇa vṛtti anusaraṇe āyātaḥ tṛtīya pāda āpatitaḥ arthaḥ tasmāt na kāraṇa viśeṣeṇa buddhimatā kārya mātrasya vyāptiḥ pratyetum śakyā iti siddham yādṛś ityādi siddhāntaḥ 
JŚNĀ_311,2	 athavā yat uktam na śarīra nirapekṣa prayatna vat mātreṇa kāryasya vyāptiḥ pratipattum pāryate pratyakṣeṇa pratikṣepāt tādṛśasya ityādi tat eva upasaṃharati siddham iti yādṛkṣaḥ asau śarīra ādi yogī adhiṣṭhātā ca iti śeṣam su bodham tādṛśaḥ ca pratyakṣa bādha ādi doṣa viṣayaḥ iti ākūtam nanu śarīravatī api cetana tvam dṛṣṭam itaratra api saṃbhavati iti yathā śarīriṇā vyāptam kārya ādi sidhyati tathā abhimatena api iti atra api prāk ukta nyāyāt saṃjñā mātrāt avaśiṣyamānāt sādhana manoratham unmathnan= āha vastu bhede kumbha ādau prasiddhasya kulāla ādeḥ yaḥ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ cetanaḥ iti tanmātrāt abhidyamānasya abhimatasya pramāṇa vyāpāra apekṣayā dūrīkṛtasya na yukta anumitiḥ iti vyāpta abhimatāt vastunaḥ iti prakṛtam artha āpannam vā katham iva iti āha
