JŚNĀ_311,3–311,4	 pāṇḍu dravya ādi vat hutāśanaḥ iti ayam abhiprāyaḥ yadi śabda mātra sāmyena abhidyamānasya anumānam śabda sāmyena abhidyamānāt api pāṇḍumnaḥ kim na dhūmadhvajasya anumānam atha tatra viśiṣṭa kārya svabhāva apekṣam adhyakṣamanya vyāptim pratikṣipati iti na anumānam ucyate tathā cetana mātra pratikṣepeṇa api pratyakṣam kim na tad anumānam nirasyati etena yadā dṛśyam api kārya antaram tiraskaroti pratyakṣam tadā kā eva kathā dṛś pathā atiriktasya cetana mātrasya iti astu tāvat vyāpya apekṣayā vibhāgaḥ eva loke tathā eva pratīteḥ anyathā ati prasaṅgāt ca 
JŚNĀ_312,1	 vyāpaka apekṣayā tu yadi eṣa niyamaḥ na syāt kaḥ doṣaḥ iti āśaṅkyā pūrva uktam eva iti prasaṅgam bhaṅgi antareṇa taruṇayati anyathā ityādi valmīkasya iti valmīka jantoḥ iti arthaḥ tad kṛtiḥ iti ghaṭa ādi kṛtiḥ ayam arthaḥ yadi viśeṣeṇa api vyāptim avasāya cetana mātram sāmānyam anumātavyam tadā kumbha ādi karaṇasya kulāle niyatasya cetana mātra paryavasita tvāt ghaṭa ādeḥ api valmīka jantuḥ kartā anumeyaḥ syāt yathā hi kumbha ādeḥ kumbhakāreṇa vyāpti grahaṇe caitanya mātreṇa aviśeṣāt tasya api anumānam evam valmīkaukasaḥ api caitanyena anya aviśeṣāt kim na anumānam yadā ca śarīriṇā vyāpti grahe śarīriṇaḥ api anyasya pratikṣepaḥ tadā kā vārtā atyanta visadṛśasya iti na ca atra bahu tvena upayogaḥ eka ātmanaḥ api caitanyāt iti valmīkasya iti nirdeśaḥ etena dhūma ādeḥ api jāṭhara ādeḥ anumāna ākṣepaḥ vyaktaḥ vyabhicāra carcāyām ca pūrvavat sarvam āvartanīyam iti 
JŚNĀ_312,2	 yat uktam prayatnavatā yat vyāptam sanniveśa ādi tat na siddham sindhu bhūdhara ādau yat ca siddham tat na vyāptam iti tatra etat syāt nanu jātyuttaram idam dharma bheda vikalpanāt tatas yathā yat kṛtakam tat anityam ghaṭa vat iti kṛte kaścid āha yadi ghaṭa gatam kṛtaka tvam hetuḥ tat asiddham śabde śabda gatam tu anitya saṃghāte ghaṭa paṭa ādau= abhāvāt viruddham atha sa pakṣa vat vipakṣe api na asti iti matiḥ tadā asādhāraṇam anaikāntikam iti na ca tāvatā kṛtaka tvam tattvataḥ aśaktam eva anitya tva sādhane tathā idam api tathā hi yat ca siddham tat na vyāptam iti anena sa pakṣa āvṛtteḥ virodhaḥ vipakṣāt api nivṛtti pakṣe vā asādhāraṇa tvam ākṛṣṭam iti atha prakṛta kārya anurodhāt adūṣaṇam eva idam udghoṣyate tathā sati kṛtaka tva ādeḥ api asādhana tva prasaṅgaḥ sūtrakāra virodhaḥ ca kārya sama saṃjñayā asya dūṣaṇasya tena pratijñānāt yat āha kāryatva anyatva leśena yat sādhyā siddhi codanam tad kārya samam etat tu tridhā vaktrabhisandhitaḥ iti upacāra mātra kṛt tvena anya tvasya leśaḥ uktaḥ vaktrabhiprāyeṇa traividhyam ca darśitam iti 
JŚNĀ_313,1	 tat etat ubhayam api asāram prathama pakṣasya tāvat pūrvam eva pratikṣepāt uktam hi vyāpti sādhaka pramāṇa puraskṛta svarūpasya abhede bhidyamānāḥ api saṃbandhinaḥ vidhūta bhedāḥ iva bhāsamānāḥ na bādhakāḥ tasya tu bhede abhedinaḥ api bhinna vat ābhāsamānāḥ kārya tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ na tad vyāpakasya sādhakāḥ iti vyāpti grahaṇa prakramaḥ ca dvividhaḥ darśitaḥ tatra yadi nāśena kṛtaka tvasya iva viparya bādhaka balāt buddhimatā api kārya tva ādeḥ avinā abhāva grahaḥ syāt tadā abhūtvā bhavana mātram iva sanniveśa ādi mātram adhikṛtya pravṛttam pramāṇam iti kaḥ tatra dharmi bhedena bhindānaḥ sādhanam śobheta iti yujyate jāti uttaram iti 
JŚNĀ_313,2	 yadi tu pratyakṣa anupalambha vaśāt sanniveśa ādikam iva kṛtaka tvam api vyāptam avadhāryeta tadā śabde api sādhana tvam kṛtaka tva ādeḥ kena nivāryeta jāti viśeṣa ullekhena eva pratyakṣa anupalambha vyāpārasya pariniṣṭhita tvāt anyathā dhūma gatāḥ api kāryatva ādayaḥ jāti viśeṣān avacchedena dahana avinā bhāvinaḥ sidhyantaḥ na aśakya parihāram atiprasaṅgam anupanīya svāsthyam āsādayeyuḥ kārya antarasya vyabhicāra upakṣepaḥ api kṣodiṣṭhaḥ pratividhiḥ tadā hi yatra eva sākṣāt vyabhicāra anupalambhaḥ tat eva sādhanam jātam iti kiyat lādhavam doṣa bhārasya 
JŚNĀ_313,3–313,4	 na ca vahni kārya antarāt api bhasma ādeḥ svapnepi alabhya vyabhicārāt dhūma eka kārya vyāptim gṛhīta pūrviṇaḥ tad anumānam asti iti api nivedita prāyam tasmāt anukrānta pramāṇa apekṣayā dharmi jāti bheda dharmāṇām bhedakaḥ eva abhyupagantavyaḥ iti katham ucyate jāti uttaram iti nyāya vādinaḥ tu tu sūtrakārasya sādhyena anugamāt kārye sāmānyena api sādhane saṃbandhi bhedāt bheda ukti doṣaḥ kārya samaḥ mataḥ 
JŚNĀ_313,5	 ayam arthaḥ yadā tāvat viśiṣṭa viṣayaḥ eva vyāpti grahaḥ pratyakṣa vyāpāra upekṣayā tadā saṃbandhi bhūta jāti antara bhedāt kārya tva ādeḥ bheda uktiḥ doṣaḥ bhavatu nyāya prāpta tvāt yadā api vināśa ādinā sādhyena viparyaya bādhaka vaśāt sāmānyena abhūtvā bhāvi tva mātram anugatam āsthāya sādhanam anuṣṭhīyate tadā api saṃbandhi bhedāt bheda ukti doṣaḥ kvacid darśanāt pramāṇa parirītim ana ālocya ucyate sarva kārya samaḥ saṃmataḥ asmad guroḥ anyadā tu sādhanasya doṣaḥ eṣaḥ iti adoṣaḥ nanu tathā api sarva upasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ na siddhā iti siddham na tu tāvatā sādhya asiddhiḥ eva yadi param para mata anurodhena vyāpti grahaḥ nirvyūḍhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_314,1	 asmākam tu dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭam eva rūpam vyāptam avadhāryate yathā mahānasa paridṛṣṭam dhūmam dhūma dhvaja adhīnam avadhārya sādhya dharmi gatam sāmānyena anupraviśya api sādhya dharmiṇi dhūmam upalabhya yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā mahānasaḥ iti evam agnim anumīmahe tathā prayatnavatā ghaṭa ādi jātīya mātrasya eva vyāpti siddhau= api yatra kārya tvam dṛṣṭam tatra prayatnavatā kṛtiḥ iti vaktum śakteḥ tatas ca evam api sādhya siddheḥ avirodhāt kaḥ anurodhaḥ sarva upasaṃhāra vyāpti grahaṇasya maula sādhana ānarthakya sādhanasya iti ced evam tarhi vyaktam idam āyātam jāti antare vyāptim ādāya jāti antarāt eva anumānam iti yadi param vyāpya liṅgayoḥ saṃjñā sāmyam apekṣya tathā ca sati na vastu liṅgam uktam bhavati kevalam kārya ādi śabda vṛtti mātram eva tat ca ayuktam iti āt arśayan= āha prayatnavataḥ jāti antare prasiddhasya śabda sāmānya darśanāt na yuktam sādhanam go tvāt vāc ādīnām viṣāṇa vat iti 
JŚNĀ_314,2	 nanu kārya ādi iti na śabda mātram abhūtvā bhāvi tva sāmānyasya anugama saṃbhavāt go śabdaḥ tu svarga ādiṣu ruci mātra śaraṇaḥ na kañcid artham anugamya vartate iti mahān viśeṣaḥ etat api plavate eva na hi abhūtvā abhāvi tva mātram prayatna vat nāntarīyakam siddham yena tad anugama samāśrayaḥ phalam syāt siddhau ca punar saḥ eva sarva upasaṃhāraḥ iti kim anena parihṛtam svīkṛtam vā tasmāt tat api sāmānyam kārya jāti bhedena bhedam āveśayataḥ na kaścid vastu anugamaḥ iti śabda mātram eva sādhanam āśritam bhavati iti paśyāmaḥ tatas ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ go tvena vāc ādeḥ viṣāṇa sādhanāt asya iti 
JŚNĀ_314,3	 evam dṛṣṭānte api ayam eva ślokaḥ tadā ca jāti antaraḥ iti anya dhūma janmani prasiddhasya vahneḥ iti yojyam yadi sarva upasaṃhāra parihāraḥ yadā tu sarvam eva dhūma rūpam eka ākāra pratyavamarśa vaśāt ekīkṛtya vyāptim avadhārayati tadā na śabda mātra sāmyam saḥ eva vyāptaḥ arthaḥ atra api iti na sādhya siddhi virodhaḥ na api evam maula hetu vaiphalya upalambha saṃbhavaḥ na hi yatra yatra sādhanam tatra tatra sādhyam iti sāmānyena pravṛttā api buddhiḥ abhimata deśa kāla ādi bhedam āspadīkartum prabhuḥ atas viśeṣasya pravṛtti nivṛtti viṣayīkaraṇāya na pakṣa dharmam anālambyāsitum śaknuyāt tat katham aphalam maulam aṅgam 
JŚNĀ_315,1^1	 tasmāt vyāpti grahe sarva upasaṃhāra parihāriṇaḥ api dhūmaḥ api na agneḥ anumāpakaḥ iti lābham icchataḥ mūlasya api nāśaḥ na hi yatra eva dhūma janmani vyāpṛtaḥ vahniḥ upalabdhaḥ tat eva deśa antare api kevalam saḥ api dhūma śabda vācyaḥ ayam api iti śabda sāmyam avatiṣṭhate iti na go tvena vācaḥ śṛṅga sādha nāt asya api kaścid viśeṣaḥ nanu tathā api kīdṛśī punar iyam vācaḥ śṛṅga siddhiḥ adhyakṣa kṣipta tvāt svayam eva hi vyastaḥ hetoḥ anāśrayaḥ iti abhidhīyate iti ced satyam iyān api abhyūhaḥ saṃbhavī bhavataḥ iti mahān lābhaḥ asmākam kadācid evam pratiṣedhataḥ saṃjñā amātrataḥ api sādhya siddhi pratyāśā parigalayati iti citram ca atra yat śāstra pariśrama anurūpam māna graḥ te girām śṛṅge sādhanam na iti paśyataḥ 
JŚNĀ_315,1^2	 saṃjñā mātreṇa sādhyasya siddhiḥ kasmāt samīhitāḥ yat na gopāla aṅganā janasya api sāmpratam evam ca samīhamānaḥ tat api śraddadhīta iti tad anurūpam uttaram parihāsa param abhidadhānaḥ vacasi viṣāṇa anumānena sakalam anucita anumāna mātram upalakṣayati yadā hi dahana ādīnām api gardabha ādibhyaḥ api labhya avakāśam anumānam tadā kasya kasmāt apratītiḥ iti ākūtam yadi param sākṣāt adhi akṣa bādhāḥ mā bhūt nanu vyāpta vastu sādhāraṇa abhidhāna vṛtteḥ tad vyāpi niścaya prasaṅga prakrame kaḥ avakāśaḥ gardabhāt dahana anumānasya na hi dahana vyāpta vastu sādhāraṇāḥ dhūma bhasma ādi śabdāḥ gardabhe saṃbhavinaḥ iti ced na vastu ādi śabdena api śabda sāmya siddheḥ iti etat ca pāṇḍu dravya ādi vat hutāśane iti anena eva prativarṇitam antarṇīya pakṣa antareṇa toṣayan= āha 
JŚNĀ_316,1–316,3	 vivakṣā paratantra tvāt na śabdāḥ santi kutra vā tad bhāvāt artha siddhau tu sarvam sarvasya sidhyati etena gardabha ādiṣu api tāvat eva dhūma ādi śabdānām asaṃbhavaḥ yāvat na samaya samīhāḥ tatas anumāna abhāvaḥ api dhūma ādi śabda apravartanau= adhikaḥ eva pravṛttau tu kaḥ sādhyam ruṇaddhi iti uktam na tu evam vastuni sādhane tathā hi avinā abhāva viṣayāt na vinā abhau= a saṃbhavaḥ vivakṣā paratantra tvāt na śabdāḥ santi kutra vā vā śabdaḥ yathārthe tad bhāvāt artha siddhau tu sarvam sarvasya sidhyati 
JŚNĀ_316,4	 na tu pratibaddha vastu vṛttitaḥ sādhya siddhau= abhimatāyām śabda ādi vat sarva siddhiḥ ullaṇṭha mātra phalā kim tu tattvataḥ eva vyāpakasya sarva siddhiḥ iti bhāvaḥ tat evam dṛṣṭānta dṛṣṭa mātrasya vyāpti vacane vacana sāmya mātra paratantrā siddhiḥ asiddhiḥ eva āpatati iti tāttvika siddhi nibandhana vastu sādhana anveṣiṇā sarva upasaṃhāriṇī eva vyāptiḥ upapādayitavyā sā ca dvidhā api na sanniveśa ādibhyaḥ buddhimataḥ anumānam māna bhājanīkaroti tanmātra siddhau= api vā na abhimatā viśeṣa siddhiḥ yatas śreyaḥ arthibhiḥ atyartham abhidhīyamānam īśvara abhidhānasya kovidaiḥ ādriyeta iti saṃkṣepataḥ prakaraṇa arthaḥ tasmāt sthitam etat tādṛśi pramāṇa saṃmate anitye api apramāṇa tā iti 
JŚNĀ_317,1–317,2	 pratyakṣānupalambhena trividhena api sidhyati kārya kāraṇayoḥ ātmā pañcakena iti kecana pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti nyāyaḥ tatra sāmānyena prāc pravṛttān upalambha sahāyam ubhaya viṣayam krami pratyakṣa dvayam yadi vā sāmānyena ubhaya grāhi pratyakṣa sahāyam kramikam anupalambha dvayam iti trividham eva tad sādhanam iti eke anye tu tat trayam antya dvaya sahāyam eva iti pañcavidham niyata ānupūrvīkam iti āhuḥ ādya traya saṃbhave api hi pratipad tuḥ na asandigdhā buddhiḥ upajāyate antya dvaye tu labdhe sidhyati anvaya vyatireka lakṣaṇaḥ hi hetu phala bhāvaḥ tatra trayeṇa anvayaḥ pratīyate dvayena vyatirekaḥ iti pañcakena sādhvī siddhiḥ tayoḥ ekaika aniścaye tu sandehaḥ durnivāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_317,3–317,5	 atra cintyate prācīna anupalambhaḥ ced anyatas saṅgama ādikam na niṣedhati kim tena niṣedhe paścimena kim anupalambha dvayena vyatireka sādhana artham eva hi anupalambhaḥ prārthyate sa ca anena hetu abhimata abhāve kārya abhimatasya bhāvam bādhamānena sādhanīyaḥ sa ca bhāvaḥ tridhā saṃbhāvyate tatra eva deśe sthitiḥ anyatas āgamanam tad vivikta kalāpāt eva utpattiḥ iti evaṃvidha bādhā vaidhurye kim atra kāraṇa m ayam apekṣate na vyatireke asya upayogaḥ 
JŚNĀ_317,6–318,1	 kim tu anvaya grāhiṇi pratyakṣe sāhāyakam āvahati iti upadarśitam eva iti ced asmin sati idam bhavati iti akṣa jena gatam na kim na hi bhāve bhāvāt anyaḥ nāma anvayaḥ sa ca siddhaḥ adhyakṣeṇa iti kim atra anupalambha sāhāyyena nanu evam anvayaḥ yadṛcchā upanatasya api syāt pratyakṣa mātra saṃbhavāt prāgabhāva grahaṇa viśeṣaṇam tu pratyakṣam tat grāhi iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ sa tarhi trividha bheda bhinna bhāva viparyaya svabhāvaḥ prāc abhāvaḥ anupalabdheḥ siddhaḥ abhāva mātram vā ādye pakṣe etat āyātam 
JŚNĀ_318,2–318,5	 asmin sati idam bhavati anyathā asaṃbhavāt iti vyatirekaḥ ayam eva saḥ na sthitam tatra na anyasmāt jātam na āyātam anyatas yasya bhāve bhavet kāryam na ced tasya na kasyacid etat ca anupalabdhi pūrveṇa siddham adhyakṣeṇa iti na kiñcid paścima dvayena tat api hi hetu abhāve phalasya tatra sthitim anyataḥ utpattim anya yatnena anyatra gamanam bādhamānam eva vyatireka sādhanam na pāścāttya dvayam iti eva tad vyāpāra abhāve śatena api abhāvāt tat ca ādimenaḥ ekena kṛtam iti na aparasya upayogaḥ 
JŚNĀ_318,6–318,9	 atha punar abhāva mātram ādimaḥ anupalambhaḥ pratyeti iti matiḥ abhāva mātra bodhe api prācyasya anupayogi tā asya etat vyāpṛteḥ prāk iti evam kim avaśiṣyate abhāva mātra pratītau tāvat kasya kena anvayaḥ asya bhāve asya bhāvaḥ iti api anvaya pratītiḥ yadṛcchā upanatena ati prasajyamāna upayoga paripanthini eva etad vyāpārāt pūrvam abhāvaḥ asya iti tu pratītau sā eva trayī gatiḥ āyātā iti kim pariśiṣyate yatas antima dvayam na vaiphalyam āvahet anvaye vyabhicārāt ced vyatirekaḥ anugamyate pratyakṣa mātra vyāpāre api evam kim na abhidhīyate 
JŚNĀ_318,10–319,2	 yad artham arthyeta prāktanaḥ anvaya vyatirekau hi pratyekam vyabhicārāt eva sahitau hetu phala bhāvaḥ ucyate tatas ekaikasya atad bhāvini api saṃbhavaḥ abādhakaḥ eva iti samānam āvayoḥ tatas na antyayoḥ ādimasya upayogaḥ ādye vāntimayoḥ iti siddham na siddham ādimena hi prāk asya vyāpārāt etat na āsīt iti pratiyan= api etat vyāpāra abhāva prayuktaḥ asya abhāvaḥ iti na avadhāritam carameṇa tu avadhāryate iti ayuktam ādimasya punar anupayogasya tādavasthyāt api ca tanmātra abhāvataḥ abhāvāt paścimena viniścayaḥ tat nyāyasya samāna tvāt prācyena api na kim mataḥ 
JŚNĀ_319,3^1	 etad vyāpārāt prāk na āsīt iti api hi tanmātra abhāvāt eva abhāvam khyāpayati yathā ukta sattā traividhya vidhūteḥ ākṣepāt tatas tena aniścaye paścimena api mā bhūt tatra pūrveṇa dvayoḥ abhāvasya sannidhi mātram na ekasya anena prayuktiḥ iti paśyataḥ paścime api kaḥ āśvāsaḥ tad anāyattau tad abhāve api utpatti prasaṅge dvitīya abhāvasya eva ayogaḥ samānaḥ atha vahni rāsabhayoḥ āgamana anantara janmanaḥ api dhūmasya gardabha abhāve api abhāvaḥ prācyena anubhūyate iti ucyate ubhaya apagame apagacchataḥ paścāt tanena api iti aparāpara upāya parampara anusaṇena pañcaka vyavasthā hāniḥ 
JŚNĀ_319,3^2	 tathā sati trayam na dvayam iti ced paścimena api na śakyate iti etāvat ucyate sa tu dvayoḥ trayoḥ vā iti kim anena asti upayogaḥ dvayasya anyasya api abhāve niścaya ayogāt iti ced yadā eva tarhi kevale hetu abhāve anupalambhaḥ tadā eva prācyaḥ api samarthaḥ iti kim na iṣyate no ced sarvathā anupayogāt iti uktam anyathā pratyakṣam api trayam na dvayam iti vaktum śakya tvāt ki ca pañcaka vādinaḥ samāna samaya tayā eva avibhāgāt prācyaḥ anupalambhaḥ ekaḥ iṣṭaḥ sa ca agni gardabha apagame asti iti anantara dhūma anupalambha apekṣayā adya api dvaitam eva 
JŚNĀ_319,4–320,3	 api ca prāc adṛṣṭau kramāt paśyan vetti hetu phala sthitim dṛṣṭau vā kramaśas apaśyan= anyathā tu anavasthitiḥ tad tad āśaṅkā nirākaraṇa artham uttarottara pūrva pūrva upalambhānupalambha paryeṣaṇa aprasakteḥ tatra yatheṣṭam traya ādi vyavasthā kriyatām na tu pratyakṣam madhyam adhiva asya anupalambhayoḥ kaścid upayogaḥ anya śaṅkane dvayoḥ api anāśvāt tad vivecane ca ekena eva siddheḥ tasmāt pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām anvaya vyatirekayoḥ niścaye saṃśayaḥ nāma kīdṛś hetu phala sthitau 
JŚNĀ_320,4^1	 artha antara tve tayoḥ eva tad bhāva rūpa tvāt tayoḥ ca na pratīti niyamaḥ kaścid dvidhā api siddheḥ syāt etat vyatireka dārḍhyāt evam vyavasthā atas tad grahiṇaḥ anupalambhasya anvaya viṣaya pratyakṣa ativṛttiḥ ucitā eva na na antarīyaka tvam eva hi pramāṇasya prameye draḍhimānam āropayati na bāhulyam pramāṇa ābhāseṣu api darśanāt ekaḥ eva ca dṛśya anupalambhaḥ tad abhāve atyantam abhāva sādhana sādhuḥ iti kim adhika dhāvanena na hi tadā gandhaḥ api dhūmasya saṃbhāvanīyaḥ nanu bhūyasām abhāvāt kasya abhāve na bhūtaḥ dhūmaḥ iti niścetavyam iti ced 
JŚNĀ_320,4^2–320,5	 atas eva anvaya grāhi pratyakṣam apekṣyate anya abhāva prayukta tve hi etat abhāvasya na asya saṃbhavam ayam ādriyeta evam anvaya grahaṇa pūrvake api niścaye bhūyasām saṃbhavāt kasya bhāva prayuktaḥ asya bhāvaḥ iti jijñāsāyām anupalabdheḥ yat abhāva prayuktaḥ asya abhāvaḥ saṃprati tad bhāva prayuktaḥ prāk api asya bhāvaḥ iti sidhyati tatra ca ekaikasya upanaye apanaye vā tathā pratipattum śakyam tathā ca sati prācyasya paścimasya vā vyatireka siddhau śaktiḥ aneka upanaya ādau tu dvitayasya api aśaktiḥ iti sthitam avyāpinī ca iyam pañcaka vyavasthā bhasma anala kalasa kumbha kāra ādiṣu paścima abhāvāt nīra ādhāra ādiṣu ca prācya abhāve api siddhaḥ tathā hi sati setau payaḥ pūra stha imānam upalabdhavataḥ tad bhāvetad bhāva darśinaḥ tayoḥ hetu phala bhāva niścayaḥ prācya anapekṣaḥ eva tadvat anyatra api trika apekṣaḥ eva iti veditavyam 
JŚNĀ_320,6	 atha prāk adṛṣṭvā vahni sannidhau dhūma darśane vahnim apekṣya anyaḥ eva janayati iti ki na kalpyate evam api vahneḥ kāraṇa tvam eva indhanasya iva evam tarhi anyasya api yadṛcchā sannihitasya gardabha ādeḥ kāraṇa tvam astu tatas ca tasya api dhūmāt anumāna prasaṅgaḥ iti ced tat kim vahneḥ kāraṇa tva niścayaḥ iti evam gardabhasya api atha pratyakṣa anupalambhayoḥ tatra api vṛtteḥ ubhayasya api ayogāt na ca anyasya tathā niṣedhāya traya āśrayaṇam api tu vahneḥ vidhaye sa ca siddhaḥ iti anyasya aniṣedhaḥ abādhakaḥ eva ananumānam tu kāraṇa tva aniścayāt eva na kadācid agnim apekṣya gardabhaḥ karoti iti śaṅkā eva niścayaḥ virodhāt tasyāḥ saṃśaya rūpa tvāt tat niṣedhaḥ api tasya eva parīkṣayā na anyasya iti asthānam evaṃvidha pralāpasya nanu tathā api vahniḥ kāraṇam iti avadhāraṇa anupapatteḥ dusthā eva sthitiḥ na hi vahniḥ eva kāraṇam anyasya api anirākaraṇāt indhanasya api paramārthataḥ kāraṇa tvāt ca na ca kāraṇam eva anārabdha dhūmasya api saṃbhavāt iti na ca udyam trividhasya api vyavacchedasya siddheḥ 
JŚNĀ_321,1–321,3	 tathā hi sāmagrī apekṣayā anyasya cchede dravya vyapekṣayā yogyatā āyām ayogasya siddhaḥ atyantam ca karmaṇi yadā hi dahana śabdena tad upalakṣitā sāmagrī samāsena abhidhīyate tadā saḥ eva iti anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ yadā tu dahana dravyam eva tadā api kāraṇa tvam nāma yadi yogyatā tadā kāraṇam eva iti ayoga vyavacchedaḥ atha kriyā eva tadā api bhavati eva iti atyanta ayoga vyavacchedaḥ ca siddhaḥ sa ca ayam iyān vyāpāraḥ trividhasya eva pratyakṣa anupalambhasya śakyaḥ iti yuktam atra bhāge bhaṭṭa arcaṭapāda vyākhyānam eva 
JŚNĀ_321,4–321,7	 bhagavataḥ vārtikakārasya api svayam eva kumbhasya kumbhakāreṇa karaṇam bhasmanaḥ agninā śastra ādinā vraṇa ādeḥ ca bruvataḥ matam eva tat katham punar kāryatva aviśeṣāt dhūmāt iva bhasmanaḥ api na agneḥ anumānam na deśa kāla ādi apekṣayā abhimata tvāt tathā hi kim api udaya mātrāya kāryam hetum apekṣate prabandha sthitaye api anyat kāla vid tad apekṣayā 
JŚNĀ_322,1	 tatra kalasa bhasma ādibhyaḥ janmani eva apekṣita parebhyaḥ atas eva artha antara apekṣa prabandha vaidhuḥ yebhyaḥ atītaḥ eva hetu sannidheḥ kālaḥ śakya niścayaḥ na tu vartamānaḥ iti na pravṛtti ādi saṅkaraḥ uttarebhyaḥ ca dhūma āloka ādibhyaḥ daśā viśeṣa apekṣā anapekṣa prabandha vaidhuḥ yebhyaḥ upādāna vikala tayā pravāha vicchittaye anapekṣita parebhyaḥ vartamānaḥ eva iti na doṣaḥ etad apekṣayā tu ācārya dharma uttarasya paścima dvayasya śrayaṇa yatnaḥ phalet api na tu pañcaka niyamaḥ tadā api para bhāga bhāj pratyakṣa pūrvake anupalambhe anya apekṣā abhāvāt iti prathamam eva śreyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_323,1	 yat yat bhāvyate tat tat bhāvanā prakarṣa paryante sphuṭa ābham saṃbhavati yathā kāmukasya kāminī ākāraḥ bhāvyante ca parama puruṣa arthinā kṣaṇika tve nairātmya ādayaḥ vastu dharmā iti atra idam cintyate bhavatu bhāvanayā mānasī sphuṭa ābhatā kevalam bhūta abhūta artha sādhāraṇa tvāt bhāvanā udbhūta vaiśadyasya api saṃvāda niyama anupapatteḥ kutas prāmāṇyam iti katham pratyakṣatā yogi jñānasya iti 
JŚNĀ_323,2	 atha anumāna vyavasthāpita vastu bhāvanāyāḥ tat vyabhicāra śaṅkā virahāt tad jasyā api jñānasya kutas śaṅkā avakāśaḥ iti ced āstām tāvat anumāna pauruṣa pratyāśā pratyakṣeṇa api vidyut dahana ādikam gṛhītvā bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jātam sthiratara tad ākāram ca jñānam bhavet yāvat na viparīta bhāvanā abhiyoga paryantaḥ astam gataḥ ca tad viṣayaḥ iti katham pramāṇa upanīta vastu gocara tve api saṃvāda āśvāsaḥ anastaṅgame api vā tāvat kālam analasya na avasthā niyamaḥ samudra ādeḥ api evam mahīruha ādīnām ca alpa alpa kālena vaisadṛśyam dṛśyate mahīdhara ādīnām ca dahana aśani prabhṛtibhiḥ bhāvanā tu yām avasthām abhiniviśya bhavati tad eka avasthā niyataḥ sphuṭa abhāva iti tad viṣaya apekṣayā bhrāntiḥ ākāra bhedāt iti na prāmāṇyam na ca pratyakṣatā yadā ca hālikaḥ eva havya aśanam anumāya bhāvanayā sphuṭyet tadā na tat yogi jñānam parama artha viṣaya tva abhāvāt iti pratyakṣa antara prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_323,3	 atra ucyate na hi tāvat iyam anantarāśaṃkā saṃbhavinī bhāvanā hi rāga śoka ādi āveśāt vā svayam upanamet prayojana anurodhāt vā prekṣavatā saṃcintya ārabhyeta tatra parama prayojana vārtā virahāt dāha pāka ādi mātram anumitena eva hutabhujā tad deśa upasarpaṇāt siddham anupamṛṣṭa deśe api bhāvanā vaiphalyam purastāt tu bhāvite parisphurati tad artha apekṣayā bhrāntiḥ evam śoka ādi upanatāyām api bhāvanāyām tat katham pratyakṣa antara prasaṅga saṅgatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_323,4–324,1	 astu vā yathā kathañcid tādṛś artha bhāvanā śirasi śṛṅga bhāvanā vat atha api abhrama pakṣe yogi jñānaḥ eva antarbhāvaḥ yogaḥ hi samādhiḥ manasaḥ ekāgra tā lakṣaṇaḥ iti na doṣaḥ śṛṅga ākāra sphuṭobhāve tu pṛthvī kṛtsnā ityādi vat apratyakṣa tā eva nirālambana tvāt yat vārtikam tatra pramāṇam saṃvādi yat prāgnirṇīta vastu vat tat bhāvanā jam pratyakṣam iṣṭam śeṣāḥ upaplavāḥ 
JŚNĀ_324,2	 yat punar astam gate api vastuni ākāra antara bhāji vā sthira ākāra tayā bhāvanā yasya nirālambana tvam āpāditam sarvasya tat api vastu bhāvanā pakṣe śobhate na vastu dharma bhāvanā pakṣe vastu dharmāḥ ca kṣaṇika tva ādayaḥ saṃsāra vairāgyāt sphuṭībhāva bhājaḥ bhāvayitum upakrāntāḥ atha ekatra pramāṇa pariśuddhe api bhāvanā janita vaiśadyasya vastuni visaṃvāda saṃdarśanāt anyatra api kaḥ āśvāsaḥ pramāṇa pariśuddhim antareṇa āśvāsa hetoḥ api asya abhāvāt tasyāḥ ca saṃvāda niyatau= asāmarthyāt tat na sthirā sthira viṣaya tvena viśeṣāt asthiram hi vastu pradhvaṃsa vikārābhyām grasyate iti na saṃvādaḥ vastu dharmāḥ tu kṣaṇika tva ādayaḥ na kadācid vicchidyante iti tad viṣayaḥ sphuṭībhāvaḥ sarvadā sa ālambanaḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_324,3	 nanu etat api na yuktam na hi kṣaṇika tva ādikam nāma kiñcid asti vastu sattve vā tat eva nityam āsaktam iti sarvam ayatna śīrṇam avastu tve ca tat eva nirālambana tvam tasmāt bhavat mate api kṣaṇika tvam nāma kṣaṇikāḥ eva bhāva rāśayaḥ aparāmṛṣṭa bhedāḥ bheda antara tiraskāreṇa ucyante tathā ca sati kṣaṇika tva bhāvanā iti api kṣaṇika padārtha sārtha bhāvanā iti eva arthaḥ tāvatā tāni eva vastūni bhāvyamānāni sphuṭībhavanti iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ atha abhinnāni api kṣaṇika tva ādīni bhinnāni iva tāvat pratibhānti tathā api adhyavasāyāt vastu gatāni eva bhāvyante iti na tad doṣāt muktiḥ taṭastha tayā bhāvayitum aśakyatvāt tathā ca truṭyat rūpam etat vastu jātam iti ayam eva ākāraḥ bhāvanāyāḥ 
JŚNĀ_324,4	 tat katham vastu tattva bhāvanā pakṣe api vastu saṃsparśa parihāraḥ parihāre ca avastu antara bhāvanā eva syāt na dharma bhāvanā satyam yadi api vastu tattva bhāvanayā api sāmānyena ākṣiptam vastu tathā api na tasya sphuṭībhāvaḥ tattva mātra tātparya paryavasānāt tattva bhāvanā eva hi sphuṭībhavantī saṃsāra apasāraṇa saraṇiḥ na hi kāminī kalevaram sākṣātkṛtam rāga saṃkocam ācarati kim tu anitya duḥkha ādi tvam eva atas tatra eva tātparyāt tat eva vaiśadyam āpadyate bhāvanayā na vastu nanu tatra tātparye api vastu dharmaḥ sphuṭībhavati na vastu iti kā saṅgatiḥ bhāvanayā dvayoḥ api kroḍīkaraṇāt kīdṛśaḥ vā dharmiṇam aspṛśataḥ dharma mātrasya sphuṭībhāvaḥ tat etat ākāśa citraṇam na khalu hālikasya api pratyayam ātanoti 
JŚNĀ_325,1	 na eṣa doṣaḥ dharmiṇaḥ sphuṭībhāvam aspṛśataḥ api dharma mātrasya sphuṭībhāva darśanāt kevalam vastu pratyāsatti anapekṣya na sphuṭa sphuraṇam iti syāt sphuṭībhāvaḥ api tasya tad viṣaya sannidhau yatnam anapekṣya jhagiti tad jñāne tat tat ākāra sphuraṇam nāma vastu prattyā asatti apekṣā tu na kṣīyate dharma tvāt eva priya tva ādi vat tathā hi nimba rasa ādau tāvat priya tvam abhyasyamānam sphuṭībhavat dṛṣṭam na ca nimba ādeḥ sa dharmaḥ iti tad bhāvanayā nimba ādi api sva janma deśa stham rasanā prasaṅgi vā sphuṭam sphurat asti yāvat na viparyaya bhāvanā abhiyoga prakarṣaḥ na ca sphuṭībhūtam priya tvam api taṭastham upalabhyate nimba ādi anubhavam anapekṣya kim tu yadā yadā nimba ādi anubhavaḥ tadā tadā jhagiti priya tvam anubhava viṣayaḥ na prāk iva udvejakam anubhayam vā iti eṣa eva dharma sphuṭībhāva arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_325,2	 yathā hi kāminī ādi vastuni sphuṭībhūte api na yathā samaya siddhaḥ tattva sphuṭībhāvaḥ tathā tattva bhāvanayā api na vastu sphuṭībhāvaḥ ubhayoḥ paraspara avyabhicāre api iti kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ atha na bāhya dharmaḥ priya tvam asādhāraṇa tvāt bhāvanā ādheya tvāt ca iti ced kasya punar ayam dharmaḥ astu priya tva ādiḥ pratyātma vedya tvena apahnotum aśakyaḥ jñānasya ced bāhyasya priya tvam abhyasyamānam jñānasya sphuṭībhavati iti kaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ utkṛṣṭam idam nimbāt iti bhāvanā kāraḥ api na tat jñānam utkṛṣṭam iti atha api jñānasya eva priya tayā sphuṭībhāve na jātu kaścid apriyam anubhavet na hi bahis iva jñānam api kādācid ka sannidhānam jñānasya api kasyacid eva priya tva vyaktiḥ iti ced kiṃkṛtaḥ punar ayam vibhāgaḥ yadi abhyāsa kṛtaḥ yatra eva abhyāsaḥ bāhye tatra eva bhavatu tad anapekṣāyām kasyacid api pratyāsatti vipra karṣa abhāvāt manaḥ mātram adhiṣṭhānībhūtam iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_325,3	 bāhye tu viśiṣṭa jāti nimba ādikam abhyāsa viṣayīkṛtam iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ jñānam api tarhi bhāvita nimba gocaram eva pratyāsannam iti viśeṣaḥ evam tarhi idam āyātam yat vastu kenacid rūpeṇa bhāvyate tat vastu vihāya tat pratyāsannasya sphuṭībhāvaḥ iti kāminīm bhāvayataḥ tad pratyāsannasya pitṛ ādeḥ eva sphuṭībhāva prasaṅgaḥ na kāminyāḥ atha viṣayasya viṣayiṇā jñānena saha viśiṣṭā eva kācid pratyāsattiḥ evam api nimbe priya tayā abhyasyamāne tat jñānam priya tayā sphurati iti nimba ādikam prāgvat apriyam eva bhavet tatas yathā sarpa ādau= apriye parihāra aṅga tayā tat niścayaḥ priyaḥ eva na sarpa ādiḥ tathā idam api iti kṛtam bhāvanayā 
JŚNĀ_325,4	 atha bhāvanā balāt priya ākāram eva tad viṣayam jñānam upajāyate iti kalpanā evam sati nimba rasaḥ priyaḥ bhāvyate iti tad viṣaya jñānam eva priya ākāram bhāvyate iti āpannam sphuṭa ābhatā api tasya tad viṣaya upanidhau tad grāhi jñānasya jhagiti yatnam anapekṣya priya ākāra sphuraṇam na viṣayasya eva asat nihitasya sākṣāt bhāvaḥ evam kṣoṇīdhara ādayaḥ api kṣaṇinaḥ bhāvyante iti tad viṣaya jñānam eva kṣaṇikā ākāram bhāvyate iti tasya api sphuṭībhāvaḥ bhūdhara ādi sannidhau tad grāhakasya kṣaṇikā ākāra udayaḥ na bhūdhara ādeḥ asannihitasya api sphuṭībhāvaḥ iyam eva dharma bhāvanā śabda artha niṣṭhā iti na prastuta vastu kṣatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_326,1	 vastutas tu priya tvam nāma sukha kara tvam tatra yat viṣaye yasya priya tva bhāvanā tad citta santānam bhāvanā pariṣkṛtam upādānam upādāya sa viṣayaḥ sahakārī sukham utpādayati iti sthitau na sarvam priya tvam tatra prīṇaka tvam tu tasya eva dharmaḥ sarvam ca prati iti na doṣaḥ sa ca abhyāsāt eva evam kṛpā ādiṣu api mānaseṣu dharmeṣu yojyam duḥkhinam uddharāmi iti duḥkhi para uddharaṇa bhāvanāyāḥ sphuṭībhāvaḥ tad viṣaya sannidhau jhagiti tat jñānam tad anurūpa anuṣṭhāna prasava hetuḥ evam śuci kapāla bhāvānāyām api nairghṛṇyasphuṭībhāvaḥ nāma karpara upasarpaṇe veditavyaḥ na tu saṃbandhi nā eba pratyāsannena itareṇa vā saha sphurat tā yathā uktam sarvajña siddhau 
JŚNĀ_326,2–326,3	 labdhaḥ bodha dayā ādibhiḥ tu atiśayaḥ tad gocara upasthitaunā evam yatnam apekṣate svarasataḥ pratyātmam unmīlati tasmāt kṣaṇika tva dharma abhyāse api prakarṣa gāmini yāvat anubhavitavyam anena tāvat truṭyat rūpam asmad ādi darśana vilakṣaṇam eva yathā asmākam atyanta sadṛśe api bhinna deśa paṭutara bheda anukāri darśanam vikalpaḥ ca jhagiti eva tathā syāt anuṣṭhānam vā tad anurūpam evam yoginaḥ kṣaṇa bhedini bhāva dvaye darśana vikalpau sthairya ādi bhrama udbhava rāga ādi kalaṅkān aṅkitam ca asya cetaḥ iti iyatī tasya sphuṭa ābhatā 
JŚNĀ_326,4	 nanu paribhāṣā mātram etat iyati eva tasya prakarṣa gatiḥ iti tathā adṛṣṭa tvāt iti na uttaram yadi api dṛṣṭam evam tathā api tāvatā eva sthitiḥ iti na śakyam prastute kadācid atiricyamānaḥ prakarṣaḥ viṣayeṇa eva saha sphuṭayet iti na pūrva doṣa śoṣaḥ priya tva ādau= api ca kadācid anyā eva niṣṭhā iti ced bhavatu iti bhāvanayā abhimatām sthitim ullaṅghya sphuṭībhāva śaṅkā yaḥ tu prekṣā pūrva kārī sva artham para artham vā bhāvanā abhiyuktaḥ tasya tāvatā eva kṛtārtha tvam jātam iti kim iti śrama antaram āviśet anarthaka tvāt anartha kara tvāt ca yathā bhojya bhaiṣajya ādiṣu abhimata pāka prāptau yathā ca atra saṃbhavati api pāka antare abhimate tāvatā eva pāka prakarṣa paryanta vyavahāraḥ tathā prastute api iti na kaścid doṣaḥ tat evam yadi api dharmi viṣaya bhāvanāyāḥ sphuṭībhāvaḥ visaṃvāda saṃvāsī sthairya viparyayāt viṣayasya tathā api na yathā ukta dharma gocarāyāḥ tad āśaṅkā iti sthitam yadi evam anucitaḥ kāminī dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti na ca udyam bhāvanāyāḥ vaiśadya mātra nidarśanasya vivakṣita tvāt atas eva vārtikam ghṛṇauvairāgya rāga vat iti āha 
JŚNĀ_327,1	 tat tarhi yogi jñānam indriya jñānāt bhinnam abhinnam vā kim ca atas abheda pakṣe na yogi jñānam nāma pratyakṣa bhedaḥ indriya jñānena eva saṃgrahāt na ca bhāvanā upaskṛta santānasya tathā udayāt bheda vyavasthā rasāyana ādi saṃskāra apekṣayā api pratyakṣa antara vyavasthā prasaṅgāt bheda pakṣe ca bhāvanā saṃbhavam kṣaṇika tva sākṣāt kāri jñānam anyat anyathā iti sādhvī śuddhiḥ indriya jñānasya api tad avasthā āyām a sthairya sākṣātkaraṇe kṛtam yogi jñānena na ca tasya ākasmikaḥ kṣaṇika tva bodhaḥ bhāvanā udbhata vaiśadyasya hi tad vodhaḥ na ca indriya jñāne bhāvanā api tu manasaḥ tām antareṇa api sākṣāt kriyā lābhe ca bhāvanā vaiyarthyam 
JŚNĀ_327,2	 kim ca bhinna kālam vā tad dvayam abhinna kālam vā tatra abhinna kāla tvam anupapannam indriya jñāna upanītasya hi dharmiṇaḥ kṣaṇika tā sākṣātkartavyāḥ bhāvanā bhāvinā anubhavena anyathā dharmiṇam dharmam ca svātantryeṇa sākṣāt kurvataḥ dharmi dvārakam dūṣaṇam anivāryam na ca dharma bhāvanāyāḥ vastu sākṣātkāra vyāpāraḥ nimba ādi vat iti niveditam etat tasmāt indriya jñāna gocarāt adhikaḥ eva tattva sākṣātkāraḥ iti prathamam indriya jñānam dharmi grāhi paścāt mānasam kṣaṇikatā āgrāhi iti niyataḥ kāla bhedaḥ kāla bhede ca prācīna apekṣayā paścimasya gṛhīta grāhi tvāda prāmāṇyam ekārtha tve bhinna artha tve tu indriya jñāna gocarāt anyatra pravartamānam svātantryeṇa dharmiṇam upasthāpayati iti na ca prācya doṣāt muktiḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_327,3	 atra brūmaḥ prathama pakṣe tāvat na vastu dūṣaṇam tādṛś puruṣa viśeṣasya sādhyasya siddha tvāt vyavasthā dūṣaṇam api na asti sādhya tayā eva tādṛśādaśa viśeṣasya loka atikrānta rūpa tve tad sādhana viśeṣa pratipādanāya pṛthagjana sādhāraṇa indriya jñānāt bhedena nirdeśāt na ca indriya jñāna śabdena koṣṭha śuddhyā rasāyana ādi janita viśeṣasya iva saṃgraha mātreṇa śāstra sāphalyam atas eva añjana ādi kṛta viśeṣa apekṣayā api na bheda nirdeśaḥ loka atikrānta rūpasya viśeṣasya abhāvāt prayojana apekṣayā hi bahulam eka prakāra saṃgrāhyasya api prakāra bheda nirdeśaḥ iṣyate eva yathā saṃprayukta saṃskāra skandha saṃgṛhītayoḥ api vedanā saṃjñayoḥ vikalpa saṃgṛhītasya api kliṣṭa manaḥ jñānasya tasmāt na indriya yogi jñānayoḥ abheda pakṣe tāvat doṣaḥ tat eva dharmi rūpā apekṣayā indriya jñānam dharma apekṣayā yogi jñānam yathā dharmi pratyakṣam eva niṣedha apekṣayā anupalabdhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_328,1	 bhedaka pakṣe api na tāvat sthairya itara sphuraṇa kṛta upālambha saṃbhavaḥ indriya jñānena api vastu sarva ātmanā gṛhṇatā truṭyat rūpasya eva grahaṇāt adhyavasāyaḥ api pūrvam durlabhaḥ sa saṃprati bhāvanā bala avalambinā manasā āsādita pāṭavena ghaṭitaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ nanu indriyasya api tad daśāyām niratiśaya viśeṣa lābhāt dūra sūkṣma ādi anubhavam kaḥ nivārayati bāhya yogi vat tiraścām api kutaścid karma ākṣepāt mātrayā tathā upalabdheḥ vidyamānānām ca kṣaṇānām avaśyam vaisadṛśyamaṇīyaḥ api saṃbhavi anyathā sarva ātmanā sādṛśye tattva prasaṅgāt tat tathāvidha sūkṣma bheda avadhāraṇa dhūryeṇa akṣa vijñānena eva sādhya siddheḥ anarthakam yogi jñānam 
JŚNĀ_328,2	 etena duḥkha anātma ādi sākṣātkāraḥ vyākhyātaḥ puruṣa vapuṣā ca indriyam antareṇa bhavitum aśakyam iti yogi jñānam anutpādanīyam astu tat api ayuktam na hi saṃbhāvanā mātra upanītam netra balam avalambya saṃvyavahāriṇā prekṣeṇa pramāṇa parāyaṇaḥ mārgaḥ parihartu śakyaḥ tad abhyāsa sahakārikam eva vā tathāvidha indriya śakti sādhanam iti aparihāryeṇa yogi jñānena samāna kakṣatāyām api indriya jñānasya na kaścid doṣaḥ vaiyarthyam ekasya iti ced katareṇa punar sva kāraṇa upanidhāna dharmaṇoḥ anayoḥ sva vyāpāra vaiyarthya bhayāt nivartitavyam bīja ādiṣu ivānti akṣaṇa prāpteṣu 
JŚNĀ_328,3	 aprāmāṇyam ekasya astu iti ced bīja ādiṣu api ekasya akāraṇa tvam astu sarvaṣām samāna sāmarthyānām katamat ekam akāraṇam avasthāpayitum śakyam iti ced pariccheda balavatoḥ jñānayoḥ api kim ekam apramāṇīkriyatām paraspara apekṣayā mā bhūt ubhayam api pramāṇam iti ced bīja ādiṣu api na ekam api kāraṇa tvam astu iti samānam gṛhīta grāhi tvam nāma na asti eva tarhi doṣaḥ iti ced na kāla bhedena tasya svīkārāt gṛhīta grahaṇam hi tat ucyate na gṛhyamāṇasya yathā kṛtasya karaṇa svīkāre akāraka tvam na tu kriyamāṇa karaṇe bīja ādi vat eva tasmāt abhinna kāla pakṣe na eṣa doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_329,1	 nanu tathā api ākāra dvaya sphuraṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti ced satyam satya jñāna ākāraḥ tāvat hanta samāna deśaḥ anyathā bhramatva prasaṅgāt atas tau= ākārau= apratighau kayā rītyā sphurataḥ iti kaḥ nirṇetum kṣamaḥ yat āha acintyā yoginām gatiḥ iti tasmāt dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt kim iva aniṣṭam kim iva vā na doṣaḥ iti ubhayoḥ api na avasaraḥ sama samaya tayā tarhi indriya jñāna anapekṣāyām svātantrya doṣaḥ uktaḥ katham parihartavyaḥ indriya apekṣayā eva parihariṣyate iti na uttaram tadā hi tat api indriya jñānam eva syāt tad vyāpāra anuvidhānāt na yogi jñānam nāma kiñcid 
JŚNĀ_329,2	 tat varam ekam eva svīkṛtam iti na bheda pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ na evam tathā hi mā bhūt indriya apekṣā vīkṣaṇam tu yathā sva sāmarthya anurūpām yogya deśa avasthitim apekṣya sva vijñāna janane pravartate tathā manaindriyam api pravartiṣyate aprāpya kāritāyāḥ ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇa tvāt arthavat tāyāḥ ca manasaḥ api tadānīm iṣṭa tvāt pṛthagjana santānasya tu na tādṛśī śaktiḥ yatas netra śrotra vat manaḥ api tādṛś maryādayā yogya deśa stham artha sahakāriṇam āsādya vedanam utpādayet iti na ati prasaṅgaḥ tad daśāyām tu śruti nayanayoḥ iva manasaḥ api kiyat dūreṇa viṣaya sannidhi vyavasthā iti kaḥ evam pramātum kṣamaḥ kevalam etāvat ucyate yāvat tena śakyam adhigantum su a ākāra arpaṇa saham sahakāri vastu tāvat itarajanāsā dhāraṇa truṭyat rūpa tayā tasya gocarībhavati tathā ca sati vastu ākāraḥ vastu kṛtaḥ eva na bhāvanā janitaḥ iti na visaṃvāda śaṅkā 
JŚNĀ_329,3	 nanu cakṣuḥ ādeḥ tāvat dūratara gocarīkaraṇe dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ manasaḥ tu na indriya atikrameṇa sarva viṣayasya iti ced na para citta jñāna ādīnām saṃbhavāt tat api na iṣṭam ekeṣām iti ced adṛṣṭa mātreṇa pratikṣepa ayogāt upāya abhāvāt iti ced upāya abhāve api na anupalambha mātrāt anyaḥ upāyaḥ tasmāt yadi evam syāt tadā yoginām indriya manaḥ jñānayoḥ bheda pakṣe api na nirvāhaḥ iti upakṣepa arthaḥ nirvāhaḥ tu anyathā api darśitaḥ eva evam ca sati kāla bheda pakṣe api na doṣaḥ yadi sā prathamam manaḥ jñāna vṛttiḥ yadi ca indriya patha atikrameṇa vṛttiḥ indriya jñānam tu tasya tad apekṣayā prāmāṇya virahe api na vyathayati iti alam vistareṇa 
JŚNĀ_330,1	 tat evam yogi jñāne tattva bhāvanā adhikārāt artha ākāraḥ artha kṛtaḥ eva bhāvanayā punar tadīya santāne netre iva añjana viśeṣeṇa śaktiḥ atiśayavatī kācid arpitāḥ yayeta raja nāsā dhāraṇam darśanam asya yathā uktam prāk yadi tarhi viṣaya janyam eva yogi jñānam atīta anāgata parijñānasya kā vārtā tat etat prastāvān avagāhanasya phalam upayukta sarvajña adhikāreṇa hi vastu dharma bhāvanā upakṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ na sarva sarvajña pakṣa apekṣayā tatas atīta anāgatam apratīyamānam api na bādhakam tāvatā eva duḥkha nirodha siddheḥ parasmai ca niṣkampa deśanā avatārāt 
JŚNĀ_330,2–330,3^1	 yat punar kaṇikāyām kṣaṇikā ādi tattva bhāvanā dvāreṇa tad dharmiṇām samasta vastūnām eva bhāvanayā tad ākāra jñāna utpādanāt sākṣātkaraṇam utthāpya dūṣaṇam abhidhīyate yogi jñānasya tat avadhīraṇīyam eva vārtika bhāṣya ādi vāda bahirbhāvāt anyathā ārabdhā eva nitya duḥkha ādi bhāvanā sā ca sarva sarvajña tvam eva arpayati iti yadi abhipretam syāt katham yatnena utthāpya tad parihāraḥ vārtike na asmābhiḥ śakyate jñātum iti santoṣaḥ iṣyate ityādinā bhāṣye ca 
JŚNĀ_330,2–330,3^2	 yadi punar tad avasthā prāptau nirāvaraṇa antaḥkaraṇasya kāruṇya atiśayāt sarva ākāra para artha prārthana para tayā sakala gocara cāriṇi cetasi cira virūḍha utsāhasya tādṛś upāya viśeṣa adhigamaḥ bhaviṣyati yam anutiṣṭhataḥ pratiparamāṇu sarva vastu viṣayam yathādeśa kālam pratyavasthā anukāri sphuṭataram jñāna mudīyāt tadā na tāvat vastu vyabhicāra kṛtam visaṃvādi tvam na api nirālambana tvam vastūnām eva pratibhāsanāt atha utpatti sārūpyābhyām ālambana vyavasthā bhinna kālam katham grāhyam iti ced grāhyatām viduḥ hetu tvam eva yukti jñāḥ jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam iti vacanāt tatas sārūpyam ekam akiñcitkaram iti katham anālambanatva parihāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_330,4	 tat ayuktam tat khalu lakṣaṇam pṛthagjana apekṣayā bahis artham prati sama samaya bhāvinā anupakāryeṇa jñānena grahaṇa niṣedha param tathā prastāvāt tattvataḥ tu yat eva yatra pratibhāsate tat eva tasya ālambanam ucyate yathā indriya pratyakṣe bāhyam anyatra su ākāraḥ pratibhāsa vaśāt pratyakṣasya grahaṇa agrahaṇe iti hi prathama pariccheda vṛttiḥ tatra bāhyasya pratibhāsaḥ nāma tad ākāra utpatti mātram tathā hi bahis vicchinna ākāra udaya saṃvedana mātrāt idam dṛṣṭam iti bhavati na khalu tad saṃkalpa kāle utpattiḥ apara apekṣyate tasyāḥ paścāt niśceya tvāt phala prāptyā vai abhyāsena vā sa ca tad ākāra udayaḥ indriya pratyakṣe arthāt bhrame viplavāt vikalpe vāsanātas tatra artha janye saṃvādaḥ anyatra viparyayaḥ bahis apekṣayā svarūpe sarvatra saṃvāda niyamāt tatas abhipreta saṃvāde vedane tad utpattim antareṇa na saṃvādaḥ na api tādrūpyam iti tatra tad utpatti prārthanā ataeva tad ākāra tā eva prāmāṇyam sārūpya tad utpattī ca saṃvedya lakṣaṇam iti ubhayam avirodhi 
JŚNĀ_331,1	 yatra tu bhāvanā viśeṣa balāt eva devatā ādhipatyāt satya svapna vat artha ākāram arthayāthātmyana antaroyakam jñānam tatra na kiñcid tad utpattyā yat vārtikam rūpa ādeḥ cetasaḥ ca evam aviśuddha dhiyam prati grāhya grāhaka cintā iyam acintyā yoginām gatiḥ iti tasmāt bāhye pṛthagjanasya sārūpya utpattibhyām vedya sthitiḥ yoginaḥ sārūpya mātreṇa api svarūpe yogyatā mātreṇa eva iti nyāyaḥ bhāvi bhūtayoḥ tarhi yadi sva rūpa sphuraṇam vartamāna tā eva syāt 
JŚNĀ_331,2^1	 atha sva rūpam asat nihitam jñānam eva tat ākāram iti nirālambanam niyamena tat api na asti yasmāt asat nihite api arthe bhāvanā balāt ced tad deśa kāla anukāri vijñānam katham anālambanam sphuraṇa rīti viśeṣeṇa tu kāla bheda vikalpa udayāt tad anurūpa anuṣṭhāne niyata tvāt tad prāpteḥ yat bhāṣyam yathā sa dṛṣṭaḥ śarad ādi kāla yuktaḥ tathā tasya na bādhita tvam iti yat vā saṃcitya eva kāla bheda bhāgi vastu rūpa pratītaye samādhi samāpatteḥ vyutthāne kāla bheda adhyavasāyaḥ yathā uktam yat yat icchati vai boddhum ityādi krameṇa tu anābhogam api jñānam avirodhi 
JŚNĀ_331,2^2	 jñāna mātrasya tattvataḥ sphuraṇāt ca na vartamāna tā prasaṅgaḥ yathā nirākāra vāde vastu svarūpasya eva sphuraṇāt iti yadi api ca vartamāne api jñāna ākārasya eva sphuraṇam tathā api vartamāna tayā eva adhyavasāyaḥ tatra evam dūra āsanna ādi bhede api veditavyam tatra yathā adhyavasāya prāptau niyamena saṃvādāt prāmāṇyam anyadā viparyayaḥ yathā svapna kāminī ādau pratibhāsvarga sādhana agniṣṭoma ādi vikalpe ca bhāvinaḥ spaṣṭa rūpasya pratibhāsā bhāvāt eva na cintā na ca tatra prekṣa vyāvahārikasya prāpti niyama niścayaḥ asti 
JŚNĀ_332,1	 prastute api kaḥ niścayaḥ iti ced kasya punar atra niścayaḥ cintyate tasya tad anyasya vā yadi tasya tadā yathā abhyāsāt paritas nirasta vibhrama āśaṅke sādhana jñāne pṛthagjanasya tathā yoginaḥ api atyanta abhyāsāt bhāvi bhūta ādi pratibhāsaḥ kena vāryate atha anyasya tadā idam āyātam yāvat anyasya na prāmāṇya bodhaḥ tāvat na pramāṇam yāvat ca na pramāṇam tāvat na anyasya prāmāṇya bodhaḥ abhra antaḥ iti na kiñcid pramāṇam syāt tad nābhi veśa pāra vaśyena kiñcid tasmāt upāya viśeṣa saciva bhāvanā bhedasya ahatyā sphuraṇāt tādṛś siddhau= eva saṃśayaḥ na tu siddhe api nirālambana tva ādi doṣaiḥ upadravaḥ śakyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_332,2	 yat ca vikalpena bāhyasya agrahaṇe api adhyavaseya tayā sphuṭībhāvam āśaṃkya yat anumānena gṛhyate yat ca adhyavasoyate te dve anya nivṛttī na vastunī sva lakṣaṇa avagāhi tve abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsā anupapatteḥ iti āha tat api asaṃbaddham tathā hi yathā tathā vā bauddha siddhānta gandhena vyavahāraḥ kāminī ākāra vikalpa bhāvana vat kṣaṇika ākārasya api paryante viśada upādeya kṣaṇa prasavaḥ tu durnivāraḥ yadi punar īdṛś apoha sthitiḥ kṣaṇika vikalpa eka talpa śāyinī na kāminī ādi vikalpam anveti iti upapādayiṣyasi tathā eva grahīṣyāmaḥ na ca adhyavaseyam avastu nivṛtti mātram vā dharma uttare api hi mate sva lakṣaṇa madhyavaseyam iti sthitiḥ 
JŚNĀ_332,3	 nanu vahniḥ pratītaḥ mayā iti adhi avasāya ākāraḥ tatra ca sva lakṣaṇa sphuraṇam iti sāhasam vikalpa adhyavasāyayoḥ eka artha tvāt satyam na tu tatra sphurati iti tāvatā sva lakṣaṇa madhya vasitam ucyate asphuraṇe tarhi abodhāt katham avasāyaḥ sphuraṇe api pratibhāsaḥ eva asau katham adhyavasāyaḥ na ca pratibhā asa adhyavasāyau= api eka arthau pratibhāsaḥ hi sākṣāt sphuraṇam asphuraṇe api pravṛtti viṣayīkaraṇam eka vyāvṛti ullekha sāmarthyāt adhyavasāyaḥ bhāṣyam atas atas yat anurūpam anuṣṭhānam tat adhyavaseyam pratibhāsamāna rūpān anupraviṣṭam eva tat ca kvacid āropita mātram kvacid vastu rūpam prakṛtam tu pramāṇa vyāpāra svīkārāt vastu rūpam eva iti katham ucyate nivṛtti mātram avastu vā adhyavaseyam iti āstām tāvat anārabdha nirbandhaḥ pratibhāsaḥ api vikalpe vyāvṛtta ākārasya na vyāvṛtti mātrasya yadi anubhava anusāraḥ sarvadā yat vā tat vā rākṣasa ādi pratibhāseta bhāvanayā punar adhyavasita ākāreṇa pariṇatiḥ abādhyā tatra āropita mātre adhyavaseye nirālambana tvam sati tu tat eva ālambanam yathā anantaram uktam 
JŚNĀ_333,1	 yat tvāha arthasya ālambana pratyaya tvam vijñānam pratīndriya apekṣa tvena vyāptam tat ca asmāt sva viruddha upalabdhyā nivartamānam ālambana pratyaya tvam api arthasya nivartayati iti tatra ālambana pratyaya tva indriya apekṣa tvayoḥ vyāpyaka bhāvam aprasādhya pramāṇena vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhim sphuṭayati iti mahat vaidagdhyam tathā darśanāt iti ced darśana adarśanam eva tarhi pramāṇīkṛtya sthīyatām kim evaṃvidha pramāṇa upanyāsa vyasanena tasmāt indriyam anapekṣya api yadi ālambana bhāvam bhāvaḥ svīkuryāt na bādhakam utpaśyāmaḥ atha atra uktam eva na khalu indhana viśeṣaḥ dhūma hetuḥ iti vinā api dahanam sahasreṇa api saṃskāraiḥ dhūmam ādhatte tad ādhāne vā samasta kārya hetu anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt jñānam api indriya sāpekṣāt arthāt utpatti dharmakam 
JŚNĀ_333,2	 indriya vyāpāra virahe ca samastā para kāraṇa sannidhau= asannidhīyamāna sattākam tat pratibaddham siddham iti katham indriya anapekṣyasya arthasya sva vijñānam pratyālambana bhāvaḥ iti ced etat api para citta jñāna saṃbhavena prativyūḍham iṣṭāḥ ca para citta vedinaḥ cārvāka mī māṃsaka vyatiriktaiḥ cārvāka ādeḥ api sandehāt na aparā gatiḥ sandehe ca vipakṣāt ekānta vyāvṛtteḥ ayogaḥ nanu jñāna kāryasya indriya apekṣā niyamāt eva na anyatra sandehaḥ dahana apekṣa dhūma vat yadi evam rūpa jñānasya vīkṣaṇa apekṣaṇe yādṛśī sāmagrī sā na saṃcaraṇa viśeṣasya caraṇa apekṣaṇe kalayā api hīyate tat katham na dhūma dṛṣṭāntar caraṇa virahiṇām uraga ādīnām gamana niṣedhāya prabhuḥ abhūt katham vā kara ādi vyāpāra saṅgi sa āvega mantra udgāra paramparā asādhyam ekeṣām viṣa śamana ādi kāryam samādhi mātrāt anyasya na ca evam dhūmaḥ api kvacid indhane dahana anapekṣa udayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yatas atra api tathā śaṅkyeta 
JŚNĀ_333,3	 tasmāt bahis bhuvaḥ bhāvāḥ yathā hetu phala bhāvena upalambha bhājaḥ te tathā eva niyata vṛttayaḥ citta santānasya tu vicitra karma abhisaṃskāra sāmarthyāt vicitraḥ eva vivartaḥ atas tad āśraya kāryam ekatra yāvat apekṣam tāvat apekṣam anyatra api iti na niyantum śakyam tat katham para citta vedanā ādeḥ abhāvaḥ eva yadi ca dhūma vat analam anapekṣya na indriyam buddhiḥ tadā sva viṣaye api utkarṣa ghoṣaṇa avīkṣaṇa ādīnām dīnā eva syāt tathā hi yāvat deśam dahana indhana ādi dhūma ādi sādhanam upalabdham na tāvat deśa atikrame samartham evam yāvat deśe asmākam viṣaya indriya ādi vedanam utpādita vat katham tad atikrame gṛdhra ādīnām utpādayet utpādane vā na indhana dahana ādi kakṣām kṣamate citta santāna āśrayā sāmagrī na api dhūma kakṣām buddhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_334,1	 atas sahakāriṇaḥ ati vyavadhāna vat vaikalye api kim na kutaścid viśeṣāt saṃbhāvyate jāti kṛtaḥ asau vibhāgaḥ na citta santāna āśrayāt iti ced na jātiḥ api hi vicitra karma ādhipatyāt eva vicitra svarūpa upasaṃhāra svabhāvāḥ karma ca na cittāt anyat iti na citta āśraya tva parihāraḥ atha indriyasya prāpya kāri tayā sarvā eva vijñāna janana sāmagrī sādhāraṇa deśā iti ucyate tathā api kasmāt punar tāvat dūra deśa sthitimati kvacid locana ruḍha aṃśa śleṣaḥ kvacid arvāk eva viśrāmaḥ iti kim atra vaktavyam karma ādhipatyāt anyatra tasmāt tad āśrayasya citta santānasya citrā eva śaktiḥ 
JŚNĀ_334,2	 na hi bahis api śakyam evam anyathā sadṛśa pradeśa sthāyinoḥ pradīpayoḥ alpakasya kasyacid dūrasāriṇī kiraṇa saṃhatiḥ itarasya punar arvācīna cāriṇī syāt atha mantra prabhāvāt evam api syāt sarīsṛpa dṛśā ca māndyam ādadhāti iti ced sa tarhi citta santateḥ eva prabhāvaḥ mantre api puruṣa māhātmya kṛtaḥ eva yathā vārtike nirṇītam apauruṣeya tve api mantrāṇām na puruṣa nirapekṣāṇām śaktiḥ tatas ca puruṣaḥ eva mantra ādi upāyena bāhya vastu śakti vyavasthām dusthayati iti āyātam iti prastute kim asaṃbhāvanam yathā ca locana apekṣaḥ padārthasya ālambana bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti tat niyate iṣṭaḥ tathā āloka apekṣaḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ iti na saṃtamase paśyeyuḥ ulūka ādayaḥ tathā dṛṣṭa tvāt na doṣaḥ iti ced tathā dṛṣṭa tvāt eva hataḥ asi tathā hi netra ālokayoḥ samāne api apekṣā sādhana nyāye cittasya acintya śakti tayā anyatara ullaṅghana darśanam anyat api śaṅkayā kalaṅkayati na tu adarśane śakyam evam atha tādṛśi jñāna tva sāmānyavanti api kāryāṇi itara jāti bheda bhāñji iti na anapekṣya sādhana sāmagrī bheda mudiyuḥ iti ucyate 
JŚNĀ_334,3	 kena punar prakṛta jñānasya api alaukikasya pṛthagjana jñānena saha eka jātitāyām pratāritaḥ asi asattvāt eva tarhi tasya na jāti bhedaḥ iti ced asattvam iti jāti bheda abhāvāt eva indriya apekṣayā niyama saṃbhavāt iti itaretara āśrayaḥ tasmāt sādhāraṇa karma nirjātānām asmad ādīnām anubhava bhedam pratīndriya apekṣa tvam ālambana tvasya vyāpakam api na sva nivṛttyā anubhava mātram prati nivartakam bhavitum arhati viśeṣa uddeśena eva vyāpti siddheḥ atha anubhava mātram ekīkṛtya vyāptiḥ iṣyate tadā viparyaya adhaka abhāvāt vyāptiḥ eva na sidhyati hetu phala niyama āśrayaḥ tu dhvastaḥ dhūma ādi sādhāraṇya anupapatteḥ vicitra karma abhisaṃskārāt acintya śakti svānta santāna saṃbhāvinaḥ anubhava mātrasya viśeṣa āśraye ca na sarva upasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ viśeṣavat tvam nāma 
JŚNĀ_335,1	 yat api ayam āha bhāvanāyāḥ ca abhūta arthāyāḥ artha anapekṣāyāḥ eva viśada jñāna janana sāmarthyam upalabdham kāma ātura ādi vartinyā iti bhūtārthā api tad nirapekṣā eva samartha iti na arthasya ālambana pratthaya tvam śakya avagamam iti tatra api kā iyam artha nirapekṣa tā kimartha aviṣaya tvam sākṣāt artha apratibhāsaḥ vā yat vai artha ahetu tvam atha artha vyabhicāraḥ iti pakṣāḥ prathama pakṣe bhūta artha tvam aviṣaya tvam ca iti vyāhatam tat pra bhava anumānasya iva tasya api adhyavasāya apekṣayā tad viṣaya tvāt pratibhāsā apekṣayā tu mā bhūt tad viṣaya tvam tasyāḥ tad janita jñānasya eva tat iṣṭeḥ iti na dvitīyaḥ api pakṣaḥ tṛtīyaḥ asaṃbhavī sva prabhava anumāna dvāreṇa tasya api bhūta artha kārya tvāt ataeva vyabhicāraḥ api siddhaḥ iti na caturthaḥ atas tad javi śada jñānasya saṃvāda niyamāt arthasya katham ālambana tvam aśakya avagamam tasmāt prācīnarītyā eva codyam cāru parihāraḥ ca uktaḥ eva 
JŚNĀ_335,2^1	 yat ca anena purastāt tanāḥ eva asya viṣa ya kṣaṇāḥ grāhyāḥ yujyante na pūrvatarāḥ ityādinā bhūtānāgata bodhi niṣedhāya prayattam tat prāk eva pratyādiṣṭam prakṛta sarvajña pakṣe tu yāvantaḥ jñānam upajanayantaḥ sva jñāna gocara tām anubhavanti tāvantaḥ kṣaṇika duḥkha an ātma ākāreṇa eva iti etāvatā eva sādhya siddhiḥ pratīta atīteṣu smaraṇam bhāvini saṃbhāvanā iva iti yadi atīte smaraṇam eva tat katham samudaya ākārāṇām sphuṭībhāvaḥ iti ced pañca skandhāḥ eva uttara apekṣayā samudayaḥ tatra ayam eva samudaya ākāra sphuṭī bhāvaḥ yat abhimukhībhūteṣu para apekṣayā jhagiti tad anurūpa vikalpa anuṣṭhāna ādi prasava hetuḥ sphuraṇa rītiḥ kācid yayā pṛthagjanāt vibhāga bhāgī bhavati pūrvavat atīteṣu ca tathā eva paṭutara smaraṇa udayaḥ para anapekṣa svarūpa mātreṇa tu kṣaṇikā ādi ākāraiḥ duḥkha satya pratītiḥ 
JŚNĀ_335,2^2	 nanu vikalpāḥ nāma saha saṃbhava svabhāva tvāt yadā duḥkha ākārāṇām avasāyaḥ tadā na samudaya ākārāṇām paścāt ca nirviṣayaḥ avasāyaḥ iti ced satyam etat ekaika satyasya api na ākāra catuṣṭaya vikalpanam eka kālam na ca kācid evam kṣatiḥ grahaṇa rīti viśeṣaḥ eva hi sphuṭībhūta sakala ākāraḥ sākṣātkāraṇam yatas bīja vikalpa avakīrṇa abhimata vikalpa krama āvirbhāvaḥ yathā hi nīla cala vikaca ādi viśeṣaṇam utpalam paśyataḥ janasya na vikalpa krameṇa tad viṣaya sakala ākāra sākṣāt kriyā vyāghātaḥ tathā prastute api unneyaḥ aparasparāḥ ca kṣaṇāḥ tava eva apara aparaiḥ anubhavaiḥ sākṣāt yante vikalpāḥ ca yathā abhimatam pravartante gṛhīta anusandhāna rūpāḥ anubhavena eva ca sārvajña sthitiḥ iti veditavyam evam nirodha dharma mārga satyayoḥ api sva saṃvedanena vedane sakala m ūhyam 
JŚNĀ_336,1	 yat ca sarva vastunaḥ mithas kathañcid sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca saṃbandha dvārakam katipaya darśane sarva darśanasya dūṣaṇam tad anabhyupagamena eva gatam saṃbandha dvārakaḥ tu viśeṣaṇa tayā samasta vastu viṣayaḥ saṅkalpaḥ yadi tad avasthāyām janma paramparā smaraṇa saṃbhave bhavet na doṣam utpaśyāmaḥ yathā abhyāsavataḥ hutāśa ādi darśane jhagiti eva edhasya kāryam hetuḥ ca pāvakasya ayam iti vikalpaḥ tathā vikalpa gṛhītānām bhāvanā prakarṣe vaiśadyam api astu na tu saṃbandha mātreṇa eka darśanāt anya darśanam saṅgirāmahe mā bhūt vā vaiśadyam api sarva viṣaya vikalpa mātreṇa eva saṃvādinā sārvajñya kārya paryāpteḥ tad avasthasya athavā sva ālambana pratyaya mātra gocaram eva avikalpakam samasta vastu viśiṣṭa ālambanādhyavasāya hetuḥ tena avasāya anugata vyāpāram avikalpam api samasta vastu viṣayam bhavati yat āha 
JŚNĀ_336,2–336,3	 vyavasyanti īkṣaṇāt eva sarva ākārān mahā ādhiyaḥ etat tu āśaṅkya yat āha katipaya vastu avalambanasya anubhavasya kutastyaḥ eṣa mahimā yatas samasta vastu avasāyaḥ rāga ādi āvaraṇa vigamāt iti ced tarhi yathāvat vastūni paśyet na tu punar asmāt aśeṣa vastu vyavasāya nirmāṇa kauśalam asya yujyate tattva āvaraka tā hi sulabhā malānām na punar vijalpa nirmāṇa pratibandha tā iti 
JŚNĀ_336,4	 atra paryanuyogaḥ kim tāvat vastuni dṛśyamāne vikalpa pratibandhaḥ eva na dṛṣṭaḥ uta kleśa kṛtaḥ vā iti tat ca dvayam na asti na hi anubhava vat sarva ākāra kalpanam kvacid na ca tad vikalpa vaikalyam kleśa anantareṇa yadā hi priye vastuni dṛṣṭe doṣavatī api doṣa avikalpanam tadā vyaktam rāgaḥ hetuḥ yadā punar apriye guṇavatī api guṇa avikalpanam tadā dveṣaḥ anabhyāse tu sarva sadrūpā vikalpanam moha kṛtam eva na ca kambala ādi vat āvaraṇam kim tu santāna vaiguṇya ādhānena tatas yathā yathā moha ādi parājayaḥ tathā tathā yatnena vaiguṇya vyāvṛttyā tāvat su ākāreṣu yadā dhiyaḥ vyavasāya bhājaḥ paryante sarva ākāreṣu sarva vastuṣu yadi syuḥ na kaścid virodhaḥ buddhi pāṭava paramparayā dṛṣṭeṣu smṛteṣu api smaraṇa saṃbhavāt īkṣamāṇeṣu ca gāḍhatara smaraṇa saṃskāra ādhānāt anādi ananta tvāt janmanaḥ eka prakāra niścayasya ca tad jātīya aśeṣa niścaya svabhāva tvāt na sarva viṣaya saṅkalpān udaya kṛtaḥ doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_337,1–337,2	 yat ca idam ūce apramāṇam ca tat nitānta viśat a ābha tve sati bhāvanā janita tvāt yat nitānta viśat a ābha tve sati bhāvanā jam vijñānam tad apramāṇam yathā anumita bhāvita viṣaya viśadam jñānam iti tatra vahneḥ anumāya bhāvanā eva na asti iti darśita tvāt dṛṣṭānta abhāvaḥ yat ca anena kāvyāyitam asti ca iha śiśira bhara saṃbhṛta jaḍima mantharatara kāya kāṇḍasya anumita vahni bhāvanā abhiyogaḥ iti tatra yadi jāḍya ātura tayā svayam citta āveśāt bhāvanā upanatiḥ tadā kva anumāna vārtā anumānam hi pravṛtti pāṭava bhṛtā prārthyate tad avasthasya tathā aśaktau ca kim bhāvanayā sphuṭībhāvaḥ eva vā purastāt aḥ tu kva anumāna avakāśaḥ na hi kāmukaḥ yāvat na kāminīm anumimīte tāvat na bhāvanāyām abhiyujyate iti asti saṃbhavaḥ tasmāt jāḍya āturasya bhāvanā janita vaiśadyam agni jñāna mātram astu dṛṣṭāntaḥ tat api kāminī dṛṣṭāntena sva kāvya alaṃkṛtena gatam na ca ekasya bhāvanā bhuvaḥ jñānasya visaṃvādāt aprāmāṇye aprāmāṇyam anyasya saṃvādinaḥ api iti nyāyaḥ indriya udayasya api sarvasya keśa ādi viplava vada prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt 
JŚNĀ_337,3	 yat ca bhāvanā prakarṣa lakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya sāmyena phalayoḥ api dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭa antikayoḥ sāmya niyamāya prapañcitam tatra api kim na cakṣuḥ eva dvi candra eka candra darśanayoḥ samānam kāraṇam utpaśyasi timira upaghāta anupaghāta kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ cakṣuṣoḥ iti ced bhāvanayoḥ api bhūtābhūta viṣaya tvena kim na bhedaḥ cakṣuṣi timira kṛtaḥ vikāraḥ eva kaścid bhedakaḥ bhāvanāyā tad vaiśadye vā kaścid sva rūpa bhedaḥ abhede api viṣayasya iti ced na saṃvāda itara kāraṇa tvena śakti bhedasya eva balīyasaḥ saṃbhave kim apareṇa sa viṣa itarayoḥ iva annayaḥ rūpa rasa dṛṣṭīnāma bhedena hetu hetvābhāsa bhāvinyoḥ iva vā sādhya buddhyoḥ tad kṛta pravṛttyoḥ ca kim ca locane api na vikāraḥ iti eva doṣaḥ añjana janite api vikārī doṣa vyavasthā prasaṅgāt kim tu bhrānti hetu tayā iti śakti kṛtaḥ eva tatra api bhedaḥ tat evam bhāvanā prakarṣeṇa sphuṭa ābha tvam eva sādhyate na prāmāṇyam yatas dṛṣṭānta asiddhi ādi doṣa avakāśaḥ prāmāṇyam tu bhūta artha tvena saṃvādāt pratyakṣa tvam ca kalpanā poḍha abhra anta tvena iti tāvatā eva asya aśeṣaḥ api avidyā duṣṭa nayaḥ pratihataḥ veditavyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_338,1	 nyāya prakīrṇa kakārasya api abhūta viṣayatā upalambhaḥ tāvat kṣaṇa bhaṅga ādi sādhanāt eva prativyūḍhaḥ yat ca anumānasya vikalpa tām prastutya āha tatra yāvat vikalpaiḥ upadarśitam tat sarvam asat śabda saṃsṛṣṭa tvāt tasmiḥ ca bhāvyamāne asatye tāvakasya vikalpasya bhāva nayā upahite viśada bhāve śabda saṃsṛṣṭa grāhya tva nimittam vikalpaka tvam vyāvartate tad vyāvṛttau ca grāhya sarva śabda saṃsṛṣṭam nivartate atas nirvikalpakam api yogi jñānam nirviṣayam prasaktam iti 
JŚNĀ_338,2	 tatra kim idam nirviṣaya tvam nāma grāhya ākāra bhraṃśāt anākāra tā vā yat vāni ākāra tā atha tad ākāra tve api tad vastu rūpa asaṃsargi tā iti prathama pakṣaḥ tāvat asaṃbhavī jñānasya nirākāra tva anupapatteḥ kāminī ādau bhāvanayā tad ākārasya eva vaiśadya darśanāt ataeva na dvitīyaḥ api pakṣaḥ yat ayam eva āha śoka āturasya api niruddha indriya vyāpārasya tanaya bhāvanayā pitṛ ādi pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt iti kevalam na ca asmin saṃsṛṣṭe bhāvyamāne sphuṭam anyat rūpam bhavati iti prastutya ākulaḥ pralāpaḥ eṣaḥ anena hi bhāvanayā sarvathā sphuṭībhāvaḥ eva niṣiddhaḥ vikalpam antareṇa bhāvanā anupapatteḥ vikalpasya ca śabda saṃsargam antareṇa iti kva sphṭībhāvaḥ tanaya bhāvanāyām ca pitṛ ādi pratibhāsa prasaṅga vādinā tanaya pratibhāsaḥ anujñātaḥ eva anyathā tanaya abhāvanayā api tanaya pratibhāsa prasaṅgāt iti abhidadhīta na ca aniṣṭi mātram dṛṣṭa apalāpāya prabhavati 
JŚNĀ_338,3	 tathā ca kaṇikā ākāraḥ eva kāminī ākāra vaiśadyam kāmukasya vacana ceṣṭā viśeṣa kāvya racanayā draḍhayati sma svayam ca ayam bhāvanayā upahite viśada bhāve ityādi vacanam kena ākāreṇa carita arthīkuryāt tasmāt anya bhāvanayā na anya sphuṭībhāvaḥ iti adhyavaseya apekṣayā anya tva vyavasthāpanam sādhu na vikalpa rūpasya gocara abhimatasya ca parasparam tayoḥ ekatā adhyāsāt spaṣṭībhāvaḥ api hi bahis abhimatasya paryante vikalpa upādeya kṣaṇasya eva sphuṭasya udayaḥ tāvatā eva sa viṣayaḥ tena sākṣātkṛtaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ kevalam sati vastuni tad ākāra jñānam saṃvādi visaṃvādi tu asati iti cintita prāyam 
JŚNĀ_338,4	 atas eva tṛtīyaḥ api vikalpaḥ pratyuktaḥ saṃvāda sākṣātkriyābhyām anyasya jñānena vastu rūpa saṃsparśasya nirvaktum aśakteḥ api ca tanaya bhāvanāyām iti atra kaḥ tanaya bhāvanā arthaḥ tanayasya punar punar cetasi niveśanam iti ced cetasi niveśana arthaḥ api tad ākāra vikalpanam eva evam tarhi yat ayam pralapati kṣaṇika tve bhāvye samāropite vāstavam kṣaṇika tvam eva yogi jñāna pratibhāsi iti ced na sattva asattvayoḥ ekatva abhāva ātmake hi bhede satya satyabhāvane api yadi satya pratibhāsaḥ sa tarhi satya tanaya abhyāse api śabda sāmyāt abhedinaḥ tanaya saṃjñakasya kasyacid aparasya svarūpa pratibhāsa prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt abhūta viṣayāt abhyāsāt nirvikalpakam api saṃvādān na pramāṇam iti tat api dhvastam samāropita bhāvanāyāḥ eva abhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_339,1	 yathā hi tanayaḥ tanayaḥ iti vikalpa abhyāsaḥ tathā yadi samāropitam kṣaṇika tvam samāropitam kṣaṇika tvam iti vikalpaḥ tadā samāropita kṣaṇika bhāvanā bhavet na ca evam kim tu kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāḥ iti tatas sattha tanaya vat vāstavam eva kṣaṇika tvam bhāvyate satya tanaya bhāvanāyāḥ vai anyaḥ ākāraḥ vaktavyaḥ kṣaṇika vikalpena kṣaṇika sva lakṣaṇa asparśāt katham tad vikalpaḥ bhāvanā vā iti tanaya vikalpe api samānam adhyavaseya apekṣayā tad vikalpa tva vyavasthā ca samānā eva na hi tanaya vikalpe api āropitāt anyasya pratibhāsaḥ tat ayam tanaya bhāvanāyām āropita śabda saṃsṛṣṭa pratibhāse api satya tanaya sphuṭībhāvam icchan prastutam pratikṣipati iti kim anyat moha mahā graha grāsī bhāvāt 
JŚNĀ_339,2	 etat ca vikalpa sphurat āropita apekṣayā bāhya tva mātreṇa satyabhāvanā asāmyam uktam bāhya apekṣayā tu śoka āturasya tanaya bhāvanam abhūta bhāvanā eva atas eva tat abhūtam puras sphurat tanaya ākāram tadā tādṛś tanayā bhāvāt apramāṇam kṣaṇika bhāvanā tu sadā tad prakṛti tvāt dharmāṇām bhūta viṣayā eva iti tad janita vaiśadyama visaṃvādāt pramāṇam atha vikalpasya avastu viṣaya tayā tanaye tanaya bhāvane api bhinnam eva vaiśadyam āpadyate na asman mataḥ iti hṛdistham tat api hṛdayaḥ eva jīryatu yogi nirṇayaḥ hi prārabdhaḥ eṣaḥ tasya ca ubhayathā api na kṣatiḥ apohasya api pramāṇena pariśuddhau= adhyavaseyasya eva vaiśadyam dṛṣṭam iti kim atra kriyatām anumāne vastu nirbhāsa abhāvāt katham tad apekṣayā pramāṇa pariśuddhiḥ iti ced prastāva antaram etat 
JŚNĀ_339,3	 yat ca idam api ca bhāvyasya vastunaḥ punar punar cetasi niveśanam abhyāsaḥ sa ca brahmacaryeṇa tapasā sa ādara dīrgha kāla nirantaram āsevitaḥ dṛḍha bhūmiḥ asphuṭa ākārasya vikalpasya sphuṭa ābha tva jananaḥ iṣṭaḥ sa ca kṣaṇika nairātmya vādinā draḍhayitum aśakyaḥ tathā hi bhāvya grāhī yādṛśaḥ vikalpaḥ utpannaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva niranvayam nirudhyate tasmin= ca niruddhe punar utpadyamānaḥ pratyayaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva apūrvaḥ utpadyate tat anena paryāyeṇa kalpa sahasre api apūrva utpatteḥ aviśeṣāt na tad janyaḥ saṃskāraḥ abhyāsaḥ utpadyate etena viśiṣṭa vijñāna utpādaḥ abhyāsaḥ vyākhyātaḥ niranvaya niruddham hi pūrva vijñānam katham uttarottara avasthā antaram viśiṣṭam janayet sarvathā krama bhāvibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ avasthitam eva rūpam śakyam saṃskartum iti 
JŚNĀ_340,1^1	 tat etat asaṃgatam na hi yādṛśaḥ eva bhāvya grāhī pratyayaḥ prathamaḥ niranvaya niruddhaḥ tādṛśaḥ eva aparaḥ utpadyate iti niyama niścaya kāraṇam kiñcid asti caṇḍa devatā sparśāt anyat kṣaṇika tvāt iti ced nanu kṣaṇika tvam sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśa utpādena tat hi prācīnam niranvaya nirodhi yathā sadṛśam kṣaṇa antaram ārabhate tathā yadi sāmagrī bheda leśataḥ viśeṣa leśa niveśi kṣaṇa antaram utpādayati tadā kā kṣatiḥ na hi bhavataḥ iva bhāvasya api kṣaṇikatāyām pradveṣaḥ asti ca iha api leśena sāmagrī bhedaḥ 
JŚNĀ_340,1^2	 tathā hi kṣaṇikāḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ iti anuvāda mātra apekṣayā saṃsāra duḥkha kṣaya arthi tayā bhāvanāyām abhiprayujyamānasya viśiṣṭaḥ eva saṃkalpaḥ saḥ api viśiṣṭam aṇu mātrayā atiriktam janayati yāvat taratama ādi krameṇa antimāt phala lābhaḥ bīja ādi vat yadi tu vyāsaṅga ādayaḥ madhyam adhyāsīran manda tā ādita aratamyam eva syāt yat bhāṣyam saṃskārasya balīyaḥ tve vyākṣepasya nivartanam vyākṣepasya balīyaḥ tve saṃskāraḥ syāt parāṅmukhaḥ iti niranvaya vināśe tarhi prācīna viśeṣa asaṃkramaṇāt dvitīyasya kutas viśeṣa lābhaḥ evam tarhi sāmagryantare api tādṛśāḥ viśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam asya tatra asaṃkramaṇāt tasmāt asan= api sa viśeṣaḥ kāraṇa balāt udapādi yathā tathā ayam api samānaḥ tarhi tena ayam iti ced na hetu viśeṣāt phala viśeṣasya durnivāra tvāt 
JŚNĀ_340,2	 tathā hi prathamaḥ viśeṣaḥ tādṛś viśeṣa vinākṛtāt utpannaḥ ayam tu tādṛśa viśeṣa sacivāt iti katham samānaḥ syāt anvayaḥ tu vicāra asahaḥ eva yaḥ hi hetutaḥ saṃkrāntaḥ bhāgaḥ tatra na aparasya hetoḥ vyāpāraḥ yaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ sa pūrvam asan= eva evam yat aṅgasya nirodhaḥ na tasya sthitiḥ sthitimataḥ ca na nirodhaḥ tat katham sa anvaye nirodha janmanī tena saha vṛtteḥ iti ced ākāśena api sa anvaya tva kalpanā prasaṅgāt ubhaya kāla anuvṛtti mātra janyasya saha arthasya abhāvāt tat ca kalasa kapālayoḥ nidhana saṃbhava kāle antarālasya na vāryate śeṣam tu prakriyā mātra ghoṣaṇam pramāṇa paripanthi iti kim tena hari pada vat avasthite tu ātmani utkarṣa apakarṣa ayogaḥ iti bahuśas carvitam āstām tāvat 
JŚNĀ_341,1^1	 yat ca āha kim ca cittam ekāgram avasthāpayitum vikṣepa tyāga artham abhyāsaḥ anuṣṭhīyate na ca kṣaṇika vādinām vikṣiptam cittam asti pratyartha niyata tayā sarvasya ekāgra tvāt iti tat api asaṃbaddham anubhava siddham hi cetasaḥ kasyacid tattva saṃmukhīkaraṇam kasyacid viparyayaḥ kārya ādi mātra parāmarśaḥ aparasya iti tatra nairātmya ādi tattva parāṅmukham sarvam eva cittam vikṣiptam ucyate ukta krameṇa tu tattu eka niṣṭham samāhitam iti etāvatā kim na paryāptam yat avaśyam ekasya eva vicitra gocara cāri tvam anveṣitavyam 
JŚNĀ_341,1^2	 atha ca tattva sākṣāt kriyā kālāt prāc aham iti eka ākāra avagraha saṃbhavāt vyāvahārikam tat api asti yatas mama eva doṣa kṣayaḥ bhāvi iti mārga abhyāsa pravṛttiḥ avyāhṛtā bhavati prāpya saṃkalpaḥ hi sarvatra pravartakaḥ sa ced asti vastu tathā bhāva vyatireke api kaḥ pravṛttim nivartayati yena hi tarhi tathā anumānena niścitam kṣaṇikatā ādi tasya pravṛttiḥ iti ced niścayasya sā ātmībhāva abhāvāt anādya vidyā vāsanā vaśīkṛtena cetasā niścaya anucitasya eva vyavahārasya pravartanāt ataeva darśana mārge api labdhe bhāvanā mārga apekṣaṇam uktam vārtike anveṣaṇīyam tasmāt tad phala lābhāt arvāk abhyāsaḥ avidyayā iva saṃpādyate abhyāsāt ca siddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_341,2	 nyāya bhūṣaṇasya ca yoga ācāra pakṣa apekṣayā dūṣaṇam aprastutam bahis artham abhyupagamya eva sādhana prakramāt tatra api sarva sarvajña pakṣa upakṣiptaḥ bādhaḥ tad anabhyupagamāt eva nirastaḥ na ca asau bādhaḥ eva saṃśaya mātra sādhana tvāt tathā hi yat tāvat atīta anāgata viṣaya tva niṣedha artham uktam na hi asataḥ kaścid ākāraḥ asti iti satyam idānīm evam etat tatas tad janya jñānena agrahaṇam api satyam satya svapna ādi vat anyathā api tu saṃbhāvanā na śakya niṣedha iti darśitam na ca yathā idānīm na kaścid ākāraḥ tathā kāla antare api bhūta bhāvinoḥ tathā sati bhūta bhāvi tvam api na syāt kari kesara vat abhrama avisaṃvādau ca prāk eva cintitau 
JŚNĀ_341,3	 yat punar āha na ca avisaṃvādi tvam api tvad mate yuktam yatas prāpya artha darśaka tvam vā pravṛtti viṣaya upadarśaka tvam vā avabhāta artha kriyā niṣpattiḥ vā bhavatām avisaṃvādi tvam abhipretam na ca etat atīta ādi artha jñānasya saṃbhavati vartamāna artha jñānasya api kṣaṇika tva pakṣe na upapadyate eva iti tat api īrṣyāpāra vaśya mātram upapatti vidhura tvāt yadi tāvat bhāvi bhūtayoḥ kāla vyavadhānena tathā ucyate tadā deśa vyavadhāne api eṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti pravṛtti yogya deśe api pradarśa kam apramāṇam syāt tat asti tāvat iti ced anyat api bhāvi bhūtam vā tad kāle na asti iti ced tad deśe vartamānam api na asti iti samānam artha kriyā api yathā tad deśa sannidhau tathā tad kāla sannidhau= iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ vartamānasya kṣaṇika tve api eka tva āra upasāmarthyāt na vyāvahārikam prati pramāṇa tāyāḥ kṣatiḥ tad abhiprāyāt saṃvādasya vyavasthita tvāt iti 
JŚNĀ_342,1^1	 yat ca kaumārilaiḥ sarva sarva vidi kāraṇānupalabdhim upakramya tasya kāraṇam indriya jñānam vā mānasam vā bhāvanā bala jam vā bhāvanā bala jam api cākṣuṣam mānasam vā iti vikalpya dūṣaṇam ārabdham tat saṃbhāvanā daurbalya āviṣkaraṇa mātram na abhāva niścaya phalam yathā indriya apekṣā ālambana tva cintāyām carcitam na ca kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ aniścayaḥ phalam tatas eva dharma adharma viṣaye api bhāvanā bala jasya balam apalapitum aśakyam tatas kāśika ākārasya api yoginām dharma adharmayoḥ aparokṣa pratibhāsam jñānam na asti indriya sannikarṣa abhāvāt asmad ādi vat iti anumānam anaikāntikam vipakṣa vyāvṛtteḥ ekāntena pratipattum aśakya tvāt 
JŚNĀ_342,1^2	 kim ca dharma adharma jñānam iti karma phala saṃbandha mātra parijñānam etat tat ca jāti smara tu a saṃbhave durnivāram tatas parijñāna saṃbhavāt bhāvanā pariniṣpattau idam suvarṇa ādi evam prayujyamānam etat sādhanam iti jhagiti vikalpa utpādana paṭīyaḥ pratyakṣam udayam āsādayet iti kim anupapannam kevalam jāti smṛtau pratipattavyam tatra ca adarśana mātram apramāṇam iti na sarvathā niṣedha abhidhānam sādhu yathā hi sannipāta ādibhiḥ abhyasta vismaraṇa saṃbhave api smaraṇam api keṣāñcid dṛṣṭam tathā garbha āvāsa pīḍayā api kasyacid prajñā taikṣṇyāt puṇya udayāt pīḍāmāndyāt ca samanantara jāti smaraṇam api bhavat sarvathā niṣeddhum aśakyam acārvākeṇa 
JŚNĀ_342,2	 saṃbhave ca asya aneka janma antara gocarīkaraṇasya api saṃbhavāt krameṇa sarva viṣaya saṃkalpa saṃbhava avirodhāt viṣayān avagama kṛtaḥ bhāvanā anudaya doṣaḥ parihṛtaḥ āgamāt ca loka sanniveśam yathāvat parigṛhya bhāvanā saṃbhavāt yadi api na āgamaḥ pramāṇam tathā api gambhīra pramāṇa antara saṃvāda saṃdarśinaḥ śraddhāvataḥ kim na saṃbhavet tat prameyasya avaitathye ca siddham sādhyam samudāya vikalpābhyām eva avayavasya api sphuṭībhāvaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ eva krameṇa sūkṣma ādi abhivyaktiḥ ca iti 
JŚNĀ_343,1	 etena tat api nirastam yat abhyasta eka śāstrasya anyatra aśaktiḥ ubhayā vā bahu bahudhā apratirūpate parama puruṣa arthā pada ādibhiḥ na hi atra vimatiḥ idam punar asti prathama śāstra abhyāse prayāsaḥ yāvān na tāvān vijātīya abhidheye api anyatra evam pāṭava prakarṣa paramparāyām aśrute api kasyacid tathā prakarṣaḥ yathā na anyasya śrute api tatas janma antara smṛti saṃbhave bhūyas abhyāsāt anabhyasteṣu api vastu rūpeṣu uha apoha saṃbhavān na niḥkleśa avasthaḥ para artha samartha tayā tāvatā eva sthāsyati yat vā sarva saṃkalpa saṃbhavāt bhāvanā abhiyuktāḥ vyaktīkariṣyanti sarva sva icchātaḥ yoginaḥ atas eva sarva avagati pakṣe bhāvanā narthakya udbhāvanam api anarthakam niṣpanna avaśya kārya catur ārya satyabhāvanasya sarva viṣaya anumāna saṃbhave sva icchāyāḥ pratipādanāt 
JŚNĀ_343,2	 atha sarva vastu sākṣātkāre anyat eva sukham para artha sādhanam vā iti paśyet na bhāvanayā parikhedaḥ kaścid tad avasthasya sukaraḥ ca sarva sphuṭībhāvaḥ saṃbhavati iti mahā udadhinā api na adhikam kiñcid uktam uktam ca tāvatā eva pratyuktam tasmāt yathā yathā cintyate saṃśaya mātra phalaḥ sarva vidi dūṣaṇa upanyāsaḥ na ekāntena bādhe vikalpaḥ prakṛta sarvajñasya tu sādhanam ekāntena eva tatra api na deśa kāla puruṣa niyamaḥ iti ced na tad apekṣāyām sādhanasya aprayukta tvāt sarvathā apavādinam prati hi sādhanam etat tat ca deśa ādi aniyame api kṛtārtham tathā ca evaṃvidham udbheditam asmābhiḥ sarvajña siddhau= iti 
JŚNĀ_345,1	 iha bahis artha abhiniveśinaḥ manorathaḥ yat yathā pratīyate tat tathā sat iti vyavasthāpyate yathā kuvalayam nīla rūpa tayā vijñānāt vyatirikta rūpa tayā ca pratīyante ghaṭa ādayaḥ iti svabhāva hetuḥ na atra asiddhiḥ grāhaka aṅgāt vicchinnena tarjanī nirdeśa yogyena puras avasthāyinā rūpeṇa ghaṭa ādi ākārasya pratibhā asādhya vasāyābhyām kroḍīkaraṇāt tathā hi ayam ghaṭaḥ na ayam ghaṭaḥ iti pratītiḥ pratyātma vedyā sarva puruṣāṇām avyutpanna saṃketānām api saṃjñā viśeṣa ullekha vimukhaḥ tad anurūpaḥ eva antar janyaḥ bālaḥ api sukha sādhanam stanam avalokya tad abhimukhe kara mukhe prahiṇvan bahi s avasāyasacivam ātmānam ātanoti tatas ca vyatiriktena rūpeṇa ghaṭa ādi ākārasya pratītiḥ na asiddhi patha prasthāyinī na api virodhinī sādhyena sa pakṣe saṃbhavasya darśita tvāt viparyaya vyāptasya ca viruddhasya tad asaṃbhavāt 
JŚNĀ_345,2–345,3	 ataeva ca nāsādhāraṇa tvam na api sandigdha anvaya tvam vipakṣe adarśanāt ca na sādhāraṇān ekāntaḥ na ca vaktavyam kāmalinaḥ pīta śaṅkha pratītau= api na tathā eva vyavasthā keśoṇḍūka pratītau vā taimirikasya atas sādhāraṇa tvam eva iti bādhaka grasta tvena tad pratīteḥ bhrānta tvena pratyakṣa vyāpāra virahāt prastutaḥ tu bādhaka abhāvāt bhrāntyasiddheḥ adhyakṣa vyāpāraḥ eva na ca kadācid atra api syāt bādhakam iti anāśvāsaḥ sarvatra pratyakṣa vyāpāra uccheda prasaṅgāt tasmāt deśa kāla nara anya tve bādhake sati na akṣajam ghaṭa ādi bheda bodhaḥ tu pratyakṣaḥ tad abhāvataḥ 
JŚNĀ_345,4	 evam tarhi pratyakṣa vyāpāre kim anumānena iti api na ca udyam vyavahāra sādhanasya vivakṣita tvāt pratyakṣa gocare hi vivāda saṃbhavaḥ na anumāna prayojye viśrāmyati tatra yathā pratyakṣe api gavi kutaścid āropāt mūḍhaḥ tat vyavahāram apravartayan sāsnādi samudāya ātmaka tvena pravarttyate abhāva vyavahāram vā anupalabdhyā tathā pratyakṣe api grāhya grāhakayoḥ bhedaḥ āgama antara anusārī tathā pratītyā vyavahāryate iti na doṣaḥ sa ca ayam vyavahāraḥ tanmātra nibandhanaḥ sakṛt pravartanāt eva siddhaḥ na hi kuvalaya ādau= api nīla ādi vyavahāre tathā pratibhā asādhyavasāyābhyām anyat adhikam vā kiñcid nimittam asti tanmātrataḥ apravṛtti prasaṅgāt artha kriyā saṃvādaḥ api hi prathamāyām pravṛttau gaveṣyate abhyāsavaḥ tu tanmātra nibandhanaḥ eva asau vyavahāraḥ prastute tu bheda vyavahāre sarvatra eva anādi kālikā abhyāsa pāṭava bhṛtaḥ lakṣyante uktam hi bālaḥ api hi ityādi 
JŚNĀ_346,1	 tasmāt vyavahāra pragalbhasya tathā pratīti mātra pratibaddhaḥ tathā avyavahāraḥ tasmin sādhye tathā pratīyamāna tvam tad anya anapekṣa tvena vyāpyate yadi ca kvacid tathā pratītau= api tathā vyabahāra virahaḥ syāt tadā tad anya apekṣam syāt iti sādhyasya tad vyavahāra yogya tvasya abhāve vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhyā avadhūyamānam tathā pratīyamāna tvam apeta bādhake viṣaye tathā vyavasthā yogya tayā eva vyāpyate iti vyāpti siddheḥ sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttika tvam api na upanyastasya hetoḥ antikam upasarpati iti siddham adhyakṣa viṣayasya api jñāna jñeya bhedasya ukta anumāna vyavahārya tvamahāryam iti 
JŚNĀ_346,2	 atra ucyate kim idam vijñānam nāma yatas bhedena pratītiḥ tathā vyavahāram sādhayet yadi hi jñāyate anena iti jñānam jānāti iti vā ubhayathā api jñeya apekṣam lakṣaṇam etat na ca bāhya apalāpinaḥ jñeyam nāma kiñcid asti siddham yatas tad adhigati sādhanam jñānam syāt tathā hi idam jñānam idam jñeyam iti vyavahāraḥ vyāpāra viśeṣa kṛtaḥ vā syāt dvaita vādinaḥ jāti niyataḥ vā prathama pakṣe jñānasya vā jñeye jñeyasya vā jñāne vyāpāraḥ parasparam vā ubhayoḥ atra api prathama pakṣe nirvartakaḥ vikārakaḥ vā iti vikalpāḥ 
JŚNĀ_346,3	 tatra na tāvat jñeye jñāna vyāpāraḥ nirvartakaḥ śakyaḥ abhidhātum adṛśya viṣaya vyāla upaprasaṅgāt na ca tathā eva abhyupagamaḥ yuktaḥ tadā eva kenacid dṛṣṭeḥ tad jñānena nirvartana abhyupagame ca parokṣasya api sthiteḥ anapahnavaḥ sa ca tena paścāt dṛśyamānaḥ tad jñānasya eva nirvartakaḥ jātaḥ iti na viṣayaḥ syāt sa na tasya dṛśyaḥ tat jñāna janyaḥ tu anyaḥ eva iti ced eka sthāna anupapattiḥ apratigha tve prakāśa rūpasya pratyātma vedyasya parāgocarasya vijñāna rūpa tā eva mukha antareṇa samarthitā syāt nīla rūpa tvāt na evam iti ced kena punar vijñānasya nīla ākāra utpatti niṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ tad sādhanāya sādhana anavadhāna prasaṅgāt tasmāt na parokṣam asat eva iti dvaya vādinaḥ yuktam 
JŚNĀ_347,1	 na ca ayam abhyupagamaḥ api asya iti na atra nirbandhaḥ pramāṇa abhāve prameya abhāvam icchataḥ api hi na parokṣasya sarvathā abhāvaḥ eva abhimataḥ api tu san= avaśyam kasyacid pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ syāt stoka antareṇa iti anyathā sat saṃprayoge sati indriyāṇām puruṣasya buddhi janma iti avācyam syāt jñānāt prāk sataḥ virahāt sa punar abhyupagamaḥ na nyāyyaḥ iti kim anena tanmātrasya vivakṣita tvāt iti alam vistareṇa 
JŚNĀ_347,2	 vikārya pakṣe tu yasya jñānasya yaḥ vikāryaḥ arthaḥ sa grāhyaḥ iti vyavasthāyām śoka ādinā upahatāyāḥ buddheḥ vikāryam indriyam api grāhyam syāt malina mukha= chāyā ādayaḥ vā duḥkha janitaḥ asau vikāraḥ iti ced na upahata ākāra saṃvedanāt anyasya tasya anupalabdheḥ nirloṭhitam ca etat śāstre iti alam prayāsena atha na etādṛśaḥ atiśayaḥ prameyasya jñānāt kim tarhi prakāśa rūpasya utpattiḥ iti ced atra api pakṣe eka gocaraḥ sarva gocaraḥ syāt tadīya jñāna nivṛttau tad rūpa nivṛtteḥ anyasya api adarśana prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_347,3	 anyasya api tad upāya yogāt nevam iti ced tasya api nivṛtta jñānasya tad prakāśa prasaṅgaḥ tad jñāna nivṛttau tad rūpā nivṛttau= api eṣaḥ eva doṣaḥ na hi kulāla prayatna pārahṛtāyāḥ mṛdaḥ tam eva prati ghaṭībhāvaḥ dahanāt vā dahana upadhāyakam eva prati ghaṭasya gaura bhāvaḥ evam tarhi upakāri tvam api svarūpam asya sarva sādhāraṇam syāt na ca evam tatas yathā ghaṭa tvena sādhāraṇaḥ api eṣa na artha kāriṇā rūpeṇa tathā prakāśa rūpeṇa api na syāt iti kaḥ ayam prasaṅgaḥ atha upakārya viśeṣa upakāritā asya sādhāraṇī puruṣa viśeṣa apekṣa prakāśa tāpyasya sarva sādhāraṇī iti samānam 
JŚNĀ_347,4	 na samānam upakāri tvam hi nāma sākṣāt upakāraḥ pravṛtti yogya tā mātram vai abhimatam syāt tatra yogyatā mātram sarva sādhāraṇam iti na tatra vivādaḥ prathama pakṣe tu upakāra lakṣaṇa kārya karmaṇi saha kāri bhāvaḥ asya yathā ekatra tathā anyatra api kim na syāt iti codya arthaḥ na ca ayam nyāyaḥ avyavadhāna ādi apekṣa tvāt tatas yat santāna vartinaḥ upādānasya upanidhiḥ tatra eva sāhāyakam asya iti katham vyavahita ādau puṣṭiḥ tathā yadi prakāśaḥ iti api kārya antara janana dvāreṇa vyavahāraḥ iṣṭaḥ syāt tadā syāt api evam yathā āhuḥ eke buddhi lakṣaṇa vyakti janaka tvam eva tasya vyakta tvam iti tadā hi yasya eva buddheḥ upādānam samanantara saṃkhyātam na upanipāta bhāgi sādhana antaram vā tasya eva na asau sahakāra dāna virahāt vyaktaḥ yuktaḥ dūṣaṇa antaram ca tatra api vakṣyāmaḥ 
JŚNĀ_348,1	 na ca evam yujyate jñānāt prakāśa rūpasya eva viṣayasya utpattiḥ iti etasya pakṣasya vicintyamāna tvāt kārya antara dvāreṇa tu vyakta vyavahāre na tatas tathā utpannaḥ iti prakṛta kṣatiḥ tathā utpattau durvāraḥ sādhāraṇa tva prasaṅgaḥ upakāraka tvam api hi yāvat eva bhinna santāna varti sukha ādi janaka tvam tāvat eva tad apekṣayā sādhāraṇam yadā tu sukha ādi rūpa tvam eva abhyupagamyeta tadā kaḥ sādhāraṇatva niṣedhāya prabhuḥ nanu tathā api yat ekasya sukham na tad anyasya iti ced arthasya dharmaḥ sādhāraṇa tvam asādhāraṇa tvam jñānasya tatas tad ātma niyatam sukha ādi na para sādhāraṇam anugraha ādi rūpa tvena iti yuktam bāhya rūpam tu svīkriyamāṇam sādhāraṇam eva tad kāryatve api hi anugrahasya sukha saṃvid upādeya kṣaṇa antara rūpa tvāt tadvat eva sādhāraṇa tvam asādhāraṇa tvam ca iti 
JŚNĀ_348,2^1	 evam na caitra janitam maitrasya tad putra tvam nāma kiñcid gaura tvam iva yat sādhāraṇam syāt api tu tat janita tvam eva asya tad putra tvam vyavahriyate sa ca janana vyāpāraḥ caitrasya na anya sādhāraṇaḥ tathā tad nimittaḥ api vyapadeśaḥ tad janita vyapadeśa vat gaura tvam tu tat kṛtam api na tat kṛtam eva guṇa antara tvāt iti sādhāraṇam yuktam na hi asau pituḥ eva gauraḥ kim tu parasya api evam na jñāna kṛta tvam eva arthasya vyakta tvam vyavahita ādi a viśiṣṭa rūpasya kim tu tad atiśāyinaḥ prakāśa rūpasya utpattiḥ iti abhyupagamaḥ 
JŚNĀ_348,2^2	 anyathā na vyaktaḥ uktaḥ viṣayaḥ syāt tathā avyavahāra mātram tu tad nimittam syāt yathā gaura tvam eva tad janya tā mātreṇa vyavaharataḥ sautra antikasya vā tad janaka tvena yathā ca tasya janaka jñāna antarasya viṣaya tā prasaṅgaḥ tathā asya api janya jñānasya iti jñāna arthayoḥ hetu phala bhāva samaya atikrama mātram atiricyate sādhāraṇa tva parihāraḥ tu ubhayoḥ api na tu vyakti rūpa artha utpatti nirvāhaḥ itas asya siddhaḥ prakāśa utpādane sarvam prati prākāśya saṃbhavaḥ utpādanā prakāśa tva sthitau na ekam api prati iti saṃgrahaḥ 
JŚNĀ_348,3	 yathā hi niviḍa andhakāra pihitayoḥ āma pakva ghaṭayoḥ ekatra vahni janita tvam eva vyakta tvam abhidadhānaḥ na akṣa yogya tām tattvataḥ samādhātum īśaḥ tathā ayam api jñāna janti tvam eva dṛśyatām iti yadi tu pradīpāt iva prakāśa rūpasya utpattiḥ vijñānāt api svīkriyate tadā parokṣa ghaṭāt asya viparyayaḥ paryavasyati sādhāraṇa doṣaḥ tu dustyajaḥ 
JŚNĀ_349,1	 pradīpa vyaktaḥ api tarhi ghaṭaḥ sarvasya prakāśaḥ syāt iti ced yādṛśī pradīpa kṛtā prakāśa tā anandhakāra avasthā yogya deśa stha tva ādi apekṣa jñāna janana yogya tā rūpā sā sādhāraṇī eva jñāna kṛtā eva tu vikalpa smṛti abhilāṣā ādinā pravṛtti ādi sādhanī niyatā sā api yadi bhāsura tā iva tasya niṣpannā khyāyate hanta sādhāraṇī pravṛtti ādeḥ tad kāla sātā ādinā vā sādhanī sarvasya syāt iti ukta prāyam tasmāt utpāda mātre atiśaya antare vā jñānāt prakāśaḥ na hi bāhya rāśeḥ prakāśa rūpasya samudbhave tu prasahya sādhāraṇa tā prasaṅgaḥ tasmāt jñāna vyāpāraḥ na grāhya grāhaka lakṣaṇa vyavasthā nibandhanam iti 
JŚNĀ_349,2	 astu tarhi jñeyasya jñāne vyāpārāt grāhya tvam iti ced na indriyasya api prasaṅgāt sarūpa janakasya vā tattve samanantara pratyaya viśeṣeṇa vyabhicārāt bāhya tve satī iti viśeṣaṇasya ca tad vādinī eva śobhā saṃbhavāt iti na ayam api pakṣaḥ kṣamaḥ mā bhūt sārūpyam arthāt utpadyamānam jñānam tad adhigati vyāpāreṇa grāhakam iti ubhaya vyāpāra pakṣaḥ astu tatra artha vyāpāra anna avyāpṛtānām grahaṇam jñāna vyāpāra āśrayāt na indriyasya api 
JŚNĀ_349,3	 na hi jñānasya tatra adhigati vyāpāraḥ iti ced na ayam api nyāyaḥ sā hi adhigatiḥ viṣaya svarūpāḥ jñāna rūpa artha antaram jñāna antaram vā syāt prathame pakṣe viṣaya ātma vat tasyāḥ api siddheḥ jñāna vyāpāra virahaḥ tadvat vā viṣayasya api jñāna vyāpāra apekṣaṇe prācīnaḥ doṣaḥ dvitīye tu jñānasya ātmani eva vyāpāraḥ iti vyāhatam vyāpāraḥ eva adhigatiḥ iti atra api etat eva dūṣaṇam vyāpāra tad vata urabheda siddheḥ evam eva jñāna jñeya dharma tva parikalpanam apāstam draṣṭavyam 
JŚNĀ_349,4	 artha antara tve ca viṣayasya kim āyātam yathā indriyasya yatas nīlam dṛṣṭam na indriyam iti syāt tasya sādhigatiḥ iti ced jñāna janyāyāḥ kiṃkṛtaḥ tad saṃbandhaḥ tasya api vyāpārāt iti ced evam tarhi ubhayoḥ ubhaya vyāpāra siddhā sādhigatiḥ iti parasparam grāhya tvam grāhaka tvam vā syāt na ca evam indriya grahaṇa prasaṅga parihāraḥ na hi ca akṣuḥ vyāpāram antareṇa rūpe adhigatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_350,1	 atha indriyasya jñānaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ na adhigatau rūpasya tu tatra api iti ced kaḥ nāma vibhāgam īdṛśam kartu samarthaḥ anyatra jāḍyāt na hi jñāna jñeyābhyām bhinnam artha antaram adhigama rūpam eva kiñcid upalabhyate yatra yāvat jñānasya eva vyāpāraḥ parikalpyeta tatra ca viṣayasya api asti na indrivasya kalyāṇa kāma tā mātram etat adhigateḥ arthasya ca viṣaya viṣayī bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ eva saṃbandhaḥ iti ced nanu saḥ eva ayam viṣaya viṣayībhāvaḥ vyāpāra vikalpena parīkṣyate sa ca yasya na jñāna jñeyayoḥ siddhaḥ tasya adhigama viṣayayoḥ api katham sidhyet adhigateḥ vā viṣaya tvam akasmāt icchan jñānasya katham pratikṣipet asti tāvat ayam vyavahāraḥ iti ced asti kevalam kim asya mūlam iti cintyate asaṃkīrṇa lakṣaṇa svarūpa vyavasthā vā anādi vitatha vikalpa abhyāsa vāsanā vā iti 
JŚNĀ_350,2	 kim asyāḥ bojam iti ced kim anena na hi pareṇa tad aparijñāne asmābhiḥ abhimatā saṃkīrṇam anayoḥ lakṣaṇam upadarśitam bhavati etena jñāna antara tva parikalpanam adhigateḥ apāstam tasya api tadvat eva tad viṣaya tvasya asiddheḥ atat viṣayayā ca adhigatyā saḥ arthaḥ jñātaḥ iti mahatī prekṣā etena jñāna vyāpāram vāda kāle na artham kurvatī vikurvatī vā buddhiḥ tat viṣayā ucyate kim tu tad adhigati mātram ātanvati iti kalpanam apāstam tasmāt na vyāpāra dvāreṇa ayam jñāna jñeya vyavahāraḥ iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_350,3	 na api jāti niyataḥ kvacid kadācid kasyacid kenacid jñeya tayā vyavasthāpanāt na hi nisarga niyatānām go tva ādīnām īdṛśī vyavasthā adya api vā avaśya vācyaḥ lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ na ca śakyaḥ iti tad abhāve tu sattā mātram jñānasya jñeyasya vā tattva nimittam iti sarvaḥ sarva artha bodhaḥ sidhyet na vā kaścid api viprakarṣa abhāvāt nanu ca asti pratyāsattiḥ indriyāṇām arthaiḥ saṃyoga samavāya ādi lakṣaṇā tat balāt upajāyamānam jñānam tad tad artha niyatam ṣoḍhā sannikarṣa viraha viprakṛṣṭa artha vyāvṛttam ca sidhyati iti katham atiprasaṅgaḥ etat api yat kiñcat utpatti niyamaḥ hi anena sidhyet na tu kañcid prati grāhaka tva niyamaḥ vijñānasya tathā hi saṃyoga ādi sannikarṣa balāt arthena jñānam janyate na tad virahiṇā vyavahita ādinā iti bhavatu kasya punar tat grāhakam iti na niścayaḥ yena eva tat janitam iti ced ātma manaḥ akṣa saṃyoga ādayaḥ api grāhyā iti na ati prasaṅga nivṛttiḥ na hi viṣaya abhimate api asya kaścid upayogaḥ indriya ādiṣu saṃbhavī yena grahaṇa vibhāgaḥ syāt paricchitti jananam vyāpāra antaram vā anantaram eva cintitam
