JŚNĀ_447,5	 nanu citram ekam iti anubhava viruddham etat nīla pīta ādīnām bhedena eva bhāsanāt kim ca citram na anekam iti anartha antaram tat ca eka paryudāsena sthitam iti tat katham citram ekam anyathā prakāśaḥ jaḍaḥ syāt iti ced na nīla ādi tve hi saṃvedana vyāpāraḥ na bhede bheda abheda avyavasthā tu nibandhana anusāram arhati nanu idam nīlam idam pītam iti paraspara ātma tayā eva pratītiḥ bheda pratītiḥ iti ced bāhya artha vāde evam etat abhyāsa vāsanā vaśāt tu buddhau= api āropyate buddhau tu etāni rūpāṇi bhinnāni abhinnāni vā iti cintām arhati buddhau= api tad anusāreṇa eva vyavasthā iti ced na khalu sarvāḥ tathā hi 
JŚNĀ_448,1–448,3	 sthiretara tve niyatam pareṇa prakāśyam artha kriyayā bahis sat ākāra bhedāt nitarām vijātiḥ na abhyāsa vaśyam viparītam antar antar iti cittam tad viparītam katham punar sthira itara tve niyatam na buddhi rūpam tattvataḥ pūrva apara apratīteḥ pūrva aparatva vittau hi nitya tvam calatā athavā eka aneka adhimokṣeṇa tad abhāvāt asat dvayam 
JŚNĀ_448,4–448,7	 tatra bhede vyativitteḥ sthūla ābhāsasya ca abhāva prasaṅgaḥ anābhāsa prasaṅgaḥ ca durnivāraḥ atha ekatve api nīlam pītam eva syāt tat uktam abhede api ekatā citra tva virodhinī syāt iti na ca evam bhāsate tathā api yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva upagamyate iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākārasya cetasaḥ nāma iti aṅgīkāre ayam arthaḥ satyam aneka vat eka bhāvaḥ na syāt prakāśamānasya tu sattā apahnavaḥ mā bhūt iti na aniṣṭam kiñcid ayam abhiprāyaḥ satyam ced saṃvidaḥ siddham aneka tvam ca bādhitam eka tve ca tava eva icchākṣatiḥ na ubhayathā api naḥ sattā siddhau ca aneka tvena api na aparāddham asmākam kiñcid kevalam nyāya anusāriṇaḥ eka tvam anuśiṣmaḥ tathā hi samāna yogakṣemat tvāt sattāyām na ekatā kṣatiḥ tat virodhi tu aneka tvam atas tasyām tad atyayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_449,1	 yat tu ucyate eka tve nīlam pītam eva syāt iti sa bāhyaḥ eva doṣaḥ tad artha kriyā arthinām tatra api pravṛtteḥ kriyāyāḥ ca prasaṅgāt kriyā arthita avyatireke api yat nīlam tat kim pītam bhavitum arhati iti ced tat kim svarūpa sattayā viyujyatām varam evam iti ced yadi parokṣatā syāt syāt api evam tasmāt bāhya tve nānā tvam eva nīla pītayoḥ mā bhūt pravṛtti saṃkara ādiḥ iti jñāna tve tu eka tvam eva bahis vyavahāra abhyāsāt tu mahataḥ saṃmukha madhyandina ādityaḥ iva duḥsaha pakṣaḥ eva iti kim atra kurmaḥ tat iha pratyakṣa virodha ādayaḥ api plavantaḥ eva pītāt anyat nīlam iti vikalpasya sva bedana vyāpāram anādṛtya vṛtteḥ indriya jñāna vyāpāra anusārasi ekasya svarasa vāhi tvāt ataeva ca citram ekam iti na virodhaḥ nīla pīta ādi tayā hi citram na tu nānātvena kevalam nānātvena vyāpti abhimānāt tathā ucyate vyāptiḥ ca bāhyaḥ eva athavā anuvāda mātram citram iti yat nānā iti bhavatām saṃmatam tat buddhi rūpam sat ekam eva iti na aśvārūḍha vat doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_449,2	 nanu viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ bhedaḥ ucyate sa ca bāhyasya buddheḥ vā iti na atra niyamaḥ iti ced niyamaḥ eva bāhya abhede hi na artha kriyā pratiniyamaḥ eva tad anādare ca pratibhāsa mātrāt na viśeṣaḥ iti tad abhāvaḥ eva syāt buddheḥ tu bhede eva svarūpa hāniḥ artha kriyā anapekṣāyāḥ tasyāḥ prakāśāt eva sattvāt bhede ca prakāśa abhāva prasaktiḥ tad avasthāyāḥ yadi api ca bhedena nirbandhe dvayoḥ api svabhāva hāniḥ tathā api tāvat dūram anītvā yathā aṇu saṃghāta saṃkhyātam bāhyam bhede api sattvam sahate aṇu ākāra ullekhā bhāve api ca eka ghana sthūla ākāreṇa jñānena saṃvāda leśāt grahaṇa sthitim ca na tathā jñānam iti ucyate na vā bāhyasya hāniḥ api pīḍayati abhimāna mātra vyavasthāpita tvāt abhimānāt eva vā nirvahet bahis adhyakṣa siddhāya aḥ tu buddheḥ kutas eva tat dvayam api bahīrūpa parāmarśa prāpteḥ ca bhede niyataḥ svabhāva bhraṃśaḥ yat āha 
JŚNĀ_449,3–449,4	 tam hi patati arthe vivecayan= iti yathā artha śakti virahe bhāsaḥ keśa ādi sannibhaḥ tathā anyaḥ asma āt ayam iti bāhyaḥ eva vivecanam na eṣa sva saṃvedana anusāraḥ kim tu bāhya abhyāsa vāsanā vilāsaḥ eva tasmāt yathā apara adhīna vedana tva ādibhiḥ dharmaiḥ bahirasādhāraṇam dhiyaḥ sva rūpam tathā viruddha dharma adhyāsa kṛta bheda vyavasthā paribhavena api nyāya sāmarthyāt iti yuktam yadi tarhi bahis eva viruddha dharma itara kṛtaḥ bhedā abhedaḥ vā anubhava ākāre kā gatiḥ iṣṭaḥ ca tatra api ekaḥ bhagavān iti vyavasthā niyama nibandhana abhāve hi santāna antareṇa api abheda prasaṅgaḥ iti āha nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne ityādi 
JŚNĀ_450,1	 buddheḥ eka bhāvaḥ nāma syāt aśakya vivecana ātmā na anekatvam yat vā buddheḥ nāma syāt na jaḍasya pratiyogi akṣamāyām nāma śabdaḥ avadhāraṇa paraḥ yat ca yathā bhāsate citram api eka saṃvid antargatam tat tathā eva anubhūyate iti eka tvam eka santāna prajñapti gocarasya nāma cetasaḥ syāt na tu etādṛśam aśakya vivecana tvam para abhimatasya iti na doṣaḥ tat evam svatantre ca vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ asiddhiḥ buddhi ākārāṇām ekatāyāḥ eva upapatteḥ iti api ca kim idam eka tvam aneka tvam vā kva vā vastu tva vyāptiḥ anayoḥ 
JŚNĀ_450,2	 atra uttaram niraṃśam ekam anekam ca samuccitam tat eva loke ca eka aneka tayā eva vastu sthitiḥ āsthīyate atha para artha anumāne sva dṛṣṭam upayogī iti ucyate vicāra āśraye saṃvṛtau svayam eva tathā upalabdham iti na doṣaḥ atra ucyate saṃvṛtau= api tat eva dṛṣṭam abhidhīyate yad siddhamadhyakṣa anumānābhyām na ca ābhyām kvacid upalambha gocaraḥ niraṃśaḥ tatas tat samuccaya rūpam anekam api na upalabdham tad katham ābhyām vastu vyāpti siddhiḥ na api kiñcid asti vastu para upagamaḥ tu na svatantra hetau= adhikriyate prasaṅga sādhana tve ca viparyaya paryavasānāt sādhya virodhaḥ yasya ca eka aneka tvābhyām vastu vyāptiḥ abhimatā tasya ayamaḥ tu daṇḍaḥ yasya tu prakāśa mātreṇa vastu tā tasya kaḥ tad anurodhaḥ 
JŚNĀ_450,3	 tasmāt svayam upapādayitavyā vyāptiḥ yadi ca kvacid saṃbandha bodhaḥ eka aneka tvābhyām vastunaḥ tat eva na śūnyam iti vyāpti śūnyatā sādhana uddhūtiḥ nanu vastu sthitiḥ eka aneka vyavahāraḥ pramāṇa siddhi avasāyaḥ ca loke tāvat asti vicāre tu na asti iti etat eva sādhyam asmākam katham bādhakam bhavitum arhati iti ced na svabhāva abhāvaḥ hi bhavatām sādhyaḥ na eka aneka tva abhāvaḥ eva sādhana tvena upanyāsāt na ca idam asiddha tā udbhāvanam kim tu vyāpti asiddhiḥ abhidhīyate viparyaya vyāptiḥ ca vyāpaka anupalambha ādau śaraṇam sā ca kvacid vyāpya vyāpa kayoḥ asiddheḥ asiddhā eva sāṃvṛtena api pramāṇena aviṣayīkaraṇāt na ca vyavahāra mātram pramāṇam na ca lakṣaṇa antaram apramāṇe api pramāṇasya na vyavasthā niyamaḥ saṃvṛtau mānam iṣṭam ced vicāraḥ api eṣa saṃvṛtiḥ saṃvṛtau= api na iṣṭam ced bruvan jetā yathā tathā iti antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_451,1	 tatas yadi pramāṇa nirastena eva rūpeṇa vyāptim avakalpya sarvatra tad abhāvāt abhāvaḥ bhāvānām abhimataḥ abandhyaḥ tarhi bandhyā suta viyogaḥ api tad sādhane syāt iti sādhvī sādhya pratyāśā tasmāt kvacid vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ upalambhe vyāpti grahaṇa nibandhane adhyakṣa rūpe viparyaya bādhaka samākhyāta anumāna rūpe vā pravṛtte kvacid tad abhāvāt anya abhāva niścayaḥ iti yuktam kṣaṇika tvena api sattvasya vyāpti sādhanam kṣaṇika sattā niścayana āntarīyakam eva iti sā eva upalabdhiḥ asya prakṛte tu tadvat tayoḥ sāmānyena api sattā ākṣepe tat na antarīyakaḥ hetuḥ iṣṭa vighāta kṛt viruddhaḥ anākṣepe api na vyāptiḥ iti anekāntaḥ 
JŚNĀ_451,2	 tatas kutas citra ākāra bodha niṣedhaḥ bāhyasya api kutas tarhi iti ced tattvataḥ aprakāśāt eva na hi anupalabdheḥ anyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti su prasiddham na vā niraṃśatā eka lakṣaṇam iti kaḥ śakti pratibandhaḥ bahis arthe vyāpaka an upalambhasya kim punar tad ekatā lakṣaṇam yatas na ukta upālambha saṃbhavaḥ vivecya aśakya darśana tvam tat tu na bāhyasya tad abhāvāt tad saṃhati rūpam anekam api na asti atha śakya vivecanam anekam bhaviṣyati iti ced yadi aśakya vivecanam kiñci d antimam syāt tadā tad apekṣayā śakya vivecana tā parasparam syāt na ca evam paramāṇoḥ api anavasthānāt buddhau tu sva santāna bhāvinyām citrāyām aśakya vivecana tvam asti na tu santāna antareṇa saha iti darśayati etena buddhau vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva siddhiḥ anyatra vyāpaka anupalambha vyāpāraḥ iti vyaktam uktam 
JŚNĀ_451,3^1	 atas eva ācārya vasu bandhu pādaiḥ api bāhya adhikāreṇa eva vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ udbhāvitaḥ na jñāna adhikāreṇa samāna nyāya tayā tatra api avakāśamānaḥ durvāraḥ iti ced na vijñāna mātram eva idam ityādinā samāna nyāya tayā niṣiddha tvāt ataeva grāhya grāhaka dvaya asattayā traidhātuka citta caitta lakṣaṇā bhūta parikalpa sattayā ca samāropa apavāda pratiṣedha nirvṛtiḥ kṛtā na itara sattva asattvam uktam tadvat ūhitum śakya tvāt anuktiḥ iti ced grāhyasya tarhi sākṣāt eva bādhakam uktam iti tad abhāvaḥ eva nābhidheyaḥ tasmāt tasya eva bādhakam uktam iti iṣṭam ca iti alam vistareṇa 
JŚNĀ_451,3^2	 tathā vivecya aśakya darśana itara tvam eva eka aneka tvam anyonya parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tayā vyāpakam svabhāve dṛṣṭa tvāt na niraṃśa rāśi tvam aṃśa cintā tu para anurodhena athavā tad dvāreṇa aśakya vivecana tva abhāvaḥ eva vyajyate iti veditavyam santāna antara vat iti nanu sva vid eka tattva vādinaḥ aneka vyavasthā āśrayaḥ santāna antara bhāvaḥ ayam na siddhaḥ ced phala aṅga vat santāna antara siddhiḥ kim saṃvṛttyā tu yathā tathā vai astu kim atra nirbandhena evam api hi buddheḥ aneka tvam eva mā bhūt eka tvena api ekena vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ asiddhi siddheḥ kalpita aneka vivekena ca eka śabdaḥ bhaviṣyati yāvat vyavahāraḥ tasmāt na bahis iva buddheḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsa kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ 
JŚNĀ_452,1	 astu ca evam kim punar tatra pramāṇam ekatve api kim pramāṇam pratyakṣam eva vikalpena ananugamāt na iti ced vikalpasya eva ayam aparādhaḥ adhyakṣasya eva kim na iti ced na anyonya saṃvid antargata pratibhāsāt eva kim ca mayā dṛṣṭāḥ nīla pīta ādayaḥ iti eka kartuḥ ut lekhaḥ mama ayam citraḥ pratibhāsaḥ iti eka saṃbandhinaḥ ca eka pratyakṣa vikalpaḥ eva ayam abhedena paṭavati anubhava ākāravān evam ekatā eva buddhiḥ ekaḥ tasya vikalpaḥ tribhuvana vikalpaḥ vā ekasyām buddhau citraḥ pratibhāsaḥ iti api śilāputra śarīra vat śarīre pāṇi pāda ādi vat vā eka avasāyaḥ eva ayam bahis abhimānāt tu samuccaya mātram ucyate tad abhāve tu eka tvam eva idam ullikhyate evam vṛkṣa kṣmā adhara ādau= api dhī mātra tve tu ubhayatra eka vyavahāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_452,2	 tasmāt na pratyākṣa aparādhaḥ na api vikalpasya bhāvaḥ eva iti siddham adhyakṣamabheda grāhi bhede api tarhi pratyakṣam eva śaraṇam na ca ekā parvata buddhiḥ iti ādau viparīta udayāt vikalpena ananugamaḥ bhūyas dṛṣṭa tvāt tat kim idānīm ubhayam astu atas vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ viplavaḥ saḥ ayam ubhaya niṣedhena śūnyatā sādhana ārambhe ubhaya sādhanena syāt vādam uddīpayitum pravṛttaḥ iti prahāra pātaḥ atha ekaika sādhanam anyānyabādhana param na tu sthitiḥ eva tasya vivakṣitā paryāyeṇa tasya api bādhanāt yadi evam yat ā aikyam siddham adhyakṣeṇa tadā dvitīya bādhā eva jātāḥ katham tad āśrayaḥ parasya bādhaḥ na hi pūrva bādhitasya kutaścid pratyujjīvanam tathā abhāve anena api bādhyamānasya punar pratyujjīvana āśaṃsāyām kīdṛśī manoratha siddhiḥ punar itareṇa bādhana jīvana paramparāyāḥ anuparamāt ekaika sanātha tayā dharmiṇaḥ na kadācid vyāpaka anupalambha saṃbhavaḥ 
JŚNĀ_453,1	 tat ayam arthaḥ yat ucyate na tāvat ekam buddhi rūpam nīla pīta ādīnām avyatikara pratibhāsanāt na api anekam paramparā saṃvedana prasaṅgāt iti tatra yat eka tva niṣedhāya pratibhāsa bhedaḥ dūṣaṇīyate tadā yadi asau sva saṃvedana siddhaḥ tasya kena punar apohaḥ tasya adṛḍha tve eka tvasya api kutas bādhā evam na api anekam iti atra api vācyam yadi punar pratiyogi saṃbhava anapekṣaḥ para paribhavaḥ sādhana antara kṛtaḥ syāt tadā na doṣaḥ svayam eva tu pramāṇa siddha saṃmatasya punar prativahanam iti asaṃbaddham na ca pramāṇa antaram eka aneka tva viparyāsanam asti tad saṃbhava abhimāne api na ekasya api sva saṃvedana siddhasya uddhūtiḥ avastu tvāt na ekam api iti paraspara apekṣam viruddhayoḥ ekatra asaṃbhavaḥ iti na dvayoḥ niṣedhaḥ tat atra yasya eva na saṃvedanam iti upapādayitum śakyam tat eva asat aḥ tu dvayoḥ api na saṃvedanam iti tu sarvathā saṃvedana abhāve syāt tat ca asiddham iti atha api syāt sva saṃvedana vādinaḥ aniṣṭa āpādana mātram etat tatas tasya eva ayam doṣaḥ na asmākam tat aniṣṭe ca iti ced 
JŚNĀ_453,2–453,6	 aniṣṭiḥ nāma mahatām parihāraḥ mahān ayam sarva anartha anuṣaṅgeṣu yadi evam syāt kṛtārtha tā vyāpaka abhyupagama vādinaḥ hi prasahya āyātaḥ sva saṃvedana abhyupagamaḥ iti uktam tatas yadi abheda vat adhyakṣa siddhiḥ bhede api na śakyaḥ syāt vāda parihāraḥ pramāṇa anupagame ca sarvasya yatheṣṭa siddhau= api kaḥ tad parihāraḥ evam tarhi bheda abheda dvayī siddhau syāt vādaḥ samupāgataḥ vedāntavādaḥ tu eka tve dustyajaḥ tattva viplavaḥ atra ucyate mad citta cakram yat api idam ekam ātmā nabhasvan na vibhuḥ tathā api tathāgatasya prathate tathā ced manaḥ samādhyā atiśayaḥ na tattvam 
JŚNĀ_453,7	 na khalu jñānasya tādṛś vyāpaka tvam nāma tattvam eva anyadā anyasya ca abhāvāt bhagavataḥ tu siddhi viśeṣaḥ asau pūrva apara rūpa saṃsparśaḥ tu saṃvedanena asti iti kutas nityatā etena hrasvata anta parihāraḥ na ca sva saṃvedanam eva kadācid ātmānam viramantam anubhavati iti uccheda antasya prabandha dvāreṇa tu śāśvata uccheda parihāraḥ avāntara vyavasthā apekṣaḥ iṣṭaḥ eva atīta ādinā api abhedaḥ bhāṣya kārasya iti sthavīyasī bhrāntiḥ lokasya prakāśamānasya eva atīta ādi bhāvanā niṣedhāt tasmāt na tāvat mātram eka tvam gagana vat vaibhava doṣākarṣi na api nitya tā pratītiḥ iti katham vedānta siddhānta śaṅkā 
JŚNĀ_454,1	 atha tāvat deśa vyāpi idam idam ca anyathā iti api pratyayaḥ katham yadi evam kāla vat deśasya api na dairdhya pratītiḥ iti natarām nitya vibhu tve ubhaya siddhivādaḥ tu ahrīkasya eva nanu digambarasya bāhyam api asti tatra api kathañcid bheda abhedau bhāvānām ca na ekāntena bāhya tvam āntara tvam vetyāt yavakara parihāre api pratyakṣa siddha buddhi rūpa eka aneka tva mātreṇa kaḥ tad mata upanipātaḥ na khalu sarvathā sāmya parihāraḥ śakyaḥ paraspara virodhaḥ tu dhvastaḥ buddhi adhikāreṇa pratibhāsāt eva tasmāt 
JŚNĀ_454,2–454,3	 yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva anubhūyate bhāsate dvi ātmaka tvena tathā eva asya sadā sthitiḥ jñāna grahaṇena etat āha na bahis dvi ātmaka eka tvena kvacid pratibhāsaḥ bhramasya api saṃbhavāt pramāṇa antara avatāra darśanāt candra dvaya ādi vat tat katham ekatvam citra ākārasya ucyate na ahrī kavāda muktiḥ vaḥ prakṛta artha vimarśane asmābhiḥ yat anuṣṭheyam bhavadbhiḥ tat anuṣṭhitam eka aneka tvayoḥ ekasya api siddhau yadā īpsitam kā kathā dvaya saṃsiddhau= ekam syāt api durbalam citra ekatā ācodye api uttaram 
JŚNĀ_454,4–455,1	 eka aneka tvayoḥ siddhau= eka tvam siddham eva tat iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākāre api cetasi citra ākāre ekāneka ākāre rūpe iti ayam api arthaḥ cetasi nāma syāt na jāte jaḍe eka bhāvaḥ api na tu eka bhāvaḥ eva na hi nīlam catur asram na nīlam iti yuktam athavā na ekam citram virodhena virodhaḥ ca na darśanāt iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākārasya cetasaḥ 
JŚNĀ_455,2	 aneka vyavahāraḥ api tarhi syāt yadi prayojanam asti kaḥ nivārayati yathā hi ekaḥ bhagavān ucyate tathā catvāri vaiśāradyāni dvātrin= lakṣaṇāni ityādi dṛśyate eva iti kā kṣatiḥ asmākam bhavataḥ tu svavadhāya kṛtyā utthāpanam etat nanu evam para hetu dūṣaṇam astu sva abhimata citrā dvaita siddhiḥ tu katham pratyakṣa pratikṣipta tvāt ekatāyāḥ nīla pītayoḥ pratibhā saṅkarāt yat api aśakya vivecana tvam uktam tat api samāna sāmagrī janya tvena avyabhicāra nimittam bheda hetuḥ buddhi rūpa tvāt tu samudāyaḥ eka deśaḥ vā na gocaraḥ parasya iti kim eka tvam astu 
JŚNĀ_455,3–455,5	 aupacārikam eka tvam viveka aśaktitaḥ yadi vyāpaka anupalambhasya asiddhiḥ satyam katham bhavet yat ca idam ucyate ekatvana āntarīyakaḥ pratibhāsaḥ iti tat api ayuktam deśa vyāptyā hi nirbhāsaḥ na ca ekasya bhavet ayam tad bhedana āntarīya tvam api ābhāsasya kim na vaḥ abhedana āntarīya tvam yathā ābhāsasya dṛśyate nīla pīta ādi tantra tvam evam bhedaḥ saḥ eva ca 
JŚNĀ_455,6–456,1	 tasmāt vyāḍi brīḍā akaram kṣāra dadhnoḥ eka tva śāsanam tat eva kim na bhavataḥ guḍa gorasa kāriṇaḥ atra ucyate iyatā yadi bhedaḥ api kathyate asti iti kā kṣatiḥ ayogasya vyavacchedena etat uktam anantaram tathā eva citrā dvaitam ca mukhyam iti api darśitam anyathā hi ekam eva syāt citra tvam na upapattimat paraspara virodhena rūpa saṃkara bhīrave avaśyam kathyam eka tvam nirbhāsāt tyajyatām bhidā 
JŚNĀ_456,2–456,5	 nirbhāse sati bhinna tvam abhedaḥ vā tad ākṛteḥ na aneka tve ca nirbhāsaḥ tasmāt ekatvam eva sat deśa vyāptiḥ anekasya jaḍasya eva upapadyate sva saṃvedyasya tu katham ekaika pratibhāsane nīla pīta ādi tantra tvam tathā astu na tat eva bhid ekasya svīkṛtasya eva tathā utpatteḥ sva hetutaḥ ekatā svīkṛtam yadvat na bheda svīkṛtam tathā dvitīyasya apratībhāsāt abhidā eva vaśīkṛtam 
JŚNĀ_456,6–456,10	 mithas virodha pakṣe ca na dvitīya avalambanam virodhān abhyupāye api citrā dvaitam prasādhitam tat na aśakya viveka tvam dhiyām advaita sādhanam eka saṃvitti siddhe asmin= tat eva ekatvam ucyate tatra iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt iti kaḥ arthaḥ etat aśakya vivecana tvam eka tvam iti arthaḥ tat evam eka bhāvaḥ hi asya anyathā eva anyathā dhiyaḥ idam vastu bala āyatam aruciḥ kva upayoginī bāhye sati dhiyaḥ grāhyam iva bhinnam śiteḥ sitam tad aikya vādī nigrāhyaḥ bāhya eṣī bāhya viplavāt etena abhedena pratyakṣa pratikṣepaḥ prayuktaḥ kim ca adhyakṣam eva hi bhinatti śiteḥ sitam ced tat bhidyamānam athavā abhidam eva bhindyāt bhede anya leśam api na iti kutas bhinattu bhindi āt abhedi manaḥ iti api kasya śakyam 
JŚNĀ_457,1–457,3^1	 bahis api hi bhidyamānā eva buddhiḥ arthān bhinatti na ca atra buddhi svarūpe pramāṇa antarāṇām avakāśaḥ sva saṃvedanāt anyatra tat ca ekam bhinatti ca iti vyāhatam bahis tu nirākāra pakṣe abhidyamānā api buddhiḥ artha kriyā ādi bhedena dṛḍhīkṛtāt bhinna svarūpa grahaṇa abhimānāt arthān bhindyāt saṃvedanam tu svadharmaḥ eva svabhāva ātmā nīla pītayoḥ na bhidyate bhinatti ca etau= iti mahat sāhasam pratyātmam bhidyamānam tu bhindyāt kevalam anyāni avārtā virahāt citra pratibhāsaḥ eva asaṃbhavī tadā iti kutas bheda sthitiḥ 
JŚNĀ_457,1–457,3^2	 athavā kutas sakāśāt bhinattu avadhera pratīyamāna tvāt na ca kim atra avadhi pratītyā kartavyam yatas eva tasya na pratītiḥ tatas eva tasya tatas bheda sthitiḥ na ca anya upalambhe api para rūpeṇa bhāvaḥ bhidyate kim tu tādātmyena pratītiḥ eva anyatas bheda pratītiḥ sā ca apratīte api parasmin= avikalā iti na bheda pratīti kṣatiḥ atra uttaram yadi tāvat apratīyamānasya api sattva pakṣa apekṣayā idam abhidhīyate tadā bāhya vādaḥ eva yuktam etat na vijñapti mātra tānaye tathā hi sattā ca nāma atyakṣāṇām sva vid mātre ca saṃsthitiḥ yat paraiḥ ucyate rucyam atra vismīyate mayā 
JŚNĀ_457,4	 tasmāt na aprakāśāt asattvāt eva tad apekṣā bheda saṃsthitiḥ na ca asat apekṣā eva bhavitum arhati na hi śaśa viṣāṇa apekṣayā kasyacid abheda sthitiḥ aikya niṣedha mātram tu syāt tat ca iṣyate eva yadi na tatas vyāvṛttam tat eva kim bhavatu ghaṭaḥ iti ced atas eva aikya niṣedha mātram brūmaḥ nanu asataḥ vyāvṛttam sat abhidhīyate yat ca asataḥ vyāvṛttam tat bandhyā sutāt api na hi vṛkṣāt vyāvṛttam na plakṣāt iti yuktam tat katham khara śṛṅgāt na vyāvṛttaḥ ghaṭaḥ yadi evam khapuṣpasya api kumbha ādibhyaḥ bhedaḥ sutarām durnivāraḥ na hi yat yatas na vyāvartate tatas tat vyāvṛttimat tatas ca vindhyāt bandhyā sutasya na bhedaḥ nābhedaḥ iti na vaktavyam ubhaya niṣedhasya abhāva niyata tvena sāmānya pudgala ādi abhāva sādhanāya anupanyāsaḥ tatas vyāvartate iti hi prathama arthaḥ pañcamī arthaḥ vā sādhāraṇaḥ eva vastu dharma tayā kalpita dharma tayā vā tat idam atra artha sa tattvam asmāt idam bhidyate iti yadi vaktuḥ eka svabhāvatā niṣedha mātram abhimatam tadā ghaṭa turaṅga śṛṅgayoḥ parasparataḥ vyāvṛttiḥ aḥ tu kā kṣatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_457,5^1	 atha ātma ātmīya vastu rūpa sthitiḥ abhimatā tadā ghaṭa paṭa ādīnām eva na nara khara śṛṅgayoḥ na vā narasya kharaśṛṅgasya ca ekasya eva vastu tvāt tathā ca sati pudgalaḥ skandhān na bhinnaḥ iti na ātma ātmīya rūpeṇa anayoḥ sthitiḥ iti eva vivakṣitam na api ekaḥ iti bandhyā sūnu samāna tām anubhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ tu abhāvasya kalpitam rūpam āśritya paraspara parihāreṇa vyavasthita lakṣaṇa tvam ucyate na vastu rūpa tvam ubhayoḥ ataeva ātma ātmīya vastu rūpa sthitiḥ iti uktam tasmāt yāvat apratibhāsamānam api na vastu tām atikrāmati tāvat paraspara asaṃkīrṇa tve a nupalabhyamānāt api bheda grahaṇam iti syāt iti mati sattā sādhane anyathā tu tadā api saṃśayaḥ eva prakāśa eka svabhāve tu sattvena pratīyamānam na ekam na nānā 
JŚNĀ_457,5^2	 pratibhāsī tu bhāvaḥ abhāvaḥ na bhavati iti bheda arthaḥ abhimataḥ eva tat ca udbhāvanā saṃvṛttyā abhidhoyate na tu tatra abhāva aṃśasya niṣedhasya ullekhaḥ ullekhe tādātmya aparihārāt kutas abhāva tā ataeva bhāva abhāva tayā api na dvaita prāptiḥ tasmāt anya abhimatasya leśasya api na pratītiḥ iti abhāvāt eva kutas bhinattu iti yuktam uktam ataeva pūrva aparayoḥ saha anupalambhe api bhedaḥ prasidhyati eva iti vyaktam ātma pratāraṇa mātram etat pūrva aparatvasya aprakāśāt prakāśasya ca pūrva aparatva ayogāt tasmāt asattvāt eva na atīta ādivedanam nāma prakāśasya eva sattvāt tathā ca bhrama atra saṃkalpana kalpanāni śātāsita ādini akhila akṣa jāni jñānāni abhinnāni saha upalabdheḥ pūrva apara tvam tu na vedyam eva iti saṃgrahaḥ 
JŚNĀ_458,1–458,3^1	 athavā kutas bhinattu iti bheda avadhera pratibhāsāt eva kim atra bhāva abhāva cintayā iti arthaḥ tathā hi asmāt bhinnam iti idam ced svarūpam grāhya vastunaḥ sa avadherasya bhāsaḥ syāt na vā grāhyam tad ātmanā nanu saṃbandhi antarā pratibhāse api saṃbandhinaḥ pitṛ ādeḥ pratītiḥ asti iti ced tatra api kālpanikam eva saṃbandhi tvam vidmaḥ vastu rūpa tve sarvasya saṃbandhinaḥ bodha ākṣepāt avadhiḥ api hi saṃbandhi viśeṣaḥ eva ataeva hetu phalayoḥ eka pratītiḥ anya pratīti vinākṛtā bhavantī śuddha svabhāva viṣayā paraspara apekṣā lakṣaṇa saṃbandha viplava saṃkalpa śilpi nirmitam eva upapādayati tasmāt avadheḥ a bodhe avadhimataḥ matiḥ iti vimatiḥ eva iti kutaścid bheda grāhi pratyakṣam apratibhāsinaḥ 
JŚNĀ_458,3^2	 nanu nīlam anīlāt bhinnam avaśyam eṣitavyam tad grāhiṇā ca pratyakṣeṇa tathā na gṛhyate iti na gṛhītam eva nīlam vayam api evam brūmaḥ anīla agrahaṇe tatas bhidyamānam na gṛhyate iti nīlam eva katham gṛhītam yatas eva tasya agrahaṇam tatas eva tatas bheda grahaḥ anyathā hi apalambha anupalambhau= eva na sidhyeyātāḥ miti ced yathā tarhi tasya na upalambhaḥ tathā tad avadheḥ bhedasya api katham upalambhaḥ tatas ca tat grahaḥ nāma yathā eka tām asya viruṇaddhi tathā tad avadhika bheda graham api atha asya etat rūpa pratītiḥ eva bheda pratītiḥ iti ucyate bheda pratīti niṣedhe api samānam etat 
JŚNĀ_459,1–459,3	 vinā avadhim pratītaḥ hi bhedaḥ bhedaḥ katham nu saḥ śabdaḥ eva tathā mābhūt iti ced bhāsatām tathā ubhaya avabhāsane hi tad apekṣaḥ svabhāvaḥ eva asya na sphurati iti ucyate na vikalpa mātra pratikṣepaḥ tasmāt yathā anya saṃkīrṇa rūpa bhāsanam eva bheda pratibhāsaḥ ucyate tathā avadhi nirapekṣam īkṣaṇam eva asya bheda pratibhāsa bhraṃśaḥ iti ucyate sva rūpa mātra pratibhāsāt yadi evam na bhedya bhāsāt avadheḥ jñātam nābhedya saṃkarāt na anyat ca bheda abhedābhyām vastu vastu grahaḥ katham yadi samīcīnam ālā ucyate evam etat arthasya avyatibhede hi jñānāt api bhidā kutas bhede ca avadhi bodhe api sarvaḥ sarvasya gocaraḥ 
JŚNĀ_459,4	 kevalam bahis abhiniveśa pāra vaśye cintā iyam tatra ca samānam eva dūṣaṇam idam yathā hi bheda grahānaṅgīkāre ekasya tathā bheda graha nibandhanasya avadhigrahasya abhāve dvitīyasya tatra yadi cakṣuṣī nimīlya bāhya graha vat avadheḥ a bodhe api bheda graha vyavasthā ekasya tadā cakṣuṣī nimīlya eva bheda graha abhāve api vastu graha vyavasthā kim na aparasya yathā paramāṇu rūpa anud lekhe api na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ anyat asti vastu tatas tatra api nimīlita akṣasya eva tad anullekhe api vastu graha vyavasthā evam bheda apratītau= api na doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_459,5^1	 katham tarhi bheda grahaḥ na kathañcid bheda graha vyavasthā mātram tu paścima niścaya apekṣayā syāt sa hi nīlam anīla rāśim ca sva anurūpa pratibhāsa viṣayīkṛtam anyaḥ anya pratyanīka tayā vibhajan sva vyāpāram api nīlam idam dṛṣṭam na ānīlam iti pratyakṣaḥ eva kṣipati iti tad apekṣayā adhyakṣam eva parasya vyāvṛttim gṛhṇāti iti vyavasthāpyate saḥ api vā smṛtiḥ iti yathā dhārāvāhi jñāna antarasya gṛhīta grahaṇam agṛhīte api ekatva niścaya apekṣayā etena tat paricchinatti iti ādeḥ avirodhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tat anena avāntara vyavasthā mātreṇa na pratyakṣasya abheda graha nisarga visarga yogaḥ tat kim idānīm upalabdha anupalabdhayoḥ aikyam astu 
JŚNĀ_459,5^2	 na bheda graha niṣedha mātrasya vivakṣita tvāt vikalpaḥ tu saha krameṇa vā pratiyoginaḥ pratipattau saṃkalpe vā bhedam abhedam vā vyavahārayet pratyakṣa apekṣayā tu apratibhāsamānam na ekam na nānā pratibhāsamāne kā gatiḥ iti ced tatra api yadi grāhakayoḥ bhedaḥ tadā anya viṣayānullekhāt pūrvavat vikalpaḥ eva bheda grāhī abhede siddhaḥ citrā dvaita vādaḥ buddhi rūpa meva abheda grāhakam eva pratyakṣam iti api saṃgrahaḥ bāhyasya sattve asattve vā na adhyakṣam bheda vedanam abheda vedanam buddhau bhāsamāna ātmanā eva tu tasmāt vyavahāra parāyaṇam eva bhedaḥ 
JŚNĀ_460,1	 nanu puras spaṣṭa ākāram nīla pīta ādi viruddha dharma adhyāsi bhāsamānam katham apahnotum śakyate na idam apahnayate ataeva citram ucyate tasya citra śabda abhidheyasya nīla pīta ādeḥ pratisvam bhedam tattvataḥ na kṣamate sva saṃvittiḥ iti ucyate tatra ca viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ iti viruddhau vā dharmau viruddhayoḥ vā prathama pakṣe api āśraya dvāreṇa vā sva rūpeṇa vā āśraya pakṣe saṃvedanāt eva adhikaraṇa tā siddheḥ asiddhiḥ viruddha dharma adhyāsasya sva saṃvedana svīkṛte pramāṇa antara avatāra virahāt atha svarūpeṇa tanmātram na vyathate abhedinya āśraye pratibhā samānau maitrīm eva avahataḥ hataḥ virodhaḥ kṛtaka nitya tva vat 
JŚNĀ_460,2^1	 tayoḥ kalpanā kṛtaḥ eva bhedaḥ atra tu pratibhāsa kṛtaḥ iti ced abhinna āśraya tva mātreṇa nidarśanam etat āśraya abhedaḥ tarhi tatra pratibhāsā bhedāt eva iti ced atra api sva saṃvedanā bhedāt pratibhāsa bhedāt tarhi bhedaḥ eva kim na vā iti ced na bāhye hi pratibhāsaḥ pramāṇam ākāra apara nāmā tad abhāve tu ābhāsaḥ eva viṣayaḥ pramāṇam tu sva saṃvedanam sa tena ekīkriyamāṇaḥ kena bhettum śakyaḥ viruddhayoḥ dharmau= iti tu dūra utsāritam bhedasya eva abhāvāt kva virodhaḥ iti tasmāt na bheda sādhanam kiñcid abheda sādhanam tu sva saṃvedanam eva bheda bādhanam ca svarasa vāhī bahis vyavahāraḥ tu upasthāpayati iti sthitam etat api āha nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne jñāna upādhiḥ ananya bhāj 
JŚNĀ_460,2^2–461,1	 aśakya darśanaḥ tam hi patati arthe vivecayan iti ananya bhāj iti ananya svabhāva bhāj pīta ādi svabhāvam abhajat nīla ādiḥ aśakya pratibhāsaḥ citra vijñāna sthaḥ ekākī śakya darśanaḥ syāt api pīta ādi eka eka niyata tvāt tad dharmatā āpannasya pratibhāsasya paraspara svabhāvaḥ tyajan= eva śakya pratibhāsaḥ iti arthaḥ tam hi vivecayan bhindan niyatam tad dharma tām anāpanna tām pratibhāsasya svīkuryāt iti bahis artha vādaḥ eva nipatet jñāna upādhiḥ ca ayam nīla ādiḥ tasmāt yat yathā bhāsate jñānam nīla pīta ādi bhāsi tvena tat tatra eva anubhūte pīta ādi tvena sva saṃvedanāt paraspara ātma tvena iti iti arthaḥ śeṣam sugamam atas yuktam āha bhāṣya kāraḥ na vā tat citram acitrāt bhedena vyavasthāpana asaṃbhavāt iti 
JŚNĀ_461,2	 atra hi acitra āda nānā rūpāt sva saṃvedanāt bhedena avyavasthāpanam iti abhedena vyavasthāpanam paryudāsa paryavasāyi vivakṣitam tat ca prasādhitam svayam eva pūrvam aśakya vivecana tvam avyabhicāra lakṣaṇam eka tvam uktam adhunā tu eka saṃvid antargata tvam eva iti vā śabdaḥ tena citra ākāra tā api saṃvṛttyā ucyate paramārthataḥ punar advaitam eva iti artham parikalpya bheda pratīti niṣedha mātra abhiprāyeṇa yat uktam yadi evam na vā tad advaitam dvaitāt bhedena apratibhāsanāt evam na vā jñānam na vā sva saṃvedanam iti tat nirastam dvaitam hi bhedaḥ tasya ca kva pratibhāsaḥ tena tatas bheda pratibhāsā bhāve api kutas eka tvam ekasya eka saṃvid antargameṇa pratipādita tvāt evam śeṣam api pratibhāse hi sarvasya viparyayasya svabhāva bhaṅga prasaṅgaḥ 
JŚNĀ_462,1^1	 udbhāvanā saṃvṛttyā ca atra citra vat bhedaḥ api vyavasthā arhaḥ iti api na yuktam anubhavasya bheda virodhena udaya pratipādanāt nīla pīta ādi mātreṇa citrasya advaita vacanam eva udbhāvanā saṃvṛtiḥ na bheda vacanam abhyāsa bhāvitam tu bheda vacanam anabhyūhita tattvasya na tattva uparodhi iti vastutas tu prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eva ayam vācaka akṣaraḥ eka tva sādhanāya iti tu bhrāntiḥ lokasya tat ayam arthaḥ athavā tad grāhya grāhaka abhimatam nīla pīta ādi vā citra śabda abhidheyam na citram na nānā acitrāt sva saṃvedanāt hetoḥ bhedena vyavasthāpana abhāvāt iti nānātva niṣedha mātram iṣṭam pareṇa ca eka tva niṣedhaḥ adhyakṣāt eva kutas iti ubhaya vinirmuktaḥ eva prakāśaḥ kṣaṇikam kṣaṇi tva m uktaḥ iva san= iti uktam bhavati yathā prathamam prathitam asmābhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_462,1^2–462,2	 atas eva anyasya jaḍasya grāhya grāhakasya vā abhāvāt kevala arthaḥ ayam advaita śabdaḥ na dvaita paryudāse na eka arthaḥ iti darśayan= āha tasmāt sva saṃvedanam eva kevalam advaitam aparasya abhāvāt iti tena yat eva codya mukhena pūrvam āha atha pratibhāsamānam katham eka aneka tva vikalpanāt eva na bhavati vikalpyamānam api tad pratibhāsate eva abhāve katham pratibhāsaḥ pratibhāsaḥ ced katham abhāvaḥ iti ṭīkā ca atra eka aneka rūpa parihṛtasya api upalambha āt matayā upalambhaḥ sattā iti nyāyāt sat eva iti tat eva siddhānta antara tvena vyaktīkṛtam tat evam eka tva upādhiḥ citrā dvaitavādaḥ vārtikakārasya mukhyaḥ upalakṣyate bhāṣya kārasya tu ubhaya vyāvṛtti viśeṣaṇaḥ tattvataḥ tu ubhayoḥ api ekaḥ eva abhiprāyaḥ abhivyakti rīti bhedāt tu mukhya itara vyavasthā anālocya tatas citrām citrā dvaita vyavasthitim bhāṣya apadeśāt ācārya dūṣaṇam kasya bhūṣaṇam 
JŚNĀ_462,3^1	 yadi ca ācāryasya anyaḥ abhiprāyaḥ bhāṣya kārasya api akṣara vyākhyeyam abhiprāyaḥ tu anyaḥ iti na aśakyam iti dhik prakāśaḥ eva skhalanam ! tat evam ekatāyāḥ eva buddhi rūpe citre api upapatteḥ vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ asiddhiḥ na upayogaḥ citra advaitena vyavahāriṇām iti tu na bādhakam buddha gocara tvāt śūnya tā vat tattva avabodha itarayoḥ abhedāt doṣaḥ eva ced anīkṣamāṇaḥ sva mukham sukham jīvati pecakaḥ tathā hi na sā kṛtau cetasi vipratītiḥ prakāśamānasya manaḥ tu asiddheḥ prakalpitena eva tu na ātmanā asat prakāśinā api iti viśeṣaḥ eṣaḥ tayā ca kim dharma tayā kadācid vimucyate cakram idam matīnām na ca ātma rūpa anubhavaḥ na pūrvam citta svabhāva tva hati prasakteḥ tatas ca tat niścayaḥ eva na āsīt ākāra bheda utkalitaḥ ca saḥ api na tattva saṃvṛti anugamya ca asya para vyapekṣā virahe asti bhedaḥ na ca kvacid nāma parasya bodhaḥ svabhāva śūnya tvam api dvayoḥ samam 
JŚNĀ_462,3^2–464,1	 tat ekadā saṃvṛtiḥ anyadā na iti ayam vibhāgaḥ bhavataḥ api kiṃkṛtaḥ athavā na śūnyatāyāḥ virahaḥ kadācid sākṣātkriyā vā api parā na kācid na doṣa nāśaḥ na guṇa udayaḥ vāna saṃvṛtiḥ kārya vicāryamāṇāḥ tat atra yāvat na vicāra saṃbhavaḥ bhavaḥ ayam anyaḥ śamaḥ iti ayam nayaḥ vicāra līlā lulite tu mānasebhavaḥ śamaḥ vā kaḥ iha iti kathyatām tathā ca sūtra alaṅkāre na ca antaram kiñcana vidyate anayoḥ sat artha vṛttyā śama janmanoḥ iha tathā api janma kṣayataḥ vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubha karma kāriṇām sat artha vṛttyā parama artha vṛttyā śeṣam saṃvṛttyā abhisamaya alaṃkāre api svapna upama tvāt dharmāṇām bhava śāntyoḥ akalpanā iti ādikam tatas ca jāti siddham nirvāṇam ca bhavaḥ ca eva dvayam etat na vidyate parijñānam bhavasya eva nirvāṇam iti kathyate iti asya dūṣaṇam niraparādha mātṛ vadhaḥ eva tat ayam prakaraṇa arthaḥ bhedaḥ abhedaḥ dvidhā advedhāḥ dhī rūpe astu yathā tathā nālīka tvam prakāśasya bādha gandha virodhinaḥ 
JŚNĀ_464,2	 vijānāti iti vijñānam ityādi kalpita prapañca śūnya tā tu sarvatra tathā ca na hi te sva bhūte dharmāḥ tathā saṃvidyante yathā bāla pṛthagjanāḥ aśrutavantaḥ abhiniviṣṭaḥ ityādi vistaraḥ buddhi dharmāḥ api hi buddhi antara parikalpitena rūpeṇa santaḥ eva na sva saṃvedya tayā eva sattvāt etena svapna māyā upama tvam bhagavataḥ vyākhyātam dṛṣṭānteṣu api hi niṣedhaḥ adhyavasitasya eva na pratibhāsamānasya tasmāt sa ākārasya eva bhagavataḥ siddhiḥ bādha āvinākṛtā iti sthitam tathā ca namaskāra ślokasya artha siddhiḥ sa anna vyañjana lakṣaṇaiḥ adhigata audārya nijena ātmanā yat gambhīram ananya gocara tayā śūnyam prapañca ūrmibhiḥ nirmāṇaiḥ ca yatas sphuranti jagatīm jñāna tviṣaḥ tad na cālīka tvena kalaṅkitam vapuḥ atas bhadram samantāt muneḥ kim bhūyas yathā suvarṇam guṇa rūpa saṃpadaḥ prakarṣa paryantam upetam akṣayam vimuktam ālīkya kalaṅka śaṅkayā tathā eva bauddham vapuḥ aḥ tu dehinām 
JŚNĀ_466,1	 nanu sva saṃvedana vilāsaḥ sarvaḥ ayam pūrvaḥ vistaraḥ sva saṃvedanam ca nāma na asti eva etat yukti āgama nigṛhīta tvāt tad abhāve kutas citrā citrā dvaita vyavasthitiḥ na vā samantabhadra tvam ālīkya aparihārataḥ atra praśnaḥ videva kim na asti kim astu na svayam prameya hatyā atha katham pravedanam hatiḥ sva vittau para vedane api vā samastam etat na samasti nirṇaye tathā hi saṃvittiḥ mama na iti na prathayitum śakyam vibhinnaiḥ mṛdaḥ na api iyam paratas kvacid na ca parisphūrta a= api idam na sat na sphūrtau svayam eva satyam iti ced anyena vittau kutas sattvam na ubhayathā api ca iti gaditum ca etat svataḥ asāṃpratam ayam arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_466,2–466,4	 saṃvittiḥ eva na asti iti brūyāt niścetanaḥ api kim na vaktā ced na ca śrotā sva nirbhāsaḥ tathā api ayam paratas tu vedanam iti nirastam anyatra iti āstām tāvat atha na sarvathā vāryate sva saṃvittiḥ kim tu sāṃvṛtī iti ucyate tarhi sarvathā pratikṣepa abhāve bādhaka adhīnam asyāḥ sāṃvṛta tvam bādhā ca prameyāt bhedena anubhavāt vā prameya bādhayā eva na tasyāḥ sthitiḥ iti tatra bhedena anubhave bhedāt sva anubhūtiḥ katham bhavet prameya bādhā tu punar śakreṇa api na śakyate 
JŚNĀ_467,1^1	 na hi sphurat rūpam eva na asti iti śakyam avasātum atha na sarvathā sphurataḥ niṣedhaḥ svayam vedyam eva tu mā bhūt para vedyam punar astu na evam sva vedane api anāśvāsaḥ kā vārtā para vedane sva vedanasya abhāve hi para vedanam api asat yadi pareṇa param vedyamānam sat bhavet param eva katham sat bhaviṣyati na ca āsat eva anya sattā vyavahāra kāraṇam tasya anyena vedane sati sattve anavasthā evam eva para sattā iti ced prameye api evam eva astu svayam eva ca sattvam ced prakāśaḥ api svayam bhavet jaḍasya sva kāritra virodhaḥ hi tāvatām anayoḥ samaḥ 
JŚNĀ_467,1^2	 atha para vedanam api yena svīkṛtam bhavatu tasya eva doṣaḥ mama tu sva vedyam na para vedyam kim api iti ced na evam cetanāvān vaktum arhati tathā hi svatas paratas vā sphuran= eva na asti arthaḥ iti na aniṣṭyā vacana mātreṇa vā nivartayitum śakyaḥ iti yadi pramāṇam anusaret tadā pratyakṣam ādau= ādāya pramāṇa antara parigaṇanam anumāna ādau hi dṛṣṭa aniṣṭiḥ na tu pratyakṣe parīkṣa viṣaye ca śeṣam aśeṣam na tad viṣaye vidhi bādhayoḥ utsahate tat eva ca pratyakṣa siddham abhidhīyate yad svarūpasya sākṣāt nirbhāsaḥ sa ca svena pareṇa vā iti kim anena 
JŚNĀ_467,2–467,5	 para vyāpāra abhāve api yadi na asya sva rūpa vid svarūpa pracyutiḥ sā eva kim anyaiḥ bādhakaiḥ api yatas eva ātma nirbhāsaḥ tatas eva na bādhyate sva artha avabhāsanāt eva bādhakasya api bādhitāḥ saḥ api tena eva bhāṇḍena vaṇij iti avagamyatām tasmāt prakāśamānasya na bādhaḥ nāma kaścana nanu pareṇa prakāśane tena eva rakṣā syāt svayam bhāsanam anātham pareṇa prabhavatā bādhyeta uktam atra paraḥ api svarūpa prakāśanena eva upayujyate na sattā mātreṇa na api bhujam prasārya prahāra vāraṇena tad svarūpa prakāśanam yadi svarūpam api saṃbhavet na aparam upayogi pratyuta sva balena eva balavān yaḥ pareṇa sa durbalaḥ yathā ātma rakṣā avahitaḥ paraḥ tatra paraḥ tathā tathā ca asat khyāti viparīta khyāti smṛti pramoṣa dṛṣṭi moṣa ādayaḥ 
JŚNĀ_468,1–468,4	 pareṇa bhāsane dṛṣṭāḥ vividhāḥ bhrama kalpanāḥ sva hetoḥ tu prakāśasya niṣpattau prabhavanti na yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva vyavasthitam na anyatra rūpam ādhāya bhāsate jñānam anyathā yadā yat eva sphurati rūpam tasya tat eva hi su a ākāreṇa aikya karaṇāt bahis api ucyate bhramaḥ yadā tu bahis api paritas nirasta vibhrama āśaṅkam abhyāsāt svarūpa nirbhāsi jñānam anubhava viṣayaḥ tadā kva bādha śaṅkā kim punar sva anubhave kevalam tādṛśasya katham utpattiḥ katham vā niścayaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_468,5–468,7	 yathā nīla svabhāvena janma bodha ātmanā tathā dhiyaḥ sva hetoḥ dīpasya pīta bhāsā ātmanā yathā katham punar sva saṃvedanam eva idam na para vedanam iti anyatra uktam iti uktam kevalam sva vedyam para vedyam vā pratibhāsamānam eva rūpam abādhyam iti prakṛtam tat ca siddham pramāṇasya pramāṇena na aparasya api bādhanam prāk eva adhyakṣa rūpasya sva saṃvitteḥ tu kā kathā 
JŚNĀ_468,8	 trairūpya pariśuddhi bodha janmanaḥ anumānasya api na māna antareṇa avamānaḥ śakyaḥ śabda ādeḥ vā yathāyatham na hi ekadā ekatra eva dharmiṇi paraspara pratyanīka dharma dvaya sādhana samarthayoḥ saṃbhavaḥ iti ākṣipta prāyam ekasya tu sva viṣaya dārḍhya virahe bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ syāt sva viṣaye ca dārḍhyam adārḍhya vā dvayoḥ paryante pratyakṣasya eva skhalana itarābhyām pratyakṣasya ca skhalanam viṣaye bhramaḥ eva bhramaḥ ca para vitti niyate iti kaḥ saṃvedanasya pratimallaḥ 
JŚNĀ_469,1	 yadi bahis api nirasta vibhrama āśaṅkasya na bādhaḥ katham advaya anumānena sva prabhavasya bādhaḥ uktam atra para vitteḥ eva ayam viplavaḥ iti na śakyam vyāpaka anupalambhe api sva vitteḥ eva ayam viplavaḥ iti śakyam abhidhātum para vedana adhyavasāyena tad vyāpārasya ananuvidhānāt tadā api sattā mātreṇa bhāvaḥ iti saṃskāriṇaḥ śruta saṃskāra kṣālana vat mahā moha sāmarthyam etat saṃskāram antareṇa api skhalanam iti ced tarhi jīvitam antareṇa na skhalanam iti maraṇam eva skhalana pratīkāraḥ iti sādhvī bauddha sthitiḥ kim ca sva vedanasya vyāpaka tayā vyatirekaḥ aśakya darśanaḥ iti anādya vidyā prabhavaḥ api viplavaḥ tadīya iti vadataḥ vyāpaka anupalabdhi sādhyāyāḥ niḥsvabhāva tāyāḥ api svabhāvāra uparāga ādayaḥ viplalaḥ iti na dūram pratyanīka ākāra tā tu sādhāraṇī 
JŚNĀ_469,2	 tasmāt na sattā mātreṇa upayoga vyavasthā upayoge api vā na tad vyāpārān anuvidhāyinā vikalpena utthāpitaḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ tasmai prabhavati tad aprabhavaḥ hi saṃbandha ādi grāhakam eva apramāṇīkurvan tena eka viṣaya tayā para vedanam eva doṣeṇa sparśayet na sva saṃvedanam atyanta bhinna viṣaya tvāt tatas yathā tatra sādhane yadi para vitteḥ prāmāṇyam svīkuryāt sva bādhanam anumānam api pramāṇayet atha na tathā api anumāna sādhyam siddham iti tasyāḥ eva viplavaḥ sphuṭībhavati anumāna udayena tathā na vyāpakān upalambhena sva vitteḥ ukta sāmarthyasya vaktum aśakteḥ sva icchayā tu pratipattā sva vedana viṣayam api pakṣīkuryāt kevalam pratyakṣa viśeṣa bādhita tvāt na sādhana avadhānam iti nyāyaḥ 
JŚNĀ_469,3	 tarhi vijñaptimātra siddhau= eṣa nyāyaḥ prāk eva tu vyāpaka anupalambha udaye tad sādhanam eva anavakāśam na evam yadā eva nīlasya niḥsvabhāva tām pratijānīte tadā eva sva vedana adhyakṣeṇa pratikṣepāt ukta krameṇa yadi evam prakāśamānatā ādi sādhana bandhya tā prasaṅgaḥ etat api na asti vijñapti vyavahāra mātra upayogāt nanu tathā api para prakāśyatā niṣedhena sva prakāśa tā sādhyamānāḥ vijñāna vyavahāram sādhayet na ca sarvathā para vedya tā abhāve niḥsvabhāva tve vā sādhya sādhanam nāma kiñcid tat katham vyavahāra siddhiḥ api 
JŚNĀ_469,4	 tat ayuktam saṃvṛtau hi sādhya sādhana āsthā tadā ca dvayoḥ api tattvayoḥ asiddhiḥ tatra ca yasya puras apara upādhi prakāśini api nīle nija abhisaṃskārikā avidyā balāt para prakāśyatā saṃśayaḥ tad vodhanāya nyāya sahaḥ sādhana upanyāsaḥ tadā ca saḥ eva pratyakṣa bādha ādikam nirūpayiṣyati tad pratipādane ca jāte vijñapti vyavahāraḥ iti etāvatā eva vijñāna vādinaḥ vyāpāra samāptiḥ parasya tu pratyakṣa bādhā eva sādhana avadhānam niṣedhati na ca anumānān udayam apekṣya pratyakṣa vṛttiḥ kvacid api anumānam tad aviṣayaḥ eva sarvadā pravṛttimat iti tena sādhite iva bādhite api na avakāśam āsādayati iti sthitam 
JŚNĀ_470,1	 tasmāt na prameya bādhayā sāṃvṛta tvam ātma vedanasya tathā etat api na aśaṅkanīyam yadi nīlam sva vedanāt siddham sva vedanena api sva vedana antarāt seddhavyam iti anavasthā tasya svayam siddhau nīlasya api sva vedanena kim kartavyam iti tathā hi nīlasya api kim sva vedanena iti vedanam vadataḥ svayam eva vedanam astu iti abhimatam ayam eva ca sva saṃvedana vādaḥ iti aśva ārūḍha nyāyaḥ yadi tu bhinnam tat syāt tadā na anavasthām atikrāmeta na api sva vedana vāda sparśaḥ iti yadi tarhi na bhinnam prajñaptisat tasya eva ca dharma mātram etat tadā tad vādhane svayam eva na taṭastham āsitum śaktam tat katham para rakṣaṇa kṣamam tat api yat kiñcit 
JŚNĀ_470,2–470,6	 nīlasya api prakāśa tvam prakāśasya api nīla tā dharma dharmi vyavasthānam na eka ātma niyatam matam abhedaḥ eva rakṣā api bhedaḥ asmin niṣprayojanaḥ svarakṣāna antarīyā hi para rakṣā bhavet na vā yatas eva svayam bhāti tatas eva na bādhyate iti artha tattvam kena api vyāhāreṇa nivedyate yat punar yukti vāditā abhimānena ucyate sva ātmani kāritra virodhāt na sva saṃvedanam na hi tat eva aṅgulī agram tena eva aṅgulī agreṇa spṛśyate iti tatra api na aṅgulī agram tad agreṇa spṛśyam ced masṛṇam katham svayam masṛṇam etat ced virodhaḥ kim na saṃprati 
JŚNĀ_470,7	 kim na dhīḥ bhāsate svayam vā svayam eva masṛṇam idam asti jātam vā iti pratītyā vākya artha paryavasānāt āyātaḥ kāritra virodhaḥ tathā ca svayam gacchati svayam gauraḥ ityādi preraṇa aṅgarāga janita tva ādi pratikṣepeṇa sarvathā na vaktavyam evam vādibhiḥ tad sannidhau vā pareṇa iti mahān viplavaḥ atha sa karmikāyām kriyāyām ekam eva karma kartā ca na ucitam jñāna arthā ca sa karmikā eva kriyā nīlam vetti caitraḥ iti evam tarhi svayam prakāśate buddhiḥ iti ādau tūṣṇīm āsyatām tatas ca vedyatas ityādi yat karma kartṛ vivakṣayā paraiḥ prayujyate tat asmābhiḥ bhāsate iti asmin= eva arthe saṅketitam iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ atha svayambhūḥ bhagavān ityādinā prakṛti īśvara ādi vyāpāra nirāśena sva hetoḥ eva tādṛś svarūpa utpatti pratipādana mātram etat na tu bheda dṛṣṭaḥ kriyā kāraka vyavahāraḥ atra mataḥ iti ucyate buddhiḥ api tarhi sva hetoḥ eva prakāśa rūpa utpannā na pareṇa prakāśitā iti saṃmatau kaḥ vidveṣaḥ iyam eva ātma saṃvittiḥ asya yā jaḍa rūpa tā kriyā kāraka bhāvena na sva saṃvittiḥ asya tu iti antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_471,1	 yat punar atra uktam evaṃvādinaḥ lokaḥ eva bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti tat anena eva nirastam loke tathāvidhāyāḥ vivakṣāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt atha buddhi viṣaye na dṛśyate tatra api prakāśa rūpa vyavahāre sva para prakāśa vivakṣāyāḥ dṛṣṭa tvāt dīpa ghaṭa vat kevalam bāhye dvaya darśane api buddhi rūpa adhikāreṇa para prakāśyatāyāḥ bādhanāt sva prakāśa tā eva vyavasthāpyate na tu sarvathā vyavahāraḥ eva evam na asti iti 
JŚNĀ_471,2	 nanu dīpaḥ prakāśate iti jñātvā jñānena kathyate jñānam prakāśate iti kena idam suhṛdā ucyate prakāśāḥ vā aprakāśāḥ vā yadā dṛṣṭā na kenacid bandhyā duhitṛ līlā iva kathyamānā api sā mudhā iti ced niravakāśam etat idam eva hi nīla ādi sva prakāśa svabhāvam jñānam iti vyavasthāpitam tat katham kena idam suhṛdā ucyate iti ucyate na sva saṃvedye arthe para upadeśaḥ garīyān kaḥ anyathā dharmī vyapaka anupalambha ādeḥ pradīpe api tarhi jñānam eva katham dṛṣṭāntaḥ satyam loka apekṣayā alokaḥ eva bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati iti apahastayitum tat etat yukti kṣīṇasya viśrāma mātram atrāṇam anyathā sarva śūnyatāyām eva kim bādhakaḥ lokaḥ saṃvṛttyā sarva svīkārāt iti ced tattvataḥ na kiñcid asti iti etat eva lokasya na kṣamam saṃvṛttyā tu na asti iti yadi syāt astu atha tattvataḥ api na asti iti kim asmābhiḥ sādhyate astināsti vyatikramasya abhimata tvāt iti ced na asti niṣedhaḥ eva na hi na asti arthaḥ 
JŚNĀ_472,1–472,4	 na bhāvaḥ yadi nīla ādeḥ abhāvaḥ kena vāryate na abhāvaḥ iti vāde ca bhāvaḥ eva avatiṣṭhate paraspara parīhāra vyavasthitimatām yatas eka bādhaḥ anya vidhaye na anicchā mātrataḥ anyathā tṛtīyaḥ vā prakāraḥ atra vaktavyaḥ yadi vā anayoḥ ekatra eva vyavasthānam dhīmatām na aparā gatiḥ syāt etat na asmābhiḥ kasyacid vidhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vā sādhyate sat asat ubhaya anubhaya vādinām tu sva abhyupagamena eva tad tad lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ iti pratipādyate tatra yadi sat lakṣaṇa anupapattyā svayam eva prāk api sattva abhāvaḥ tadā kim asmābhiḥ apanītam kim api syāt yadā ca asat lakṣaṇa anupapattyā prāk api asattva abhāvaḥ tadā kim abhāva abhāvena bhāvaḥ nāma kasyacid kutas yathā hi 
JŚNĀ_472,5–472,6	 putra utpatti vipattibhyām kumāryāḥ prīti dīnate putra saṅkalpataḥ svapne jāgrataḥ tu na vidyate sa tasyāḥ sauvaśeṣa śoka vinodanāya yadi tad prabandha mṛṣā tvam āsādayati tat kim tena kasyacid vidhiḥ putra ādi abhāvasya niṣedhaḥ vā putra ādi bhāvasya kṛtaḥ putra udaya niṣedhena vā abhāvaḥ kasyacid maraṇa niṣedhena vā bhāva vidhiḥ svayam āditas putrasya eva abhāvāt tad anuvāda mātram tu jāgrataḥ evam ārya anāryayoḥ ūhitavyam etat eva ca ādiśānta tvam prakṛti pariśuddhiḥ ca āgame gīyate iti 
JŚNĀ_472,7–472,8	 atra ucyate kīdṛśau vidhi niṣedhau bhavatā parihriyete utpādana vināśa lakṣaṇau hastena gṛhītvā upanaya apanaya svabhāvau vā yat vā vivāda āspadībhūtasya kasyacid dharmasya pramāṇena sādhana lakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ bādhana lakṣaṇaḥ vā niṣedhaḥ tatra ādya pakṣa dvayam tāvat anyasya api na vidyate bhavatā api tṛtīyaḥ tu parihartum na śakyate 
JŚNĀ_473,1	 na hi bhagavataḥ prāmāṇyam sthitam eva prāk apanīyate paścāt veti īśvara ādau= asat eva upanīyate iti pare api manyante tathā na dvayam sthitam eva apanīyate advayam vā saṃpratyupanīyate apareṇa sthitaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ anūdyate yuktyā ca kayācid pratipādyate iti sarva saṃmatiḥ tat ca bhavataḥ api asti iti kaḥ evam atirekaḥ uktaḥ bhavati tat ayam eva vidhi niṣedha prakramaḥ yat idam asti idam na asti iti pratipādanam tat ca āyātam vacana vyāpṛtasya viśeṣataḥ jigīṣayā para artha śīla tayā vā vāde pravṛttasya mūkībhūya tiṣṭataḥ tu na ayam paryanuyogaḥ iti syāt svapna dṛṣṭāntaḥ api sarva sādhāraṇaḥ yaḥ hi vastu dharmaḥ kenacid ādriyamāṇaḥ kenacid niṣedhyaḥ tasya siddhyā tad guṇa āropāt vā prītiḥ pareṇa tad abhāva pratipādane viṣādaḥ tat cita vinodana udyatena ca ādinaḥ eva tathā na asti iti anuvāda mātram kṛtam iti tulyam 
JŚNĀ_473,2^1	 tatra yaḥ eva tathā pratipādana kṣamaḥ tasya eva svādhīnaḥ svapna dṛṣṭāntaḥ tathā ca advaya vāde api yathā su a ākāra mātraḥ eva putram jāgaraṇa kāle phalitam āropya harṣa ādiḥ tathā jāgrat daśāyām api jñāna ākāra mātraḥ eva bahis āropeṇa iti na kṣatiḥ tad ubhaya daśayoḥ api nirvikalpa pratibhāsaḥ sva rūpa mātra paryavasitaḥ api vikalpena abhūtāropaḥ tiraskriyate iti uktam sa ca svarūpam tirodhāya para rūpam eva darśanena yojayati yatas evam bhavati putraḥ adya svapne mayā dṛṣṭaḥ iti kiñcid vimarśe hi na putradarśanam nāma jñāna mātram mama tathā udapādī iti tatas tad vyavasāya apekṣayā sā putram jātam ca mṛtam ca paśyati ityādi abhidhānam tattvataḥ tu kva putra darśanam anādi vāsanā vaśāt tad abhiniveśa prasava yogya viśiṣṭa ākāra jñāna mātra udayāt anyatra 
JŚNĀ_473,2^2	 kevalam kim atra vastu tattvam iti vicāra vyasanam yasya hasta āmarśena tasya kim prītyā abhiyogaḥ kriyatām kīrtivārtika bhāṣyayoḥ śraddhā vaśa tve api varam yuvarājanayā āśrayaḥ ārya nāgārjuna ādīnām api yatra vyavasthitiḥ iti pratipādayiṣyate āgama pāṭhāḥ punar avicāra caturasya puṇya mātra prasava hetavaḥ eva vicāra prakrame ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ eka niṣedha abhidhāyinaḥ dvitīya svīkāraḥ sāmarthyāt āyātaḥ iti na anicchā mātreṇa trātum śakyam tathā hi svapne na putraḥ nāma āsīt iti putra abhāvaḥ vihitaḥ eva bhāvaḥ ca niṣiddhaḥ tat katham jāgratā na vidhiḥ na pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate āryasya tu na tathā darśanam iti api tad ākāra darśana pratyanīka ākāra jñāna udayaḥ eva na sarvathā saṃvitti vilopaḥ iti āstām tāvat 
JŚNĀ_474,1–474,2	 atha bhāva abhāva vikalpa niṣedhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ sarvathā na pratibhāsa mātra lopaḥ tat etat iṣṭam eva vikalpasya prakṛti bhrānta tvāt atha vicāra akṣa mata eva śūnyatā arthaḥ tadā vicāraḥ nāma saṃvṛtya āśrayaḥ tatra ca niyamena pramāṇa avatāre na sva saṃvittim antareṇa pratyakṣa antaram anumānam vā svarūpa sat tayā eva viyoga prasaṅgāt na api dharmi dharma ādi pratipattiḥ iti saṃvṛtau niyata sva ākārāyāḥ sva saṃvidaḥ prameya pramāṇa antara vat bādha anupapatteḥ sthiteḥ eva iti na sāṃvṛta tva viśeṣaṇa avakāśaḥ yathā yathārthāḥ cintyante vivicyante tathā tathā svayam tu vittiḥ chāyā iva dhāvataḥ duratikramāḥ 
JŚNĀ_474,3	 tatas ca sva saṃvidita rūpasya kīdṛśī vicāra akṣa matā kiyantaḥ hi vicārāḥ pravartantām na tu nīla prakāśasya prakāśa tā nīla tā vai atipāta mātram na api aprakāśa dharma antaram paricaya viṣayaḥ yaḥ eva ca sva rūpa mātra anubhavaḥ kalpitānām parābhavaḥ saḥ eva tatas ca sama tā jñeyāḥ na upalambha upalambhayoḥ iti nyāyaḥ tat etat ādi śānta tvam prakṛtyā ca viśuddha tā vaimalya pariśuddhiḥ tu sarva asat kalpanā kṣayaḥ iti uktam eva yat api idam tad abhyupagamena eva tad lakṣaṇa anupapattiḥ iti tāvatā api na anubhava svabhāva paribhavaḥ yatas bhauta kalpita kalpānām lakṣaṇānām kṣatau= api sarva upādhi viviktasya vastu rūpasya na kṣatiḥ rāja dvāri dviradam avalokya 
JŚNĀ_475,1–475,4	 dantena mūlādakam andhakāram prasrāvataḥ nīrada potam āha kaścid catustambhakam aṭṭam āsyam dvāram balim piṇḍa nibhāt purīṣāt rājadvāre śmaśāne vā yaḥ tiṣṭhati sa bāndhavaḥ iti gāḍha smṛteḥ anyaḥ bhautaḥ bāndhavam eva tam tatas bhautaiḥ iva paraiḥ kalpitāni eva svarūpāṇi vigalantu puras prakāśinaḥ kim āyātam bādhāyāḥ tatas yadi eṣaḥ eva siddhāntaḥ na viśeṣaḥ tad ā āvayoḥ bādhe tu sarvathā abhāvaḥ katham lokāt abādhanam yadi loka anurakṣā api dhīrūpe na āstitīcyatām tattvena sarvathā na asti iti udvegaḥ kim na gaṇyate 
JŚNĀ_475,5	 tasmāt loke udvījatām mā vā puruṣa artha upayogi tattva ākhyānam katham parihartum śakyam iti yadi svayam āśayaḥ paraḥ kim alīkam ākulīkriyate kaḥ hi saduttare api bhavatām śakti pratibandham śraddha dhīta asti ca loke api sva prakāśa vyavahāraḥ iti kva loka bādhā api buddheḥ eva adhikāre sākṣāt na dṛṣṭaḥ iti kim anenaḥ sva prakāśam api vastu asti na ca kāritra virodhaḥ iti sāmānya āśrayeṇa eva dṛṣṭāntasya kṛta tvāt api ca sphurati etādṛśaḥ buddhiḥ mama ityādimatiḥ na kim mama sva anubhavaḥ ca atra saṅkalpe tvad guṇa spṛśi tasmāt alam anena bāla jana upalāpanena 
JŚNĀ_475,6	 yat api smaraṇāt anubhava siddhim āśaṅkya arthaḥ eva smaraṇam anubhavaḥ ca na jñānaḥ iti ucyate tatra api artha ākāra jñānam eva tat ca svayaṃsphuritam anusmaryate iti na kṣatiḥ arthe ca smaraṇam iti na tāvat ananubhūte bhavitum arhati atiprasaṅgāt anubhūtaḥ ca arthaḥ anubhavān anubhave iti katham pratītam atra hṛdayena asaṃvittau vitteḥ na khalu tad upādhi vyavahṛtiḥ pratītau= anyena prasabham anavasthā prasarati anena eva apāste api anumitimate liṅga virahaḥ na ca adṛṣṭam liṅgam tad adhigati siddhau ca vimatiḥ iti antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_476,1–476,3	 katham tarhīdaṃtayā na nirdiśyate jñānam anubhūyamānam nanu nirdiṣṭam eva antar śātādi viṣayam bahis śīta ādi gocaram vedanam tat tat ākāram na anyaḥ api asti tatas paraḥ sphurat tā nāma dharmaḥ ayam pratyātmam durapahnavaḥ iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalam sva vid tatas nirākāra pakṣe syāt eṣa doṣaḥ sa ākāra pakṣe tu śaṃkā api na asti sa ākāra pakṣaḥ eva tu śāntideva pādānām abhimataḥ yat āhuḥ yathā dṛṣṭam śrutam jñātam na iva iha pratiṣidhyate satyataḥ kalpanā tu atra duḥkha hetuḥ nivāryate iti atra hi satyataḥ tattvataḥ dṛṣṭa ādiḥ na niṣidhyate iti dṛṣṭa ādi karma nirdeśāt prakāśamānaḥ nīla komala ādiḥ aśakya nihnavaḥ iti uktam bhavati 
JŚNĀ_476,4	 kasya tarhi nairātmyam iti āha kalpanā eva abhūtānām grāhya grāhaka hetu phala ādīnām iti arthāt kalpanā śabdāt eva adṛṣṭe hi kalpanā adṛṣṭam ca adṛṣṭa tvāt eva na saṃbhavati tattvataḥ iti atra api saṃbadhyate tena niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarva dharmāḥ ityādi vacane api tattvataḥ kalpita rūpa niṣedhaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ kimartham punar abhūta vikalpa vāraṇam duḥkhasya hetu tvāt saḥ eva hi pravṛtti nivṛtti ādi lakṣaṇam saṃsāram ākṣipati tam antareṇa tad ākāra udaya mātrasya tatra akiṃñcitkara tvāt iti yat tu satyate iti satya tvena yā kalpanā iti yojayanti tatra api yadi satya tve api satyam idam iti vikalpa vāraṇam pariniṣpattau kaḥ doṣaḥ 
JŚNĀ_476,5^1	 atha saṃprati api satya adhimokṣa vāraṇam asattvāt iti arthaḥ tadā dṛṣṭa ādi na pratiṣidhyate iti vyāhatam asatyam ca āpādyate dṛṣṭa ādi na ca pratiṣidhyate iti asatya tā āpādanasya eva pratiṣedha artha tvāt atha na pratiṣidhyate saṃvṛttyā tattvataḥ tu vāraṇam tat api na akṣara ārūḍham satyataḥ śabdaḥ anyathā yojitaḥ kalpanā viśeṣaṇa tvena na ca tadā kalpanā śabdaḥ saṅgataḥ dṛṣṭa ādeḥ eva ekasya saṃvṛti parama artha apekṣayā vidhi niṣedha viṣaya tayā abhimata tvāt tathā hi yathā dṛṣṭam śrutam jñātam na eva iha pratiṣidhyate 
JŚNĀ_476,5^2	 saṃvṛttyā tattvataḥ tu etat duḥkha hetuḥ nivāryate iti vaktum ucitam tat atra śabdataḥ śabdasya punarāvṛttiḥ saṃvṛti śabdasya adhyāhāraḥ kalpanā śabdasya anyārtha tā iti kim akṣarāṇi kliśyante mahatām vyaktam etat ṣaṣ indriya vijñāna gocara abhimatāḥ ākārāḥ na niṣidhyante sva saṃvidita tvāt kalpitasya eva tu niṣedhaḥ iti katham tarhi sva saṃvedana niṣedhaḥ eṣām yathā bhagavataḥ bhagavataḥ eva katham bhinna viṣaya pratiṣedhāt ekatra api citra ākāre grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ sūkṣme api sākṣāt iti kriyā kāraka bhāva abhiprāyeṇa 
JŚNĀ_476,5^3	 na ca ayam na āśaṅkāyāḥ viṣayaḥ sarvathā parihāra yatnasya vā iti mantavyam tathā hi kasyacid ekatra api yathā bhāve kārya kāraṇa kalpanam ekatra eva tathā jñāne grāhya grāhaka dhīḥ bhavet yathā bhagavataḥ sa ca ayam aṅkuraḥ na svayaṃkṛtaḥ iti ārya nāgārjuna pādānām vā na svatas na api paratas ityādinā niṣedha yatnaḥ tathā vibhum cittam na paśyati ityādi yuktam etat niḥsīmā ca samāropaḥ sāṃsārikasya skandhāḥ eva ātmā ityādi vat kāruṇikena tasya api anupekṣaṇīya tvāt grāhya grāhakāra upasya ca pradhāna doṣa tvāt 
JŚNĀ_476,5^4	 kriyā kāraka bhāvena niṣedhaḥ tena yujyate sva saṃvidita rūpasya samutpādaḥ tu śasyate yathā uktam ārya sandhi nirmocane na hi maitreya tatra kaścid dharma pratyavekṣate api tu tathā samutpannam tat cittam yat tathā khyāti iti cittam artha ābhāsam pravartate iti api sva saṃvedanam eva nivedayati vedya vedakayoḥ ekīkaraṇāt tathā nīla jñāna samaṅgī puruṣaḥ nīlam jānāti iti ageḥ gati artha tayā jñāna artha tvāt nīla jñāna saṃvedī san= iti anena apratyakṣa upalambhasya na artha dṛṣṭiḥ prasidhyati iti vyaktam uktam tad vedī iti eva nīla vedī iti yāvat 
JŚNĀ_478,1–478,3	 uttaratantre ca pratyātma vedyaḥ dharmaḥ iti eva akṣaram na ca abhūta parikalpaḥ asti iti bruvataḥ sva saṃvedanāt anyat śaraṇam tasmāt na yukti āgamābhyām sva bodha siddhau pratibandhaḥ astu nāma sva saṃvittiḥ svam alīkam tu budhyatām mānayoḥ na virodhaḥ ca kṣaṇi nīlā īkṣaṇe yathā anumāna siddha vyāvṛtti antara viśiṣṭasya pratyakṣeṇa sākṣātkāre pramāṇayoḥ api na virodhaḥ kṣaṇika vat alīka tve api niścaya pratyaya anudayāt viṣaya bhedaḥ ca vyaktaḥ tat api yat kiñcit nīla sattā grāhiṇaḥ hi pratyakṣasya kṣaṇa bhaṅga sādhanam sattā viśeṣa sādhanam eva iti na virodhaḥ sattā bādhanam tu prameya tvam kūrma roma vat iti viruddham eva bādhyate ca adhyakṣeṇa tathā vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ api tathā hi 
JŚNĀ_478,4–479,1	 alīkam ātmānam avaiti kaḥ arthaḥ hi asat svabhāvaḥ sphurati iti yaḥ arthaḥ sphurat tvam eva asya ca sattvam uktam katham niṣedhaḥ ca vidhiḥ ca tasya etena pratītya utpanna tvam api pratibimba vat niḥsvabhāvatāyām svabhāva hetu abhimatam apāstam api ca pratītya utpannatā nāma kārya tā mātram ucyate sā ca nitya viruddha iti nitya tām eva bādhatām atha 
JŚNĀ_479,2–479,6	 akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvaḥ hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca iti abhiprāyataḥ tādṛś svabhāvasya eva bādhanam yena tarhi īdṛśam yatra rūpam āropi vastuni tasya eva bādhaḥ nirbādhaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga vyavasthitaḥ evam hi sautra antikaḥ eva mādhyamikaḥ prasaktaḥ iti mahat pauruṣam yatra ca akṛtrimam rūpam vyoma ādau= abhyupeyate na pratītya udayaḥ tatra pramāsiddhaḥ kathaṃcana īpsita artha kriyā āsaktā upalabdhā ghaṭa ādayaḥ na santi ātma ādayaḥ santi vyatyayena iti kā api dhīḥ 
JŚNĀ_479,7–479,8	 anupalambhāt eva na te santi iti ced upalambhaḥ tarhi sattā sādhanaḥ iti katham asantaḥ śaila ādayaḥ na upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhiḥ vā sattā sādhanī iti ced etat eva para samuttaram kim pratītya utpādena asattā sādhanam anena iti ced sarvathā sarvadā sattāyāḥ asiddheḥ asattā siddhā eva na anupalambhaḥ madīyaḥ ayam asattā hetuḥ kim tu pareṇa eva tathā abhyupagata tvāt upanyasyate tat na upalabdheḥ sattā siddhiḥ iti ced na ātma ādi vādinā anupalambha mātreṇa abhāvaḥ iṣṭaḥ tad anyena iṣṭa tve api na tasya sva upagamena doṣaḥ uktaḥ bhavati tatas ca svatantraḥ eva ayam anupalambhaḥ hetuḥ kartavyaḥ sattā sādhuḥ na saṃvittiḥ asaṃvittiḥ tu bādhanī viśeṣaṇa anapekṣā ca sa itya yoga paramparā 
JŚNĀ_479,9	 na ca kārya tā niḥsvabhāva tayoḥ viparyaye bādhakam pratibandha sādhakam kiñcid asti na ca kvacid ubhaya darśana mātreṇa vyāpti siddhiḥ na api pratibimbe sva abhimata niḥsvabhāvatā saṃbhavaḥ pratibhāsasya aśakya niṣedha tvāt prasādhya sādhyam sādhya śūnyatā parihāre sādhana antara abhāvāt anavasthā adhyavasita niṣedha upadarśane ca tena eva vyāptiḥ pratibhāsinām iti siddha sādhanam na ca kvacid hetu phala bhāvaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ iti sādhana śūnyatā ca dṛṣṭāntasya atha pakṣa dharmasya hetoḥ loka āśrayāt siddhiḥ iti ced loka āśrayāt tarhi śūnyatāyai jala añjaliḥ deyaḥ na hi idam arddha jaratīyam labhyam sādhane loka āśrayaḥ na sādhye iti 
JŚNĀ_480,1	 pratibimbe loka āśrayeṇa api śūnyatā dṛṣṭā iti ced bimbe tarhi viparyaya darśanāt na sādhanam na ca pramāṇa pratikṣiptasya pakṣīkaraṇam iti nyāyaḥ viparyaya adarśane darśana abhimānaḥ iti ced pratibimbe api niḥsvabhāva tva adarśane darśana abhimānaḥ bhavataḥ kevalam lokaḥ pramāṇam āśritaḥ bimbe viparyaye pramāṇam api loke eva bimbe ca apramāṇībhavan pratibimbe api katham pramāṇam syāt pratibimbe saṃvāda abhāvaḥ eva pramāṇam iti ced yatra tarhi saṃvāda saṃvāsaḥ tatra durvāraḥ śūnyatā virahaḥ kṣmāruha ādau saṃvāda abhimāna mātram iti ced vaktavyaḥ tarhi saṃvādaḥ arthaḥ yathā prasiddhāt anyaḥ yatas pratibimbe tad abhāvaḥ pratīyate 
JŚNĀ_480,2	 pramāṇa nirūpaṇa asaha tvam mahīdhara ādau= asaṃvādaḥ iti ced kena punar pramāṇena bhavān nirūpaṇam anusarati iti prakrame pratyakṣa anumāna upamāna śabdāni tad itarāṇi vā abhidadhīta na tu ekasya api sva saṃvedanam antareṇa siddhiḥ iti mahāntam āyāsam āviśet tatas pramāṇa antara tiraskāre api sva saṃvedanāt eva siddhaḥ sindhu bhūdhara ādeḥ yadi ca kvacid pramāṇa nirūpaṇena saṃvāda upalambhaḥ tadā tad abhāvāt nivarteta na ca tat asti punar api para caraṇa paricaraṇam eva śaraṇam iti kaḥ eṣa nyāyaḥ prasaṅga mātreṇa tad upagama apekṣāyāḥ kṣama tvāt na ca sarvadā prasaṅgaḥ eva viparyaya artham eva hi prasaṅga saṅgamaḥ na ca kadācid asvātantryeṇa hetoḥ upanyāsaḥ eṣām kṣamaḥ kṣamāyām vā sāṃvṛtam tāttvikam vā pramāṇam āśrayaṇīyam iti na bhūdhara ādeḥ siddhi pratibandhaḥ anyasya tu vijñaptimātra vyavahāraḥ eva adhikaḥ na tu pratibhāsamāna rūpa siddhi pratibandhaḥ yadi ca nirūpaṇa akṣama tvam kṣmādhara ādeḥ asaṃvādaḥ tat eva tarhi niḥsvabhāva tvam iti kim pratītya utpādena 
JŚNĀ_480,3	 kim ca śaktinā antarīyakaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śaktiḥ eva ca sattvam iti niḥsvabhāva tva sādhane virodhaḥ ca doṣaḥ atha śūnyebhyaḥ eva dharmebhyaḥ śūnyāḥ dharmāḥ prajāyante iti na doṣaḥ tat kim idānīm siddhānta pāṭha mātreṇa doṣa parihāraḥ evam hi ati prasaṅgaḥ syāt yasmāt eva hi yat janma śaktam tatra tat eva tat śakte api niḥsvabhāva tva kalpanā kva upayoginī anyasya tu pūrva apara virahaḥ eva tad kalpanā pratighāta hetuḥ iti anavadyam kim ca sarva pratīti mūla tvāt dhanmaḥ hetu phala sthitim śūnyatā kāṃkṣiṇaḥ yatnāt viparītaḥ tu ayam vidhiḥ tat ayam ahetuḥ eva niḥsvabhāva tve pratītya utpādaḥ nāma 
JŚNĀ_481,1	 atha pratītya utpādaḥ eva niḥsvabhāva tvam vyavahāra mātra sādhanam tu kadācid tadā api kārya tā mātram śūnya tvam uktam bhavati iti adhara sthiti pātaḥ eva samaya mātram vā kurvataḥ na kaścid paripanthi iti kim anena svayam eva vā kṛtrime svabhāva tvam avakalpya tad abhāvena svabhāva hānim bruvataḥ śṛṅgeṇa api turaṅgatām avakalpya tad abhāvena na turaṅgaḥ iti api pratyeyam katham tarhi yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā sā eva te matā iti ādikam saṅgaṃsyate adhara sthiti apekṣayā tāvatā aṅgena śūnyatā avatāram abhipretya tat etādṛśāni sādhanāni api kvacid na prakṛta vādinī upayoga bhāñji bhavanti vyāpaka anupalambha vat vā sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa apoḍha pauruṣāṇi na aṅga nirūpaṇa āyātam iti sthitam tatas niḥsvabhāva tayā na kathañcid api sva saṃvedana siddhiḥ iti nirastam tad sādhana pramāṇa an avakāśāt pratyakṣeṇa pratibandha ādi abhāvāt ca sādhana vinākṛtāyām siddhau= atiprasaṅgāt sva prakāśini tu na anya apekṣita tathā siddhiḥ eva sva saṃvedana sthitiḥ 
JŚNĀ_481,2–482,1	 yat api ucyate na ca api jaḍa svabhāva tā madhyamakam vādinam prati kasyacid siddhāḥ yena tad vyāvṛttam ajaḍam sva saṃvedanam syāt iti tat api gātra abhreḍa mātram na trāṇāya tathā hi yoga ācārasya na ajñānam na aśūnyāḥ madhyamā vidaḥ tathā api jñāna śūnya ādi vyavahāraḥ na bādhyate yadi sarvathā na asti iti tad vyāvṛtti nibandhana dhvani niṣedhaḥ hanta ! āditas prabhṛti kṣaṇika nirātmāni īśvara kṛta aprakṛti mayā ādi śabda unmūla nāda vyavahāraḥ eva āyātaḥ nañaḥ nirviṣayasya asti na prayogaḥ iti bruvan paribhūtaḥ sva vācā eva param vā bodhayet katham antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_482,2–482,3	 tadā āstām tāvat ati ghṛṇākaram etādṛśam tasmāt na sva saṃvedane dūṣaṇa kaṇasya api saṃbhavaḥ tatas sāṃvṛta tva viśeṣaṇam apanīya sva saṃvedanam asti eva iti vyavasthānam anapetam nyāyāt yadi adya api na abhiniveśa āveśi mānasam iti svayam api yadi bodhe bādhakasya pravṛttiḥ tad upanata viśeṣe kīdṛśī nirvṛtiḥ vaḥ atha katham api tatra āpattitaḥ kim na sākṣāt anubhuvi tad abādhā bodhi bhittiḥ svavittiḥ para bodhaḥ tu tattvataḥ asan= api abhimāna mātra siddhau yadi anumāna antareṇa bādhyate bādhyatām svarūpa paryavasāyi tu tadā pratyakṣam sva rakṣāyām na kṣamam iti na kṣamam eva iti sakalaḥ iha vicāraḥ saṃvṛtau= eva yuktaḥ kvacid anubhava bādhaḥ na kṣamaḥ saṃvṛtau ca na ca param anubhūtam kvāpi tad vodha bādhe kaliḥ iva kalinā ayam hanyatām astu śāntiḥ 
JŚNĀ_483,1–483,2	 atha tathāvidha ślāghā āspadam madhyamām upakramya samyak yoga ācāra darśanam etat pariniṣṭhitam iti kaḥ ayam kramaḥ na eṣa doṣaḥ asya api bhagavatā eva uktasya nīta neya vibhāga kāri tayā tad vyākṛtaiḥ āryaiḥ yuvarāja paryantaiḥ pratigṛhītasya ācāryaiḥ prasādhitasya ullāgha ślāgha tvāt sa ākāra siddhiḥ ca iyam upakrāntāḥ nanu tathā api paraspara virodhi dvayam api na satyam tatra eka hṛdayaḥ api svayam daiśikaḥ bhagavān vineya apekṣayā na iyam api upadiśet bhūmi lābhinaḥ tu dṛṣṭa satyāḥ katham ekaika pakṣa pātinaḥ ekaikam atadeśanāt viśiṣṭānyadeśane hi para anurodhāt etat iti syāt parama gambhīraḥ ca mantra naya samaye ete eva sthitī samāśritya yayoḥ iyān virodhaḥ iti katham hṛdaya nirvṛtiḥ samantabhadra tve api ucyate virodhaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ atra vastu ekam ubhaya sthitau samāropa apavāda antam uktam hi muni śāsanam 
JŚNĀ_483,3	 atra hi citra prakāśa rāśau na aprakāśa kaṇasya āropaḥ sahyaḥ na api prakāśa leśasya apavādaḥ śalyena viśata aṅgena cchidyamānena vā yathā vyathā āropa apavādābhyām tathā iha sphurat ākṛtau apavādaḥ na saṃvṛttyā na āropaḥ tattvataḥ yadi na tau dvau= api tattvena yadi kim vā virudhyate tathā sat asat lakṣaṇa nirdeśe ārya svāmī abhūta parikalpaḥ asti dvayam tatra na vidyate śūnyatā vidyate tu atra tasyām api sa vidyate abhūta parikalpaḥ tu citta caittāḥ tri dhātukāḥ iti bruvan grāhya grāhakayoḥ eva āropaniṣedham prati bhāsamānasya eva apavāda niṣedham āha tatra abhūtam grāhya grāhaka dvayam parikalpyate anena asmin vā pṛṣṭhaja vikalpa dvāra iti abhūta parikalpaḥ tat eva vistareṇa darśayan sa bhāṣyaḥ sūtra alaṃkāraḥ 
JŚNĀ_484,1–484,2^1	 yathā māyā tathābhūta parikalpaḥ nirucyate yathā māyā kṛtam tadvat dvi abhra antiḥ nirucyate yathā māyā mantra parigṛhītam bhrānti nimittam kāṣṭha loṣṭa ādikam tathā abhūta parikalpaḥ paratantra svabhāve veditavyaḥ yathā māyā kṛtam tasyām māyāyām hasti aśva suvarṇa ādi ākṛtiḥ tad bhāvena pratibhāsitā tasmin= abhūta parikalpe dvaya bhrāntiḥ grāhya grāhaka tvena pratibhāsitā parikalpita svabhāva ākāra tā veditavyā atra bhāṣye kāṣṭha loṣṭa ādikam iti pravīṇa śilpi racita hasti ādi saṃsthānam citritam ca samyak prayuktam loṣṭam mantra ādi parigrahāt vikṛta indriya jñāna dharma pīta ādi ābhāsa parikaritam ādi śabdāt mṛṇmaya pāṣāṇa ādi parigrahaḥ yathā māyā akṛtam iti vyākhyeya anuvādaḥ tasyām māyāyām iti kṛtrima hasti ādau 
JŚNĀ_484,2^2	 upalakṣaṇam etat yathā ukta loṣṭe ca hasti ādīnām ākṛtiḥ varṇa saṃsthānam tad bhāvena hasti ādi tvena pratibhāsitāḥ adhyavasitā asataḥ anubhava abhāvāt marīciṣu jalasya iva adhyavasāna mātram yat tatra hasti ādīnām tad māyā mātra kṛtam uktam iti arthaḥ tathā dvaya bhrāntiḥ iti sambandhaḥ tasyāḥ vyākhyānam parikalpita svabhāvam grāhya grāhakam eva tasya eva ākāraḥ ullekhaḥ asya abhūta parikalpasya khaṇḍa dvaya pratibhāsāt tasya bhāvaḥ tat tā grāhya grāhaka tvena pratibhāsita adhyavasitāḥ yathā māyā ādiṣu hasti ādi avasāyaḥ tathā abhūta parikalpe dvaya avasāya iti eva arthaḥ tathā ca 
JŚNĀ_484,3–484,4	 yathā tasmin na tad bhāvaḥ paramārthaḥ tathā iṣyate yathā tasya upalabdhiḥ tu tathā saṃvṛti satya tā yathā tasmin na tad bhāvaḥ māyā kṛte hasti tva ādi abhāvaḥ tathā tasmin paratantre parama arthaḥ iṣyate parikalpitasya dvaya lakṣaṇasya abhāvaḥ yathā tasya māyā kṛtasya hasti ādi bhāvena upalabdhiḥ tathā tasya abhūta parikalpasya saṃvṛti satya vetna upalabdhiḥ atra māyā kṛtam māyā racitam mantavyam hasti ādi bhāvena upalabdhiḥ jñāna madhyavasāyaḥ iti arthaḥ saṃvṛti satyam grāhya grāhakam tad bhāvena upalabdhiḥ adhyavasāyaḥ etena mūlena viṣayeṇa viṣayi nirdeśaḥ iti darśitam 
JŚNĀ_485,1–485,2	 tad abhāve yathā vyaktiḥ tad nimittasya labhyate tathā āśraya parāvṛttau= asat kalpasya labhyate yathā māyā kṛtasya abhāve tasya tad nimittasya kāṣṭha ādikasya vyakti bhūtāya upalabhyate tathā āśraya parāvṛttau dvaya bhrānti abhāvāt abhūta parikalpasya bhūta arthaḥ upalabhyate mūle asat kalpaḥ iti abhūta parikalpaḥ uktaḥ bhūta arthaḥ dvaya vivekaḥ 
JŚNĀ_485,3–485,4	 tad nimitte yathā lokaḥ hi abhrāntaḥ kāmataḥ caret parāvṛttau= aparyastaḥ kāma cārī tathā yatiḥ yathā tad nimitte kāṣṭhā dau= abhrāntaḥ lokaḥ kāmataḥ carati svatantraḥ tathā āśraya parāvṛttau= aviparyastaḥ āryaḥ kāma cārī bhavati svatantraḥ atra ca kāṣṭha ādi yantra mātram etat bhrānta jñāna ākāraḥ vā na hastī na vā suvarṇam iti niścayāt iti mantavyam 
JŚNĀ_485,5–485,8	 tad ākṛtiḥ ca tatra asti tad bhāvaḥ ca na vidyate tasmāt astitva nāstitvam māyā ādiṣu vidhīyate eṣa ślokaḥ gata arthaḥ na bhāvaḥ tatra ca abhāvaḥ na abhauvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva ca bhāva abhāva aviśeṣaḥ ca māyā ādiṣu vidhīyate na bhāvaḥ tatra ca abhāvaḥ yaḥ tad ākṛti bhāvaḥ na asau na bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva ca yaḥ hasi a ādi abhāvaḥ na asau na abhāvaḥ tayoḥ ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ māyā ādiṣu vidhīyate yaḥ eva tatra tadā akṛteḥ bhāvaḥ saḥ eva hasti ādi abhāvaḥ yaḥ eva hasti ādi abhāvaḥ saḥ eva tad ākṛti bhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_485,9–485,10	 tathā advaya abhatā ca asti tad bhāvaḥ ca na vidyate tasmāt astitva nāstitvam rūpa ādiṣu vidhīyate tathā atra abhūta parikalpe advaya abhatā ca asti dvaya bhāvaḥ ca na asti tasmāt astitva nāstitvam rūpa ādiṣu vidhīyate abhūta parikalpa svabhāveṣu atra ca dvayam iva abhāti iti dvaya ābhaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ antar bahīrūpa pratibhāsī svabhāvaḥ 
JŚNĀ_486,1–486,3	 na bhāvaḥ tatra ca abhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva ca bhāva abhāva aviśeṣaḥ ca rūpa ādiṣu vidhīyate na bhāvaḥ tatra ca abhāvaḥ yā dvaya ābhāsa tā na abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva ca yā tad dvaya bhāvanāstitāḥ bhāva abhāva aviśeṣaḥ ca rūpa ādiṣu vidhīyate yaḥ eva hi dvaya ābhāsa tayā bhāvaḥ saḥ eva dvayasya abhāvaḥ iti samāropa apavāda anta pratiṣedha artham iṣyate hīna yānena yānasya pratiṣedha artham eva ca 
JŚNĀ_486,4^1	 kimartham punar iha bhāva abhāvayoḥ aikāntika tvam aviśeṣaḥ ca iṣyate yathākramam samāropa apavāda anta pratiṣedha artham iṣyate hīna yāna gamana pratiṣedha artham ca abhāvasya hi abhāva tvam viditvā samāropaṇam karoti bhāvasya bhāva tvam viditvā apavādam na karoti tayoḥ ca aviśeṣam viditvā na bhāvāt udvijate tasmāt na hīna yānena niryāti iti evam vistaraḥ tathā abhisamaya alaṅkāre tātparyam sattā ca nāma dharmāṇām jñeye ca āvaraṇa kṣayaḥ yat paraiḥ ucyate śāstuḥ atra vismīyate mayā iti prakaraṇa antara vat kalpita dharma niṣedha abhiprāyeṇa abhidhāya sāmānya vacanāt prakāśa niṣedha śaṅkā saṅkoca artham eva āha na apaneyam atas kiñcid prakṣeptavyam na kiñcana draṣṭavyam bhūtataḥ bhūtam bhūta darśī vimucyate iti tatra atas iti prakāśamānāt citrāt saṃkleśa kāla apekṣayā abhūta parikalpa śabda vācyāt sva saṃvedya tayā na kiñci d apaneyam prāk api abhāvāt asmābhiḥ apanītam kim atra ced asattva āpāda nāt anyaḥ nihnavaḥ nāma kīdṛśaḥ 
JŚNĀ_486,4^2	 sa kiñcid prakṣeptavyama prakāśam grāhya grāhakam anākāram ātma ādi vā kim tu yat bhūtam tat bhūtena eva grahītavyam na abhūta tvena iti apavāda niṣedhaḥ bhūtam eva ca bhūta tvena adhimoktavyam na abhūtam iti samāropa niṣedhaḥ kim tat bhūtam abhūtam vā iti viśeṣa niṣṭhām netum madhya anta vibhāge sat asat lakṣaṇam anusaran dvayam abhūtam dvaya śūnyatā dharmiṇam ca bhūtam avagacchati eka kartṛka tvāt atra api vā atas iti pratyakṣa parāmarśāt prakāśa rāśeḥ a pratikṣepa arha tvāt bhūta tvam anyasya tu kalpita mātra tvāt abhūta tvam tatas ca tad śūnyatāyāḥ api bhūta tvam sūcitam eva 
JŚNĀ_486,4^3	 tatas bhūta sākṣāt kārī vimucyate bhūta grāhī vā śruta cintābhyām abhyāsa krameṇa vimucyate iti arthaḥ samāropa apavāda vinirmuktā ca madhyamā sthitiḥ tat eva ca yoga ācāra darśanam iti na vastu bhedaḥ na hi pratibhāsaḥ eva āropaḥ na api bādham arthāmi iti uktam ye tu atra api pratibhāsamānam api pudgala nirākāra vedanā ādi grāhyatā ādi ca āropayanti ye ca apratibhāsamānam api apavadanti sarvatas aṃśataḥ vā tad ubhaya puruṣa āśrayaḥ virodhaḥ paraspara pratikṣepa hetuḥ anarthāya tasmāt ayam eva śūnyatā anayaḥ yathottaratantram 
JŚNĀ_487,1^1	 tatra śūnyatā vikṣipta cittāḥ ucyante na ca yāna saṃprasthitāḥ bodhisattvāḥ tathāgata garbha śūnyatānaya vipralabdhāḥ ye bhāva vināśāya śūnyatā vimokṣa sukham icchanti sataḥ eva dharmasya uttara kālam ucchedaḥ vināśaḥ parinirvāṇam iti ye vā punar śūnyatā upalambhena śūnyatām pratisaranti śūnyatā nāma rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa kaścid dharmaḥ asti yam adhigamiṣyāmaḥ bhāvayiṣyāmaḥ iti tatra katamaḥ sa tathāgata garbha śūnyatānayaḥ ucyate na apaneyam atas kiñcid upaneyam na kiñcana draṣṭavyam bhūtataḥ bhūtam bhūta darśī vimucyate ityādi vistaraḥ tatra sataḥ eva ākārasya alīka tām āsthāya paścāt ucchedān upagamāt na prathamaḥ vipralambhaḥ śūnyatā arthe na api dvitīyaḥ nirākāra vedanā ādi vat vyatirikta anugamāt nanu atra atas tathāgata dhātoḥ na kiñci d apanā iyam saṃkleśa nimittam na atra kiñcid upaneyam vyavadāna nimittam iti vyākhyātam 
JŚNĀ_487,1^2	 satyam kim tu dharmeṇa dharmi nirdeśāt tathāgata dhātu śabdena śūnyatā dharmā citta vivarta grāhyaḥ eva grāhyaḥ kalpanā niveśini śūnyatā mātre kasyacid prakṣepa ādi śaṃkā virahāt tatas ca saṃkleśa vyavadāna nimittayoḥ sadasatoḥ nirodha utpāda pratiṣedhena yathā ukta apavāda samāropa niṣedhaḥ eva vivakṣitaḥ yatas anantaram āha evam yat yatra na asti tat tena śūnyam iti paśyati yat punar atra avaśiṣṭam bhavati tat sat iha asti iti yathābhūtam prajānāti samāropa apavādāt na parivarjanāt aviparīta śūnyatā lakṣaṇam anena paridīpitam iti tat na prakāśa rūpa niṣedhaḥ ayam eva ca madhyama arthaḥ athavā śūnyam na api na ca aśūnyam tasmāt sarvam vidhīyate sattvāt asattvāt sattvāt ca madhyama apratipad ca sā iti anena sat madhyamā ākhyā pratipad ca sā eva iti uvāca madhya anta vibhāga śāstre sākṣāt akalpam yuvarāja mauliḥ kim atra pāṇḍitya pariśrameṇa tasmāt iyam eva sthitiḥ madhyamā yoga ācāra nayaḥ ca vastutas iti 
JŚNĀ_488,1^1	 enām eva ca abhisandhāya ārya nāgārjuna pādānām api ātma graha nivṛtti artham skandha dhātu ādi deśanā sā api dhvastāḥ mahābhāgaiḥ citra mātra vyavasthayā iti ślāghā itara diś apakṣepāt tu cittamātram idam sarvam iti yā deśanā muneḥ tad trāsa parihāra artham bālānām sā na tattvataḥ iti uktam prāyasaḥ bahis iva artha śaktyā eva sattām cittasya api prapannaḥ janaḥ tathā ca adya yāvat vārtika bhāṣya kārayatnaiḥ api na prabodham āsādayati pratyutānya abhiprāya dūṣaṇābhyām upakramataḥ iti cittamātram iti sāmānya vacanam prāyastva sūcana param na tu sarvathā aniṣṭya eva ślāghāyāḥ niravakāśa tva prasaṅgāt na ca eṣām svapna vat anutpanna aniruddha pratibhāsa mātrāt anyatra ślāghāsaṃbhavaḥ 
JŚNĀ_488,1^2–489,2	 dharmaḥ na utpadyate kaścid na api kaścid nirudhyate utpadyante nirudhyante pratyayāḥ eva kevalāḥ iti vacanāt ca sa ākāra nayaḥ eva eṣām saṃbhoga kāya varṇanāt ca anyaiḥ iva upacāra ādeḥ avarṇanāt katham tarhi na raktaḥ harinmāñjiṣṭaḥ ityādi uktam dharma kāya abhiprāyeṇa tathā ca anantaram eva advayāya namaḥ astute iti uktam prasajya vṛttim āśritya kim ca vande pratyātma vedyam dharma kāyam iti sva saṃvedana ādare api viparīta śaṅkā iti dhik svātantryam sva saṃvedanasya citra ākāra pratibhāsaḥ eva viśrāmāt tat ca dṛḍhīkṛtam iti na dharma kāya ādi apalāpinām vilāpena kiñcid tasmāt yuvarāja ruci tā eva āryāṇām madhyamā iti sthitam etena yaiḥ api rūpa kāyam adhiṣṭhāya prakṛti bhrama bhāvataḥ nirodhaḥ citta caittānām dharmakāya āptiḥ iṣyate teṣām api vyavasthā duḥstha iti pratipāditam tathā hi kva rūpa mātra adhiṣṭhānam sarvatra eva prasādhanāt sva saṃvedana rūpasya bhrama bhāva virodhinaḥ 
JŚNĀ_489,3	 tasmāt tattvataḥ jñānam api na vicāra saham saṃvṛttyā tu pañca api skandhāḥ santaḥ iti kutas eka niṣedhaḥ anya sthāpanam ca iti na vācyam etat kim ca kā iyam saṃvṛtiḥ nāma yadi avicāra ramyā pratītiḥ hanta ananta tvāt saṃvṛteḥ kva pañca skandha niyamaḥ prakṛti īśvara ṣaṭpadārtha ādi buddhayaḥ api vividhāḥ sahaja abhisaṃskāri kavyāmoha bhājaḥ paryante bālasya api prāpya candra bimba ādi gocarāḥ kara praṇidhāna ādi anumeyāḥ tad tad vastu saṃvṛti satya tvena grāhayeyuḥ evam astu iti ced kim idānīm nirodhāya mārga anveṣaṇena veda īśvara ādeḥ api gaveṣaṇīya tvāt atha saṃvṛtau= api kvacid eva paritoṣa lābhāt na sattā āśrayaṇam evam tarhi yathā vihita lakṣaṇa pratyakṣa anumāna rūpā eva saṃvṛtiḥ āśrayaṇīyāḥ tathā ca satyavāntara vyavasthā mātram etat nāma rūpam iti 
JŚNĀ_490,1–490,2^1	 pratyakṣāt anumānāt vā na rūpa skandha sādhanam tābhyām eva tu bādhā asya jñānam eva akhilam tatas kevalam tatra api anumānam eva bādhakam iti kila tatra api na sthitiḥ tathā sati jñānam eva saṃvṛtisat na rūpam tasmāt āsaṃsāra sthāyi jñānam eva saṃvṛtyā yuktam bādhane api tasya prakāśāt anyasya aprakāśāt santu vā saṃvṛtyā pañca api skandhāḥ svayam vā buddheḥ tu nivṛttitaḥ syāt nivartana prayatnena vā na ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ sthira svabhāva tva sādhanāt citta santateḥ nirālambā praśāmyati iti ced nanu śāntiḥ anupadravaḥ ucyate iti kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ nāśaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti ced tadā api yadi ālambanam viṣayaḥ idānīm api nirviṣaya eva tattvataḥ katham prabandhena pravartate 
JŚNĀ_490,2^2	 saṃvṛtyā tu na kadāpi viṣaya vyāvṛttiḥ atha ādhāraḥ na asyāḥ kiñcid ādhāreṇa gaurava abhāvāt atha kāraṇam tadā idānīm api samanantara pratyayaḥ kāraṇam na tadā api vicchidyate viśeṣataḥ aśeṣa jagat kṛpā sahāyam kleśa abhāvāt na pratisandhi saktiḥ iti ced hita sukha icchayā aśuci sthāna pāta lakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāraḥ eva mā bhūt prabandha mātreṇa tu vṛttiḥ kena vāryate viśeṣeṇa dayāloḥ tasmāt na svayam nivṛttiḥ prayatnaḥ tu dvayoḥ ekasya sthāpane nivartane vā anyasya guṇa doṣa darśinaḥ syāt 
JŚNĀ_490,3	 tatra jaḍa rāśeḥ kīdṛśaḥ guṇaḥ yaḥ na caitanyasya kīdṛśaḥ vā asya doṣaḥ yaḥ na jāḍya rāśeḥ prakṛti bhrānta tvāt citta caittānām iti ced jāḍya rāśi tvāt rūpasya iti kim na ucyate yadi ca tāvatā eva bahu mānaḥ loṣṭa iṣṭakā prabhṛtayaḥ varam bhavadbhyaḥ iti kim atas param pareṇa kartavyam kim ca kā iyam bhrāntiḥ nāma na tāvat alīka tā eva rūpe api prasaṅgāt atha alīka tve api na rūpe bhrānti vyavasthā kim tu vijñānaḥ eva evam tarhi paribhāṣā mātram etat sva saṃketa anurodhāt ca vibhāge tyāga parigrahau tathā ca sati rūpe api tathā paribhāṣya tyāgaḥ bhavet yadi tu vijñāna mātra vādinaḥ bhagavataḥ prātikūlyena tasya eva nirodhaḥ iṣṭaḥ na rūpasya tathā api kim bhrama tu apoṣaṇena mā bhūt jaḍa rūpasya pratyāsattyā bhrānti saṃbhāvanā 
JŚNĀ_490,4	 vijñānasya viparyāsaḥ upalabdhaḥ na jaḍa eka rūpasya iti ced nanu viparyāsaḥ bhramaḥ iti ekaḥ eva arthaḥ tasya eva ca svarūpa nirūpaṇam idam iti kva idam uttaram saṃbadhyate atha ātasmin tad graha ādiḥ yathā samayam prasiddhaḥ bhrama arthaḥ tarhi tad vyatyayena abhrāntiḥ api vijñānasya upalabdhā eva syāt etat bhramaḥ tāvat bhramaḥ eva ubhaya siddheḥ atra saḥ api bhramaḥ eva mad vicāreṇa iti evam tarhi sarve eva bhramaḥ iti śūnyatā jñānam api bhramaḥ nanu na śūnyatā ajñānam nāma tattvena iti ced tattvataḥ na asti iti bhavatu bhramaḥ tu śūnyatā jñānam iti kāpīyam vyavasthā api ca 
JŚNĀ_491,1–491,3	 tattvena kiñcid nā asti iti śūnyatā nāma kathyate tattvena eva bhramaḥ asti iha na abhramaḥ asti iti kā api diś yatas vicārāt akhila bhrama sthitiḥ saḥ eva kim bhrānti ratha abhramaḥ bhavet yadi bhramaḥ asau= akhilaḥ bhramaḥ katham na ced saḥ eva bhrama bhāva varjitaḥ paramārthataḥ na kaścid bhramaḥ api abhramaḥ iti ced yuktam api etat kevalam saṃvṛtau yathā skandha pañcakam tathā kaścid bhramaḥ kaścid abhramaḥ iti avaśya upeyam na hi tadā api nīle nīla buddhiḥ bhramaḥ śvete tu syāt evam rajata buddhi ādayaḥ dvidhā abhidhātavyāḥ anyathā na rūpaskandhaḥ nāma saṃvṛtyā ca citta caitta nirodhaḥ rūpa skandha sthitiḥ iti vivakṣitam tatra ca bhramaḥ eva tasya tu na samyak bodhaḥ tad artham eva sarva ārambhāt 
JŚNĀ_491,4–491,5	 saṃvṛttau dvayam api asti tattvataḥ dvayam api asat bhramaḥ eva akhilaḥ iti kva idam saṃbadhyate vacaḥ atha kadācid jñānaḥ eva bhramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ na rūpaḥ iti ucyate skandheṣu eva dṛṣṭaḥ iti api syāt śāstṛ saṃmateṣu vā doṣa darśanam bhagavantam api tyājayet avāntara bhedaḥ tu sādhāraṇaḥ prakṛtyā bhrāntiḥ iti api yadi sarva vyakti anuyāyi tvam vivakṣitam tadā anena eva pratyuktam atha kvacid bhrāntiḥ bhavanti api vikṛtiḥ eva iti arthaḥ tathā api katham ayam niścayaḥ ubhayasya api darśanāt tatra āgamaḥ tāvat cittasya prakṛta pariśuddha tvam āgantuka tvam tu doṣāṇām asakṛt abhidhatte anubhūyate ca viparyāsa śaṅkayā paripīḍyamānam manaḥ samyak parijñāne ca nirvṛtam iti vibhaktam sarvajña siddhau 
JŚNĀ_491,6	 na ca sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ anyatara apekṣayā idam abhidhātum śakyam dvayoḥ dvaya darśanāt ekatra tathā abhāve vā tasya eva prahāṇiḥ aḥ tu bheda apratipattau vā pratipattaye śāstra antaram anveṣaṇīyam tat ayam alakṣaḥ kṣepaḥ prakṛti bhrāntāḥ citta caittāḥ iti kim ca citta cetta nirodhaḥ ca dharma kāya sākṣātkriyā ca iti vyāhatam citta dharma tvāt sākṣātkriyāyāḥ sākṣātkāra upacāraḥ asau= iti ced kutas gati antara abhāvāt iti ced tatra sākṣātkāri citta sthitiḥ eva astu kim nivartana yatnena iti katham gati antara abhāvaḥ tat etat netram utpāṭya darśana kautuka vinodanam na prekṣāvatām kṣamate 
JŚNĀ_492,1	 loṣṭa ādayaḥ vā dharma kāya sākṣāt kāriṇaḥ teṣām prabhāva atiśaya abhāvāt iti ced na khalu tāvatā dharma kāya sākṣātkriyā kim tu adhigama viśeṣeṇa anyathā mantra ādīnām api sāmyāt buddha tvam ca yadi evam abhāva atiśaya saṃbhave sākṣāt kriyayā kim kartavyam maṇya ādi vat yadi evam lakṣaṇa anuvyañjanaiḥ api kim kartavyam sāmarthya viśeṣasya maṇi mantra ādi vat anyathā api saṃbhavāt iti na dharma kāyaḥ na api saṃbhoga kāyaḥ iti pariśuddhā buddha sthitiḥ athavā rūpavat adhigamasya api prabhāva phala atiśaya darśanāt rūpam eva nivartyam astu sthāpyam vā dvayam api kasyacid kenacid artha siddheḥ 
JŚNĀ_492,2	 sarva sāmarthyasya rūpaḥ eva āropayitum śakya tvāt iti ced vijñānaḥ eva śakya tvāt viparyayaḥ astu na iti kośa pānam pramāṇam tathā api ekasya sthāpane kadācid citta bhāgasya eva syāt iti na rūpasya eva sthitiḥ rūpa sāmarthyāt ca jñāna sāmarthyasya eva mahat tva darśanāt tatra eva bharanyāsaḥ ucitaḥ katham anyathā vijñāna mātram jagat iti na iyam tasmāt pañca skandhaka saṃvṛti pakṣe api na citta caitta nirodhaḥ sādhuḥ na ca sā eva saṃvṛtiḥ sarva śūnyatā pakṣe api antimā saṃvṛtiḥ vaktum saṃvṛti tve na yujyate antyā ca jñāna rūpā eva no ced dravya guṇa ādi api tasmāt sa ākāra cittasya eva sthitiḥ sva saṃvedana siddhaḥ ca dharma kāyaḥ iti 
JŚNĀ_492,3–493,1	 yadi evam sva saṃvedanasya vastu viṣaya tvāt katham prajñaptisat śūnyatā abhidhānam dharma mātram dharma kāyaḥ bhagavataḥ tatas saṃbhoga kāyāditara jñānam eva nirākṛti śūnyatā ālambanam dharma kāyaḥ iti apare viduḥ atra api pakṣe saṃbhoga saṃkhyātāt buddha nāmataḥ bhidyamānam katham tasya svabhāvaḥ bhavitum kṣamaḥ 
JŚNĀ_493,2–493,5	 tasya api buddha rūpa tve dvau buddhau bhinnna lakṣaṇau tasya eva buddha rūpa tve dharma kāyaḥ aparaḥ punar saḥ eṣa buddhaḥ dharmaḥ ced tasya iti na samanvayaḥ na dharmi dharma bhāvena na sāmānya viśeṣataḥ saṃbhoga dharmaḥ buddhaḥ ced buddhaḥ prājñaptikaḥ bhavet tatas api anyaḥ atha dharma ātmā dravyam ced sā paramparā dharmatā ced na saṃvittiḥ saṃvittau nīla tā ādi vat anākāreṇa kim sā anya asaṃbhogasya eva dharmatā
