JŚNĀ_123–126	 kutra saṅketakaraṇam śabdaḥ yasya avabodhakaḥ kasya avabodhakaḥ śabdaḥ yatra saṃketaka kriyā vācoyuktiḥ iyam kīdṛśī dṛś eva yadīkṣase vācya vācaka tām kvāpi mama api pratipādaya alīkaḥ yasya ca ākāraḥ kim tasya api viśiṣyate alīke yadi saṃketaḥ sati a ākāre katham na saḥ phalam na sati api ākāre alīke suṣṭhu na vidyate artha āropāt alīke ced satye kena niṣidhyate 
JŚNĀ_127–130	 kaḥ artha āropaḥ atha satya tve alīka tve api sa kīdṛśaḥ satyaḥ alīkaḥ athavā ākāraḥ vastu āropaḥ tu kiṃkṛtaḥ asatya go tva bhānāt hi bhānāt satya ākṛteḥ na kim satye api satya ākāraḥ ced satye api ālīkyam ākṛte asatyabhānāt āropaḥ yuktaḥ satye katham bhavet nanu asatye api saṃketaḥ asatya tvau= asitau katham tasmāt artha kriyā śaktavaḥ tu āra upa ātmana stanau saṃketa karaṇam satya asatyayoḥ na viśiṣyate 
JŚNĀ_131–134	 yathā tathā tve vā ākārasya avasāyaḥ na vidyate na bhānam arthasya tatas vācya tā kasya tatvataḥ abhāne pratibhāne vā na ca āropaḥ api kasyacid pratītya utpāda bhedena vyavasthā mātram īdṛśaḥ nirvikalpāt vikalpasya bhāve leśa anusāriṇaḥ saṃketa kāri vacanāt buddhi ākāre viśeṣiṇi saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ iti āsthā tādṛś śabda sthitau punar pravṛtti ākṣepa buddhi ātma bhāve vācya vyavasthitiḥ 
JŚNĀ_135–138	 evam pravṛtteḥ ākṣepi vikalpa ākāra janmani sataḥ jalādiḥ āropaḥ satya asatya samaḥ ca saḥ tatas yadi api tattvena na āropaḥ kasyacid kvacid vyavahāra kṛtaḥ tu eṣa pratiṣeddhum na śakyate marīcau jala vat yāvat anātmani ātma kalpanam bhramaḥ saḥ eva saṃsāraḥ nirvāṇam tatva saṃsthitiḥ tat atra yāvat na vicāra saṃbhavaḥ bhavaḥ ayam anyaḥ śamaḥ iti ayam nayaḥ vicāra līlā lulite tu mānase bhavaḥ śamaḥ vā kaḥ iha iti kathyatām tathā ca 
JŚNĀ_139–141	 naca antaram kiñcana vidyate anayoḥ sat artha vṛttyā śama janmanoḥ iha tathā api janma kṣayataḥ vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubha karma kāriṇām tathā nirvāṇam ca bhavaḥ ca eva dvayam etat na vidyate parijñānam bhavasya eva nirvāṇam iti kathyate jala buddha avalīka tvam na ākārasya prayojakam bhrama vyavasthitau tadvat grāhya grāhaka viplave 
JŚNĀ_142–145	 satye asatye athavā ākāre na aparādhaḥ asti cetasaḥ yadi pravṛtteḥ ākṣepī bāhya āropaḥ na jāyate sati a ākāram api jñānam kalpakam gocare tatas pravṛtti ākṣepaṇāt duṣṭam pravṛttiḥ saṃsṛtiḥ yatas pravṛttiḥ avikalpe api vikalpe api na sā iti ced viśeṣa saraṇe api eva tatra aniṣṭiḥ tatas na kim anādi kālikā abhyāsāt yathā kiñcid kvacid kṣamam tathā vikalpasya api iyam yogyatā niṣṭi sādhanī 
JŚNĀ_146–149	 vikalpe kleśa bhāvaḥ adhisattva anām atas eva hi tad vāsanā āhatau yatnaḥ yāvat hetu phala sthitiḥ alīka go tvā ākāreṇa khyātiḥ siddhāḥ na gomateḥ satya ākāraḥ api saṃkalpaḥ adhyavasāyaḥ pravartanāt satyasya go tva ākārasya go buddhau bhāsanam yathā tādātmyam ca avyatiricaḥ anāropaḥ vastu tā api ca tathā nīla ādi nirbhāse satyasya dhavala ādinaḥ prakāśa bhāva siddhyā eva tādātmyam satyam iṣyatām 
JŚNĀ_150–153	 yat vastu rūpam tat vastu go vikalpe yathā ākṛtiḥ prakāśa vastu rūpam ca nīlam na sphūrtiḥ anyathā tādātmya dvaidha nirdhūteḥ siddhaḥ bādhaḥ ca vāstavaḥ na īkṣate ca sitāt anyaḥ tathā anāropa sādhanam śaktaḥ tu alīkaākāraḥ na upakāra apakārayoḥ kādācid kaḥ sphuran= artha samarthaḥ vā mṛṣā katham etad sva rūpa bādhe hi bādhakaḥ api asya kiṃkaraḥ tatas svayam prakāśa ātmā śuddhaḥ vā kliṣṭaḥ eva vā 
JŚNĀ_154–157	 alīka mātram sat api na hi kvāpi vibandha kṛt vibandhaka tve alīka tvam eva alīkam prasajyate gocara antara sañcāraḥ na iṣṭaḥ eva kva bandha kṛt sva saṃvittau punar tasya śatena api na bandhanam sva vitti bandhe hi jaḍaḥ prakāśaḥ ca sva hetutaḥ iti ayuktam atas aśakyam sva abhedena api vedanam sva hetoḥ ca tathā utpattiḥ vedanam ca tad ātmanā bhāvaiḥ svīkṛtam eka tvam vādinām mahatī vyathā 
JŚNĀ_158–161	 tad nālīkaḥ ayam ākāraḥ spṛśati enam sphuran= api tau= atā api asya saṃkleśe santāna antarataḥ na kim vastu san= api santāna bhedaḥ tasya na bādhakaḥ asatyaḥ punar ākāraḥ bādhāya iti kim api adaḥ tad pravṛtti nivṛttibhyām saṃsāraḥ nāma na aparaḥ tattva avasāya bhedeṣu pratibandhe prasādhite viśeṣaḥ ca avasāyānām ākārāt paratas na ca jala ākārāt visaṃkalpāt jalaḥ eva pravartate 
JŚNĀ_162–165	 jala ākāra vikalpaḥ api jala ākārāt akalpataḥ bhavan= api na tanmātrāt vāsanā sacivā tu asau tad vāsanā samudghāte kevalānna avikalpataḥ grāhya grāhaka bhāva ādeḥ abhūtasya vikalpanam nirvikalpam api jñānam hetuḥ ced vāsanā āśrayāt yathā pravṛtta ākārasya tat kṣaye astu udaya kṣayaḥ ā bodhi citta grahaṇāt dāna ādi abhyāsataḥ kramāt ati viśva vapuḥ bhoga pratiṣṭhā ākāra saṃbhavaḥ 
JŚNĀ_166–170	 āsaṃsāram aviśrāma para artha sva artha saṃpade ruceḥ tad eka niṣṭha tvāt tad hetau= asamaḥ śramaḥ mahā kāruṇya sampanna puṇya jñāna śriyā antataḥ viśuddhi vāsanā bandha prabandha sthairya sādhanaḥ tatra asat kalpanā kālaḥ saṃkleśaḥ śuddhiḥ uttaraḥ sa ākāraḥ eva vijñāne tasmāt eṣā vyavasthitiḥ advaita citra guṇa saṃbhṛta śāta pūrṇa sādhāra dheya maya maṇḍana cakra rūpam sādhyam vidhūya na ca santanayaḥ api sāraḥ sa ākāranītiḥ iti nīti pugasya jīvaḥ dṛṣṭam śarma viśiṣṭa sādhana para adhīnam yathā bhāvanā api asya udeti tathā eva yat sukha rasa ākṛṣṭa aṅganā ādeḥ api niṣpattau ca tathā nirantara sukha syanda abhinandya ākṛtau bādha ābādha vidhau sametara tayā śarma eka śeṣaḥ astu kim antara ślokau 
JŚNĀ_1–4	 mā bhūt anyaḥ astu sa ākāraḥ eva sādhya itara sthitiḥ eka aneka vivekena tu ālīkyam kena vāryate eka aneka vivekaḥ astu na tu ālīkyam prakāśinaḥ bādhā hi rūpe avasite na adhyakṣa viṣaye kvacid rūpa mātrasya nirbhāsaḥ dvi candre api na bādhyate bādhā sparśa ādinaḥ rūpasya api tad sahacāriṇaḥ evaṃsvapne api putra ādiḥ kalpitaḥ asan na dhī tanuḥ mantra ādhipatyāt loṣṭa ādau pīta bhāsaḥ na bādhanam 
JŚNĀ_5–8	 rukma ādi kalpitam bādhyam loṣṭa ādeḥ tu na bhāsanam na ca avasāyaḥ tena asya na vidhiḥ na ca bādhanam anyathā ākhyātiḥ asya iti duṣṭam tad khyāti asaṃbhavāt asat khyātiḥ tu vikhyātā kalpitā sat apekṣayā loṣṭam eva anyathā ākhyāti iti abhiprāyāt na sā api kim vyavahāreṇa nirbandhaḥ tattvataḥ tu na tad dvayam anyathā eva avabhāsante tad rūpa rahitāḥ api iti ukteḥ bhāvikaḥ tu atra boddhavyaḥ arthaḥ yathā uditaḥ 
JŚNĀ_9–12	 tathā eva adarśanāt teṣām anupapluta cakṣuṣā kalpita tvam anena uktam ābhāse kanaka ādinaḥ na bādhaḥ kasyacid tattve saṃvṛttau kalpitasya tu prakāśinaḥ api bādhaḥ ced bādhe api āśvāsanam kutas anumāba adhika āśā ca na vastu viṣaya iti ced avaśyam asti vastu ātma niṣṭhā asau na anyathā pramā bhātam eva purā vastuvidhau= adhyavasīyate niṣedhaḥ api svabhāva arthaḥ paryante paryavasyati antara ślokau 
JŚNĀ_13–16	 pareṇa viṣaya abhāva jñāpanam sa padīṣyate sva arthe pravṛttimat jñānam abhāvam gamayet katham sva gocara upasthānena viṣaya antara bādhane sva gocarasya tena api sthānāt kim na asya bādhanam tad artha karma hāneḥ ced bhinnā sārtha kriyā yadi anya hāne anya hāniḥ kim abhede tu sphurati asau rūpam samīkṣya dāha āt i ha aneḥ sparśasya bādhanam na ca sparśaḥ sphurati atra bādhā sā eva asya kim paraiḥ 
JŚNĀ_17–20	 viṣayīkṛtam anyat vā bādhyeta prathamam yadi sphurat eva katham bādhyama sphūrtau bādhakena kim na bādhā bhinna kāla tve sva sva kāle spharat tayā tathā eva kāla abhede api nīla pīta sita ādi vat tasmāt āropavat bādhaḥ pratītya utpāda bhedataḥ kalpitaḥ na tu tattvena sva vid mātre tu kā kathā yāvat na siddhiḥ sva vidaḥ bādhakam tāvat astu ced nirūpya sva vidaḥ asiddhim bādhaḥ tarhi pravartatām 
JŚNĀ_21–24	 pūrvam pravartana ārambhe pratijñābādham akṣataḥ yadi brūyāt para jñāna niṣedhe sva vid āgatā yathā yathārthāḥ cintyante vivicyante tathā tathā svayam tu vittiḥ chāyā iva dhāvataḥ api anatikramāḥ ataeva niṣedhasya prakrame api jagau guruḥ yadi idam svayam arthānām rocate tatra ke vayam na bādhā ced pareṇa asti siddhiḥ api astu na anyatas sva vid siddhiḥ api idānīm sādhana antarataḥ katham 
JŚNĀ_25–28	 kutaścid kasyacid siddhiḥ na tattve kim tu saṃvṛtau yathā dhūma āditas agni ādeḥ matā siddhiḥ iyam tathā sva vid siddhiḥ atattve ced yāvat sādhya aṅga saṃsthitiḥ tāvat tat eva tattvam yat siddham sādhana śaktitaḥ yad sādhana balāt siddhe sva vid mātre punar param siddhi bādhanayoḥ asti na avakāśaḥ kutaścana na bodhayan kiñcid anyat prastutatyajana kṣamaḥ prastutam vā tyajan na anyasya anyatas grahaṇa kṣamaḥ 
JŚNĀ_29–32	 ataeva para jñānam gṛhyamāṇam sva bādhanam sva vitti hetu traiḥ ūpya jñānasya api avakāśataḥ tyaktam tu teṣām rūpāṇām abodhe api na bādhakam sādhya siddheḥ prakāśaḥ hi vidyate paratas na tu svatas api mā bhūt iti ced yadi bhāsaḥ na sarvathā yuktam etat prakāśaḥ tu sannāḥ ti asmāt na kim svatas prakāśaḥ asti na tu svasmāt atas anyasmāt katham na ced anyathā bādhakam yadvat tadvat na asti svatas matau 
JŚNĀ_33–36	 sva ātmani atha kriyā rodhaḥ dhārayoḥ sva= chidā na hi dhārā api tīkṣṇā svayam iti ucyate kim na sūriṇā sva hetoḥ eva tīkṣṇā sā jāyate na anyatas yadi prakāśa rūpa jñānam ca sva hetoḥ eva jāyate upakārya upakāri tva kṛtam mā bhūt prakāśanam tad rūpa janma rūpam tu svayaṃśabdena śabditam yathā pradīpa paṭayoḥ upakārāt prakāśanam dṛṣṭam tathā pradīpasya svayam kim na samīkṣitam 
JŚNĀ_37–40	 akṣa apekṣā api dīpe ced sā kumbhe kim na vidyate tad sattve api ghaṭaḥ dīpam dīpaḥ na anyam apekṣate yatna ādau sati api yathā para preraṇa vāraṇāt svayaṃgama uktiḥ tad jāti vāraṇā eva sva bhāsane āgame api svayaṃvitteḥ bādhe ca pratibhāti yā grāhya grāhaka bhāvasya sūkṣmasya tad apohanam ekatra phala hetu tvam yathā āśaṅkya nivāritam grāhya grāhaka tā ekatra tathā āśaṅkya nivāritā 
JŚNĀ_41–44	 na karma kartṛ bhāvena sva prakāśam atas matam parān apekṣya bhāsantu sva hetoruditam manaḥ sandhi nirmocane vyaktam tad artha pratipādanāt artha ābhāsa pravṛtti ādi vacanaiḥ api sūcanāt tasmāt na yukti āgamayoḥ pratibodhi sva vedanam doṣaḥ saḥ eva anya vidam bādhate agniḥ iva drumam na ca sva vitti vyāpāram para vitti grahaḥ arthitaḥ yatas asya guṇa doṣābhyām sva vitteḥ avalepanam 
JŚNĀ_45–48	 doṣaḥ na sattā mātreṇa vyāpāreṇa tu sa smṛtaḥ akārya kṛti kāla sthāḥ nigrāhyā kṣmā ādayaḥ na hi na sva vitteḥ atas doṣaḥ para vitteḥ tu vistarāt tad anya vitti vyāvṛttaḥ prakāśaḥ niyataḥ svayam na svatas na api paratas bhāsaḥ ced bhāsaḥ eva na na aloṣṭa ādi samānasya vaktum etat ca sāmpratam svatas anyatas ca vyāvṛttau= api bhāsaḥ yadi iṣyate eka aneka viyogaḥ api vastunaḥ sattvam astu vaḥ 
JŚNĀ_49–52	 eka aneka viyoge api yadi vastu sadiṣyate svatas anyatas ca abhāve api bhāvaḥ bhāsasya kim na vaḥ bhāsamānāḥ tathā api ete na bhāvāḥ śakya nihnavāḥ asādhāraṇa bhā sattvāt jñāna tvam ca bhaviṣyati rūpa nirbhāsataḥ adhyakṣa rūpa tā api asti vāstavī na ca sva vittau doṣaḥ ca iti atas kiñcid na duṣyati nanu sva vittiḥ nīlasya iti etat eva kutas bhavet na hi idam ekam ātmānam vetti yena sva vedanam 
JŚNĀ_53–56	 antar śāta ādi rūpasya bahis śīta śita ādinaḥ bhāsanāt kasya kena astu katham vittiḥ na ca ekatā bhāsanam tāvat asti eṣām tad niṣeddhum na śakyate na bhede tat ca yuktam ced abhedaḥ astu dhiyaḥ tadā bhinna ākṛtīnām eteṣām abhedaḥ api katham bhavet tat kim iṣṭaḥ dvaya abhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ eva dvayasya vā bhedaḥ abhedaḥ dvidhā advedhāḥ dhī rūpe astu yathā tathā nālīka tvam prakāśasya bādha gandha virodhinaḥ 
JŚNĀ_57–60	 na hi sva anubhavasya asti bādhaḥ kvāpi upapattibhiḥ saḥ eva tāsām prabhavaḥ niṣṭhā tatra eva vā yatas bheda ādiḥ eva cintyaḥ astu na prakāśasya vāraṇam yatra prakāśa viśrāmaḥ svar paraḥ vā saḥ eva san sattve ca sva vidaḥ siddhe kim eka aneka cintayā tad abhāvāt abhāvena tasyāḥ kila phala sthitiḥ prakāśa mātre siddhe api svavittiḥ katham ucyate tāvatā ca artha saṃsiddhau kim sva vitti girā api naḥ 
JŚNĀ_61–64	 pratyakṣa bādhā hi para pratijñā yā vivakṣitā svarūpasya pareṇa api prakāśe sā ca sidhyati svarūpa sākṣāt karaṇāt adhyakṣa tvam na ca aparam pareṇa api prakāśasya rūpam tāvat vibhāti tat tathā api sva vid asti eva kim tu svasya iti na svayam bādhā siddhau tathā anyena vittivāde api na kṣatiḥ na siddha apara vittiḥ ca svavittiḥ ca na sidhyati tatas pratyakṣatā nāma kīdṛśī bādhanam yayā 
JŚNĀ_65–68	 sākṣātkāra svarūpasya pratyakṣa tvam udīritam viśeṣa lakṣaṇasya api na eva kṣatiḥ aniścaye sāmānyena viśeṣāṇām yathā vyāptiḥ tathā asya taiḥ siddhe viśeṣam sāmānyam sāmānye anyataraḥ sa ca manuṣya niścaye bhāvyam śūriṇā vā apareṇa vā na ca tad dvaya sandehe manuṣyasya parābhavaḥ niścite tad dvaya abhāve bhavet mānuṣyakakṣatiḥ kim tu mānuṣyake asiddhe siddhe vā na dvaya kṣatiḥ 
JŚNĀ_69–72	 parokṣe vastuni tatas dvidhā ābhāsa kṣati sthitau bhāsa bhraṃśaḥ astu niśceyaḥ bhāse tu ekā sthitiḥ dvayoḥ na prakāśe asti sandehaḥ sandehaḥ tu bhidā abhidoḥ bhidā abhidoḥ anyatarā prakāśe avaśyam anvitā bheda abheda sthitiḥ yadvat upapattim apekṣate na evam prakāśaḥ apekṣāyām prakāśaḥ katham ucyate dvābhyām vyāptiḥ prakāśasya syāt ced eka sthitiḥ dvayoḥ vyāptiḥ ca na kvacid siddhā tathā api akṣatiḥ īritāḥ 
JŚNĀ_73–76	 na abhinnena na bhinnena vedanena viditi atas katham pratyakṣa bādha iti vyāptau= eva idam api alam upapādyam samakṣa tvam atha ced bādhya vādinā abhyupeta pramāṇasya pratyakṣam kīdṛśam param vyāpaka anupalambhe api rūpa traya nirūpaṇe pāramparyeṇa sākṣāt vā apekṣa avaśyam samakṣadhīḥ tatra kīdṛś samakṣam te yadi asmākam na vidyate tat sāṃvṛtam ced bādhā api sāṃvṛtāt aḥ tu siddhi vat 
JŚNĀ_77–80	 rūpa āptau sāṃvṛtam śaktam na bādhaḥ iti kaḥ kramaḥ yad jātikam ca tad siddhau tad jāti eva astu bādhakam sāṃvṛta tvam ca mānasya meyasya yadi saṃvṛteḥ adya api cintyate sā eva na siddhā sādhanam katham anyasya asaṃvidaḥ anyena yadi vyāpti grahaḥ hatiḥ viplutaḥ anya grahaḥ ca astu sva vitteḥ kiyatī kṣatiḥ anupeta pramāṇasya jyāyasī mūka tā eva yat bruvatā niyatam kiñcid bādhyam vā sādhyam eva vā 
JŚNĀ_81–84	 saṃvṛtaḥ mānam iṣṭam ced vicāraḥ api eṣa saṃvṛtiḥ saṃvṛtau= api na iṣṭam ced bruvan jetā yathā tathā na ca hetau prakāśa ādau= api evam bādha saṃbhavaḥ asādhāraṇa nirbhāsa vyatyayasya aprasādhanāt amunā api samakṣeṇa viṣayīkṛti mātrakam na sattā siddhiḥ asya iti bādhaka avasaraḥ na kim vidhi sādhana mānena viṣayīkaraṇāt param na sattā sādhanam kvāpi śaktiḥ sattā tu laukikī 
JŚNĀ_85–88	 sarvatra māna vihite sattā bhedasya sādhanam yuktam nāśa ādi vat sattā ābādhakam tu virudhyate tasmāt svam vā param vā syāt pratyakṣam viṣayasya tu yasya svarūpa nirbhāsaḥ saḥ eva adhyakṣa gocaraḥ tad atad rūpa vimatau= api bodhya vapuḥ sthiram jñāna jñeya upanayanāt eva sādhaka bādhakam na sva rūpeṇa rūpam tu gaveṣyam bhrānti śāntaye pratibhāsini rūpe ca na bhrānteḥ asti saṃbhavaḥ 
JŚNĀ_89–92	 kalpanā apoḍham eva astu kim abhra anta padam tadā bhrānti dvaividhya nirvāha nirbandhaḥ api mudhā iti ced satyam ācārya diś nāga pādena kṛtam eva tat vārtike tu kṛtam lokasya ākāre bāhya ropaṇāt ākāram ākāra tayā śuktim śukti tayā tathā yadi vidyāt janaḥ kvāpi katham syāt kasyacid bhramaḥ atadātmani tādātmya vyavasāyaḥ tadā dvayoḥ vikalpa varjanena eva nivartya iti yujyate 
JŚNĀ_93–96	 yadā tu artha grahaḥ jñānasya ākāre sarva dehinām dṛṣṭaḥ ati spaṣṭa vicchinna pratibhāse viśeṣataḥ tadā mṛṣā artha grahaṇam tad adhyakṣam akalpanāt prāptam gṛhīta graha vat tad dvitīyam viśeṣaṇam loka buddhim apekṣya eva sa taimiram iti īritam spaṣṭa ābhasya asya kalpa tva moha apohāya ca aparam tat tattva cintā avasare kalpita apekṣayā eva sā bhrama vyavasthā spaṣṭa ābhe na su a ākāra vyapekṣayā 
JŚNĀ_97–100	 bhrama tvam avikalpe api vikalpān na tatas param atas vikalpe viśrāntam avikalpe api kathyate vikalpakasya bhrānta tve bhramaḥ anyaḥ syāt na vā bhavet vikalpakasya abhrānta tve bhramaḥ eva na vidyate antara ślokau nirbhāsinaḥ samakṣa tvam asatya tvam apohati atas prakāśe mithyātvam arthasya eva na dhī tanoḥ tasmāt māne bhidā bheda vivāde api prakāśinaḥ pratyakṣa gocara avasthā siddhā sattvam tat eva ca 
JŚNĀ_101–104	 tat citram etat advaitam grāhya ādi virahāt matam sāṃvṛtī puṃvadeka ākhya aneka vyavahṛtiḥ mudhā yāvat eva bahis adhyavasāyaḥ tāvat eva pṛthak etat idam ca tad matiḥ tu sakala iti saḥ eva jñāna pāṇi caraṇa ādiḥ asau hi nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne jñāna upādhiḥ ananya bhāj aśakya darśanaḥ tam hi patati arthe vivecayan yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva anubhūyate iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākārasya cetasaḥ saṃgraha ślokau 
JŚNĀ_105–108	 citra vijñānaḥ iti ābhyām ekān eka atyayaḥ kramāt jñāna upādhitayā bādhyam vivicya aśakyadṛś tayā mudhā aneka dhvaniḥ tam hi ityādinā śeṣa saṃgrahaḥ yat yathā ityādinā yuktiḥ eka saṃjñā tad ekatā pratyakṣa anumayoḥ na api virodhe śakti saṃśayaḥ akṣa apekṣā anumā nityam na anumā apekṣam akṣa jam parihṛtya yathā adhyakṣa virodha m anumodayaḥ tathā anumā virodham na parihṛtya akṣa saṃbhavaḥ 
JŚNĀ_109–112	 parokṣe ca anumānyatra virodhaḥ iti kaḥ kramaḥ akṣeṇa bādhyate kaḥ arthaḥ na iyam tad gocare pramā sva ātma sattā sthitā vakṣāt anumānāt guṇa antaram pratthakṣeṇa avyavahṛteḥ parokṣa tva vyavasthiteḥ tatas adhyakṣa antareṇa api na anumāyāḥ tulā kvacid sva saṃvittyā tu yat siddham tatra cintā eva kīdṛśī sva vittiḥ eva apara māna yoniḥ na ced pramāṇam kim iha pramāṇam atas tayā sādhita bādhiteṣu na bādha siddhyoḥ aparasya śaktiḥ antaraślokaḥ 
JŚNĀ_113–116	 ekān eka atyaye api asmāt sphurataḥ kena vāraṇam na ca tābhyām sthiti vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva bādhanāt lakṣaṇasya kriyā kāle vyāpti vid ca hata amunā bahis eva eṣa niyamaḥ sāmarthyāt avatiṣṭhate dvaite api na bahis dharmaḥ sarvaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dhiyaḥ sthairya āsthairyavat advaite syāt na yadi eṣa na kṣatiḥ pūrva apara tayā vyāptam sthairya ādi na tad atyaye eka aneka tayā avyāptiḥ sthiteḥ buddhau na saṃvidaḥ 
JŚNĀ_117–120	 vyāptiḥ eva atha tat api sattvāt asti ekam enayoḥ sarva ākāra avasāyaḥ hi na pratyakṣe api vastuni bhāsamāne ca nīla ādau bhāsaḥ eva samakṣadhīḥ tatas bhedaḥ atha nirbheda śaṅkā pīta ādinaḥ punar tatra api vyatinirbhāsāt eva abheda vyavasthitiḥ bhede hi bheda santāna jñāna vat na prakāśanam upādāna abhidaḥ anyonyam prakāśaḥ iti ced asat upādāna abhidapi eṣām na hi bhedam apohati 
JŚNĀ_121–124	 pratyāsattiḥ yat api asti grahaṇa arthaḥ tu kaḥ bhavet sā eva ced sphuraṇam sākṣāt na bhavet sā eva hi prathā tad balāt ca grahe hetu phalayoḥ kim na vedanam sānnidhya tāratamyam tu tatra eva etat apekṣayā paraspara graha arthaḥ atra sāhitya sphuraṇam yadi āsanna deśa sphuraṇam agrahe api mithas na kim tasmāt na citrabhāsaḥ syāt saṃstu na kṣamate bhidām anyonya saṃvid āveśāt svabhāva abheda lakṣaṇāt 
JŚNĀ_125–128	 citrāt eva sadā utpattau= eka upādāna tā api kā na saṅkocadaśāyām api ekāntāt citra niścayaḥ yāvat ca janma citrasya citrāt eva upalabhyate bhinna upādāna tā tāvat kṣamate na mithas prathām upādānasya yadi ca citrasya api ekatā sthitiḥ upādeyasya kim na iti citrāt vaitamabādhitam katham vā nīlam api ekam atha aṇu pratibhāsanam tatas aneka sthiti bhraṃśe kena kasya sthira ekatā 
JŚNĀ_129–132	 eka aneka tva virahaḥ api atas eva iti ced matiḥ astu sattvasya bādhā tu na śakyā iti niveditam etat tu prakṛtam bhede yuktam na anyonya bhāsanam upādānābhidaḥ nāma na uttarasya balam yatas tasmāt saha upalambha niyamāt abhedaḥ nīla pītayoḥ svabhāvaḥ hi tayoḥ saṃvid abhinna iti bhidā kutas saṃvitti niyamaḥ na asti bhinnayoḥ nīla pītayoḥ ittham arthe patet puṃbhyām ekaikasya api darśanāt tat āha 
JŚNĀ_133–136	 nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne jñāna upādhiḥ ananya bhāj aśakya darśanaḥ tam hi patati arthe vivecayan yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva anubhūyate iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākāre api cetasi bāhya vat na hi bodhe api puṃsoḥ ekaika darśanam yatas anyathā api grahaṇāt niyamasya parāhatiḥ bhāsate yat yat ekam tat yathā citre sita ākṛtiḥ bhāsate ca akhilam citram pīta śīta sukha ādikam 
JŚNĀ_137–140	 eka abhimata boddhāram apekṣya idam udīritam na anaikāntika tā tasmāt santāna antara bhāsinā dṛṣṭānte sādhya śūnya tvam na viparyaya bādhakāt bhāsaḥ sthūla tayā vyāptaḥ na hi asau= aṇuśas bhidi ekaika aṇu nimagna tvāt saṃvittiḥ na parasparam na ca ekāṇu prakāśaḥ asti sthūlam eva sphurati atas bāhya aṇūnām pratībhāsaḥ buddhiḥ ekā sthavīyasī jñāna aṇūnām kaḥ ekaḥ tu pratibhāsaḥ bhaviṣyati 
JŚNĀ_141–144	 aneka tra api avayavinī ekā citra ākṛtiḥ matiḥ khaṇḍaśas vyavahārāya sādhvī buddhau tu kā gatiḥ ekatra api aṃśini mitiḥ sa ākāra ekā prasādhitā vyavahāraḥ anyathā na iti sthaulyam jñānasya dustyajam tasmāt sthūla tayā vyāptaḥ nirbhāsaḥ tad nivṛttitaḥ nivartamānaḥ anekasmāt eka tve vinayasya te yathā sajātīya matāt bhāgāt bheda nirākriyā anābhāsa prasaṅgena vijātīyam atāt tathā 
JŚNĀ_145–148	 tat na astu sādhyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na ca āśaṅkā viparyaye sādhyasya adhyakṣa bādhā api na adhyakṣasya apratiṣṭhiteḥ na mānam anya grahaṇam na bheda grāhikā sva vid bhinnam asmāt idam iti vikalpaḥ vāsanā anvayaḥ yathā bāhyam svatas bhinnam svatantraḥ kalpayati ayam bāhyam bāhya antarāt bhinnam tathā kalpayati svayam bāhye sati api na anyasmāt adhyakṣam bheda vedanam anyasya api graha prāpteḥ tad viśiṣṭa ātmanaḥ grahāt 
JŚNĀ_149–152	 asmāt bhinnam iti idam ced svarūpam grāhya vastunaḥ sa avadherasya bhāsaḥ syāt na vā grāhyam tad ātmanā vinā avadhim pratītaḥ hi bhedaḥ abhedaḥ katham na saḥ bheda upacāra mātram syāt na bhedaḥ tattvataḥ tatas para asaṃkīrṇa rūpasya grahaṇam kila bheda vid para asaṃkīrṇam anyasmāt bhinnam eka artham īdṛśam na tu anya saṃkīrṇa gatau= anyasya api ucitaḥ grahaḥ anya agrahe tu akīrṇasya kevalasya āgrahaḥ katham 
JŚNĀ_153–156	 kevalaḥ yatas eva ayam bhāti tena eva na anya yuj anyasya api prakāśe hi gṛhītaḥ kevalaḥ katham kevalasya grahaḥ na syāt anyasya sphuraṇe yathā anyasya asphuraṇe api evam parāmiśraḥ hi kevalaḥ amiśraḥ ayam pareṇa iti vivartaḥ manasaḥ yathā tathā eva yadi anubhavaḥ para dhīḥ kena vāryate parihṛtya param tātaḥ yathā miśra grahaḥ na san parihṛtya param tātaḥ tathā bhinna grahaḥ na san 
JŚNĀ_157–160	 vastu mātra grahaḥ tasmāt adhyakṣeṇa iti yujyate na bhinnam na api ca abhinnam grahītum tena śakyate na bhedya bhāsāt avadheḥ jñātam nābhedya śaṅkarāt na anyat ca bheda abhedābhyām vastu vastu grahaḥ katham sarvam artha avyatibhidi jñānāt api bhidā kutas bhede ca avadhimāne api sarvaḥ sarvasya gocaraḥ kim tu bāhya graha āveśe cintāyām dūṣaṇam samam yathā bheda graha aniṣṭau tathā sati a vadhi grahe 
JŚNĀ_161–164	 tasmāt bāhya grahaḥ cakṣu nirmīlyāḥ tu yathā tathā bheda agraham tu anuvadan tattva vid bādhyatām katham na adhyakṣam bheda kṛt kalpam taskaraḥ tu iha tad karaḥ sa sva aparādham adhyakṣe kṣipati iti bhidaḥ sthitiḥ nīlāt iva tat ekam ca katham etat sametu ced nīlam aṃśa antaram ca ekam iti kim bhāti saṅgatam na ekam tat api ced tarhi kva aṇutaḥ bhidi bhāsanam na parīkṣā kṣamaḥ ca aṇuḥ kutas kasya tadā bhidā 
JŚNĀ_165–168	 mā bhūt avastutaḥ vā ced saḥ api ekatva hatau bhavet nirbhāsāt ekatā siddhau sva vitteḥ vastu tā sthitā atha deśa vitā ana āptiḥ nāma antara viyoginaḥ na deśa bhāna hānau ca bhāsaḥ iti api śakyate na sva ātma antara manya ātmā sa bāhyasya eva yujyate buddheḥ sva vitti niṣṭhāyāḥ yaḥ paraḥ tasya kā gatiḥ bhinnaḥ api deśa bhedena bāhya arthaḥ gṛhyate dhiyā dhīḥ tu deśa bhidāḥ bhinnā kena astu vyavahāra bhāj 
JŚNĀ_169–172	 sthūla deśā api tena aikyāt na buddhiḥ bhedam arhati yathā na bhedaḥ asya abhede bhedakaḥ tadvat ākṛteḥ citram tat ekam iti ced idam citrataram tatas tatas citratamam ca idam yat bhede vedanam mithas citra eka buddhi nirbhāse bāhyaḥ syāt vā na vā bhavet anābhāsa prasaṅge asyāḥ na bāhyāni na buddhayaḥ aṇu tve tad abhāve vā na dhī bhāsasya saṅgatiḥ tasmāt aṇutva abhāvābhyām viruddham bhāsanam dhiyaḥ tat āha 
JŚNĀ_173–176	 nīla ādiḥ citra vijñāne jñāna upādhiḥ ananya bhāj aśakya darśanaḥ tam hi patati arthe vivecayan yat yathā bhāsate jñānam tat tathā eva anugamyate iti nāma eka bhāvaḥ syāt citra ākārasya cetasaḥ jñāna tvena viśiṣṭaḥ ayam nīla ādiḥ citra vedane mithas svarūpān āpannaḥ asthūlaḥ draṣṭum na śakyate bhedasya pratthaṇu prāpteḥ nīla ādi cayaḥ eva vā aśakyaḥ draṣṭum uditaḥ ekaikasya grahāt dhiyā 
JŚNĀ_177–180	 aneka ākāraḥ ekaḥ atas eṣṭavyaḥ anubhavaḥ yatas asmāt idam bhinnam iti prakalpayati pṛṣṭa jam atas eva ca nīla ādi bhindan= artha vivecayet na buddhi rūpam tat bhede na jñānam na ca gocaraḥ tasmāt yena prakāreṇa karaṇena cakāsti dhīḥ sthūla eka tvena tena eva viśiṣṭā sa upagamyate viruddha dharma adhyāsaḥ ca tatra bhedāya kalpate yatra adhyakṣa kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ vyavahāra prasādhanāt 
JŚNĀ_181–184	 svayam vedanam eva atra pratyakṣam na ca tad bhide nīla ādi tve vikalpaḥ anuvartakaḥ tasya naḥ bhidi nirbhāsa bhedāt bhedaḥ ced saḥ eva ākāraḥ ucyate bahis meye pramāṇam sa tatra meye sva vid pramā sva vid ekīkṛtasya asya bhedāt bhinnam katham bahis yathā dhiyaḥ akṣāt grahaṇam sva vidā bhedanam tathā sphuraṇam pratibhāsaḥ ced sā sva vid na ca vidyate meya bhūta ākṛtaḥ bheda avasāyaḥ hanyate vidā 
JŚNĀ_185–136	 adhyakṣam eva hi bhinatti śiteḥ sitam ced tat bhidyamānam athavā abhidam eva bhindyāt bhede anya leśam api na iti kutas bhinattu bhindi āt abhedi manaḥ iti api kasya śakyam bāhyam na naśyati bhidāṇu tayā api abhede tu artha kriyā viraha saṃkarataḥ aśu mātram buddhiḥ tu naśyati bhidā eva vidā eva sattāt citrāpi atas na bhidam eti kim atra kurmaḥ 
JŚNĀ_187–189	 bhedaḥ tathā api abudha buddhi anurodhataḥ ced etāvatā api tava hetuḥ asiddhaḥ eva eka tva hāniḥ atha buddhi anurodha bādhaḥ bādhaḥ tu naḥ tat api na iti paroktam etat antaraślokāḥ eka aneka tayā vastu vyāptiḥ siddhāḥ yadi kvacid sarva śūnyatva samaye hetuḥ iṣṭa vighāta kṛt atha loka prasiddhau ca na sarvam loka kalpitam tattva vyavasthā śaraṇam kim tu mānena saṅgatam 
JŚNĀ_190–193	 na ca adhyakṣa anumānābhyām anaṃśam kvacid īkṣitam yasya rāśiḥ anekam syāt na api vastu ca kiñcana sthūlam ekaikam adhyakṣam na eka anekam vyavasyati vastutas tu kim ekam tat nānā vā kaḥ atra niścayaḥ na ca anya upagamaḥ sādhuḥ svatantre sādhane satām na prasaṅge ca mukhya arthaḥ tathā tve ca mata kṣatiḥ yasya ca ekatara tvābhyām sattva vyāptiḥ sa hanyatām abhra anta vitti mātreṇa sattā vādī tu jitvaraḥ 
JŚNĀ_194–197	 sarvatra hetau vyāptiḥ tu pramā siddhim apekṣate vyāpaka anupalambha ādau sā ca jñeyāḥ viparyaye māna siddham na ca vyāpti vyāpyam na upagatam svayam para vid para vittyā eva bādhyate tu iti kīrtitam na ca svabhāva svīkāraḥ avaśyam eka ādi karṣakaḥ vyāpteḥ asiddheḥ adya api pramāṇa vyāhatam ca tat pramāṇa vyasta rūpeṇa vyāptim ādāya tat hateḥ yadi bhāva asvabhāva tvam khara śṛṅga atyayāt na kim 
JŚNĀ_198–201	 ekān eka atyayāt tarhi bāhyasya api katham kṣatiḥ tattvataḥ anupalambhena grāhya lakṣaṇa hānitaḥ na ca anaśaika tā kim tu vivicyā śabda darśanam tat ca na asti bahis tasya abhāvataḥ tat samuccayaḥ vivicya aśakya darśi tvam eva eka tva maṇau= api citra jñāne tad akṣīṇam aruciḥ kva upayoginī buddhau tu citra rūpa āyām aśakya eka viveka dṛś para citta vivekena tad eka aneka lakṣaṇam 
JŚNĀ_202–205	 tat āha nīla ādi ityādi sphuṭātaḥ anya dhiyaḥ anya tā sā kutas anumiteḥ sā ced saṃvṛttyāḥ tu yathā tathā tathā api kalpitam nityam apekṣya kṣaṇitāḥ yathā dṛḍha prakalpāni amanaḥ apekṣyam ekam tathā dhiyaḥ tarhi aśakya viveka eka abhāve api anyatayā tatas śakya bhedam anekam syāt bāhye api ekacayena kim na evam yathā aṃśini hate tu aṇuḥ ekaḥ avatiṣṭhate tatas tat pracayaḥ anekaḥ tad doṣāt eva dūṣitaḥ 
JŚNĀ_206–209	 tathā tad pratirūpe asmin= ekān eka atyaye kṛte eka saṃhatiḥ eva ayam anekaḥ vādi saṃmataḥ śakyam evam api khyātum iti bāhya adhikārataḥ avayavi aṇu cintā ādya kṛtinaḥ abhūt parāśayāt yadā ca citra buddhyā eva bādhaka antara hānitaḥ eka aneka tvayoḥ bādhaḥ siddhiḥ kim na tayā tayoḥ ekatve citra tā bhāvaḥ nānātve sutarām yathā citra tva at na ekatā yadvat eka aneka sthitiḥ tathā 
JŚNĀ_210–213	 vinā viruddha upanayāt na bādhā pratiyoginaḥ tathā aneka hatau= eka sva vid anta rgamāt vada tathā ca vyāpaka abhāva viplavaḥ syāt mata sthiteḥ asmākam tu na doṣaḥ ayam dvayoḥ ced māna siddha tā sarvauvakāra hānena kim ekam na samam kvacid eka tā aneka tābhyām tat sphurat tābhyām tad anvitam syāt nāma tatas eka tvam bheda abheda ātma citrake atha ekasya anya bādhāya sādhanam sthitaye na tu 
JŚNĀ_214–217	 tasya api bādhanāt paścāt pratyāśā mahati īdṛśī pramāṇāt eka siddhiḥ ced paścāt bādhaḥ katham bhavet pramāṇa anna eka siddhiḥ ced anya bādhaḥ katham bhavet ekātyayaḥ na anya vidhiḥ syāt virodhaḥ svayam yadi vidhiḥ ca citra dhīrhanyāt viruddha upanayāt param udīryamāṇaḥ śaktaḥ ced aho prāmāṇika sthitiḥ kadāpi na ubhaya bhraṃśaḥ tathā api ekaika saṃsthitiḥ kadā api ekatayā aneka tayā bhāti kadāpi tat 
JŚNĀ_218–221	 tathā api bhāvaḥ ekasyām asiddhiḥ vyāpaka cyuteḥ artha śakti ādi rūpam ca yadi sattvam niṣidhyate kā kṣatiḥ bhāsa rūpam tu brahmaṇā api na bādhyate bādhane dharmiṇaḥ tasya bādhā syāt api na svayam yathā nīlam idam tadvat bhāti satyam na vā bhavet sandehe dharmiṇaḥ dharma sandehaḥ iti ced kutas tādātmyāt tattvataḥ iti tulyam nāśikatā ādibhiḥ 
JŚNĀ_222–225	 atha eka niścayaḥ anyatra pravṛttam api saṃśayaḥ hanti vyāvṛtti bhedena tat api prastute samam pratītiḥ eva sattāḥ tu yadā bāhye api tattvataḥ bhāsinaḥ dharmiṇaḥ tarhi kva bādhā kva ca saṃśayaḥ kadācid kenacid dṛṣṭasya anumāna tvam anyadā apātram sarvathā dṛṣṭeḥ pātram kim sat iti sthiteḥ vikalpaḥ eva anumiteḥ abhāve api prakāśanam tādṛśām yādṛśī sattā pratītiḥ api tādṛśī 
JŚNĀ_226–229	 pratītim eva sattām ca sphuṭayan vārtike kṛtī apratītya eva bāhyasya vinmātram pratyapīpadat tad bhāsa mātra rūpeṇa bhāta dravya ādi tāḥ mudhā citre bhāsa eka bhāvaḥ syāt na prapañcaḥ guṇa ādibhiḥ sthitiḥ hi vijñāna naye tāttvikī ca phala aṅga tā aho nairlajyam athavā sarva hi mahatām mahat pūrva apara parijñāne para jñāne ca tad grahaḥ kutas sva vitti niṣṭhāyām ubhayasya api asaṃbhavāt 
JŚNĀ_230–233	 abhāse pūrva para tā jñānam na jñāna hānitaḥ na bhāse pūrva para tā jñānam advaita saṃgateḥ sva eka rūpe dvaya abhāvāt sva anyayoḥ parayoḥ na vā phala aṅga bhāvaḥ para vid parihārāt tu na dvidhā tasmāt yathā para jñānam tathā hetu phala sthitiḥ yathā sva vitti viśrāmaḥ tathā saṃvṛti sati asau cittamātra vyavasthānam anutpādam vadanti atas pratītya utpanna tā api asmāt asiddheḥ api asādhanam 
JŚNĀ_234–236	 na ca pratītya utpanna tvam eva vācyā ca śūnyatā adhara sthiti yugmāt ca na evam bhedaḥ vṛthā śramaḥ anutpanna tvam eva astu hetuḥ na prācya dūṣaṇāt hāne api hetu phalayoḥ sphurat rūpam kva gacchatu tasmāt dharmaḥ kalpitaiḥ eva rūpaiḥ śūnyaḥ sarvaḥ bhāsabha agnā eva kaścid citrā dvaitam citra cakram tat etat bhāvyam bhāvyaiḥ aprapañcam śivāya 
JŚNĀ_237–238	 sākṣātkāraḥ na kāmam bhavati bhavabhṛtām yāvat asyāḥ daśāyāḥ heya upādeya sādhya prabhava paricayaḥ tāvat asti aprakampaḥ tasmāt saṃbhāra yugma abhyasana pariṇatau mūrti cetaḥ guṇābhyām yogī yogi īśvaraḥ asau nirupama nilaye labdha bodhiḥ prasiddhaḥ yathā suvarṇa guṇa rūpa saṃpadaḥ prakarṣa paryantam upetam akṣayam vimuktam ālīkya kalaṅka śaṅkayā tathā eva bauddham vapuḥ aḥ tu dehinām
